sura.ayah: bi- ism 'allaah ar- rah.maan ar- rah.em
al- h.amd li- 'allaah rabb al- caalamen
ar- rah.maan ar- rah.em
maalik yawm ad- den
'eyaa -ka nacbud wa- 'eyaa -ka nastacen
ihdi -naa as.- s.iraat. al- mustaqem
s.iraat. 'alladhena ancamta calay -him ghayr al- maghd.ob calay -him wa- laa ad.- d.aallen
alif-laam-mem
dhaalika al- kitaab laa rayb fe -hi huda(n) li- al- muttaqen
'alladhena yu'minon bi- al- ghayb wa- yuqemon as.- s.alaah wa- min maa razaqnaa -hum yunfiqon
wa- 'alladhena yu'minon bi- maa unzila 'ilay -ka wa- maa unzila min qabli -ka wa- bi- al- 'aakhirah hum yoqinon
'olaa'ika calaa huda(n) min rabb -him wa- 'olaa'ika hum al- muflih.on
'inna 'alladhena kafaro sawaa' calay -him 'a- andharta -hum 'am lam tundhir -hum laa yu'minon
khatama 'allaah calaa qulob -him wa- calaa samc -him wa- calaa abs.aar -him ghishaawah wa- la- -hum cadhaab caz.em
wa- min an- naas man yaqol 'aamannaa bi- 'allaah wa- bi- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- maa hum bi- mu'minen
yukhaadicon 'allaah wa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- maa yakhdacon 'illaa anfus -hum wa- maa yashcuron
fe qulob -him marad. fa- zaada -hum 'allaah marad.(an) wa- la- -hum cadhaab 'alem bi- maa kaano yakdhibon
wa- 'idhaa qela la- -hum laa tufsido fe al- 'ard. qaalo 'inna-maa nah.nu mus.lih.on
'a-laa 'inna -hum hum al- mufsidon wa- laakin laa yashcuron
wa- 'idhaa qela la- -hum 'aamino ka-maa 'aamana an- naas qaalo 'a- nu'min ka-maa 'aamana as- sufahaa' 'a-laa 'inna -hum hum as- sufahaa' wa- laakin laa yaclamon
wa- 'idhaa laqo 'alladhena 'aamano qaalo 'aamannaa wa- 'idhaa khalaw 'ilaa shayaat.en -him qaalo 'in(na) -naa maca -kum 'inna-maa nah.nu mustahzi'on
'allaah yastahzi' bi- -him wa- yamudd -hum fe t.ughyaan -him yacmahon
'olaa'ika 'alladhena ishtaraw ad.- d.alaalah bi- al- hudaa fa- maa rabih.at tijaarah -hum wa- maa kaano muhtaden
mathal -hum ka- mathal 'alladhe istawqada naar(an) fa- lammaa ad.aa'at maa h.awla -hu dhahaba 'allaah bi- nor -him wa- taraka -hum fe z.ulumaat laa yubs.iron
s.umm bukm cumy fa- hum laa yarjicon
'aw ka- s.ayyib min as- samaa' fe -hi z.ulumaat wa- racd wa- barq yajcalon as.aabic -hum fe 'aadhaan -him min as.- s.awaaciq h.adhar al- mawt wa- 'allaah muh.et. bi- al- kaafiren

yakaad al- barq yakht.af abs.aar -hum kulla-maa ad.aa'a la- -hum mashaw fe -hi wa- 'idhaa az.lama calay -him qaamo wa- law shaa'a 'allaah la- dhahaba bi- samc -him wa- abs.aar -him 'inna 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas ucbudo rabb -kum 'alladhe khalaqa -kum wa- 'alladhena min qabli -kum lacalla -kum tattaqon

'alladhe jacala la- -kum al- 'ard. firaash(an) wa- as- samaa' binaa'(an) wa- anzala min as- samaa' maa'(an) fa- akhraja bi- -hi min ath- thamaraat rizq(an) la- -kum fa- laa tajcalo li- 'allaah andaad(an) wa- 'antum taclamon
wa- 'in kuntum fe rayb min maa nazzalnaa calaa cabd -naa fa- i'to bi- sorah min mithl -hi wa- udco shuhadaa' -kum min doni 'allaah 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
fa- 'in lam tafcalo wa- lan tafcalo fa- ittaqo an- naar 'allate waqod -haa an- naas wa- al- h.ijaarah uciddat li- al- kaafiren

wa- bashshir 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat 'anna la- -hum jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar kulla-maa ruziqo min -haa min thamarah rizq(an) qaalo haadhaa 'alladhe ruziqnaa min qablu wa- 'uto bi- -hi mutashaabih(an) wa- la- -hum fe -haa azwaaj mut.ahharah wa- hum fe -haa khaalidon

'inna 'allaah laa yastah.ye 'an yad.rib mathal(an) maa bacod.ah fa- maa fawqa -haa fa- 'ammaa 'alladhena 'aamano fa- yaclamon 'anna -hu al- h.aqq min rabb -him wa- 'ammaa 'alladhena kafaro fa- yaqolon maa-dhaa araada 'allaah bi- haadhaa mathal(an) yud.ill bi- -hi kather(an) wa- yahde bi- -hi kather(an) wa- maa yud.ill bi- -hi 'illaa al- faasiqen
'alladhena yanqud.on cahd 'allaah min bacdi methaaq -hi wa- yaqt.acon maa 'amara 'allaah bi- -hi 'an yos.al wa- yufsidon fe al- 'ard. 'olaa'ika hum al- khaasiron
kayfa takfuron bi- 'allaah wa- kuntum amwaat(an) fa- ah.yaa -kum thumma yumet -kum thumma yuh.ye -kum thumma 'ilay -hi turjacon
huwa 'alladhe khalaqa la- -kum maa fe al- 'ard. jamec(an) thumma istawaa 'ilaa as- samaa' fa- sawwaa -hunna sabc samaawaat wa- huwa bi- kull shay' calem

wa- 'idh qaala rabb -ka li- al- malaa'ikah 'inni -y jaacil fe al- 'ard. khalefah qaalo 'a- tajcal fe -haa man yufsid fe -haa wa- yasfik ad- dimaa' wa- nah.nu nusabbih. bi- h.amd -ka wa- nuqaddis la- -ka qaala 'inni -y aclam maa laa taclamon
wa- callama 'aadam al- asmaa' kull -haa thumma carad.a -hum calaa al- malaa'ikah fa- qaala nabbi'o -ne bi- asmaa' haa'ulaa'i 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
qaalo subh.aana -ka laa cilm la- -naa 'illaa maa callamta -naa 'inna -ka 'anta al- calem al- h.akem

qaala yaa 'aadam anbi' -hum bi- asmaa' -him fa- lammaa anba'a -hum bi- asmaa' -him qaala 'a- lam 'a- qul la- -kum 'inni -y aclam ghayb as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- aclam maa tubdon wa- maa kuntum taktumon
wa- 'idh qulnaa li- al- malaa'ikah usjudo li- 'aadam fa- sajado 'illaa 'ibles 'abaa wa- istakbara wa- kaana min al- kaafiren
wa- qulnaa yaa 'aadam uskun 'anta wa- zawj -ka al- jannah wa- kulaa min -haa raghad(an) h.aythu shi'tumaa wa- laa taqrabaa haadhihi ash- shajarah fa- takonaa min az.- z.aalimen
fa- azalla -humaa ash- shayt.aan can -haa fa- akhraja -humaa min maa kaanaa fe -hi wa- qulnaa ihbit.o bacd. -kum li- bacd. cadow wa- la- -kum fe al- 'ard. mustaqarr wa- mataac 'ilaa h.en
fa- talaqqaa 'aadam min rabb -hi kalimaat fa- taaba calay -hi 'inna -hu huwa at- tawwaab ar- rah.em
qulnaa ihbit.o min -haa jamec(an) fa- 'immaa ya'tiyanna -kum min -ne huda(n) fa- man tabica hudaa -ya fa- laa khawf calay -him wa- laa hum yah.zanon
wa- 'alladhena kafaro wa- kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa 'olaa'ika as.h.aab an- naar hum fe -haa khaalidon
yaa bane 'israa'el udhkuro nicmah -e 'allate ancamtu calay -kum wa- awfo bi- cahd -e ofi bi- cahd -kum wa- 'eyaa -ya fa- irhabo -ni
wa- 'aamino bi- maa anzaltu mus.addiq(an) li- maa maca -kum wa- laa takono 'awwal kaafir bi- -hi wa- laa tashtaro bi- 'aayaat -e thaman(an) qalel(an) wa- 'eyaa -ya fa- ittaqo -ni
wa- laa talbiso al- h.aqq bi- al- baat.il wa- taktumo al- h.aqq wa- 'antum taclamon
wa- aqemo as.- s.alaah wa- 'aato az- zakaah wa- irkaco maca ar- raakicen
'a- ta'muron an- naas bi- al- birr wa- tansawn anfus -kum wa- 'antum tatlon al- kitaab 'a- fa- laa tacqilon
wa- istaceno bi- as.- s.abr wa- as.- s.alaah wa- 'inna -haa la- kaberah 'illaa calaa al- khaashicen
'alladhena yaz.unnon 'anna -hum mulaaqo rabb -him wa- 'anna -hum 'ilay -hi raajicon
yaa bane 'israa'el udhkuro nicmah -e 'allate ancamtu calay -kum wa- 'anni -y fad.d.altu -kum calaa al- caalamen
wa- ittaqo yawm(an) laa tajze nafs can nafs shay'(an) wa- laa yuqbal min -haa shafaacah wa- laa yu'khadh min -haa cadl wa- laa hum yuns.aron
wa- 'idh najjaynaa -kum min 'aal fircawn yasomon -kum so' al- cadhaab yudhabbih.on abnaa' -kum wa- yastah.yon nisaa' -kum wa- fe dhaalikum balaa' min rabb -kum caz.em
wa- 'idh faraqnaa bi- -kum al- bah.r fa- anjaynaa -kum wa- aghraqnaa 'aal fircawn wa- 'antum tanz.uron
wa- 'idh wacadnaa mosaa arbacen laylah thumma ittakhadhtum al- cijl min bacdi -hi wa- 'antum z.aalimon
thumma cafawnaa can -kum min bacdi dhaalika lacalla -kum tashkuron
wa- 'idh 'aataynaa mosaa al- kitaab wa- al- furqaan lacalla -kum tahtadon

wa- 'idh qaala mosaa li- qawm -hi yaa qawm -e 'inna -kum z.alamtum anfus -kum bi- ittikhaadh -kum al- cijl fa- tobo 'ilaa baari' -kum fa- uqtulo anfus -kum dhaalikum khayr la- -kum cinda baari' -kum fa- taaba calay -kum 'inna -hu huwa at- tawwaab ar- rah.em
wa- 'idh qultum yaa mosaa lan nu'min la- -ka h.attaa naraa 'allaah jahrah fa- 'akhadhat -kum as.- s.aaciqah wa- 'antum tanz.uron
thumma bacathnaa -kum min bacdi mawt -kum lacalla -kum tashkuron
wa- z.allalnaa calay -kum al- ghamaam wa- anzalnaa calay -kum al- mann wa- as- salwaa kulo min t.ayyibaat maa razaqnaa -kum wa- maa z.alamo -naa wa- laakin kaano anfus -hum yaz.limon

wa- 'idh qulnaa udkhulo haadhihi al- qaryah fa- kulo min -haa h.aythu shi'tum raghad(an) wa- udkhulo al- baab sujjad(an) wa- qolo h.it.t.ah naghfir la- -kum khat.aayaa -kum wa- sa- nazed al- muh.sinen
fa- baddala 'alladhena z.alamo qawl(an) ghayr 'alladhe qela la- -hum fa- anzalnaa calaa 'alladhena z.alamo rijz(an) min as- samaa' bi- maa kaano yafsuqon

wa- 'idh istasqaa mosaa li- qawm -hi fa- qulnaa id.rib bi- cas.aa -ka al- h.ajar fa- infajarat min -hu ithnataa cashrah cayn(an) qad calima kull unaas mashrab -hum kulo wa- ishrabo min rizq 'allaah wa- laa tacthaw fe al- 'ard. mufsiden

wa- 'idh qultum yaa mosaa lan nas.bir calaa t.acaam waah.id fa- udcu la- -naa rabb -ka yukhrij la- -naa min maa tunbit al- 'ard. min baql -haa wa- qiththaa' -haa wa- fom -haa wa- cadas -haa wa- bas.al -haa qaala 'a- tastabdilon 'alladhe huwa adnaa bi- 'alladhe huwa khayr ihbit.o mis.r(an) fa- 'inna la- -kum maa sa'altum wa- d.uribat calay -him adh- dhillah wa- al- maskanah wa- baa'o bi- ghad.ab min 'allaah dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum kaano yakfuron bi- 'aayaat 'allaah wa- yaqtulon an- nabeyen bi- ghayr al- h.aqq dhaalika bi- maa cas.aw wa- kaano yactadon

'inna 'alladhena 'aamano wa- 'alladhena haado wa- an- nas.aaraa wa- as.- s.aabi'en man 'aamana bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- camila s.aalih.(an) fa- la- -hum 'ajr -hum cinda rabb -him wa- laa khawf calay -him wa- laa hum yah.zanon
wa- 'idh 'akhadhnaa methaaq -kum wa- rafacnaa fawqa -kum at.- t.or khudho maa 'aataynaa -kum bi- qowah wa- udhkuro maa fe -hi lacalla -kum tattaqon
thumma tawallaytum min bacdi dhaalika fa- law-laa fad.l 'allaah calay -kum wa- rah.mah -hu la- kuntum min al- khaasiren
wa- la- qad calimtum 'alladhena ictadaw min -kum fe as- sabt fa- qulnaa la- -hum kono qiradah khaasi'en
fa- jacalnaa -haa nakaal(an) li- maa bayna yadai -haa wa- maa khalfa -haa wa- mawciz.ah li- al- muttaqen
wa- 'idh qaala mosaa li- qawm -hi 'inna 'allaah ya'mur -kum 'an tadhbah.o baqarah qaalo 'a- tattakhidh -naa huzuw(an) qaala acodhu bi- 'allaah 'an akon min al- jaahilen
qaalo udcu la- -naa rabb -ka yubayyin la- -naa maa hiya qaala 'inna -hu yaqol 'inna -haa baqarah laa faarid. wa- laa bikr cawaan bayna dhaalika fa- ifcalo maa tu'maron
qaalo udcu la- -naa rabb -ka yubayyin la- -naa maa lawn -haa qaala 'inna -hu yaqol 'inna -haa baqarah s.afraa' faaqic lawn -haa tasurr an- naaz.iren
qaalo udcu la- -naa rabb -ka yubayyin la- -naa maa hiya 'inna al- baqar tashaabaha calay -naa wa- 'in(na) -naa 'in shaa'a 'allaah la- muhtadon
qaala 'inna -hu yaqol 'inna -haa baqarah laa dhalol tuther al- 'ard. wa- laa tasqe al- h.arth musallamah laa shiyah fe -haa qaalo al-'aan ji'ta bi- al- h.aqq fa- dhabah.o -haa wa- maa kaado yafcalon
wa- 'idh qataltum nafs(an) fa- iddaara'tum fe -haa wa- 'allaah mukhrij maa kuntum taktumon
fa- qulnaa id.ribo -hu bi- bacd. -haa ka- dhaalika yuh.ye 'allaah al- mawtaa wa- yure -kum 'aayaat -hi lacalla -kum tacqilon

thumma qasat qulob -kum min bacdi dhaalika fa- hiya ka- al- h.ijaarah 'aw ashadd qaswah wa- 'inna min al- h.ijaarah la- maa yatafajjar min -hu al- anhaar wa- 'inna min -haa la- maa yashshaqqaq fa- yakhruj min -hu al- maa' wa- 'inna min -haa la- maa yahbit. min khashyah 'allaah wa- maa 'allaah bi- ghaafil can maa tacmalon
'a- fa- tat.macon 'an yu'mino la- -kum wa- qad kaana fareq min -hum yasmacon kalaam 'allaah thumma yuh.arrifon -hu min bacda maa caqalo -hu wa- hum yaclamon

wa- 'idhaa laqo 'alladhena 'aamano qaalo 'aamannaa wa- 'idhaa khalaa bacd. -hum 'ilaa bacd. qaalo 'a- tuh.addithon -hum bi- maa fatah.a 'allaah calay -kum li- yuh.aajjo -kum bi- -hi cinda rabb -kum 'a- fa- laa tacqilon
'a- wa- laa yaclamon 'anna 'allaah yaclam maa yusirron wa- maa yuclinon
wa- min -hum 'ummeyon laa yaclamon al- kitaab 'illaa amaaniya wa- 'in hum 'illaa yaz.unnon

fa- wayl li- 'alladhena yaktubon al- kitaab bi- ayde -him thumma yaqolon haadhaa min cindi 'allaah li- yashtaro bi- -hi thaman(an) qalel(an) fa- wayl la- -hum min maa katabat ayde -him wa- wayl la- -hum min maa yaksibon
wa- qaalo lan tamass -naa an- naar 'illaa ayyaam(an) macdodah qul 'a- ittakhadhtum cinda 'allaah cahd(an) fa- lan yukhlif 'allaah cahd -hu 'am taqolon calaa 'allaah maa laa taclamon
balaa man kasaba sayyi'ah wa- ah.aat.at bi- -hi khat.e'ah -hu fa- 'olaa'ika as.h.aab an- naar hum fe -haa khaalidon
wa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat 'olaa'ika as.h.aab al- jannah hum fe -haa khaalidon

wa- 'idh 'akhadhnaa methaaq bane 'israa'el laa tacbudon 'illaa 'allaah wa- bi- al- waalidain ih.saan(an) wa- dhe al- qurbaa wa- al- yataamaa wa- al- masaaken wa- qolo li- an- naas h.usn(an) wa- aqemo as.- s.alaah wa- 'aato az- zakaah thumma tawallaytum 'illaa qalel(an) min -kum wa- 'antum mucrid.on
wa- 'idh 'akhadhnaa methaaq -kum laa tasfikon dimaa' -kum wa- laa tukhrijon anfus -kum min diyaar -kum thumma aqrartum wa- 'antum tashhadon

thumma 'antum haa'ulaa'i taqtulon anfus -kum wa- tukhrijon fareq(an) min -kum min diyaar -him taz.aaharon calay -him bi- al- 'ithm wa- al- cudwaan wa- 'in ya'to -kum 'usaaraa tufaado -hum wa- huwa muh.arram calay -kum ikhraaj -hum 'a- fa- tu'minon bi- bacd. al- kitaab wa- takfuron bi- bacd. fa- maa jazaa' man yafcal dhaalika min -kum 'illaa khizy fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- yawm al- qiyaamah yuraddon 'ilaa ashadd al- cadhaab wa- maa 'allaah bi- ghaafil can maa tacmalon
'olaa'ika 'alladhena ishtaraw al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa bi- al- 'aakhirah fa- laa yukhaffaf can -hum al- cadhaab wa- laa hum yuns.aron

wa- la- qad 'aataynaa mosaa al- kitaab wa- qaffaynaa min bacdi -hi bi- ar- rusul wa- 'aataynaa cesaa ibn maryam al- bayyinaat wa- 'ayyadnaa -hu bi- roh. al- qudus 'a- fa- kulla-maa jaa'a -kum rasol bi- maa laa tahwaa anfus -kum istakbartum fa- fareq(an) kadhdhabtum wa- fareq(an) taqtulon
wa- qaalo qulob -naa ghulf bal lacana -hum 'allaah bi- kufr -him fa- qalel(an) maa yu'minon

wa- lammaa jaa'a -hum kitaab min cindi 'allaah mus.addiq li- maa maca -hum wa- kaano min qablu yastaftih.on calaa 'alladhena kafaro fa- lammaa jaa'a -hum maa carafo kafaro bi- -hi fa- lacnah 'allaah calaa al- kaafiren

bi's maa ishtaraw bi- -hi anfus -hum 'an yakfuro bi- maa anzala 'allaah baghy(an) 'an yunazzil 'allaah min fad.l -hi calaa man yashaa' min cibaad -hi fa- baa'o bi- ghad.ab calaa ghad.ab wa- li- al- kaafiren cadhaab muhen

wa- 'idhaa qela la- -hum 'aamino bi- maa anzala 'allaah qaalo nu'min bi- maa unzila calay -naa wa- yakfuron bi- maa waraa'a -hu wa- huwa al- h.aqq mus.addiq(an) li- maa maca -hum qul fa- li- maa taqtulon anbiyaa' 'allaah min qablu 'in kuntum mu'minen
wa- la- qad jaa'a -kum mosaa bi- al- bayyinaat thumma ittakhadhtum al- cijl min bacdi -hi wa- 'antum z.aalimon

wa- 'idh 'akhadhnaa methaaq -kum wa- rafacnaa fawqa -kum at.- t.or khudho maa 'aataynaa -kum bi- qowah wa- ismaco qaalo samicnaa wa- cas.aynaa wa- ushribo fe qulob -him al- cijl bi- kufr -him qul bi's maa ya'mur -kum bi- -hi 'emaan -kum 'in kuntum mu'minen
qul 'in kaanat la- -kum ad- daar al- 'aakhirah cinda 'allaah khaalis.ah min doni an- naas fa- tamannawu al- mawt 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
wa- lan yatamannaw -hu 'abad(an) bi- maa qaddamat ayde -him wa- 'allaah calem bi- az.- z.aalimen

wa- la- tajidanna -hum ah.ras. an- naas calaa h.ayaah wa- min 'alladhena ashrako yawadd 'ah.ad -hum law yucammar 'alf sanah wa- maa huwa bi- muzah.zih. -hi min al- cadhaab 'an yucammar wa- 'allaah bas.er bi- maa yacmalon
qul man kaana cadow li- jibrel fa- 'inna -hu nazzala -hu calaa qalb -ka bi- 'idhn 'allaah mus.addiq(an) li- maa bayna yadai -hi wa- huda(n) wa- bushraa li- al- mu'minen
man kaana cadow li- 'allaah wa- malaa'ikah -hi wa- rusul -hi wa- jibrel wa- mekaal fa- 'inna 'allaah cadow li- al- kaafiren
wa- la- qad anzalnaa 'ilay -ka 'aayaat bayyinaat wa- maa yakfur bi- -haa 'illaa al- faasiqon
'a- wa- kulla-maa caahado cahd(an) nabadha -hu fareq min -hum bal akthar -hum laa yu'minon
wa- lammaa jaa'a -hum rasol min cindi 'allaah mus.addiq li- maa maca -hum nabadha fareq min 'alladhena 'oto al- kitaab kitaab 'allaah waraa'a z.uhor -him ka-'anna -hum laa yaclamon

wa- ittabaco maa tatlo ash- shayaat.en calaa mulk sulaymaan wa- maa kafara sulaymaan wa- laakin ash- shayaat.en kafaro yucallimon an- naas as- sih.r wa- maa unzila calaa al- malakain bi- baabil haarot wa- maarot wa- maa yucallimaan min 'ah.ad h.attaa yaqolaa 'inna-maa nah.nu fitnah fa- laa takfur fa- yatacallamon min -humaa maa yufarriqon bi- -hi bayna al- mar' wa- zawj -hi wa- maa hum bi- d.aarren bi- -hi min 'ah.ad 'illaa bi- 'idhn 'allaah wa- yatacallamon maa yad.urr -hum wa- laa yanfac -hum wa- la- qad calimo la- man ishtaraa -hu maa la- -hu fe al- 'aakhirah min khalaaq wa- la- bi's maa sharaw bi- -hi anfus -hum law kaano yaclamon
wa- law 'anna -hum 'aamano wa- ittaqaw la- mathobah min cindi 'allaah khayr law kaano yaclamon
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa taqolo raaci -naa wa- qolo unz.ur -naa wa- ismaco wa- li- al- kaafiren cadhaab 'alem

maa yawadd 'alladhena kafaro min 'ahl al- kitaab wa- laa al- mushriken 'an yunzil calay -kum min khayr min rabb -kum wa- 'allaah yakhtas.s. bi- rah.mah -hi man yashaa' wa- 'allaah dho al- fad.l al- caz.em
maa nansakh min 'aayah 'aw nunsi -haa na'ti bi- khayr min -haa 'aw mithl -haa 'a- lam taclam 'anna 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader
'a- lam taclam 'anna 'allaah la- -hu mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa la- -kum min doni 'allaah min waley wa- laa nas.er
'am turedon 'an tas'alo rasol -kum ka-maa su'ila mosaa min qablu wa- man yatabaddal al- kufr bi- al- 'emaan fa- qad d.alla sawaa' as- sabel

wadda kather min 'ahl al- kitaab law yaruddon -kum min bacdi 'emaan -kum kuffaar(an) h.asad(an) min cindi anfus -him min bacdi maa tabayyana la- -hum al- h.aqq fa- ucfo wa- is.fah.o h.attaa ya'tiya 'allaah bi- 'amr -hi 'inna 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader
wa- aqemo as.- s.alaah wa- 'aato az- zakaah wa- maa tuqaddimo li- anfus -kum min khayr tajido -hu cinda 'allaah 'inna 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon bas.er
wa- qaalo lan yadkhul al- jannah 'illaa min kaana hod(an) 'aw nas.aaraa tilka amaaney -hum qul haato burhaan -kum 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
balaa man aslama wajh -hu li- 'allaah wa- huwa muh.sin fa- la- -hu 'ajr -hu cinda rabb -hi wa- laa khawf calay -him wa- laa hum yah.zanon

wa- qaalat al- yahod laysat an- nas.aaraa calaa shay' wa- qaalat an- nas.aaraa laysat al- yahod calaa shay' wa- hum yatlon al- kitaab ka- dhaalika qaala 'alladhena laa yaclamon mithl qawl -him fa- 'allaah yah.kum bayna -hum yawm al- qiyaamah fe maa kaano fe -hi yakhtalifon

wa- man az.lam min man manaca masaajid 'allaah 'an yudhkar fe -haa ism -hu wa- sacaa fe kharaab -haa 'olaa'ika maa kaana la- -hum 'an yadkhulo -haa 'illaa khaa'ifen la- -hum fe ad- dunyaa khizy wa- la- -hum fe al- 'aakhirah cadhaab caz.em
wa- li- 'allaah al- mashriq wa- al- maghrib fa- 'ayna-maa tawallaw fa- thamma wajh 'allaah 'inna 'allaah waasic calem
wa- qaalo ittakhadha 'allaah walad(an) subh.aana -hu bal la- -hu maa fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. kull la- -hu qaaniton
badec as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- 'idhaa qad.aa 'amr(an) fa- 'inna-maa yaqol la- -hu kun fa- yakon

wa- qaala 'alladhena laa yaclamon law-laa yukallim -naa 'allaah 'aw ta'te -naa 'aayah ka- dhaalika qaala 'alladhena min qabli -him mithl qawl -hum tashaabahat qulob -hum qad bayyannaa al- 'aayaat li- qawm yoqinon
'in(na) -naa arsalnaa -ka bi- al- h.aqq basher(an) wa- nadher(an) wa- laa tus'al can as.h.aab al- jah.em

wa- lan tard.aa can -ka al- yahod wa- laa an- nas.aaraa h.attaa tattabic millah -hum qul 'inna hudaa 'allaah huwa al- hudaa wa- la- 'in ittabacta ahwaa' -hum bacda 'alladhe jaa'a -ka min al- cilm maa la- -ka min 'allaah min waley wa- laa nas.er
'alladhena 'aataynaa -hum al- kitaab yatlon -hu h.aqq tilaawah -hi 'olaa'ika yu'minon bi- -hi wa- man yakfur bi- -hi fa- 'olaa'ika hum al- khaasiron
yaa bane 'israa'el udhkuro nicmah -e 'allate ancamtu calay -kum wa- 'anni -y fad.d.altu -kum calaa al- caalamen
wa- ittaqo yawm(an) laa tajze nafs can nafs shay'(an) wa- laa yuqbal min -haa cadl wa- laa tanfac -haa shafaacah wa- laa hum yuns.aron
wa- 'idh ibtalaa 'ibraahem rabb -hu bi- kalimaat fa- atamma -hunna qaala 'inni -y jaacil -ka li- an- naas 'imaam(an) qaala wa- min dhurreyah -e qaala laa yanaal cahd -e az.- z.aalimen

wa- 'idh jacalnaa al- bayt mathaabah li- an- naas wa- 'amn(an) wa- ittakhadho min maqaam 'ibraahem mus.alla(n) wa- cahidnaa 'ilaa 'ibraahem wa- 'ismaacel 'an t.ahhiraa bayt -e li- at.- t.aa'ifen wa- al- caakifen wa- ar- rukkac as- sujod

wa- 'idh qaala 'ibraahem rabb -i ijcal haadhaa balad(an) 'aamin(an) wa- urzuq 'ahl -hu min ath- thamaraat man 'aamana min -hu bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir qaala wa- man kafara fa- umattic -hu qalel(an) thumma ad.t.arr -hu 'ilaa cadhaab an- naar wa- bi's al- mas.er
wa- 'idh yarfac 'ibraahem al- qawaacid min al- bayt wa- 'ismaacel rabb -naa taqabbal min -naa 'inna -ka 'anta as- samec al- calem
rabb -naa wa- ijcal -naa muslimain la- -ka wa- min dhurreyah -naa 'ummah muslimah la- -ka wa- ari -naa manaasik -naa wa- tub calay -naa 'inna -ka 'anta at- tawwaab ar- rah.em
rabb -naa wa- ibcath fe -him rasol(an) min -hum yatlo calay -him 'aayaat -ka wa- yucallim -hum al- kitaab wa- al- h.ikmah wa- yuzakke -him 'inna -ka 'anta al- cazez al- h.akem
wa- man yarghab can millah 'ibraahem 'illaa man safiha nafs -hu wa- la- qad is.t.afaynaa -hu fe ad- dunyaa wa- 'inna -hu fe al- 'aakhirah la- min as.- s.aalih.en
'idh qaala la- -hu rabb -hu aslim qaala aslamtu li- rabb al- caalamen
wa- was.s.aa bi- -haa 'ibraahem bane -hi wa- yacqob yaa bane -ya 'inna 'allaah is.t.afaa la- -kum ad- den fa- laa tamotunna 'illaa wa- 'antum muslimon

'am kuntum shuhadaa' 'idh h.ad.ara yacqob al- mawt 'idh qaala li- bane -hi maa tacbudon min bacdi -y qaalo nacbud 'ilaah -ka wa- 'ilaah 'aabaa' -ka 'ibraahem wa- 'ismaacel wa- 'ish.aaq 'ilaah(an) waah.id(an) wa- nah.nu la- -hu muslimon
tilka 'ummah qad khalat la- -haa maa kasabat wa- la- -kum maa kasabtum wa- laa tus'alon can maa kaano yacmalon
wa- qaalo kono hod(an) 'aw nas.aaraa tahtado qul bal millah 'ibraahem h.anef(an) wa- maa kaana min al- mushriken

qolo 'aamannaa bi- 'allaah wa- maa unzila 'ilay -naa wa- maa unzila 'ilaa 'ibraahem wa- 'ismaacel wa- 'ish.aaq wa- yacqob wa- al- asbaat. wa- maa 'otiya mosaa wa- cesaa wa- maa 'otiya an- nabeyon min rabb -him laa nufarriq bayna 'ah.ad min -hum wa- nah.nu la- -hu muslimon
fa- 'in 'aamano bi- mithl maa 'aamantum bi- -hi fa- qad ihtadaw wa- 'in tawallaw fa- 'inna-maa hum fe shiqaaq fa- sa- yakfe -ka -hum 'allaah wa- huwa as- samec al- calem
s.ibghah 'allaah wa- maa ah.san min 'allaah s.ibghah wa- nah.nu la- -hu caabidon
qul 'a- tuh.aajjon -naa fe 'allaah wa- huwa rabb -naa wa- rabb -kum wa- la- -naa acmaal -naa wa- la- -kum acmaal -kum wa- nah.nu la- -hu mukhlis.on

'am taqolon 'inna 'ibraahem wa- 'ismaacel wa- 'ish.aaq wa- yacqob wa- al- asbaat. kaano hod(an) 'aw nas.aaraa qul 'a- 'antum aclam 'am 'allaah wa- man az.lam min man katama shahaadah cinda -hu min 'allaah wa- maa 'allaah bi- ghaafil can maa tacmalon
tilka 'ummah qad khalat la- -haa maa kasabat wa- la- -kum maa kasabtum wa- laa tus'alon can maa kaano yacmalon
sa- yaqol as- sufahaa' min an- naas maa wallaa -hum can qiblah -him 'allate kaano calay -haa qul li- 'allaah al- mashriq wa- al- maghrib yahde man yashaa' 'ilaa s.iraat. mustaqem

wa- ka- dhaalika jacalnaa -kum 'ummah wasat.(an) li- takono shuhadaa' calaa an- naas wa- yakon ar- rasol calay -kum shahed(an) wa- maa jacalnaa al- qiblah 'allate kunta calay -haa 'illaa li- naclam man yattabic ar- rasol min man yanqalib calaa caqibai -hi wa- 'in kaanat la- kaberah 'illaa calaa 'alladhena hadaa 'allaah wa- maa kaana 'allaah li- yud.ec 'emaan -kum 'inna 'allaah bi- an- naas la- ra'of rah.em

qad naraa taqallub wajh -ka fe as- samaa' fa- la- nuwalliyanna -ka qiblah tard.aa -haa fa- walli wajh -ka shat.r al- masjid al- h.araam wa- h.aythu-maa kuntum fa- wallo wujoh -kum shat.r -hu wa- 'inna 'alladhena 'oto al- kitaab la- yaclamon 'anna -hu al- h.aqq min rabb -him wa- maa 'allaah bi- ghaafil can maa yacmalon

wa- la- 'in 'atayta 'alladhena 'oto al- kitaab bi- kull 'aayah maa tabico qiblah -ka wa- maa 'anta bi- taabic qiblah -him wa- maa bacd. -hum bi- taabic qiblah bacd. wa- la- 'in ittabacta ahwaa' -hum min bacdi maa jaa'a -ka min al- cilm 'inna -ka 'idhan la- min az.- z.aalimen
'alladhena 'aataynaa -hum al- kitaab yacrifon -hu ka-maa yacrifon abnaa' -hum wa- 'inna fareq(an) min -hum la- yaktumon al- h.aqq wa- hum yaclamon
al- h.aqq min rabb -ka fa- laa takonanna min al- mumtaren
wa- li- kull wijhah huwa muwalle -haa fa- istabiqo al- khayraat 'ayna-maa takono ya'ti bi- -kum 'allaah jamec(an) 'inna 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader
wa- min h.aythu kharajta fa- walli wajh -ka shat.r al- masjid al- h.araam wa- 'inna -hu la- al- h.aqq min rabb -ka wa- maa 'allaah bi- ghaafil can maa tacmalon

wa- min h.aythu kharajta fa- walli wajh -ka shat.r al- masjid al- h.araam wa- h.aythu-maa kuntum fa- wallo wujoh -kum shat.r -hu li- 'an laa yakon li- an- naas calay -kum h.ujjah 'illaa 'alladhena z.alamo min -hum fa- laa takhshaw -hum wa- ikhshaw -ne wa- li- utimm nicmah -e calay -kum wa- lacalla -kum tahtadon
ka-maa arsalnaa fe -kum rasol(an) min -kum yatlo calay -kum 'aayaat -naa wa- yuzakke -kum wa- yucallim -kum al- kitaab wa- al- h.ikmah wa- yucallim -kum maa lam takono taclamon
fa- udhkuro -ne adhkur -kum wa- ushkuro li- -y wa- laa takfuro -ni
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano istaceno bi- as.- s.abr wa- as.- s.alaah 'inna 'allaah maca as.- s.aabiren
wa- laa taqolo li- man yuqtal fe sabel 'allaah amwaat bal ah.yaa' wa- laakin laa tashcuron
wa- la- nabluwanna -kum bi- shay' min al- khawf wa- al- joc wa- naqs. min al- amwaal wa- al- anfus wa- ath- thamaraat wa- bashshir as.- s.aabiren
'alladhena 'idhaa as.aabat -hum mus.ebah qaalo 'in(na) -naa li- 'allaah wa- 'in(na) -naa 'ilay -hi raajicon
'olaa'ika calay -him s.alawaat min rabb -him wa- rah.mah wa- 'olaa'ika hum al- muhtadon
'inna as.-s.afaa wa- al-marwah min shacaa'ir 'allaah fa- man h.ajja al- bayt 'aw ictamara fa- laa junaah. calay -hi 'an yat.of bi- -himaa wa- man tat.awwaca khayr(an) fa- 'inna 'allaah shaakir calem
'inna 'alladhena yaktumon maa anzalnaa min al- bayyinaat wa- al- hudaa min bacdi maa bayyannaa -hu li- an- naas fe al- kitaab 'olaa'ika yalcan -hum 'allaah wa- yalcan -hum al- laacinon
'illaa 'alladhena taabo wa- as.lah.o wa- bayyano fa- 'olaa'ika atob calay -him wa- 'anaa at- tawwaab ar- rah.em
'inna 'alladhena kafaro wa- maato wa- hum kuffaar 'olaa'ika calay -him lacnah 'allaah wa- al- malaa'ikah wa- an- naas ajmacen
khaaliden fe -haa laa yukhaffaf can -hum al- cadhaab wa- laa hum yunz.aron
wa- 'ilaah -kum 'ilaah waah.id laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa ar- rah.maan ar- rah.em

'inna fe khalq as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- ikhtilaaf al- layl wa- an- nahaar wa- al- fulk 'allate tajre fe al- bah.r bi- maa yanfac an- naas wa- maa anzala 'allaah min as- samaa' min maa' fa- ah.yaa bi- -hi al- 'ard. bacda mawt -haa wa- baththa fe -haa min kull daabbah wa- tas.ref ar- riyaah. wa- as- sah.aab al- musakhkhar bayna as- samaa' wa- al- 'ard. la- 'aayaat li- qawm yacqilon

wa- min an- naas man yattakhidh min doni 'allaah andaad(an) yuh.ibbon -hum ka- h.ubb 'allaah wa- 'alladhena 'aamano ashadd h.ubb(an) li- 'allaah wa- law yaraa 'alladhena z.alamo 'idh yarawn al- cadhaab 'anna al- qowah li- 'allaah jamec(an) wa- 'anna 'allaah shaded al- cadhaab
'idh tabarra'a 'alladhena ittubico min 'alladhena ittabaco wa- ra'aw al- cadhaab wa- taqat.t.acat bi- -him al- asbaab

wa- qaala 'alladhena ittabaco law 'anna la- -naa karrah fa- natabarra' min -hum ka-maa tabarra'o min -naa ka- dhaalika yure -him 'allaah acmaal -hum h.asaraat calay -him wa- maa hum bi- khaarijen min an- naar
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas kulo min maa fe al- 'ard. h.alaal(an) t.ayyib(an) wa- laa tattabico khut.uwaat ash- shayt.aan 'inna -hu la- -ka cadow muben
'inna-maa ya'mur -kum bi- as- so' wa- al- fah.shaa' wa- 'an taqolo calaa 'allaah maa laa taclamon
wa- 'idhaa qela la- -hum ittabico maa anzala 'allaah qaalo bal nattabic maa alfaynaa calay -hi 'aabaa' -naa 'a- wa- law kaana 'aabaa' -hum laa yacqilon shay'(an) wa- laa yahtadon
wa- mathal 'alladhena kafaro ka- mathal 'alladhe yanciq bi- maa laa yasmac 'illaa ducaa' wa- nidaa' s.umm bukm cumy fa- hum laa yacqilon
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano kulo min t.ayyibaat maa razaqnaa -kum wa- ushkuro li- 'allaah 'in kuntum 'eyaa -hu tacbudon

'inna-maa h.arrama calay -kum al- maytah wa- ad- dam wa- lah.m al- khinzer wa- maa uhilla bi- -hi li- ghayr 'allaah fa- man id.t.urra ghayr baaghi(n) wa- laa caadi(n) fa- laa 'ithm calay -hi 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em

'inna 'alladhena yaktumon maa anzala 'allaah min al- kitaab wa- yashtaron bi- -hi thaman(an) qalel(an) 'olaa'ika maa ya'kulon fe but.on -him 'illaa an- naar wa- laa yukallim -hum 'allaah yawm al- qiyaamah wa- laa yuzakke -him wa- la- -hum cadhaab 'alem
'olaa'ika 'alladhena ishtaraw ad.- d.alaalah bi- al- hudaa wa- al- cadhaab bi- al- maghfirah fa- maa as.bara -hum calaa an- naar
dhaalika bi- 'anna 'allaah nazzala al- kitaab bi- al- h.aqq wa- 'inna 'alladhena ikhtalafo fe al- kitaab la- fe shiqaaq baced

laysa al- birr 'an tuwallo wujoh -kum qibala al- mashriq wa- al- maghrib wa- laakin al- birr man 'aamana bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- al- malaa'ikah wa- al- kitaab wa- an- nabeyen wa- 'aataa al- maal calaa h.ubb -hi dhawe al- qurbaa wa- al- yataamaa wa- al- masaaken wa- ibn as- sabel wa- as- saa'ilen wa- fe ar- riqaab wa- aqaama as.- s.alaah wa- 'aataa az- zakaah wa- al- mofon bi- cahd -him 'idhaa caahado wa- as.- s.aabiren fe al- ba'saa' wa- ad.- d.arraa' wa- h.ena al- ba's 'olaa'ika 'alladhena s.adaqo wa- 'olaa'ika hum al- muttaqon

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano kutiba calay -kum al- qis.aas. fe al- qatlaa al- h.urr bi- al- h.urr wa- al- cabd bi- al- cabd wa- al- 'unthaa bi- al- 'unthaa fa- man cufiya la- -hu min 'akhe -hi shay' fa- ittibaac bi- al- macrof wa- 'adaa' 'ilay -hi bi- ih.saan dhaalika takhfef min rabb -kum wa- rah.mah fa- man ictadaa bacda dhaalika fa- la- -hu cadhaab 'alem
wa- la- -kum fe al- qis.aas. h.ayaah yaa 'ole al- albaab lacalla -kum tattaqon
kutiba calay -kum 'idhaa h.ad.ara 'ah.ad -kum al- mawt 'in taraka khayr(an) al- was.eyah li- al- waalidain wa- al- aqraben bi- al- macrof h.aqq(an) calaa al- muttaqen
fa- man baddala -hu bacda maa samica -hu fa- 'inna-maa 'ithm -hu calaa 'alladhena yubaddilon -hu 'inna 'allaah samec calem
fa- man khaafa min mos.i(n) janaf(an) 'aw 'ithm(an) fa- as.lah.a bayna -hum fa- laa 'ithm calay -hi 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano kutiba calay -kum as.- s.iyaam ka-maa kutiba calaa 'alladhena min qabli -kum lacalla -kum tattaqon

ayyaam(an) macdodaat fa- man kaana min -kum mared.(an) 'aw calaa safar fa- ciddah min ayyaam 'ukhar wa- calaa 'alladhena yut.eqon -hu fidyah t.acaam misken fa- man tat.awwaca khayr(an) fa- huwa khayr la- -hu wa- 'an tas.omo khayr la- -kum 'in kuntum taclamon

shahr ramad.aan 'alladhe unzila fe -hi al- qur'aan huda(n) li- an- naas wa- bayyinaat min al- hudaa wa- al- furqaan fa- man shahida min -kum ash- shahr fa- li- yas.um -hu wa- man kaana mared.(an) 'aw calaa safar fa- ciddah min ayyaam 'ukhar yured 'allaah bi- -kum al- yusr wa- laa yured bi- -kum al- cusr wa- li- tukmilo al- ciddah wa- li- tukabbiro 'allaah calaa maa hadaa -kum wa- lacalla -kum tashkuron
wa- 'idhaa sa'ala -ka cibaad -e can -ne fa- 'inni -y qareb ujeb dacwah ad- daaci 'idhaa dacaa -ni fa- li- yastajebo li- -y wa- li- yu'mino bi- -y lacalla -hum yarshudon

uh.illa la- -kum laylah as.- s.iyaam ar- rafath 'ilaa nisaa' -kum hunna libaas la- -kum wa- 'antum libaas la- -hunna calima 'allaah 'anna -kum kuntum takhtaanon anfus -kum fa- taaba calay -kum wa- cafaa can -kum fa- al-'aan baashiro -hunna wa- ibtagho maa kataba 'allaah la- -kum wa- kulo wa- ishrabo h.attaa yatabayyan la- -kum al- khayt. al- abyad. min al- khayt. al- aswad min al- fajr thumma atimmo as.- s.iyaam 'ilaa al- layl wa- laa tubaashiro -hunna wa- 'antum caakifon fe al- masaajid tilka h.udod 'allaah fa- laa taqrabo -haa ka- dhaalika yubayyin 'allaah 'aayaat -hi li- an- naas lacalla -hum yattaqon
wa- laa ta'kulo amwaal -kum bayna -kum bi- al- baat.il wa- tudlo bi- -haa 'ilaa al- h.ukkaam li- ta'kulo fareq(an) min amwaal an- naas bi- al- 'ithm wa- 'antum taclamon

yas'alon -ka can al- ahillah qul hiya mawaaqet li- an- naas wa- al- h.ajj wa- laysa al- birr bi- 'an ta'to al- buyot min z.uhor -haa wa- laakin al- birr man ittaqaa wa- i'to al- buyot min abwaab -haa wa- ittaqo 'allaah lacalla -kum tuflih.on
wa- qaatilo fe sabel 'allaah 'alladhena yuqaatilon -kum wa- laa tactado 'inna 'allaah laa yuh.ibb al- muctaden

wa- uqtulo -hum h.aythu thaqiftumo -hum wa- akhrijo -hum min h.aythu akhrajo -kum wa- al- fitnah ashadd min al- qatl wa- laa tuqaatilo -hum cinda al- masjid al- h.araam h.attaa yuqaatilo -kum fe -hi fa- 'in qaatalo -kum fa- uqtulo -hum ka- dhaalika jazaa' al- kaafiren
fa- 'in intahaw fa- 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em
wa- qaatilo -hum h.attaa laa takon fitnah wa- yakon ad- den li- 'allaah fa- 'in intahaw fa- laa cudwaan 'illaa calaa az.- z.aalimen

ash- shahr al- h.araam bi- ash- shahr al- h.araam wa- al- h.urumaat qis.aas. fa- man ictadaa calay -kum fa- ictado calay -hi bi- mithl maa ictadaa calay -kum wa- ittaqo 'allaah wa- iclamo 'anna 'allaah maca al- muttaqen
wa- anfiqo fe sabel 'allaah wa- laa tulqo bi- ayde -kum 'ilaa at- tahlukah wa- ah.sino 'inna 'allaah yuh.ibb al- muh.sinen

wa- atimmo al- h.ajj wa- al- cumrah li- 'allaah fa- 'in uh.s.irtum fa- maa istaysara min al- hady wa- laa tah.liqo ru'os -kum h.attaa yablugh al- hady mah.ill -hu fa- man kaana min -kum mared.(an) 'aw bi- -hi 'adha(n) min ra's -hi fa- fidyah min s.iyaam 'aw s.adaqah 'aw nusuk fa- 'idhaa 'amintum fa- man tamattaca bi- al- cumrah 'ilaa al- h.ajj fa- maa istaysara min al- hady fa- man lam yajid fa- s.iyaam thalaathah ayyaam fe al- h.ajj wa- sabcah 'idhaa rajactum tilka casharah kaamilah dhaalika li- man lam yakun 'ahl -hu h.aad.ire al- masjid al- h.araam wa- ittaqo 'allaah wa- iclamo 'anna 'allaah shaded al- ciqaab

al- h.ajj ashhur maclomaat fa- man farad.a fe -hinna al- h.ajj fa- laa rafath wa- laa fusoq wa- laa jidaal fe al- h.ajj wa- maa tafcalo min khayr yaclam -hu 'allaah wa- tazawwado fa- 'inna khayr az- zaad at- taqwaa wa- ittaqo -ni yaa 'ole al- albaab

laysa calay -kum junaah. 'an tabtagho fad.l(an) min rabb -kum fa- 'idhaa afad.tum min carafaat fa- udhkuro 'allaah cinda al- mashcar al- h.araam wa- udhkuro -hu ka-maa hadaa -kum wa- 'in kuntum min qabli -hi la- min ad.- d.aallen
thumma afed.o min h.aythu afaad.a an- naas wa- istaghfiro 'allaah 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em

fa- 'idhaa qad.aytum manaasik -kum fa- udhkuro 'allaah ka- dhikr -kum 'aabaa' -kum 'aw ashadd dhikr(an) fa- min an- naas man yaqol rabb -naa 'aati -naa fe ad- dunyaa wa- maa la- -hu fe al- 'aakhirah min khalaaq
wa- min -hum man yaqol rabb -naa 'aati -naa fe ad- dunyaa h.asanah wa- fe al- 'aakhirah h.asanah wa- qi -naa cadhaab an- naar
'olaa'ika la- -hum nas.eb min maa kasabo wa- 'allaah sarec al- h.isaab

wa- udhkuro 'allaah fe ayyaam macdodaat fa- man tacajjala fe yawmain fa- laa 'ithm calay -hi wa- man ta'akhkhara fa- laa 'ithm calay -hi li- man ittaqaa wa- ittaqo 'allaah wa- iclamo 'anna -kum 'ilay -hi tuh.sharon
wa- min an- naas man yucjib -ka qawl -hu fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- yushhid 'allaah calaa maa fe qalb -hi wa- huwa aladd al- khis.aam
wa- 'idhaa tawallaa sacaa fe al- 'ard. li- yufsid fe -haa wa- yuhlik al- h.arth wa- an- nasl wa- 'allaah laa yuh.ibb al- fasaad
wa- 'idhaa qela la- -hu ittaqi 'allaah 'akhadhat -hu al- cizzah bi- al- 'ithm fa- h.asb -hu jahannam wa- la- bi's al- mihaad
wa- min an- naas man yashre nafs -hu ibtighaa' mard.aat 'allaah wa- 'allaah ra'of bi- al- cibaad
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano udkhulo fe as- silm kaaffah wa- laa tattabico khut.uwaat ash- shayt.aan 'inna -hu la- -kum cadow muben
fa- 'in zalaltum min bacdi maa jaa'at -kum al- bayyinaat fa- iclamo 'anna 'allaah cazez h.akem
hal yanz.uron 'illaa 'an ya'tiya -hum 'allaah fe z.ulal min al- ghamaam wa- al- malaa'ikah wa- qud.iya al- 'amr wa- 'ilaa 'allaah turjac al- 'umor
sal bane 'israa'el kam 'aataynaa -hum min 'aayah bayyinah wa- man yubaddil nicmah 'allaah min bacdi maa jaa'at -hu fa- 'inna 'allaah shaded al- ciqaab
zuyyina li- 'alladhena kafaro al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- yaskharon min 'alladhena 'aamano wa- 'alladhena ittaqaw fawqa -hum yawm al- qiyaamah wa- 'allaah yarzuq man yashaa' bi- ghayr h.isaab

kaana an- naas 'ummah waah.idah fa- bacatha 'allaah an- nabeyen mubashshiren wa- mundhiren wa- anzala maca -hum al- kitaab bi- al- h.aqq li- yah.kum bayna an- naas fe maa ikhtalafo fe -hi wa- maa ikhtalafa fe -hi 'illaa 'alladhena 'oto -hu min bacdi maa jaa'at -hum al- bayyinaat baghy(an) bayna -hum fa- hadaa 'allaah 'alladhena 'aamano li- maa ikhtalafo fe -hi min al- h.aqq bi- 'idhn -hi wa- 'allaah yahde man yashaa' 'ilaa s.iraat. mustaqem

'am h.asibtum 'an tadkhulo al- jannah wa- lammaa ya'ti -kum mathal 'alladhena khalaw min qabli -kum massat -hum al- ba'saa' wa- ad.- d.arraa' wa- zulzilo h.attaa yaqol ar- rasol wa- 'alladhena 'aamano maca -hu mataa nas.r 'allaah 'a-laa 'inna nas.r 'allaah qareb

yas'alon -ka maa-dhaa yunfiqon qul maa anfaqtum min khayr fa- li- al- waalidain wa- al- aqraben wa- al- yataamaa wa- al- masaaken wa- ibn as- sabel wa- maa tafcalo min khayr fa- 'inna 'allaah bi- -hi calem

kutiba calay -kum al- qitaal wa- huwa kurh la- -kum wa- casaa 'an takraho shay'(an) wa- huwa khayr la- -kum wa- casaa 'an tuh.ibbo shay'(an) wa- huwa sharr la- -kum wa- 'allaah yaclam wa- 'antum laa taclamon

yas'alon -ka can ash- shahr al- h.araam qitaal fe -hi qul qitaal fe -hi kaber wa- s.add can sabel 'allaah wa- kufr bi- -hi wa- al- masjid al- h.araam wa- ikhraaj 'ahl -hi min -hu akbar cinda 'allaah wa- al- fitnah akbar min al- qatl wa- laa yazaalon yuqaatilon -kum h.attaa yaruddo -kum can den -kum 'in istat.aaco wa- man yartadd min -kum can den -hi fa- yamot wa- huwa kaafir fa- 'olaa'ika h.abit.at acmaal -hum fe ad- dunyaa wa- al- 'aakhirah wa- 'olaa'ika as.h.aab an- naar hum fe -haa khaalidon
'inna 'alladhena 'aamano wa- 'alladhena haajaro wa- jaahado fe sabel 'allaah 'olaa'ika yarjon rah.mah 'allaah wa- 'allaah ghafor rah.em

yas'alon -ka can al- khamr wa- al- maysir qul fe -himaa 'ithm kaber wa- manaafic li- an- naas wa- 'ithm -humaa akbar min nafc -himaa wa- yas'alon -ka maa-dhaa yunfiqon qul al- cafw ka- dhaalika yubayyin 'allaah la- -kum al- 'aayaat lacalla -kum tatafakkaron

fe ad- dunyaa wa- al- 'aakhirah wa- yas'alon -ka can al- yataamaa qul is.laah. la- -hum khayr wa- 'in tukhaalit.o -hum fa- 'ikhwaan -kum wa- 'allaah yaclam al- mufsid min al- mus.lih. wa- law shaa'a 'allaah la- acnata -kum 'inna 'allaah cazez h.akem

wa- laa tankih.o al- mushrikaat h.attaa yu'minna wa- la- 'amah mu'minah khayr min mushrikah wa- law acjabat -kum wa- laa tankih.o al- mushriken h.attaa yu'mino wa- la- cabd mu'min khayr min mushrik wa- law acjaba -kum 'olaa'ika yadcon 'ilaa an- naar wa- 'allaah yadco 'ilaa al- jannah wa- al- maghfirah bi- 'idhn -hi wa- yubayyin 'aayaat -hi li- an- naas lacalla -hum yatadhakkaron

wa- yas'alon -ka can al- mah.ed. qul huwa 'adha(n) fa- ictazilo an- nisaa' fe al- mah.ed. wa- laa taqrabo -hunna h.attaa yat.hurna fa- 'idhaa tat.ahharna fa- i'to -hunna min h.aythu 'amara -kum 'allaah 'inna 'allaah yuh.ibb at- tawwaaben wa- yuh.ibb al- mutat.ahhiren
nisaa' -kum h.arth la- -kum fa- i'to h.arth -kum 'annaa shi'tum wa- qaddimo li- anfus -kum wa- ittaqo 'allaah wa- iclamo 'anna -kum mulaaqo -hu wa- bashshir al- mu'minen
wa- laa tajcalo 'allaah curd.ah li- aymaan -kum 'an tabarro wa- tattaqo wa- tus.lih.o bayna an- naas wa- 'allaah samec calem
laa yu'aakhidh -kum 'allaah bi- al- laghw fe aymaan -kum wa- laakin yu'aakhidh -kum bi- maa kasabat qulob -kum wa- 'allaah ghafor h.alem
li- 'alladhena yu'lon min nisaa' -him tarabbus. arbacah ashhur fa- 'in faa'o fa- 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em
wa- 'in cazamo at.- t.alaaq fa- 'inna 'allaah samec calem

wa- al- mut.allaqaat yatarabbas.na bi- anfus -hinna thalaathah quro' wa- laa yah.ill la- -hunna 'an yaktumna maa khalaqa 'allaah fe arh.aam -hinna 'in kunna yu'minna bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- bucolah -hunna ah.aqq bi- radd -hinna fe dhaalika 'in araado is.laah.(an) wa- la- -hunna mithl 'alladhe calay -hinna bi- al- macrof wa- li- ar- rijaal calay -hinna darajah wa- 'allaah cazez h.akem

at.- t.alaaq marrataan fa- imsaak bi- macrof 'aw tasreh. bi- ih.saan wa- laa yah.ill la- -kum 'an ta'khudho min maa 'aataytumo -hunna shay'(an) 'illaa 'an yakhaafaa 'an laa yuqemaa h.udod 'allaah fa- 'in khiftum 'an laa yuqemaa h.udod 'allaah fa- laa junaah. calay -himaa fe maa iftadat bi- -hi tilka h.udod 'allaah fa- laa tactado -haa wa- man yatacadd h.udod 'allaah fa- 'olaa'ika hum az.- z.aalimon

fa- 'in t.allaqa -haa fa- laa tah.ill la- -hu min bacdu h.attaa tankih. zawj(an) ghayr -hu fa- 'in t.allaqa -haa fa- laa junaah. calay -himaa 'an yataraajacaa 'in z.annaa 'an yuqemaa h.udod 'allaah wa- tilka h.udod 'allaah yubayyin -haa li- qawm yaclamon

wa- 'idhaa t.allaqtum an- nisaa' fa- balaghna 'ajal -hunna fa- amsiko -hunna bi- macrof 'aw sarrih.o -hunna bi- macrof wa- laa tumsiko -hunna d.iraar(an) li- tactado wa- man yafcal dhaalika fa- qad z.alama nafs -hu wa- laa tattakhidho 'aayaat 'allaah huzuw(an) wa- udhkuro nicmah 'allaah calay -kum wa- maa anzala calay -kum min al- kitaab wa- al- h.ikmah yaciz. -kum bi- -hi wa- ittaqo 'allaah wa- iclamo 'anna 'allaah bi- kull shay' calem

wa- 'idhaa t.allaqtum an- nisaa' fa- balaghna 'ajal -hunna fa- laa tacd.ulo -hunna 'an yankih.na azwaaj -hunna 'idhaa taraad.aw bayna -hum bi- al- macrof dhaalika yocaz. bi- -hi man kaana min -kum yu'min bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir dhaalikum azkaa la- -kum wa- at.har wa- 'allaah yaclam wa- 'antum laa taclamon

wa- al- waalidaat yurd.icna awlaad -hunna h.awlain kaamilain li- man araada 'an yutimm ar- rad.aacah wa- calaa al- mawlod la- -hu rizq -hunna wa- kiswah -hunna bi- al- macrof laa tukallaf nafs 'illaa wusc -haa laa tud.aarr waalidah bi- walad -haa wa- laa mawlod la- -hu bi- walad -hi wa- calaa al- waarith mithl dhaalika fa- 'in araadaa fis.aal(an) can taraad.i(n) min -humaa wa- tashaawur fa- laa junaah. calay -himaa wa- 'in aradtum 'an tastard.ico awlaad -kum fa- laa junaah. calay -kum 'idhaa sallamtum maa 'aataytum bi- al- macrof wa- ittaqo 'allaah wa- iclamo 'anna 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon bas.er

wa- 'alladhena yutawaffawn min -kum wa- yadharon azwaaj(an) yatarabbas.na bi- anfus -hinna arbacah ashhur wa- cashr(an) fa- 'idhaa balaghnaa 'ajal -hunna fa- laa junaah. calay -kum fe maa facalna fe anfus -hinna bi- al- macrof wa- 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon khaber

wa- laa junaah. calay -kum fe maa carrad.tum bi- -hi min khit.bah an- nisaa' 'aw aknantum fe anfus -kum calima 'allaah 'anna -kum sa- tadhkuron -hunna wa- laakin laa tuwaacido -hunna sirr(an) 'illaa 'an taqolo qawl(an) macrof(an) wa- laa taczimo cuqdah an- nikaah. h.attaa yablugh al- kitaab 'ajal -hu wa- iclamo 'anna 'allaah yaclam maa fe anfus -kum fa- ih.dharo -hu wa- iclamo 'anna 'allaah ghafor h.alem

laa junaah. calay -kum 'in t.allaqtum an- nisaa' maa lam tamasso -hunna 'aw tafrid.o la- -hunna fared.ah wa- mattico -hunna calaa al- mosic qadar -hu wa- calaa al- muqtir qadar -hu mataac(an) bi- al- macrof h.aqq(an) calaa al- muh.sinen

wa- 'in t.allaqtumo -hunna min qabli 'an tamasso -hunna wa- qad farad.tum la- -hunna fared.ah fa- nis.f maa farad.tum 'illaa 'an yacfon 'aw yacfuwa 'alladhe bi- yad -hi cuqdah an- nikaah. wa- 'an tacfo aqrab li- at- taqwaa wa- laa tansawu al- fad.l bayna -kum 'inna 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon bas.er
h.aafiz.o calaa as.- s.alawaat wa- as.- s.alaah al- wust.aa wa- qomo li- 'allaah qaaniten
fa- 'in khiftum fa- rijaal(an) 'aw rukbaan(an) fa- 'idhaa 'amintum fa- udhkuro 'allaah ka-maa callama -kum maa lam takono taclamon

wa- 'alladhena yutawaffawn min -kum wa- yadharon azwaaj(an) was.eyah li- azwaaj -him mataac(an) 'ilaa al- h.awl ghayr ikhraaj fa- 'in kharajna fa- laa junaah. calay -kum fe maa facalna fe anfus -hinna min macrof wa- 'allaah cazez h.akem
wa- li- al- mut.allaqaat mataac bi- al- macrof h.aqq(an) calaa al- muttaqen
ka- dhaalika yubayyin 'allaah la- -kum 'aayaat -hi lacalla -kum tacqilon

'a- lam tara 'ilaa 'alladhena kharajo min diyaar -him wa- hum 'ulof h.adhar al- mawt fa- qaala la- -hum 'allaah moto thumma ah.yaa -hum 'inna 'allaah la- dho fad.l calaa an- naas wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yashkuron
wa- qaatilo fe sabel 'allaah wa- iclamo 'anna 'allaah samec calem
man-dhaa 'alladhe yuqrid. 'allaah qard.(an) h.asan(an) fa- yud.aacif -hu la- -hu ad.caaf(an) katherah wa- 'allaah yaqbid. wa- yabsut. wa- 'ilay -hi turjacon

'a- lam tara 'ilaa al- mala' min bane 'israa'el min bacdi mosaa 'idh qaalo li- nabey la- -hum ibcath la- -naa malik(an) nuqaatil fe sabel 'allaah qaala hal casaytum 'in kutiba calay -kum al- qitaal 'an laa tuqaatilo qaalo wa- maa la- -naa 'an laa nuqaatil fe sabel 'allaah wa- qad ukhrijnaa min diyaar -naa wa- abnaa' -naa fa- lammaa kutiba calay -him al- qitaal tawallaw 'illaa qalel(an) min -hum wa- 'allaah calem bi- az.- z.aalimen

wa- qaala la- -hum nabey -hum 'inna 'allaah qad bacatha la- -kum t.aalot malik(an) qaalo 'annaa yakon la- -hu al- mulk calay -naa wa- nah.nu ah.aqq bi- al- mulk min -hu wa- lam yu'ta sacah min al- maal qaala 'inna 'allaah is.t.afaa -hu calay -kum wa- zaada -hu bast.ah fe al- cilm wa- al- jism wa- 'allaah yu'te mulk -hu man yashaa' wa- 'allaah waasic calem

wa- qaala la- -hum nabey -hum 'inna 'aayah mulk -hi 'an ya'tiya -kum at- taabot fe -hi sakenah min rabb -kum wa- baqeyah min maa taraka 'aal mosaa wa- 'aal haaron tah.mil -hu al- malaa'ikah 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayah la- -kum 'in kuntum mu'minen

fa- lammaa fas.ala t.aalot bi- al- junod qaala 'inna 'allaah mubtale -kum bi- nahar fa- man shariba min -hu fa- laysa min -ne wa- man lam yat.cam -hu fa- 'inna -hu min -ne 'illaa man ightarafa ghurfah bi- yad -hi fa- sharibo min -hu 'illaa qalel(an) min -hum fa- lammaa jaawazo -hu huwa wa- 'alladhena 'aamano maca -hu qaalo laa t.aaqah la- -naa al- yawm bi- jaalot wa- junod -hi qaala 'alladhena yaz.unnon 'anna -hum mulaaqo 'allaah kam min fi'ah qalelah ghalabat fi'ah katherah bi- 'idhn 'allaah wa- 'allaah maca as.- s.aabiren
wa- lammaa barazo li- jaalot wa- junod -hi qaalo rabb -naa afrigh calay -naa s.abr(an) wa- thabbit aqdaam -naa wa- uns.ur -naa calaa al- qawm al- kaafiren

fa- hazamo -hum bi- 'idhn 'allaah wa- qatala daawod jaalot wa- 'aataa -hu 'allaah al- mulk wa- al- h.ikmah wa- callama -hu min maa yashaa' wa- law-laa dafc 'allaah an- naas bacd. -hum bi- bacd. la- fasadat al- 'ard. wa- laakin 'allaah dho fad.l calaa al- caalamen
tilka 'aayaat 'allaah natlo -haa calay -ka bi- al- h.aqq wa- 'inna -ka la- min al- mursalen

tilka ar- rusul fad.d.alnaa bacd. -hum calaa bacd. min -hum man kallama 'allaah wa- rafaca bacd. -hum darajaat wa- 'aataynaa cesaa ibn maryam al- bayyinaat wa- 'ayyadnaa -hu bi- roh. al- qudus wa- law shaa'a 'allaah maa iqtatala 'alladhena min bacda -hum min bacdi maa jaa'at -hum al- bayyinaat wa- laakin ikhtalafo fa- min -hum man 'aamana wa- min -hum man kafara wa- law shaa'a 'allaah maa iqtatalo wa- laakin 'allaah yafcal maa yured
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano anfiqo min maa razaqnaa -kum min qabli 'an ya'tiya yawm laa bayc fe -hi wa- laa khullah wa- laa shafaacah wa- al- kaafiron hum az.- z.aalimon

'allaah laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa al- h.ayy al- qayyom laa ta'khudh -hu sinah wa- laa nawm la- -hu maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. man-dhaa 'alladhe yashfac cinda -hu 'illaa bi- 'idhn -hi yaclam maa bayna ayde -him wa- maa khalf -hum wa- laa yuh.et.on bi- shay' min cilm -hi 'illaa bi- maa shaa'a wasica kursey -hu as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- laa ya'od -hu h.ifz. -humaa wa- huwa al- caley al- caz.em

laa ikraah fe ad- den qad tabayyana ar- rushd min al- ghayy fa- man yakfur bi- at.- t.aaghot wa- yu'min bi- 'allaah fa- qad istamsaka bi- al- curwah al- wuthqaa laa infis.aam la- -haa wa- 'allaah samec calem

'allaah waley 'alladhena 'aamano yukhrij -hum min az.- z.ulumaat 'ilaa an- nor wa- 'alladhena kafaro awliyaa' -hum at.- t.aaghot yukhrijon -hum min an- nor 'ilaa az.- z.ulumaat 'olaa'ika as.h.aab an- naar hum fe -haa khaalidon

'a- lam tara 'ilaa 'alladhe h.aajja 'ibraahem fe rabb -hi 'an 'aataa -hu 'allaah al- mulk 'idh qaala 'ibraahem rabb -e 'alladhe yuh.ye wa- yumet qaala 'anaa uh.ye wa- umet qaala 'ibraahem fa- 'inna 'allaah ya'te bi- ash- shams min al- mashriq fa- i'ti bi- -haa min al- maghrib fa- buhita 'alladhe kafara wa- 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm az.- z.aalimen

'aw ka- 'alladhe marra calaa qaryah wa- hiya khaawiyah calaa curosh -haa qaala 'annaa yuh.ye haadhihi 'allaah bacda mawt -haa fa- amaata -hu 'allaah mi'ah caam thumma bacatha -hu qaala kam labithta qaala labithtu yawm(an) 'aw bacd. yawm qaala bal labithta mi'ah caam fa- unz.ur 'ilaa t.acaam -ka wa- sharaab -ka lam yatasannah wa- unz.ur 'ilaa h.imaar -ka wa- li- najcal -ka 'aayah li- an- naas wa- unz.ur 'ilaa al- ciz.aam kayfa nunshiz -haa thumma nakso -haa lah.m(an) fa- lammaa tabayyana la- -hu qaala aclam 'anna 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader

wa- 'idh qaala 'ibraahem rabb -i ari -ne kayfa tuh.ye al- mawtaa qaala 'a- wa- lam tu'min qaala balaa wa- laakin li- yat.ma'inn qalb -e qaala fa- khudh arbacah min at.- t.ayr fa- s.ur -hunna 'ilay -ka thumma ijcal calaa kull jabal min -hunna juz'(an) thumma udcu -hunna ya'tena -ka sacy(an) wa- iclam 'anna 'allaah cazez h.akem
mathal 'alladhena yunfiqon amwaal -hum fe sabel 'allaah ka- mathal h.abbah anbatat sabc sanaabil fe kull sunbulah mi'ah h.abbah wa- 'allaah yud.aacif li- man yashaa' wa- 'allaah waasic calem
'alladhena yunfiqon amwaal -hum fe sabel 'allaah thumma laa yutbicon maa anfaqo mann(an) wa- laa 'adha(n) la- -hum 'ajr -hum cinda rabb -hum wa- laa khawf calay -him wa- laa hum yah.zanon
qawl macrof wa- maghfirah khayr min s.adaqah yatbac -haa 'adha(n) wa- 'allaah ghaney h.alem

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tubt.ilo s.adaqaat -kum bi- al- mann wa- al- 'adhaa ka- 'alladhe yunfiq maal -hu ri'aa' an- naas wa- laa yu'min bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir fa- mathal -hu ka- mathal s.afwaan calay -hi turaab fa- as.aaba -hu waabil fa- taraka -hu s.ald(an) laa yaqdiron calaa shay' min maa kasabo wa- 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm al- kaafiren

wa- mathal 'alladhena yunfiqon amwaal -hum ibtighaa' mard.aat 'allaah wa- tathbet(an) min anfus -him ka- mathal jannah bi- rabwah as.aaba -haa waabil fa- 'atat 'ukul -haa d.icfain fa- 'in lam yus.ib -haa waabil fa- t.all wa- 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon bas.er

'a- yawadd 'ah.ad -kum 'an takon la- -hu jannah min nakhel wa- acnaab tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar la- -hu fe -haa min kull ath- thamaraat wa- as.aaba -hu al- kibar wa- la- -hu dhurreyah d.ucafaa' fa- as.aaba -haa ics.aar fe -hi naar fa- ih.taraqat ka- dhaalika yubayyin 'allaah la- -kum al- 'aayaat lacalla -kum tatafakkaron

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano anfiqo min t.ayyibaat maa kasabtum wa- min maa akhrajnaa la- -kum min al- 'ard. wa- laa tayammamo al- khabeth min -hu tunfiqon wa- lastum bi- 'aakhidhe -hi 'illaa 'an tughmid.o fe -hi wa- iclamo 'anna 'allaah ghaney h.amed
ash- shayt.aan yacid -kum al- faqr wa- ya'mur -kum bi- al- fah.shaa' wa- 'allaah yacid -kum maghfirah min -hu wa- fad.l(an) wa- 'allaah waasic calem
yu'te al- h.ikmah man yashaa' wa- man yu'ta al- h.ikmah fa- qad 'otiya khayr(an) kather(an) wa- maa yadhdhakkar 'illaa 'olo al- albaab
wa- maa anfaqtum min nafaqah 'aw nadhartum min nadhr fa- 'inna 'allaah yaclam -hu wa- maa li- az.- z.aalimen min ans.aar
'in tubdo as.- s.adaqaat fa- nicim maa hiya wa- 'in tukhfo -haa wa- tu'to -haa al- fuqaraa' fa- huwa khayr la- -kum wa- yukaffir can -kum min sayyi'aat -kum wa- 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon khaber

laysa calay -ka hudaa -hum wa- laakin 'allaah yahde man yashaa' wa- maa tunfiqo min khayr fa- li- anfus -kum wa- maa tunfiqon 'illaa ibtighaa' wajh 'allaah wa- maa tunfiqo min khayr yuwaffa 'ilay -kum wa- 'antum laa tuz.lamon

li- al- fuqaraa' 'alladhena uh.s.iro fe sabel 'allaah laa yastat.econ d.arb(an) fe al- 'ard. yah.sab -hum al- jaahil aghniyaa' min at- tacaffuf tacrif -hum bi- semaa -hum laa yas'alon an- naas ilh.aaf(an) wa- maa tunfiqo min khayr fa- 'inna 'allaah bi- -hi calem
'alladhena yunfiqon amwaal -hum bi- al- layl wa- an- nahaar sirr(an) wa- calaaniyah fa- la- -hum 'ajr -hum cinda rabb -hum wa- laa khawf calay -him wa- laa hum yah.zanon

'alladhena ya'kulon ar- ribaa laa yaqomon 'illaa ka-maa yaqom 'alladhe yatakhabbat. -hu ash- shayt.aan min al- mass dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum qaalo 'inna-maa al- bayc mithl ar- ribaa wa- ah.alla 'allaah al- bayc wa- h.arrama ar- ribaa fa- man jaa'a -hu mawciz.ah min rabb -hi fa- intahaa fa- la- -hu maa salafa wa- 'amr -hu 'ilaa 'allaah wa- man caada fa- 'olaa'ika as.h.aab an- naar hum fe -haa khaalidon
yamh.aq 'allaah ar- ribaa wa- yurbe as.- s.adaqaat wa- 'allaah laa yuh.ibb kull kaffaar 'athem
'inna 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat wa- aqaamo as.- s.alaah wa- 'aato az- zakaah la- -hum 'ajr -hum cinda rabb -him wa- laa khawf calay -him wa- laa hum yah.zanon
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano ittaqo 'allaah wa- dharo maa baqiya min ar- ribaa 'in kuntum mu'minen
fa- 'in lam tafcalo fa- i'dhano bi- h.arb min 'allaah wa- rasol -hi wa- 'in tubtum fa- la- -kum ru'os amwaal -kum laa taz.limon wa- laa tuz.lamon
wa- 'in kaana dho cusrah fa- naz.irah 'ilaa maysarah wa- 'an tas.addaqo khayr la- -kum 'in kuntum taclamon
wa- ittaqo yawm(an) turjacon fe -hi 'ilaa 'allaah thumma tuwaffaa kull nafs maa kasabat wa- hum laa yuz.lamon

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'idhaa tadaayantum bi- dayn 'ilaa 'ajal musamma(n) fa- uktubo -hu wa- li- yaktub bayna -kum kaatib bi- al- cadl wa- laa ya'ba kaatib 'an yaktub ka-maa callama -hu 'allaah fa- li- yaktub wa- li- yumlil 'alladhe calay -hi al- h.aqq wa- li- yattaqi 'allaah rabb -hu wa- laa yabkhas min -hu shay'(an) fa- 'in kaana 'alladhe calay -hi al- h.aqq safeh(an) 'aw d.acef(an) 'aw laa yastat.ec 'an yumill huwa fa- li- yumlil waley -hu bi- al- cadl wa- istashhido shahedain min rijaal -kum fa- 'in lam yakonaa rajulain fa- rajul wa- imra'ataan min man tard.awn min ash- shuhadaa' 'an tad.ill 'ih.daa -humaa fa- tudhakkir 'ih.daa -humaa al- 'ukhraa wa- laa ya'ba ash- shuhadaa' 'idhaa maa duco wa- laa tas'amo 'an taktubo -hu s.agher(an) 'aw kaber(an) 'ilaa 'ajal -hi dhaalikum aqsat. cinda 'allaah wa- aqwam li- ash- shahaadah wa- adnaa 'an laa tartaabo 'illaa 'an takon tijaarah h.aad.irah tuderon -haa bayna -kum fa- laysa calay -kum junaah. 'an laa taktubo -haa wa- ashhido 'idhaa tabaayactum wa- laa yud.aarr kaatib wa- laa shahed fa- 'in tafcalo fa- 'inna -hu fusoq bi- -kum wa- ittaqo 'allaah wa- yucallim -kum 'allaah wa- 'allaah bi- kull shay' calem

wa- 'in kuntum calaa safar wa- lam tajido kaatib(an) fa- rihaan maqbod.ah fa- 'in 'amina bacd. -kum bacd.(an) fa- li- yu'addi 'alladhe u'tumina 'amaanah -hu wa- li- yattaqi 'allaah rabb -hu wa- laa taktumo ash- shahaadah wa- man yaktum -haa fa- 'inna -hu 'aathim qalb -hu wa- 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon calem

li- 'allaah maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- 'in tubdo maa fe anfus -kum 'aw tukhfo -hu yuh.aasib -kum bi- -hi 'allaah fa- yaghfir li- man yashaa' wa- yucadhdhib man yashaa' wa- 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader

'aamana ar- rasol bi- maa unzila 'ilay -hi min rabb -hi wa- al- mu'minon kull 'aamana bi- 'allaah wa- malaa'ikah -hi wa- kutub -hi wa- rusul -hi laa nufarriq bayna 'ah.ad min rusul -hi wa- qaalo samicnaa wa- at.acnaa ghufraan -ka rabb -naa wa- 'ilay -ka al- mas.er

laa yukallif 'allaah nafs(an) 'illaa wusc -haa la- -haa maa kasabat wa- calay -haa maa iktasabat rabb -naa laa tu'aakhidh -naa 'in nasenaa 'aw akht.a'naa rabb -naa wa- laa tah.mil calay -naa 'is.r(an) ka-maa h.amalta -hu calaa 'alladhena min qabli -naa rabb -naa wa- laa tuh.ammil -naa maa laa t.aaqah la- -naa bi- -hi wa- ucfu can -naa wa- ighfir la- -naa wa- irh.am -naa 'anta mawlaa -naa fa- uns.ur -naa calaa al- qawm al- kaafiren
alif-laam-mem
'allaah laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa al- h.ayy al- qayyom
nazzala calay -ka al- kitaab bi- al- h.aqq mus.addiq(an) li- maa bayna yadai -hi wa- anzala at- tawraah wa- al- 'injel
min qablu huda(n) li- an- naas wa- anzala al- furqaan 'inna 'alladhena kafaro bi- 'aayaat 'allaah la- -hum cadhaab shaded wa- 'allaah cazez dho intiqaam
'inna 'allaah laa yakhfaa calay -hi shay' fe al- 'ard. wa- laa fe as- samaa'
huwa 'alladhe yus.awwir -kum fe al- arh.aam kayfa yashaa' laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa al- cazez al- h.akem

huwa 'alladhe anzala calay -ka al- kitaab min -hu 'aayaat muh.kamaat hunna 'umm al- kitaab wa- 'ukhar mutashaabihaat fa- 'ammaa 'alladhena fe qulob -him zaygh fa- yattabicon maa tashaabaha min -hu ibtighaa' al- fitnah wa- ibtighaa' ta'wel -hu wa- maa yaclam ta'wel -hu 'illaa 'allaah wa- ar- raasikhon fe al- cilm yaqolon 'aamannaa bi- -hi kull min cinda rabb -naa wa- maa yadhdhakkar 'illaa 'olo al- albaab
rabb -naa laa tuzigh qulob -naa bacda 'idh hadayta -naa wa- hab la- -naa min ladun -ka rah.mah 'inna -ka 'anta al- wahhaab
rabb -naa 'inna -ka jaamic an- naas li- yawm laa rayb fe -hi 'inna 'allaah laa yukhlif al- mecaad
'inna 'alladhena kafaro lan tughniya can -hum amwaal -hum wa- laa awlaad -hum min 'allaah shay'(an) wa- 'olaa'ika hum waqod an- naar
ka- da'b 'aal fircawn wa- 'alladhena min qabli -him kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa fa- 'akhadha -hum 'allaah bi- dhunob -him wa- 'allaah shaded al- ciqaab
qul li- 'alladhena kafaro sa- tughlabon wa- tuh.sharon 'ilaa jahannam wa- bi's al- mihaad

qad kaana la- -kum 'aayah fe fi'atain iltaqataa fi'ah tuqaatil fe sabel 'allaah wa- 'ukhraa kaafirah yarawn -hum mithlai -him ra'y al- cayn wa- 'allaah yu'ayyid bi- nas.r -hi man yashaa' 'inna fe dhaalika la- cibrah li- 'ole al- abs.aar

zuyyina li- an- naas h.ubb ash- shahawaat min an- nisaa' wa- al- banen wa- al- qanaat.er al- muqant.arah min adh- dhahab wa- al- fid.d.ah wa- al- khayl al- musawwamah wa- al- ancaam wa- al- h.arth dhaalika mataac al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- 'allaah cinda -hu h.usn al- ma'aab

qul 'a- unabbi' -kum bi- khayr min dhaalikum li- 'alladhena ittaqaw cinda rabb -him jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa wa- azwaaj mut.ahharah wa- rid.waan min 'allaah wa- 'allaah bas.er bi- al- cibaad
'alladhena yaqolon rabb -naa 'inna -naa 'aamannaa fa- ighfir la- -naa dhunob -naa wa- qi -naa cadhaab an- naar
as.- s.aabiren wa- as.- s.aadiqen wa- al- qaaniten wa- al- munfiqen wa- al- mustaghfiren bi- al- ash.aar
shahida 'allaah 'anna -hu laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa wa- al- malaa'ikah wa- 'olo al- cilm qaa'im(an) bi- al- qist. laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa al- cazez al- h.akem

'inna ad- den cinda 'allaah al- islaam wa- maa ikhtalafa 'alladhena 'oto al- kitaab 'illaa min bacdi maa jaa'a -hu al- cilm baghy(an) bayna -hum wa- man yakfur bi- 'aayaat 'allaah fa- 'inna 'allaah sarec al- h.isaab

fa- 'in h.aajjo -ka fa- qul aslamtu wajh -e li- 'allaah wa- man ittabaca -ni wa- qul li- 'alladhena 'oto al- kitaab wa- al- 'ummeyen 'a- aslamtum fa- 'in aslamo fa- qad ihtadaw wa- 'in tawallaw fa- 'inna-maa calay -ka al- balaagh wa- 'allaah bas.er bi- al- cibaad
'inna 'alladhena yakfuron bi- 'aayaat 'allaah wa- yaqtulon an- nabeyen bi- ghayr h.aqq wa- yaqtulon 'alladhena ya'muron bi- al- qist. min an- naas fa- bashshir -hum bi- cadhaab 'alem
'olaa'ika 'alladhena h.abit.at acmaal -hum fe ad- dunyaa wa- al- 'aakhirah wa- maa la- -hum min naas.iren
'a- lam tara 'ilaa 'alladhena 'oto nas.eb(an) min al- kitaab yudcawn 'ilaa kitaab 'allaah li- yah.kum -kum bayna -hum thumma yatawallaa fareq min -hum wa- hum mucrid.on
dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum qaalo lan tamass -naa an- naar 'illaa ayyaam(an) macdodaat wa- gharra -hum fe den -him maa kaano yaftaron
fa- kayfa 'idhaa jamacnaa -hum li- yawm laa rayb fe -hi wa- wuffiyat kull nafs maa kasabat wa- hum laa yuz.lamon
qul 'allaahumma maalik al- mulk tu'te al- mulk man tashaa' wa- tanzic al- mulk min man tashaa' wa- tucizz man tashaa' wa- tudhill man tashaa' bi- yad -ka al- khayr 'inna -ka calaa kull shay' qader
tolij al- layl fe an- nahaar wa- tolij an- nahaar fe al- layl wa- tukhrij al- h.ayy min al- mayyit wa- tukhrij al- mayyit min al- h.ayy wa- tarzuq man tashaa' bi- ghayr h.isaab

laa yattakhidh al- mu'minon al- kaafiren awliyaa' min doni al- mu'minen wa- man yafcal dhaalika fa- laysa min 'allaah fe shay' 'illaa 'an tattaqo min -hum tuqaah wa- yuh.adhdhir -kum 'allaah nafs -hu wa- 'ilaa 'allaah al- mas.er
qul 'in tukhfo maa fe s.udor -kum 'aw tubdo -hu yaclam -hu 'allaah wa- yaclam maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader

yawm tajid kull nafs maa camilat min khayr muh.d.ar(an) wa- maa camilat min so' tawadd law 'anna bayna -haa wa- bayna -hu 'amad(an) baced(an) wa- yuh.adhdhir -kum 'allaah nafs -hu wa- 'allaah ra'of bi- al- cibaad
qul 'in kuntum tuh.ibbon 'allaah fa- ittabico -ne yuh.bib -kum 'allaah wa- yaghfir la- -kum dhunob -kum wa- 'allaah ghafor rah.em
qul at.eco 'allaah wa- ar- rasol fa- 'in tawallaw fa- 'inna 'allaah laa yuh.ibb al- kaafiren
'inna 'allaah is.t.afaa 'aadam wa- noh.(an) wa- 'aal 'ibraahem wa- 'aal cimraan calaa al- caalamen
dhurreyah bacd. -haa min bacd. wa- 'allaah samec calem
'idh qaalat imra'ah cimraan rabb -i 'inni -y nadhartu la- -ka maa fe bat.n -e muh.arrar(an) fa- taqabbal min -ne 'inna -ka 'anta as- samec al- calem

fa- lammaa wad.acat -haa qaalat rabb -i 'inni -y wad.actu -haa 'unthaa wa- 'allaah aclam bi- maa wad.acat wa- laysa adh- dhakar ka- al- 'unthaa wa- 'inni -y sammaytu -haa maryam wa- 'inni -y ucedh -haa bi- -ka wa- dhurreyah -haa min ash- shayt.aan ar- rajem

fa- taqabbala -haa rabb -haa bi- qabol h.asan wa- anbata -haa nabaat(an) h.asan(an) wa- kaffala -haa zakareyaa kulla-maa dakhala calay -haa zakareyaa al- mih.raab wajada cinda -haa rizq(an) qaala yaa maryam 'annaa la- -ki haadhaa qaalat huwa min cindi 'allaah 'inna 'allaah yarzuq man yashaa' bi- ghayr h.isaab
hunaalika dacaa zakareyaa rabb -hu qaala rabb -i hab li- -y min ladun -ka dhurreyah t.ayyibah 'inna -ka samec ad- ducaa'

fa- naadat -hu al- malaa'ikah wa- huwa qaa'im yus.alle fe al- mih.raab 'anna 'allaah yubashshir -ka bi- yah.yaa mus.addiq(an) bi- kalimah min 'allaah wa- sayyid(an) wa- h.as.or(an) wa- nabey(an) min as.- s.aalih.en
qaala rabb -i 'annaa yakon li- -y ghulaam wa- qad balagha -ne al- kibar wa- imra'ah -e caaqir qaala ka- dhaalika 'allaah yafcal maa yashaa'
qaala rabb -i ijcal li- -y 'aayah qaala 'aayah -ka 'an laa tukallim an- naas thalaathah ayyaam 'illaa ramz(an) wa- udhkur rabb -ka kather(an) wa- sabbih. bi- al- cashey wa- al- ibkaar
wa- 'idh qaalat al- malaa'ikah yaa maryam 'inna 'allaah is.t.afaa -ki wa- t.ahhara -ki wa- is.t.afaa -ki calaa nisaa' al- caalamen
yaa maryam uqnute li- rabb -ki wa- usjude wa- irkace maca ar- raakicen
dhaalika min anbaa' al- ghayb noh.e -hi 'ilay -ka wa- maa kunta laday -him 'idh yulqon aqlaam -hum 'ayy -hum yakful maryam wa- maa kunta laday -him 'idh yakhtas.imon
'idh qaalat al- malaa'ikah yaa maryam 'inna 'allaah yubashshir -ka bi- kalimah min -hu ism -hu al- maseh. cesaa ibn maryam wajeh(an) fe ad- dunyaa wa- al- 'aakhirah wa- min al- muqarraben
wa- yukallim an- naas fe al- mahd wa- kahl(an) wa- min as.- s.aalih.en
qaalat rabb -i 'annaa yakon li- -y walad wa- lam yamsas -ne bashar qaala ka- dhaaliki 'allaah yakhluq maa yashaa' 'idhaa qad.aa 'amr(an) fa- 'inna-maa yaqol la- -hu kun fa- yakon
wa- yucallim -hu al- kitaab wa- al- h.ikmah wa- at- tawraah wa- al- 'injel

wa- rasol(an) 'ilaa bane 'israa'el 'anni -y qad ji'tu -kum bi- 'aayah min rabb -kum 'anni -y akhluq la- -kum min at.- t.en ka- hay'ah at.- t.ayr fa- anfukh fe -hi fa- yakon t.ayr(an) bi- 'idhn 'allaah wa- ubri' al- akmah wa- al- abras. wa- uh.ye al- mawtaa bi- 'idhn 'allaah wa- unabbi' -kum bi- maa ta'kulon wa- maa taddakhiron fe buyot -kum 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayah la- -kum 'in kuntum mu'minen
wa- mus.addiq(an) li- maa bayna yadai -ya min at- tawraah wa- li- uh.ill la- -kum bacd. 'alladhe h.urrima calay -kum wa- ji'tu -kum bi- 'aayah min rabb -kum fa- ittaqo 'allaah wa- at.eco -ni
'inna 'allaah rabb -e wa- rabb -kum fa- ucbudo -hu haadhaa s.iraat. mustaqem
fa- lammaa ah.assa cesaa min -hum al- kufr qaala man ans.aar -e 'ilaa 'allaah qaala al- h.awaareyon nah.nu ans.aar 'allaah 'aamannaa bi- 'allaah wa- ishhad bi- 'an(na) -naa muslimon
rabb -naa 'aamannaa bi- maa anzalta wa- ittabacnaa ar- rasol fa- uktub -naa maca ash- shaahiden
wa- makaro wa- makara 'allaah wa- 'allaah khayr al- maakiren

'idh qaala 'allaah yaa cesaa 'inni -y mutawaffe -ka wa- raafic -ka 'ilay -ya wa- mut.ahhir -ka min 'alladhena kafaro wa- jaacil 'alladhena ittabaco -ka fawqa 'alladhena kafaro 'ilaa yawm al- qiyaamah thumma 'ilay -ya marjic -kum fa- ah.kum bayna -kum fe maa kuntum fe -hi takhtalifon
fa- 'ammaa 'alladhena kafaro fa- ucadhdhib -hum cadhaab(an) shaded(an) fe ad- dunyaa wa- al- 'aakhirah wa- maa la- -hum min naas.iren
wa- 'ammaa 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat fa- yuwaffe -him 'ujor -hum wa- 'allaah laa yuh.ibb az.- z.aalimen
dhaalika natlo -hu calay -ka min al- 'aayaat wa- adh- dhikr al- h.akem
'inna mathal cesaa cinda 'allaah ka- mathal 'aadam khalaqa -hu min turaab thumma qaala la- -hu kun fa- yakon
al- h.aqq min rabb -ka fa- laa takun min al- mumtaren

fa- man h.aajja -ka fe -hi min bacdi maa jaa'a -ka min al- cilm fa- qul tacaalaw nadcu abnaa' -naa wa- abnaa' -kum wa- nisaa' -naa wa- nisaa' -kum wa- anfus -naa wa- anfus -kum thumma nabtahil fa- najcal lacnah 'allaah calaa al- kaadhiben
'inna haadhaa la- huwa al- qas.as. al- h.aqq wa- maa min 'ilaah 'illaa 'allaah wa- 'inna 'allaah la- huwa al- cazez al- h.akem
fa- 'in tawallaw fa- 'inna 'allaah calem bi- al- mufsiden

qul yaa 'ahl al- kitaab tacaalaw 'ilaa kalimah sawaa' bayna -naa wa- bayna -kum 'an laa nacbud 'illaa 'allaah wa- laa nushrik bi- -hi shay'(an) wa- laa yattakhidh bacd. -naa bacd.(an) arbaab(an) min doni 'allaah fa- 'in tawallaw fa- qolo ishhado bi- 'an(na) -naa muslimon
yaa 'ahl al- kitaab li- ma(a) tuh.aajjon fe 'ibraahem wa- maa unzilat at- tawraah wa- al- 'injel 'illaa min bacdi -hi 'a- fa- laa tacqilon
haa 'antum haa'ulaa'i h.aajajtum fe maa la- -kum bi- -hi cilm fa- li- ma(a) tuh.aajjon fe maa laysa la- -kum bi- -hi cilm wa- 'allaah yaclam wa- 'antum laa taclamon
maa kaana 'ibraahem yahodey(an) wa- laa nas.raaney(an) wa- laakin kaana h.anef(an) muslim(an) wa- maa kaana min al- mushriken
'inna awlaa an- naas bi- 'ibraahem la- 'alladhena ittabaco -hu wa- haadhaa an- nabey wa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- 'allaah waley al- mu'minen
waddat t.aa'ifah min 'ahl al- kitaab law yud.illon -kum wa- maa yud.illon 'illaa anfus -hum wa- maa yashcuron
yaa 'ahl al- kitaab li- ma(a) takfuron bi- 'aayaat 'allaah wa- 'antum tashhadon
yaa 'ahl al- kitaab li- ma(a) talbison al- h.aqq bi- al- baat.il wa- taktumon al- h.aqq wa- 'antum taclamon
wa- qaalat t.aa'ifah min 'ahl al- kitaab 'aamino bi- 'alladhe unzila calaa 'alladhena 'aamano wajh an- nahaar wa- ukfuro 'aakhir -hu lacalla -hum yarjicon

wa- laa tu'mino 'illaa li- man tabica den -kum qul 'inna al- hudaa hudaa 'allaah 'an yu'taa 'ah.ad mithl maa 'otetum 'aw yuh.aajjo -kum cinda rabb -kum qul 'inna al- fad.l bi- yad 'allaah yu'te -hi man yashaa' wa- 'allaah waasic calem
yakhtas.s. bi- rah.mah -hi man yashaa' wa- 'allaah dho al- fad.l al- caz.em

wa- min 'ahl al- kitaab man 'in ta'man -hu bi- qint.aar yu'addi -hi 'ilay -ka wa- min -hum man 'in ta'man -hu bi- denaar laa yu'addi -hi 'ilay -ka 'illaa maa dumta calay -hi qaa'im(an) dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum qaalo laysa calay -naa fe al- 'ummeyen sabel wa- yaqolon calaa 'allaah al- kadhib wa- hum yaclamon
balaa man awfaa bi- cahd -hi wa- ittaqaa fa- 'inna 'allaah yuh.ibb al- muttaqen

'inna 'alladhena yashtaron bi- cahd 'allaah wa- aymaan -hum thaman(an) qalel(an) 'olaa'ika laa khalaaq la- -hum fe al- 'aakhirah wa- laa yukallim -hum 'allaah wa- laa yanz.ur 'ilay -him yawm al- qiyaamah wa- laa yuzakke -him wa- la- -hum cadhaab 'alem

wa- 'inna min -hum la- fareq(an) yalwon alsinah -hum bi- al- kitaab li- tah.sabo -hu min al- kitaab wa- maa huwa min al- kitaab wa- yaqolon huwa min cindi 'allaah wa- maa huwa min cindi 'allaah wa- yaqolon calaa 'allaah al- kadhib wa- hum yaclamon

maa kaana li- bashar 'an yu'tiya -hu 'allaah al- kitaab wa- al- h.ukm wa- an- nubowah thumma yaqol li- an- naas kono cibaad(an) li- -y min doni 'allaah wa- laakin kono rabbaaneyen bi- maa kuntum tucallimon al- kitaab wa- bi- maa kuntum tadruson
wa- laa ya'mur -kum 'an tattakhidho al- malaa'ikah wa- an- nabeyen arbaab(an) 'a- ya'mur -kum bi- al- kufr bacda 'idh 'antum muslimon

wa- 'idh 'akhadha 'allaah methaaq an- nabeyen la- maa 'aataytu -kum min kitaab wa- h.ikmah thumma jaa'a -kum rasol mus.addiq li- maa maca -kum la- tu'minunna bi- -hi wa- la- tans.urunna -hu qaala 'a- aqrartum wa- 'akhadhtum calaa dhaalikum 'is.r -e qaalo aqrarnaa qaala fa- ishhado wa- 'anaa maca -kum min ash- shaahiden
fa- man tawallaa bacda dhaalika fa- 'olaa'ika hum al- faasiqon
'a- fa- ghayr den 'allaah yabghon wa- la- -hu aslama man fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. t.awc(an) wa- karh(an) wa- 'ilay -hi yurjacon

qul 'aamannaa bi- 'allaah wa- maa unzila calay -naa wa- maa unzila calaa 'ibraahem wa- 'ismaacel wa- 'ish.aaq wa- yacqob wa- al- asbaat. wa- maa 'otiya mosaa wa- cesaa wa- an- nabeyon min rabb -him laa nufarriq bayna 'ah.ad min -hum wa- nah.nu la- -hu muslimon
wa- man yabtaghi ghayr al- islaam den(an) fa- lan yuqbal min -hu wa- huwa fe al- 'aakhirah min al- khaasiren
kayfa yahde 'allaah qawm(an) kafaro bacda 'emaan -him wa- shahido 'anna ar- rasol h.aqq wa- jaa'a -hum al- bayyinaat wa- 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
'olaa'ika jazaa' -hum 'anna calay -him lacnah 'allaah wa- al- malaa'ikah wa- an- naas ajmacen
khaaliden fe -haa laa yukhaffaf can -hum al- cadhaab wa- laa hum yunz.aron
'illaa 'alladhena taabo min bacdi dhaalika wa- as.lah.o fa- 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em
'inna 'alladhena kafaro bacda 'emaan -him thumma izdaado kufr(an) lan tuqbal tawbah -hum wa- 'olaa'ika hum ad.- d.aallon
'inna 'alladhena kafaro wa- maato wa- hum kuffaar fa- lan yuqbal min 'ah.ad -him mil' al- 'ard. dhahab(an) wa- law iftadaa bi- -hi 'olaa'ika la- -hum cadhaab 'alem wa- maa la- -hum min naas.iren
lan tanaalo al- birr h.attaa tunfiqo min maa tuh.ibbon wa- maa tunfiqo min shay' fa- 'inna 'allaah bi- -hi calem
kull at.- t.acaam kaana h.ill(an) li- bane 'israa'el 'illaa maa h.arrama 'israa'el calaa nafs -hi min qabli 'an tunazzal at- tawraah qul fa- i'to bi- at- tawraah fa- utlo -haa 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
fa- man iftaraa calaa 'allaah al- kadhib min bacdi dhaalika fa- 'olaa'ika hum az.- z.aalimon
qul s.adaqa 'allaah fa- ittabico millah 'ibraahem h.anef(an) wa- maa kaana min al- mushriken
'inna 'awwal bayt wud.ica li- an- naas la- 'alladhe bi- bakkah mubaarak(an) wa- huda(n) li- al- caalamen

fe -hi 'aayaat bayyinaat maqaam 'ibraahem wa- man dakhala -hu kaana 'aamin(an) wa- li- 'allaah calaa an- naas h.ijj al- bayt man istat.aaca 'ilay -hi sabel(an) wa- man kafara fa- 'inna 'allaah ghaney can al- caalamen
qul yaa 'ahl al- kitaab li- ma(a) takfuron bi- 'aayaat 'allaah wa- 'allaah shahed calaa maa tacmalon
qul yaa 'ahl al- kitaab li- ma(a) tas.uddon can sabel 'allaah man 'aamana tabghon -haa ciwaj(an) wa- 'antum shuhadaa' wa- maa 'allaah bi- ghaafil can maa tacmalon
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'in tut.eco fareq(an) min 'alladhena 'oto al- kitaab yaruddo -kum bacda 'emaan -kum kaafiren
wa- kayfa takfuron wa- 'antum tutlaa calay -kum 'aayaat 'allaah wa- fe -kum rasol -hi wa- man yactas.im bi- 'allaah fa- qad hudiya 'ilaa s.iraat. mustaqem
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano ittaqo 'allaah h.aqq tuqaah -hu wa- laa tamotunna 'illaa wa- 'antum muslimon

wa- ictas.imo bi- h.abl 'allaah jamec(an) wa- laa tafarraqo wa- udhkuro nicmah 'allaah calay -kum 'idh kuntum acdaa' fa- 'allafa bayna qulob -kum fa- as.bah.tum bi- nicmah -hi 'ikhwaan(an) wa- kuntum calaa shafaa h.ufrah min an- naar fa- anqadha -kum min -haa ka- dhaalika yubayyin 'allaah la- -kum 'aayaat -hi lacalla -kum tahtadon
wa- li- takun min -kum 'ummah yadcon 'ilaa al- khayr wa- ya'muron bi- al- macrof wa- yanhawn can al- munkar wa- 'olaa'ika hum al- muflih.on
wa- laa takono ka- 'alladhena tafarraqo wa- ikhtalafo min bacdi maa jaa'a -hum al- bayyinaat wa- 'olaa'ika la- -hum cadhaab caz.em
yawm tabyad.d. wujoh wa- taswadd wujoh fa- 'ammaa 'alladhena iswaddat wujoh -hum 'a- kafartum bacda 'emaan -kum fa- dhoqo al- cadhaab bi- maa kuntum takfuron
wa- 'ammaa 'alladhena ibyad.d.at wujoh -hum fa- fe rah.mah 'allaah hum fe -haa khaalidon
tilka 'aayaat 'allaah natlo -haa calay -ka bi- al- h.aqq wa- maa 'allaah yured z.ulm(an) li- al- caalamen
wa- li- 'allaah maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- 'ilaa 'allaah turjac al- 'umor

kuntum khayr 'ummah ukhrijat li- an- naas ta'muron bi- al- macrof wa- tanhawn can al- munkar wa- tu'minon bi- 'allaah wa- law 'aamana 'ahl al- kitaab la- kaana khayr(an) la- -hum min -hum al- mu'minon wa- akthar -hum al- faasiqon
lan yad.urro -kum 'illaa 'adha(n) wa- 'in yuqaatilo -kum yuwallo -kum al- adbaar thumma laa yuns.aron

d.uribat calay -him adh- dhillah 'ayna-maa thuqifo 'illaa bi- h.abl min 'allaah wa- h.abl min an- naas wa- baa'o bi- ghad.ab min 'allaah wa- d.uribat calay -him al- maskanah dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum kaano yakfuron bi- 'aayaat 'allaah wa- yaqtulon al- anbiyaa' bi- ghayr h.aqq dhaalika bi- maa cas.aw wa- kaano yactadon
layso sawaa' min 'ahl al- kitaab 'ummah qaa'imah yatlon 'aayaat 'allaah 'anaa' al- layl wa- hum yasjudon
yu'minon bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- ya'muron bi- al- macrof wa- yanhawn can al- munkar wa- yusaaricon fe al- khayraat wa- 'olaa'ika min as.- s.aalih.en
wa- maa yafcalo min khayr fa- lan yukfaro -hu wa- 'allaah calem bi- al- muttaqen
'inna 'alladhena kafaro lan tughniya can -hum amwaal -hum wa- laa awlaad -hum min 'allaah shay'(an) wa- 'olaa'ika as.h.aab an- naar hum fe -haa khaalidon

mathal maa yunfiqon fe haadhihi al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa ka- mathal reh. fe -haa s.irr as.aabat h.arth qawm z.alamo anfus -hum fa- ahlakat -hu wa- maa z.alama -hum 'allaah wa- laakin anfus -hum yaz.limon

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tattakhidho bit.aanah min doni -kum laa ya'lon -kum khabaal(an) waddo maa canittum qad badat al- baghd.aa' min afwaah -him wa- maa tukhfe s.udor -hum akbar qad bayyannaa la- -kum al- 'aayaat 'in kuntum tacqilon

haa 'antum 'olaa'i tuh.ibbon -hum wa- laa yuh.ibbon -kum wa- tu'minon bi- al- kitaab kull -hu wa- 'idhaa laqo -kum qaalo 'aamannaa wa- 'idhaa khalaw cad.d.o calay -kum al- anaamil min al- ghayz. qul moto bi- ghayz. -kum 'inna 'allaah calem bi- dhaat as.- s.udor
'in tamsas -kum h.asanah tasu' -hum wa- 'in tus.ib -kum sayyi'ah yafrah.o bi- -haa wa- 'in tas.biro wa- tattaqo laa yad.urr -kum kayd -hum shay'(an) 'inna 'allaah bi- maa yacmalon muh.et.
wa- 'idh ghadawta min 'ahl -ka tubawwi' al- mu'minen maqaacid li- al- qitaal wa- 'allaah samec calem
'idh hammat t.aa'ifataan min -kum 'an tafshalaa wa- 'allaah waley -humaa wa- calaa 'allaah fa- li- yatawakkal al- mu'minon
wa- la- qad nas.ara -kum 'allaah bi- badr wa- 'antum adhillah fa- ittaqo 'allaah lacalla -kum tashkuron
'idh taqol li- al- mu'minen 'a- lan yakfiya -kum 'an yumidd -kum rabb -kum bi- thalaathah 'aalaaf min al- malaa'ikah munzalen
balaa 'in tas.biro wa- tattaqo wa- ya'to -kum min fawr -him haadhaa yumdid -kum rabb -kum bi- khamsah 'aalaaf min al- malaa'ikah musawwimen
wa- maa jacala -hu 'allaah 'illaa bushraa la- -kum wa- li- tat.ma'inn qulob -kum bi- -hi wa- maa an- nas.r 'illaa min cindi 'allaah al- cazez al- h.akem
li- yaqt.ac t.araf(an) min 'alladhena kafaro 'aw yakbit -hum fa- yanqalibo khaa'iben
laysa la- -ka min al- 'amr shay' 'aw yatob calay -him 'aw yucadhdhib -hum fa- 'inna -hum z.aalimon
wa- li- 'allaah maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. yaghfir li- man yashaa' wa- yucadhdhib man yashaa' wa- 'allaah ghafor rah.em
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa ta'kulo ar- ribaa ad.caaf(an) mud.aacafah wa- ittaqo 'allaah lacalla -kum tuflih.on
wa- ittaqo an- naar 'allate uciddat li- al- kaafiren
wa- at.eco 'allaah wa- ar- rasol lacalla -kum turh.amon
wa- saarico 'ilaa maghfirah min rabb -kum wa- jannah card. -haa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. uciddat li- al- muttaqen
'alladhena yunfiqon fe as- sarraa' wa- ad.- d.arraa' wa- al- kaaz.imen al- ghayz. wa- al- caafen can an- naas wa- 'allaah yuh.ibb al- muh.sinen

wa- 'alladhena 'idhaa facalo faah.ishah 'aw z.alamo anfus -hum dhakaro 'allaah fa- istaghfaro li- dhunob -him wa- man yaghfir adh- dhunob 'illaa 'allaah wa- lam yus.irro calaa maa facalo wa- hum yaclamon
'olaa'ika jazaa' -hum maghfirah min rabb -him wa- jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa wa- nicma 'ajr al- caamilen
qad khalat min qabli -kum sunan fa- sero fe al- 'ard. fa- unz.uro kayfa kaana caaqibah al- mukadhdhiben
haadhaa bayaan li- an- naas wa- huda(n) wa- mawciz.ah li- al- muttaqen
wa- laa tahino wa- laa tah.zano wa- 'antum al- aclawn 'in kuntum mu'minen

'in yamsas -kum qarh. fa- qad massa al- qawm qarh. mithl -hu wa- tilka al- ayyaam nudaawil -haa bayna an- naas wa- li- yaclam 'allaah 'alladhena 'aamano wa- yattakhidh min -kum shuhadaa' wa- 'allaah laa yuh.ibb az.- z.aalimen
wa- li- yumah.h.is. 'allaah 'alladhena 'aamano wa- yamh.aq al- kaafiren
'am h.asibtum 'an tadkhulo al- jannah wa- lammaa yaclam 'allaah 'alladhena jaahado min -kum wa- yaclam as.- s.aabiren
wa- la- qad kuntum tamannawn al- mawt min qabli 'an talqaw -hu fa- qad ra'aytumo -hu wa- 'antum tanz.uron

wa- maa muh.ammad 'illaa rasol qad khalat min qabli -hi ar- rusul 'a- fa- 'in maata 'aw qutila inqalabtum calaa acqaab -kum wa- man yanqalib calaa caqibai -hi fa- lan yad.urr 'allaah shay'(an) wa- sa- yajze 'allaah ask- shaakiren

wa- maa kaana li- nafs 'an tamot 'illaa bi- 'idhn 'allaah kitaab(an) mu'ajjal(an) wa- man yurid thawaab ad- dunyaa nu'ti -hi min -haa wa- man yurid thawaab al- 'aakhirah nu'ti -hi min -haa wa- sa- najze ask- shaakiren
wa- ka-'ayyin min nabey qaatala maca -hu ribbeyon kather fa- maa wahano li- maa as.aaba -hum fe sabel 'allaah wa- maa d.acufo wa- maa istakaano wa- 'allaah yuh.ibb as.- s.aabiren
wa- maa kaana qawl -hum 'illaa 'an qaalo rabb -naa ighfir la- -naa dhunob -naa wa- israaf -naa fe 'amr -naa wa- thabbit aqdaam -naa wa- uns.ur -naa calaa al- qawm al- kaafiren
fa- 'aataa -hum 'allaah thawaab ad- dunyaa wa- h.usn thawaab al- 'aakhirah wa- 'allaah yuh.ibb al- muh.sinen
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'in tut.eco 'alladhena kafaro yaruddo -kum calaa acqaab -kum fa- tanqalibo khaasiren
bal 'allaah mawlaa -kum wa- huwa khayr an- naas.iren
sa- nulqe fe qulob 'alladhena kafaro ar- rucb bi- maa ashrako bi- 'allaah maa lam yunazzil bi- -hi sult.aan(an) wa- ma'waa -hum an- naar wa- bi's mathwaa az.- z.aalimen

wa- la- qad s.adaqa -kum 'allaah wacd -hu 'idh tah.usson -hum bi- 'idhn -hi h.attaa 'idhaa fashiltum wa- tanaazactum fe al- 'amr wa- cas.aytum min bacdi maa araa -kum maa tuh.ibbon min -kum man yured ad- dunyaa wa- min -kum man yured al- 'aakhirah thumma s.arafa -kum can -hum li- yabtaliya -kum wa- la- qad cafaa can -kum wa- 'allaah dho fad.l calaa al- mu'minen

'idh tus.cidon wa- laa talwon calaa 'ah.ad wa- ar- rasol yadco -kum fe 'ukhraa -kum fa- athaaba -kum ghamm(an) bi- ghamm li- kay laa tah.zano calaa maa faata -kum wa- laa maa as.aaba -kum wa- 'allaah khaber bi- maa tacmalon

thumma anzala calay -kum min bacdi al- ghamm 'amanah nucaas(an) yaghshaa t.aa'ifah min -kum wa- t.aa'ifah qad ahammat -hum anfus -hum yaz.unnon bi- 'allaah ghayr al- h.aqq z.ann al- jaahileyah yaqolon hal la- -naa min al- 'amr min shay' qul 'inna al- 'amr kull -hu li- 'allaah yukhfon fe anfus -him maa laa yubdon la- -ka yaqolon law kaana la- -naa min al- 'amr shay' maa qutilnaa haahunaa qul law kuntum fe buyot -kum la- baraza 'alladhena kutiba calay -him al- qatl 'ilaa mad.aajic -him wa- li- yabtaliya 'allaah maa fe s.udor -kum wa- li- yumah.h.is. maa fe qulob -kum wa- 'allaah calem bi- dhaat as.- s.udor
'inna 'alladhena tawallaw min -kum yawm iltaqaa al- jamcaan 'inna-maa istazalla -hum ash- shayt.aan bi- bacd. maa kasabo wa- la- qad cafaa 'allaah can -hum 'inna 'allaah ghafor h.alem

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa takono ka- 'alladhena kafaro wa- qaalo li- 'ikhwaan -him 'idhaa d.arabo fe al- 'ard.
