'aw kaano ghuzza(n) law kaano cinda -naa maa maato wa- maa qutilo li- yajcal 'allaah dhaalika h.asrah fe qulob -him wa- 'allaah yuh.ye wa- yumet wa- 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon bas.er
wa- la- 'in qataltum fe sabel 'allaah 'aw muttum la- maghfirah min 'allaah wa- rah.mah khayr min maa yajmacon
wa- la- 'in muttum 'aw qutiltum la- 'ilaa 'allaah tuh.sharon

fa- bi- maa rah.mah min 'allaah linta la- -hum wa- law kunta faz.z.(an) ghalez. al- qalb la- infad.d.o min h.awl -ka fa- ucfu can -hum wa- istaghfir la- -hum wa- shaawir -hum fe al- 'amr fa- 'idhaa cazamta fa- tawakkal calaa 'allaah 'inna 'allaah yuh.ibb al- mutawakkilen
'in yans.ur -kum 'allaah fa- laa ghaalib la- -kum wa- 'in yakhdhul -kum fa- man-dhaa 'alladhe yans.ur -kum min bacdi -hi wa- calaa 'allaah fa- li- yatawakkal al- mu'minon
wa- maa kaana li- nabey 'an yaghull wa- man yaghlul ya'ti bi- maa ghalla yawm al- qiyaamah thumma tuwaffaa kull nafs maa kasabat wa- hum laa yuz.lamon
'a- fa- man ittabaca rid.waan 'allaah ka- man baa'a bi- sakhat. min 'allaah wa- ma'waa -hu jahannam wa- bi's al- mas.er
hum darajaat cinda 'allaah wa- 'allaah bas.er bi- maa yacmalon

la- qad manna 'allaah calaa al- mu'minen 'idh bacatha fe -him rasol(an) min anfus -him yatlo calay -him 'aayaat -hi wa- yuzakke -him wa- yucallim -hum al- kitaab wa- al- h.ikmah wa- 'in kaano min qablu la- fe d.alaal muben
'a- wa- lammaa as.aabat -kum mus.ebah qad as.abtum mithlai -haa qultum 'annaa haadhaa qul huwa min cindi anfus -kum 'inna 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader
wa- maa as.aaba -kum yawm iltaqaa al- jamcaan fa- bi- 'idhn 'allaah wa- li- yaclam al- mu'minen

wa- li- yaclam 'alladhena naafaqo wa- qela la- -hum tacaalaw qaatilo fe sabel 'allaah 'aw idfaco qaalo law naclam qitaal(an) la- ittabacnaa -kum hum li- al- kufr yawma'idhin aqrab min -hum li- al- 'emaan yaqolon bi- afwaah -him maa laysa fe qulob -him wa- 'allaah aclam bi- maa yaktumon
'alladhena qaalo li- 'ikhwaan -him wa- qacado law at.aaco -naa maa qutilo qul fa- idra'o can anfus -kum al- mawt 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
wa- laa tah.sabanna 'alladhena qutilo fe sabel 'allaah amwaat(an) bal ah.yaa' cinda rabb -hum yurzaqon
farih.en bi- maa 'aataa -hum 'allaah min fad.l -hi wa- yastabshiron bi- 'alladhena lam yalh.aqo bi- -him min khalfi -him 'an laa khawf calay -him wa- laa hum yah.zanon
yastabshiron bi- nicmah min 'allaah wa- fad.l wa- 'anna 'allaah laa yud.ec 'ajr al- mu'minen
'alladhena istajaabo li- 'allaah wa- ar- rasol min bacdi maa as.aaba -hum al- qarh. li- 'alladhena ah.sano min -hum wa- ittaqaw 'ajr caz.em
'alladhena qaala la- -hum an- naas 'inna an- naas qad jamaco la- -kum fa- ikhshaw -hum fa- zaada -hum 'emaan(an) wa- qaalo h.asb -naa 'allaah wa- nicma al- wakel
fa- inqalabo bi- nicmah min 'allaah wa- fad.l lam yamsas -hum so' wa- ittabaco rid.waan 'allaah wa- 'allaah dho fad.l caz.em
'inna-maa dhaalikum ash- shayt.aan yukhawwif awliyaa' -hu fa- laa takhaafo -hum wa- khaafo -ni 'in kuntum mu'minen
wa- laa yah.zun -ka 'alladhena yusaaricon fe al- kufr 'inna -hum lan yad.urro 'allaah shay'(an) yured 'allaah 'an laa yajcal la- -hum h.az.z.(an) fe al- 'aakhirah wa- la- -hum cadhaab caz.em
'inna 'alladhena ishtaraw al- kufr bi- al- 'emaan lan yad.urro 'allaah shay'(an) wa- la- -hum cadhaab 'alem
wa- laa yah.sabanna 'alladhena kafaro 'anna maa numle la- -hum khayr li- anfus -him 'inna-maa numle la- -hum li- yazdaado 'ithm(an) wa- la- -hum cadhaab muhen

maa kaana 'allaah li- yadhar al- mu'minen calaa maa 'antum calay -hi h.attaa yamez al- khabeth min at.- t.ayyib wa- maa kaana 'allaah li- yut.lic -kum calaa al- ghayb wa- laakin 'allaah yajtabe min rusul -hi man yashaa' fa- 'aamino bi- 'allaah wa- rusul -hi wa- 'in tu'mino wa- tattaqo fa- la- -kum 'ajr caz.em

wa- laa yah.sabanna 'alladhena yabkhalon bi- maa 'aataa -hum 'allaah min fad.l -hi huwa khayr(an) la- -hum bal huwa sharr la- -hum sa- yut.awwaqon maa bakhilo bi- -hi yawm al- qiyaamah wa- li- 'allaah meraath as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon khaber
la- qad samica 'allaah qawl 'alladhena qaalo 'inna 'allaah faqer wa- nah.nu aghniyaa' sa- naktub maa qaalo wa- qatl -hum al- anbiyaa' bi- ghayr h.aqq wa- naqol dhoqo cadhaab al- h.areq
dhaalika bi- maa qaddamat ayde -kum wa- 'anna 'allaah laysa bi- z.allaam li- al- cabed

'alladhena qaalo 'inna 'allaah cahida 'ilay -naa 'an laa nu'min li- rasol h.attaa ya'tiya -naa bi- qurbaan ta'kul -hu an- naar qul qad jaa'a -kum rusul min qabli -e bi- al- bayyinaat wa- bi- 'alladhe qultum fa- li- maa qataltumo -hum 'in kunta s.aadiqen
fa- 'in kadhdhabo -ka fa- qad kudhdhiba rusul min qabli -ka jaa'o bi- al- bayyinaat wa- az- zubur wa- al- kitaab al- muner

kull nafs dhaa'iqah al- mawt wa- 'inna-maa tuwaffawn 'ujor -kum yawm al- qiyaamah fa- man zuh.zih.a can an- naar wa- udkhila al- jannah fa- qad faaza wa- maa al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa 'illaa mataac al- ghuror

la- tublawunna fe amwaal -kum wa- anfus -kum wa- la- tasmacunna min 'alladhena 'oto al- kitaab min qabli -kum wa- min 'alladhena ashrako 'adha(n) kather(an) wa- 'in tas.biro wa- tattaqo fa- 'inna dhaalika min cazm al- 'umor

wa- 'idh 'akhadha 'allaah methaaq 'alladhena 'oto al- kitaab la- tubayyinunna -hu li- an- naas wa- laa taktumon -hu fa- nabadho -hu waraa'a z.uhor -him wa- ishtaraw bi- -hi thaman(an) qalel(an) fa- bi's maa yashtaron
laa tah.sabanna 'alladhena yafrah.on bi- maa 'ataw wa- yuh.ibbon 'an yuh.mado bi- maa lam yafcalo fa- laa tah.sabanna -hum bi- mafaazah min al- cadhaab wa- la- -hum cadhaab 'alem
wa- li- 'allaah mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader
'inna fe khalq as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- ikhtilaaf al- layl wa- an- nahaar la- 'aayaat li- 'ole al- albaab

'alladhena yadhkuron 'allaah qiyaam(an) wa- qucod(an) wa- calaa junob -him wa- yatafakkaron fe khalq as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. rabb -naa maa khalaqta haadhaa baat.il(an) subh.aana -ka fa- qi -naa cadhaab an- naar
rabb -naa 'inna -ka man tudkhil an- naar fa- qad akhzayta -hu wa- maa li- az.- z.aalimen min ans.aar

rabb -naa 'inna -naa samicnaa munaadiy(an) yunaade li- al- 'emaan 'an 'aamino bi- rabb -kum fa- 'aamannaa rabb -naa fa- ighfir la- -naa dhunob -naa wa- kaffir can -naa sayyi'aat -naa wa- tawaffa -naa maca al- abraar
rabb -naa wa- 'aati -naa maa wacadta -naa calaa rusul -ka wa- laa tukhzi -naa yawm al- qiyaamah 'inna -ka laa tukhlif al- mecaad

fa- istajaaba la- -hum rabb -hum 'anni -y laa ud.ec camal caamil min -kum min dhakar 'aw 'unthaa bacd. -kum min bacd. fa- 'alladhena haajaro wa- ukhrijo min diyaar -him wa- 'odho fe sabel -e wa- qaatalo wa- qutilo la- ukaffiranna can -hum sayyi'aat -him wa- la- udkhilanna -hum jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar thawaab(an) min cindi 'allaah wa- 'allaah cinda -hu h.usn ath- thawaab
laa yaghurranna -ka taqallub 'alladhena kafaro fe al- bilaad
mataac qalel thumma ma'waa -hum jahannam wa- bi's al- mihaad
laakin 'alladhena ittaqaw rabb -hum la- -hum jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa nuzul(an) min cinda 'allaah wa- maa cinda 'allaah khayr li- al- abraar

wa- 'inna min 'ahl al- kitaab la- man yu'min bi- 'allaah wa- maa unzila 'ilay -kum wa- maa unzila 'ilay -him khaashicen li- 'allaah laa yashtaron bi- 'aayaat 'allaah thaman(an) qalel(an) 'olaa'ika la- -hum 'ajr -hum cinda rabb -him 'inna 'allaah sarec al- h.isaab
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano is.biro wa- s.aabiro wa- raabit.o wa- ittaqo 'allaah lacalla -kum tuflih.on

yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas ittaqo rabb -kum 'alladhe khalaqa -kum min nafs waah.idah wa- khalaqa min -haa zawj -haa wa- baththa min -humaa rijaal(an) kather(an) wa- nisaa' wa- ittaqo 'allaah 'alladhe tasaa'alon bi- -hi wa- al- arh.aam 'inna 'allaah kaana calay -kum raqeb(an)
wa- 'aato al- yataamaa amwaal -hum wa- laa tatabaddalo al- khabeth bi- at.- t.ayyib wa- laa ta'kulo amwaal -hum 'ilaa amwaal -kum 'inna -hu kaana h.ob(an) kaber(an)

wa- 'in khiftum 'an laa tuqsit.o fe al- yataamaa fa- ankih.o maa t.aaba la- -kum min an- nisaa' mathnaa wa- thulaath wa- rubaac fa- 'in khiftum 'an laa tacdilo fa- waah.idah 'aw maa malakat aymaan -kum dhaalika adnaa 'an laa tacolo
wa- 'aato an- nisaa' s.aduqaat -hinna nih.lah fa- 'in t.ibna la- -kum can shay' min -hu nafs(an) fa- kulo -hu hane'(an) mare'
wa- laa tu'to as- sufahaa' amwaal -kum 'allate jacala 'allaah la- -kum qiyaam(an) wa- urzuqo -hum fe -haa wa- ukso -hum wa- qolo la- -hum qawl(an) macrof(an)

wa- ibtalo al- yataamaa h.attaa 'idhaa balagho an- nikaah. fa- 'in 'aanastum min -hum rushd(an) fa- idfaco 'ilay -him amwaal -hum wa- laa ta'kulo -haa israaf(an) wa- bidaar(an) 'an yakbaro wa- man kaana ghaney(an) fa- li- yastacfif wa- man kaana faqer(an) fa- li- ya'kul bi- al- macrof fa- 'idhaa dafactum 'ilay -him amwaal -hum fa- ashhido calay -him wa- kafaa bi- 'allaah h.aseb(an)
li- ar- rijaal nas.eb min maa taraka al- waalidaan wa- al- aqrabon wa- li- an- nisaa' nas.eb min maa taraka al- waalidaan wa- al- aqrabon min maa qalla min -hu 'aw kathura nas.eb(an) mafrod.(an)
wa- 'idhaa h.ad.ara al- qismah 'olo al- qurbaa wa- al- yataamaa wa- al- masaaken fa- urzuqo -hum min -hu wa- qolo la- -hum qawl(an) macrof(an)
wa- li- yakhsha 'alladhena law tarako min khalfi -him dhurreyah d.icaaf(an) khaafo calay -him fa- li- yattaqo 'allaah wa- li- yaqolo qawl(an) saded(an)
'inna 'alladhena ya'kulon amwaal al- yataamaa z.ulm(an) 'inna-maa ya'kulon fe but.on -him naar(an) wa- sa- yas.lawn sacer(an)

yos.e -kum 'allaah fe awlaad -kum li- adh- dhakar mathal h.az.z. al- 'unthayain fa- 'in kunna nisaa' fawqa ithnatain fa- la- -hunna thuluthaa maa taraka wa- 'in kaanat waah.idah fa- la- -haa an- nis.f wa- li- 'abawai -hi li- kull waah.id min -humaa as- sudus min maa taraka 'in kaana la- -hu walad fa- 'in lam yakun la- -hu walad wa- waritha -hu 'abawaa -hu fa- li- 'umm -hi ath- thuluth fa- 'in kaana la- -hu 'ikhwah fa- li- 'umm -hi as- sudus min bacdi was.eyah yos.e bi- -haa 'aw dayn 'aabaa' -kum wa- abnaa' -kum laa tadron 'ayy -hum aqrab la- -kum nafc(an) fared.ah min 'allaah 'inna 'allaah kaana calem(an) h.akem(an)

wa- la- -kum nis.f maa taraka azwaaj -kum 'in lam yakun la- -hunna walad fa- 'in kaana la- -hunna walad fa- la- -kum ar- rubuc min maa tarakna min bacdi was.eyah yos.en bi- -haa 'aw dayn wa- la- -hunna ar- rubuc min maa taraktum 'in lam yakun la- -kum walad fa- 'in kaana la- -kum walad fa- la- -hunna ath- thumun min maa taraktum min bacdi was.eyah tos.on bi- -haa 'aw dayn wa- 'in kaana rajul yorath kalaalah 'aw imra'ah wa- la- -hu 'akh 'aw 'ukht fa- li- kull waah.id min -humaa as- sudus fa- 'in kaano akthar min dhaalika fa- hum shurakaa' fe ath- thuluth min bacdi was.eyah yos.aa bi- -haa 'aw dayn ghayr mud.aarr was.eyah min 'allaah wa- 'allaah calem h.alem
tilka h.udod 'allaah wa- man yut.ic 'allaah wa- rasol -hu yudkhil -hu jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa wa- dhaalika al- fawz al- caz.em
wa- man yacs.i 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- yatacadd h.udod -hu yudkhil -hu naar(an) khaalid(an) fe -haa wa- la- -hu cadhaab muhen

wa- 'allaate ya'tena al- faah.ishah min nisaa' -kum fa- istashhido calay -hinna arbacah min -kum fa- 'in shahido fa- amsiko -hunna fe al- buyot h.attaa yatawaffaa -hunna al- mawt 'aw yajcal 'allaah la- -hunna sabel(an)
wa- 'alladhaani ya'tiyaan -haa min -kum fa- 'aadho -humaa fa- 'in taabaa wa- as.lah.aa fa- acrid.o can -humaa 'inna 'allaah kaana tawwaab(an) rah.em(an)
'inna-maa at- tawbah calaa 'allaah li- 'alladhena yacmalon as- so' bi- jahaalah thumma yatobon min qareb fa- 'olaa'ika yatob 'allaah calay -him wa- kaana 'allaah calem(an) h.akem(an)

wa- laysat at- tawbah li- 'alladhena yacmalon as- sayyi'aat h.attaa 'idhaa h.ad.ara 'ah.ad -hum al- mawt qaala 'inni -y tubtu al-'aan wa- laa 'alladhena yamoton wa- hum kuffaar 'olaa'ika actadnaa la- -hum cadhaab(an) 'alem(an)

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa yah.ill la- -kum 'an taritho an- nisaa' karh(an) wa- laa tacd.ulo -hunna li- tadhhabo bi- bacd. maa 'aataytumo -hunna 'illaa 'an ya'tena bi- faah.ishah mubayyinah wa- caashiro -hunna bi- al- macrof fa- 'in karihtumo -hunna fa- casaa 'an takraho shay'(an) wa- yajcal 'allaah fe -hi khayr(an) kather(an)
wa- 'in aradtum istibdaal zawj makaan zawj wa- 'aataytum 'ih.daa -hunna qint.aar(an) fa- laa ta'khudho min -hu shay'(an) 'a- ta'khudhon -hu buhtaan(an) wa- 'ithm(an) muben(an)
wa- kayfa ta'khudhon -hu wa- qad afd.aa bacd. -kum 'ilaa bacd. wa- 'akhadhna min -kum methaaq(an) ghalez.(an)
wa- laa tankih.o maa nakah.a 'aabaa' -kum min an- nisaa' 'illaa maa qad salafa 'inna -hu kaana faah.ishah wa- maqt(an) wa- saa'a sabel(an)

h.urrimat calay -kum 'ummahaat -kum wa- banaat -kum wa- 'akhawaat -kum wa- cammaat -kum wa- khaalaat -kum wa- banaat al- 'akh wa- banaat al- 'ukht wa- 'ummahaat -kum 'allaate ard.acna -kum wa- 'akhawaat -kum min ar- rad.aacah wa- 'ummahaat nisaa' -kum wa- rabaa'ib -kum 'allaate fe h.ujor -kum min nisaa' -kum 'allaate dakhaltum bi- -hinna fa- 'in lam takono dakhaltum bi- -hinna fa- laa junaah. calay -kum wa- h.alaa'il abnaa' -kum 'alladhena min as.laab -kum wa- 'an tajmaco bayna al- 'ukhtain 'illaa maa qad salafa 'inna 'allaah kaana ghafor(an) rah.em(an)

wa- al- muh.s.anaat min an- nisaa' 'illaa maa malakat aymaan -kum kitaab 'allaah calay -kum wa- uh.illa la- -kum maa waraa'a dhaalikum 'an tabtagho bi- amwaal -kum muh.s.inen ghayr musaafih.en fa- maa istamtactum bi- -hi min -hunna fa- 'aato -hunna 'ujor -hunna fared.ah wa- laa junaah. calay -kum fe maa taraad.aytum bi- -hi min bacdi al- fared.ah 'inna 'allaah kaana calem(an) h.akem(an)

wa- man lam yastat.ic min -kum t.awl(an) 'an yankih. al- muh.s.anaat al- mu'minaat fa- min maa malakat aymaan -kum min fatayaat -kum al- mu'minaat wa- 'allaah aclam bi- 'emaan -kum bacd. -kum min bacd. fa- inkih.o -hunna bi- 'idhn 'ahl -hunna wa- 'aato -hunna 'ujor -hunna bi- al- macrof muh.s.anaat ghayr musaafih.aat wa- laa muttakhidhaat akhdaan fa- 'idhaa uh.s.inna fa- 'in 'atayna bi- faah.ishah fa- calay -hinna nis.f maa calaa al- muh.s.anaat min al- cadhaab dhaalika li- man khashiya al- canat min -kum wa- 'an tas.biro khayr la- -kum wa- 'allaah ghafor rah.em
yured 'allaah li- yubayyin la- -kum wa- yahdiya -kum sunan 'alladhena min qabli -kum wa- yatob calay -kum wa- 'allaah calem h.akem
wa- 'allaah yured 'an yatob calay -kum wa- yured 'alladhena yattabicon ash- shahawaat 'an tamelo mayl(an) caz.em(an)
yured 'allaah 'an yukhaffif can -kum wa- khuliqa al- 'insaan d.acef(an)

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa ta'kulo amwaal -kum bayna -kum bi- al- baat.il 'illaa 'an takon tijaarah can taraad.i(n) min -kum wa- laa taqtulo anfus -kum 'inna 'allaah kaana bi- -kum rah.em(an)
wa- man yafcal dhaalika cudwaan(an) wa- z.ulm(an) fa- sawfa nus.le -hi naar(an) wa- kaana dhaalika calaa 'allaah yaser(an)
'in tajtanibo kabaa'ir maa tunhawn can -hu nukaffir can -kum sayyi'aat -kum wa- nudkhil -kum madkhal(an) karem(an)

wa- laa tatamannaw maa fad.d.ala 'allaah bi- -hi bacd. -kum calaa bacd. li- ar- rijaal nas.eb min maa iktasabo wa- li- an- nisaa' nas.eb min maa iktasabna wa- is'alo 'allaah min fad.l -hi 'inna 'allaah kaana bi- kull shay' calem(an)
wa- li- kull jacalnaa mawaaliya min maa taraka al- waalidaan wa- al- aqrabon wa- 'alladhena caqadat aymaan -kum fa- 'aato -hum nas.eb -hum 'inna 'allaah kaana calaa kull shay' shahed(an)

ar- rijaal qawwaamon calaa an- nisaa' bi- maa fad.d.ala 'allaah bacd. -hum calaa bacd. wa- bi- maa anfaqo min amwaal -him fa- as.- s.aalih.aat qaanitaat h.aafiz.aat li- al- ghayb bi- maa h.afiz.a 'allaah wa- 'allaate takhaafon nushoz -hunna fa- ciz.o -hunna wa- uhjuro -hunna fe al- mad.aajic wa- id.ribo -hunna fa- 'in at.acna -kum fa- laa tabgho calay -hinna sabel(an) 'inna 'allaah kaana caley(an) kaber(an)
wa- 'in khiftum shiqaaq bayna -humaa fa- ibcatho h.akam(an) min 'ahl -hi wa- h.akam(an) min 'ahl -haa 'in yuredaa is.laah.(an) yuwaffiq 'allaah bayna -humaa 'inna 'allaah kaana calem(an) khaber(an)

wa- ucbudo 'allaah wa- laa tushriko bi- -hi shay'(an) wa- bi- al- waalidain ih.saan(an) wa- bi- dhe al- qurbaa wa- al- yataamaa wa- al- masaaken wa- al- jaar dhe al- qurbaa wa- al- jaar al- junub wa- as.- s.aah.ib bi- al- junub wa- ibn as- sabel wa- maa malakat aymaan -kum 'inna 'allaah laa yuh.ibb man kaana mukhtaal(an) fakhor(an)
'alladhena yabkhalon wa- ya'muron an- naas bi- al- bukhl wa- yaktumon maa 'aataa -hum 'allaah min fad.l -hi wa- actadnaa li- al- kaafiren cadhaab(an) muhen(an)
wa- 'alladhena yunfiqon amwaal -hum ri'aa' an- naas wa- laa yu'minon bi- 'allaah wa- laa bi- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- man yakun ash- shayt.aan la- -hu qaren(an) fa- saa'a qaren(an)
wa- maa-dhaa calay -him law 'aamano bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- anfaqo min maa razaqa -hum 'allaah wa- kaana 'allaah bi- -him calem(an)
'inna 'allaah laa yaz.lim mithqaal dharrah wa- 'in taku(n) h.asanah yud.aacif -haa wa- yu'ti min ladun -hu 'ajr(an) caz.em(an)
fa- kayfa 'idhaa ji'naa min kull 'ummah bi- shahed wa- ji'naa bi- -ka calaa haa'ulaa'i shahed(an)
yawma'idhin yawadd 'alladhena kafaro wa- cas.aw ar- rasol law tusawwaa bi- -him al- 'ard. wa- laa yaktumon 'allaah h.adeth(an)

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa taqrabo as.- s.alaah wa- 'antum sukaaraa h.attaa taclamo maa taqolon wa- laa junub(an) 'illaa caabire sabel h.attaa taghtasilo wa- 'in kuntum mard.aa 'aw calaa safar 'aw jaa'a 'ah.ad min -kum min al- ghaa'it. 'aw laamastum an- nisaa' fa- lam tajido maa' fa- tayammamo s.aced(an) t.ayyib(an) fa- imsah.o bi- wujoh -kum wa- ayde -kum 'inna 'allaah kaana cafow ghafor(an)
'a- lam tara 'ilaa 'alladhena 'oto nas.eb(an) min al- kitaab yashtaron ad.- d.alaalah wa- yuredon 'an tad.illo as- sabel
wa- 'allaah aclam bi- acdaa' -kum wa- kafaa bi- 'allaah waley(an) wa- kafaa bi- 'allaah nas.er(an)

min 'alladhena haado yuh.arrifon al- kalim can mawaad.ic -hi wa- yaqolon samicnaa wa- cas.aynaa wa- ismac ghayr musmac wa- raaci -naa layy(an) bi- alsinah -him wa- t.acn(an) fe ad- den wa- law 'anna -hum qaalo samicnaa wa- at.acnaa wa- ismac wa- unz.ur -naa la- kaana khayr(an) la- -hum wa- aqwam wa- laakin lacana -hum 'allaah bi- kufr -him fa- laa yu'minon 'illaa qalel(an)

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'oto al- kitaab 'aamino bi- maa nazzalnaa mus.addiq(an) li- maa maca -kum min qabli 'an nat.mis wujoh(an) fa- narudd -haa calaa adbaar -haa 'aw nalcan -hum ka-maa lacannaa as.h.aab as- sabt wa- kaana 'amr 'allaah mafcol(an)
'inna 'allaah laa yaghfir 'an yushrak bi- -hi wa- yaghfir maa dona dhaalika li- man yashaa' wa- man yushrik bi- 'allaah fa- qad iftaraa 'ithm(an) caz.em(an)
'a- lam tara 'ilaa 'alladhena yuzakkon anfus -hum bal 'allaah yuzakke man yashaa' wa- laa yuz.lamon fatel(an)
unz.ur kayfa yaftaron calaa 'allaah al- kadhib wa- kafaa bi- -hi 'ithm(an) muben(an)
'a- lam tara 'ilaa 'alladhena 'oto nas.eb(an) min al- kitaab yu'minon bi- al- jibt wa- at.- t.aaghot wa- yaqolon li- 'alladhena kafaro haa'ulaa'i ahdaa min 'alladhena 'aamano sabel(an)
'olaa'ika 'alladhena lacana -hum 'allaah wa- man yalcan 'allaah fa- lan tajid la- -hu nas.er(an)
'am la- -hum nas.eb min al- mulk fa- 'idhaa laa yu'ton an- naas naqer(an)
'am yah.sudon an- naas calaa maa 'aataa -hum 'allaah min fad.l -hi fa- qad 'aataynaa 'aal 'ibraahem al- kitaab wa- al- h.ikmah wa- 'aataynaa -hum mulk(an) caz.em(an)
fa- min -hum man 'aamana bi- -hi wa- min -hum man s.adda can -hu wa- kafaa bi- jahannam sacer(an)
'inna 'alladhena kafaro bi- 'aayaat -naa sawfa nus.le -him naar(an) kulla-maa nad.ijat julod -hum baddalnaa -hum julod(an) ghayr -haa li- yadhoqo al- cadhaab 'inna 'allaah kaana cazez(an) h.akem(an)

wa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat sa- nudkhil -hum jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa 'abad(an) la- -hum fe -haa azwaaj mut.ahharah wa- nudkhil -hum z.ill(an) z.alel(an)

'inna 'allaah ya'mur -kum 'an tu'addo al- 'amaanaat 'ilaa 'ahl -haa wa- 'idhaa h.akamtum bayna an- naas 'an tah.kumo bi- al- cadl 'inna 'allaah nicim maa yaciz. -kum bi- -hi 'inna 'allaah kaana samec(an) bas.er(an)

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano at.eco 'allaah wa- at.eco ar- rasol wa- 'ole al- 'amr min -kum fa- 'in tanaazactum fe shay' fa- ruddo -hu 'ilaa 'allaah wa- ar- rasol 'in kuntum tu'minon bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir dhaalika khayr wa- ah.san ta'wel(an)

'a- lam tara 'ilaa 'alladhena yazcumon 'anna -hum 'aamano bi- maa unzila 'ilay -ka wa- maa unzila min qabli -ka yuredon 'an yatah.aakamo 'ilaa at.- t.aaghot wa- qad 'umiro 'an yakfuro bi- -hi wa- yured ash- shayt.aan 'an yud.ill -hum d.alaal(an) baced(an)
wa- 'idhaa qela la- -hum tacaalaw 'ilaa maa anzala 'allaah wa- 'ilaa ar- rasol ra'ayta al- munaafiqen yas.uddon can -ka s.udod(an)
fa- kayfa 'idhaa as.aabat -hum mus.ebah bi- maa qaddamat ayde -him thumma jaa'o -ka yah.lifon bi- 'allaah 'in aradnaa 'illaa ih.saan(an) wa- tawfeq(an)
'olaa'ika 'alladhena yaclam 'allaah maa fe qulob -him fa- acrid. can -hum wa- ciz. -hum wa- qul la- -hum fe anfus -him qawl(an) balegh(an)

wa- maa arsalnaa min rasol 'illaa li- yut.aac bi- 'idhn 'allaah wa- law 'anna -hum 'idh z.alamo anfus -hum jaa'o -ka fa- istaghfaro 'allaah wa- istaghfara la- -hum ar- rasol la- wajado 'allaah tawwaab(an) rah.em(an)
fa- laa wa- rabb -ka laa yu'minon h.attaa yuh.akkimo -ka fe maa shajar bayna -hum thumma laa yajido fe anfus -him h.araj(an) min maa qad.ayta wa- yusallimo taslem(an)

wa- law 'an(na) -naa katabnaa calay -him 'an uqtulo anfus -kum 'aw ukhrujo min diyaar -kum maa facalo -hu 'illaa qalel min -hum wa- law 'anna -hum facalo maa yocaz.on bi- -hi la- kaana khayr(an) la- -hum wa- ashadd tathbet(an)
wa- 'idhan la- 'aataynaa -hum min ladun -naa 'ajr(an) caz.em(an)
wa- la- hadaynaa -hum s.iraat.(an) mustaqem(an)
wa- man yut.ic 'allaah wa- ar- rasol fa- 'olaa'ika maca 'alladhena ancama 'allaah calay -him min an- nabeyen wa- as.- s.iddeqen wa- ash- shuhadaa' wa- as.- s.aalih.en wa- h.asuna 'olaa'ika rafeq(an)
dhaalika al- fad.l min 'allaah wa- kafaa bi- 'allaah calem(an)
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano khudho h.idhr -kum fa- infiro thubaat 'aw infiro jamec(an)
wa- 'inna min -kum la- man la- yubat.t.i'anna fa- 'in as.aabat -kum mus.ebah qaala qad ancama 'allaah calay -ya 'idh lam akun maca -hum shahed(an)
wa- la- 'in as.aaba -kum fad.l min 'allaah la- yaqolanna ka-'an lam takun bayna -kum wa- bayna -hu mawaddah yaa layta -ne kuntu maca -hum fa- afoz fawz(an) caz.em(an)
fa- li- yuqaatil fe sabel 'allaah 'alladhena yashron al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa bi- al- 'aakhirah wa- man yuqaatil fe sabel 'allaah fa- yuqtal 'aw yaghlib fa- sawfa nu'te -hi 'ajr(an) caz.em(an)

wa- maa la- -kum laa tuqaatilon fe sabel 'allaah wa- al- mustad.cafen min ar- rijaal wa- an- nisaa' wa- al- wildaan 'alladhena yaqolon rabb -naa akhrij -naa min haadhihi al- qaryah az.- z.aalim 'ahl -haa wa- ijcal la- -naa min ladun -ka waley(an) wa- ijcal la- -naa min ladun -ka nas.er(an)
'alladhena 'aamano yuqaatilon fe sabel 'allaah wa- 'alladhena kafaro yuqaatilon fe sabel at.- t.aaghot fa- qaatilo awliyaa' ash- shayt.aan 'inna kayd ash- shayt.aan kaana d.acef(an)

'a- lam tara 'ilaa 'alladhena qela la- -hum kuffo ayde -kum wa- aqemo as.- s.alaah wa- 'aato az- zakaah fa- lammaa kutiba calay -him al- qitaal 'idhaa fareq min -hum yakhshawn an- naas ka- khashyah 'allaah 'aw ashadd khashyah wa- qaalo rabb -naa li- maa katabta calay -naa al- qitaal law-laa 'akhkharta -naa 'ilaa 'ajal qareb qul mataac ad- dunyaa qalel wa- al- 'aakhirah khayr li- man ittaqaa wa- laa tuz.lamon fatel(an)

'ayna-maa takono yudrik -kum al- mawt wa- law kuntum fe buroj mushayyadah wa- 'in tus.ib -hum h.asanah yaqolo haadhihi min cindi 'allaah wa- 'in tus.ib -hum sayyi'ah yaqolo haadhihi min cindi -ka qul kull min cindi 'allaah fa- maa li- haa'ulaa'i al- qawm laa yakaadon yafqahon h.adeth(an)
maa as.aaba -ka min h.asanah fa- min 'allaah wa- maa as.aaba -ka min sayyi'ah fa- min nafs -ka wa- arsalnaa -ka li- an- naas rasol(an) wa- kafaa bi- 'allaah shahed(an)
man yut.ic ar- rasol fa- qad at.aaca 'allaah wa- man tawallaa fa- maa arsalnaa -ka calay -him h.afez.(an)

wa- yaqolon t.aacah fa- 'idhaa barazo min cindi -ka bayyata t.aa'ifah min -hum ghayr 'alladhe taqol wa- 'allaah yaktub maa yubayyiton fa- acrid. can -hum wa- tawakkal calaa 'allaah wa- kafaa bi- 'allaah wakel(an)
'a- fa- laa yatadabbaron al- qur'aan wa- law kaana min cindi ghayr 'allaah la- wajado fe -hi ikhtilaaf(an) kather(an)

wa- 'idhaa jaa'a -hum 'amr min al- 'amn 'aw al- khawf adhaaco bi- -hi wa- law raddo -hu 'ilaa ar- rasol wa- 'ilaa 'ole al- 'amr min -hum la- calima -hu 'alladhena yastanbit.on -hu min -hum wa- law-laa fad.l 'allaah calay -kum wa- rah.mah -hu la- ittabactum ash- shayt.aan 'illaa qalel(an)
fa- qaatil fe sabel 'allaah laa tukallaf 'illaa nafs -ka wa- h.arrid. al- mu'minen casaa 'allaah 'an yakuff ba's 'alladhena kafaro wa- 'allaah ashadd ba's(an) wa- ashadd tankel(an)
man yashfac shafaacah h.asanah yakun la- -hu nas.eb min -haa wa- man yashfac shafaacah sayyi'ah yakun la- -hu kifl min -haa wa- kaana 'allaah calaa kull shay' muqet(an)
wa- 'idhaa h.uyyetum bi- tah.eyah fa- h.ayyo bi- ah.san min -haa 'aw ruddo -haa 'inna 'allaah kaana calaa kull shay' h.aseb(an)
'allaah laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa la- yajmacanna -kum 'ilaa yawm al- qiyaamah laa rayb fe -hi wa- man as.daq min 'allaah h.adeth(an)
fa- maa la- -kum fe al- munaafiqen fi'atain wa- 'allaah arkasa -hum bi- maa kasabo 'a- turedon 'an tahdo man ad.alla 'allaah wa- man yud.lil 'allaah fa- lan tajid la- -hu sabel(an)

waddo law takfuron ka-maa kafaro fa- takonon sawaa' fa- laa tattakhidho min -hum awliyaa' h.attaa yuhaajiro fe sabel 'allaah fa- 'in tawallaw fa- khudho -hum wa- uqtulo -hum h.aythu wajadtumo -hum wa- laa tattakhidho min -hum waley(an) wa- laa nas.er(an)

'illaa 'alladhena yas.ilon 'ilaa qawm bayna -kum wa- bayna -hum methaaq 'aw jaa'o -kum h.as.irat s.udor -hum 'an yuqaatilo -kum 'aw yuqaatilo qawm -hum wa- law shaa'a 'allaah la- sallat.a -hum calay -kum fa- la- qaatalo -kum fa- 'in ictazalo -kum fa- lam yuqaatilo -kum wa- alqaw 'ilay -kum as- salam fa- maa jacala 'allaah la- -kum calay -him sabel(an)

sa- tajidon 'aakharen yuredon 'an ya'mano -kum wa- ya'mano qawm -hum kulla-maa ruddo 'ilaa al- fitnah urkiso fe -haa fa- 'in lam yactazilo -kum wa- yulqo 'ilay -kum as- salam wa- yakuffo ayde -him fa- khudho -hum wa- uqtulo -hum h.aythu thaqiftumo -hum wa- 'olaa'ikum jacalnaa la- -kum calay -him sult.aan(an) muben(an)

wa- maa kaana li- mu'min 'an yaqtul mu'min(an) 'illaa khat.a'(an) wa- man qatala mu'min(an) khat.a'(an) fa- tah.rer raqabah mu'minah wa- diyah musallamah 'ilaa 'ahl -hi 'illaa 'an yas.s.addaqo fa- 'in kaana min qawm cadow la- -kum wa- huwa mu'min fa- tah.rer raqabah mu'minah wa- 'in kaana min qawm bayna -kum wa- bayna -hum methaaq fa- diyah musallamah 'ilaa 'ahl -hi wa- tah.rer raqabah mu'minah fa- man lam yajid fa- s.iyaam shahrain mutataabicain tawbah min 'allaah wa- kaana 'allaah calem h.akem(an)
wa- man yaqtul mu'min(an) mutacammid(an) fa- jazaa' -hu jahannam khaalid(an) fe -haa wa- ghad.iba 'allaah calay -hi wa- lacana -hu wa- acadda la- -hu cadhaab(an) caz.em(an)

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'idhaa d.arabtum fe sabel 'allaah fa- tabayyano wa- laa taqolo li- man alqaa 'ilay -kum as- salaam lasta mu'min(an) tabtaghon carad. al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa fa- cinda 'allaah maghaanim katherah ka- dhaalika kuntum min qablu fa- manna 'allaah calay -kum fa- tabayyano 'inna 'allaah kaana bi- maa tacmalon khaber(an)

laa yastawe al- qaacidon min al- mu'minen ghayr 'ole ad.- d.arar wa- al- mujaahidon fe sabel 'allaah bi- amwaal -him wa- anfus -him fad.d.ala 'allaah al- mujaahiden bi- amwaal -him wa- anfus -him calaa al- qaaciden darajah wa- kull(an) wacada 'allaah al- h.usnaa wa- fad.d.ala 'allaah al- mujaahiden calaa al- qaaciden 'ajr(an) caz.em(an)
darajaat min -hu wa- maghfirah wa- rah.mah wa- kaana 'allaah ghafor(an) rah.em(an)

'inna 'alladhena tawaffaa -hum al- malaa'ikah z.aalime anfus -him qaalo fe ma(a) kuntum qaalo kunnaa mustad.cafen fe al- 'ard. qaalo 'a- lam takun 'ard. 'allaah waasicah fa- tuhaajiro fe -haa fa- 'olaa'ika ma'waa -hum jahannam wa- saa'at mas.er(an)
'illaa al- mustad.cafen min ar- rijaal wa- an- nisaa' wa- al- wildaan laa yastat.econ h.elah wa- laa yahtadon sabel
fa- 'olaa'ika casaa 'allaah 'an yacfuwa can -hum wa- kaana 'allaah cafow ghafor(an)

wa- man yuhaajir fe sabel 'allaah yajid fe al- 'ard. muraagham(an) kather(an) wa- sacah wa- man yakhruj min bayt -hi muhaajir(an) 'ilaa 'allaah wa- rasol -hi thumma yudrik -hu al- mawt fa- qad waqaca 'ajr -hu calaa 'allaah wa- kaana 'allaah ghafor(an) rah.em(an)
wa- 'idhaa d.arabtum fe al- 'ard. fa- laysa calay -kum junaah. 'an taqs.uro min as.- s.alaah 'in khiftum 'an yaftin -ka 'alladhena kafaro 'inna al- kaafiren kaano la- -kum cadow muben(an)

wa- 'idhaa kunta fe -him fa- aqamta la- -hum as.- s.alaah fa- li- taqum t.aa'ifah min -hum maca -ka wa- li- ya'khudho aslih.ah -hum fa- 'idhaa sajado fa- li- yakono min waraa'a -kum wa- li- ta'ti t.aa'ifah 'ukhraa lam yus.allo fa- li- yus.allo maca -ka wa- li- ya'khudho h.idhr -hum wa- aslih.ah -hum wadda 'alladhena kafaro law taghfulon can aslih.ah -kum wa- amticah -kum fa- yamelon calay -kum maylah waah.idah wa- laa junaah. calay -kum 'in kaana bi- -kum 'adha(n) min mat.ar 'aw kuntum mard.aa 'an tad.aco aslih.ah -kum wa- khudho h.idhr -kum 'inna 'allaah acadda li- al- kaafiren cadhaab(an) muhen(an)

fa- 'idhaa qad.aytum as.- s.alaah fa- udhkuro 'allaah qiyaam(an) wa- qucod(an) wa- calaa junob -kum fa- 'idhaa it.ma'nantum fa- aqemo as.- s.alaah 'inna as.- s.alaah kaanat calaa al- mu'minen kitaab(an) mawqot(an)
wa- laa tahino fe ibtighaa' al- qawm 'in takono ta'lamon fa- 'inna -hum ya'lamon ka-maa ta'lamon wa- tarjon min 'allaah maa laa yarjon wa- kaana 'allaah calem(an) h.akem(an)
'in(na) -naa anzalnaa 'ilay -ka al- kitaab bi- al- h.aqq li- tah.kum bayna an- naas bi- maa araa -ka 'allaah wa- laa takun li- al- khaa'inen khas.em(an)
wa- istaghfir 'allaah 'inna 'allaah kaana ghafor(an) rah.em(an)
wa- laa tujaadil can 'alladhena yakhtaanon anfus -hum 'inna 'allaah laa yuh.ibb man kaana khawwaan(an) 'athem(an)
yastakhfon min an- naas wa- laa yastakhfon min 'allaah wa- huwa maca -hum 'idh yubayyiton maa laa yard.aa min al- qawl wa- kaana 'allaah bi- maa yacmalon muh.et.(an)
haa 'antum haa'ulaa'i jaadaltum can -hum fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa fa- man yujaadil 'allaah can -hum yawm al- qiyaamah 'am man yakon calay -him wakel(an)
wa- man yacmal so' 'aw yaz.lim nafs -hu thumma yastaghfir 'allaah yajid 'allaah ghafor(an) rah.em(an)
wa- man yaksib 'ithm(an) fa- 'inna-maa yaksib -hu calaa nafs -hi wa- kaana 'allaah calem(an) h.akem(an)
wa- man yaksib khat.e'ah 'aw 'ithm(an) thumma yarmi bi- -hi bare'(an) fa- qad ih.tamala buhtaan(an) wa- 'ithm(an) muben(an)

wa- law-laa fad.l 'allaah calay -ka wa- rah.mah -hu la- hammat t.aa'ifah min -hum 'an yud.illo -ka wa- maa yud.illon 'illaa anfus -hum wa- maa yad.urron -ka min shay' wa- anzala 'allaah calay -ka al- kitaab wa- al- h.ikmah wa- callama -ka maa lam takun taclam wa- kaana fad.l 'allaah calay -ka caz.em(an)
laa khayr fe kather min najwaa -hum 'illaa man 'amara bi- s.adaqah 'aw macrof 'aw is.laah. bayna an- naas wa- man yafcal dhaalika ibtighaa' mard.aat 'allaah fa- sawfa nu'te -hi 'ajr(an) caz.em(an)
wa- man yushaaqiq ar- rasol min bacdi maa tabayyana la- -hu al- hudaa wa- yattabic ghayr sabel al- mu'minen nuwalli -hi maa tawallaa wa- nus.li -hi jahannam wa- saa'at mas.er(an)
'inna 'allaah laa yaghfir 'an yushrak bi- -hi wa- yaghfir maa dona dhaalika li- man yashaa' wa- man yushrik bi- 'allaah fa- qad d.alla d.alaal(an) baced(an)
'in yadcon min doni -hi 'illaa 'inaath(an) wa- 'in yadcon 'illaa shayt.aan(an) mared(an)
lacana -hu 'allaah wa- qaala la- attakhidhanna min cibaad -ka nas.eb(an) mafrod.(an)

wa- la- ud.illanna -hum wa- la- umanniyanna -hum wa- la- 'aamuranna -hum fa- la- yubattikunna 'aadhaan al- ancaam wa- la- 'aamuranna -hum fa- la- yughayyirunna khalq 'allaah wa- man yattakhidh ash- shayt.aan waley(an) min doni 'allaah fa- qad khasira khusraan(an) muben(an)
yacid -hum wa- yumanne -him wa- maa yacid -hum ash- shayt.aan 'illaa ghuror(an)
'olaa'ika ma'waa -hum jahannam wa- laa yajidon can -haa mah.es.(an)
wa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat sa- nudkhil -hum jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa 'abad(an) wacd 'allaah h.aqq(an) wa- man as.daq min 'allaah qel(an)
laysa bi- amaaney -kum wa- laa amaaney 'ahl al- kitaab man yacmal so' yujza bi- -hi wa- laa yajid la- -hu min doni 'allaah waley(an) wa- laa nas.er(an)
wa- man yacmal min as.- s.aalih.aat min dhakar 'aw 'unthaa wa- huwa mu'min fa- 'olaa'ika yadkhulon al- jannah wa- laa yuz.lamon naqer(an)
wa- man ah.san den(an) min man aslama wajh -hu li- 'allaah wa- huwa muh.sin wa- ittabaca millah 'ibraahem h.anef(an) wa- ittakhadha 'allaah 'ibraahem khalel(an)
wa- li- 'allaah maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- kaana 'allaah bi- kull shay' muh.et.(an)

wa- yastafton -ka fe an- nisaa' qul 'allaah yufte -kum fe -hinna wa- maa yutlaa calay -kum fe al- kitaab fe yataamaa an- nisaa' 'allaate laa tu'ton -hunna maa kutiba la- -hunna wa- targhabon 'an tankih.o -hunna wa- al- mustad.cafen min al- wildaan wa- 'an taqomo li- al- yataamaa bi- al- qist. wa- maa tafcalo min khayr fa- 'inna 'allaah kaana bi- -hi calem(an)

wa- 'in imra'ah khaafat min bacl -haa nushoz(an) 'aw icraad.(an) fa- laa junaah. calay -himaa 'an yus.lih.aa bayna -humaa s.ulh.(an) wa- as.- s.ulh. khayr wa- uh.d.irat al- anfus ash- shuh.h. wa- 'in tuh.sino wa- tattaqo fa- 'inna 'allaah kaana bi- maa tacmalon khaber(an)

wa- lan tastat.eco 'an tacdilo bayna an- nisaa' wa- law h.aras.tum fa- laa tamelo kull al- mayl fa- tadharo -haa ka- al- mucallaqah wa- 'in tus.lih.o wa- tattaqo fa- 'inna 'allaah kaana ghafor(an) rah.em(an)
wa- 'in yatafarraqaa yughni 'allaah kull(an) min sacah -hi wa- kaana 'allaah waasic(an) h.akem(an)

wa- li- 'allaah maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- la- qad was.s.aynaa 'alladhena 'oto al- kitaab min qabli -kum wa- 'eyaa -kum 'an ittaqo 'allaah wa- 'in takfuro fa- 'inna li- 'allaah maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- kaana 'allaah ghaney(an) h.amed(an)
wa- li- 'allaah maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- kafaa bi- 'allaah wakel(an)
'in yasha' yudhhib -kum 'ayyuhaa an- naas wa- ya'ti bi- 'aakharen wa- kaana 'allaah calaa dhaalika qader(an)
man kaana yured thawaab ad- dunyaa fa- cinda 'allaah thawaab ad- dunyaa wa- al- 'aakhirah wa- kaana 'allaah samec(an) bas.er(an)

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano kono qawwaamen bi- al- qist. shuhadaa' li- 'allaah wa- law calaa anfus -kum 'aw al- waalidain wa- al- aqraben 'in yakun ghaney(an) 'aw faqer(an) fa- 'allaah awlaa bi- -himaa fa- laa tattabico al- hawaa 'an tacdilo wa- 'in talwo 'aw tucrid.o fa- 'inna 'allaah kaana bi- maa tacmalon khaber(an)

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'aamino bi- 'allaah wa- rasol -hi wa- al- kitaab 'alladhe nazzala calaa rasol -hi wa- al- kitaab 'alladhe anzala min qablu wa- man yakfur bi- 'allaah wa- malaa'ikah -hi wa- kutub -hi wa- rusul -hi wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir fa- qad d.alla d.alaal(an) baced(an)
'inna 'alladhena 'aamano thumma kafaro thumma 'aamano thumma kafaro thumma izdaado kufr(an) lam yakun 'allaah li- yaghfir la- -hum wa- laa li- yahdiya -hum sabel(an)
bashshir al- munaafiqen bi- 'anna la- -hum cadhaab(an) 'alem(an)
'alladhena yattakhidhon al- kaafiren awliyaa' min doni al- mu'minen 'a- yabtaghon cinda -hum al- cizzah fa- 'inna al- cizzah li- 'allaah jamec(an)

wa- qad nazzala calay -kum fe al- kitaab 'an 'idhaa samictum 'aayaat 'allaah yukfar bi- -haa wa- yustahza' bi- -haa fa- laa taqcudo maca -hum h.attaa yakhod.o fe h.adeth ghayr -hi 'inna -kum 'idhan mithl -hum 'inna 'allaah jaamic al- munaafiqen wa- al- kaafiren fe jahannam jamec(an)

'alladhena yatarabbas.on bi- -kum fa- 'in kaana la- -kum fath. min 'allaah qaalo 'a- lam nakun maca -kum wa- 'in kaana li- al- kaafiren nas.eb qaalo 'a- lam nastah.widh calay -kum wa- namnac -kum min al- mu'minen fa- 'allaah yah.kum bayna -kum yawm al- qiyaamah wa- lan yajcal 'allaah li- al- kaafiren calaa al- mu'minen sabel(an)
'inna al- munaafiqen yukhaadicon 'allaah wa- huwa khaadic -hum wa- 'idhaa qaamo 'ilaa as.- s.alaah qaamo kusaalaa yuraa'on an- naas wa- laa yadhkuron 'allaah 'illaa qalel(an)
mudhabdhaben bayna dhaalika laa 'ilaa haa'ulaa'i wa- laa 'ilaa haa'ulaa'i wa- man yud.lil 'allaah fa- lan tajid la- -hu sabel(an)
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tattakhidho al- kaafiren awliyaa' min doni al- mu'minen 'a- turedon 'an tajcalo li- 'allaah calay -kum sult.aan(an) muben(an)
'inna al- munaafiqen fe ad- dark al- asfal min an- naar wa- lan tajid la- -hum nas.er(an)
'illaa 'alladhena taabo wa- as.lah.o wa- ictas.amo bi- 'allaah wa- akhlas.o den -hum li- 'allaah fa- 'olaa'ika maca al- mu'minen wa- sawfa yu'ti 'allaah al- mu'minen 'ajr(an) caz.em(an)
maa yafcal 'allaah bi- cadhaab -kum 'in shakartum wa- 'aamantum wa- kaana 'allaah shaakir(an) calem(an)
laa yuh.ibb 'allaah al- jahr bi- as- so' min al- qawl 'illaa man z.ulima wa- kaana 'allaah samec(an) calem(an)
'in tubdo khayr(an) 'aw tukhfo -hu 'aw tacfo can so' fa- 'inna 'allaah kaana cafow qader(an)

'inna 'alladhena yakfuron bi- 'allaah wa- rusul -hi wa- yuredon 'an yufarriqo bayna 'allaah wa- rusul -hi wa- yaqolon nu'min bi- bacd. wa- nakfur bi- bacd. wa- yuredon 'an yattakhidho bayna dhaalika sabel(an)
'olaa'ika hum al- kaafiron h.aqq(an) wa- actadnaa li- al- kaafiren cadhaab(an) muhen(an)
wa- 'alladhena 'aamano bi- 'allaah wa- rusul -hi wa- lam yufarriqo bayna 'ah.ad min -hum 'olaa'ika sawfa yu'te -him 'ujor -hum wa- kaana 'allaah ghafor(an) rah.em(an)

yas'al -ka 'ahl al- kitaab 'an tunazzil calay -him kitaab(an) min as- samaa' fa- qad sa'alo mosaa akbar min dhaalika fa- qaalo ari -naa 'allaah jahrah fa- 'akhadhat -hum as.- s.aaciqah bi- z.ulm -him thumma ittakhadho al- cijl min bacdi maa jaa'at -hum al- bayyinaat fa- cafawnaa can dhaalika wa- 'aataynaa mosaa sult.aan(an) muben(an)
wa- rafacnaa fawqa -hum at.- t.or bi- methaaq -him wa- qulnaa la- -hum udkhulo al- baab sujjad(an) wa- qulnaa la- -hum laa tacdo fe as- sabt wa- 'akhadhnaa min -hum methaaq(an) ghalez.(an)

fa- bi- maa naqd.i -him methaaq -hum wa- kufr -hum bi- 'aayaat 'allaah wa- qatl -hum al- anbiyaa' bi- ghayr h.aqq wa- qawl -hum qulob -naa ghulf bal t.abaca 'allaah calay -haa bi- kufr -him fa- laa yu'minon 'illaa qalel(an)
wa- bi- kufr -him wa- qawl -him calaa maryam buhtaan(an) caz.em(an)

wa- qawl -him 'in(na) -naa qatalnaa al- maseh. cesaa ibn maryam rasol 'allaah wa- maa qatalo -hu wa- maa s.alabo -hu wa- laakin shubbiha la- -hum wa- 'inna 'alladhena ikhtalafo fe -hi la- fe shakk min -hu maa la- -hum bi- -hi min cilm 'illaa ittibaac az.- z.ann wa- maa qatalo -hu yaqen(an)
bal rafaca -hu 'allaah 'ilay -hi wa- kaana 'allaah cazez(an) h.akem(an)
wa- 'in min 'ahl al- kitaab 'illaa la- yu'minanna bi- -hi qabla mawt -hi wa- yawm al- qiyaamah yakon calay -him shahed(an)
fa- bi- z.ulm min 'alladhena haado h.arramnaa calay -him t.ayyibaat uh.illat la- -hum wa- bi- s.add -him can sabel 'allaah kather(an)
wa- 'akhdh -hum ar- ribaa wa- qad nuho can -hu wa- 'akl -hum amwaal an- naas bi- al- baat.il wa- actadnaa li- al- kaafiren min -hum cadhaab(an) 'alem(an)

laakin ar- raasikhon fe al- cilm min -hum wa- al- mu'minon yu'minon bi- maa unzila 'ilay -ka wa- maa unzila min qabla -ka wa- al- muqemen as.- s.alaah wa- al- mu'ton az- zakaah wa- al- mu'minon bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir 'olaa'ika sa- nu'te -him 'ajr(an) caz.em(an)

'in(na) -naa awh.aynaa 'ilay -ka ka-maa awh.aynaa 'ilaa noh. wa- an- nabeyen min bacdi -hi wa- awh.aynaa 'ilaa 'ibraahem wa- 'ismaacel wa- 'ish.aaq wa- yacqob wa- al- asbaat. wa- cesaa wa- 'ayyob wa- yonus wa- haaron wa- sulaymaan wa- 'aataynaa daawod zabor(an)
wa- rusul(an) qad qas.as.naa -hum calay -ka min qablu wa- rusul(an) lam naqs.us. -hum calay -ka wa- kallama 'allaah mosaa taklem(an)
rusul(an) mubashshiren wa- mundhiren li- 'an laa yakon li- an- naas calaa 'allaah h.ujjah bacda ar- rusul wa- kaana 'allaah cazez(an) h.akem(an)
laakin 'allaah yashhad bi- maa anzala 'ilay -ka anzala -hu bi- cilm -hi wa- al- malaa'ikah yashhadon wa- kafaa bi- 'allaah shahed(an)
'inna 'alladhena kafaro wa- s.addo can sabel 'allaah qad d.allo d.alaal(an) baced(an)
'inna 'alladhena kafaro wa- z.alamo lam yakun 'allaah li- yaghfir la- -hum wa- laa li- yahdiya -hum t.areq(an)
'illaa t.areq jahannam khaaliden fe -haa 'abad(an) wa- kaana dhaalika calaa 'allaah yaser(an)

yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas qad jaa'a -kum ar- rasol bi- al- h.aqq min rabb -kum fa- 'aamino khayr(an) la- -kum wa- 'in takfuro fa- 'inna li- 'allaah maa fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- kaana 'allaah calem(an) h.akem(an)

yaa 'ahl al- kitaab laa taghlo fe den -kum wa- laa taqolo calaa 'allaah 'illaa al- h.aqq 'inna-maa al- maseh. cesaa ibn maryam rasol 'allaah wa- kalimah -hu alqaa -haa 'ilaa maryam wa- roh. min -hu fa- 'aamino bi- 'allaah wa- rusul -hi wa- laa taqolo thalaathah intaho khayr(an) la- -kum 'inna-maa 'allaah 'ilaah waah.id subh.aana -hu 'an yakon la- -hu walad la- -hu maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- kafaa bi- 'allaah wakel(an)
lan yastankif al- maseh. 'an yakon cabd(an) li- 'allaah wa- laa al- malaa'ikah al- muqarrabon wa- man yastankif can cibaadah -hi wa- yastakbir fa- sa- yah.shur -hum 'ilay -hi jamec(an)

fa- 'ammaa 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat fa- yuwaffe -him 'ujor -hum wa- yazed -hum min fad.l -hi wa- 'ammaa 'alladhena istankafo wa- istakbaro fa- yucadhdhib -hum cadhaab(an) 'alem(an) wa- laa yajidon la- -hum min doni 'allaah waley(an) wa- laa nas.er(an)
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas qad jaa'a -kum burhaan min rabb -kum wa- anzalnaa 'ilay -kum nor(an) muben(an)
fa- 'ammaa 'alladhena 'aamano bi- 'allaah wa- ictas.amo bi- -hi fa- sa- yudkhil -hum fe rah.mah min -hu wa- fad.l wa- yahde -him 'ilay -hi s.iraat.(an) mustaqem(an)

yastafton -ka qul 'allaah yufte -kum fe al- kalaalah 'in imru' halaka laysa la- -hu walad wa- la- -hu 'ukht fa- la- -haa nis.f maa taraka wa- huwa yarith -haa 'in lam yakun la- -haa walad fa- 'in kaanataa ithnatain fa- la- -humaa ath- thuluthaan min maa taraka wa- 'in kaano 'ikhwah rijaal(an) wa- nisaa' fa- li- adh- dhakar mithl h.az.z. al- 'unthayain yubayyin 'allaah la- -kum 'an tad.illo wa- 'allaah bi- kull shay' calem
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano awfo bi- al- cuqod
uh.illat la- -kum bahemah al- ancaam 'illaa maa yutlaa calay -kum ghayr muh.ille as.- s.ayd wa- 'antum h.urum 'inna 'allaah yah.kum maa yured

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tuh.illo shacaa'ir 'allaah wa- laa ash- shahr al- h.araam wa- laa al- hady wa- laa al- qalaa'id wa- laa 'aammen al- bayt al- h.araam yabtaghon fad.l(an) min rabb -him wa- rid.waan(an) wa- 'idhaa h.alaltu fa- is.t.aado wa- laa yajrimanna -kum shana'aan qawm 'an s.addo -kum can al- masjid al- h.araam 'an tactado wa- tacaawano calaa al- birr wa- at- taqwaa wa- laa tacaawano calaa al- 'ithm wa- al- cudwaan wa- ittaqo 'allaah 'inna 'allaah shaded al- ciqaab

h.urrimat calay -kum al- maytah wa- ad- dam wa- lah.m al- khinzer wa- maa uhilla li- ghayr 'allaah bi- -hi wa- al- munkhaniqah wa- al- mawqodhah wa- al- mutaraddiyah wa- an- nat.eh.ah wa- maa 'akala as- sabuc 'illaa maa dhakkaytum wa- maa dhubih.a calaa an- nus.ub wa- 'an tastaqsimo bi- al- azlaam dhaalikum fisq al- yawm ya'isa 'alladhena kafaro min den -kum fa- laa takhshaw -hum wa- ikhshaw -ni al- yawm akmaltu la- -kum den -kum wa- atmamtu calay -kum nicmah -e wa- rad.etu la- -kum al- islaam den(an) fa- man id.t.urra fe makhmas.ah ghayr mutajaanif li- 'ithm fa- 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em

yas'alon -ka maa-dhaa uh.illa la- -hum qul uh.illa la- -kum at.- t.ayyibaat wa- maa callamtum min al- jawaarih. mukalliben tucallimon -hunna min maa callama -kum 'allaah fa- kulo min maa amsakna calay -kum wa- udhkuro ism 'allaah calay -hi wa- ittaqo 'allaah 'inna 'allaah sarec al- h.isaab

al- yawm uh.illa la- -kum at.- t.ayyibaat wa- t.acaam 'alladhena 'oto al- kitaab h.ill la- -kum wa- t.acaam -kum h.ill la- -hum wa- al- muh.s.anaat min al- mu'minaat wa- al- muh.s.anaat min 'alladhena 'oto al- kitaab min qabli -kum 'idhaa 'aataytumo -hunna 'ujor -hunna muh.s.inen ghayr musaafih.en wa- laa muttakhidhe akhdaan wa- man yakfur bi- al- 'emaan fa- qad h.abit.a camal -hu wa- huwa fe al- 'aakhirah min al- khaasiren

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'idhaa qumtum 'ilaa as.- s.alaah fa- ighsilo wujoh -kum wa- ayde -kum 'ilaa al- maraafiq wa- imsah.o bi- ru'os -kum wa- arjul -kum 'ilaa al- kacbain wa- 'in kuntum junub(an) fa- it.t.ahharo wa- 'in kuntum mard.aa 'aw calaa safar 'aw jaa'a 'ah.ad min -kum min al- ghaa'it. 'aw laamastum an- nisaa' fa- lam tajido maa' fa- tayammamo s.aced(an) t.ayyib(an) fa- imsah.o bi- wujoh -kum wa- ayde -kum min -hu maa yured 'allaah li- yajcal calay -kum min h.araj wa- laakin yured li- yut.ahhir -kum wa- li- yutimm nicmah -hu calay -kum lacalla -kum tashkuron
wa- udhkuro nicmah 'allaah calay -kum wa- methaaq -hi 'alladhe waathaqa -kum bi- -hi 'idh qultum samicnaa wa- at.acnaa wa- ittaqo 'allaah 'inna 'allaah calem bi- dhaat as.- s.udor

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano kono qawwaamen li- 'allaah shuhadaa' bi- al- qist. wa- laa yajrimanna -kum shana'aan qawm calaa 'an laa tacdilo icdilo huwa aqrab li- at- taqwaa wa- ittaqo 'allaah 'inna 'allaah khaber bi- maa tacmalon
wacada 'allaah 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat la- -hum maghfirah wa- 'ajr caz.em
wa- 'alladhena kafaro wa- kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa 'olaa'ika as.h.aab al- jah.em

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano udhkuro nicmah 'allaah calay -kum 'idh hamma qawm 'an yabsut.o 'ilay -kum ayde -him fa- kaffa ayde -him can -kum wa- ittaqo 'allaah wa- calaa 'allaah fa- li- yatawakkal al- mu'minon

wa- la- qad 'akhadha 'allaah methaaq bane 'israa'el wa- bacathnaa min -hum ithnai cashar naqeb(an) wa- qaala 'allaah 'inni -y maca -kum la- 'in aqamtum as.- s.alaah wa- 'aataytum az- zakaah wa- 'aamantum bi- rusul -e wa- cazzartumo -hum wa- aqrad.tum 'allaah qard.(an) h.asan(an) la- ukaffiranna can -kum sayyi'aat -kum wa- la- udkhilanna -kum jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar fa- man kafara bacda dhaalika min -kum fa- qad d.alla sawaa' as- sabel

fa- bi- maa naqd.i -him methaaq -hum lacannaa -hum wa- jacalnaa qulob -hum qaasiyah yuh.arrifon al- kalim can mawaad.ic -hi wa- naso h.az.z.(an) min maa dhukkiro bi- -hi wa- laa tazaal tat.t.alic calaa khaa'inah min -hum 'illaa qalel(an) min -hum fa- ucfu can -hum wa- is.fah. 'inna 'allaah yuh.ibb al- muh.sinen

wa- min 'alladhena qaalo 'in(na) -naa nas.aaraa 'akhadhnaa methaaq -hum fa- naso h.az.z.(an) min maa dhukkiro bi- -hi fa- aghraynaa bayna -hum al- cadaawah wa- al- baghd.aa' 'ilaa yawm al- qiyaamah wa- sawfa yunabbi' -hum 'allaah bi- maa kaano yas.nacon
yaa 'ahl al- kitaab qad jaa'a -kum rasol -naa yubayyin la- -kum kather(an) min maa kuntum tukhfon min al- kitaab wa- yacfo can kather
qad jaa'a -kum min 'allaah nor wa- kitaab muben
yahde bi- -hi 'allaah man ittabaca rid.waan -hu subul as- salaam wa- yukhrij -hum min az.- z.ulumaat 'ilaa an- nor bi- 'idhn -hi wa- yahdi -him 'ilaa s.iraat. mustaqem

la- qad kafara 'alladhena qaalo 'inna 'allaah huwa al- maseh. ibn maryam qul fa- man yamlik min 'allaah shay' 'in araada 'an yuhlik al- maseh. ibn maryam wa- 'umm -hu wa- man fe al- 'ard. jamec(an) wa- li- 'allaah mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa yakhluq maa yashaa' wa- 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader

wa- qaalat al- yahod wa- an- nas.aaraa nah.nu abnaa' 'allaah wa- ah.ibbaa' -hu qul fa- li- maa yucadhdhib -kum bi- dhunob -kum bal 'antum bashar min man khalaqa yaghfir li- man yashaa' wa- yucadhdhib man yashaa' wa- li- 'allaah mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa wa- 'ilay -hi al- mas.er

yaa 'ahl al- kitaab qad jaa'a -kum rasol -naa yubayyin la- -kum calaa fatrah min ar- rusul 'an taqolo maa jaa'a -naa min basher wa- laa nadher fa- qad jaa'a -kum basher wa- nadher wa- 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader
wa- 'idh qaala mosaa li- qawm -hi yaa qawm -e udhkuro nicmah 'allaah calay -kum 'idh jacala fe -kum anbiyaa' wa- jacala -kum mulok(an) wa- 'aataa -kum maa lam yu'ti 'ah.ad(an) min al- caalamen
yaa qawm -e udkhulo al- 'ard. al- muqaddasah 'allate kataba 'allaah la- -kum wa- laa tartaddo calaa adbaar -kum fa- tanqalibo khaasiren
qaalo yaa mosaa 'inna fe -haa qawm(an) jabbaaren wa- 'in(na) -naa lan nadkhul -haa h.attaa yakhrujo min -haa fa- 'in yakhrujo min -haa fa- 'in(na) -naa daakhilon
qaala rajulaan min 'alladhena yakhaafon ancama 'allaah calay -himaa udkhulo calay -him al- baab fa- 'idhaa dakhaltumo -hu fa- 'inna -kum ghaalibon
wa- calaa 'allaah fa- tawakkalo 'in kuntum mu'minen
qaalo yaa mosaa 'in(na) -naa lan nadkhul -haa 'abad(an) maa daamo fe -haa fa- idhhab 'anta wa- rabb -ka fa- qaatilaa 'in(na) -naa haahunaa qaacidon
qaala rabb -i 'inni -y laa amlik 'illaa nafs -e wa- 'akh -e fa- ufruq bayna -naa wa- bayna al- qawm al- faasiqen
qaala fa- 'inna -haa muh.arramah calay -him arbacen sinah yatehon fe al- 'ard. fa- laa ta'sa calaa al- qawm al- faasiqen

wa- utlu calay -him naba' ibnai 'aadam bi- al- h.aqq 'idh qurrabaa qurbaan(an) fa- tuqubbila min 'ah.ad -himaa wa- lam yutaqabbal min al- 'aakhar qaala la- aqtulanna -ka qaala 'inna-maa yataqabbal 'allaah min al- muttaqen
la- 'in basat.ta 'ilay -ya yad -ka li- taqtul -ne maa 'anaa bi- baasit. yad -iya 'ilay -ka li- aqtul -ka 'inni -y akhaaf 'allaah rabb al- caalamen
'inni -y ured 'an tabo' bi- 'ithm -e wa- 'ithm -ka fa- takon min as.h.aab an- naar wa- dhaalika jazaa' az.- z.aalimen
fa- t.awwacat la- -hu nafs -hu qatl 'akhe -hi fa- qatala -hu fa- as.bah.a min al- khaasiren

fa- bacatha 'allaah ghuraab(an) yabh.ath fe al- 'ard. li- yuriya -hu kayfa yuwaare saw'ah 'akhe -hi qaala yaa waylah -aa 'a- cajaztu 'an akon mithl haadhaa al- ghuraab fa- uwaariya saw'ah 'akh -e fa- as.bah.a min an- naadimen

min 'ajl dhaalika katabnaa calaa bane 'israa'el 'anna -hu man qatala nafs(an) bi- ghayr nafs 'aw fasaad fe al- 'ard. fa- ka-'anna maa qatala an- naas jamec(an) wa- man ah.yaa -haa fa- ka-'anna maa ah.yaa an- naas jamec(an) wa- la- qad jaa'at -hum rusul -naa bi- al- bayyinaat thumma 'inna kather(an) min -hum bacda dhaalika fe al- 'ard. la- musrifon

'inna-maa jazaa' 'alladhena yuh.aaribon 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- yascawn fe al- 'ard. fasaad(an) 'an yuqattalo 'aw yus.allabo 'aw tuqat.t.ac ayde -hum wa- arjul -hum min khilaaf 'aw yunfaw min al- 'ard. dhaalika la- -hum khizy fe ad- dunyaa wa- la- -hum fe al- 'aakhirah cadhaab caz.em
'illaa 'alladhena taabo min qabli 'an taqdiro calay -him fa- iclamo 'anna 'allaah ghafor rah.em
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano ittaqo 'allaah wa- ibtagho 'ilay -hi al- waselah wa- jaahido fe sabel -hi lacalla -kum tuflih.on
'inna 'alladhena kafaro law 'anna la- -hum maa fe al- 'ard. jamec(an) wa- mithl -hu maca -hu li- yaftado bi- -hi min cadhaab yawm al- qiyaamah maa tuqubbila min -hum wa- la- -hum cadhaab 'alem
yuredon 'an yakhrujo min an- naar wa- maa hum bi- khaarijen min -haa wa- la- -hum cadhaab muqem
wa- as- saariq wa- as- saariqah fa- iqt.aco aydiya -humaa jazaa' bi- maa kasabaa nakaal(an) min 'allaah wa- 'allaah cazez h.akem
fa- man taaba min bacdi z.ulm -hi wa- as.lah.a fa- 'inna 'allaah yatob calay -hi 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em
'a- lam taclam 'anna 'allaah la- -hu mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. yucadhdhib man yashaa' wa- yaghfir li- man yashaa' wa- 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader

yaa 'ayyuhaa ar- rasol laa yah.zun -ka 'alladhena yusaaricon fe al- kufr min 'alladhena qaalo 'aamannaa bi- afwaah -him wa- lam tu'min qulob -hum wa- min 'alladhena haado sammaacon li- al- kadhib sammaacon li- qawm 'aakharen lam ya'to -ka yuh.arrifon al- kalim min bacdi mawaad.ic -hi yaqolon 'in 'otetum haadhaa fa- khudho -hu wa- 'in lam tu'to -hu fa- ih.dharo wa- man yurid 'allaah fitnah -hu fa- lan tamlik la- -hu min 'allaah shay'(an) 'olaa'ika 'alladhena lam yurid 'allaah 'an yut.ahhir qulob -hum la- -hum fe ad- dunyaa khizy wa- la- -hum fe al- 'aakhirah cadhaab caz.em

sammaacon li- al- kadhib 'akkaalon li- as- suh.t fa- 'in jaa'o -ka fa- uh.kum bayna -hum 'aw acrid. can -hum wa- 'in tucrid. can -hum fa- lan yad.urro -ka shay'(an) wa- 'in h.akamta fa- uh.kum bayna -hum bi- al- qist. 'inna 'allaah yuh.ibb al- muqsit.en
wa- kayfa yuh.akkimon -ka wa- cinda -hum at- tawraah fe -haa h.ukm 'allaah thumma yatawallawn min bacdi dhaalika wa- maa 'olaa'ika bi- al- mu'minen

'in(na) -naa anzalnaa at- tawraah fe -haa huda(n) wa- nor yah.kum bi- -haa an- nabeyon 'alladhena aslamo li- 'alladhena haado wa- ar- rabbaaneyon wa- al- ah.baar bi- maa istuh.fiz.o min kitaab 'allaah wa- kaano calay -hi shuhadaa' fa- laa takhshaw an- naas wa- ikhshaw -ni wa- laa tashtaro bi- 'aayaat -e thaman(an) qalel(an) wa- man lam yah.kum bi- maa anzala 'allaah fa- 'olaa'ika hum al- kaafiron

wa- katabnaa calay -him fe -haa 'anna an- nafs bi- an- nafs wa- al- cayn bi- al- cayn wa- al- 'anf bi- al- 'anf wa- al- 'udhun bi- al- 'udhun wa- as- sinn bi- as- sinn wa- al- juroh. qis.aas. fa- man tas.addaqa bi- -hi fa- huwa kaffaarah la- -hu wa- man lam yah.kum bi- maa anzala 'allaah fa- 'olaa'ika hum az.- z.aalimon

wa- qaffaynaa calaa 'aathaar -him bi- cesaa ibn maryam mus.addiq(an) li- maa bayna yadai -hi min at- tawraah wa- 'aataynaa -hu al- 'injel fe -hi huda(n) wa- nor wa- mus.addiq(an) li- maa bayna yadai -hi min at- tawraah wa- huda(n) wa- mawciz.ah li- al- muttaqen
wa- li- yah.kum 'ahl al- 'injel bi- maa anzala 'allaah fe -hi wa- man lam yah.kum bi- maa anzala 'allaah fa- 'olaa'ika hum al- faasiqon

wa- anzalnaa 'ilay -ka al- kitaab bi- al- h.aqq mus.addiq(an) li- maa bayna yadai -hi min al- kitaab wa- muhaymin(an) calay -hi fa- uh.kum bayna -hum bi- maa anzala 'allaah wa- laa tattabic ahwaa' -hum can maa jaa'a -ka min al- h.aqq li- kull jacalnaa min -kum shircah wa- minhaaj(an) wa- law shaa'a 'allaah la- jacala -kum 'ummah waah.idah wa- laakin li- yabluwa -kum fe maa 'aataa -kum fa- istabiqo al- khayraat 'ilaa 'allaah marjic -kum jamec(an) fa- yunabbi' -kum bi- maa kuntum fe -hi takhtalifon

wa- 'an uh.kum bayna -hum bi- maa anzala 'allaah wa- laa tattabic ahwaa' -hum wa- ih.dhar -hum 'an yaftino -ka can bacd. maa anzala 'allaah 'ilay -ka fa- 'in tawallaw fa- iclam 'anna-maa yured 'allaah 'an yus.eb -hum bi- bacd. dhunob -him wa- 'inna kather(an) min an- naas la- faasiqon
'a- fa- h.ukm al- jaahileyah yabghon wa- man ah.san min 'allaah h.ukm(an) li- qawm yoqinon

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tattakhidho al- yahod wa- an- nas.aaraa awliyaa' bacd. -hum awliyaa' bacd. wa- man yatawalla -hum min -kum fa- 'inna -hu min -hum 'inna 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm az.- z.aalimen

fa- taraa 'alladhena fe qulob -him marad. yusaaricon fe -him yaqolon nakhshaa 'an tus.eb -naa daa'irah fa- casaa 'allaah 'an ya'tiya bi- al- fath. 'aw 'amr min cindi -hi fa- yus.bih.o calaa maa asarro fe anfus -him naadimen
wa- yaqol 'alladhena 'aamano 'a- haa'ulaa'i 'alladhena aqsamo bi- 'allaah jahd aymaan -him 'inna -hum la- maca -kum h.abit.at acmaal -hum fa- as.bah.o khaasiren

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano man yartadd min -kum can den -hi fa- sawfa ya'te 'allaah bi- qawm yuh.ibb -hum wa- yuh.ibbon -hu adhillah calaa al- mu'minen acizzah calaa al- kaafiren yujaahidon fe sabel 'allaah wa- laa yakhaafon lawmah laa'im dhaalika fad.l 'allaah yu'te -hi man yashaa' wa- 'allaah waasic calem
'inna-maa waley -kum 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- 'alladhena 'aamano 'alladhena yuqemon as.- s.alaah wa- yu'ton az- zakaah wa- hum raakicon
wa- man yatawalla 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- 'alladhena 'aamano fa- 'inna h.izb 'allaah hum al- ghaalibon

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tattakhidho 'alladhena ittakhadho den -kum huzuw(an) wa- lacib(an) min 'alladhena 'oto al- kitaab min qabli -kum wa- al- kuffaar awliyaa' wa- ittaqo 'allaah 'in kuntum mu'minen
wa- 'idhaa naadaytum 'ilaa as.- s.alaah ittakhadho -haa huzuw(an) wa- lacib(an) dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum qawm laa yacqilon
qul yaa 'ahl al- kitaab hal tanqimon min -naa 'illaa 'an 'aamannaa bi- 'allaah wa- maa unzila 'ilay -naa wa- maa unzila min qablu wa- 'anna akthar -kum faasiqon

qul hal unabbi' -kum bi- sharr min dhaalika mathobah cinda 'allaah man lacana -hu 'allaah wa- ghad.iba calay -hi wa- jacala min -hum al- qiradah wa- al- khanaazer wa- cabad at.- t.aaghot 'olaa'ika sharr makaan(an) wa- ad.all can sawaa' as- sabel
wa- 'idhaa jaa'o -kum qaalo 'aamannaa wa- qad dakhalo bi- al- kufr wa- hum qad kharajo bi- -hi wa- 'allaah aclam bi- maa kaano yaktumon
wa- taraa kather(an) min -hum yusaaricon fe al- 'ithm wa- al- cudwaan wa- 'akl -hum as- suh.t la- bi's maa kaano yacmalon
law-laa yanhaa -hum ar- rabbaaneyon wa- al- ah.baar can qawl -him al- 'ithm wa- 'akl -hum as- suh.t la- bi's maa kaano yas.nacon

wa- qaalat al- yahod yad 'allaah maghlolah ghullat ayde -him wa- lucino bi- maa qaalo bal yadaa -hu mabsot.ataan yunfiq kayfa yashaa' wa- la- yazedanna kather(an) min -hum maa unzila 'ilay -ka min rabb -ka t.ughyaan(an) wa- kufr(an) wa- alqaynaa bayna -hum al- cadaawah wa- al- baghd.aa' 'ilaa yawm al- qiyaamah kulla-maa awqado naar(an) li- al- h.arb at.fa'a -haa 'allaah wa- yascawn fe al- 'ard. fasaad(an) wa- 'allaah laa yuh.ibb al- mufsiden
wa- law 'anna 'ahl al- kitaab 'aamano wa- ittaqo la- kaffarnaa can -hum sayyi'aat -him wa- la- adkhalnaa -hum jannaat an- nacem

wa- law 'anna -hum aqaamo at- tawraah wa- al- 'injel wa- maa unzila 'ilay -him min rabb -him la- 'akalo min fawqi -him wa- min tah.ti arjul -him min -hum 'ummah muqtas.idah wa- kather min -hum saa'a maa yacmalon
yaa 'ayyuhaa ar- rasol balligh maa unzila 'ilay -ka min rabb -ka wa- 'in lam tafcal fa- maa ballaghta risaalah -hu wa- 'allaah yacs.im -ka min an- naas 'inna 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm al- kaafiren

qul yaa 'ahl al- kitaab lastum calaa shay' h.attaa tuqemo at- tawraah wa- al- 'injel wa- maa unzila 'ilay -kum min rabb -kum wa- la- yazedanna kather(an) min -hum maa unzila 'ilay -ka min rabb -ka t.ughyaan(an) wa- kufr(an) fa- laa ta'sa calaa al- qawm al- kaafiren

'inna 'alladhena 'aamano wa- 'alladhena haado wa- as.- s.aabi'on wa- an- nas.aaraa man 'aamana bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- camila s.aalih.(an) fa- laa khawf calay -him wa- laa hum yah.zanon
la- qad 'akhadhnaa methaaq bane 'israa'el wa- arsalnaa 'ilay -him rusul(an) kulla-maa jaa'a -hum rasol bi- maa laa tahwaa anfus -hum fareq(an) kadhdhabo wa- fareq(an) yaqtulon
wa- h.asibo 'an laa takon fitnah fa- camo wa- s.ammo thumma taaba 'allaah calay -him thumma camo wa- s.ammo kather min -hum wa- 'allaah bas.er bi- maa yacmalon

la- qad kafara 'alladhena qaalo 'inna 'allaah huwa al- maseh. ibn maryam wa- qaala al- maseh. yaa bane 'israa'el ucbudo 'allaah rabb -e wa- rabb -kum 'inna -hu man yushrik bi- 'allaah fa- qad h.arrama 'allaah calay -hi al- jannah wa- ma'wa(n) -hu an- naar wa- maa li- az.- z.aalimen min ans.aar
la- qad kafara 'alladhena qaalo 'inna 'allaah thaalith thalaathah wa- maa min 'ilaah 'illaa 'ilaah waah.id wa- 'in lam yantaho can maa yaqolon la- yamassanna 'alladhena kafaro min -hum cadhaab 'alem
'a- fa- laa yatobon 'ilaa 'allaah wa- yastaghfiron -hu wa- 'allaah ghafor rah.em
maa al- maseh. ibn maryam 'illaa rasol qad khalat min qabli -hi ar- rusul wa- 'umm -hu s.iddeqah kaanaa ya'kulaan at.- t.acaam unz.ur kayfa nubayyin la- -hum al- 'aayaat thumma unz.ur 'annaa yu'fakon
qul 'a- tacbudon min doni 'allaah maa laa yamlik la- -kum d.arr(an) wa- laa nafc(an) wa- 'allaah huwa as- samec al- calem
qul yaa 'ahl al- kitaab laa taghlo fe den -kum ghayr al- h.aqq wa- laa tattabico ahwaa' qawm qad d.allo min qablu wa- ad.allo kather(an) wa- d.allo can sawaa' as- sabel
lucina 'alladhena kafaro min bane 'israa'el calaa lisaan daawod wa- cesaa ibn maryam dhaalika bi- maa cas.aw wa- kaano yactadon
kaano laa yatanaahawn can munkar facalo -hu la- bi's maa kaano yafcalon
taraa kather(an) min -hum yatawallawn 'alladhena kafaro la- bi's maa qaddamat la- -hum anfus -hum 'an sakhit.a 'allaah calay -him wa- fe al- cadhaab hum khaalidon
wa- law kaano yu'minon bi- 'allaah wa- an- nabey wa- maa unzila 'ilay -hi maa ittakhadho -hum awliyaa' wa- laakin kather(an) min -hum faasiqon

la- tajidanna ashadd an- naas cadaawah li- 'alladhena 'aamano al- yahod wa- 'alladhena ashrako wa- la- tajidanna aqrab -hum mawaddah li- 'alladhena 'aamano 'alladhena qaalo 'in(na) -naa nas.aaraa dhaalika bi- 'anna min -hum qissesen wa- ruhbaan(an) wa- 'anna -hum laa yastakbiron
wa- 'idhaa samico maa unzila 'ilaa ar- rasol taraa acyun -hum tafed. min ad- damc min maa carafo min al- h.aqq yaqolon rabb -naa 'aamannaa fa- uktub -naa maca ash- shaahiden
wa- maa la- -naa laa nu'min bi- 'allaah wa- maa jaa'a -naa min al- h.aqq wa- nat.mac 'an yudkhil -naa rabb -naa maca al- qawm as.- s.aalih.en
fa- athaaba -hum 'allaah bi- maa qaalo jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa wa- dhaalika jazaa' al- muh.sinen
wa- 'alladhena kafaro wa- kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa 'olaa'ika as.h.aab al- jah.em
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tuh.arrimo t.ayyibaat maa ah.alla 'allaah la- -kum wa- laa tactado 'inna 'allaah laa yuh.ibb al- muctaden
wa- kulo min maa razaqa -kum 'allaah h.alaal(an) t.ayyib(an) wa- ittaqo 'allaah 'alladhe 'antum bi- -hi mu'minon

laa yu'aakhidh -kum 'allaah bi- al- laghw fe aymaan -kum wa- laakin yu'aakhidh -kum bi- maa caqqadtum al- aymaan fa- kaffaarah -hu it.caam casharah masaaken min awsat. maa tut.cimon 'ahle -kum 'aw kiswah -hum 'aw tah.rer raqabah fa- man lam yajid fa- s.iyaam thalaathah ayyaam dhaalika kaffaarah aymaan -kum 'idhaa h.alaftum wa- ih.faz.o aymaan -kum ka- dhaalika yubayyin 'allaah la- -kum 'aayaat -hi lacalla -kum tashkuron
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'inna-maa al- khamr wa- al- maysir wa- al- ans.aab wa- al- azlaam rijs min camal ash- shayt.aan fa- ijtanibo -hu lacalla -kum tuflih.on
'inna-maa yured ash- shayt.aan 'an yoqic bayna -kum al- cadaawah wa- al- baghd.aa' fe al- khamr wa- al- maysir wa- yas.udd -kum can dhikr 'allaah wa- can as.- s.alaah fa- hal 'antum muntahon
wa- at.eco 'allaah wa- at.eco ar- rasol wa- ih.dharo fa- 'in tawallaytum fa- iclamo 'anna-maa calaa rasol -naa al- balaagh al- muben

laysa calaa 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat junaah. fe maa t.acimo 'idhaa-maa ittaqaw wa- 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat thumma ittaqaw wa- 'aamano thumma ittaqaw wa- ah.sano wa- 'allaah yuh.ibb al- muh.sinen

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano la- yabluwanna -kum 'allaah bi- shay' min as.- s.ayd tanaal -hu ayde -kum wa- rimaah. -kum li- yaclam 'allaah man yakhaaf -hu bi- al- ghayb fa- man ictadaa bacda dhaalika fa- la- -hu cadhaab 'alem

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa taqtulo as.- s.ayd wa- 'antum h.urum wa- man qatala -hu min -kum mutacammid(an) fa- jazaa' mithl maa qatala min an- nacam yah.kum bi- -hi dhawaa cadl min -kum hady(an) baaligh al- kacbah 'aw kaffaarah t.acaam masaaken 'aw cadl dhaalika s.iyaam(an) li- yadhoq wabaal 'amr -hi cafaa 'allaah can maa salafa wa- man caada fa- yantaqim 'allaah min -hu wa- 'allaah cazez dho intiqaam

uh.illa la- -kum s.ayd al- bah.r wa- t.acaam -hu mataac(an) la- -kum wa- li- as- sayyaarah wa- h.urrima calay -kum s.ayd al- barr maa dumtum h.urum(an) wa- ittaqo 'allaah 'alladhe 'ilay -hi tuh.sharon

jacala 'allaah al- kacbah al- bayt al- h.araam qiyaam(an) li- an- naas wa- ash- shahr al- h.araam wa- al- hady wa- al- qalaa'id dhaalika li- taclamo 'anna 'allaah yaclam maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- 'anna 'allaah bi- kull shay' calem
iclamo 'anna 'allaah shaded al- ciqaab wa- 'anna 'allaah ghafor rah.em
maa calaa ar- rasol 'illaa al- balaagh wa- 'allaah yaclam maa tubdon wa- maa taktumon
qul laa yastawe al- khabeth wa- at.- t.ayyib wa- law acjaba -ka kathrah al- khabeth fa- ittaqo 'allaah yaa 'ole al- albaab lacalla -kum tuflih.on

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tas'alo can ashyaa' 'in tubda la- -kum tasu' -kum wa- 'in tas'alo can -haa h.ena yunazzal al- qur'aan tubda la- -kum cafaa 'allaah can -haa wa- 'allaah ghafor h.alem
qad sa'ala -haa qawm min qabli -kum thumma as.bah.o bi- -haa kaafiren
maa jacala 'allaah min bah.erah wa- laa saa'ibah wa- laa was.elah wa- laa h.aami(n) wa- laakin 'alladhena kafaro yaftaron calaa 'allaah al- kadhib wa- akthar -hum laa yacqilon

wa- 'idhaa qela la- -hum tacaalaw 'ilaa maa anzala 'allaah wa- 'ilaa ar- rasol qaalo h.asb -naa maa wajadnaa calay -hi 'aabaa' -naa 'a- wa- law kaana 'aabaa' -hum laa yaclamon shay'(an) wa- laa yahtadon
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano calay -kum anfus -kum laa yad.urr -kum man d.alla 'idhaa ihtadaytum 'ilaa 'allaah marjic -kum jamec(an) fa- yunabbi' -kum bi- maa kuntum tacmalon

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano shahaadah bayna -kum 'idhaa h.ad.ara 'ah.ad -kum al- mawt h.ena al- was.eyah ithnaan dhawaa cadl min -kum 'aw 'aakharaan min ghayr -kum 'in 'antum d.arabtum fe al- 'ard. fa- as.aabat -kum mus.ebah al- mawt tah.bison -humaa min bacdi as.- s.alaah fa- yuqsimaan bi- 'allaah 'in irtabtum laa nashtare bi- -hi thaman(an) wa- law kaana dhaa qurbaa wa- laa naktum shahaadah 'allaah 'in(na) -naa 'idhan la- min al- 'aathimen

fa- 'in cuthira calaa 'anna -humaa istah.aqqaa 'ithm(an) fa- 'aakharaan yaqomaan maqaam -humaa min 'alladhena istah.aqqa calay -him al- awlayaan fa- yuqsimaan bi- 'allaah la- shahaadah -naa ah.aqq min shahaadah -himaa wa- maa ictadaynaa 'in(na) -naa 'idhan la- min az.- z.aalimen
dhaalika adnaa 'an ya'to bi- ash- shahaadah calaa wajh -haa 'aw yakhaafo 'an turadd aymaan bacda aymaan -hi wa- ittaqo 'allaah wa- ismaco wa- 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm al- faasiqen
yawm yajmac 'allaah ar- rusul fa- yaqol maa-dhaa ujibtum qaalo laa cilm la- -naa 'inna -ka 'anta callaam al- ghuyob

'idh qaala 'allaah yaa cesaa ibn maryam udhkur nicmah -e calay -ka wa- calaa waalidah -ka 'idh 'ayyadtu -ka bi- roh. al- qudus tukallim an- naas fe al- mahd wa- kahl(an) wa- 'idh callamtu -ka al- kitaab wa- al- h.ikmah wa- at- tawraah wa- al- 'injel wa- 'idh takhluq min at.- t.en ka- hay'ah at.- t.ayr bi- 'idhn -e fa- tanfukh fe -haa fa- takon t.ayr(an) bi- 'idhn -e wa- tubri' al- akmah wa- al- abras. bi- 'idhn -e wa- 'idh tukhrij al- mawtaa bi- 'idhn -e wa- 'idh kafaftu bane 'israa'el can -ka 'idh ji'ta -hum bi- al- bayyinaat fa- qaala 'alladhena kafaro min -hum 'in haadhaa 'illaa sih.r muben
wa- 'idh awh.aytu 'ilaa al- h.awaareyen 'an 'aamino bi- -y wa- bi- rasol -e qaalo 'aamannaa wa- ishhad bi- 'anna -naa muslimon
'idh qaala al- h.awaareyon yaa cesaa ibn maryam hal yastat.ec rabb -ka 'an yunazzil calay -naa maa'idah min as- samaa' qaala ittaqo 'allaah 'in kuntum mu'minen
qaalo nured 'an na'kul min -haa wa- tat.ma'inn qulob -naa wa- naclam 'an qad s.adaqta -naa wa- nakon calay -haa min ash- shaahiden

qaala cesaa ibn maryam 'allaahumma rabb -naa anzil calay -naa maa'idah min as- samaa' takon la- -naa ced(an) li- 'awwal -naa wa- 'aakhir -naa wa- 'aayah min -kum wa- urzuq -naa wa- 'anta khayr ar- raaziqen
qaala 'allaah 'inn(a) -e munazzil -haa calay -kum fa- man yakfur bacdu min -kum fa- 'inni -y ucadhdhib -hu cadhaab(an) laa ucadhdhib -hu 'ah.ad(an) min al- caalamen

wa- 'idh qaala 'allaah yaa cesaa ibn maryam 'a- 'anta qulta li- an- naas ittakhidho -ne wa- 'umm -e 'ilaahain min doni 'allaah qaala subh.aana -ka maa yakon li- -y 'an aqol maa laysa li- -y bi- h.aqq 'in kuntu qultu -hu fa- qad calimta -hu taclam maa fe nafs -e wa- laa aclam maa fe nafs -ka 'inna -ka 'anta callaam al- ghuyob

maa qulta la- -hum 'illaa maa 'amarta -ne bi- -hi 'an ucbudo 'allaah rabb -e wa- rabb -kum wa- kuntu calay -him shahed(an) maa dumtu fe -him fa- lammaa tawaffayta -ne kunta 'anta ar- raqeb calay -him wa- 'anta calaa kull shay' shahed
'in tucadhdhib -hum fa- 'inna -hum cibaad -ka wa- 'in taghfir la- -hum fa- 'inna -ka 'anta al- cazez al- h.akem

qaala 'allaah haadhaa yawm yanfac as.- s.aadiqen s.idq -hum la- -hum jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa 'abad(an) rad.iya 'allaah can -hum wa- rad.o can -hu dhaalika al- fawz al- caz.em
li- 'allaah mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa fe -hinna wa- huwa calaa kull shay' qader
al- h.amd li- 'allaah 'alladhe khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- jacala az.- z.ulumaat wa- an- nor thumma 'alladhena kafaro bi- rabb -him yacdilon
huwa 'alladhe khalaqa -kum min t.en thumma qad.aa 'ajal(an) wa- 'ajal musamma(n) cinda -hu thumma 'antum tamtaron
wa- huwa 'allaah fe as- samaawaat wa- fe al- 'ard. yaclam sirr -kum wa- jahr -kum wa- yaclam maa taksibon
wa- maa ta'te -him min 'aayah min 'aayaat rabb -him 'illaa kaano can -haa mucrid.en
fa- qad kadhdhabo bi- al- h.aqq lammaa jaa'a -hum fa- sawfa ya'te -him anbaa' maa kaano bi- -hi yastahzi'on

'a- lam yaraw kam ahlaknaa min qabli -him min qarn makkannaa -hum fe al- 'ard. maa lam numakkin la- -kum wa- arsalnaa as- samaa' calay -him midraar(an) wa- jacalnaa al- anhaar tajre min tah.ti -him fa- ahlaknaa -hum bi- dhunob -him wa- ansha'naa min bacdi -him qarn(an) 'aakharen
wa- law nazzalnaa calay -ka kitaab(an) fe qirt.aas fa- lamaso -hu bi- ayde -him la- qaala 'alladhena kafaro 'in haadhaa 'illaa sih.r muben
wa- qaalo law-laa unzila calay -hi malak wa- law anzalnaa malak(an) la- qud.iya al- 'amr thumma laa yunz.aron
wa- law jacalnaa -hu malak(an) la- jacalnaa -hu rajul(an) wa- la- labasnaa calay -him maa yalbison
wa- la- qad istuhzi' bi- rusul min qabli -ka fa- h.aaqa bi- 'alladhena sakhiro min -hum maa kaano bi- -hi yastahzi'on
qul sero fe al- 'ard. thumma unz.uro kayfa kaana caaqibah al- mukadhdhiben

qul li- man maa fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. qul li- 'allaah kataba calaa nafs -hi ar- rah.mah la- yajmacanna -kum 'ilaa yawm al- qiyaamah laa rayb fe -hi 'alladhena khasiro anfus -hum fa- hum laa yu'minon
wa- la- -hu maa sakana fe al- layl wa- an- nahaar wa- huwa as- samec al- calem
qul 'a- ghayr 'allaah attakhidh waley(an) faat.ir as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- huwa yut.cim wa- laa yut.cam qul 'inni -y 'umirtu 'an akon 'awwal man aslama wa- laa takonanna min al- mushriken
qul 'inni -y akhaaf 'in cas.aytu rabb -e cadhaab yawm caz.em
man yus.raf can -hu yawma'idhin fa- qad rah.ima -hu wa- dhaalika al- fawz al- muben
wa- 'in yamsas -ka 'allaah bi- d.urr fa- laa kaashif la- -hu 'illaa huwa wa- 'in yamsas -ka bi- khayr fa- huwa calaa kull shay' qader
wa- huwa al- qaahir fawqa cibaad -hi wa- huwa al- h.akem al- khaber

qul 'ayy shay' akbar shahaadah qul 'allaah shahed bayni -y wa- bayna -kum wa- oh.iya 'ilay -ya haadhaa al- qur'aan li- undhir -kum bi- -hi wa- man balagha 'a- 'inna -kum la- tashhadon 'anna maca 'allaah 'aalihah 'ukhraa qul laa ashhad qul 'inna-maa huwa 'ilaah waah.id wa- 'inna -ne bare' min maa tushrikon
'alladhena 'aataynaa -hum al- kitaab yacrifon -hu ka-maa yacrifon abnaa' -hum 'alladhena khasiro anfus -hum fa- hum laa yu'minon
wa- man az.lam min man iftaraa calaa 'allaah kadhib(an) 'aw kadhdhaba bi- 'aayaat -hi 'inna -hu laa yuflih. az.- z.aalimon
wa- yawm nah.shur -hum jamec(an) thumma naqol li- 'alladhena ashrako 'ayna shurakaa' -kum 'alladhena kuntum tazcumon
thumma lam takun fitnah -hum 'illaa 'an qaalo wa- 'allaah rabb -naa maa kunnaa mushriken
unz.ur kayfa kadhabo calaa anfus -him wa- d.alla can -hum maa kaano yaftaron

wa- min -hum man yastamic 'ilay -ka wa- jacalnaa calaa qulob -him akinnah 'an yafqaho -hu wa- fe 'aadhaan -him waqr(an) wa- 'in yaraw kull 'aayah laa yu'mino bi- -haa h.attaa 'idhaa jaa'o -ka yujaadilon -ka yaqol 'alladhena kafaro 'in haadhaa 'illaa asaat.er al- 'awwalen
wa- hum yanhawn can -hu wa- yan'awn can -hu wa- 'in yuhlikon 'illaa anfus -hum wa- maa yashcuron
wa- law taraa 'idh wuqifo calaa an- naar fa- qaalo yaa layta -naa nuradd wa- laa nukadhdhib bi- 'aayaat rabb -naa wa- nakon min al- mu'minen
bal badaa la- -hum maa kaano yukhfon min qablu wa- law ruddo la- caado li- maa nuho can -hu wa- 'inna -hum la- kaadhibon
wa- qaalo 'in hiya 'illaa h.ayaah -naa ad- dunyaa wa- maa nah.nu bi- mabcothen
wa- law taraa 'idh wuqifo calaa rabb -him qaala 'a- laysa haadhaa bi- al- h.aqq qaalo balaa wa- rabb -naa qaala fa- dhoqo al- cadhaab bi- maa kuntum takfuron

qad khasira 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- liqaa' 'allaah h.attaa 'idhaa jaa'at -hum as- saacah baghtah qaalo yaa h.asrah -naa calaa maa farrat.naa fe -haa wa- hum yah.milon awzaar -hum calaa z.uhor -him 'a-laa saa'a maa yaziron
wa- maa al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa 'illaa lacib wa- lahw wa- la- ad- daar al- 'aakhirah khayr li- 'alladhena yattaqon 'a- fa- laa tacqilon
qad naclam 'inna -hu la- yah.zun -ka 'alladhe yaqolon fa- 'inna -hum laa yukadhdhibon -ka wa- laakin az.- z.aalimen bi- 'aayaat 'allaah yajh.adon
wa- la- qad kudhdhibat rusul min qabli -ka fa- s.abaro calaa maa kudhdhibo wa- 'odho h.attaa 'ataa -hum nas.r -naa wa- laa mubaddil li- kalimaat 'allaah wa- la- qad jaa'a -ka min naba' al- mursalen

wa- 'in kaana kabura calay -ka icraad. -hum fa- 'in istat.acta 'an tabtaghiya nafaq(an) fe al- 'ard. 'aw sullam(an) fe as- samaa' fa- ta'te -him bi- 'aayah wa- law shaa'a 'allaah la- jamaca -hum calaa al- hudaa fa- laa takonanna min al- jaahilen
'inna-maa yastajeb 'alladhena yasmacon wa- al- mawtaa yabcath -hum 'allaah thumma 'ilay -hi yurjacon
wa- qaalo law-laa nuzzila calay -hi 'aayah min rabb -hi qul 'inna 'allaah qaadir calaa 'an yunazzil 'aayah wa- laakin akthar -hum laa yaclamon
wa- maa min daabbah fe al- 'ard. wa- laa t.aa'ir yat.er bi- janaah.ai -hi 'illaa 'umam amthaal -kum maa farrat.naa fe al- kitaab min shay' thumma 'ilaa rabb -him yuh.sharon
wa- 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa s.umm wa- bukm fe az.- z.ulumaat man yasha' 'allaah yud.lil -hu wa- man yasha' yajcal calaa s.iraat. mustaqem
qul 'a- ra'ayta -kum 'in 'ataa -kum cadhaab 'allaah 'aw 'atat -kum as- saacah 'a- ghayr 'allaah tadcon 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
bal 'eyaa -hu tadcon fa- yakshif maa tadcon 'ilay -hi 'in shaa'a wa- tansawn maa tushrikon
wa- la- qad arsalnaa 'ilaa 'umam min qabli -ka fa- 'akhadhnaa -hum bi- al- ba'saa' wa- ad.- d.arraa' lacalla -hum yatad.arracon
fa- law-laa 'idh jaa'a -hum ba's -naa tad.arraco wa- laakin qasat qulob -hum wa- zayyana la- -hum ash- shayt.aan maa kaano yacmalon
fa- lammaa naso maa dhukiro bi- -hi fatah.naa calay -him abwaab kull shay' h.attaa 'idhaa farih.o bi- maa 'oto 'akhadhnaa -hum baghtah fa- 'idhaa hum mublison
fa- qut.ica daabir al- qawm 'alladhena z.alamo wa- al- h.amd li- 'allaah rabb al- caalamen
qul 'a- ra'aytum 'in 'akhadha 'allaah samc -kum wa- abs.aar -kum wa- khatama calaa qulob -kum man 'ilaah ghayr 'allaah ya'te -kum bi- -hi unz.ur kayfa nus.arrif al- 'aayaat thumma hum yas.difon
qul 'a- ra'ayta -kum 'in 'ataa -kum cadhaab 'allaah baghtah 'aw jahrah hal yuhlik 'illaa al- qawm az.- z.aalimon
wa- maa nursil al- mursalen 'illaa mubashshiren wa- mundhiren fa- man 'aamana wa- as.lah.a fa- laa khawf calay -him wa- laa hum yah.zanon
wa- 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa yamass -hum al- cadhaab bi- maa kaano yafsuqon

qul laa aqol la- -kum cindi -y khazaa'in 'allaah wa- laa aclam al- ghayb wa- laa aqol la- -kum 'inni -y malak 'in attabic 'illaa maa yoh.aa 'ilay -ya qul hal yastawe al- acmaa wa- al- bas.er 'a- fa- laa tatafakkaron
wa- andhir bi- -hi 'alladhena yakhaafon 'an yuh.sharo 'ilaa rabb -him laysa la- -hum min doni -hi waley wa- laa shafec lacalla -hum yattaqon

wa- laa tat.rud 'alladhena yadcon rabb -hum bi- al- ghadaah wa- al- cashey yuredon wajh -hu maa calay -ka min h.isaab -him min shay' wa- maa min h.isaab -ka calay -him min shay' fa- tat.rud -hum fa- takon min az.- z.aalimen
wa- ka- dhaalika fatannaa bacd. -hum bi- bacd. li- yaqolo 'a- haa'ulaa'i manna 'allaah calay -him min bayna -naa 'a- laysa 'allaah bi- aclam bi- ask- shaakiren

wa- 'idhaa jaa'a -ka 'alladhena yu'minon bi- 'aayaat -naa fa- qul salaam calay -kum kataba rabb -kum calaa nafs -hi ar- rah.mah 'anna -hu man camila min -kum so' bi- jahaalah thumma taaba min bacdi -hi wa- as.lah.a fa- 'anna -hu ghafor rah.em
wa- ka- dhaalika nufas.s.il al- 'aayaat wa- li- tastaben sabel al- mujrimen
qul 'inni -y nuhetu 'an acbud 'alladhena tadcon min doni 'allaah qul laa attabic ahwaa' -kum qad d.alaltu 'idhan wa- maa 'anaa min al- muhtaden
qul 'inni -y calaa bayyinah min rabb -e wa- kadhdhabtum bi- -hi maa cindi -y maa tastacjilon bi- -hi 'inna al- h.ukm 'illaa li- 'allaah yaqus.s. al- h.aqq wa- huwa khayr al- faas.ilen
qul law 'anna cindi -y maa tastacjilon bi- -hi la- qud.iya al- 'amr bayni -y wa- bayna -kum wa- 'allaah aclam bi- az.- z.aalimen

wa- cinda -hu mafaatih. al- ghayb laa yaclam -haa 'illaa huwa wa- yaclam maa fe al- barr wa- al- bah.r wa- maa tasqut. min waraqah 'illaa yaclam -haa wa- laa h.abbah fe z.ulumaat al- 'ard. wa- laa rat.b wa- laa yaabis 'illaa fe kitaab muben

wa- huwa 'alladhe yatawaffaa -kum bi- al- layl wa- yaclam maa jarah.tum bi- an- nahaar thumma yabcath -kum fe -hi li- yuqd.aa 'ajal musamma(n) thumma 'ilay -hi marjic -kum thumma yunabbi' -kum bi- maa kuntum tacmalon
wa- huwa al- qaahir fawqa cibaad -hi wa- yursil calay -kum h.afaz.ah h.attaa 'idhaa jaa'a 'ah.ad -kum al- mawt tawaffat -hu rusul -naa wa- hum laa yufarrit.on
thumma ruddo 'ilaa 'allaah mawlaa -hum al- h.aqq 'a-laa la- -hu al- h.ukm wa- huwa asrac al- h.aasiben
qul man yunajje -kum min z.ulumaat al- barr wa- al- bah.r tadcon -hu tad.arruc(an) wa- khufyah la- 'in anjaa -naa min haadhihi la- nakonanna min ask- shaakiren
qul 'allaah yunajje -kum min -haa wa- min kull karb thumma 'antum tushrikon

qul huwa al- qaadir calaa 'an yabcath calay -kum cadhaab(an) min fawqa -kum 'aw min tah.ta arjul -kum 'aw yalbis -kum shiyac(an) wa- yudheq bacd. -kum ba's bacd. unz.ur kayfa nus.arrif al- 'aayaat lacalla -hum yafqahon
wa- kadhdhaba bi- -hi qawm -ka wa- huwa al- h.aqq qul lasta calay -kum bi- wakel
li- kull naba' mustaqarr wa- sawfa taclamon

wa- 'idhaa ra'ayta 'alladhena yakhod.on fe 'aayaat -naa fa- acrid. can -hum h.attaa yakhod.o fe h.adeth ghayr -hi wa- 'immaa yunsiyanna -ka ash- shayt.aan fa- laa taqcud bacda adh- dhikraa maca al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
wa- maa calaa 'alladhena yattaqon min h.isaab -him min shay' wa- laakin dhikraa lacalla -hum yattaqon

wa- dhar 'alladhena ittakhadho den -hum lacib(an) wa- lahw(an) wa- gharrat -hum al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- dhakkir bi- -hi 'an tubsal nafs bi- maa kasabat laysa la- -haa min doni 'allaah waley wa- laa shafec wa- 'in tacdil kull cadl laa yu'khadh min -haa 'olaa'ika 'alladhena ubsilo bi- maa kasabo la- -hum sharaab min h.amem wa- cadhaab 'alem bi- maa kaano yakfuron

qul 'a- nadco min doni 'allaah maa laa yanfac -naa wa- laa yad.urr -naa wa- nuradd calaa acqaab -naa bacda 'idh hadaa -naa 'allaah ka- 'alladhe istahwat -hu ash- shayaat.en fe al- 'ard. h.ayraan la- -hu as.h.aab yadcon -hu 'ilaa al- hudaa i'ti -naa qul 'inna hudaa 'allaah huwa al- hudaa wa- 'umirnaa li- nuslim li- rabb al- caalamen
wa- 'an aqemo as.- s.alaah wa- ittaqo -hu wa- huwa 'alladhe 'ilay -hi tuh.sharon

wa- huwa 'alladhe khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. bi- al- h.aqq wa- yawm yaqol kun fa- yakon qawl -hu al- h.aqq wa- la- -hu al- mulk yawm yunfakh fe as.- s.or caalim al- ghayb wa- ash- shahaadah wa- huwa al- h.akem al- khaber
wa- 'idh qaala 'ibraahem li- 'abe -hi 'aazar 'a- tattakhidh as.naam(an) 'aalihah 'inni -y araa -ka wa- qawm -ka fe d.alaal muben
wa- ka- dhaalika nure 'ibraahem malakot as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- li- yakon min al- moqinen
fa- lammaa janna calay -hi al- layl ra'aa kawkab(an) qaala haadhaa rabb -e fa- lammaa 'afala qaala laa uh.ibb al- 'aafilen
fa- lammaa ra'aa al- qamar baazigh(an) qaala haadhaa rabb -e fa- lammaa 'afala qaala la- 'in lam yahdi -ne rabb -e la- akonanna min al- qawm ad.- d.aallen
fa- lammaa ra'aa ash- shams baazighah qaala haadhaa rabb -e haadhaa akbar fa- lammaa 'afalat qaala yaa qawm -e 'inni -y bare' min maa tushrikon
'inni -y wajjahtu wajh -e li- 'alladhe fat.ara as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. h.anef(an) wa- maa 'anaa min al- mushriken

wa- h.aajja -hu qawm -hu qaala 'a- tuh.aajjon -e fe 'allaah wa- qad hadaa -ne wa- laa akhaaf maa tushrikon bi- -hi 'illaa 'an yashaa' rabb -e shay'(an) wasica rabb -e kull shay' cilm(an) 'a- fa- laa tatadhakkaron
wa- kayfa akhaaf maa ashraktum wa- laa takhaafon 'anna -kum ashraktum bi- 'allaah maa lam yunazzil bi- -hi calay -kum sult.aan(an) fa- 'ayy al- fareqain ah.aqq bi- al- 'amn 'in kuntum taclamon
'alladhena 'aamano wa- lam yalbiso 'emaan -hum bi- z.ulm 'olaa'ika la- -hum al- 'amn wa- hum muhtadon
wa- tilka h.ujjah -naa 'ataynaa -haa 'ibraahem calaa qawm -hi narfac darajaat man nashaa' 'inna rabb -ka h.akem calem

wa- wahabnaa la- -hu 'ish.aaq wa- yacqob kull(an) hadaynaa wa- noh.(an) hadaynaa min qablu wa- min dhurreyah -hi daawod wa- sulaymaan wa- 'ayyob wa- yosuf wa- mosaa wa- haaron wa- ka- dhaalika najze al- muh.sinen
