wa- zakareyaa wa- yah.yaa wa- cesaa wa- 'ilyaas kull min as.- s.aalih.en
wa- 'ismaacel wa- al-yasac wa- yonus wa- lot.(an) wa- kull(an) fad.d.alnaa calaa al- caalamen
wa- min 'aabaa' -him wa- dhurreyaat -him wa- 'ikhwaan -him wa- ijtabaynaa -hum wa- hadaynaa -hum 'ilaa s.iraat. mustaqem
dhaalika hudaa 'allaah yahde bi- -hi man yashaa' min cibaad -hi wa- law ashrako la- h.abit.a can -hum maa kaano yacmalon
'olaa'ika 'alladhena 'aataynaa -hum al- kitaab wa- al- h.ukm wa- an- nubowah fa- 'in yakfur bi- -haa haa'ulaa'i fa- qad wakkalnaa bi- -haa qawm(an) layso bi- -haa bi- kaafiren
'olaa'ika 'alladhena hadaa 'allaah fa- bi- hudaa -hum iqtadi -hi qul laa as'al -kum calay -hi 'ajr(an) 'in huwa 'illaa dhikraa li- al- caalamen

wa- maa qadaro 'allaah h.aqq qadr -hi 'idh qaalo maa anzala 'allaah calaa bashar min shay' qul man anzala al- kitaab 'alladhe jaa'a bi- -hi mosaa nor(an) wa- huda(n) li- an- naas tajcalon -hu qaraat.es tubdon -haa wa- tukhfon kather(an) wa- cullimtum maa lam taclamo 'antum wa- laa 'aabaa' -kum qul 'allaah thumma dhar -hum fe khawd. -him yalcabon

wa- haadhaa kitaab anzalnaa -hu mubaarak mus.addiq 'alladhe bayna yadai -hi wa- li- tundhir 'umm al- quraa wa- man h.awla -haa wa- 'alladhena yu'minon bi- al- 'aakhirah yu'minon bi- -hi wa- hum calaa s.alaah -him yuh.aafiz.on

wa- man az.lam min man iftaraa calaa 'allaah kadhib(an) 'aw qaala oh.iya 'ilay -ya wa- lam yoh.a 'ilay -hi shay' wa- man qaala sa- unzil mithl maa anzala 'allaah wa- law taraa 'idh az.- z.aalimon fe ghamaraat al- mawt wa- al- malaa'ikah baasit.o ayde -him akhrijo anfus -kum al- yawm tujzawn cadhaab al- hawn bi- maa kuntum taqolon calaa 'allaah ghayr al- h.aqq wa- kuntum can 'aayaat -hi tastakbiron

wa- la- qad ji'tumo -naa furaad(an) ka-maa khalaqnaa -kum 'awwal marrah wa- taraktum maa khawwalnaa -kum waraa'a z.uhor -kum wa- maa naraa maca -kum shufacaa' -kum 'alladhena zacamtum 'anna -hum fe -kum shurakaa' la- qad taqat.t.aca bayna -kum wa- d.alla can -kum maa kuntum tazcumon
'inna 'allaah faaliq al- h.abb wa- an- nawaa yukhrij al- h.ayy min al- mayyit wa- mukhrij al- mayyit min al- h.ayy dhaalikum 'allaah fa- 'annaa tu'fakon
faaliq al- is.baah. wa- jacala al- layl sakan(an) wa- ash- shams wa- al- qamar h.usbaan(an) dhaalika taqder al- cazez al- calem
wa- huwa 'alladhe jacala la- -kum an- nujom li- tahtado bi- -haa fe z.ulumaat al- barr wa- al- bah.r qad fas.s.alnaa al- 'aayaat li- qawm yaclamon
wa- huwa 'alladhe ansha'a -kum min nafs waah.idah fa- mustaqarr wa- mustawdac qad fas.s.alnaa al- 'aayaat li- qawm yafqahon

wa- huwa 'alladhe anzala min as- samaa' maa' fa- akhrajnaa bi- -hi nabaat kull shay' fa- akhrajnaa min -hu khad.ir(an) nukhrij min -hu h.abb(an) mutaraakib(an) wa- min an- nakhl min t.alc -haa qinwaan daaniyah wa- jannaat min acnaab wa- az- zayton wa- ar- rummaan mushtabih(an) wa- ghayr mutashaabih unz.uro 'ilaa thamarah 'idhaa athmara wa- yanc -hi 'inna fe dhaalikum la- 'aayaat li- qawm yu'minon
wa- jacalo li- 'allaah shurakaa' al- jinn wa- khalaqa -hum wa- kharaqo la- -hu banen wa- banaat bi- ghayr cilm subh.aana -hu wa- tacaalaa can maa yas.ifon
badec as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. 'annaa yakon la- -hu walad wa- lam takun la- -hu s.aah.ibah wa- khalaqa kull shay' wa- huwa bi- kull shay' calem
dhaalikum 'allaah rabb -kum laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa khaaliq kull shay' fa- ucbudo -hu wa- huwa calaa kull shay' wakel
laa tudrik -hu al- abs.aar wa- huwa yudrik al- abs.aar wa- huwa al- lat.ef al- khaber
qad jaa'a -kum bas.aa'ir min rabb -kum fa- man abs.ara fa- li- nafs -hi wa- man camiya fa- calay -haa wa- maa 'anaa calay -kum bi- h.afez.
wa- ka- dhaalika nus.arrif al- 'aayaat wa- li- yaqolo darasta wa- li- nubayyin -hu li- qawm yaclamon
ittabic maa oh.iya 'ilay -ka min rabb -ka laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa wa- acrid. can al- mushriken
wa- law shaa'a 'allaah maa ashrako wa- maa jacalnaa -ka calay -him h.afez.(an) wa- maa 'anta calay -him bi- wakel

wa- laa tasubbo 'alladhena yadcon min doni 'allaah fa- yasubbo 'allaah cadw(an) bi- ghayr cilm ka- dhaalika zayyannaa li- kull 'ummah camal -hum thumma 'ilaa rabb -him marjic -hum fa- yunabbi' -hum bi- maa kaano yacmalon
wa- aqsamo bi- 'allaah jahd aymaan -him la- 'in jaa'at -hum 'aayah la- yu'minunna bi- -haa qul 'inna-maa al- 'aayaat cinda 'allaah wa- maa yushcir -kum 'anna -haa 'idhaa jaa'at laa yu'minon
wa- nuqallib af'idah -hum wa- abs.aar -hum ka-maa lam yu'mino bi- -hi 'awwal marrah wa- nadhar -hum fe t.ughyaan -him yacmahon

wa- law 'inna -naa nazzalnaa 'ilay -him al- malaa'ikah wa- kallama -hum al- mawtaa wa- h.asharnaa calay -him kull shay' qubul(an) maa kaano li- yu'mino 'illaa 'an yashaa' 'allaah wa- laakin akthar -hum yajhalon

wa- ka- dhaalika jacalnaa li- kull nabey cadow shayaat.en al- 'ins wa- al- jinn yoh.e bacd. -hum 'illaa bacd. zukhruf al- qawl ghuror(an) wa- law shaa'a rabb -ka maa facalo -hu fa- dhar -hum wa- maa yaftaron
wa- li- tas.ghaa 'ilay -hi af'idah 'alladhena laa yu'minon bi- al- 'aakhirah wa- li- yard.aw -hu wa- li- yaqtarifo maa hum muqtarifon

'a- fa- ghayr 'allaah abtaghe h.akam(an) wa- huwa 'alladhe anzala 'ilay -kum al- kitaab mufas.s.al(an) wa- 'alladhena 'aataynaa -hum al- kitaab yaclamon 'anna -hu munazzal min rabb -ka bi- al- h.aqq fa- laa takonanna min al- mumtaren
wa- tammat kalimah rabb -ka s.idq(an) wa- cadl(an) laa mubaddil li- kalimaat -hi wa- huwa as- samec al- calem
wa- 'in tut.ic akthar man fe al- 'ard. yud.illo -ka can sabel 'allaah 'in yutbicon 'illaa az.- z.ann wa- 'in hum 'illaa yakhrus.on
'inna rabb -ka huwa aclam man yad.ill can sabel -hi wa- huwa aclam bi- al- muhtaden
fa- kulo min maa dhukira ism 'allaah calay -hi 'in kuntum bi- 'aayaat -hi mu'minen

wa- maa la- -kum 'an laa ta'kulo min maa dhukira ism 'allaah calay -hi wa- qad fas.s.ala la- -kum maa h.arrama calay -kum 'illaa maa id.t.urirtum 'ilay -hi wa- 'inna kather(an) la- yud.illon bi- ahwaa' -him bi- ghayr cilm 'inna rabb -ka huwa aclam bi- al- muctaden
wa- dharo z.aahir al- 'ithm wa- baat.in -hu 'inna 'alladhena yaksibon al- 'ithm sa- yujzawn bi- maa kaano yaqtarifon

wa- laa ta'kulo min maa lam yudhkar ism 'allaah calay -hi wa- 'inna -hu la- fisq wa- 'inna ash- shayaat.en la- yoh.on 'ilaa awliyaa' -him li- yujaadilo -kum wa- 'in at.actumo -hum 'inna -kum la- mushrikon

'a- wa- man kaana mayt(an) fa- ah.yaynaa -hu wa- jacalnaa la- -hu nor(an) yamshe bi- -hi fe an- naas ka- man mathal -hu fe az.- z.ulumaat laysa bi- khaarij min -haa ka- dhaalika zuyyina li- al- kaafiren maa kaano yacmalon
wa- ka- dhaalika jacalnaa fe kull qaryah akaabir mujrime -haa li- yamkuro fe -haa wa- maa yamkuron 'illaa bi- anfus -him wa- maa yashcuron

wa- 'idhaa jaa'at -hum 'aayah qaalo lan nu'min h.attaa nu'taa mithl maa 'otiya rusul 'allaah 'allaah aclam h.aythu yajcal risaalah -hu sa- yus.eb 'alladhena ajramo s.aghaar cinda 'allaah wa- cadhaab shaded bi- maa kaano yamkuron

fa- man yurid 'allaah 'an yahdiya -hu yashrah. s.adr -hu li- al- islaam wa- man yurid 'an yud.ill -hu yajcal s.adr -hu d.ayyiq(an) h.araj(an) ka-'anna maa yas.s.accad fe as- samaa' ka- dhaalika yajcal 'allaah ar- rijs calaa 'alladhena laa yu'minon
wa- haadhaa s.iraat. rabb -ka mustaqem(an) qad fas.s.alnaa al- 'aayaat li- qawm yadhdhakkaron
la- -hum daar as- salaam cinda rabb -him wa- huwa waley -hum bi- maa kaano yacmalon

wa- yawm yah.shur -hum jamec(an) yaa macshar al- jinn qad istakthartum min al- 'ins wa- qaala awliyaa' -hum min al- 'ins rabb -naa istamtaca bacd. -naa bi- bacd. wa- balaghnaa 'ajal -naa 'alladhe 'ajjalta la- -naa qaala an- naar mathwaa -kum khaaliden fe -haa 'illaa maa shaa'a 'allaah 'inna rabb -ka h.akem calem
wa- ka- dhaalika nuwalle bacd. az.- z.aalimen bacd.(an) bi- maa kaano yaksibon

yaa macshar al- jinn wa- al- 'ins 'a- lam ya'ti -kum rusul min -kum yaqus.s.on calay -kum 'aayaat -e wa- yundhiron -kum liqaa' yawm -kum haadhaa qaalo shahidnaa calaa anfus -naa wa- gharrat -hum al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- shahido calaa anfus -him 'anna -hum kaano kaafiren
dhaalika 'an lam yakun rabb -ka muhlik al- quraa bi- z.ulm wa- 'ahl -haa ghaafilon
wa- li- kull darajaat min maa camilo wa- maa rabb -ka bi- ghaafil can maa yacmalon
wa- rabb -ka al- ghaney dho ar- rah.mah 'in yasha' yudhhib -kum wa- yastakhlif min bacdi -kum maa yashaa' ka-maa ansha'a -kum min dhurreyah qawm 'aakharen
'inna maa tocadon la- 'aati(n) wa- maa 'antum bi- mucjizen
qul yaa qawm -e icmalo calaa makaanah -kum 'inni -y caamil fa- sawfa taclamon man takon la- -hu caaqibah ad- daar 'inna -hu laa yuflih. az.- z.aalimon

wa- jacalo li- 'allaah min maa dhara'a min al- h.arth wa- al- ancaam nas.eb(an) fa- qaalo haadhaa li- 'allaah bi- zacm -him wa- haadhaa li- shurakaa' -naa fa- maa kaana li- shurakaa' -him fa- laa yas.il 'ilaa 'allaah wa- maa kaana li- 'allaah fa- huwa yas.il 'ilaa shurakaa' -him saa'a maa yah.kumon

wa- ka- dhaalika zayyana li- kather min al- mushriken qatl awlaad -him shurakaa' -hum li- yurdo -hum wa- li- yalbiso calay -him den -hum wa- law shaa'a 'allaah maa facalo -hu fa- dhar -hum wa- maa yaftaron

wa- qaalo haadhihi ancaam wa- h.arth h.ijr laa yat.cam -haa 'illaa man nashaa' bi- zacm -him wa- ancaam h.urrimat z.uhor -haa wa- ancaam laa yadhkuron ism 'allaah calay -haa iftiraa' calay -hi sa- yajze -him bi- maa kaano yaftaron
wa- qaalo maa fe but.on haadhihi al- ancaam khaalis.ah li- dhukor -naa wa- muh.arram calaa azwaaj -naa wa- 'in yakun maytah fa- hum fe -hi shurakaa' sa- yajze -him was.f -hum 'inna -hu h.akem calem
qad khasira 'alladhena qatalo awlaad -hum safah(an) bi- ghayr cilm wa- h.arramo maa razaqa -hum 'allaah iftiraa' calaa 'allaah qad d.allo wa- maa kaano muhtaden

wa- huwa 'alladhe ansha'a jannaat macroshaat wa- ghayr macroshaat wa- an- nakhl wa- az- zarc mukhtalif(an) 'ukul -hu wa- az- zayton wa- ar- rummaan mutashaabih(an) wa- ghayr mutashaabih kulo min thamarah 'idhaa athmara wa- 'aato h.aqq -hu yawm h.as.aad -hi wa- laa tusrifo 'inna -hu laa yuh.ibb al- musrifen
wa- min al- ancaam h.amolah wa- farsh(an) kulo min maa razaqa -kum 'allaah wa- laa tattabico khut.uwaat ash- shayt.aan 'inna -hu la- -kum cadow muben

thamaaniyah azwaaj min ad.- d.a'n ithnain wa- min al- macz ithnain qul 'a- adh- dhakarain h.arrama 'am al- 'unthayain 'ammaa ishtamalat calay -hi arh.aam al- 'unthayain nabbi'o -ne bi- cilm 'in kuntum s.aadiqen

wa- min al- 'ibil ithnain wa- min al- baqar ithnain qul 'a- adh- dhakarain h.arrama 'am al- 'unthayain 'ammaa ishtamalat calay -hi arh.aam al- 'unthayain 'am kuntum shuhadaa' 'idh was.s.aa -kum 'allaah bi- haadhaa fa- man az.lama min man iftaraa calaa 'allaah kadhib(an) li- yud.ill an- naas bi- ghayr cilm 'inna 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm az.- z.aalimen

qul laa ajid fe maa oh.iya 'ilay -ya muh.arram(an) calaa t.aacim yat.cam -hu 'illaa 'an yakon maytah 'aw dam(an) masfoh.(an) 'aw lah.m khinzer fa- 'inna -hu rijs 'aw fisq(an) uhilla li- ghayr 'allaah bi- -hi fa- man id.t.urra ghayr baaghi(n) wa- laa caadi(n) fa- 'inna rabb -ka ghafor rah.em

wa- calaa 'alladhena haado h.arramnaa kull dhe z.ufur wa- min al- baqar wa- al- ghanam h.arramnaa calay -him shuh.om -humaa 'illaa maa h.amalat z.uhor -humaa 'aw al- h.awaayaa 'aw maa ikhtalat.a bi- caz.m dhaalika jazaynaa -hum bi- baghy -him wa- 'in(na) -naa la- s.aadiqon
fa- 'in kadhdhabo -ka fa- qul rabb -kum dho rah.mah waasicah wa- laa yuradd ba's -hu can al- qawm al- mujrimen

sa- yaqol 'alladhena ashrako law shaa'a 'allaah maa ashraknaa wa- laa 'aabaa' -naa wa- laa h.arramnaa min shay' ka- dhaalika kadhdhaba 'alladhena min qabli -him h.attaa dhaaqo ba's -naa qul hal cinda -kum min cilm fa- tukhrijo -hu la- -naa 'in tattabicon 'illaa az.- z.ann wa- 'in 'antum 'illaa takhrus.on
qul fa- li- 'allaah al- h.ujjah al- baalighah fa- law shaa'a la- hadaa -kum ajmacen

qul halumma shuhadaa' -kum 'alladhena yashhadon 'anna 'allaah h.arrama haadhaa fa- 'in shahido fa- laa tashhad maca -hum wa- laa tattabic ahwaa' 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa wa- 'alladhena laa yu'minon bi- al- 'aakhirah wa- hum bi- rabb -him yacdilon

qul tacaalaw utlu maa h.arrama rabb -kum calay -kum 'an laa tushriko bi- -hi shay'(an) wa- bi- al- waalidain ih.saan(an) wa- laa taqtulo awlaad -kum min imlaaq nah.nu narzuq -kum wa- 'eyaa -hum wa- laa taqrabo al- fawaah.ish maa z.ahara min -haa wa- maa bat.ana wa- laa taqtulo an- nafs 'allate h.arrama 'allaah 'illaa bi- al- h.aqq dhaalikum was.s.aa -kum bi- -hi lacalla -kum tacqilon

wa- laa taqrabo maal al- yatem 'illaa bi- 'allate hiya ah.san h.attaa yablugh ashudd -hu wa- awfo al- kayl wa- al- mezaan bi- al- qist. laa nukallif nafs(an) 'illaa wusc -haa wa- 'idhaa qultum fa- icdilo wa- law kaana dhaa qurbaa wa- bi- cahd 'allaah awfo dhaalikum was.s.aa -kum bi- -hi lacalla -kum tadhakkaron
wa- 'anna haadhaa s.iraat. -e mustaqem(an) fa- ittabico -hu wa- laa tattabico as- subul fa- tafarraqa bi- -kum can sabel -hi dhaalikum was.s.aa -kum bi- -hi lacalla -kum tattaqon
thumma 'aataynaa mosaa al- kitaab tamaam(an) calaa 'alladhe ah.san wa- tafs.el(an) li- kull shay' wa- huda(n) wa- rah.mah lacalla -hum bi- liqaa' rabb -him yu'minon
wa- haadhaa kitaab anzalnaa -hu mubaarak fa- ittabico -hu wa- ittaqo lacalla -kum turh.amon
'an taqolo 'inna-maa unzila al- kitaab calaa t.aa'ifatain min qabli -naa wa- 'in kunnaa can diraasah -him la- ghaafilen

'aw taqolo law 'an(na) -naa unzila calay -naa al- kitaab la- kunnaa ahdaa min -hum fa- qad jaa'a -kum bayyinah min rabb -kum wa- huda(n) wa- rah.mah fa- man az.lam min man kadhdhaba bi- 'aayaat 'allaah wa- s.adafa can -haa sa- najze 'alladhena yas.difon can 'aayaat -naa so' al- cadhaab bi- maa kaano yas.difon

hal yanz.uron 'illaa 'an ta'tiya -hum al- malaa'ikah 'aw ya'te rabb -ka 'aw ya'tiya bacd. 'aayaat rabb -ka yawm ya'te bacd. 'aayaat rabb -ka laa yanfac nafs(an) 'emaan -haa lam takun 'aamanat min qablu 'aw kasabat fe 'emaan -haa khayr(an) qul intaz.iro 'in(na) -naa muntaz.iron
'inna 'alladhena farraqo den -hum wa- kaano shiyac(an) lasta min -hum fe shay' 'inna-maa 'amr -hum 'ilaa 'allaah thumma yunabbi' -hum bi- maa kaano yafcalon
man jaa'a bi- al- h.asanah fa- la- -hu cashr amthaal -haa wa- man jaa'a bi- as- sayyi'ah fa- laa yujzaa 'illaa mithl -haa wa- hum laa yuz.lamon
qul 'inna -ne hadaa -ne rabb -e 'ilaa s.iraat. mustaqem den(an) qiyam(an) millah 'ibraahem h.anef(an) wa- maa kaana min al- mushriken
qul 'inna s.alaah -e wa- nusuk -e wa- mah.yaa -ya wa- mamaat -e li- 'allaah rabb al- caalamen
laa sharek la- -hu wa- bi- dhaalika 'umirtu wa- 'anaa 'awwal al- muslimen

qul 'a- ghayr 'allaah abghe rabb(an) wa- huwa rabb kull shay' wa- laa taksib kull nafs 'illaa calay -haa wa- laa tazir waazirah wizr 'ukhraa thumma 'ilaa rabb -kum marjic -kum fa- yunabbi' -kum bi- maa kuntum fe -hi takhtalifon
wa- huwa 'alladhe jacala -kum khalaa'if al- 'ard. wa- rafaca bacd. -kum fawqa bacd. darajaat li- yabluwa -kum fe maa 'aataa -kum 'inna rabb -ka sarec al- ciqaab wa- 'inna -hu la- ghafor rah.em
alif-laam-mem-s.aad
kitaab unzila 'ilay -ka fa- laa yakun fe s.adr -ka h.araj min -hu li- tundhir bi- -hi wa- dhikraa li- al- mu'minen
ittabico maa unzila 'ilay -kum min rabb -kum wa- laa tattabico min doni -hi awliyaa' qalel(an) maa tadhakkaron
wa- kam min qaryah ahlaknaa -haa fa- jaa'a -haa ba's -naa bayaat(an) 'aw hum qaa'ilon
fa- maa kaana dacwaa -hum 'idh jaa'a -hum ba's -naa 'illaa 'an qaalo 'in(na) -naa kunnaa z.aalimen
fa- la- nas'alanna 'alladhena ursila 'ilay -him wa- la- nas'alanna al- mursalen
fa- la- naqus.s.anna calay -him bi- cilm wa- maa kunnaa ghaa'iben
wa- al- wazn yawma'idhin al- h.aqq fa- man thaqulat mawaazen -hu fa- 'olaa'ika hum al- muflih.on
wa- man khaffat mawaazen -hu fa- 'olaa'ika 'alladhena khasiro anfus -hum bi- maa kaano bi- 'aayaat -naa yaz.limon
wa- la- qad makkannaa -kum fe al- 'ard. wa- jacalnaa la- -kum fe -haa macaayish qalel(an) maa tashkuron
wa- la- qad khalaqnaa -kum thumma s.awwarnaa -kum thumma qulnaa li- al- malaa'ikah usjudo li- 'aadam fa- sajado 'illaa 'ibles lam yakun min as- saajiden
qaala maa manaca -ka 'an laa tasjud 'idh 'amartu -ka qaala 'anaa khayr min -hu khalaqta -ne min naar wa- khalaqta -hu min t.en
qaala fa- ihbit. min -haa fa- maa yakon la- -ka 'an tatakabbar fe -haa fa- ukhruj 'inna -ka min as.- s.aaghiren
qaala anz.ir -ne 'ilaa yawm yubcathon
qaala 'inna -ka min al- munz.aren
qaala fa- bi- maa aghwayta -ne la- aqcudanna la- -hum s.iraat. -ka al- mustaqem
thumma la- 'aatiyanna -hum min bayna ayde -him wa- min khalfi -him wa- can aymaan -him wa- can shamaa'il -him wa- laa tajid akthar -hu shaakiren
qaala ukhruj min -haa madh'om(an) madh.or(an) la- man tabica -ka min -hum la- amla'anna jahannam min -kum ajmacen
wa- yaa 'aadam uskun 'anta wa- zawj -ka al- jannah fa- kulaa min h.aythu shi'tumaa wa- laa taqrabaa haadhihi ash- shajarah fa- takonaa min az.- z.aalimen

fa- waswasa la- -humaa ash- shayt.aan li- yubdiya la- -humaa maa woriya can -humaa min saw'aat -himaa wa- qaala maa nahaa -kumaa rabb -kumaa can haadhihi ash- shajarah 'illaa 'an takonaa malakain 'aw takonaa min al- khaaliden
wa- qaasama -humaa 'inni -y la- -kumaa la- min an- naas.ih.en

fa- dallaa -humaa bi- ghuror fa- lammaa dhaaqaa ash- shajarah badat la- -humaa saw'aat -humaa wa- t.afiqaa yakhs.ifaan calay -himaa min waraq al- jannah wa- naadaa -humaa rabb -humaa 'a- lam anhaa -kumaa can tilkumaa ash- shajarah wa- aqul la- -kumaa 'inna ash- shayt.aan la- -kumaa cadow muben
qaalaa rabb -naa z.alamnaa anfus -naa wa- 'in lam taghfir la- -naa wa- tarh.am -naa la- nakonanna min al- khaasiren
qaala ihbit.o bacd. -kum li- bacd. cadow wa- la- -kum fe al- 'ard. mustaqarr wa- mataac 'ilaa h.en
qaala fe -haa tah.yawn wa- fe -haa tamoton wa- min -haa tukhrajon
yaa bane 'aadam qad anzalnaa calay -kum libaas(an) yuwaare saw'aat -kum wa- resh(an) wa- libaas at- taqwaa dhaalika khayr dhaalika min 'aayaat 'allaah lacalla -hum yadhdhakkaron

yaa bane 'aadam laa yaftinanna -kum ash- shayt.aan ka-maa akhraja 'abawai -kum min al- jannah yanzic can -humaa libaas -humaa li- yuriya -humaa saw'aat -himaa 'inna -hu yaraa -kum huwa wa- qabel -hu min h.aythu laa tarawn -hum 'in(na) -naa jacalnaa ash- shayaat.en awliyaa' li- 'alladhena laa yu'minon
wa- 'idhaa facalo faah.ishah qaalo wajadnaa calay -haa 'aabaa' -naa wa- 'allaah 'amara -naa bi- -haa qul 'inna 'allaah laa ya'mur bi- al- fah.shaa' 'a- taqolon calaa 'allaah maa laa taclamon
qul 'amara rabb -e bi- al- qist. wa- aqemo wujoh -kum cinda kull masjid wa- udco -hu mukhlis.en la- -hu ad- den ka-maa bada'a -kum tacodon
fareq(an) hudaa wa- fareq(an) h.aqqa calay -him ad.- d.alaalah 'inna -hum ittakhadho ash- shayaat.en awliyaa' min doni 'allaah wa- yah.sabon 'anna -hum muhtadon
yaa bane 'aadam khudho zenah -kum cinda kull masjid wa- kulo wa- ishrabo wa- laa tusrifo 'inna -hu laa yuh.ibb al- musrifen

qul man h.arrama zenah 'allaah 'allate akhraja li- cibaad -hi wa- at.- t.ayyibaat min ar- rizq qul hiya li- 'alladhena 'aamano fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa khaalis.ah yawm al- qiyaamah ka- dhaalika nufas.s.il al- 'aayaat li- qawm yaclamon

qul 'inna-maa h.arrama rabb -e al- fawaah.ish maa z.ahara min -haa wa- maa bat.ana wa- al- 'ithm wa- al- baghy bi- ghayr al- h.aqq wa- 'an tushriko bi- 'allaah maa lam yunazzil bi- -hi sult.aan(an) wa- 'an taqolo calaa 'allaah maa laa taclamon
wa- li- kull 'ummah 'ajal fa- 'idhaa jaa'a 'ajal -hum laa yasta'khiron saacah wa- laa yastaqdimon
yaa bane 'aadam 'immaa ya'tiyanna -kum rusul min -kum yaqus.s.on calay -kum 'aayaat -e fa- man ittaqaa wa- as.lah.a fa- laa khawf calay -him wa- laa hum yah.zanon
wa- 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa wa- istakbaro can -haa 'olaa'ika as.h.aab an- naar hum fe -haa khaalidon

fa- man az.lam min man iftaraa calaa 'allaah kadhib(an) 'aw kadhdhaba bi- 'aayaat -hi 'olaa'ika yanaal -hum nas.eb -hum min al- kitaab h.attaa 'idhaa jaa'at -hum rusul -naa yatawaffawn -hum qaalo 'ayna maa kuntum tadcon min doni 'allaah qaalo d.allo can -naa wa- shahido calaa anfus -him 'anna -hum kaano kaafiren

qaala udkhulo fe 'umam qad khalat min qabli -kum min al- jinn wa- al- 'ins fe an- naar kulla-maa dakhalat 'ummah lacanat 'ukht -haa h.attaa 'idhaa iddaarako fe -haa jamec(an) qaalat 'ukhraa -hum li- 'olaa -hum rabb -naa haa'ulaa'i ad.allo -naa fa- 'aati -him cadhaab(an) d.icf(an) min an- naar qaala li- kull d.icf wa- laakin laa taclamon
wa- qaalat 'olaa -hum li- 'ukhraa -hum fa- maa kaana la- -kum calay -naa min fad.l fa- dhoqo al- cadhaab bi- maa kuntum taksibon

'inna 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa wa- istakbaro can -haa laa tufattah. la- -hum abwaab as- samaa' wa- laa yadkhulon al- jannah h.attaa yalij al- jamal fe samm al- khiyaat. wa- ka- dhaalika najze al- mujrimen
la- -hum min jahannam mihaad wa- min fawqi -him ghawaash wa- ka- dhaalika najze az.- z.aalimen
wa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat laa nukallif nafs(an) 'illaa wusc -haa 'olaa'ika as.h.aab al- jannah hum fe -haa khaalidon

wa- nazacnaa maa fe s.udor -him min ghill tajre min tah.ti -him al- anhaar wa- qaalo al- h.amd li- 'allaah 'alladhe hadaa -naa li- haadhaa wa- maa kunnaa li- nahtadiya law-laa 'an hadaa -naa 'allaah la- qad jaa'at rusul rabb -naa bi- al- h.aqq wa- nodo 'an tilkum al- jannah orithtumo -haa bi- maa kuntum tacmalon

wa- naadaa as.h.aab al- jannah as.h.aab an- naar 'an qad wajadnaa maa wacada -naa rabb -naa h.aqq(an) fa- hal wajadtum maa wacada rabb -kum h.aqq(an) qaalo nacam fa- 'adhdhana mu'adhdhin bayna -hum 'an lacnah 'allaah calaa az.- z.aalimen
'alladhena yas.uddon can sabel 'allaah wa- yabghon -haa ciwaj(an) wa- hum bi- al- 'aakhirah kaafiron
wa- bayna -humaa h.ijaab wa- calaa al- acraaf rijaal yacrifon kull(an) bi- semaa -hum wa- naadaw as.h.aab al- jannah 'an salaam calay -kum lam yadkhulo -haa wa- hum yat.macon
wa- 'idhaa s.urifat abs.aar -hum tilqaa'a as.h.aab an- naar qaalo rabb -naa laa tajcal -naa maca al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
wa- naadaa as.h.aab al- acraaf rijaal(an) yacrifon -hum bi- semaa -hum qaalo maa aghnaa can -kum jamc -kum wa- maa kuntum tastakbiron
'a- haa'ulaa'i 'alladhena aqsamtum laa yanaal -hum 'allaah bi- rah.mah udkhulo al- jannah laa khawf calay -kum wa- laa 'antum tah.zanon
wa- naadaa as.h.aab an- naar as.h.aab al- jannah 'an afed.o calay -naa min al- maa' 'aw min maa razaqa -kum 'allaah qaalo 'inna 'allaah h.arrama -humaa calaa al- kaafiren
'alladhena ittakhadho den -hum lahw(an) wa- lacib(an) wa- gharrat -hum al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa fa- al- yawm nansaa -hum ka-maa naso liqaa' yawm -him haadhaa wa- maa kaano bi- 'aayaat -naa yajh.adon
wa- la- qad ji'naa -hum bi- kitaab fas.s.alnaa -hu calaa cilm huda(n) wa- rah.mah li- qawm yu'minon

hal yanz.uron 'illaa ta'wel -hu yawm ya'te ta'wel -hu yaqol 'alladhena naso -hu min qablu qad jaa'at rusul rabb -naa bi- al- h.aqq fa- hal la- -naa min shufacaa' fa- yashfaco la- -naa 'aw nuradd fa- nacmal ghayr 'alladhe kunnaa nacmal qad khasiro anfus -hum wa- d.alla can -hum maa kaano yaftaron

'inna rabb -kum 'allaah 'alladhe khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. fe sittah ayyaam thumma istawaa calaa al- carsh yughshe al- layl an- nahaar yat.lub -hu h.atheth(an) wa- ash- shams wa- al- qamar wa- an- nujom musakhkharaat bi- 'amr -hi 'a-laa la- -hu al- khalq wa- al- 'amr tabaaraka 'allaah rabb al- caalamen
udco rabb -kum tad.arruc(an) wa- khufyah 'inna -hu laa yuh.ibb al- muctaden
wa- laa tufsido fe al- 'ard. bacda is.laah. -haa wa- udco -hu khawf(an) wa- t.amac(an) 'inna rah.mah 'allaah qareb min al- muh.sinen

wa- huwa 'alladhe yursil ar- riyaah. bushraa bayna yadai rah.mah -hi h.attaa 'idhaa aqallat sah.aab(an) thiqaal(an) suqnaa -hu li- balad mayyit fa- anzalnaa bi- -hi al- maa' fa- akhrajnaa bi- -hi min kull ath- thamaraat ka- dhaalika nukhrij al- mawtaa lacalla -kum tadhakkaron
wa- al- balad at.- t.ayyib yakhruj nabaat -hu bi- 'idhn rabb -hi wa- 'alladhe khabutha laa yakhruj 'illaa nakid(an) ka- dhaalika nus.arrif al- 'aayaat li- qawm yashkuron
la- qad arsalnaa noh.(an) 'ilaa qawm -hi fa- qaala yaa qawm -e ucbudo 'allaah maa la- -kum min 'ilaah ghayr -hu 'in(na) -ne akhaaf calay -kum cadhaab yawm caz.em
qaala al- mala' min qawm -hi 'in(na) -naa la- naraa -ka fe d.alaal muben
qaala yaa qawm -e laysa bi- -y d.alaalah wa- laakin -ne rasol min rabb al- caalamen
uballigh -kum risaalaat rabb -e wa- ans.ah. la- -kum wa- aclam min 'allaah maa laa taclamon
'a- wa- cajibtum 'an jaa'a -kum dhikr min rabb -kum calaa rajul min -kum li- yundhir -kum wa- li- tattaqo wa- lacalla -kum turh.amon
fa- kadhdhabo -hu fa- anjaynaa -hu wa- 'alladhena maca -hu fe al- fulk wa- aghraqnaa 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa 'inna -hum kaano qawm(an) camen
wa- 'ilaa caadi(n) 'akhaa -hum hod(an) qaala yaa qawm -e ucbudo 'allaah maa la- -kum min 'ilaah ghayr -hu 'a- fa- laa tattaqon
qaala al- mala' 'alladhena kafaro min qawm -hi 'in(na) -naa la- naraa -ka fe safaahah wa- 'in(na) -naa la- naz.unn -ka min al- kaadhiben
qaala yaa qawm -e laysa bi- -y safaahah wa- laakin -e rasol min rabb al- caalamen
uballigh -kum risaalaat rabb -e wa- 'anaa la- -kum naas.ih. 'amen

'a- wa- cajibtum 'an jaa'a -kum dhikr min rabb -kum calaa rajul min -kum li- yundhir -kum wa- udhkuro 'idh jacala -kum khulafaa' min bacdi qawm noh. wa- zaada -kum fe al- khalq bast.ah fa- udhkuro 'aalaa' 'allaah lacalla -kum tuflih.on
qaalo 'a- ji'ta -naa li- nacbud 'allaah wah.d -hu wa- nadhar maa kaana yacbud 'aabaa' -naa fa- i'ti -naa bi- maa tacid -naa 'in kunta min as.- s.aadiqen

qaala qad waqaca calay -kum min rabb -kum rijs wa- ghad.ab 'a- tujaadilon -ne fe asmaa' sammaytumo -haa 'antum wa- 'aabaa' -kum maa nazzala 'allaah bi- -haa min sult.aan fa- intaz.iro 'inni -y maca -kum min al- muntaz.iren
fa- anjaynaa -hu wa- 'alladhena maca -hu bi- rah.mah min -naa wa- qat.acnaa daabir 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa wa- maa kaano mu'minen

wa- 'ilaa thamod 'akhaa -hum s.aalih.(an) qaala yaa qawm -e ucbudo 'allaah maa la- -kum min 'ilaah ghayr -hu qad jaa'at -kum bayyinah min rabb -kum haadhihi naaqah 'allaah la- -kum 'aayah fa- dharo -haa ta'kul fe 'ard. 'allaah wa- laa tamasso -haa bi- so' fa- ya'khudh -kum cadhaab 'alem

wa- udhkuro 'idh jacala -kum khulafaa' min bacdi caadi(n) wa- bawwa'a -kum fe al- 'ard. tattakhidhon min suhol -haa qus.or(an) wa- tanh.iton al- jibaal buyot(an) fa- udhkuro 'aalaa' 'allaah wa- laa tacthaw fe al- 'ard. mufsiden

qaala al- mala' 'alladhena istakbaro min qawm -hi li- 'alladhena istud.cifo li- man 'aamana min -hum 'a- taclamon 'anna s.aalih.(an) mursal min rabb -hi qaalo 'in(na) -naa bi- maa ursila bi- -hi mu'minon
qaala 'alladhena istakbaro 'in(na) -naa bi- 'alladhe 'aamantum bi- -hi kaafiron
fa- caqaro an- naaqah wa- cataw can 'amr rabb -him wa- qaalo yaa s.aalih. i'ti -naa bi- maa tacid -naa 'in kunta min al- mursalen
fa- 'akhadhat -hum ar- rajfah fa- as.bah.o fe daar -him jaathimen
fa- tawallaa can -hum wa- qaala yaa qawm -e la- qad ablaghtu -kum risaalah rabb -e wa- nas.ah.tu la- -kum wa- laakin laa tuh.ibbon an- naas.ih.en
wa- lot.(an) 'idh qaala li- qawm -hi 'a- ta'ton al- faah.ishah maa sabaqa -kum bi- -haa min 'ah.ad min al- caalamen
'inna -kum la- ta'ton ar- rijaal shahwah min doni an- nisaa' bal 'antum qawm musrifon
wa- maa kaana jawaab qawm -hi 'illaa 'an qaalo akhrijo -hum min qaryah -kum 'inna -hum unaas yatat.ahharon
fa- anjaynaa -hu wa- 'ahl -hu 'illaa imra'ah -hu kaanat min al- ghaabiren
wa- amt.arnaa calay -him mat.ar(an) fa- unz.ur kayfa kaana caaqibah al- mujrimen

wa- 'ilaa madyan 'akhaa -hum shucayb(an) qaala yaa qawm -e ucbudo 'allaah maa la- -kum min 'ilaah ghayr -hu qad jaa'at -kum bayyinah min rabb -kum fa- awfo al- kayl wa- al- mezaan wa- laa tabkhaso an- naas ashyaa' -hum wa- laa tufsido fe al- 'ard. bacda is.laah. -haa dhaalikum khayr la- -kum 'in kuntum mu'minen

wa- laa taqcudo bi- kull s.iraat. tocidon wa- tas.uddon can sabel 'allaah man 'aamana bi- -hi wa- tabghon -haa ciwaj(an) wa- udhkuro 'idh kuntum qalel(an) fa- kaththara -kum wa- unz.uro kayfa kaana caaqibah al- mufsiden
wa- 'in kaana t.aa'ifah min -kum 'aamano bi- 'alladhe ursilat bi- -hi wa- t.aa'ifah lam yu'mino fa- is.biro h.attaa yah.kum 'allaah bayna -naa wa- huwa khayr al- h.aakimen
qaala al- mala' 'alladhena istakbaro min qawm -hi la- nukhrijanna -ka yaa shucayb wa- 'alladhena 'aamano maca -ka min qaryah -naa 'aw la- tacodunna fe millah -naa qaala 'a- wa- law kunnaa kaarihen

qad iftaraynaa calaa 'allaah kadhib(an) 'in cudnaa fe millah -kum bacda 'idh najjaa -naa 'allaah min -haa wa- maa yakon la- -naa 'an nacod fe -haa 'illaa 'an yashaa' 'allaah rabb -naa wasica rabb -naa kull shay' cilm(an) calaa 'allaah tawakkalnaa rabb -naa iftah. bayna -naa wa- bayna qawm -naa bi- al- h.aqq wa- 'anta khayr al- faatih.en
wa- qaala al- mala' 'alladhena kafaro min qawm -hi la- 'in ittabactum shucayb(an) 'inna -kum 'idhan la- khaasiron
fa- 'akhadhat -hum ar- rajfah fa- as.bah.o fe daar -him jaathimen
'alladhena kadhdhabo shucayb(an) ka-'an lam yaghnaw fe -haa 'alladhena kadhdhabo shucayb(an) kaano -hum al- khaasiren
fa- tawallaa can -hum wa- qaala yaa qawm -e la- qad ablaghtu -kum risaalaat rabb -e wa- nas.ah.tu la- -kum fa- kayfa 'aasaa calaa qawm kaafiren
wa- maa arsalnaa fe qaryah min nabey 'illaa 'akhadhnaa 'ahl -haa bi- al- ba'saa' wa- ad.- d.arraa' lacalla -hum yad.d.arracon
thumma baddalnaa makaan as- sayyi'ah al- h.asanah h.attaa cafaw wa- qaalo qad massa 'aabaa' -naa ad.- d.arraa' wa- as- sarraa' fa- 'akhadhnaa -hum baghtah wa- hum laa yashcuron
wa- law 'anna 'ahl al- quraa 'aamano wa- ittaqaw la- fatah.naa calay -him barakaat min as- samaa' wa- al- 'ard. wa- laakin kadhdhabo fa- 'akhadhnaa -hum bi- maa kaano yaksibon
'a- fa- 'amina 'ahl al- quraa 'an ya'tiya -hum ba's -naa bayaat(an) wa- hum naa'imon
'aw 'amina 'ahl al- quraa 'an ya'tiya -him ba's -naa d.uh.a(n) wa- hum yalcabon
'a- fa- 'amino makr 'allaah fa- laa ya'man makr 'allaah 'illaa al- qawm al- khaasiron
'a- wa- lam yahdi li- 'alladhena yarithon al- 'ard. min bacdi 'ahl -haa 'an law nashaa' as.abnaa -hum bi- dhunob -him wa- nat.bac calaa qulob -him fa- hum laa yasmacon

tilka al- quraa naqus.s. calay -ka min anbaa' -haa wa- la- qad jaa'at -hum rusul -hum bi- al- bayyinaat fa- maa kaano li- yu'mino bi- maa kadhdhabo min qablu ka- dhaalika yat.bac 'allaah calaa qulob al- kaafiren
wa- maa wajadnaa li- akthar -him min cahd wa- 'in wajadnaa akthar -hum la- faasiqen
thumma bacathnaa min bacdi -him mosaa bi- 'aayaat -naa 'ilaa fircawn wa- mala' -hi fa- z.alamo bi- -haa fa- unz.ur kayfa kaana caaqibah al- mufsiden
wa- qaala mosaa yaa fircawn 'inni -y rasol min rabb al- caalamen
h.aqeq calaa 'an laa aqol calaa 'allaah 'illaa al- h.aqq qad ji'tu -kum bi- bayyinah min rabb -kum fa- arsil maci -ya bane 'israa'el
qaala 'in kunta ji'ta bi- 'aayah fa- i'ti bi- -haa 'in kunta min as.- s.aadiqen
fa- alqaa cas.aa -hu fa- 'idhaa hiya thucbaan muben
wa- nazaca yad -hu fa- 'idhaa hiya bayd.aa' li- an- naaz.iren
qaala al- mala' min qawm fircawn 'inna haadhaa la- saah.ir calem
yured 'an yukhrij -kum min 'ard. -kum fa- maa-dhaa ta'muron
qaalo arji -hi wa- 'akhaa -hu wa- arsil fe al- madaa'in h.aashiren
ya'to -ka bi- kull saah.ir calem
wa- jaa'a as- sah.arah fircawn qaalo 'inna la- -naa la- 'ajr(an) 'in kunnaa nah.nu al- ghaaliben
qaala nacam wa- 'inna -kum la- min al- muqarraben
qaalo yaa mosaa 'immaa 'an tulqiya wa- 'immaa 'an nakon nah.nu al- mulqen
qaala alqo fa- lammaa alqaw sah.aro acyun an- naas wa- istarhabo -hum wa- jaa'o bi- sih.r caz.em
wa- awh.aynaa 'illaa mosaa 'an alqi cas.aa -ka fa- 'idhaa hiya talqaf maa ya'fikon
fa- waqaca al- h.aqq wa- bat.ala maa kaano yacmalon
fa- ghulibo hunaalika wa- inqalabo s.aaghiren
wa- ulqiya as- sah.arah saajiden
qaalo 'aamannaa bi- rabb al- caalamen
rabb mosaa wa- haaron
qaala fircawn 'aamantum bi- -hi qabla 'an 'aadhan la- -kum 'inna haadhaa la- makr makartumo -hu fe al- madenah li- tukhrijo min -haa 'ahl -haa fa- sawfa taclamon
la- uqat.t.icanna ayde -kum wa- arjul -kum min khilaaf thumma la- us.allibanna -kum ajmacen
qaalo 'in(na) -naa 'ilaa rabb -naa munqalibon
wa- maa tanqim min -naa 'illaa 'an 'aamannaa bi- 'aayaat rabb -naa lammaa jaa'at -naa rabb -naa afrigh calay -naa s.abr(an) wa- tawaffa -naa muslimen

wa- qaala al- mala' min qawm fircawn 'a- tadhar mosaa wa- qawm -hu li- yufsido fe al- 'ard. wa- yadhar -ka wa- 'aalihah -ka qaala sa- nuqattil abnaa' -hum wa- nastah.ye nisaa' -hum wa- 'in(na) -naa fawqa -hum qaahiron
qaala mosaa li- qawm -hi istaceno bi- 'allaah wa- is.biro 'inna al- 'ard. li- 'allaah yorith -haa man yashaa' min cibaad -hi wa- al- caaqibah li- al- muttaqen
qaalo 'odhenaa min qabli 'an ta'tiya -naa wa- min bacdi maa ji'ta -naa qaala casaa rabb -kum 'an yuhlik cadow -kum wa- yastakhlif -kum fe al- 'ard. fa- yanz.ur kayfa tacmalon
wa- la- qad 'akhadhnaa 'aal fircawn bi- as- sinen wa- naqs. min ath- thamaraat lacalla -hum yadhdhakkaron

fa- 'idhaa jaa'at -hum al- h.asanah qaalo la- -naa haadhihi wa- 'in tus.ib -hum sayyi'ah yat.t.ayyaro bi- mosaa wa- man maca -hu 'a-laa 'inna-maa t.aa'ir -hum cinda 'allaah wa- laakin akthar -hum laa yaclamon
wa- qaalo mahmaa ta'ti -naa bi- -hi min 'aayah li- tash.ar -naa bi- -haa fa- maa nah.nu la- -ka bi- mu'minen
fa- arsalnaa calay -him at.- t.ofaan wa- al- jaraad wa- al- qummal wa- ad.- d.afaadic wa- ad- dam 'aayaat mufas.s.alaat fa- istakbaro wa- kaano qawm(an) mujrimen

wa- lammaa waqaca calay -him ar- rijz qaalo yaa mosaa udcu la- -naa rabb -ka bi- maa cahida cinda -ka la- 'in kashafta can -naa ar- rijz la- nu'minanna la- -ka wa- la- nursilanna maca -ka bane 'israa'el
fa- lammaa kashafnaa can -hum ar- rijz 'ilaa 'ajal hum baaligho -hu 'idhaa hum yankuthon
fa- intaqamnaa min -hum fa- aghraqnaa -hum fe al- yamm bi- 'anna -hum kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa wa- kaano can -haa ghaafilen

wa- awrathnaa al- qawm 'alladhena kaano yustad.cafon mashaariq al- 'ard. wa- maghaarib -haa 'allate baaraknaa fe -hi wa- tammat kalimah rabb -ka al- h.usnaa calaa bane 'israa'el bi- maa s.abaro wa- dammarnaa maa kaana yas.nac fircawn wa- qawm -hu wa- maa kaano yacrishon
wa- jaawaznaa bi- bane 'israa'el al- bah.r fa- 'ataw calaa qawm yackufon calaa as.naam la- -hum qaalo yaa mosaa ijcal la- -naa 'ilaah(an) ka-maa la- -hum 'aalihah qaala 'inna -kum qawm tajhalon
'inna haa'ulaa'i mutabbar maa hum fe -hi wa- baat.il maa kaano yacmalon
qaala 'a- ghayr 'allaah abghe -kum 'ilaah(an) wa- huwa fad.d.ala -kum calaa al- caalamen
wa- 'idh anjaynaa -kum min 'aal fircawn yasomon -kum so' al- cadhaab yuqattilon abnaa' -kum wa- yastah.yon nisaa' -kum wa- fe dhaalikum balaa' min rabb -kum caz.em

wa- waacadnaa mosaa thalaathen laylah wa- atmamnaa -haa bi- cashr fa- tamma meqaat rabb -hi arbacen laylah wa- qaala mosaa li- 'akhe -hi haaron ukhluf -ne fe qawm -e wa- as.lih. wa- laa tattabic sabel al- mufsiden

wa- lammaa jaa'a mosaa li- meqaat -naa wa- kallama -hu rabb -hu qaala rabb ari -ne anz.ur 'ilay -ka qaala lan taraa -ne wa- laakin unz.ur 'ilaa al- jabal fa- 'in istaqarra makaan -hu fa- sawfa taraa -ne fa- lammaa tajallaa rabb -hu li- al- jabal jacala dakk(an) wa- kharra mosaa s.aciq(an) fa- lammaa afaaqa qaala subh.aana -ka tubtu 'ilay -ka wa- 'anaa 'awwal al- mu'minen
qaala yaa mosaa 'inni -y is.t.afaytu -ka calaa an- naas bi- risaalaat -e wa- bi- kalaam -e fa- khudh maa 'aataytu -ka wa- kun min ask- shaakiren
wa- katabnaa la- -hu fe al- alwaah. min kull shay' mawciz.ah wa- tafs.el(an) li- kull shay' fa- khudh -haa bi- qowah wa- u'mur qawm -ka ya'khudho bi- ah.san -haa sa- ure -kum daar al- faasiqen

sa- as.rif can 'aayaat -e 'alladhena yatakabbaron fe al- 'ard. bi- ghayr al- h.aqq wa- 'in yaraw kull 'aayah laa yu'mino bi- -haa wa- 'in yaraw sabel ar- rushd laa yattakhidho -hu sabel(an) wa- 'in yaraw sabel al- ghayy yattakhidho -hu sabel(an) dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa wa- kaano can -haa ghaafilen
wa- 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa wa- liqaa' al- 'aakhirah h.abit.at acmaal -hum hal yujzawn 'illaa maa kaano yacmalon
wa- ittakhadha qawm mosaa min bacdi -hi min h.uley -him cijl(an) jasad(an) la- -hu khuwaar 'a- lam yaraw 'anna -hu laa yukallim -hum wa- laa yahde -him sabel(an) ittakhadho -hu wa- kaano z.aalimen
wa- lammaa suqit.a fe ayde -him wa- ra'aw 'anna -hum qad d.allo qaalo la- 'in lam yarh.am -naa rabb -naa wa- yaghfir la- -naa la- nakonanna min al- khaasiren

wa- lammaa rajaca mosaa 'ilaa qawm -hi ghad.baan 'asif(an) qaala bi's maa khalaftumo -ne min bacdi -y 'a- cajiltum 'amr rabb -kum wa- alqaa al- alwaah. wa- 'akhadha bi- ra's 'akhe -hi yajurr -hu 'ilay -hi qaala ibn 'umm -a 'inna al- qawm istad.cafo -ne wa- kaado yaqtulon -ne fa- laa tushmit bi- -y al- acdaa' wa- laa tajcal -ne maca al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
qaala rabb -i ighfir li- -y wa- li- 'akh -e wa- adkhil -naa fe rah.mah -ka wa- 'anta arh.am ar- raah.imen
'inna 'alladhena ittakhadho al- cijl sa- yanaal -hum ghad.ab min rabb -him wa- dhillah fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- ka- dhaalika najze al- muftaren
wa- 'alladhena camilo as- sayyi'aat thumma taabo min bacdi -haa wa- 'aamano 'inna rabb -ka min bacdi -haa la- ghafor rah.em
wa- lammaa sakata can mosaa al- ghad.ab 'akhadha al- alwaah. wa- fe nuskhah -haa huda(n) wa- rah.mah li- 'alladhena hum li- rabb -him yarhabon

wa- ikhtaara mosaa qawm -hu sabcen rajul(an) li- meqaat -naa fa- lammaa 'akhadhat -hum ar- rajfah qaala rabb -i law shi'ta ahlakta -hum min qablu wa- 'eyaa -ya 'a- tuhlik -naa bi- maa facala as- sufahaa' min -naa 'in hiya 'illaa fitnah -ka tud.ill bi- -hi man tashaa' wa- tahde man tashaa' 'anta waley -naa fa- ighfir la- -naa wa- irh.am -naa wa- 'anta khayr al- ghaafiren

wa- uktub la- -naa fe haadhihi ad- dunyaa h.asanah wa- fe al- 'aakhirah 'in(na) -naa hudnaa 'ilay -ka qaala cadhaab -e us.eb bi- -hi man ashaa' wa- rah.mah -e wasicat kull shay' fa- sa- aktub -haa li- 'alladhena yattaqon wa- yu'ton az- zakaah wa- 'alladhena hum bi- 'aayaat -naa yu'minon

'alladhena yattabicon ar- rasol an- nabey al- 'ummey 'alladhe yajidon -hu maktob(an) cinda -hum fe at- tawraah wa- al- 'injel ya'mur -hum bi- al- macrof wa- yanhaa -hum can al- munkar wa- yuh.ill la- -hum at.- t.ayyibaat wa- yuh.arrim calay -him al- khabaa'ith wa- yad.ac can -hum 'is.r -hum wa- al- aghlaal 'allate kaanat calay -him fa- 'alladhena 'aamano bi- -hi wa- cazzaro -hu wa- nas.aro -hu wa- ittabaco an- nor 'alladhe unzila maca -hu 'olaa'ika hum al- muflih.on

qul yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas 'inni -y rasol 'allaah 'ilay -kum jamec(an) 'alladhe la- -hu mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa yuh.ye wa- yumet fa- 'aamino bi- 'allaah wa- rasol -hi an- nabey al- 'ummey 'alladhe yu'min bi- 'allaah wa- kalimaat -hi wa- ittabico -hu lacalla -kum tahtadon
wa- min qawm mosaa 'ummah yahdon bi- al- h.aqq wa- bi- -hi yacdilon

wa- qat.t.acnaa -hum ithnatai cashrah asbaat.(an) 'umam(an) wa- awh.aynaa 'ilaa mosaa 'idh istasqaa -hu qawm -hu 'an id.rib bi- cas.aa -ka al- h.ajar fa- inbajasat min -hu ithnataa cashrah cayn(an) qad calima kull unaas mashrab -hum wa- z.allalnaa calay -him al- ghamaam wa- anzalnaa calay -him al- mann wa- as- salwaa kulo min t.ayyibaat maa razaqnaa -kum wa- maa z.alamo -naa wa- laakin kaano anfus -hum yaz.limon
wa- 'idh qela la- -hum uskuno haadhihi al- qaryah wa- kulo min -haa h.aythu shi'tum wa- qolo h.it.t.ah wa- udkhulo al- baab sujjad(an) naghfir la- -kum khat.e'aat -kum sa- nazed al- muh.sinen
fa- baddala 'alladhena z.alamo min -hum qawl(an) ghayr 'alladhe qela la- -hum fa- arsalnaa calay -him rijz(an) min as- samaa' bi- maa kaano yaz.limon

wa- is'al -hum can al- qaryah 'allate kaanat h.aad.irah al- bah.r 'idh yacdon fe as- sabt 'idh ta'te -him h.etaan -hum yawm sabt -hum shurrac(an) wa- yawm laa yasbiton laa ta'te -him ka- dhaalika nablo -hum bi- maa kaano yafsuqon
wa- 'idh qaalat 'ummah min -hum li- ma(a) taciz.on qawm(an) 'allaah muhlik -hum 'aw mucadhdhib -hum cadhaab(an) shaded(an) qaalo macdhirah 'ilaa rabb -kum wa- lacalla -hum yattaqon
fa- lammaa naso maa dhukkiro bi- -hi anjaynaa 'alladhena yanhawn can as- so' wa- 'akhadhnaa 'alladhena z.alamo bi- cadhaab ba'es bi- maa kaano yafsuqon
fa- lammaa cataw can maa nuho can -hu qulnaa la- -hum kono qiradah khaasi'en
wa- 'idh ta'adhdhana rabb -ka la- yabcathanna calay -him 'ilaa yawm al- qiyaamah man yasom -hum so' al- cadhaab 'inna rabb -ka la- sarec al- ciqaab wa- 'inna -hu la- ghafor rah.em
wa- qat.t.acnaa -hum fe al- 'ard. 'umam(an) min -hum as.- s.aalih.on wa- min -hum dona dhaalika wa- balawnaa -hum bi- al- h.asanaat wa- as- sayyi'aat lacalla -hum yarjicon

fa- khalafa min bacdi -him khalf waritho al- kitaab ya'khudhon carad. haadhaa al- adnaa wa- yaqolon sa- yughfar la- -naa wa- 'in ya'ti -him carad. mithl -hu ya'khudho -hu 'a- lam yu'khadh calay -him methaaq al- kitaab 'an laa yaqolo calaa 'allaah 'illaa al- h.aqq wa- daraso maa fe -hi wa- ad- daar al- 'aakhirah khayr li- 'alladhena yattaqon 'a- fa- laa tacqilon
wa- 'alladhena yumassikon bi- al- kitaab wa- aqaamo as.- s.alaah 'in(na) -naa laa nud.ec 'ajr al- mus.lih.en
wa- 'idh nataqnaa al- jabal fawqa -hum ka-'anna -hu z.ullah wa- z.anno 'anna -hu waaqic bi- -him khudho maa 'aataynaa -kum bi- qowah wa- udhkuro maa fe -hi lacalla -kum tattaqon

wa- 'idh 'akhadha rabb -ka min bane 'aadam min z.uhor -him dhurreyah -hum wa- ashhada -hum calaa anfus -him 'a- lastu bi- rabb -kum qaalo balaa shahidnaa 'an taqolo yawm al- qiyaamah 'in(na) -naa kunnaa can haadhaa ghaafilen
'aw taqolo 'inna-maa ashraka 'aabaa' -naa min qablu wa- kunnaa dhurreyah min bacdi -him 'a- fa- tuhlik -naa bi- maa facala al- mubt.ilon
wa- ka- dhaalika nufas.s.il al- 'aayaat wa- lacalla -hum yarjicon
wa- utlu calay -him naba' 'alladhe 'aataynaa -hu 'aayaat -naa fa- insalakha min -haa fa- atbaca -hu ash- shayt.aan fa- kaana min al- ghaawen

wa- law shi'naa la- rafacnaa -hu bi- -haa wa- laakinna -hu akhlada 'ilaa al- 'ard. wa- ittabaca hawaa -hu fa- mathal -hu ka- mathal al- kalb 'in tah.mil calay -hi yalhath 'aw tatruk -hu yalhath dhaalika mathal al- qawm 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa fa- uqs.us. al- qas.as. lacalla -hum yatafakkaron
saa'a mathal(an) al- qawm 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa wa- anfus -hum kaano yaz.limon
man yahdi 'allaah fa- huwa al- muhtade wa- man yud.lil fa- 'olaa'ika hum al- khaasiron

wa- la- qad dhara'naa li- jahannam kather(an) min al- jinn wa- al- 'ins la- -hum qulob laa yafqahon bi- -haa wa- la- -hum acyun laa yubs.iron bi- -haa wa- la- -hum 'aadhaan laa yasmacon bi- -haa 'olaa'ika ka- al- ancaam bal hum ad.all 'olaa'ika hum al- ghaafilon
wa- li- 'allaah al- asmaa' al- h.usnaa fa- udco -hu bi- -haa wa- dharo 'alladhena yulh.idon fe asmaa' -hi sa- yujzawn maa kaano yacmalon
wa- min man khalaqnaa 'ummah yahdon bi- al- h.aqq wa- bi- -hi yacdilon
wa- 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa sa- nastadrij -hum min h.aythu laa yaclamon
wa- umle la- -hum 'inna kayd -e maten
'a- wa- lam yatafakkaro maa bi- s.aah.ib -him min jinnah 'inna huwa 'illaa nadher muben
'a- wa- lam yanz.uro fe malakot as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa khalaqa 'allaah min shay' wa- 'an casaa 'an yakon qad iqtaraba 'ajal -hum fa- bi- 'ayy h.adeth bacda -hu yu'minon
man yud.lil 'allaah fa- laa haadiy la- -hu wa- yadhar -hum fe t.ughyaan -him yacmahon

yas'alon -ka can as- saacah 'ayyaana mursaa -haa qul 'inna-maa cilm -haa cinda rabb -e laa yujalle -haa li- waqt -haa 'illaa huwa thaqulat fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. laa ta'te -kum 'illaa baghtah yas'alon -ka ka-'anna -ka h.afey can -haa qul 'inna-maa cilm -haa cinda 'allaah wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yaclamon

qul laa amlik li- nafs -e nafc(an) wa- laa d.arr(an) 'illaa maa shaa'a 'allaah wa- law kuntu aclam al- ghayb la- istakthartu min al- khayr wa- maa massa -ne as- so' 'in 'anaa 'illaa nadher wa- basher li- qawm yu'minon

huwa 'alladhe khalaqa -kum min nafs waah.idah wa- jacala min -haa zawj -haa li- yaskun 'ilay -haa fa- lammaa taghashshaa -haa h.amalat h.aml(an) khafef(an) fa- marrat bi- -hi fa- lammaa athqalat dacawaa 'allaah rabb -humaa la- 'in 'aatayta -naa s.aalih.(an) la- nakonanna min ask- shaakiren
fa- lammaa 'aataa -humaa s.aalih.(an) jacalaa la- -hu shurakaa' fe maa 'ataa -humaa fa- tacaalaa 'allaah can maa yushrikon
'a- yushrikon maa laa yakhluq shay'(an) wa- hum yukhlaqon
wa- laa yastat.econ la- -hum nas.r(an) wa- laa anfus -hum yans.uron
wa- 'in tadcon -hum 'ilaa al- hudaa laa yattabico -kum sawaa' calay -kum 'a- dacawtumo -hum 'am 'antum s.aamiton
'inna 'alladhena tadcon min doni 'allaah cibaad amthaal -kum fa- udco -hum fa- li- yastajebo la- -kum 'in kuntum s.aadiqen

'a- la- -hum arjul yamshon bi- -haa 'am la- -hum aydi(n) yabt.ishon bi- -haa 'am la- -hum acyun yubs.iron bi- -haa 'am la- -hum 'aadhaan yasmacon bi- -haa qul udco shurakaa' -kum thumma kedo -ni fa- laa tunz.iro -ni
'inna waley -ya 'allaah 'alladhe nazzala al- kitaab wa- huwa yatawallaa as.- s.aalih.en
wa- 'alladhena tadcon min doni -hi laa yastat.econ nas.r -kum wa- laa anfus -hum yans.uron
wa- 'in tadcon -hum 'ilaa al- hudaa laa yasmaco wa- taraa -hum yanz.uron 'ilay -ka wa- hum laa yubs.iron
khudh al- cafw wa- u'mur bi- al- curf wa- acrid. can al- jaahilen
wa- 'immaa yanzaghanna -ka min ash- shayt.aan nazgh fa- istacidh bi- 'allaah 'inna -hu samec calem
'inna 'alladhena ittaqaw 'idhaa massa -hum t.aa'if min ash- shayt.aan tadhakkaro fa- 'idhaa hum mubs.iron
wa- 'ikhwaan -hum yamuddon -hum fe al- ghayy thumma laa yuqs.iron
wa- 'idhaa lam ta'ti -him bi- 'aayah qaalo law-laa ijtabayta -haa qul 'inna-maa attabic maa yoh.aa 'ilay -ya min rabb -e haadhaa bas.aa'ir min rabb -kum wa- huda(n) wa- rah.mah li- qawm yu'minon
wa- 'idhaa quri'a al- qur'aan fa- istamico la- -hu wa- ans.ito lacalla -kum turh.amon
wa- adhkur rabb -ka fe nafs -ka tad.arruc(an) wa- khefah wa- dona al- jahr min al- qawl bi- al- ghudow wa- al- 'aas.aal wa- laa takun min al- ghaafilen
'inna 'alladhena cinda rabb -ka laa yastakbiron can cibaadah -hi wa- yusabbih.on -hu wa- la- -hu yasjudon
yas'alon -ka can al- anfaal qul al- anfaal li- 'allaah wa- ar- rasol fa- ittaqo 'allaah wa- as.lih.o dhaat bayna -kum wa- at.eco 'allaah wa- rasol -hu 'in kuntum mu'minen
'inna-maa al- mu'minon 'alladhena 'idhaa dhukira 'allaah wajilat qulob -hum wa- 'idhaa tuliyat calay -him 'aayaat -hu zaadat -hum 'emaan(an) wa- calaa rabb -him yatawakkalon
'alladhena yuqemon as.- s.alaah wa- min maa razaqnaa -hum yunfiqon
'olaa'ika hum al- mu'minon h.aqq(an) la- -hum darajaat cinda rabb -him wa- maghfirah wa- rizq karem
ka-maa akhraja -ka rabb -ka min bayt -ka bi- al- h.aqq wa- 'inna fareq(an) min al- mu'minen la- kaarihon
yujaadilon -ka fe al- h.aqq bacda maa tabayyana ka-'anna maa yusaaqon 'ilaa al- mawt wa- hum yanz.uron

wa- 'idh yacid -kum 'allaah 'ih.daa at.- t.aa'ifatain 'anna -haa la- -kum wa- tawaddon 'anna ghayr dhaat ash- shawkah takon la- -kum wa- yured 'allaah 'an yuh.iqq al- h.aqq bi- kalimaat -hi wa- yaqt.ac daabir al- kaafiren
li- yuh.iqq al- h.aqq wa- yubt.il al- baat.il wa- law kariha al- mujrimon
'idh tastaghethon rabb -kum fa- istajaaba la- -kum 'an(na) -ne mumidd -kum bi- 'alf min al- malaa'ikah murdifen
wa- maa jacala -hu 'allaah 'illaa bushraa wa- li- tat.ma'inn bi- -hi qulob -kum wa- maa an- nas.r 'illaa min cindi 'allaah 'inna 'allaah cazez h.akem

'idh yughashshe -kum an- nucaas 'amanah min -hu wa- yunazzil calay -kum min as- samaa' maa' li- yut.ahhir -kum bi- -hi wa- yudhhib can -kum rijz ash- shayt.aan wa- li- yarbit. calaa qulob -kum wa- yuthabbit bi- -hi al- aqdaam

'idh yoh.e rabb -ka 'ilaa al- malaa'ikah 'an(na) -ne maca -kum fa- thabbito 'alladhena 'aamano sa- ulqe fe qulob 'alladhena kafaro ar- rucb fa- id.ribo fawqa al- acnaaq wa- id.ribo min -hum kull banaan
dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum shaaqqo 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- man yushaaqiq 'allaah wa- rasol -hu fa- 'inna 'allaah shaded al- ciqaab
dhaalikum fa- dhoqo -hu wa- 'anna li- al- kaafiren cadhaab an- naar
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'idhaa laqetum 'alladhena kafaro zah.f(an) fa- laa tuwallo -hum al- adbaar
wa- man yuwalli -him yawma'idhin dubur -hu 'illaa mutah.arrif(an) li- qitaal 'aw mutah.ayyiz(an) 'ilaa fi'ah fa- qad baa'a bi- ghad.ab min 'allaah wa- ma'waa -hu jahannam wa- bi's al- mas.er
fa- lam taqtulo -hum wa- laakin 'allaah qatala -hum wa- maa ramayta 'idh ramayta wa- laakin 'allaah ramaa wa- li- yubliya al- mu'minen min -hu balaa' h.asan(an) 'inna 'allaah samec calem
dhaalikum wa- 'anna 'allaah mohin kayd al- kaafiren

'in tastaftih.o fa- qad jaa'a -kum al- fath. wa- 'in tantaho fa- huwa khayr la- -kum wa- 'in tacodo nacud wa- lan tughne can -kum fi'ah -kum shay'(an) wa- law kathurat wa- 'anna 'allaah maca al- mu'minen
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano at.eco 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- laa tawallaw can -hu wa- 'antum tasmacon
wa- laa takono ka- 'alladhena qaalo samicnaa wa- hum laa yasmacon
'inna sharr ad- dawaabb cinda 'allaah as.- s.umm al- bukm 'alladhena laa yacqilon
wa- law calima 'allaah fe -him khayr(an) la- asmaca -hum wa- law asmaca -hum la- tawallaw wa- hum mucrid.on

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano istajebo li- 'allaah wa- li- ar- rasol 'idhaa dacaa -kum li- maa yuh.ye -kum wa- iclamo 'anna 'allaah yah.ol bayna al- mar' wa- qalb -hi wa- 'anna -hu 'ilay -hi tuh.sharon
wa- ittaqo fitnah laa tus.ebanna 'alladhena z.alamo min -kum khaas.s.ah wa- iclamo 'anna 'allaah shaded al- ciqaab

wa- udhkuro 'idh 'antum qalel mustad.cafon fe al- 'ard. takhaafon 'an yatakhat.t.afa -kum an- naas fa- 'aawaa -kum wa- 'ayyada -kum bi- nas.r -hi wa- razaqa -kum min at.- t.ayyibaat lacalla -kum tashkuron
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa takhono 'allaah wa- ar- rasol wa- takhono 'amaanaat -kum wa- 'antum taclamon
wa- iclamo 'anna-maa amwaal -kum wa- awlaad -kum fitnah wa- 'anna 'allaah cinda -hu 'ajr caz.em
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'in tattaqo 'allaah yajcal la- -kum furqaan(an) wa- yukaffir can -kum sayyi'aat -kum wa- yaghfir la- -kum wa- 'allaah dho al- fad.l al- caz.em
wa- 'idh yamkur bi- -ka 'alladhena kafaro li- yuthbito -ka 'aw yaqtulo -ka 'aw yukhrijo -ka wa- yamkuron wa- yamkur 'allaah wa- 'allaah khayr al- maakiren
wa- 'idhaa tutlaa calay -him 'aayaat -naa qaalo qad samicnaa law nashaa' la- qulnaa mithl haadhaa 'in haadhaa 'illaa asaat.er al- 'awwalen
wa- 'idh qaalo 'allaahumma 'in kaana haadhaa huwa al- h.aqq min cindi -ka fa- amt.ir calay -naa h.ijaarah min as- samaa' 'aw i'ti -naa bi- cadhaab 'alem
wa- maa kaana 'allaah li- yucadhdhib -hum wa- 'anta fe -him wa- maa kaana 'allaah mucadhdhib -hum wa- hum yastaghfiron
wa- maa la- -hum 'an laa yucadhdhib -hum 'allaah wa- hum yas.uddon can al- masjid al- h.araam wa- maa kaano awliyaa' -hu 'in awliyaa' -hu 'illaa al- muttaqon wa- laakin akthar -hum laa yaclamon
wa- maa kaana s.alaah -hum cinda al- bayt 'illaa mukaa' wa- tas.diyah fa- dhoqo al- cadhaab bi- maa kuntum takfuron
'inna 'alladhena kafaro yunfiqon amwaal -hum li- yas.uddo can sabel 'allaah fa- sa- yunfiqon -haa thumma takon calay -him h.asrah thumma yughlabon wa- 'alladhena kafaro 'ilaa jahannam yuh.sharon
li- yamez 'allaah al- khabeth min at.- t.ayyib wa- yajcal al- khabeth bacd. -hu calaa bacd. fa- yarkum -hu jamec(an) fa- yajcal -hu fe jahannam 'olaa'ika hum al- khaasiron
qul li- 'alladhena kafaro 'in yantaho yughfar la- -hum maa qad salafa wa- 'in yacodo fa- qad mad.at sunnah al- 'awwalen
wa- qaatilo -hum h.attaa laa takon fitnah wa- yakon ad- den kull -hu li- 'allaah fa- 'in intahaw fa- 'inna 'allaah bi- maa yacmalon bas.er
wa- 'in tawallaw fa- iclamo 'anna 'allaah mawlaa -kum nicma al- mawlaa wa- nicma an- nas.er

wa- iclamo 'anna maa ghanimtum min shay' fa- 'anna li- 'allaah khumus -hu wa- li- ar- rasol wa- li- dhe al- qurbaa wa- al- yataamaa wa- al- masaaken wa- ibn as- sabel 'in kuntum 'aamantum bi- 'allaah wa- maa anzalnaa calaa cabd -naa yawm al- furqaan yawm iltaqaa al- jamcaan wa- 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader

'idh 'antum bi- al- cudwah ad- dunyaa wa- hum bi- al- cudwah al- qus.waa wa- ar- rakb asfal min -kum wa- law tawaacadtum la- ikhtalaftum fe al- mecaad wa- laakin li- yaqd.iya 'allaah 'amr(an) kaana mafcol(an) li- yahlik man halaka can bayyinah wa- yah.yaa man h.ayya can bayyinah wa- 'inna 'allaah la- samec calem
'idh yure -ka -hum 'allaah fe manaam -ka qalel(an) wa- law araa -ka -hum kather(an) la- fashiltum wa- la- tanaazactum fe al- 'amr wa- laakin 'allaah sallama 'inna -hu calem bi- dhaat as.- s.udor
wa- 'idh yure -kum -hum 'idh iltaqaytum fe acyun -kum qalel(an) wa- yuqallil -kum fe acyun -him li- yaqd.iya 'allaah 'amr(an) kaana mafcol(an) wa- 'ilaa 'allaah turjac al- 'umor
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'idhaa laqetum fi'ah fa- uthbuto wa- udhkuro 'allaah kather(an) lacalla -kum tuflih.on
wa- at.eco 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- laa tanaazaco fa- tafshalo wa- tadhhab reh. -kum wa- is.biro 'inna 'allaah maca as.- s.aabiren
wa- laa takono ka- 'alladhena kharajo min diyaar -him bat.ar(an) wa- ri'aa' an- naas wa- yas.uddon can sabel 'allaah wa- 'allaah bi- maa yacmalon muh.et.

wa- 'idh zayyana la- -hum ash- shayt.aan acmaal -hum wa- qaala laa ghaalib la- -kum al- yawm min an- naas wa- 'inni -y jaar la- -kum fa- lammaa taraa'at al- fi'ataan nakas.a calaa caqibai -hi wa- qaala 'inni -y bare' min -kum 'inni -y araa maa laa tarawn 'inni -y akhaaf 'allaah wa- 'allaah shaded al- ciqaab
'idh yaqol al- munaafiqon wa- 'alladhena fe qulob -him marad. gharra haa'ulaa'i den -hum wa- man yatawakkal calaa 'allaah fa- 'inna 'allaah cazez h.akem
wa- law taraa 'idh yatawaffaa 'alladhena kafaro al- malaa'ikah yad.ribon wujoh -hum wa- adbaar -hum wa- dhoqo cadhaab al- h.areq
dhaalika bi- maa qaddamat ayde -kum wa- 'anna 'allaah laysa bi- z.allaam li- al- cabed
ka- da'b 'aal fircawn wa- 'alladhena min qabli -him kafaro bi- 'aayaat 'allaah fa- 'akhadha -hum 'allaah bi- dhunob -him 'inna 'allaah qawey shaded al- ciqaab
dhaalika bi- 'anna 'allaah lam yaku(n) mughayyir(an) nicmah ancama -haa calaa qawm h.attaa yughayyiro maa bi- anfus -him wa- 'anna 'allaah samec calem
ka- da'b 'aal fircawn wa- 'alladhena min qabli -him kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat rabb -him fa- ahlaknaa -hum bi- dhunob -him wa- aghraqnaa 'aal fircawn wa- kull kaano z.aalimen
'inna sharr ad- dawaabb cinda 'allaah 'alladhena kafaro fa- hum laa yu'minon
'alladhena caahadta min -hum thumma yanqud.on cahd -hum fe kull marrah wa- hum laa yattaqon
fa- 'immaa tathqafanna -hum fe al- h.arb fa- sharrid bi- -him man khalfa -hum lacalla -hum yadhdhakkaron
wa- 'immaa takhaafanna min qawm khiyaanah fa- inbidh 'ilay -him calaa sawaa' 'inna 'allaah laa yuh.ibb al- khaa'inen
wa- laa yah.sabanna 'alladhena kafaro sabaqo 'inna -hum laa yucjizon

wa- aciddo la- -hum maa istat.actum min qowah wa- min ribaat. al- khayl turhibon bi- -hi cadow 'allaah wa- cadow -kum wa- 'aakharen min doni -him laa taclamon -hum 'allaah yaclam -hum wa- maa tunfiqo min shay' fe sabel 'allaah yuwaffa 'ilay -kum wa- 'antum laa tuz.lamon
wa- 'inna janah.o li- as- salm fa- ijnah. la- -haa wa- tawakkal calaa 'allaah 'inna -hu huwa as- samec al- calem
wa- 'in yuredo 'an yakhdaco -ka fa- 'inna h.asb -ka 'allaah huwa 'alladhe 'ayyada -ka bi- nas.r -hi wa- bi- al- mu'minen
wa- 'allafa bayna qulob -him law anfaqta maa fe al- 'ard. jamec(an) maa 'allafta bayna qulob -him wa- laakin 'allaah 'allafa bayna -hum 'inna -hu cazez h.akem
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- nabey h.asb -ka 'allaah wa- man ittabaca -ka min al- mu'minen

yaa 'ayyuhaa an- nabey h.arrid. al- mu'minen calaa al- qitaal 'in yakun min -kum cishron s.aabiron yaghlibo mi'atain wa- 'in yakun min -kum mi'ah yaghlibo 'alf(an) min 'alladhena kafaro bi- 'anna -hum qawm laa yafqahon

al-'aan khaffafa 'allaah can -kum wa- calima 'anna fe -kum d.acf(an) fa- 'in yakun min -kum mi'ah s.aabirah yaghlibo mi'atain wa- 'in yakun min -kum 'alf yaghlibo 'alfain bi- 'idhn 'allaah wa- 'allaah maca as.- s.aabiren
maa kaana li- nabey 'an yakon la- -hu asraa h.attaa yuthkhin fe al- 'ard. turedon carad. ad- dunyaa wa- 'allaah yured al- 'aakhirah wa- 'allaah cazez h.akem
law-laa kitaab min 'allaah sabaqa la- massa -kum fe maa 'akhadhtum cadhaab caz.em
fa- kulo min maa ghanimtum h.alaal(an) t.ayyib(an) wa- ittaqo 'allaah 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- nabey qul li- man fe ayde -kum min al- 'asraa 'in yaclam 'allaah fe qulob -kum khayr(an) yu'ti -kum khayr(an) min maa 'ukhidha min -kum wa- yaghfir la- -kum wa- 'allaah ghafor rah.em
wa- 'in yuredo khiyaanah -ka fa- qad khaano 'allaah min qablu fa- amkana min -hum wa- 'allaah calem h.akem

'inna 'alladhena 'aamano wa- haajaro wa- jaahado bi- amwaal -him wa- anfus -him fe sabel 'allaah wa- 'alladhena 'aawaw wa- nas.aro 'olaa'ika bacd. -hum awliyaa' bacd. wa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- lam yuhaajiro maa la- -kum min walaayah -him min shay' h.attaa yuhaajiro wa- 'in istans.aro -kum fe ad- den fa- calay -kum an- nas.r 'illaa calaa qawm bayna -kum wa- bayna -hum methaaq wa- 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon bas.er
wa- 'alladhena kafaro bacd. -hum awliyaa' bacd. 'illaa tafcalo -hu takun fitnah fe al- 'ard. wa- fasaad kaber
wa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- haajaro wa- jaahado fe sabel 'allaah wa- 'alladhena 'aawaw wa- nas.aro 'olaa'ika hum al- mu'minon h.aqq(an) la- -hum maghfirah wa- rizq karem
wa- 'alladhena 'aamano min bacdu wa- haajaro wa- jaahado maca -kum fa- 'olaa'ika min -kum wa- 'olo al- arh.aam bacd. -hu awlaa bi- bacd. fe kitaab 'allaah 'inna 'allaah bi- kull shay' calem
baraa'ah min 'allaah wa- rasol -hi 'ilaa 'alladhena caahadtum min al- mushriken
fa- seh.o fe al- 'ard. arbacah ashhur wa- iclamo 'anna -kum ghayr mucjize 'allaah wa- 'anna 'allaah mukhze al- kaafiren

wa- 'adhaan min 'allaah wa- rasol -hi 'ilaa an- naas yawm al- h.ajj al- akbar 'anna 'allaah bare' min al- mushriken wa- rasol -hu fa- 'in tubtum fa- huwa khayr la- -kum wa- 'in tawallaytum fa- iclamo 'anna -kum ghayr mucjize 'allaah wa- bashshir 'alladhena kafaro bi- cadhaab 'alem

'illaa 'alladhena caahadtum min al- mushriken thumma lam yanqus.o -kum shay'(an) wa- lam yuz.aahiro calay -kum 'ah.ad(an) fa- atimmo 'ilay -him cahd -hum 'ilaa muddah -him 'inna 'allaah yuh.ibb al- muttaqen

fa- 'idhaa insalakha al- ashhur al- h.urum fa- uqtulo al- mushriken h.aythu wajadtumo -hum wa- khudho -hum wa- uh.s.uro -hum wa- uqcudo la- -hum kull mars.ad fa- 'in taabo wa- aqaamo as.- s.alaah wa- 'aataw az- zakaah fa- khallo sabel -hum 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em
wa- 'in 'ah.ad min al- mushriken istajaara -ka fa- ajir -hu h.attaa yasmac kalaam 'allaah thumma abligh -hu ma'man -hu dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum qawm laa yaclamon

kayfa yakon li- al- mushriken cahd cinda 'allaah wa- cinda rasol -hi 'illaa 'alladhena caahadtum cinda al- masjid al- h.araam fa- maa istaqaamo la- -kum fa- istaqemo la- -hum 'inna 'allaah yuh.ibb al- muttaqen
kayfa wa- 'in yaz.haro calay -kum laa yarqubo fe -kum 'ill(an) wa- laa dhimmah yurd.on -kum bi- afwaah -him wa- ta'baa qulob -hum wa- akthar -hum faasiqon
ishtaraw bi- 'aayaat 'allaah thaman(an) qalel(an) fa- s.addo can sabel -hi 'inna -hum saa'a maa kaano yacmalon
laa yarqubon fe mu'min 'ill(an) wa- laa dhimmah wa- 'olaa'ika hum al- muctadon
fa- 'in taabo wa- aqaamo as.- s.alaah wa- 'aataw az- zakaah fa- 'ikhwaan -kum fe ad- den wa- nufas.s.il al- 'aayaat li- qawm yaclamon
wa- 'in nakatho aymaan -hum min bacdi cahd -him wa- ta.cano fe den -kum fa- qaatilo a'immah al- kufr 'inna -hum laa aymaan la- -hum lacalla -hum yantahon
'a-laa tuqaatilon qawm(an) nakatho aymaan -hum wa- hammo bi- ikhraaj ar- rasol wa- hum bada'o -kum 'awwal marrah 'a- takhshaw -hum fa- 'allaah ah.aqq 'an takhshaw -hu 'in kuntum mu'minen
qaatilo -hum yucadhdhib -hum 'allaah bi- ayde -kum wa- yukhzi -him wa- yans.ur -kum calay -him wa- yashfi s.udor qawm mu'minen
wa- yudhhib ghayz. qulob -him wa- yatob 'allaah calaa man yashaa' wa- 'allaah calem h.akem
'am h.asibtum 'an tutrako wa- lammaa yaclam 'allaah 'alladhena jaahado min -kum wa- lam yattakhidho min doni 'allaah wa- laa rasol -hi wa- laa al- mu'minen walejah wa- 'allaah khaber bi- maa tacmalon
maa kaana li- al- mushriken 'an yacmuro masaajid 'allaah shaahiden calaa anfus -him bi- al- kufr 'olaa'ika h.abit.at acmaal -hum wa- fe an- naar hum khaalidon

'inna-maa yacmur masaajid 'allaah man 'aamana bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- aqaama as.- s.alaah wa- 'aataa az- zakaah wa- lam yakhsha 'illaa 'allaah fa- casaa 'olaa'ika 'an yakono min al- muhtaden

'a- jacaltum siqaayah al- h.aajj wa- cimaarah al- masjid al- h.araam ka- man 'aamana bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- jaahada fe sabel 'allaah laa yastawon cinda 'allaah wa- 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
'alladhena 'aamano wa- haajaro wa- jaahado fe sabel 'allaah bi- amwaal -him wa- anfus -him acz.am darajah cinda 'allaah wa- 'olaa'ika hum al- faa'izon
yubashshir -hum rabb -hum bi- rah.mah min -hu wa- rid.waan wa- jannaat la- -hum fe -haa nacem muqem
khaaliden fe -haa 'abad(an) 'inna 'allaah cinda -hu 'ajr caz.em
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tattakhidho 'aabaa' -kum wa- 'ikhwaan -kum awliyaa' 'in istah.abbo al- kufr calaa al- 'emaan wa- man yatawalla -hum min -kum fa- 'olaa'ika hum az.- z.aalimon

qul 'in kaana 'aabaa' -kum wa- abnaa' -kum wa- 'ikhwaan -kum wa- azwaaj -kum wa- casherah -kum wa- amwaal iqtaraftumo -haa wa- tijaarah takhshawn kasaad -haa wa- masaakin tard.awn -haa ah.abb 'ilay -kum min 'allaah wa- rasol -hi wa- jihaad fe sabel -hi fa- tarabbas.o h.attaa ya'tiya 'allaah bi- 'amr -hi wa- 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm al- faasiqen

la- qad nas.ara -kum 'allaah fe mawaat.in katherah wa- yawm h.unayn 'idh acjabat -kum kathrah -kum fa- lam tughni can -kum shay'(an) wa- d.aaqat calay -kum al- 'ard. bi- maa rah.ubat thumma wallaytum mudbiren
thumma anzala 'allaah sakenah -hu calaa rasol -hi wa- calaa al- mu'minen wa- anzala junod(an) lam taraw -haa wa- cadhdhaba 'alladhena kafaro wa- dhaalika jazaa' al- kaafiren
thumma yatob 'allaah min bacdi dhaalika calaa man yashaa' wa- 'allaah ghafor rah.em

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'inna-maa al- mushrikon najas fa- laa yaqrabo al- masjid al- h.araam bacda caam -hum haadhaa wa- 'in khiftum caylah fa- sawfa yughne -kum 'allaah min fad.l -hi 'in shaa'a 'inna 'allaah calem h.akem

qaatilo 'alladhena laa yu'minon bi- 'allaah wa- laa bi- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- laa yuh.arrimon maa h.arrama 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- laa yadenon den al- h.aqq min 'alladhena 'oto al- kitaab h.attaa yuct.o al- jizyah can yad wa- hum s.aaghiron

wa- qaalat al- yahod cuzayr ibn 'allaah wa- qaalat an- nas.aaraa al- maseh. ibn 'allaah dhaalika qawl -hum bi- afwaah -him yud.aahi'on qawl 'alladhena kafaro min qablu qaatala -hum 'allaah 'annaa yu'fakon

ittakhadho ah.baar -hum wa- ruhbaan -hum arbaab(an) min doni 'allaah wa- al- maseh. ibn maryam wa- maa 'umiro 'illaa li- yacbudo 'ilaah(an) waah.id(an) laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa subh.aana -hu can maa yushrikon
yuredon 'an yut.fi' nor 'allaah bi- afwaah -him wa- ya'baa 'allaah 'illaa 'an yutimm nor -hu wa- law kariha al- kaafiron
huwa 'alladhe arsala rasol -hu bi- al- hudaa wa- den al- h.aqq li- yuz.hir -hu calaa ad- den kull -hi wa- law kariha al- mushrikon

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'inna kather(an) min al- ah.baar wa- ar- ruhbaan la- ya'kulon amwaal an- naas bi- al- baat.il wa- yas.uddon can sabel 'allaah wa- 'alladhena yaknizon adh- dhahab wa- al- fid.d.ah wa- laa yunfiqon -haa fe sabel 'allaah fa- bashshir -hum bi- cadhaab 'alem
yawm yuh.maa calay -haa fe naar jahannam fa- tukwaa bi- -haa jibaah -hum wa- junob -hum wa- z.uhor -hum haadhaa maa kanaztum li- anfus -kum fa- dhoqo maa kuntum taknizon

'inna ciddah ash- shuhor cinda 'allaah ithnaa cashar shahr(an) fe kitaab 'allaah yawm khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. min -haa arbacah h.urum dhaalika ad- den al- qayyim fa- laa taz.limo fe -hinna anfus -kum wa- qaatilo al- mushriken kaaffah ka-maa yuqaatilon -kum kaaffah wa- iclamo 'anna 'allaah maca al- muttaqen

'inna-maa an- nase' ziyaadah fe al- kufr yud.all bi- -hi 'alladhena kafaro yuh.illon -hu caam(an) wa- yuh.arrimon -hu caam(an) li- yuwaat.i'o ciddah maa h.arrama 'allaah fa- yuh.illo maa h.arrama 'allaah zuyyina la- -hum so' acmaal -hum wa- 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm al- kaafiren

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano maa la- -kum 'idhaa qela la- -kum anfiro fe sabel 'allaah iththaaqaltum 'ilaa al- 'ard. 'a- rad.etum bi- al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa min al- 'aakhirah fa- maa mataac al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa fe al- 'aakhirah 'illaa qalel
'illaa tanfiro yucadhdhib -kum cadhaab(an) 'alem(an) wa- yastabdil qawm(an) ghayr -kum wa- laa tad.urro -hu shay'(an) wa- 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader

'illaa tans.uro -hu fa- qad nas.ara -hu 'allaah 'idh akhraja -hu 'alladhena kafaro thaane ithnain 'idh humaa fe al- ghaar 'idh yaqol li- s.aah.ib -hi laa tah.zan 'inna 'allaah maca -naa fa- anzala 'allaah sakenah -hu calay -hi wa- 'ayyada -hu bi- junod lam taraw -haa wa- jacala kalimah 'alladhena kafaro as- suflaa wa- kalimah 'allaah hiya al- culyaa wa- 'allaah cazez h.akem
infiro khifaaf(an) wa- thiqaal(an) wa- jaahido bi- amwaal -kum wa- anfus -kum fe sabel 'allaah dhaalikum khayr la- -kum 'in kuntum taclamon

law kaana carad.(an) qareb(an) wa- safar(an) qaas.id(an) la- ittabaco -ka wa- laakin bacudat calay -him ash- shuqqah wa- sa- yah.lifon bi- 'allaah law istat.acnaa la- kharajnaa maca -kum yuhlikon anfus -hum wa- 'allaah yaclam 'inna -hum la- kaadhibon
cafaa 'allaah can -ka li- ma(a) 'adhinta la- -hum h.attaa yatabayyan la- -ka 'alladhena s.adaqo wa- taclam al- kaadhiben
laa yasta'dhin -ka 'alladhena yu'minon bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir 'an yujaahido bi- amwaal -him wa- anfus -him wa- 'allaah calem bi- al- muttaqen
'inna-maa yasta'dhin -ka 'alladhena laa yu'minon bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- irtaabat qulob -hum fa- hum fe rayb -him yataraddadon
wa- law araado al- khuroj la- acaddo la- -hu cuddah wa- laakin kariha 'allaah inbicaath -hum fa- thabbat.a -hum wa- qela uqcudo maca al- qaaciden
law kharajo fe -kum maa zaado -kum 'illaa khabaal(an) wa- la- awd.aco khilaal -kum yabghon -kum al- fitnah wa- fe -kum sammaacon la- -hum wa- 'allaah calem bi- az.- z.aalimen
la- qad ibtaghaw al- fitnah min qablu wa- qallabo la- -ka al- 'umor h.attaa jaa'a al- h.aqq wa- z.ahara 'amr 'allaah wa- hum kaarihon
wa- min -hum man yaqol i'dhan li- -y wa- laa taftin -ne 'a-laa fe al- fitnah saqat.o wa- 'inna jahannam la- muh.et.ah bi- al- kaafiren
'in tus.ib -ka h.asanah tasu' -hum wa- 'in tus.ib -ka mus.ebah yaqolo qad 'akhadhnaa 'amr -naa min qablu wa- yatawallaw wa- hum farih.on
qul lan yus.eb -naa 'illaa maa kataba 'allaah la- -naa huwa mawlaa -naa wa- calaa 'allaah fa- li- yatawakkal al- mu'minon

qul hal tarabbas.on bi- -naa 'illaa 'ih.daa al- h.usnayain wa- nah.nu natarabbas. bi- -kum 'an yus.eb -kum 'allaah bi- cadhaab min cindi -hi 'aw bi- ayde -naa fa- tarabbas.o 'inna -naa maca -kum mutarabbis.on
qul anfiqo t.awc(an) 'aw karh(an) lan yutaqabbal min -kum 'inna -kum kuntum qawm(an) faasiqen

wa- maa manaca -hum 'an tuqbal min -hum nafaqaat -hum 'illaa 'anna -hum kafaro bi- 'allaah wa- bi- rasol -hi wa- laa ya'ton as.- s.alaah 'illaa wa- hum kusaalaa wa- laa yunfiqon 'illaa wa- hum kaarihon
fa- laa tucjib -ka amwaal -hum wa- laa awlaad -hum 'inna-maa yured 'allaah li- yucadhdhib -hum bi- -haa fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- tazhaq anfus -hum wa- hum kaafiron
wa- yah.lifon bi- 'allaah 'inna -hum la- min -kum wa- maa hum min -kum wa- laakin -hum qawm yafraqon
law yajidon malja'(an) 'aw maghaaraat 'aw muddakhal(an) la- wallaw 'ilay -hi wa- hum yajmah.on
wa- min -hum man yalmiz -ka fe as.- s.adaqaat fa- 'in uct.o min -haa rad.o wa- 'in lam yuct.o min -haa 'idhaa hum yaskhat.on
wa- law 'anna -hum rad.o maa 'aataa -hum 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- qaalo h.asb -naa 'allaah sa- yu'te -naa 'allaah min fad.l -hi wa- rasol -hu 'in(na) -naa 'ilaa 'allaah raaghibon

'inna-maa as.- s.adaqaat li- al- fuqaraa' wa- al- masaaken wa- al- caamilen calay -haa wa- al- mu'allafah qulob -hum wa- fe ar- riqaab wa- al- ghaarimen wa- fe sabel 'allaah wa- ibn as- sabel fared.ah min 'allaah wa- 'allaah calem h.akem

wa- min -hum 'alladhena yu'dhon an- nabey wa- yaqolon huwa 'udhun qul 'udhun khayr la- -kum yu'min bi- 'allaah wa- yu'min li- al- mu'minen wa- rah.mah li- 'alladhena 'aamano min -kum wa- 'alladhena yu'dhon rasol 'allaah la- -hum cadhaab 'alem
yah.lifon bi- 'allaah la- -kum li- yurd.o -kum wa- 'allaah wa- rasol -hu ah.aqq 'an yurd.o -hu 'in kaano mu'minen
'a- lam yaclamo 'anna -hu man yuh.aadid 'allaah wa- rasol -hu fa- 'anna la- -hu naar jahannam khaalid(an) fe -haa dhaalika al- khizy al- caz.em
yah.dhar al- munaafiqon 'an tunazzal calay -him sorah tunabbi' -hum bi- maa fe qulob -him qul istahzi'o 'inna 'allaah mukhrij maa tah.dharon
wa- la- 'in sa'alta -hum la- yaqolanna 'inna-maa kunnaa nakhod. wa- nalcab qul 'a- bi- 'allaah wa- 'aayaat -hi wa- rasol -hi kuntum tastahzi'on
laa tactadhiro qad kafartum bacda 'emaan -kum 'in nacfu can t.aa'ifah min -kum nucadhdhib t.aa'ifah bi- 'anna -hum kaano mujrimen

al- munaafiqon wa- al- munaafiqaat bacd. -hum min bacd. ya'muron bi- al- munkar wa- yanhawn can al- macrof wa- yaqbid.on aydiya -hum naso 'allaah fa- nasiya -hum 'inna al- munaafiqen -hum al- faasiqon
wacada 'allaah al- munaafiqen wa- al- munaafiqaat wa- al- kuffaar naar jahannam khaaliden fe -haa hiya h.asb -hum wa- lacana -hum 'allaah wa- la- -hum cadhaab muqem

ka- 'alladhena min qabli -kum kaano ashadd min -kum qowah wa- akthar amwaal(an) wa- awlaad(an) fa- istamtaco bi- khalaaq -him fa- istamtactum bi- khalaaq -kum ka-maa istamtaca 'alladhena min qabli -kum bi- khalaaq -him wa- khud.tum ka- 'alladhe khaad.o 'olaa'ika h.abit.at acmaal -hum fe ad- dunyaa wa- al- 'aakhirah wa- 'olaa'ika hum al- khaasiron

'a- lam ya'ti -him naba' 'alladhena min qabli -him qawm noh. wa- caad wa- thamod wa- qawm 'ibraahem wa- as.h.aab madyan wa- al- mu'tafikaat 'atat -hum rusul -hum bi- al- bayyinaat fa- maa kaana 'allaah li- yaz.lim -hum wa- laakin kaano anfus -hum yaz.limon

wa- al- mu'minon wa- al- mu'minaat bacd. -hum awliyaa' bacd. ya'muron bi- al- macrof wa- yanhawn can al- munkar wa- yuqemon as.- s.alaah wa- yu'ton az- zakaah wa- yut.econ 'allaah wa- rasol -hu 'olaa'ika sa- yarh.am -hum 'allaah 'inna 'allaah cazez h.akem

wacada 'allaah al- mu'minen wa- al- mu'minaat jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa wa- masaakin t.ayyibah fe jannaat cadn wa- rid.waan min 'allaah akbar dhaalika huwa al- fawz al- caz.em
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- nabey jaahid al- kuffaar wa- al- munaafiqen wa- ughluz. calay -him wa- ma'waa -hum jahannam wa- bi's al- mas.er

yah.lifon bi- 'allaah maa qaalo wa- la- qad qaalo kalimah al- kufr wa- kafaro bacda islaam -him wa- hammo bi- maa lam yanaalo wa- maa naqamo 'illaa 'an aghnaa -hum 'allaah wa- rasol -hu min fad.l -hi fa- 'in yatobo yaku(n) khayr la- -hum wa- 'in yatawallaw yucadhdhib -hum 'allaah cadhaab(an) 'alem(an) fe ad- dunyaa wa- al- 'aakhirah wa- maa la- -hum fe al- 'ard. min waley wa- laa nas.er
wa- min -hum man caahada 'allaah la- 'in 'aataa -naa min fad.l -hi la- nas.s.addaqanna wa- la- nakonanna min as.- s.aalih.en
fa- lammaa 'aataa -hum min fad.l -hi bakhilo bi- -hi wa- tawallaw wa- hum mucrid.on
fa- acqaba -hum nifaaq(an) fe qulob -him 'ilaa yawm yalqawna -hu bi- maa akhlafo 'allaah maa wacado -hu wa- bi- maa kaano yakdhibon
'a- lam yaclamo 'anna 'allaah yaclam sirr -hum wa- najwaa -hum wa- 'anna 'allaah callaam al- ghuyob
'alladhena yalmizon al- mut.t.awwicen min al- mu'minen fe as.- s.adaqaat wa- 'alladhena laa yajidon 'illaa juhd -hum fa- yaskharon min -hum sakhira 'allaah min -hum wa- la- -hum cadhaab 'alem

istaghfir la- -hum 'aw laa tastaghfir la- -hum 'in tastaghfir la- -hum sabcen marrah fa- lan yaghfir 'allaah la- -hum dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum kafaro bi- 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm al- faasiqen

farih.a al- mukhallafon bi- maqcad -him khilaaf rasol 'allaah wa- kariho 'an yujaahido bi- amwaal -him wa- anfus -him fe sabel 'allaah wa- qaalo laa tanfiro fe al- h.arr qul naar jahannam ashadd h.arr(an) law kaano yafqahon
fa- li- yad.h.ako qalel(an) wa- li- yabko kather(an) jazaa' bi- maa kaano yaksibon

fa- 'in rajaca -ka 'allaah 'ilaa t.aa'ifah min -hum fa- ista'dhano -ka li- al- khuroj fa- qul lan takhrujo maci -ya 'abad(an) wa- lan tuqaatilo maci -ya cadow(an) 'inna -kum rad.etum bi- al- qucod 'awwal marrah fa- uqcudo maca al- khaalifen
wa- laa tus.alli calaa 'ah.ad min -hum maata 'abad(an) wa- laa taqum calaa qabr -hi 'inna -hum kafaro bi- 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- maato wa- hum faasiqon
wa- laa tucjib -ka amwaal -hum wa- awlaad -hum 'inna-maa yured 'allaah 'an yucadhdhib -hum bi- -haa fe ad- dunyaa wa- tazhaq anfus -hum wa- hum kaafiron
wa- 'idhaa unzilat sorah 'an 'aamino bi- 'allaah wa- jaahido maca rasol -hi ista'dhana -ka 'olo at.- t.awl min -hu wa- qaalo dhar -naa nakun maca al- qaaciden
rad.o bi- 'an yakono maca al- khawaalif wa- t.ubica calaa qulob -him fa- hum laa yafqahon
laakin ar- rasol wa- 'alladhena 'aamano maca -hu jaahado bi- amwaal -him wa- anfus -him wa- 'olaa'ika la- -hum al- khayraat wa- 'olaa'ika hum al- muflih.on
acadda 'allaah la- -hum jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa dhaalika al- fawz al- caz.em
wa- jaa'a al- mucadhdhiron min al- acraab li- yu'dhan la- -hum wa- qacada 'alladhena kadhabo 'allaah wa- rasol -hu sa- yus.eb 'alladhena kafaro min -hum cadhaab 'alem

laysa calaa ad.- d.ucafaa' wa- laa calaa al- mard.aa wa- laa calaa 'alladhena laa yajidon maa yunfiqon h.araj 'idhaa nas.ah.o li- 'allaah wa- rasol -hi maa calaa al- muh.sinen min sabel wa- 'allaah ghafor rah.em
wa- laa calaa 'alladhena 'idhaa maa 'ataw -ka li- tah.mil -hum qulta laa ajid maa ah.mil -kum calay -hi tawallaw wa- acyun -hum tafed. min ad- damc h.azan(an) 'an laa yajido maa yunfiqon
'inna-maa as- sabel calaa 'alladhena yasta'dhinon -ka wa- hum aghniyaa' rad.o bi- 'an yakono maca al- khawaalif wa- t.abaca 'allaah calaa qulob -him fa- hum laa yaclamon

yactadhiron 'ilay -kum 'idhaa rajactum 'ilay -him qul laa tactadhiro lan nu'min la- -kum qad nabba'a -naa 'allaah min akhbaar -kum wa- sa- yaraa 'allaah camal -kum wa- rasol -hu thumma turaddon 'ilaa caalim al- ghayb wa- ash- shahaadah fa- yunabbi' -kum bi- maa kuntum tacmalon
sa- yah.lifon bi- 'allaah la- -kum 'idhaa inqalabtum 'ilay -him li- tucrid.o can -hum fa- acrid.o can -hum 'inna -hum rijs wa- ma'waa -hum jahannam jazaa' bi- maa kaano yaksibon
yah.lifon la- -kum li- tard.aw can -hum fa- 'in tard.aw can -hum fa- 'inna 'allaah la- yard.aa can al- qawm al- faasiqen
al- acraab ashadd kufr(an) wa- nifaaq(an) wa- ajdar 'an laa yaclamo h.udod maa anzala 'allaah calaa rasol -hi wa- 'allaah calem h.akem
wa- min al- acraab man yattakhidh maa yunfiq maghram(an) wa- yatarabbas. bi- -kum ad- dawaa'ir calay -him daa'irah as- saw' wa- 'allaah samec calem

wa- min al- acraab man yu'min bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- yattakhidh maa yunfiq qurubaat cinda 'allaah wa- s.alawaat ar- rasol 'a-laa 'inna -haa qurbah la- -hum sa- yudkhil -hum 'allaah fe rah.mah -hi 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em

wa- as- saabiqon al- 'awwalon min al- muhaajiren wa- al- ans.aar wa- 'alladhena ittabaco -hum bi- ih.saan rad.iya 'allaah can -hum wa- rad.o can -hu wa- acadda la- -hum jannaat tajre tah.ta -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa 'abad(an) dhaalika al- fawz al- caz.em

wa- min man h.awla -kum min al- acraab munaafiqon wa- min 'ahl al- madenah marado calaa an- nifaaq laa taclam -hum nah.nu naclam -hum sa- nucadhdhib -hum marratain thumma yuraddon 'ilaa cadhaab caz.em
wa- 'aakharon ictarafo bi- dhunob -him khalat.o camal(an) s.aalih.(an) wa- 'aakhar sayyi'(an) casaa 'allaah 'an yatob calay -hi 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em
khudh min amwaal -him s.adaqah tut.ah.hir -hum wa- tuzakke -him bi- -haa wa- s.alli calay -him 'inna s.alawaat -ka sakan la- -hum wa- 'allaah samec calem
'a- lam yaclamo 'anna 'allaah huwa yaqbal at- tawbah can cibaad -hi wa- ya'khudh as.- s.adaqaat wa- 'anna 'allaah huwa at- tawwaab ar- rah.em
wa- qul icmalo fa- sa- yaraa 'allaah camal -kum wa- rasol -hu wa- al- mu'minon wa- sa- turaddon 'ilaa caalim al- ghayb wa- ash- shahaadah fa- yunabbi' -kum bi- maa kuntum tacmalon
wa- 'aakharon murjawn li- 'amr 'allaah 'immaa yucadhdhib -hum wa- 'immaa yatob calay -him wa- 'allaah calem h.akem

wa- 'alladhena ittakhadho masjid(an) d.iraar(an) wa- kufr(an) wa- tafreq(an) bayna al- mu'minen wa- irs.aad(an) li- man h.aaraba 'allaah wa- rasol -hu min qablu wa- la- yah.lifunna 'in aradnaa 'illaa al- h.usnaa wa- 'allaah yashhad 'inna -hum la- kaadhibon
laa taqum fe -hi 'abad(an) la- masjid 'ussisa calaa at- taqwaa min 'awwal yawm ah.aqq 'an taqom fe -hi fe -hi rijaal yuh.ibbon 'an yatat.ahharo wa- 'allaah yuh.ibb al- mut.t.ahhiren

'a- fa- man 'assasa bunyaan -hu calaa taqwaa min 'allaah wa- rid.waan khayr 'am min 'assasa bunyaan -hu calaa shafaa juruf haar fa- inhaara bi- -hi fe naar jahannam wa- 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
laa yazaal bunyaan -hum 'alladhe banaw rebah fe qulob -him 'illaa 'an taqat.t.aca qulob -hum wa- 'allaah calem h.akem

'inna 'allaah ishtaraa min al- mu'minen anfus -hum wa- amwaal -hum bi- 'anna la- -hum al- jannah yuqaatilon fe sabel 'allaah fa- yaqtulon wa- yuqtalon wacd(an) calay -hi h.aqq(an) fe at- tawraah wa- al- 'injel wa- al- qur'aan wa- man awfaa bi- cahd -hi min 'allaah fa- istabshiro bi- bayc -kum 'alladhe baayactum bi- -hi wa- dhaalika huwa al- fawz al- caz.em

at- taa'ibon al- caabidon al- h.aamidon as- saa'ih.on ar- raakicon as- saajidon al- 'aamiron bi- al- macrof wa- an- naahon can al- munkar wa- al- h.aafiz.on li- h.udod 'allaah wa- bashshir al- mu'minen
maa kaana li- an- nabey wa- 'alladhena 'aamano 'an yastaghfiro li- al- mushriken wa- law kaano 'ole qurbaa min bacda maa tabayyana la- -hum 'anna -hum as.h.aab al- jah.em
wa- maa kaana istighfaar 'ibraahem li- 'abe -hi 'illaa can mawcidah wacada -haa 'eyaa -hu fa- lammaa tabayyana la- -hu 'anna -hu cadow li- 'allaah tabarra'a min -hu 'inna 'ibraahem la- 'awwaah h.alem
wa- maa kaana 'allaah li- yud.ill qawm(an) bacda 'idh hadaa -hum h.attaa yubayyin la- -hum maa yattaqon 'inna 'allaah bi- kull shay' calem
'inna 'allaah la- -hu mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. yuh.ye wa- yumet wa- maa la- -kum min doni 'allaah min waley wa- laa nas.er

la- qad taaba 'allaah calaa an- nabey wa- al- muhaajiren wa- al- ans.aar 'alladhena ittabaco -hu fe saacah al- cusrah min bacdi maa kaada yazegh qulob fareq min -hum thumma taaba calay -him 'inna -hu bi- -him ra'of rah.em

wa- calaa ath- thalaathah 'alladhena khullifo h.attaa 'idhaa d.aaqat calay -him al- 'ard. bi- maa rah.ubat wa- d.aaqat calay -him anfus -hum wa- z.anno 'an laa malja' min 'allaah 'illaa 'ilay -hi thumma taaba calay -him li- yatobo 'inna 'allaah huwa at- tawwaab ar- rah.em
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano ittaqo 'allaah wa- kono maca as.- s.aadiqen

maa kaana li- 'ahl al- madenah wa- man h.awla -hum min al- acraab 'an yatakhallafo can rasol 'allaah wa- laa yarghabo bi- anfus -him can nafs -hu dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum laa yus.eb -hum z.ama' wa- laa nas.ab wa- laa makhmas.ah fe sabel 'allaah wa- laa yat.a'on mawt.i'(an) yaghez. al- kuffaar wa- laa yanaalon min cadow nayl(an) 'illaa kutiba la- -hum bi- -hi camal s.aalih. 'inna 'allaah laa yud.ec 'ajr al- muh.sinen
wa- laa yunfiqon nafaqah s.agherah wa- laa kaberah wa- laa yaqt.acon waadiy(an) 'illaa kutiba la- -hum li- yajziya -hum 'allaah ah.san maa kaano yacmalon

wa- maa kaana al- mu'minon li- yanfiro kaaffah fa- law-laa nafar min kull firqah min -hum t.aa'ifah li- yatafaqqaho fe ad- den wa- li- yundhiro qawm -hum 'idhaa rajaco 'ilay -him lacalla -hum yah.dharon
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano qaatilo 'alladhena yalon -kum min al- kuffaar wa- li- yajido fe -kum ghilz.ah wa- iclamo 'anna 'allaah maca al- muttaqen
wa- 'idhaa maa unzilat sorah fa- min -hum man yaqol 'ayy -kum zaadat -hu haadhihi 'emaan(an) fa- 'ammaa 'alladhena 'aamano fa- zaadat -hum 'emaan(an) wa- hum yastabshiron
wa- 'ammaa 'alladhena fe qulob -him marad. fa- zaadat -hum rijs(an) 'ilaa rijs -him wa- maato wa- hum kaafiron
'aw laa yarawn 'anna -hum yuftanon fe kull caam marrah 'aw marratain thumma laa yatobon wa- laa hum yadhdhakkaron
wa- 'idhaa maa unzilat sorah naz.ara bacd. -hum 'ilaa bacd. hal yaraa -kum min 'ah.ad thumma ins.arafo s.arafa 'allaah qulob -hum bi- 'anna -hum qawm laa yafqahon
la- qad jaa'a -kum rasol min anfus -kum cazez calay -hi maa canittum h.ares. calay -kum bi- al- mu'minen ra'of rah.em
fa- 'in tawallaw fa- qul h.asb -e 'allaah laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa calay -hi tawakkaltu wa- huwa rabb al- carsh al- caz.em
alif-laam-raa' tilka 'aayaat al- kitaab al- h.akem

'a- kaana li- an- naas cajab(an) 'an awh.aynaa 'ilaa rajul min -hum 'an andhir an- naas wa- bashshir 'alladhena 'aamano 'anna la- -hum qadam s.idq cinda rabb -him qaala al- kaafiron 'inna haadhaa la- saah.ir muben
