'inna rabb -kum 'allaah 'alladhe khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. fe sittah ayyaam thumma istawaa calaa al- carsh yudabbir al- 'amr maa min shafec 'illaa min bacdi 'idhn -hi dhaalikum 'allaah rabb -kum fa- ucbudo -hu 'a- fa- laa tadhakkaron

'ilay -hi marjic -kum jamec(an) wacd 'allaah h.aqq(an) 'inna -hu yabda' al- khalq thumma yuced -hu li- yajziya 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat bi- al- qist. wa- 'alladhena kafaro la- -hum sharaab min h.amem wa- cadhaab 'alem bi- maa kaano yakfuron

huwa 'alladhe jacala ash- shams d.iyaa' wa- al- qamar nor(an) wa- qaddara -hu manaazil li- taclamo cadad as- sinen wa- al- h.isaab maa khalaqa 'allaah dhaalika 'illaa bi- al- h.aqq yufas.s.il al- 'aayaat li- qawm yaclamon
'inna fe ikhtilaaf al- layl wa- an- nahaar wa- maa khalaqa 'allaah fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. la- 'aayaat li- qawm yattaqon
'inna 'alladhena laa yarjon liqaa' -naa wa- rad.o bi- al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- it.ma'anno bi- -haa wa- 'alladhena hum can 'aayaat -naa ghaafilon
'olaa'ika ma'waa -hum an- naar bi- maa kaano yaksibon
'inna 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat yahde -him rabb -hum bi- 'emaan -him tajre min tah.ti -him al- anhaar fe jannaat an- nacem
dacwaa -hum fe -haa subh.aana -ka 'allaahumma wa- tah.eyah -hum fe -haa salaam wa- 'aakhar dacwaa -hum 'anna al- h.amd li- 'allaah rabb al- caalamen
wa- law yucajjil 'allaah li- an- naas ash- sharr isticjaal -hum bi- al- khayr la- qud.iya 'ilay -him 'ajal -hum fa- nadhar 'alladhena laa yarjon liqaa' -naa fe t.ughyaan -him yacmahon

wa- 'idhaa massa al- 'insaan ad.- d.urr dacaa -naa li- janb -hi 'aw qaacid(an) 'aw qaa'im(an) fa- lammaa kashafnaa can -hu d.urr -hu marra ka-'an lam yadcu -naa 'ilaa d.urr massa -hu ka- dhaalika zuyyina li- al- musrifen maa kaano yacmalon
wa- la- qad ahlaknaa al- quron min qabli -kum lammaa z.alamo wa- jaa'at -hum rusul -hum bi- al- bayyinaat wa- maa kaano li- yu'mino ka- dhaalika najze al- qawm al- mujrimen
thumma jacalnaa -kum khalaa'if fe al- 'ard. min bacdi -him li- nanz.ur kayfa tacmalon

wa- 'idhaa tutlaa calay -him 'aayaat -naa bayyinaat qaala 'alladhena laa yarjon liqaa' -naa i'ti bi- qur'aan ghayr haadhaa 'aw baddil -hu qul maa yakon li- -y 'an ubaddil -hu min tilqaa'i nafs -e 'in attabic 'illaa maa yoh.aa 'ilay -ya 'in(na) -ne akhaaf 'in cas.aytu rabb -e cadhaab yawm caz.em
qul law shaa'a 'allaah maa talawtu -hu calay -kum wa- laa adraa -kum bi- -hi fa- qad labithtu fe -kum cumur(an) min qabli -hi 'a- fa- laa tacqilon
fa- man az.lam min man iftaraa calaa 'allaah kadhib(an) 'aw kadhdhaba bi- 'aayaat -hi 'inna -hu laa yuflih. al- mujrimon

wa- yacbudon min doni 'allaah maa laa yad.urr -hum wa- laa yanfac -hum wa- yaqolon haa'ulaa'i shufacaa' -naa cinda 'allaah qul 'a- tunabbi'on 'allaah bi- maa laa yaclam fe as- samaawaat wa- laa fe al- 'ard. subh.aana -hu wa- tacaalaa can maa yushrikon
wa- maa kaana an- naas 'illaa 'ummah waah.idah fa- ikhtalafo wa- law-laa kalimah sabaqat min rabb -ka la- qud.iya bayna -hum fe maa fe -hi yakhtalifon
wa- yaqolon law-laa unzila calay -hi 'aayah min rabb -hi fa- qul 'inna-maa al- ghayb li- 'allaah fa- intaz.iro 'inni -y maca -kum min al- muntaz.iren
wa- 'idhaa adhaqnaa an- naas rah.mah min bacdi d.arraa' massat -hum 'idhaa la- -hum makr fe 'aayaat -naa qul 'allaah asrac makr(an) 'inna rusul -naa yaktubon maa tamkuron

huwa 'alladhe yusayyir -kum fe al- barr wa- al- bah.r h.attaa 'idhaa kuntum fe al- fulk wa- jarayna bi- -him bi- reh. t.ayyibah wa- farih.o bi- -haa jaa'at -haa reh. caas.if wa- jaa'a -hum al- mawj min kull makaan wa- z.anno 'anna -hum uh.et.a bi- -him dacaw 'allaah mukhlis.en la- -hu ad- den la- 'in anjayta -naa min haadhihi la- nakonanna min ask- shaakiren

fa- lammaa anjaa -hum 'idhaa hum yabghon fe al- 'ard. bi- ghayr al- h.aqq yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas 'inna-maa baghy -kum calaa anfus -kum mataac al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa thumma 'ilay -naa marjic -kum fa- nunabbi' -kum bi- maa kuntum tacmalon

'inna-maa mathal al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa ka- maa' anzalnaa -hu min as- samaa' fa- ikhtalat.a bi- -hi nabaat al- 'ard. min maa ya'kul an- naas wa- al- ancaam h.attaa 'idhaa 'akhadhat al- 'ard. zukhruf -haa wa- izzayyanat wa- z.anna 'ahl -haa 'anna -hum qaadiron calay -haa 'ataa -haa 'amr -naa layl(an) 'aw nahaar(an) fa- jacalnaa -haa h.as.ed(an) ka-'an lam taghna bi- al- 'ams ka- dhaalika nufas.s.il al- 'aayaat li- qawm yatafakkaron
wa- 'allaah yadco 'ilaa daar as- salaam wa- yahde man yashaa' 'ilaa s.iraat. mustaqem
li- 'alladhena ah.sano al- h.usnaa wa- ziyaadah wa- laa yarhaq wujoh -hum qatar wa- laa dhillah 'olaa'ika as.h.aab al- jannah hum fe -haa khaalidon

wa- 'alladhena kasabo as- sayyi'aat jazaa' sayyi'ah bi- mithl -haa wa- tarhaq -hum dhillah maa la- -hum min 'allaah min caas.im ka-'anna maa ughshiyat wujoh -hum qit.ac(an) min al- layl muz.lim(an) 'olaa'ika as.h.aab an- naar hum fe -haa khaalidon
wa- yawm nah.shur -hum jamec(an) thumma naqol li- 'alladhena ashrako makaan -kum 'antum wa- shurakaa' -kum fa- zayyalnaa bayna -hum wa- qaala shurakaa' -hum maa kuntum 'eyaa -naa tacbudon
fa- kafaa bi- 'allaah shahed(an) bayna -naa wa- bayna -kum 'in kunnaa can cibaadah -kum la- ghaafilen
hunaalika tablo kull nafs maa aslafat wa- ruddo 'ilaa 'allaah mawlaa -hum al- h.aqq wa- d.alla can -hum maa kaano yaftaron

qul man yarzuq -kum min as- samaa' wa- al- 'ard. 'am man yamlik as- samc wa- al- abs.aar wa- man yukhrij al- h.ayy min al- mayyit wa- yukhrij al- mayyit min al- h.ayy wa- man yudabbir al- 'amr fa- sa- yaqolon 'allaah fa- qul 'a- fa- laa tattaqon
fa- dhaalikum 'allaah rabb -kum al- h.aqq fa- maa-dhaa bacda al- h.aqq 'illaa ad.- d.alaal fa- 'annaa tus.rafon
ka- dhaalika h.aqqat kalimah rabb -ka calaa 'alladhena fasaqo 'anna -hum laa yu'minon
qul hal min shurakaa' -kum man yabda' al- khalq thumma yuced -hu qul 'allaah yabda' al- khalq thumma yuced -hu fa- 'annaa tu'fakon

qul hal min shurakaa' -kum man yahde 'ilaa al- h.aqq qul 'allaah yahde li- al- h.aqq 'a- fa- man yahde 'ilaa al- h.aqq ah.aqq 'an yuttabac 'am man laa yahde 'illaa 'an yuhdaa fa- maa la- -kum kayfa tah.kumon
wa- maa yattabic akthar -hum 'illaa z.ann(an) 'inna az.- z.ann laa yughne min al- h.aqq shay'(an) 'inna 'allaah calem bi- maa yafcalon
wa- maa kaana haadhaa al- qur'aan 'an yuftaraa min doni 'allaah wa- laakin tas.deq 'alladhe bayna yadai -hi wa- tafs.el al- kitaab laa rayb fe -hi min rabb al- caalamen
'am yaqolon iftaraa -hu qul fa- i'to bi- sorah mithl -hi wa- udco man istat.actum min doni 'allaah 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
bal kadhdhabo bi- maa lam yuh.et.o bi- cilm -hi wa- lammaa ya'ti -him ta'wel -hu ka- dhaalika kadhdhaba 'alladhena min qabli -him fa- unz.ur kayfa kaana caaqibah az.- z.aalimen
wa- min -hum man yu'min bi- -hi wa- min -hum man laa yu'min bi- -hi wa- rabb -ka aclam bi- al- mufsiden
wa- 'in kadhdhabo -ka fa- qul li- -y camal -e wa- la- -kum camal -kum 'antum bare'on min maa acmal wa- 'anaa bare' min maa tacmalon
wa- min -hum man yastamicon 'ilay -ka 'a- fa- 'anta tusmic as.- s.umm wa- law kaano laa yacqilon
wa- min -hum man yanz.ur 'ilay -ka 'a- fa- 'anta tahde al- cumyaa wa- law kaano laa yubs.iron
'inna 'allaah laa yaz.lim an- naas shay'(an) wa- laakin an- naas anfus -hum yaz.limon
wa- yawm yah.shur -hum ka-'an lam yalbatho 'illaa saacah min an- nahaar yatacaarafon bayna -hum qad khasira 'alladhe kadhdhabo bi- liqaa' 'allaah wa- maa kaano muhtaden
wa- 'immaa nuriyanna -ka bacd. 'alladhe nacid -hum 'aw natawaffayanna -ka fa- 'ilay -naa marjic -hum thumma 'allaah shahed calaa maa yafcalon
wa- li- kull 'ummah rasol fa- 'idhaa jaa'a rasol -hum qud.iya bayna -hum bi- al- qist. wa- hum laa yuz.lamon
wa- yaqolon mataa haadhaa al- wacd 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
qul laa amlik li- nafs -e d.arr(an) wa- laa nafc(an) 'illaa maa shaa'a 'allaah li- kull 'ummah 'ajal 'idhaa jaa'a 'ajal -hum fa- laa yasta'khiron saacah wa- laa yastaqdimon
qul 'a- ra'aytum 'in 'ataa -kum cadhaab -hu bayaat(an) 'aw nahaar(an) maa-dhaa yastacjil min -hu al- mujrimon
'a- thumma 'idhaa maa waqaca 'aamantum bi- -hi 'a- al- 'aan wa- qad kuntum bi- -hi tastacjilon
thumma qela li- 'alladhena z.alamo dhoqo cadhaab al- khuld hal tujzawn 'illaa bi- maa kuntum taksibon
wa- yastanbi'on -ka 'a- h.aqq huwa qul 'iy wa- rabb -e 'inna -hu la- h.aqq wa- maa 'antum bi- mucjizen
wa- law 'anna li- kull nafs z.alamat maa fe al- 'ard. la- iftadat bi- -hi wa- asarro an- nadaamah lammaa ra'aw al- cadhaab wa- qud.iya bayna -hum bi- al- qist. wa- hum laa yuz.lamon
'a-laa 'inna li- 'allaah maa fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. 'a-laa 'inna wacd 'allaah h.aqq wa- laakin akthar -hum laa yaclamon
huwa yuh.ye wa- yumet wa- 'ilay -hi turjacon
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas qad jaa'at -kum mawciz.ah min rabb -kum wa- shifaa' li- maa fe as.- s.udor wa- huda(n) wa- rah.mah li- al- mu'minen
qul bi- fad.l 'allaah wa- bi- rah.mah -hi fa- bi- dhaalika fa- li- yafrah.o huwa khayr min maa yajmacon
qul 'a- ra'aytum maa anzala 'allaah la- -kum min rizq fa- jacaltum min -hu h.araam(an) wa- h.alaal(an) qul 'a- 'allaah 'adhina la- -kum 'am calaa 'allaah taftaron
wa- maa z.ann 'alladhena yaftaron calaa 'allaah al- kadhib yawm al- qiyaamah 'inna 'allaah la- dho fad.l calaa an- naas wa- laakin akthar -hum laa yashkuron

wa- maa takon fe sha'n wa- maa tatlo min -hu min qur'aan wa- laa tacmalon min camal 'illaa kunnaa calay -kum shuhod(an) 'idh tufed.on fe -hi wa- maa yaczub can rabb -ka min mithqaal dharrah fe al- 'ard. wa- laa fe as- samaa' wa- laa as.ghar min dhaalika wa- laa akbar 'illaa fe kitaab muben
'a-laa 'inna awliyaa' 'allaah laa khawf calay -him wa- laa hum yah.zanon
'alladhena 'aamano wa- kaano yattaqon
la- -hum al- bushraa fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- fe al- 'aakhirah laa tabdel li- kalimaat 'allaah dhaalika huwa al- fawz al- caz.em
wa- laa yah.zun -ka qawl -hum 'inna al- cizzah li- 'allaah jamec(an) huwa as- samec al- calem
'a-laa 'inna li- 'allaah man fe as- samaawaat wa- man fe al- 'ard. wa- maa yattabic 'alladhena yadcon min doni 'allaah shurakaa' 'in yattabicon 'illaa az.- z.ann wa- 'in hum 'illaa yakhrus.on
huwa 'alladhe jacala la- -kum al- layl li- taskuno fe -hi wa- an- nahaar mubs.ir(an) 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- qawm yasmacon

qaalo ittakhadha 'allaah walad(an) subh.aana -hu huwa al- ghaney la- -hu maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. 'in cinda -kum min sult.aan bi- haadhaa 'a- taqolon calay -ya 'allaah maa laa taclamon
qul 'inna 'alladhena yaftaron calaa 'allaah al- kadhib laa yuflih.on
mataac fe ad- dunyaa thumma 'ilay -naa marjic -hum thumma nudheq -hum al- cadhaab ash- shaded bi- maa kaano yakfuron

wa- utlu calay -him naba' noh. 'idh qaala li- qawm -hi yaa qawm -e 'in kaana kabura calay -kum maqaam -e wa- tadhker -y bi- 'aayaat 'allaah fa- calaa 'allaah tawakkaltu fa- ajmico 'amr -kum wa- shurakaa' -kum thumma laa yakun 'amr -kum calay -kum ghummah thumma iqd.o 'ilay -ya wa- laa tunz.iron
fa- 'in tawallaytum fa- maa sa'altu -kum min 'ajr 'in 'ajr -y 'illaa calaa 'allaah wa- 'umirtu 'an akon min al- muslimen
fa- kadhdhabo -hu fa- najjaynaa -hu wa- man maca -hu fe al- fulk wa- jacalnaa -hum khalaa'if wa- aghraqnaa 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa fa- unz.ur kayfa kaana caaqibah al- mundharen
thumma bacathnaa min bacdi -hi rusul(an) 'ilaa qawm -him fa- jaa'o -hum bi- al- bayyinaat fa- maa kaano li- yu'mino bi- maa kadhdhabo bi- -hi min qablu ka- dhaalika nat.bac calaa qulob al- muctaden
thumma bacathnaa min bacdi -him mosaa wa- haaron 'ilaa fircawn wa- mala' -hi bi- 'aayaat -naa fa- istakbaro wa- kaano qawm(an) mujrimen
fa- lammaa jaa'a -hum al- h.aqq min cindi -naa qaalo 'inna haadhaa la- sih.r muben
qaala mosaa 'a- taqolon li- al- h.aqq lammaa jaa'a -kum 'a- sih.r haadhaa wa- laa yuflih. as- saah.iron
qaalo 'a- ji'ta -naa li- talfit -naa can maa wajadnaa calay -hi 'aabaa' -naa wa- takon la- -kumaa al- kibriyaa' fe al- 'ard. wa- maa nah.nu la- -kumaa bi- mu'minen
wa- qaala fircawn i'to -ne bi- kull saah.ir calem
fa- lammaa jaa'a as- sah.arah qaala la- -hum mosaa alqo maa 'antum mulqon
fa- lammaa alqaw qaala mosaa maa ji'tum bi- -hi as- sih.r 'inna 'allaah sa- yubt.il -hu 'inna 'allaah laa yus.lih. camal al- mufsiden
wa- yuh.iqq 'allaah al- h.aqq bi- kalimaat -hi wa- law kariha al- mujrimon
fa- maa 'aamana li- mosaa 'illaa dhurreyah min qawm -hi calaa khawf min fircawn wa- mala' -him 'an yaftin -hum wa- 'inna fircawn la- caali(n) fe al- 'ard. wa- 'inna -hu la- min al- musrifen
wa- qaala mosaa yaa qawm -e 'in kuntum 'aamantum bi- 'allaah fa- calay -hi tawakkalo 'in kuntum muslimen
fa- qaalo calaa 'allaah tawakkalnaa rabb -naa laa tajcal -naa fitnah li- al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
wa- najji -naa bi- rah.mah -ka min al- qawm al- kaafiren
wa- awh.aynaa 'ilaa mosaa wa- 'akhe -hi 'an tabawwa'aa li- qawm -kumaa bi- mis.r buyot(an) wa- ijcalo buyot -kum qiblah wa- aqemo as.- s.alaah wa- bashshir al- mu'minen

wa- qaala mosaa rabb -naa 'inna -ka 'aatayta fircawn wa- mala' -hi zenah wa- amwaal(an) fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa rabb -naa li- yud.illo can sabel -ka rabb -naa it.mis calaa amwaal -him wa- ushdud calaa qulob -him fa- laa yu'mino h.attaa yaraw al- cadhaab al- 'alem
qaala qad ujebat dacwah -kumaa fa- istaqemaa wa- laa tattabicaann sabel 'alladhena laa yaclamon

wa- jaawaznaa bi- bane 'israa'el al- bah.r fa- atbaca -hum fircawn wa- junod -hi baghy(an) wa- cadw(an) h.attaa 'idhaa adraka -hu al- gharaq qaala 'aamantu 'anna -hu laa 'ilaah 'illaa 'alladhe 'aamanat bi- -hi bano 'israa'el wa- 'anaa min al- muslimen
'a- al- 'aan wa- qad cas.ayta qablu wa- kuntu min al- mufsiden
fa- al- yawm nunajje -ka bi- badan -ka li- takon li- man khalf -ka 'aayah wa- 'inna kather(an) min an- naas can 'aayaat -naa la- ghaafilon

wa- la- qad bawwa'naa bane 'israa'el mubawwa' s.idq wa- razaqnaa -hum min at.- t.ayyibaat fa- maa ikhtalafo h.attaa jaa'a -hum al- cilm 'inna rabb -ka yaqd.e bayna -hum yawm al- qiyaamah fe maa kaano fe -hi yakhtalifon
fa- 'in kunta fe shakk min maa anzalnaa 'ilay -ka fa- is'al 'alladhena yaqra'on al- kitaab min qabli -ka la- qad jaa'a -ka al- h.aqq min rabb -ka fa- laa takonanna min al- mumtaren
wa- laa takonanna min 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat 'allaah fa- takon min al- khaasiren
'inna 'alladhena h.aqqat calay -him kalimah rabb -ka laa yu'minon
wa- law jaa'at -hum kull 'aayah h.attaa yaraw al- cadhaab al- 'alem
fa- law-laa kaanat qaryah 'aamanat fa- nafaca -haa 'emaan -haa 'illaa qawm yonus lammaa 'aamano kashafnaa can -hum cadhaab al- khizy fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- mattacnaa -hum 'ilaa h.en
wa- law shaa'a rabb -ka la- 'aamana man fe al- 'ard. kull -hum jamec(an) 'a- fa- 'anta tukrih an- naas h.attaa yakono mu'minen
wa- maa kaana li- nafs 'an tu'min 'illaa bi- 'idhn 'allaah wa- yajcal ar- rijs calaa 'alladhena laa yacqilon
qul unz.uro maa-dhaa fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa tughne al- 'aayaat wa- an- nudhur can qawm laa yu'minon
fa- hal yantaz.iron 'illaa mithl ayyaam 'alladhena khalaw min qabli -him qul fa- intaz.iro 'inni -y maca -kum min al- muntaz.iren
thumma nunajje rusul -naa wa- 'alladhena 'aamano ka- dhaalika h.aqq(an) calay -naa nunji al- mu'minen
qul yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas 'in kuntum fe shakk min den -e fa- laa acbud 'alladhena tacbudon min doni 'allaah wa- laakin acbud 'allaah 'alladhe yatawaffaa -kum wa- 'umirtu 'an akon min al- mu'minen
wa- 'an aqim wajh -ka li- ad- den h.anef(an) wa- laa takonanna min al- mushriken
wa- laa tadcu min doni 'allaah maa laa yanfac -ka wa- laa yad.urr -ka fa- 'in facalta fa- 'inna -ka 'idhan min az.- z.aalimen

wa- 'in yamsas -ka 'allaah bi- d.urr fa- laa kaashif la- -hu 'illaa huwa wa- 'in yurid -ka bi- khayr fa- laa raadd li- fad.l -hi yus.eb bi- -hi man yashaa' min cibaad -hi wa- huwa al- ghafor ar- rah.em
qul yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas qad jaa'a -kum al- h.aqq min rabb -kum fa- man ihtadaa fa- 'inna-maa yahtade li- nafs -hi wa- man d.alla fa- 'inna-maa yad.ill calay -haa wa- maa 'anaa calay -kum bi- wakel
wa- ittabic maa yoh.aa 'ilay -ka wa- is.bir h.attaa yah.kum 'allaah wa- huwa khayr al- h.aakimen
alif-laam-raa' kitaab uh.kimat 'aayaat -hu thumma fus.s.ilat min ladun h.akem khaber
'an laa tacbudo 'illaa 'allaah 'inni -y la- -kum min -hu nadher wa- basher

wa- 'an istaghfiro rabb -kum thumma tobo 'ilay -hi yumattic -kum mataac(an) h.asan(an) 'ilaa 'ajal musamma(n) wa- yu'ti kull dhe fad.l fad.l -hu wa- 'in tawallaw fa- 'inni -y akhaaf calay -kum cadhaab yawm kaber
'ilaa 'allaah marjic -kum wa- huwa calaa kull shay' qader
'a-laa 'inna -hum yathnon s.udor -hum li- yastakhfo min -hu 'a-laa h.ena yastaghshon thiyaab -hum yaclam maa yusirron wa- maa yuclinon 'inna -hu calem bi- dhaat as.- s.udor
wa- maa min daabbah fe al- 'ard. 'illaa calaa 'allaah rizq -haa wa- yaclam mustaqarr -haa wa- mustawdac -haa kull fe kitaab muben

wa- huwa 'alladhe khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. fe sittah ayyaam wa- kaana carsh -hu calaa al- maa' li- yabluwa -kum 'ayy -kum ah.san camal(an) wa- la- 'in qulta 'inna -kum mabcothon min bacdi al- mawt la- yaqolanna 'alladhena kafaro 'in haadhaa 'illaa sih.r muben
wa- la- 'in 'akhkharnaa can -hum al- cadhaab 'ilaa 'ummah macdodah la- yaqolanna maa yah.bis -hu 'a-laa yawm ya'te -him laysa mas.rof(an) can -hum wa- h.aaqa bi- -him maa kaano bi- -hi yastahzi'on
wa- la- 'in adhaqnaa al- 'insaan min -naa rah.mah thumma nazacnaa -haa min -hu 'inna -hu la- ya'os kafor
wa- la- 'in adhaqnaa -hu nacmaa' bacda d.arraa' massat -hu la- yaqolanna dhahaba as- sayyi'aat can -ne 'inna -hu la- farih. fakhor
'illaa 'alladhena s.abaro wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat 'olaa'ika la- -hum maghfirah wa- 'ajr kaber

fa- lacalla -ka taarik bacd. maa yoh.aa 'ilay -ka wa- d.aa'iq bi- -hi s.adr -ka 'an yaqolo law-laa unzila calay -hi kanz 'aw jaa'a maca -hu malak 'inna-maa 'anta nadher wa- 'allaah calaa kull shay' wakel
'am yaqolon iftaraa -hu qul fa- i'to bi- cashr suwar mithl -hi muftarayaat wa- udco man istat.actum min doni 'allaah 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
fa- 'in lam yastajebo la- -kum fa- iclamo 'anna-maa unzila bi- cilm 'allaah wa- 'an laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa fa- hal 'antum muslimon
man kaana yured al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- zenah -haa nuwaffi 'ilay -him acmaal -hum fe -haa wa- hum fe -haa laa yubkhason
'olaa'ika 'alladhena laysa la- -hum fe al- 'aakhirah 'illaa an- naar wa- h.abit.a maa s.anaco fe -haa wa- baat.il maa kaano yacmalon

'a- fa- man kaana calaa bayyinah min rabb -hi wa- yatlo -hu shaahid min -hu wa- min qabli -hi kitaab mosaa 'imaam(an) wa- rah.mah 'olaa'ika yu'minon bi- -hi wa- man yakfur bi- -hi min al- ah.zaab fa- an- naar mawcid -hu fa- laa taku(n) fe miryah min -hu 'inna -hu al- h.aqq min rabb -ka wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yu'minon

wa- man az.lam min man iftaraa calaa 'allaah kadhib(an) 'olaa'ika yucrad.on calaa rabb -him wa- yaqol al- ashhaad haa'ulaa'i 'alladhena kadhabo calaa rabb -him 'a-laa lacnah 'allaah calaa az.- z.aalimen
'alladhena yas.uddon can sabel 'allaah wa- yabghon -haa ciwaj(an) wa- hum bi- al- 'aakhirah hum kaafiron
'olaa'ika lam yakono mucjizen fe al- 'ard. wa- maa kaana la- -hum min doni 'allaah min awliyaa' yud.aacif la- -hum al- cadhaab maa kaano yastat.econ as- samc wa- maa kaano yubs.iron
'olaa'ika 'alladhena khasiro anfus -hum wa- d.alla can -hum maa kaano yaftaron
laa jaram 'anna -hum fe al- 'aakhirah hum al- akhsaron
'inna 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat wa- akhbato 'ilaa rabb -him 'olaa'ika as.h.aab al- jannah hum fe -haa khaalidon
mathal al- fareqain ka- al- acmaa wa- al- as.amm wa- al- bas.er wa- as- samec hal yastawiyaan mathal(an) 'a- fa- laa tadhakkaron
wa- la- qad arsalnaa noh.(an) 'ilaa qawm -hi 'inni -y la- -kum nadher muben
'an laa tacbudo 'illaa 'allaah 'inni -y akhaaf calay -kum cadhaab yawm 'alem

fa- qaala al- mala' 'alladhena kafaro min qawm -hi maa naraa -ka 'illaa bashar(an) mithl -naa wa- maa naraa -ka ittabaca -ka 'illaa 'alladhena hum araadhil -naa baadiy ar- ra'y wa- maa naraa la- -kum calay -naa min fad.l bal naz.unn -kum kaadhiben
qaala yaa qawm -e 'a- ra'aytum 'in kuntu calaa bayyinah min rabb -e wa- 'aataa -ne rah.mah min cindi -hi fa- cummiyat calay -kum 'a- nulzim -kumo -haa wa- 'antum la- -haa kaarihon
wa- yaa qawm -i laa as'al -kum calay -hi maal(an) 'in 'ajr -y 'illaa calaa 'allaah wa- maa 'anaa bi- t.aarid 'alladhena 'aamano 'inna -hum mulaaqo rabb -him wa- laakin -ne araa -kum qawm(an) tajhalon
wa- yaa qawm -i man yans.ur -ne min 'allaah 'in t.aradtu -hum 'a- fa- laa tadhakkaron

wa- laa aqol la- -kum cindi -y khazaa'in 'allaah wa- laa aclam al- ghayb wa- laa aqol 'inni -y malak wa- laa aqol li- 'alladhena tazdare acyun -kum lan yu'tiya -hum 'allaah khayr(an) 'allaah aclam bi- maa fe anfus -him 'inni -y 'idhaa la- man az.- z.aalimen
qaalo yaa noh. qad jaadalta -naa fa- aktharta jidaal -naa fa- i'ti -naa bi- maa tacid -naa 'in kunta min as.- s.aadiqen
qaala 'inna-maa ya'te -kum bi- -hi 'allaah 'in shaa'a wa- maa 'antum bi- mucjizen
wa- laa yanfac -kum nus.h. -e 'in aradtu 'an ans.ah. la- -kum 'in kaana 'allaah yured 'an yughwiya -kum huwa rabb -kum wa- 'ilay -hi turjacon
'am yaqolon iftaraa -hu qul 'in iftaraytu -hu fa- calay -ya ijraam -e wa- 'anaa bare' min maa tujrimon
wa- oh.iya 'ilaa noh. 'anna -hu lan yu'min min qawm -ka 'illaa man qad 'aamana fa- laa tabta'is bi- maa kaano yafcalon
wa- is.nac al- fulk bi- acyun -naa wa- wah.y -naa wa- laa tukhaat.ib -ne fe 'alladhena z.alamo 'inna -hum mughraqon
wa- yas.nac al- fulk wa- kulla-maa marra calay -hi mala' min qawm -hi sakhiro min -hu qaala 'in taskharo min -naa fa- 'in(na) -naa naskhar min -kum ka-maa taskharon
fa- sawfa taclamon man ya'te -hi cadhaab yukhze -hi wa- yah.ill calay -hi cadhaab muqem

h.attaa 'idhaa jaa'a 'amr -naa wa- faara at- tannor qulnaa ih.mil fe -haa min kull zawjain ithnain wa- 'ahl -ka 'illaa min sabaqa calay -hi al- qawl wa- man 'aamana wa- maa 'aamana maca -hu 'illaa qalel
wa- qaala irkabo fe -haa bi- ism 'allaah majraa -haa wa- mursaa -haa 'inna rabb -e la- ghafor rah.em
wa- hiya tajre bi- -him fe mawj ka- al- jibaal wa- naadaa noh. ibn -hu wa- kaana fe maczil yaa bunay -ya irkab maca -naa wa- laa takun maca al- kaafiren
qaala sa- 'aawe 'ilaa jabal yacs.im -ne min al- maa' qaala laa caas.im al- yawm min 'amr 'allaah 'illaa min rah.ima wa- h.aala bayna -humaa al- mawj fa- kaana min al- mughraqen
wa- qela yaa 'ard. iblace maa' -ki wa- yaa samaa' aqlice wa- ghed.a al- maa' wa- qud.iya al- 'amr wa- istawat calaa al-jodey wa- qela bucd(an) li- al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
wa- naadaa noh. rabb -hu fa- qaala rabb -i 'inna ibn -e min 'ahl -e wa- 'inna wacd -ka al- h.aqq wa- 'anta ah.kam al- h.aakimen
qaala yaa noh. 'inna -hu laysa min 'ahl -ka 'inna -hu camal ghayr s.aalih. fa- laa tas'al -ni maa laysa la- -ka bi- -hi cilm 'inni -y aciz. -ka 'an takon min al- jaahilen
qaala rabb -i 'inni -y acodhu bi- -ka 'an as'al -ka maa laysa li- -y bi- -hi cilm wa- 'illaa taghfir li- -y wa- tarh.am -ne akun min al- khaasiren
qela yaa noh. ihbit. bi- salaam min -naa wa- barakaat calay -ka wa- calaa 'umam min man maca -ka wa- 'umam sa- numattic -hum thumma yamass -hum min -naa cadhaab 'alem
tilka min anbaa' al- ghayb noh.e -haa 'ilay -ka maa kunta taclam -haa 'anta wa- laa qawm -ka min qabli haadhaa fa- is.bir 'inna al- caaqibah li- al- muttaqen
wa- 'ilaa caadi(n) 'akhaa -hum hod(an) qaala yaa qawm -e ucbudo 'allaah maa la- -kum min 'ilaah ghayr -hu 'in 'antum 'illaa muftaron
yaa qawm -i laa as'al -kum calay -hi 'ajr(an) 'in 'ajr -iya 'illaa calaa 'alladhe fat.ara -ne 'a- fa- laa tacqilon
wa- yaa qawm -e istaghfiro rabb -kum thumma tobo 'ilay -hi yursil as- samaa' calay -kum midraar(an) wa- yazid -kum qowah 'ilaa qowah -kum wa- laa tatawallaw mujrimen
qaalo yaa hod maa ji'ta -naa bi- bayyinah wa- maa nah.nu bi- taarike 'aalihah -naa can qawl -ka wa- maa nah.nu la- -ka bi- mu'minen
'in naqol 'illaa ictaraa -ka bacd. 'aalihah -naa bi- so' qaala 'inni -y ushhid 'allaah wa- ishhado 'an -ne bare' min maa tushrikon
min doni -hi fa- kedo -ne jamec(an) thumma laa tunz.iron
'inni -y tawakkaltu calaa 'allaah rabb -e wa- rabb -kum maa min daabbah 'illaa huwa 'aakhidh bi- naas.iyah -haa 'inna rabb -e calaa s.iraat. mustaqem
fa- 'in tawallaw fa- qad ablaghtu -kum maa ursiltu bi- -hi 'ilay -kum wa- yastakhlif rabb -e qawm(an) ghayr -kum wa- laa tad.urron -hu shay'(an) 'inna rabb -e calaa kull shay' h.afez.
wa- lammaa jaa'a 'amr -naa najjaynaa hod(an) wa- 'alladhena 'aamano maca -hu bi- rah.mah min -naa wa- najjaynaa -hum min cadhaab ghalez.
wa- tilka caadi(n) jah.ado bi- 'aayaat rabb -him wa- cas.aw rusul -hi wa- ittabaco 'amr kull jabbaar caned
wa- utbico fe haadhihi ad- dunyaa lacnah wa- yawm al- qiyaamah 'a-laa 'inna caad(an) kafaro rabb -hum 'a-laa bucd(an) li- caad qawm hod

wa- 'ilaa thamod 'akhaa -hum s.aalih.(an) qaala yaa qawm -e ucbudo 'allaah maa la- -kum min 'ilaah ghayr -hu huwa ansha'a -kum min al- 'ard. wa- istacmara -kum fe -haa fa- istaghfiro -hu thumma tobo 'ilay -hi 'inna rabb -e qareb mujeb
qaalo yaa s.aalih. qad kunta fe -naa marjow(an) qabla haadhaa 'a- tanhaa -naa 'an nacbud maa yacbud 'aabaa' -naa wa- 'inna -naa la- fe shakk min maa tadco -naa 'ilay -hi mureb
qaala yaa qawm -e 'a- ra'aytum 'in kuntu calaa bayyinah min rabb -e wa- 'aataa -ne min -hu rah.mah fa- man yans.ur -ne min 'allaah 'in cas.aytu -hu fa- maa tazedon -ne ghayr takhser
wa- yaa qawm -i haadhihi naaqah 'allaah la- -kum 'aayah fa- dharo -haa ta'kul fe 'ard. 'allaah wa- laa tamasso -haa bi- so' fa- ya'khudh -kum cadhaab qareb
fa- caqaro -haa fa- qaala tamattaco fe daar -kum thalaathah ayyaam dhaalika wacd ghayr makdhob
fa- lammaa jaa'a 'amr -naa najjaynaa s.aalih.(an) wa- 'alladhena 'aamano maca -hu bi- rah.mah min -naa wa- min khizy yawmi'idhin 'inna rabb -ka huwa al- qawey al- cazez
wa- 'akhadha 'alladhena z.alamo as.- s.ayh.ah fa- as.bah.o fe diyaar -him jaathimen
ka-'an lam yaghnaw fe -haa 'a-laa 'inna thamod kafaro rabb -hum 'a-laa bucd(an) li- thamod
wa- la- qad jaa'at rusul -naa 'ibraahem bi- al- bushraa qaalo salaam(an) qaala salaam fa- maa labitha 'an jaa'a bi- cijl h.anedh
fa- lammaa ra'aa ayde -him laa tas.il 'ilay -hi nakira -hum wa- awjasa min -hum khefah qaalo laa takhaf 'in(na) -naa ursilnaa 'ilaa qawm lot.
wa- imra'ah -hu qaa'imah fa- d.ah.ikat fa- bashsharnaa -haa bi- 'ish.aaq wa- min waraa'a 'ish.aaq yacqob
qaalat yaa waylah -taa 'a- alid wa- 'anaa cajoz wa- haadhaa bacl -e shaykh(an) 'inna haadhaa la- shay' cajeb
qaalo 'a- tacjabena min 'amr 'allaah rah.mah 'allaah wa- barakaat -hu calay -kum 'ahl al- bayt 'inna -hu h.amed majed
fa- lammaa dhahaba can 'ibraahem ar- rawc wa- jaa'at -hu al- bushraa yujaadil -naa fe qawm lot.
'inna 'ibraahem la- h.alem 'awwaah muneb
yaa 'ibraahem acrid. can haadhaa 'inna -hu qad jaa'a 'amr rabb -ka wa- 'inna -hum 'aate -him cadhaab ghayr mardod
wa- lammaa jaa'at rusul -naa lot.(an) se'a bi- -him wa- d.aaqa bi- -him dharc(an) wa- qaala haadhaa yawm cas.eb

wa- jaa'a -hu qawm -hu yuhracon 'ilay -hi wa- min qablu kaano yacmalon as- sayyi'aat qaala yaa qawm -e haa'ulaa'i banaat -e hunna at.har la- -kum fa- ittaqo 'allaah wa- laa tukhzo -ni fe d.ayf -e 'a- laysa min -kum rajul rashed
qaalo la- qad calimta maa la- -naa fe banaat -ka min h.aqq wa- 'inna -ka la- taclam maa nured
qaala law 'anna li- -y bi- -kum qowah 'aw 'aawe 'ilaa rukn shaded

qaalo yaa lot. 'in(na) -naa rusul rabb -ka lan yas.ilo 'ilay -ka fa- asri bi- 'ahl -ka bi- qit.c min al- layl wa- laa yaltafit min -kum 'ah.ad 'illaa imra'ah -ka 'inna -hu mus.eb -haa maa as.aaba -hum 'inna mawcid -hum as.- s.ubh. 'a- laysa as.- s.ubh. bi- qareb
fa- lammaa jaa'a 'amr -naa jacalnaa caaliy -haa saafil -haa wa- amt.arnaa calay -haa h.ijaarah min sijjel mand.od
musawwamah cinda rabb -ka wa- maa hiya min az.- z.aalimen bi- baced

wa- 'ilaa madyan 'akhaa -hum shucayb(an) qaala yaa qawm -e ucbudo 'allaah maa la- -kum min 'ilaah ghayr -hu wa- laa tanqus.o al- mikyaal wa- al- mezaan 'inni -y araa -kum bi- khayr wa- 'inni -y akhaaf calay -kum cadhaab yawm muh.et.
wa- yaa qawm -e awfo al- mikyaal wa- al- mezaan bi- al- qist. wa- laa tabkhaso an- naas ashyaa' -hum wa- laa tacthaw fe al- 'ard. mufsiden
baqeyah 'allaah khayr la- -kum 'in kuntum mu'minen wa- maa 'anaa calay -kum bi- h.afez.
qaalo yaa shucayb 'a- s.alaah -ka ta'mur -ka 'an natruk maa yacbud 'aabaa' -naa 'aw 'an nafcal fe amwaal -naa maa nashaa' 'inna -ka la- 'anta al- h.alem ar- rashed

qaala yaa qawm -e 'a- ra'aytum 'in kuntu calaa bayyinah min rabb -e wa- razaqa -ne min -hu rizq(an) h.asan(an) wa- maa ured 'an ukhaalif -kum 'ilaa maa anhaa -kum can -hu 'in ured 'illaa al- is.laah. maa istat.actu wa- maa tawfeq -e 'illaa bi- 'allaah calay -hi tawakkaltu wa- 'ilay -hi uneb
wa- yaa qawm -i laa yajrimanna -kum shiqaaq -e 'an yus.eb -kum mithl maa as.aaba qawm noh. 'aw qawm hod 'aw qawm s.aalih. wa- maa qawm lot. min -kum bi- baced
wa- istaghfiro rabb -kum thumma tobo 'ilay -hi 'inna rabb -e rah.em wadod
qaalo yaa shucayb maa nafqah kather(an) min maa taqol wa- 'in(na) -naa la- naraa -ka fe -naa d.acef(an) wa- law-laa raht. -ka la- rajamnaa -ka wa- maa 'anta calay -naa bi- cazez
qaala yaa qawm -i 'a- raht. -e acazz calay -kum min 'allaah wa- ittakhadhtumo -hu waraa'a -kum z.ihrey(an) 'inna rabb -e bi- maa tacmalon muh.et.
wa- yaa qawm -i icmalo calaa makaanah -kum 'inni -y caamil sawfa taclamon man ya'te -hi cadhaab yukhze -hi wa- man huwa kaadhib wa- irtaqibo 'inni -y maca -kum raqeb
wa- lammaa jaa'a 'amr -naa najjaynaa shucayb(an) wa- 'alladhena 'aamano maca -hu bi- rah.mah min -naa wa- 'akhadhat 'alladhena z.alamo as.- s.ayh.ah fa- as.bah.o fe diyaar -him jaathimen
ka-'an lam yaghnaw fe -haa 'a-laa bucd(an) li- madyan ka-maa bacudat thamod
wa- la- qad arsalnaa mosaa bi- 'aayaat -naa wa- sult.aan muben
'ilaa fircawn wa- mala' -hi fa- ittabaco 'amr fircawn wa- maa 'amr fircawn bi- rashed
yaqdum qawm -hu yawm al- qiyaamah fa- awrada -hum an- naar wa- bi's al- wird al- mawrod
wa- utbico fe haadhihi lacnah wa- yawm al- qiyaamah bi's ar- rifd al- marfod
dhaalika min anbaa' al- quraa naqus.s. -hu calay -ka min -haa qaa'im wa- h.as.ed
wa- maa z.alamnaa -hum wa- laakin z.alamo anfus -hum fa- maa aghnat can -hum 'aalihah -hum 'allate yadcon min doni 'allaah min shay' lammaa jaa'a 'amr rabb -ka wa- maa zaado -hum ghayr tatbeb
wa- ka- dhaalika 'akhdh rabb -ka 'idhaa 'akhadha al- quraa wa- hiya z.aalimah 'inna 'akhdh -hu 'alem shaded
'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayah li- man khaafa cadhaab al- 'aakhirah dhaalika yawm majmoc la- -hu an- naas wa- dhaalika yawm mashhod
wa- maa nu'akhkhir -hu 'illaa li- 'ajal macdod
yawm ya'ti laa takallam nafs 'illaa bi- 'idhn -hi fa- min -hum shaqey wa- saced
fa- 'ammaa 'alladhena shaqo fa- fe an- naar la- -hum fe -haa zafer wa- shaheq
khaaliden fe -haa maa daamat as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. 'illaa maa shaa'a rabb -ka 'inna rabb -ka faccaal li- maa yured
wa- 'ammaa 'alladhena sucido fa- fe al- jannah khaaliden fe -haa maa daamat as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. 'illaa maa shaa'a rabb -ka cat.aa'(an) ghayr majdhodh
fa- laa taku(n) fe miryah min maa yacbud haa'ulaa'i maa yacbudon 'illaa ka-maa yacbud 'aabaa' -hum min qablu wa- 'in(na) -naa la- muwaffo -hum nas.eb -hum ghayr manqos.
wa- la- qad 'aataynaa mosaa al- kitaab fa- ikhtulifa fe -hi wa- law-laa kalimah sabaqat min rabb -ka la- qud.iya bayna -hum wa- 'inna -hum la- fe shakk min -hu mureb
wa- 'inna kull(an) lammaa la- yuwaffiyanna -hum rabb -ka acmaal -hum 'inna -hu bi- maa yacmalon khaber
fa- istaqim ka-maa 'umirta wa- man taaba maca -ka wa- laa tat.ghaw 'inna -hu bi- maa tacmalon bas.er
wa- laa tarkano 'ilaa 'alladhena z.alamo fa- tamass -kum an- naar wa- maa la- -kum min doni 'allaah min awliyaa' thumma laa tuns.aron
wa- aqim as.- s.alaah t.arafai an- nahaar wa- zulaf(an) min al- layl 'inna al- h.asanaat yudhhibna as- sayyi'aat dhaalika dhikraa li- adh- dhaakiren
wa- is.bir fa- 'inna 'allaah laa yud.ec 'ajr al- muh.sinen

fa- law-laa kaana min al- quron min qabli -kum 'olo baqeyah yanhawn can al- fasaad fe al- 'ard. 'illaa qalel(an) min man anjaynaa min -hum wa- ittabaca 'alladhena z.alamo maa utrifo fe -hi wa- kaano mujrimen
wa- maa kaana rabb -ka li- yuhlik al- quraa bi- z.ulm wa- 'ahl -haa mus.lih.on
wa- law shaa'a rabb -ka la- jacala an- naas 'ummah waah.idah wa- laa yazaalon mukhtalifen
'illaa man rah.ima rabb -ka wa- li- dhaalika khalaqa -hum wa- tammat kalimah rabb -ka la- amla'anna jahannam min al- jinnah wa- an- naas ajmacen
wa- kull(an) naqus.s. calay -ka min anbaa' ar- rusul maa nuthabbit bi- -hi fu'aad -ka wa- jaa'a -ka fe haadhihi al- h.aqq wa- mawciz.ah wa- dhikraa li- al- mu'minen
wa- qul li- 'alladhena laa yu'minon icmalo calaa makaanah -kum 'in(na) -naa caamilon
wa- intaz.iro 'in(na) -naa muntaz.iron
wa- li- 'allaah ghayb as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- 'ilay -hi yurjac al- 'amr kull -hu fa- ucbud -hu wa- tawakkal calay -hi wa- maa rabb -ka bi- ghaafil can maa tacmalon
alif-laam-raa' tilka 'aayaat al- kitaab al- muben
'in(na) -naa anzalnaa -hu qur'aan(an) carabey(an) lacalla -kum tacqilon
nah.nu naqus.s. calay -ka ah.san al- qas.as. bi- maa awh.aynaa 'ilay -ka haadhaa al- qur'aan wa- 'in kunta min qabli -hi la- min al- ghaafilen
'idh qaala yosuf li- 'abe -hi yaa 'ab -ti 'inni -y ra'aytu 'ah.ad cashar kawkab(an) wa- ash- shams wa- al- qamar ra'aytu -hum li- -y saajiden
qaala yaa bunay -ya laa taqs.us. ru'yaa -ka calaa 'ikhwah -ka fa- yakedo la- -ka kayd(an) 'inna ash- shayt.aan li- al- 'insaan cadow muben

wa- ka- dhaalika yajtabe -ka rabb -ka wa- yucallim -ka min ta'wel al- ah.aadeth wa- yutimm nicmah -hu calay -ka wa- calaa 'aal yacqob ka-maa atamma -haa calaa 'abawai -ka min qabli 'ibraahem wa- 'ish.aaq 'inna rabb -ka calem h.akem
la- qad kaana fe yosuf wa- 'ikhwah -hi 'aayaat li- as- saa'ilen
'idh qaalo la- yosuf wa- 'akho -hu ah.abb 'ilaa 'abe -naa min -naa wa- nah.nu cus.bah 'inna 'abaa -naa la- fe d.alaal muben
uqtulo yosuf 'aw it.rah.o -hu 'ard.(an) yakhlu la- -kum wajh 'abe -kum wa- takono min bacdi -hi qawm(an) s.aalih.en
qaala qaa'il min -hum laa taqtulo yosuf wa- alqo -hu fe ghayaabah al- jubb yaltaqit. -hu bacd. as- sayyaarah 'in kuntum faacilen
qaalo yaa 'abaa -naa maa la- -ka laa ta'man -naa calaa yosuf wa- 'in(na) -naa la- -hu la- naas.ih.on
arsil -hu maca -naa ghad(an) yartac wa- yalcab wa- 'in(na) -naa la- -hu la- h.aafiz.on
qaala 'inni -y la- yah.zun -ne 'an tadhhabo bi- -hi wa- akhaaf 'an ya'kul -hu adh- dhi'b wa- 'antum can -hu ghaafilon
qaalo la- 'in 'akala -hu adh- dhi'b wa- nah.nu cus.bah 'in(na) -naa 'idhan la- khaasiron
fa- lammaa dhahabo bi- -hi wa- ajmaco 'an yajcalo -hu fe ghayaabah al- jubb wa- awh.aynaa 'ilay -hi la- tunabbi'anna -hum bi- 'amr -him haadhaa wa- hum laa yashcuron
wa- jaa'o 'abaa -hum cishaa'(an) yabkon
qaalo yaa 'abaa -naa 'in(na) -naa dhahabnaa nastabiq wa- taraknaa yosuf cinda mataac -naa fa- 'akala -hu adh- dhi'b wa- maa 'anta bi- mu'min la- -naa wa- law kunnaa s.aadiqen
wa- jaa'o calaa qames. -hi bi- dam kadhib qaala bal sawwalat la- -kum anfus -kum 'amr(an) fa- s.abr jamel wa- 'allaah al- mustacaan calaa maa tas.ifon
wa- jaa'at sayyaarah fa- arsalo waarid -hum fa- adlaa dalw -hu qaala yaa bushraa haadhaa ghulaam wa- asarro -hu bid.aacah wa- 'allaah calem bi- maa yacmalon
wa- sharaw -hu bi- thaman bakhs daraahim macdodah wa- kaano fe -hi min az- zaahiden

wa- qaala 'alladhe ishtaraa -hu min mis.r li- imra'ah -hi akrime mathwaa -hu casaa 'an yanfac -naa 'aw nattakhidh -hu walad(an) wa- ka- dhaalika makkannaa li- yosuf fe al- 'ard. wa- li- nucallim -hu min ta'wel al- ah.aadeth wa- 'allaah ghaalib calaa 'amr -hi wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yaclamon
wa- lammaa balagha ashudd -hu 'aataynaa -hu h.ukm(an) wa- cilm(an) wa- ka- dhaalika najze al- muh.sinen

wa- raawadat -hu 'allate huwa fe bayt -haa can nafs -hi wa- ghallaqat al- abwaab wa- qaalat hayta la- -ka qaala macaadh 'allaah 'inna -hu rabb -e ah.sana mathwaa -ya 'inna -hu laa yuflih. az.- z.aalimon
wa- la- qad hammat bi- -hi wa- hamma bi- -haa law-laa 'an ra'aa burhaan rabb -hi ka- dhaalika li- nas.rif can -hu as- so' wa- al- fah.shaa' 'inna -hu min cibaad -naa al- mukhlas.en
wa- istabaqaa al- baab wa- qaddat qames. -hu min dubur wa- alfayaa sayyid -haa ladaa al- baab qaalat maa jazaa' man araada bi- 'ahl -ka so' 'illaa 'an yusjan 'aw cadhaab 'alem
qaala hiya raawadat -ne can nafs -e wa- shahida shaahid min 'ahl -haa 'in kaana qames. -hu qudda min qubul fa- s.adaqat wa- huwa min al- kaadhiben
wa- 'in kaana qames. -hu qudda min dubur fa- kadhabat wa- huwa min as.- s.aadiqen
fa- lammaa ra'aa qames. -hu qudda min dubur qaala 'inna -hu min kayd -kunna 'inna kayd -kunna caz.em
yosuf acrid. can haadhaa wa- istaghfire li- dhanb -ki 'inna -ki kunti min al- khaat.i'en
wa- qaala niswah fe al- madenah imra'ah al- cazez turaawid fataa -haa can nafs -hi qad shaghafa -haa h.ubb(an) 'in(na) -naa la- naraa -haa fe d.alaal muben

fa- lammaa samicat bi- makr -hinna arsalat 'ilay -hinna wa- actadat la- -hunna muttaka'(an) wa- 'atat kull waah.idah min -hunna sikken(an) wa- qaalat ukhruj calay -hinna fa- lammaa ra'ayna -hu akbarna -hu wa- qat.t.acna aydiya -hunna wa- qulna h.aasha li- 'allaah maa haadhaa bashar(an) 'in haadhaa 'illaa malak karem
qaalat fa- dhaalikunna 'alladhe lumtunna -ne fe -hi wa- la- qad raawadtu -hu can nafs -hi fa- istacs.ama wa- la- 'in lam yafcal maa 'aamur -hu la- yusjananna wa- la- yakon(an) min as.- s.aaghiren
qaala rabb -i as- sijn ah.abb 'ilay -ya min maa yadcon -ne 'ilay -hi wa- 'illaa tas.rif can -ne kayd -hunna as.bu 'ilay -hinna wa- akun min al- jaahilen
fa- istajaaba la- -hu rabb -hu fa- s.arafa can -hu kayd -hunna 'inna -hu huwa as- samec al- calem
thumma badaa la- -hum min bacdi maa ra'aw al- 'aayaat la- yasjununna -hu h.attaa h.en

wa- dakhala maca -hu as- sijn fatayaan qaala 'ah.ad -humaa 'inni -y araa -ne acs.ir khamr(an) wa- qaala al- 'aakhar 'inni -y araa -ne ah.mil fawqa ra's -e khubz(an) ta'kul at.- t.ayr min -hu nabbi' -naa bi- ta'wel -hi 'in(na) -naa naraa -ka min al- muh.sinen

qaala laa ya'te -kumaa t.acaam turzaqaan -hi 'illaa nabba'tu -kumaa bi- ta'wel -hi qabla 'an ya'tiya -kumaa dhaalikumaa min maa callama -ne rabb -e 'inni -y taraktu millah qawm laa yu'minon bi- 'allaah wa- hum bi- al- 'aakhirah hum kaafiron

wa- ittabactu millah 'aabaa' -e 'ibraahem wa- 'ish.aaq wa- yacqob maa kaana la- -naa 'an nushrik bi- 'allaah min shay' dhaalika min fad.l 'allaah calay -naa wa- calaa an- naas wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yashkuron
yaa s.aah.ibai as- sijn 'a- arbaab mutafarriqon khayr 'am 'allaah al- waah.id al- qahhaar

maa tacbudon min doni -hi 'illaa asmaa'(an) sammaytumo -haa 'antum wa- 'aabaa' -kum maa anzala 'allaah bi- -haa min sult.aan 'inna al- h.ukm 'illaa li- 'allaah 'amara 'an laa tacbudo 'illaa 'eyaa -hu dhaalika ad- den al- qayyim wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yaclamon
yaa s.aah.ibai as- sijn 'ammaa 'ah.ad -kumaa fa- yasqe rabb -hu khamr(an) wa- 'ammaa al- 'aakhar fa- yus.lab fa- ta'kul at.- t.ayr min ra's -hi qud.iya al- 'amr 'alladhe fe -hi tastaftiyaan
wa- qaala li- 'alladhe z.anna 'anna -hu naaji(n) min -humaa udhkur -ne cinda rabb -ka fa- ansaa -hu ash- shayt.aan dhikr rabb -hi fa- labitha fe as- sijn bid.c sinen

wa- qaala al- malik 'inni -y araa sabc baqaraat simaan ya'kul -hunna sabc cijaaf wa- sabc sunbulaat khud.r wa- 'ukhar yaabisaat yaa 'ayyuhaa al- mala' afto -ne fe ru'yaa -ya 'in kuntum li- ar- ru'yaa tacburon
qaalo ad.ghaath ah.laam wa- maa nah.nu bi- ta'wel al- ah.laam bi- caalimen
wa- qaala 'alladhe najaa min -humaa wa- iddaakara bacda 'ummah 'anaa unabbi' -kum bi- ta'wel -hi fa- arsilo -ni
yosuf 'ayyuhaa as.- s.iddeq afti -naa fe sabc baqaraat simaan ya'kul -hunna sabc cijaaf wa- sabc sunbulaat khud.r wa- 'ukhar yaabisaat lacalli -y arjic 'ilaa an- naas lacalla -hum yaclamon
qaala tazracon sabc sinen da'ab(an) fa- maa h.as.adtum fa- dharo -hu fe sunbul -hi 'illaa qalel(an) min maa ta'kulon
thumma ya'te min bacdi dhaalika sabc shidaad ya'kulna maa qaddamtum la- -hunna 'illaa qalel(an) min maa tuh.s.inon
thumma ya'te min bacdi dhaalika caam fe -hi yughaath an- naas wa- fe -hi yacs.iron
wa- qaala al- malik i'to -ne bi- -hi fa- lammaa jaa'a -hu ar- rasol qaala irjic 'ilaa rabb -ka fa- is'al -hu maa baal an- niswah 'allate qat.t.acna aydiya -hunna 'inna rabb -e bi- kayd -hinna calem

qaala maa khat.b -kunna 'idh raawadtunna yosuf can nafs -hi qulna h.aasha li- 'allaah maa calimnaa calay -hi min so' qaalat imra'ah al- cazez al-'aan h.as.h.as.a al- h.aqq 'anaa raawadtu -hu can nafs -hu wa- 'inna -hu la- min as.- s.aadiqen
dhaalika li- yaclam 'anni -y lam akhun -hu bi- al- ghayb wa- 'anna 'allaah laa yahde kayd al- khaa'inen
wa- maa ubarri' nafs -e 'inna an- nafs la- 'ammaarah bi- as- so' 'illaa maa rah.ima rabb -e 'inna rabb -e ghafor rah.em
wa- qaala al- malik i'to -ne bi- -hi astakhlis. -hu li- nafs -e fa- lammaa kallama -hu qaala 'inna -ka al- yawm laday -naa maken 'amen
qaala ijcal -ne calaa khazaa'in al- 'ard. 'inni -y h.afez. calem
wa- ka- dhaalika makkannaa li- yosuf fe al- 'ard. yatabawwa' min -haa h.aythu yashaa' nus.eb bi- rah.mah -naa man nashaa' wa- laa nud.ec 'ajr al- muh.sinen
wa- la- 'ajr al- 'aakhirah khayr li- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- kaano yattaqon
wa- jaa'a 'ikhwah yosuf fa- dakhalo calay -hi fa- carafa -hum wa- hum la- -hu munkiron
wa- lammaa jahhaza -hum bi- jahaaz -him qaala i'to -ne bi- 'akh la- -kum min 'abe -kum 'a-laa tarawn 'anni -y ofe al- kayl wa- 'anaa khayr al- munzilen
fa- 'in lam ta'to -ne bi- -hi fa- laa kayl la- -kum cindi -y wa- laa taqrabon
qaalo sa- nuraawid can -hu 'abaa -hu wa- 'in(na) -naa la- faacilon
wa- qaala li- fityaan -hi ijcalo bid.aacah -hum fe rih.aal -him lacalla -hum yacrifon -haa 'idhaa inqalabo 'ilaa 'ahl -him lacalla -hum yarjicon
fa- lammaa rajaco 'ilaa 'abe -him qaalo yaa 'abaa -naa munica min -naa al- kayl fa- arsil maca -naa 'akhaa -naa naktal wa- 'in(na) -naa la- -hu la- h.aafiz.on
qaala hal 'aaman -kum calay -hi 'illaa ka-maa 'amintu -kum calaa 'akhe -hi min qablu fa- 'allaah khayr h.aafiz.(an) wa- huwa arh.am ar- raah.imen

wa- lammaa fatah.o mataac -hum wajado bid.aacah -hum ruddat 'ilay -him qaalo yaa 'abaa -naa maa nabghe haadhihi bid.aacah -naa ruddat 'ilay -naa wa- namer 'ahl -naa wa- nah.faz. 'akhaa -naa wa- nazdaad kayl bacer dhaalika kayl yaser
qaala lan ursil -hu maca -kum h.attaa tu'to -ni mawthiq(an) min 'allaah la- ta'tunna -ne bi- -hi 'illaa 'an yuh.aat. bi- -kum fa- lammaa 'aataw -hu mawthiq -hum qaala 'allaah calaa maa naqol wakel

wa- qaala yaa bane -ya laa tadkhulo min baab waah.id wa- udkhulo min abwaab mutafarriqah wa- maa ughne can -kum min 'allaah min shay' 'in al- h.ukm 'illaa li- 'allaah calay -hi tawakkaltu wa- calay -hi fa- li- yatawakkal al- mutawakkilon

wa- lammaa dakhalo min h.aythu 'amara -hum 'abo -hum maa kaana yughne can -hum min 'allaah min shay' 'illaa h.aajah fe nafs yacqob qad.aa -haa wa- 'inna -hu la- dho cilm li- maa callamnaa -hu wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yaclamon
wa- lammaa dakhalo calaa yosuf 'aawaa 'ilay -hi 'akhaa -hu qaala 'inni -y 'anaa 'akho -ka fa- laa tabta'is bi- maa kaano yacmalon
fa- lammaa jahhaza -hum bi- jahaaz -him jacala as- siqaayah fe rah.l 'akhe -hi thumma 'adhdhana mu'adhdhin 'ayyatuhaa al- cer 'inna -ka la- saariqon
qaalo wa- aqbalo calay -him maa-dhaa tafqidon
qaalo nafqid s.uwaac al- malik wa- li- man jaa'a bi- -hi h.iml bacer wa- 'anaa bi- -hi zacem
qaalo ta- 'allaah la- qad calimtum maa ji'naa li- nufsid fe al- 'ard. wa- maa kunnaa saariqen
qaalo fa- maa jazaa' -hu 'in kuntum kaadhiben
qaalo jazaa' -hu man wujida fe rah.l -hi fa- huwa jazaa' -hu ka- dhaalika najze az.- z.aalimen

fa- bada'a bi- awciyah -him qabla wicaa' 'akhe -hi thumma istakhraja -haa min wicaa' 'akhe -hi ka- dhaalika kidnaa li- yosuf maa kaana li- ya'khudh 'akhaa -hu fe den al- malik 'illaa 'an yashaa' 'allaah narfac darajaat man nashaa' wa- fawqa kull dhe cilm calem
qaalo 'in yasriq fa- qad saraqa 'akh la- -hu min qablu fa- asarra -haa yosuf fe nafs -hi wa- lam yubdi -haa la- -hum qaala 'antum sharr makaan(an) wa- 'allaah aclam bi- maa tas.ifon
qaalo yaa 'ayyuhaa al- cazez 'inna la- -hu 'ab(an) shaykh(an) kaber(an) fa- khudh 'ah.ad -naa makaan -hu 'in(na) -naa naraa -ka min al- muh.sinen
qaala macaadh 'allaah 'an na'khudh 'illaa man wajadnaa mataac -naa cinda -hu 'in(na) -naa 'idhan la- z.aalimon

fa- lammaa istay'aso min -hu khalas.o najey(an) qaala kaber -hum 'a- lam taclamo 'anna 'abaa -kum qad 'akhadha calay -kum mawthiq(an) min 'allaah wa- min qablu maa farrat.tum fe yosuf fa- lan abrah. al- 'ard. h.attaa ya'dhan li- -y 'ab -e 'aw yah.kum 'allaah li- -y wa- huwa khayr al- h.aakimen
irjico 'ilaa 'abe -kum fa- qolo yaa 'abaa -naa 'inna ibn -ka saraqa wa- maa shahidnaa 'illaa bi- maa calimnaa wa- maa kunnaa li- al- ghayb h.aafiz.en
wa- is'al al- qaryah 'allate kunnaa fe -haa wa- al- cer 'allate aqbalnaa fe -haa wa- 'in(na) -naa la- s.aadiqon
qaala bal sawwalat la- -kum anfus -kum 'amr(an) fa- s.abr jamel casaa 'allaah 'an ya'tiya -ne bi- -him jamec(an) 'inna -hu huwa al- calem al- h.akem
wa- tawallaa can -hum wa- qaala yaa 'asaf -aa calaa yosuf wa- ibyad.d.at caynaa -hu min al- h.uzn fa- huwa kaz.em
qaalo ta- 'allaah tafta' tadhkur yosuf h.attaa takon h.arad.(an) 'aw takon min al- haaliken
qaala 'inna-maa ashko bathth -e wa- h.uzn -e 'ilaa 'allaah wa- aclam min 'allaah maa laa taclamon
yaa bane -ya idhhabo fa- tah.assaso min yosuf wa- 'akhe -hi wa- laa tay'aso min rawh. 'allaah 'inna -hu laa yay'as min rawh. 'allaah 'illaa al- qawm al- kaafiron

fa- lammaa dakhalo calay -hi qaalo yaa 'ayyuhaa al- cazez massa -naa wa- 'ahl -naa ad.- d.urr wa- ji'naa bi- bid.aacah muzjaah fa- awfi la- -naa al- kayl wa- tas.addaq calay -naa 'inna 'allaah yajze al- mutas.addiqen
qaala hal calimtum maa facaltum bi- yosuf wa- 'akhe -hi 'idh 'antum jaahilon
qaalo 'a- 'inna -ka la- 'anta yosuf qaala 'anaa yosuf wa- haadhaa 'akh -e qad manna 'allaah calay -naa 'inna -hu man yattaqi wa- yas.bir fa- 'inna 'allaah laa yud.ec 'ajr al- muh.sinen
qaalo ta- 'allaah la- qad 'aathara -ka 'allaah calay -naa wa- 'in kunnaa la- khaat.i'en
qaala laa tathreb calay -kum al- yawm yaghfir 'allaah la- -kum wa- huwa arh.am ar- raah.imen
idhhabo bi- qames. -e haadhaa fa- alqo -hu calaa wajh 'ab -e ya'ti bas.er(an) wa- i'to -ne bi- 'ahl -kum ajmacen
wa- lammaa fas.alat al- cer qaala 'abo -hum 'inni -y la- ajid reh. yosuf law-laa 'an tufannido -ni
qaalo ta- 'allaah 'inna -ka la- fe d.alaal -ka al- qadem
fa- lammaa 'an jaa'a al- basher alqaa -hu calaa wajh -hi fa- irtadda bas.er(an) qaala 'a- lam aqul la- -kum 'inni -y aclam min 'allaah maa laa taclamon
qaalo yaa 'abaa -naa istaghfir la- -naa dhunob -naa 'in(na) -naa kunnaa khaat.i'en
qaala sawfa astaghfir la- -kum rabb -e 'inna -hu huwa al- ghafor ar- rah.em
fa- lammaa dakhalo calaa yosuf 'aawaa 'ilay -hi 'abawai -hi wa- qaala udkhulo mis.r 'in shaa'a 'allaah 'aaminen

wa- rafaca 'abawai -hi calaa al- carsh wa- kharro la- -hu sujjad(an) wa- qaala yaa 'ab -ti haadhaa ta'wel ru'yaa -ya min qablu qad jacala -haa rabb -e h.aqq(an) wa- qad ah.sana bi- -y 'idh akhraja -ne min as- sijn wa- jaa'a bi- -kum min al- badw min bacda 'an nazagha ash- shayt.aan bayni -y wa- bayna 'ikhwah -te 'inna rabb -e lat.ef li- maa yashaa' 'inna -hu huwa al- calem al- h.akem

rabb -i qad 'aatayta -ne min al- mulk wa- callamta -ne min ta'wel al- ah.aadeth faat.ir as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. 'anta waley -i fe ad- dunyaa wa- al- 'aakhirah tawaffa -ne muslim(an) wa- alh.iq -ne bi- as.- s.aalih.en
dhaalika min anbaa' al- ghayb noh.e -hi 'ilay -ka wa- maa kunta laday -him 'idh ajmaco 'amr -hum wa- hum yamkuron
wa- maa akthar an- naas wa- law h.aras.ta bi- mu'minen
wa- maa tas'al -hum calay -hi min 'ajr 'in huwa 'illaa dhikr li- al- caalamen
wa- ka-'ayyin min 'aayah fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. yamurron calay -haa wa- hum can -haa mucrid.on
wa- maa yu'min akthar -hum bi- 'allaah 'illaa wa- hum mushrikon
'a- fa- 'amino 'an ta'tiya -hum ghaashiyah min cadhaab 'allaah 'aw ta'tiya -hum as- saacah baghtah wa- hum laa yashcuron
qul haadhihi sabel -e adco 'ilaa 'allaah calaa bas.erah 'anaa wa- man ittabaca -ne wa- subh.aana 'allaah wa- maa 'anaa min al- mushriken

wa- maa arsalnaa min qabli -ka 'illaa rijaal(an) noh.e 'ilay -him min 'ahl al- quraa 'a- fa- lam yasero fe al- 'ard. fa- yanz.uro kayfa kaana caaqibah 'alladhena min qabli -him wa- la- daar al- 'aakhirah khayr li- 'alladhena ittaqaw 'a- fa- laa tacqilon
h.attaa 'idhaa istay'asa ar- rusul wa- z.anno 'anna -hum qad kudhibo jaa'a -hum nas.r -naa fa- nujjiya man nashaa' wa- laa yuradd ba's -naa can al- qawm al- mujrimen
la- qad kaana fe qas.as. -him cibrah li- 'ole al- albaab maa kaana h.adeth(an) yuftaraa wa- laakin tas.deq 'alladhe bayna yadai -hi wa- tafs.el kull shay' wa- huda(n) wa- rah.mah li- qawm yu'minon
alif-laam-mem-raa' tilka 'aayaat al- kitaab wa- 'alladhe unzila 'ilay -ka min rabb -ka al- h.aqq wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yu'minon

'allaah 'alladhe rafaca as- samaawaat bi- ghayr camad tarawn -haa thumma istawaa calaa al- carsh wa- sakhkhara ash- shams wa- al- qamar kull yajre li- 'ajal musamma(n) yudabbir al- 'amr yufas.s.il al- 'aayaat lacalla -kum bi- liqaa' rabb -kum toqinon

wa- huwa 'alladhe madda al- 'ard. wa- jacala fe -haa rawaasiya wa- anhaar(an) wa- min kull ath- thamaraat jacala fe -haa zawjain ithnain yughshe al- layl an- nahaar 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- qawm yatafakkaron

wa- fe al- 'ard. qit.ac mutajaawiraat wa- jannaat min acnaab wa- zarc wa- nakhel s.inwaan wa- ghayr s.inwaan yusqaa bi- maa' waah.id wa- nufad.d.il bacd. -haa calaa bacd. fe al- 'ukul 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- qawm yacqilon

wa- 'in tacjab fa- cajab qawl -hum 'a- 'idhaa kunnaa turaab(an) 'a- 'in(na) -naa la- fe khalq jaded 'olaa'ika 'alladhena kafaro bi- rabb -him wa- 'olaa'ika al- aghlaal fe acnaaq -him wa- 'olaa'ika as.h.aab an- naar hum fe -haa khaalidon

wa- yastacjilon -ka bi- as- sayyi'ah qabla al- h.asanah wa- qad khalat min qabli -him al- mathulaat wa- 'inna rabb -ka la- dho maghfirah li- an- naas calaa z.ulm -him wa- 'inna rabb -ka la- shaded al- ciqaab
wa- yaqol 'alladhena kafaro law-laa unzila calay -hi 'aayah min rabb -hi 'inna-maa 'anta mundhir wa- li- kull qawm haadi(n)
'allaah yaclam maa tah.mil kull 'unthaa wa- maa taghed. al- arh.aam wa- maa tazdaad wa- kull shay' cinda -hu bi- miqdaar
caalim al- ghayb wa- ash- shahaadah al- kaber al- mutacaali
sawaa' min -kum man asarra al- qawl wa- man jahara bi- -hi wa- man huwa mustakhfi bi- al- layl wa- saarib bi- an- nahaar

la- -hu mucaqqibaat min bayna yadai -hi wa- min khalf -hi yah.faz.on -hu min 'amr 'allaah 'inna 'allaah laa yughayyir maa bi- qawm h.attaa yughayyiro maa bi- anfus -him wa- 'idhaa araada 'allaah bi- qawm so' fa- laa maradd la- -hu wa- maa la- -hum min doni -hi min waali(n)
huwa 'alladhe yure -kum al- barq khawf(an) wa- t.amac(an) wa- yunshi' as- sah.aab ath- thiqaal
wa- yusabbih. ar- racd bi- h.amd -hi wa- al- malaa'ikah min khefah -hi wa- yursil as.- s.awaaciq fa- yus.eb bi- -haa man yashaa' wa- hum yujaadilon fe 'allaah wa- huwa shaded al- mih.aal

la- -hu dacwah al- h.aqq wa- 'alladhena yadcon min doni -hi laa yastajebon la- -hum bi- shay' 'illaa ka- baasit. kaffai -hi 'ilaa al- maa' li- yablugh faa -hu wa- maa huwa bi- baaligh -hi wa- maa ducaa' al- kaafiren 'illaa fe d.alaal
wa- li- 'allaah yasjud man fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. t.awc(an) wa- karh(an) wa- z.ilaal -hum bi- al- ghudow wa- al- 'aas.aal

qul man rabb as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. qul 'allaah qul 'a- fa- ittakhadhtum min doni -hi awliyaa' laa yamlikon li- anfus -him nafc(an) wa- laa d.arr(an) qul hal yastawe al- acmaa wa- al- bas.er 'am hal tastawe az.- z.ulumaat wa- an- nor 'am jacalo li- 'allaah shurakaa' khalaqo ka- khalq -hi fa- tashaabaha al- khalq calay -him qul 'allaah khaaliq kull shay' wa- huwa al- waah.id al- qahhaar

anzala min as- samaa' maa' fa- saalat awdiyah bi- qadar -haa fa- ih.tamala as- sayl zabad(an) raabiy(an) wa- min maa yoqidon calay -hi fe an- naar ibtighaa' h.ilyah 'aw mataac zabad mithl -hi ka- dhaalika yad.rib 'allaah al- h.aqq wa- al- baat.il fa- 'ammaa az- zabad fa- yadhhab jufaa' wa- 'ammaa maa yanfac an- naas fa- yamkuth fe al- 'ard. ka- dhaalika yad.rib 'allaah al- amthaal

li- 'alladhena istajaabo li- rabb -him al- h.usnaa wa- 'alladhena lam yastajebo la- -hu law 'anna la- -hum maa fe al- 'ard. jamec(an) wa- mithl -hu maca -hu la- iftadaw bi- -hi 'olaa'ika la- -hum so' al- h.isaab wa- ma'waa -hum jahannam wa- bi's al- mihaad
'a- fa- man yaclam 'anna maa unzila 'ilay -ka min rabb -ka al- h.aqq ka- man huwa acmaa 'inna-maa yatadhakkar 'olo al- albaab
'alladhena yofon bi- cahd 'allaah wa- laa yanqud.on al- methaaq
wa- 'alladhena yas.ilon maa 'amara 'allaah bi- -hi 'an yos.al wa- yakhshawn rabb -hum wa- yakhaafon so' al- h.isaab

wa- 'alladhena s.abaro ibtighaa' wajh rabb -him wa- aqaamo as.- s.alaah wa- anfiqo min maa razaqnaa -hum sirr(an) wa- calaaniyah wa- yadra'on bi- al- h.asanah as- sayyi'ah 'olaa'ika la- -hum cuqbaa ad- daar
jannaat cadn yadkhulon -haa wa- man s.alah.a min 'aabaa' -him wa- azwaaj -him wa- dhurreyaat -hum wa- al- malaa'ikah yadkhulon calay -him min kull baab
salaam calay -kum bi- maa s.abartum fa- nicma cuqbaa ad- daar
wa- 'alladhena yanqud.on cahd 'allaah min bacdi methaaq -hi wa- yaqt.acon maa 'amara 'allaah bi- -hi 'an yos.al wa- yufsidon fe al- 'ard. 'olaa'ika la- -hum al- lacnah wa- la- -hum so' ad- daar
'allaah yabsut. ar- rizq li- man yashaa' wa- yaqdir wa- farih.o bi- al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- maa al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa fe al- 'aakhirah 'illaa mataac
wa- yaqol 'alladhena kafaro law-laa unzila calay -hi 'aayah min rabb -hi qul 'inna 'allaah yud.ill man yashaa' wa- yahde 'ilay -hi man anaaba
'alladhena 'aamano wa- tat.ma'inn qulob -hum bi- dhikr 'allaah 'a-laa bi- dhikr 'allaah tat.ma'inn al- qulob
'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat t.obaa la- -hum wa- h.usn ma'aab

ka- dhaalika arsalnaa -ka fe 'ummah qad khalat min qabli -haa 'umam li- tatluwa calay -him 'alladhe awh.aynaa 'ilay -ka wa- hum yakfuron bi- ar- rah.maan qul huwa rabb -e laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa calay -hi tawakkaltu wa- 'ilay -hi mataab -i

wa- law 'anna qur'aan(an) suyyirat bi- -hi al- jibaal 'aw qut.t.icat bi- -hi al- 'ard. 'aw kullima bi- -hi al- mawtaa bal li- 'allaah al- 'amr jamec(an) 'a- fa- lam yay'as 'alladhena 'aamano 'an law yashaa' 'allaah la- hadaa an- naas jamec(an) wa- laa yazaal 'alladhena kafaro tus.eb -hum bi- maa s.anaco qaaricah 'aw tah.ull qareb(an) min daar -him h.attaa ya'tiya wacd 'allaah 'inna 'allaah laa yukhlif al- mecaad
wa- la- qad istuhzi' bi- rusul min qabli -ka fa- amlaytu li- 'alladhena kafaro thumma 'akhadhtu -hum fa- kayfa kaana ciqaab -i

'a- fa- man huwa qaa'im calaa kull nafs bi- maa kasabat wa- jacalo li- 'allaah shurakaa' qul sammo -hum 'am tunabbi'on -hu bi- maa laa yaclam fe al- 'ard. 'am bi- z.aahir min al- qawl bal zuyyina li- 'alladhena kafaro makr -hum wa- s.addo can as- sabel wa- man yud.lil 'allaah fa- maa la- -hu min haadi(n)
la- -hum cadhaab fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- la- cadhaab al- 'aakhirah ashaqq wa- maa la- -hum min 'allaah min waaqi(n)
mathal al- jannah 'allate wucida al- muttaqon tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar 'ukul -haa daa'im wa- z.ill -haa tilka cuqbaa 'alladhena ittaqo wa- cuqbaa al- kaafiren an- naar

wa- 'alladhena 'aataynaa -hum al- kitaab yafrah.on bi- maa unzila 'ilay -ka wa- min al- ah.zaab man yunkir bacd. -hu qul 'inna-maa 'umirtu 'an acbud 'allaah wa- laa ushrik bi- -hi 'ilay -hi adco wa- 'ilay -hi ma'aab -i
wa- ka- dhaalika anzalnaa -hu h.ukm(an) carabey(an) wa- la- 'in ittabacta ahwaa' -hum bacda maa jaa'a -ka min al- cilm maa la- -ka min 'allaah min waley wa- laa waaqi(n)
wa- la- qad arsalnaa rusul(an) min qabli -ka wa- jacalnaa la- -hum azwaaj(an) wa- dhurreyah wa- maa kaana li- rasol 'an ya'tiya bi- 'aayah 'illaa bi- 'idhn 'allaah li- kull 'ajal kitaab
yamh.o 'allaah maa yashaa' wa- yuthbit wa- cinda -hu 'umm al- kitaab
wa- 'immaa nuriyanna -ka bacd. 'alladhe nacid -hum 'aw natawaffayanna -ka fa- 'inna-maa calay -ka al- balaagh wa- calay -naa al- h.isaab
'a- wa- lam yaraw 'an(na) -naa na'te al- 'ard. nanqus. -haa min at.raaf -haa wa- 'allaah yah.kum laa mucaqqib li- h.ukm -hi wa- huwa sarec al- h.isaab
wa- qad makara 'alladhena min qabli -him fa- li- 'allaah al- makr jamec(an) yaclam maa taksib kull nafs wa- sa- yaclam al- kuffaar li- man cuqbaa ad- daar
wa- yaqol 'alladhena kafaro lasta mursal(an) qul kafaa bi- 'allaah shahed(an) bayni -y wa- bayna -kum wa- man cinda -hu cilm al- kitaab
alif-laam-raa' kitaab anzalnaa -hu 'ilay -ka li- tukhrij an- naas min az.- z.ulumaat 'ilaa an- nor bi- 'idhn rabb -hum 'ilaa s.iraat. al- cazez al- h.amed
'allaah 'alladhe la- -hu maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- wayl li- al- kaafiren min cadhaab shaded
'alladhena yastah.ibbon al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa calaa al- 'aakhirah wa- yas.uddon can sabel 'allaah wa- yabghon -haa ciwaj(an) 'olaa'ika fe d.alaal baced
wa- maa arsalnaa min rasol 'illaa bi- lisaan qawm -hi li- yubayyin la- -hum fa- yud.ill 'allaah man yashaa' wa- yahde man yashaa' wa- huwa al- cazez al- h.akem
wa- la- qad arsalnaa mosaa bi- 'aayaat -naa 'an akhrij qawm -ka min az.- z.ulumaat 'ilaa an- nor wa- dhakkir -hum bi- ayyaam 'allaah 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- kull s.abbaar shakor

wa- 'idh qaala mosaa li- qawm -hi udhkuro nicmah 'allaah calay -kum 'idh anjaa -kum min 'aal fircawn yasomon -kum so' al- cadhaab wa- yudhabbih.on abnaa' -kum wa- yastah.yon nisaa' -kum wa- fe dhaalikum balaa' min rabb -kum caz.em
wa- 'idh ta'adhdhana rabb -kum la- 'in shakartum la- azedanna -kum wa- la- 'in kafartum 'inna cadhaab -e la- shaded
wa- qaala mosaa 'in takfuro 'antum wa- man fe al- 'ard. jamec(an) fa- 'inna 'allaah la- ghaney h.amed

'a- lam ya'ti -kum naba' 'alladhena min qabli -kum qawm noh. wa- caad wa- thamod wa- 'alladhena min bacdi -him laa yaclam -hum 'illaa 'allaah jaa'at -hum rusul -hum bi- al- bayyinaat fa- raddo ayde -him fe afwaah -him wa- qaalo 'in(na) -naa kafarnaa bi- maa ursiltum bi- -hi wa- 'in(na) -naa la- fe shakk min maa tadcon -naa 'ilay -hi mureb

qaalat rusul -hum 'a- fe 'allaah shakk faat.ir as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. yadco -kum li- yaghfir la- -kum min dhunob -kum wa- yu'akhkhir -kum 'ilaa 'ajal musamma(n) qaalo 'in 'antum 'illaa bashar mithl -naa turedon 'an tas.uddo -naa can maa kaana yacbud 'aabaa' -naa fa- i'to -naa bi- sult.aan muben

qaalat la- -hum rusul -hum 'in nah.nu 'illaa bashar mithl -kum wa- laakin 'allaah yamunn calaa man yashaa' min cibaad -hi wa- maa kaana la- -naa 'an na'tiya -kum bi- sult.aan 'illaa bi- 'idhn 'allaah wa- calaa 'allaah fa- li- yatawakkal al- mu'minon
wa- maa la- -naa 'an laa natawakkal calaa 'allaah wa- qad hadaa -naa subul -naa wa- la- nas.biranna calaa maa 'aadhaytumo -naa wa- calaa 'allaah fa- li- yatawakkal al- mutawakkilon
wa- qaala 'alladhena kafaro li- rusul -him la- nukhrijanna -kum min 'ard. -naa 'aw la- tacodunna fe millah -naa fa- awh.aa 'ilay -him rabb -hum la- nuhlikanna az.- z.aalimen
wa- la- nuskinanna -kum al- 'ard. min bacdi -him dhaalika li- man khaafa maqaam -e wa- khaafa waced -i
wa- istaftah.o wa- khaaba kull jabbaar caned
min waraa'i -hi jahannam wa- yusqaa min maa' s.aded
yatajarrac -hu wa- laa yakaad yusegh -hu wa- ya'te -hi al- mawt min kull makaan wa- maa huwa bi- mayyit wa- min waraa'i -hi cadhaab ghalez.
mathal 'alladhena kafaro bi- rabb -him acmaal -hum ka- ramaad ishtaddat bi- -hi ar- reh. fe yawm caas.if laa yaqdiron min maa kasabo calaa shay' dhaalika huwa ad.- d.alaal al- baced
'a- lam tara 'anna 'allaah khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. bi- al- h.aqq 'in yasha' yudhhib -kum wa- ya'ti bi- khalq jaded
wa- maa dhaalika calaa 'allaah bi- cazez

wa- barazo li- 'allaah jamec(an) fa- qaala ad.- d.ucafaa' li- 'alladhena istakbaro 'in(na) -naa kunnaa la- -kum tabac(an) fa- hal 'antum mughnon can -naa min cadhaab 'allaah min shay' qaalo law hadaa -naa 'allaah la- hadaynaa -kum sawaa' calay -naa 'a- jazicnaa 'am s.abarnaa maa la- -naa min mah.es.

wa- qaala ash- shayt.aan lammaa qud.iya al- 'amr 'inna 'allaah wacada -kum wacd al- h.aqq wa- wacadtu -kum fa- akhlaftu -kum wa- maa kaana li- -y calay -kum min sult.aan 'illaa 'an dacawtu -kum fa- istajabtum li- -y fa- laa talomo -ne wa- lomo anfus -kum maa 'anaa bi- mus.rikh -kum wa- maa 'antum bi- mus.rikhe -ya 'inni -y kafartu bi- maa ashraktumo -ne min qablu 'inna az.- z.aalimen la- -hum cadhaab 'alem
wa- udkhila 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -hi bi- 'idhn rabb -him tah.eyah -hum fe -haa salaam
'a- lam tara kayfa d.araba 'allaah mathal(an) kalimah t.ayyibah ka- shajarah t.ayyibah 'as.l -haa thaabit wa- farc -haa fe as- samaa'
tu'te 'ukul -haa kull h.en bi- 'idhn rabb -haa wa- yad.rib 'allaah al- amthaal li- an- naas lacalla -hum yatadhakkaron
wa- mathal kalimah khabethah ka- shajarah khabethah ijtuththat min fawqa al- 'ard. maa la- -haa min qaraar
yuthabbit 'allaah 'alladhena 'aamano bi- al- qawl ath- thaabit fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- fe al- 'aakhirah wa- yud.ill 'allaah az.- z.aalimen wa- yafcal 'allaah maa yashaa'
'a- lam tara 'ilaa 'alladhena baddalo nicmah 'allaah kufr(an) wa- ah.allo qawm -hum daar al- bawaar
jahannam yas.lawn -haa wa- bi's al- qaraar
wa- jacalo li- 'allaah andaad(an) li- yud.illo can sabel -hi qul tamattaco fa- 'inna mas.er -kum 'ilaa an- naar
qul li- cibaad -e 'alladhena 'aamano yuqemo as.- s.alaah wa- yunfiqo min maa razaqnaa -hum sirr(an) wa- calaaniyah min qablu 'an ya'tiya yawm laa bayc fe -hi wa- laa khilaal

'allaah 'alladhe khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- anzala min as- samaa' maa' fa- akhraja bi- -hi min ath- thamaraat rizq(an) la- -kum wa- sakhkhara la- -kum al- fulk li- tajriya fe al- bah.r bi- 'amr -hi wa- sakhkhara la- -kum al- anhaar
wa- sakhkhara la- -kum ash- shams wa- al- qamar daa'ibain wa- sakhkhara la- -kum al- layl wa- an- nahaar
wa- 'aataa -kum min kulla-maa sa'altumo -hu wa- 'in tacuddo nicmah 'allaah laa tuh.s.o -haa 'inna al- 'insaan la- z.alom kaffaar
wa- 'idh qaala 'ibraahem rabb ijcal haadhaa al- balad 'aamin(an) wa- ujnub -ne wa- bane -ya 'an nacbud al- as.naam
rabb -i 'in -hunna ad.lalna kather(an) min an- naas fa- man tabica -ne fa- 'inna -hu min -ne wa- man cas.aa -ne fa- 'inna -ka ghafor rah.em

rabb -naa 'inni -y askantu min dhurreyah -e bi- waadi ghayr dhe zarc cinda bayt -ka al- muh.arram rabb -naa li- yuqemo as.- s.alaah fa- ijcal af'idah min an- naas tahwe 'ilay -him wa- urzuq -hum min ath- thamaraat lacalla -hum yashkuron
rabb -naa 'inna -ka taclam maa nukhfe wa- maa nuclin wa- maa yakhfaa calaa 'allaah min shay' fe al- 'ard. wa- laa fe as- samaa'
al- h.amd li- 'allaah 'alladhe wahaba li- -y calaa al- kibar 'ismaacel wa- 'ish.aaq 'inna rabb -e la- samec ad- ducaa'
rabb ijcal -ne muqem as.- s.alaah wa- min dhurreyah -e rabb -naa wa- taqabbal ducaa' -i
rabb -naa ighfir li- -y wa- li- waalidai -ya wa- li- al- mu'minen yawm yaqom al- h.isaab
wa- laa tah.sabanna 'allaah ghaafil(an) can maa yacmal az.- z.aalimon 'inna-maa yu'akhkhir -hum li- yawm tashkhas. fe -hi al- abs.aar
muht.icen muqnice ru'os -him laa yartadd 'ilay -him t.arf -hum wa- af'idah -hum hawaa'

wa- andhir an- naas yawm ya'te -him al- cadhaab fa- yaqol 'alladhena z.alamo rabb -naa 'akhkhir -naa 'ilaa 'ajal qareb nujib dacwah -ka wa- nattabic ar- rusul 'a- wa- lam takono aqsamtum min qablu maa la- -kum min zawaal
wa- sakantum fe masaakin 'alladhena z.alamo anfus -hum wa- tabayyana la- -kum kayfa facalnaa bi- -him wa- d.arabnaa la- -kum al- amthaal
wa- qad makaro makr -hum wa- cinda 'allaah makr -hum wa- 'in kaana makr -hum li- tazol min -hu al- jibaal
fa- laa tah.sabanna 'allaah mukhlif wacd -hu rusul -hu 'inna 'allaah cazez dho intiqaam
yawm tubaddal al- 'ard. ghayr al- 'ard. wa- as- samaawaat wa- barazo li- 'allaah al- waah.id al- qahhaar
wa- taraa al- mujrimen yawma'idhin muqarranen fe al- as.faad
saraabel -hum min qat.iraan wa- taghshaa wujoh -hum an- naar
li- yajziya 'allaah kull nafs maa kasabat 'inna 'allaah sarec al- h.isaab
haadhaa balaagh li- an- naas wa- li- yundharo bi- -hi wa- li- yaclamo 'anna-maa huwa 'ilaah waah.id wa- li- yadhdhakkar 'olo al- albaab
alif-laam-raa' tilka 'aayaat al- kitaab wa- qur'aan muben
rubamaa yawadd 'alladhena kafaro law kaano muslimen
dhar -hum ya'kulo wa- yatamattaco wa- yulhi -him al- 'amal fa- sawfa yaclamon
wa- maa ahlaknaa min qaryah 'illaa wa- la- -haa kitaab maclom
maa tasbiq min 'ummah 'ajal -haa wa- maa yasta'khiron
wa- qaalo yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhe nuzzila calay -hi adh- dhikr 'inna -ka la- majnon
law-maa ta'te -naa bi- al- malaa'ikah 'in kunta min as.- s.aadiqen
maa nunazzil al- malaa'ikah 'illaa bi- al- h.aqq wa- maa kaano 'idhan munz.aren
'in(na) -naa nah.nu nazzalnaa adh- dhikr wa- 'in(na) -naa la- -hu la- h.aafiz.on
wa- la- qad arsalnaa min qabli -ka fe shiyac al- 'awwalen
wa- maa ya'te -him min rasol 'illaa kaano bi- -hi yastahzi'on
ka- dhaalika nasluk -hu fe qulob al- mujrimen
laa yu'minon bi- -hi wa- qad khalat sunnah al- 'awwalen
wa- law fatah.naa calay -him baab(an) min as- samaa' fa- z.allo fe -hi yacrujon
la- qaalo 'inna-maa sukkirat abs.aar -naa bal nah.nu qawm mash.oron
wa- la- qad jacalnaa fe as- samaa' buroj(an) wa- zayyannaa -haa li- an- naaz.iren
wa- h.afaz.naa -haa min kull shayt.aan rajem
'illaa man istaraqa as- samc fa- atbaca -hu shihaab muben
wa- al- 'ard. madadnaa -haa wa- alqaynaa fe -haa rawaasiya wa- anbatnaa fe -haa min kull shay' mawzon
wa- jacalnaa la- -kum fe -haa macaayish wa- man lastum la- -hu bi- raaziqen
wa- 'in min shay' 'illaa cinda -naa khazaa'in -hu wa- maa nunazzil -hu 'illaa bi- qadar maclom
wa- arsalnaa ar- riyaah. lawaaqih. fa- anzalnaa min as- samaa' maa' fa- asqaynaa -kumo -hu wa- maa 'antum la- -hu bi- khaazinen
wa- 'in(na) -naa la- nah.nu nuh.ye wa- numet wa- nah.nu al- waarithon
wa- la- qad calimnaa al- mustaqdimen min -kum wa- la- qad calimnaa al- musta'khiren
wa- 'inna rabb -ka huwa yah.shur -hum 'inna -hu h.akem calem
wa- la- qad khalaqnaa al- 'insaan min s.als.aal min h.ama' masnon
wa- al- jaann khalaqnaa -hu min qablu min naar as- samom
wa- 'idh qaala rabb -ka li- al- malaa'ikah 'inni -y khaaliq bashar(an) min s.als.aal min h.ama' masnon
fa- 'idhaa sawwaytu -hu wa- nafakhtu fe -hi min roh. -e fa- qaco la- -hu saajiden
fa- sajada al- malaa'ikah kull -hum ajmacon
'illaa 'ibles 'abaa 'an yakon maca as- saajiden
qaala yaa 'ibles maa la- -ka 'an laa takon maca as- saajiden
qaala lam akun li- asjud li- bashar khalaqta -hu min s.als.aal min h.ama' masnon
qaala fa- ukhruj min -haa fa- 'inna -ka rajem
wa- 'inna calay -ka al- lacnah 'ilaa yawm ad- den
qaala rabb -i fa- anz.ir -ne 'ilaa yawm yubcathon
qaala fa- 'inna -ka min al- munz.aren
'ilaa yawm al- waqt al- maclom
qaala rabb -i bi- maa aghwayta -ne la- uzayyinanna la- -hum fe al- 'ard. wa- la- ughwiyanna -hum ajmacen
'illaa cibaad -ka min -hum al- mukhlas.en
qaala haadhaa s.iraat. calay -ya mustaqem
'inna cibaad -e laysa la- -ka calay -him sult.aan 'illaa man ittabaca -ka min al- ghaawen
wa- 'inna jahannam la- mawcid -hum ajmacen
la- -haa sabcah abwaab li- kull baab min -hum juz'(an) maqsom
'inna al- muttaqen fe jannaat wa- cuyon
udkhulo -haa bi- salaam 'aaminen
wa- nazacnaa maa fe s.udor -him min ghill 'ikhwaan(an) calaa surur mutaqaabilen
laa yamass -hum fe -haa nas.ab wa- maa hum min -haa bi- mukhrajen
nabbi' cibaad -e 'anni -y 'anaa al- ghafor ar- rah.em
wa- 'anna cadhaab -e huwa al- cadhaab al- 'alem
wa- nabbi' -hum can d.ayf 'ibraahem
'idh dakhalo calay -hi fa- qaalo salaam(an) qaala 'in(na) -naa min -kum wajilon
qaalo laa tawjal 'in(na) -naa nubashshir -ka bi- ghulaam calem
qaala 'a- bashshartumo -ne calaa 'an massa -ne al- kibar fa- bi- maa tubashshiron
qaalo bashsharnaa -ka bi- al- h.aqq fa- laa takun min al- qaanit.en
qaala wa- man yaqnat. min rah.mah rabb -hi 'illaa ad.- d.aallon
qaala fa- maa khat.b -kum 'ayyuhaa al- mursalon
qaalo 'in(na) -naa ursilnaa 'ilaa qawm mujrimen
'illaa 'aal lot. 'in(na) -naa la- munajjo -hum ajmacen
'illaa imra'ah -hu qaddarnaa 'inna -haa la- min al- ghaabiren
fa- lammaa jaa'a 'aal lot. al- mursalon
qaala 'inna -kum qawm munkaron
qaalo bal ji'naa -ka bi- maa kaano fe -hi yamtaron
wa- 'ataynaa -ka bi- al- h.aqq wa- 'in(na) -naa la- s.aadiqon
fa- asri bi- 'ahl -ka bi- qit.c min al- layl wa- ittabic adbaar -hum wa- laa yaltafit min -kum 'ah.ad wa- imd.o h.aythu tu'maron
wa- qad.aynaa 'ilay -hi dhaalika al- 'amr 'anna daabir haa'ulaa'i maqt.oc mus.bih.en
wa- jaa'a 'ahl al- madenah yastabshiron
qaala 'inna haa'ulaa'i d.ayf -e fa- laa tafd.ah.o -ni
wa- ittaqo 'allaah wa- laa tukhzo -ni
qaalo 'a- wa- lam nanha -ka can al- caalamen
qaala haa'ulaa'i banaat -e 'in kuntum faacilen
la- camr -ka 'inna -hum la- fe sakrah -him yacmahon
fa- 'akhadhat -hum as.- s.ayh.ah mushriqen
fa- jacalnaa caaliy -haa saafil -haa wa- amt.arnaa calay -him h.ijaarah min sijjel
'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- al- mutawassimen
wa- 'inna -haa la- bi- sabel muqem
'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayah li- al- mu'minen
wa- 'in kaana as.h.aab al- 'aykah la- z.aalimen
fa- intaqamnaa min -hum wa- 'inna -humaa la- bi- 'imaam muben
wa- la- qad kadhdhaba as.h.aab al- h.ijr al- mursalen
wa- 'aataynaa -hum 'aayaat -naa fa- kaano can -haa mucrid.en
wa- kaano yanh.iton min al- jibaal buyot(an) 'aaminen
fa- 'akhadhat -hum as.- s.ayh.ah mus.bih.en
fa- maa aghnaa can -hum maa kaano yaksibon
wa- maa khalaqnaa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa 'illaa bi- al- h.aqq wa- 'inna as- saacah la- 'aatiyah fa- is.fah. as.- s.afh. al- jamel
'inna rabb -ka huwa al- khallaaq al- calem
wa- la- qad 'aataynaa -ka sabc(an) min al- mathaane wa- al- qur'aan al- caz.em
laa tamuddanna caynai -ka 'ilaa maa mattacnaa bi- -hi azwaaj(an) min -hum wa- laa tah.zan calay -him wa- ikhfid. janaah. -ka li- al- mu'minen
wa- qul 'inni -y 'anaa an- nadher al- muben
ka-maa anzalnaa calaa al- muqtasimen
'alladhena jacalo al- qur'aan cid.en
fa- wa- rabb -ka la- nas'alanna -hum ajmacen
can maa kaano yacmalon
fa- is.dac bi- maa tu'mar wa- acrid. can al- mushriken
'in(na) -naa kafaynaa -ka al- mustahzi'en
'alladhena yajcalon maca 'allaah 'ilaah(an) 'aakhar fa- sawfa yaclamon
wa- la- qad naclam 'anna -ka yad.eq s.adr -ka bi- maa yaqolon
fa- sabbih. bi- h.amd rabb -ka wa- kun min as- saajiden
wa- ucbud rabb -ka h.attaa ya'tiya -ka al- yaqen
'ataa 'amr 'allaah fa- laa tastacjilo -hu subh.aana -hu wa- tacaalaa can maa yushrikon
yunazzil al- malaa'ikah bi- ar- roh. min 'amr -hi calaa min yashaa' min cibaad -hi 'an andhiro 'anna -hu laa 'ilaah 'illaa 'anaa fa- ittaqo -ni
khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. bi- al- h.aqq tacaalaa can maa yushrikon
khalaqa al- 'insaan min nut.fah fa- 'idhaa huwa khas.em muben
wa- al- ancaam khalaqa -haa la- -kum fe -haa dif' wa- manaafic wa- min -haa ta'kulon
wa- la- -kum fe -haa jamaal h.ena tureh.on wa- h.ena tasrah.on
wa- tah.mil athqaal -kum 'ilaa balad lam takono baalighe -hi 'illaa bi- shiqq al- anfus 'inna rabb -kum la- ra'of rah.em
wa- al- khayl wa- al- bighaal wa- al- h.amer li- tarkabo -haa wa- zenah wa- yakhluq maa laa taclamon
wa- calaa 'allaah qas.d as- sabel wa- min -haa jaa'ir wa- law shaa'a la- hadaa -kum ajmacen
huwa 'alladhe anzala min as- samaa' maa' la- -kum min -hu sharaab wa- min -hu shajar fe -hi tusemon
yunbit la- -kum bi- -hi az- zarc wa- az- zayton wa- an- nakhel wa- al- acnaab wa- min kull ath- thamaraat 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayah li- qawm yatafakkaron
wa- sakhkhara la- -kum al- layl wa- an- nahaar wa- ash- shams wa- al- qamar wa- an- nujom musakhkharaat bi- 'amr -hi 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- qawm yacqilon
wa- maa dhara'a la- -kum fe al- 'ard. mukhtalif(an) alwaan -hu 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayah li- qawm yadhdhakkaron

wa- huwa 'alladhe sakhkhara al- bah.r li- ta'kulo min -hu lah.m(an) t.arey(an) wa- tastakhrijo min -hu h.ilyah talbason -haa wa- taraa al- fulk mawaakhir fe -hi wa- li- tabtagho min fad.l -hi wa- lacalla -kum tashkuron
wa- alqaa fe al- 'ard. rawaasiya 'an tamed bi- -kum wa- anhaar(an) wa- subul(an) lacalla -kum tahtadon
wa- calaamaat wa- bi- an- najm hum yahtadon
'a- fa- man yakhluq ka- man laa yakhluq 'a- fa- laa tadhakkaron
wa- 'in tacuddo nicmah 'allaah laa tuh.s.o -haa 'inna 'allaah la- ghafor rah.em
wa- 'allaah yaclam maa tusirron wa- maa tuclinon
wa- 'alladhena yadcon min doni 'allaah laa yakhluqon shay'(an) wa- hum yukhlaqon
amwaat ghayr ah.yaa' wa- maa yashcuron 'ayyaana yubcathon
'ilaah -kum 'ilaah waah.id fa- 'alladhena laa yu'minon bi- al- 'aakhirah qulob -hum munkirah wa- hum mustakbiron
laa jaram 'anna 'allaah yaclam maa yusirron wa- maa yuclinon 'inna -hu laa yuh.ibb al- mustakbiren
wa- 'idhaa qela la- -hum maa-dhaa anzala rabb -kum qaalo asaat.er al- 'awwalen
li- yah.milo awzaar -hum kaamilah yawm al- qiyaamah wa- min awzaar 'alladhena yud.illon -hum bi- ghayr cilm 'a-laa saa'a maa yaziron
qad makara 'alladhena min qabli -him fa- 'ataa 'allaah bunyaan -hum min al- qawaacid fa- kharra calay -him as- saqf min fawqi -hum wa- 'ataa -hum al- cadhaab min h.aythu laa yashcuron
thumma yawm al- qiyaamah yukhze -him wa- yaqol 'ayna shurakaa' -e 'alladhena kuntum tushaaqqon fe -him qaala 'alladhena 'oto al- cilm 'inna al- khizy al- yawm wa- as- so' calaa al- kaafiren
'alladhena tatawaffaa -hum al- malaa'ikah z.aalime anfus -him fa- alqaw as- salam maa kunnaa nacmal min so' balaa 'inna 'allaah calem bi- maa kuntum tacmalon
fa- udkhulo abwaab jahannam khaaliden fe -haa fa- la- bi's mathwaa al- mutakabbiren
wa- qela li- 'alladhena ittaqaw maa-dhaa anzala rabb -kum qaalo khayr(an) li- 'alladhena ah.sano fe haadhihi ad- dunyaa h.asanah wa- la- daar al- 'aakhirah khayr wa- la- nicma daar al- muttaqen
jannaat cadn yadkhulon -haa tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar la- -hum fe -haa maa yashaa'on ka- dhaalika yajze 'allaah al- muttaqen
'alladhena tatawaffaa -hum al- malaa'ikah t.ayyiben yaqolon salaam calay -kum udkhulo al- jannah bi- maa kuntum tacmalon
hal yanz.uron 'illaa 'an ta'tiya -him al- malaa'ikah 'aw ya'tiya 'amr rabb -ka ka- dhaalika facala 'alladhena min qabli -him wa- maa z.alama -hum 'allaah wa- laakin kaano anfus -hum yaz.limon
fa- as.aaba -hum sayyi'aat maa camilo wa- h.aaqa bi- -him maa kaano bi- -hi yastahzi'on

wa- qaala 'alladhena ashrako law shaa'a 'allaah maa cabadnaa min doni -hi min shay' nah.nu wa- laa 'aabaa' -naa wa- laa h.arramnaa min doni -hi min shay' ka- dhaalika facala 'alladhena min qabli -him fa- hal calaa ar- rusul 'illaa al- balaagh al- muben

wa- la- qad bacathnaa fe kull 'ummah rasol(an) 'an ucbudo 'allaah wa- ijtanibo at.- t.aaghot fa- min -hum man hadaa 'allaah wa- min -hum man h.aqqat calay -hi ad.- d.alaalah fa- sero fe al- 'ard. fa- unz.uro kayfa kaana caaqibah al- mukadhdhiben
'in tah.ris. calaa hudaa -hum fa- 'inna 'allaah laa yahde man yud.ill wa- maa la- -hum min naas.iren
wa- aqsamo bi- 'allaah jahd aymaan -him laa yabcath 'allaah man yamot balaa wacd(an) calay -hi h.aqq(an) wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yaclamon
li- yubayyin la- -hum 'alladhe yakhtalifon fe -hi wa- li- yaclam 'alladhena kafaro 'anna -hum kaano kaadhiben
'inna-maa qawl -naa li- shay' 'idhaa aradnaa -hu 'an naqol la- -hu kun fa- yakon
wa- 'alladhena haajaro fe 'allaah min bacdi maa z.ulimo la- nubawwi'anna -hum fe ad- dunyaa h.asanah wa- la- 'ajr al- 'aakhirah akbar law kaano yaclamon
'alladhena s.abaro wa- calaa rabb -him yatawakkalon
wa- maa arsalnaa min qabli -ka 'illaa rijaal(an) noh.e 'ilay -him fa- is'alo 'ahl adh- dhikr 'in kuntum laa taclamon
bi- al- bayyinaat wa- az- zubur wa- anzalnaa 'ilay -ka adh- dhikr li- tubayyin li- an- naas maa nuzzila 'ilay -him wa- lacalla -hum yatafakkaron
'a- fa- 'amina 'alladhena makaro as- sayyi'aat 'an yakhsif 'allaah bi- -him al- 'ard. 'aw ya'tiya -hum al- cadhaab min h.aythu laa yashcuron
'aw ya'khudh -hum fe taqallub -him fa- maa hum bi- mucjizen
'aw ya'khudh -hum calaa takhawwuf fa- 'inna rabb -kum la- ra'of rah.em
'a- wa- lam yaraw 'ilaa maa khalaqa 'allaah min shay' yatafayya' z.ilaal -hu can al- yamen wa- ash- shamaa'il sujjad(an) li- 'allaah wa- hum daakhiron
wa- li- 'allaah yasjud maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. min daabbah wa- al- malaa'ikah wa- hum laa yastakbiron
yakhaafon rabb -hum min fawqi -him wa- yafcalon maa yu'maron
wa- qaala 'allaah laa tattakhidho 'ilaahain ithnain 'inna-maa huwa 'ilaah waah.id fa- 'eyaa -ya fa- irhabo -ni
wa- la- -hu maa fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- la- -hu ad- den waas.ib(an) 'a- fa- ghayr 'allaah tattaqon
wa- maa bi- -kum min nicmah fa- min 'allaah thumma 'idhaa massa -kum ad.- d.urr fa- 'ilay -hi taj'aron
thumma 'idhaa kashafa ad.- d.urr can -kum 'idhaa fareq min -kum bi- rabb -him yushrikon
li- yakfuro bi- maa 'aataynaa -hum fa- tamattaco fa- sawfa taclamon
wa- yajcalon li- maa laa yaclamon nas.eb(an) min maa razaqnaa -hum ta- 'allaah la- tus'alunna can maa kuntum taftaron
wa- yajcalon li- 'allaah al- banaat subh.aana -hu wa- la- -hum maa yashtahon
wa- 'idhaa bushshira 'ah.ad -hum bi- al- 'unthaa z.alla wajh -hu muswadd(an) wa- huwa kaz.em
yatawaaraa min al- qawm min so' maa bushshira bi- -hi 'a- yumsik -hu calaa hon 'am yaduss -hu fe at- turaab 'a-laa saa'a maa yah.kumon
li- 'alladhena laa yu'minon bi- al- 'aakhirah mathal as- saw' wa- li- 'allaah al- mathal al- aclaa wa- huwa al- cazez al- h.akem

wa- law yu'aakhidh 'allaah an- naas bi- z.ulm -him maa taraka calay -haa min daabbah wa- laakin yu'akhkhir -hum 'ilaa 'ajal musamma(n) fa- 'idhaa jaa'a 'ajal -hum laa yasta'khiron saacah wa- laa yastaqdimon
wa- yajcalon li- 'allaah maa yakrahon wa- tas.if alsinah -hum al- kadhib 'anna la- -hum al- h.usnaa laa jaram 'anna la- -hum an- naar wa- 'anna -hum mufrat.on
ta- 'allaah la- qad arsalnaa 'ilaa 'umam min qabli -ka fa- zayyana la- -hum ash- shayt.aan acmaal -hum fa- huwa waley -hum al- yawm wa- la- -hum cadhaab 'alem
wa- maa anzalnaa calay -ka al- kitaab 'illaa li- tubayyin la- -hum 'alladhe ikhtalafo fe -hi wa- huda(n) wa- rah.mah li- qawm yu'minon
wa- 'allaah anzala min as- samaa' maa' fa- ah.yaa bi- -hi al- 'ard. bacda mawt -haa 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayah li- qawm yasmacon
wa- 'inna la- -kum fe al- ancaam la- cibrah nusqe -kum min maa fe but.on -hi min bayna farth wa- dam laban(an) khaalis.(an) saa'igh(an) li- ash- shaariben
wa- min thamaraat an- nakhel wa- al- acnaab tattakhidhon min -hu sakar(an) wa- rizq(an) h.asan(an) 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayah li- qawm yacqilon
wa- awh.aa rabb -ka 'ilaa an- nah.l 'an ittakhidhe min al- jibaal buyot(an) wa- min ash- shajar wa- min maa yacrishon

thumma kule min kull ath- thamaraat fa- usluke subul rabb -ki dhulul(an) yakhruj min but.on -haa sharaab mukhtalif alwaan -hu fe -hi shifaa' li- an- naas 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayah li- qawm yatafakkaron
wa- 'allaah khalaqa -kum thumma yatawaffaa -kum wa- min -kum man yuradd 'ilaa ardhal al- cumur li- kay laa yaclam bacda cilm shay'(an) 'inna 'allaah calem qader
wa- 'allaah fad.d.ala bacd. -kum calaa bacd. fe ar- rizq fa- maa 'alladhena fud.d.ilo bi- raadde rizq -him calaa maa malakat aymaan -hum fa- hum fe -hi sawaa' 'a- fa- bi- nicmah 'allaah yajh.adon

wa- 'allaah jacala la- -kum min anfus -kum azwaaj(an) wa- jacala la- -kum min azwaaj -kum banen wa- h.afadah wa- razaqa -kum min at.- t.ayyibaat 'a- fa- bi- al- baat.il yu'minon wa- bi- nicmah 'allaah hum yakfuron
wa- yacbudon min doni 'allaah maa laa yamlik la- -hum rizq(an) min as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. shay'(an) wa- laa yastat.econ
fa- laa tad.ribo li- 'allaah al- amthaal 'inna 'allaah yaclam wa- 'antum laa taclamon

d.araba 'allaah mathal(an) cabd(an) mamlok(an) laa yaqdir calaa shay' wa- man razaqnaa -hu min -naa rizq(an) h.asan(an) fa- huwa yunfiq min -hu sirr(an) wa- jahr(an) hal yastawon al- h.amd li- 'allaah bal akthar -hum laa yaclamon

wa- d.araba 'allaah mathal(an) rajulain 'ah.ad -humaa abkam laa yaqdir calaa shay' wa- huwa kall calaa mawlaa -hu 'ayna-maa yuwajjih -hu laa ya'ti bi- khayr hal yastawe huwa wa- man ya'mur bi- al- cadl wa- huwa calaa s.iraat. mustaqem
wa- li- 'allaah ghayb as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa 'amr as- saacah 'illaa ka- lamh. al- bas.ar 'aw huwa aqrab 'inna 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader
wa- 'allaah akhraja -kum min but.on 'ummahaat -kum laa taclamon shay'(an) wa- jacala la- -kum as- samc wa- al- abs.aar wa- al- af'idah lacalla -kum tashkuron
'a- lam yaraw 'ilaa at.- t.ayr musakhkharaat fe jaww as- samaa' maa yumsik -hunna 'illaa 'allaah 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- qawm yu'minon

wa- 'allaah jacala la- -kum min buyot -kum sakan(an) wa- jacala la- -kum min julod al- ancaam buyot(an) tastakhiffon -haa yawm z.acn -kum wa- yawm iqaamah -kum wa- min as.waaf -haa wa- awbaar -haa wa- ashcaar -haa 'athaath(an) wa- mataac(an) 'ilaa h.en
