wa- 'allaah jacala la- -kum min maa khalaqa z.ilaal(an) wa- jacala la- -kum min al- jibaal aknaan(an) wa- jacala la- -kum saraabel taqe -kum al- h.arr wa- saraabel taqe -kum ba's -kum ka- dhaalika yutimm nicmah -hu calay -kum lacalla -kum tuslimon
fa- 'in tawallaw fa- 'inna-maa calay -ka al- balaagh al- muben
yacrifon nicmah 'allaah thumma yunkiron -haa wa- akthar -hum al- kaafiron
wa- yawm nabcath min kull 'ummah shahed(an) thumma laa yu'dhan li- 'alladhena kafaro wa- laa hum yustactabon
wa- 'idhaa ra'aa 'alladhena z.alamo al- cadhaab fa- laa yukhaffaf can -hum wa- laa hum yunz.aron
wa- 'idhaa ra'aa 'alladhena ashrako shurakaa' -hum qaalo rabb -naa haa'ulaa'i shurakaa' -naa 'alladhena kunnaa nadco min doni -ka fa- alqaw 'ilay -him al- qawl 'inna -kum la- kaadhibon
wa- alqaw 'ilaa 'allaah yawma'idhin as- salam wa- d.alla can -hum maa kaano yaftaron
'alladhena kafaro wa- s.addo can sabel 'allaah zidnaa -hum cadhaab(an) fawqa al- cadhaab bi- maa kaano yufsidon

wa- yawm nabcath fe kull 'ummah shahed(an) calay -him min anfus -him wa- ji'naa bi- -ka shahed(an) calaa haa'ulaa'i wa- nazzalnaa calay -ka al- kitaab tibyaan(an) li- kull shay' wa- huda(n) wa- rah.mah wa- bushraa li- al- muslimen
'inna 'allaah ya'mur bi- al- cadl wa- al- ih.saan wa- 'etaa' dhe al- qurbaa wa- yanhaa can al- fah.shaa' wa- al- munkar wa- al- baghy yaciz. -kum lacalla -kum tadhakkaron
wa- awfo bi- cahd 'allaah 'idhaa caahadtum wa- laa tanqud.o al- aymaan bacda tawked -haa wa- qad jacaltum 'allaah calay -kum kafel(an) 'inna 'allaah yaclam maa tafcalon

wa- laa takono ka- 'allate naqad.at ghazl -haa min bacdi qowah ankaath(an) tattakhidhon aymaan -kum dakhal(an) bayna -kum 'an takon 'ummah hiya arbaa min 'ummah 'inna-maa yablo -kum 'allaah bi- -hi wa- la- yubayyinanna la- -kum yawm al- qiyaamah maa kuntum fe -hi takhtalifon
wa- law shaa'a 'allaah la- jacala -kum 'ummah waah.idah wa- laakin yud.ill man yashaa' wa- yahde man yashaa' wa- la- tus'alunna can maa kuntum tacmalon
wa- laa tattakhidho aymaan -kum dakhal(an) bayna -kum fa- tazill qadam bacda thubot -haa wa- tadhoqo as- so' bi- maa s.adadtum can sabel 'allaah wa- la- -kum cadhaab caz.em
wa- laa tashtaro bi- cahd 'allaah thaman(an) qalel(an) 'inna-maa cinda 'allaah huwa khayr la- -kum 'in kuntum taclamon
maa cinda -kum yanfad wa- maa cinda 'allaah baaqi(n) wa- la- najziyanna 'alladhena s.abaro 'ajr -hum bi- ah.san maa kaano yacmalon
man camila s.aalih.(an) min dhakar 'aw 'unthaa wa- huwa mu'min fa- la- nuh.yiyanna -hu h.ayaah t.ayyibah wa- la- najziyanna -hum 'ajr -hu bi- ah.san maa kaano yacmalon
fa- 'idhaa qara'ta al- qur'aan fa- istacidh bi- 'allaah min ash- shayt.aan ar- rajem
'inna -hu laysa la- -hu sult.aan calaa 'alladhena 'aamano wa- calaa rabb -him yatawakkalon
'inna-maa sult.aan -hu calaa 'alladhena yatawallawna -hu wa- 'alladhena hum bi- -hi mushrikon
wa- 'idhaa baddalnaa 'aayah makaan 'aayah wa- 'allaah aclam bi- maa yunazzil qaalo 'inna-maa 'anta muftari(n) bal akthar -hum laa yaclamon
qul nazzala -hu roh. al- qudus min rabb -ka bi- al- h.aqq li- yuthabbit 'alladhena 'aamano wa- huda(n) wa- bushraa li- al- muslimen
wa- la- qad naclam 'anna -hum yaqolon 'inna-maa yucallim -hu bashar lisaan 'alladhe yulh.idon 'ilay -hi acjamey wa- haadhaa lisaan carabey muben
'inna 'alladhena laa yu'minon bi- 'aayaat 'allaah laa yahde -him 'allaah wa- la- -hum cadhaab 'alem
'inna-maa yaftare al- kadhib 'alladhena laa yu'minon bi- 'aayaat 'allaah wa- 'olaa'ika hum al- kaadhibon

man kafara bi- 'allaah min bacdi 'emaan -hi 'illaa man ukriha wa- qalb -hu mut.ma'inn bi- al- 'emaan wa- laakin man sharah.a bi- al- kufr s.adr(an) fa- calay -him ghad.ab min 'allaah wa- la- -hum cadhaab caz.em
dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum istah.abbo al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa calaa al- 'aakhirah wa- 'anna 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm al- kaafiren
'olaa'ika 'alladhena t.abaca 'allaah calaa qulob -him wa- samc -him wa- abs.aar -him wa- 'olaa'ika hum al- ghaafilon
laa jaram 'anna -hum fe al- 'aakhirah hum al- khaasiron
thumma 'inna rabb -ka li- 'alladhena haajaro min bacdi maa futino thumma jaahado wa- s.abaro 'inna rabb -ka min bacdi -hi la- ghafor rah.em
yawm ta'te kull nafs tujaadil can nafs -haa wa- tuwaffaa kull nafs maa camilat wa- hum laa yuz.lamon

wa- d.araba 'allaah mathal(an) qaryah kaanat 'aaminah mut.ma'innah ya'te -haa rizq -haa raghad(an) min kull makaan fa- kafarat bi- ancum 'allaah fa- adhaaqa -haa 'allaah libaas al- joc wa- al- khawf bi- maa kaano yas.nacon
wa- la- qad jaa'a -hum rasol min -hum fa- kadhdhabo -hu fa- 'akhadha -hum al- cadhaab wa- hum z.aalimon
fa- kulo min maa razaqa -kum 'allaah h.alaal(an) t.ayyib(an) wa- ushkuro nicmah 'allaah 'in kuntum 'eyaa -hu tacbudon
'inna-maa h.arrama calay -kum al- maytah wa- ad- dam wa- lah.m al- khinzer wa- maa uhilla li- ghayr 'allaah bi- -hi fa- man id.t.urra ghayr baaghi(n) wa- laa caadi(n) fa- 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em
wa- laa taqolo li- maa tas.if alsinah -kum al- kadhib haadhaa h.alaal wa- haadhaa h.araam li- taftaro calaa 'allaah al- kadhib 'inna 'alladhena yaftaron calaa 'allaah al- kadhib laa yuflih.on
mataac qalel wa- la- -hum cadhaab 'alem
wa- calaa 'alladhena haado h.arramnaa maa qas.as.naa calay -ka min qablu wa- maa z.alamnaa -hum wa- laakin kaano anfus -hum yaz.limon
thumma 'inna rabb -ka li- 'alladhena camilo as- so' bi- jahaalah thumma taabo min bacdi dhaalika wa- as.lah.o 'inna rabb -ka min bacdi -haa la- ghafor rah.em
'inna 'ibraahem kaana 'ummah qaanit(an) li- 'allaah h.anef(an) wa- lam yakun min al- mushriken
shaakir(an) li- ancum -hi ijtabaa -hu wa- hadaa -hu 'ilaa s.iraat. mustaqem
wa- 'aataynaa -hu fe ad- dunyaa h.asanah wa- 'inna -hu fe al- 'aakhirah la- min as.- s.aalih.en
thumma awh.aynaa 'ilay -ka 'an ittabaca millah 'ibraahem h.anef(an) wa- maa kaana min al- mushriken
'inna-maa jucila as- sabt calaa 'alladhena ikhtalafo fe -hi wa- 'inna rabb -ka li- yah.kum bayna -hum yawm al- qiyaamah fa- maa kaano fe -hi yakhtalifon
udcu 'ilaa sabel rabb -ka bi- al- h.ikmah wa- al- mawciz.ah al- h.asanah wa- jaadil -hum bi- 'allate hiya ah.san 'inna rabb -ka huwa aclam bi- man d.alla can sabel -hi wa- huwa aclam bi- al- muhtaden
wa- 'in caaqabtum fa- caaqibo bi- mithl maa coqibtum bi- -hi wa- la- 'in s.abartum la- huwa khayr li- as.- s.aabiren
wa- is.bir wa- maa s.abr -ka 'illaa bi- 'allaah wa- laa tah.zan calay -him wa- laa taku(n) fe d.ayq min maa yamkuron
'inna 'allaah maca 'alladhena ittaqaw wa- 'alladhena hum muh.sinon
subh.aana 'alladhe asraa bi- cabd -hi layl(an) min al- masjid al- h.araam 'ilaa al- masjid al- aqs.aa 'alladhe baaraknaa h.awla -hu li- nuriya -hu min 'aayaat -naa 'inna -hu huwa as- samec al- bas.er
wa- 'aataynaa mosaa al- kitaab wa- jacalnaa -hu huda(n) li- bane 'israa'el 'an laa tattakhidho min doni -y wakel(an)
dhurreyah man h.amalnaa maca noh. 'inna -hu kaana cabd(an) shakor(an)
wa- qad.aynaa 'ilaa bane 'israa'el fe al- kitaab la- tufsidunna fe al- 'ard. marratain wa- la- taclunna culow(an) kaber(an)
fa- 'idhaa jaa'a wacd 'olaa -humaa bacathnaa calay -kum cibaad(an) la- -naa 'ole ba's shaded fa- jaaso khilaala ad- diyaar wa- kaana wacd(an) mafcol(an)
thumma radadnaa la- -kum al- karrah calay -him wa- amdadnaa -kum bi- amwaal wa- banen wa- jacalnaa -kum akthar nafer(an)

'in ah.santum ah.santum li- anfus -kum wa- 'in asa'tum fa- la- -haa fa- 'idhaa jaa'a wacd al- 'aakhirah li- yaso'o wujoh -kum wa- li- yadkhulo al- masjid ka-maa dakhalo -hu 'awwal marrah wa- li- yutabbiro maa calaw tatber(an)
casaa rabb -kum 'an yarh.am -kum wa- 'in cudtum cudnaa wa- jacalnaa jahannam li- al- kaafiren h.as.er(an)
'inna haadhaa al- qur'aan yahde li- 'allate hiya aqwam wa- yubashshir al- mu'minen 'alladhena yacmalon as.- s.aalih.aat 'anna la- -hum 'ajr(an) kaber(an)
wa- 'anna 'alladhena laa yu'minon bi- al- 'aakhirah actadnaa la- -hum cadhaab(an) 'alem(an)
wa- yadcu al- 'insaan bi- ash- sharr ducaa' -hu bi- al- khayr wa- kaana al- 'insaan cajol(an)

wa- jacalnaa al- layl wa- an- nahaar 'aayatain fa- mah.awnaa 'aayah al- layl wa- jacalnaa 'aayah an- nahaar mubs.irah li- tabtagho fad.l(an) min rabb -kum wa- li- taclamo cadad as- sinen wa- al- h.isaab wa- kull shay' fas.s.alnaa -hu tafs.el(an)
wa- kull 'insaan alzamnaa -hu t.aa'ir -hu fe cunuq -hi wa- nukhrij la- -hu yawm al- qiyaamah kitaab(an) yalqaa -hu manshor
iqra' kitaab -ka kafaa bi- nafs -ka al- yawm calay -ka h.aseb(an)
man ihtadaa fa- 'inna-maa yahtade li- nafs -hi wa- man d.alla fa- 'inna-maa yad.ill calay -haa wa- laa tazir waazirah wizr 'ukhraa wa- maa kunnaa mucadhdhiben h.attaa nabcath rasol(an)
wa- 'idhaa aradnaa 'an nuhlik qaryah 'amarnaa mutrafe -haa fa- fasaqo fe -haa fa- h.aqqa calay -haa al- qawl fa- dammarnaa -haa tadmer(an)
wa- kam ahlaknaa min al- quron min bacdi noh. wa- kafaa bi- rabb -ka bi- dhunob cibaad -hi khaber(an) bas.er(an)
man kaana yured al- caajilah cajjalnaa la- -hu fe -haa maa nashaa' li- man nured thumma jacalnaa la- -hu jahannam yas.laa -haa madhmom(an) madh.or(an)
wa- man araada al- 'aakhirah wa- sacaa la- -haa sacy -haa wa- huwa mu'min fa- 'olaa'ika kaana sacy -hum mashkor(an)
kull(an) numidd haa'ulaa'i wa- haa'ulaa'i min cat.aa' rabb -ka wa- maa kaana cat.aa' rabb -ka mah.z.or(an)
unz.ur kayfa fad.d.alnaa bacd. -hum calaa bacd. wa- la- al- 'aakhirah akbar darajaat wa- akbar tafd.el(an)
laa tajcal maca 'allaah 'ilaah(an) 'aakhar fa- taqcud madhmom(an) makhdhol(an)

wa- qad.aa rabb -ka 'an laa tacbudo 'illaa 'eyaa -hu wa- bi- al- waalidain ih.saan(an) 'immaa yablughanna cinda -ka al- kibar 'ah.ad -humaa 'aw kilaa -humaa fa- laa taqul la- -humaa 'uff wa- laa tanhar -humaa wa- qul la- -humaa qawl(an) karem(an)
wa- ikhfid. la- -humaa janaah. adh- dhull min ar- rah.mah wa- qul rabb -i irh.am -humaa ka-maa rabbayaa -ne s.agher(an)
rabb -kum aclam bi- maa fe nufos -kum 'in takono s.aalih.en fa- 'inna -hu kaana li- al- 'awwaaben ghafor(an)
wa- 'aati dhaa al- qurbaa h.aqq -hu wa- al- misken wa- ibn as- sabel wa- laa tubadhdhir tabdher(an)
'inna al- mubadhdhiren kaano 'ikhwaan ash- shayaat.en wa- kaana ash- shayt.aan li- rabb -hi kafor(an)
wa- 'immaa tucrid.anna can -hum ibtighaa' rah.mah min rabb -ka tarjo -haa fa- qul la- -hum qawl(an) maysor(an)
wa- laa tajcal yad -ka maghlolah 'ilaa cunuq -ka wa- laa tabsut. -haa kull al- bast. fa- taqcud malom(an) mah.sor(an)
'inna rabb -ka yabsut. ar- rizq li- man yashaa' wa- yaqdir 'inna -hu kaana bi- cibaad -hi khaber(an) bas.er(an)
wa- laa taqtulo awlaad -kum khashyah imlaaq nah.nu narzuq -hum wa- 'eyaa -kum 'inna qatl -hum kaana khit.'(an) kaber(an)
wa- laa taqrabo az- zinaa 'inna -hu kaana faah.ishah wa- saa'a sabel(an)
wa- laa taqtulo an- nafs 'allate h.arrama 'allaah 'illaa bi- al- h.aqq wa- man qutila maz.lom(an) fa- qad jacalnaa li- waley -hi sult.aan(an) fa- laa yusrif fe al- qatl 'inna -hu kaana mans.or(an)
wa- laa taqrabo maal al- yatem 'illaa bi- 'allate hiya ah.san h.attaa yablugh ashudd -hu wa- awfo bi- al- cahd 'inna al- cahd kaana mas'ol(an)
wa- awfo al- kayl 'idhaa kiltum wa- zino bi- al- qist.aas al- mustaqem dhaalika khayr wa- ah.san ta'wel(an)
wa- laa taqfu maa laysa la- -ka bi- -hi cilm 'inna as- samc wa- al- bas.ar wa- al- fu'aad kull 'olaa'ika kaana can -hu mas'ol(an)
wa- laa tamshi fe al- 'ard. marah.(an) 'inna -ka lan takhriq al- 'ard. wa- lan tablugh al- jibaal t.ol(an)
kull dhaalika kaana sayyi' -hu cinda rabb -ka makroh(an)
dhaalika min maa awh.aa 'ilay -ka rabb -ka min al- h.ikmah wa- laa tajcal maca 'allaah 'ilaah(an) 'aakhar fa- tulqaa fe jahannam malom(an) madh.or(an)
'a- fa- as.faa -kum rabb -kum bi- al- banen wa- ittakhadha min al- malaa'ikah 'inaath(an) 'inna -kum la- taqolon qawl(an) caz.em(an)
wa- la- qad s.arrafnaa fe haadhaa al- qur'aan li- yadhdhakkaro wa- maa yazed -hum 'illaa nufor(an)
qul law kaana maca -hu 'aalihah ka-maa yaqolon 'idhan la- ibtaghaw 'ilaa dhe al- carsh sabel(an)
subh.aana -hu wa- tacaalaa can maa yaqolon culow kaber(an)
tusabbih. la- -hu as- samaawaat as- sabc wa- al- 'ard. wa- man fe -hinna wa- 'in min shay' 'illaa yusabbih. bi- h.amd -hi wa- laakin laa tafqahon tasbeh. -hum 'inna -hu kaana h.alem(an) ghafor(an)
wa- 'idhaa qara'ta al- qur'aan jacalnaa bayna -ka wa- bayna 'alladhena laa yu'minon bi- al- 'aakhirah h.ijaab(an) mastor(an)
wa- jacalnaa calaa qulob -him akinnah 'an yafqaho -hu wa- fe 'aadhaan -him waqr(an) wa- 'idhaa dhakarta rabb -ka fe al- qur'aan wah.d -hu wallaw calaa adbaar -him nufor(an)
nah.nu aclam bi- maa yastamicon bi- -hi 'idh yastamicon 'ilay -ka wa- 'idh hum najwaa 'idh yaqol az.- z.aalimon 'in tattabicon 'illaa rajul(an) mash.or(an)
unz.ur kayfa d.arabo la- -ka al- amthaal fa- d.allo fa- laa yastat.econ sabel(an)
wa- qaalo 'a- 'idhaa kunnaa ciz.aam(an) wa- rufaat(an) 'a- 'in(na) -naa la- mabcothon khalq(an) jaded(an)
qul kono h.ijaarah 'aw h.aded(an)

'aw khalq(an) min maa yakbur fe s.udor -kum fa- sa- yaqolon man yuced -naa qul 'alladhe fat.ara -kum 'awwal marrah fa- sa- yunghid.on 'ilay -ka ru'os -hum wa- yaqolon mataa huwa qul casaa 'an yakon qareb(an)
yawm yadco -kum fa- tastajebon bi- h.amd -hi wa- taz.unnon 'in labithtum 'illaa qalel(an)
wa- qul li- cibaad -e yaqolo 'allate hiya ah.san 'inna ash- shayt.aan yanzagh bayna -hum 'inna ash- shayt.aan kaana li- al- 'insaan cadow(an) muben(an)
rabb -kum aclam bi- -kum 'in yasha' yarh.am -kum 'aw 'in yasha' yucadhdhib -kum wa- maa arsalnaa -ka calay -him wakel(an)
wa- rabb -ka aclam bi- man fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- la- qad fad.d.alnaa bacd. an- nabeyen calaa bacd. wa- 'aataynaa daawod zabor(an)
qul udco 'alladhena zacamtum min doni -hi fa- laa yamlikon kashf ad.- d.urr can -kum wa- laa tah.wel(an)
'olaa'ika 'alladhena yadcon yabtaghon 'ilaa rabb -him al- waselah 'ayy -hum aqrab wa- yarjon rah.mah -hu wa- yakhaafon cadhaab -hu 'inna cadhaab rabb -ka kaana mah.dhor(an)
wa- 'in min qaryah 'illaa nah.nu muhliko -haa qabla yawm al- qiyaamah 'aw mucadhdhibo -haa cadhaab(an) shaded(an) kaana dhaalika fe al- kitaab mast.or(an)

wa- maa manaca -naa 'an nursil bi- al- 'aayaat 'illaa 'an kadhdhaba bi- -haa al- 'awwalon wa- 'aataynaa thamod an- naaqah mubs.irah fa- z.alamo bi- -haa wa- maa nursil bi- al- 'aayaat 'illaa takhwef(an)

wa- 'idh qulnaa la- -ka 'inna rabb -ka ah.aat.a bi- an- naas wa- maa jacalnaa ar- ru'yaa 'allate araynaa -ka 'illaa fitnah li- an- naas wa- ash- shajarah al- malconah fe al- qur'aan wa- nukhawwif -hum fa- maa yazed -hum 'illaa t.ughyaan(an) kaber(an)
wa- 'idh qulnaa li- al- malaa'ikah usjudo li- 'aadam fa- sajado 'illaa 'ibles qaala 'a- asjud li- man khalaqta t.en(an)
qaala 'a- ra'ayta -ka haadhaa 'alladhe karramta calay -ya la- 'in 'akhkharta -ni 'ilaa yawm al- qiyaamah la- ah.tanikanna dhurreyah -hi 'illaa qalel(an)
qaala idhhab fa- man tabica -ka min -hum fa- 'inna jahannam jazaa' -kum jazaa' mawfor(an)

wa- istafziz man istat.acta min -hum bi- s.awt -ka wa- ajlib calay -him bi- khayl -ka wa- rajil -ka wa- shaarik -hum fe al- amwaal wa- al- awlaad wa- cid -hum wa- maa yacid -hum ash- shayt.aan 'illaa ghuror(an)
'inna cibaad -e laysa la- -ka calay -him sult.aan wa- kafaa bi- rabb -ka wakel(an)
rabb -kum 'alladhe yuzje la- -kum al- fulk fe al- bah.r li- tabtagho min fad.l -hi 'inna -hu kaana bi- -kum rah.em(an)
wa- 'idhaa massa -kum ad.- d.urr fe al- bah.r d.alla man tadcon 'illaa 'eyaa -hu fa- lammaa najjaa -kum 'ilaa al- barr acrad.tum wa- kaana al- 'insaan kafor(an)
'a- fa- 'amintum 'an yakhsif bi- -kum jaanib al- barr 'aw yursil calay -kum h.aas.ib(an) thumma laa tajido la- -kum wakel(an)
'am 'amintum 'an yuced -kum fe -hi taarah 'ukhraa fa- yursil calay -kum qaas.if(an) min ar- reh. fa- yughriq -kum bi- maa kafartum thumma laa tajido la- -kum calay -naa bi- -hi tabec(an)
wa- la- qad karramnaa bane 'aadam wa- h.amalnaa -hum fe al- barr wa- al- bah.r wa- razaqnaa -hum min at.- t.ayyibaat wa- fad.d.alnaa -hum calaa kather min man khalaqnaa tafd.el(an)
yawm nadco kull unaas bi- 'imaam -him fa- man 'otiya kitaab -hu bi- yamen -hi fa- 'olaa'ika yaqra'on kitaab -hum wa- yuz.lamon fatel(an)
wa- man kaana fe haadhihi acmaa fa- huwa fe al- 'aakhirah acmaa wa- ad.all sabel(an)
wa- 'in kaado la- yaftinon -ka can 'alladhe awh.aynaa 'ilay -ka li- taftariya calay -naa ghayr -hu wa- 'idhan la- ittakhadho -ka khalel(an)
wa- law-laa 'an thabbatnaa -ka la- qad kidta tarakna 'ilay -him shay'(an) qalel(an)
'idhan la- adhaqnaa -ka d.icf al- h.ayaah wa- d.icf al- mamaat thumma laa tajid la- -ka calay -naa nas.er(an)
wa- 'in kaado la- yastafizzon -ka min al- 'ard. li- yukhrijo -ka min -haa wa- 'idhan laa yalbathon khilaaf -ka 'illaa qalel(an)
sunnah man qad arsalnaa qabla -ka min rusul -naa wa- laa tajid li- sunnah -naa tah.wel(an)
aqim as.- s.alaah li- dulok ash- shams 'ilaa ghasaq al- layl wa- qur'aan al- fajr 'inna qur'aan al- fajr kaana mashhod(an)
wa- min al- layl fa- tahajjada bi- -hi naafilah la- -ka casaa 'an yabcath -ka rabb -ka maqaam(an) mah.mod(an)
wa- qul rabb -i adkhil -ne mudkhal s.idq wa- akhrij -ne mukhraj s.idq wa- ijcal li- -y min ladun -ka sult.aan(an) nas.er(an)
wa- qul jaa'a al- h.aqq wa- zahaqa al- baat.il 'inna al- baat.il kaana zahoq(an)
wa- nunazzil min al- qur'aan maa huwa shifaa' wa- rah.mah li- al- mu'minen wa- laa yazed az.- z.aalimen 'illaa khasaar(an)
wa- 'idhaa ancamnaa calaa al- 'insaan acrad.a wa- na'aa bi- jaanib -hi wa- 'idhaa massa -hu ash- sharr kaana ya'os(an)
qul kull yacmal calaa shaakilah -hi fa- rabb -kum aclam bi- man huwa ahdaa sabel(an)
wa- yas'alon -ka can ar- roh. qul ar- roh. min 'amr rabb -e wa- maa 'otetum min al- cilm 'illaa qalel(an)
wa- la- 'in shi'naa la- nadhhabanna bi- 'alladhe awh.aynaa 'ilay -ka thumma laa tajid la- -ka bi- -hi calay -naa wakel(an)
'illaa rah.mah min rabb -ka 'inna fad.l -hu kaana calay -ka kaber(an)
qul la- 'in ijtamacat al- 'ins wa- al- jinn calaa 'an ya'to bi- mithl haadhaa al- qur'aan laa ya'ton bi- mithl -hi wa- law kaana bacd. -hum li- bacd. z.aher(an)
wa- la- qad s.arrafnaa li- an- naas fe haadhaa al- qur'aan min kull mathal fa- 'abaa akthar an- naas 'illaa kufor(an)
wa- qaalo lan nu'min la- -ka h.attaa tafjur la- -naa min al- 'ard. yunboc(an)
'aw takon la- -ka jannah min nakhel wa- cinab fa- tufajjir al- anhaar khilaala -haa tafjer(an)
'aw tusqit. as- samaa' ka-maa zacamta calay -naa kisaf(an) 'aw ta'te bi- 'allaah wa- al- malaa'ikah qabel(an)
'aw yakon la- -ka bayt min zukhruf 'aw tarqaa fe as- samaa' wa- lan nu'min li- ruqey -ka h.attaa tunazzil calay -naa kitaab(an) naqra' -hu qul subh.aana rabb -e hal kuntu 'illaa bashar(an) rasol(an)
wa- maa manaca an- naas 'an yu'mino 'idh jaa'a -hum al- hudaa 'illaa 'an qaalo 'a- bacatha 'allaah bashar(an) rasol(an)
qul law kaana fe al- 'ard. malaa'ikah yamshon mut.ma'innen la- nazzalnaa calay -him min as- samaa' malak(an) rasol(an)
qul kafaa bi- 'allaah shahed(an) bayni -y wa- bayna -kum 'inna -hu kaana bi- cibaad -hi khaber(an) bas.er(an)

wa- man yahdi 'allaah fa- huwa al- muhtadi wa- man yud.lil fa- lan tajid la- -hum awliyaa' min doni -hi wa- nah.shur -hum yawm al- qiyaamah calaa wujoh -him cumy(an) wa- bukm(an) wa- s.umm(an) ma'waa -hum jahannam kulla-maa khabat zidnaa -hum sacer(an)
dhaalika jazaa' -hum bi- 'anna -hum kafaro bi- 'aayaat -naa wa- qaalo 'a- 'idhaa kunnaa ciz.aam(an) wa- rufaat(an) 'a- 'in(na) -naa la- mabcothon khalq(an) jaded(an)

'a- wa- lam yaraw 'anna 'allaah 'alladhe khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. qaadir calaa 'an yakhluq mithl -hum wa- jacala la- -hum 'ajal(an) laa rayb fe -hi fa- 'abaa az.- z.aalimon 'illaa kufor(an)
qul law 'antum tamlikon khazaa'in rah.mah rabb -e 'idhan la- amsaktum khashyah al- infaaq wa- kaana al- 'insaan qator(an)
wa- la- qad 'aataynaa mosaa tisc 'aayaat bayyinaat fa- is'al bane 'israa'el 'idh jaa'a -hum fa- qaala la- -hu fircawn 'inni -y la- az.unn -ka yaa mosaa mash.or(an)
qaala la- qad calimta maa anzala haa'ulaa'i 'illaa rabb as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. bas.aa'ir wa- 'inni -y la- az.unn -ka yaa fircawn mathbor(an)
fa- araada 'an yastafizz -hum min al- 'ard. fa- aghraqnaa -hu wa- man maca -hu jamec(an)
wa- qulnaa min bacdi -hi li- bane 'israa'el uskuno al- 'ard. fa- 'idhaa jaa'a wacd al- 'aakhirah ji'naa bi- -kum lafef(an)
wa- bi- al- h.aqq anzalnaa -hu wa- bi- al- h.aqq nazala wa- maa arsalnaa -ka 'illaa mubashshir(an) wa- nadher(an)
wa- qur'aan(an) faraqnaa -hu li- taqra' -hu calaa an- naas calaa mukth wa- nazzalnaa -hu tanzel(an)
qul 'aamino bi- -hi 'aw laa tu'mino 'inna 'alladhena 'oto al- cilm min qabli -hi 'idhaa yutlaa calay -him yakhirron li- al- adhqaan sujjad(an)
wa- yaqolon subh.aana rabb -naa 'in kaana wacd rabb -naa la- mafcol(an)
wa- yakhirron li- al- adhqaan yabkon wa- yazed -hum khushoc(an)
qul udco 'allaah 'aw udco ar- rah.maan 'ayy(an) maa tadco fa- la- -hu al- asmaa' al- h.usnaa wa- laa tajhar bi- s.alaah -ka wa- laa tukhaafit bi- -haa wa- ibtaghi bayna dhaalika sabel(an)
wa- qul al- h.amd li- 'allaah 'alladhe lam yattakhidh walad(an) wa- lam yakun la- -hu sharek fe al- mulk wa- lam yakun la- -hu waley min adh- dhull wa- kabbir -hu takber(an)
al- h.amd li- 'allaah 'alladhe anzala calaa cabd -hi al- kitaab wa- lam yajcal la- -hu ciwaj(an)
qayyim(an) li- yundhir ba's(an) shaded(an) min ladun -hu wa- yubashshir al- mu'minen 'alladhena yacmalon as.- s.aalih.aat 'anna la- -hum 'ajr(an) h.asan(an)
maakithen fe -hi 'abad(an)
wa- yundhir 'alladhena qaalo ittakhadha 'allaah walad(an)
maa la- -hum bi- -hi min cilm wa- laa li- 'aabaa' -him kaburat kalimah takhruj min afwaah -him 'in yaqolon 'illaa kadhib(an)
fa- lacalla -ka baakhic nafs -ka calaa 'aathaar -him 'in lam yu'mino bi- haadhaa al- h.adeth 'asif(an)
'in(na) -naa jacalnaa maa calaa al- 'ard. zenah la- -haa li- nabluwa -hum 'ayy -hum ah.san camal(an)
wa- 'in(na) -naa la- jaacilon maa calay -haa s.aced(an) juruz(an)
'am h.asibta 'anna as.h.aab al- kahf wa- ar- raqem kaano min 'aayaat -naa cajab(an)
'idh 'awaa al- fityah 'ilaa al- kahf fa- qaalo rabb -naa 'aati -naa min ladun -ka rah.mah wa- hayyi' la- -naa min 'amr -naa rashad(an)
fa- d.arabnaa calaa 'aadhaan -him fe al- kahf sinen cadad(an)
thumma bacathnaa -hum li- naclam 'ayy al- h.izbain ah.s.aa li- maa labitho 'amad(an)
nah.nu naqus.s. calay -ka naba' -hum bi- al- h.aqq 'inna -hum fityah 'aamano bi- rabb -him wa- zidnaa -hum huda(n)
wa- rabat.naa calaa qulob -him 'idh qaamo fa- qaalo rabb -naa rabb as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. lan nadcuwa min doni -hi 'ilaah(an) la- qad qulnaa 'idhan shat.at.(an)
haa'ulaa'i qawm -naa ittakhadho min doni -hi 'aalihah law-laa ya'ton calay -him bi- sult.aan bayyin fa- man az.lam min man iftaraa calaa 'allaah kadhib(an)
wa- 'idh ictazaltumo -hum wa- maa yacbudon 'illaa 'allaah fa- u'wo 'ilaa al- kahf yanshur la- -kum rabb -kum min rah.mah -hi wa- yuhayyi' la- -kum min 'amr -kum mirfaq(an)

wa- taraa ash- shams 'idhaa t.alacat tazaawara can kahf -him dhaat al- yamen wa- 'idhaa gharabat taqrid. -hum dhaat ash- shimaal wa- hum fe fajwah min -hu dhaalika min 'aayaat 'allaah man yahdi 'allaah fa- huwa al- muhtadi wa- man yud.lil fa- lan tajid la- -hu waley(an) murshid(an)

wa- tah.sab -hum ayqaaz.(an) wa- hum ruqod wa- nuqallib -hum dhaat al- yamen wa- dhaat ash- shimaal wa- kalb -hum baasit. dhiraacai -hi bi- al- was.ed law it.t.alacta calay -him la- wallayta min -hum firaar(an) wa- la- muli'ta min -hum rucb(an)

wa- ka- dhaalika bacathnaa -hum li- yatasaa'alo bayna -hum qaala qaa'il min -hum kam labithtum qaalo labithnaa yawm(an) 'aw bacd. yawm qaalo rabb -kum aclam bi- maa labithtum fa- ibcatho 'ah.ad -kum bi- wariq -kum haadhihi 'ilaa al- madenah fa- li- yanz.ur 'ayy -haa azkaa t.acaam(an) fa- li- ya'ti -kum bi- rizq min -hu wa- li- yatalat.t.af wa- laa yushciranna bi- -kum 'ah.ad(an)
'inna -hum 'in yaz.haro calay -kum yarjumo -kum 'aw yucedo -kum fe millah -him wa- lan tuflih.o 'idhan 'abad(an)

wa- ka- dhaalika actharnaa calay -him li- yaclamo 'anna wacd 'allaah h.aqq wa- 'anna as- saacah laa rayb fe -haa 'idh yatanaazacon bayna -hum 'amr -hum fa- qaalo ibno calay -him bunyaan(an) rabb -hum aclam bi- -him qaala 'alladhena ghalabo calaa 'amr -him la- nattakhidhanna calay -him masjid(an)

sa- yaqolon thalaathah raabic -hum kalb -hum wa- yaqolon khamsah saadis -hum kalb -hum rajm(an) bi- al- ghayb wa- yaqolon sabcah wa- thaamin -hum kalb -hum qul rabb -e aclam bi- ciddah -him maa yaclam -hum 'illaa qalel fa- laa tumaari fe -him 'illaa miraa' z.aahir(an) wa- laa tastafti fe -him min -hum 'ah.ad(an)
wa- laa taqolanna li- shay' 'inni -y faacil dhaalika ghad(an)
'illaa 'an yashaa' 'allaah wa- udhkur rabb -ka 'idhaa naseta wa- qul casaa 'an yahdiya -ni rabb -e li- aqrab min haadhaa rashad(an)
wa- labitho fe kahf -him thalaath mi'ah sinen wa- izdaado tisc(an)
qul 'allaah aclam bi- maa labitho la- -hu ghayb as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. abs.ir bi- -hi wa- asmic maa la- -hum min doni -hi min waley wa- laa yushrik fe h.ukm -hi 'ah.ad(an)
wa- utlu maa oh.iya 'ilay -ka min kitaab rabb -ka laa mubaddil li- kalimaat -hi wa- lan tajid min doni -hi multah.ad(an)

wa- is.bir nafs -ka maca 'alladhena yadcon rabb -hum bi- al- ghadaah wa- al- cashey yuredon wajh -hu wa- laa tacdu caynaa -ka can -hum tured zenah al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- laa tut.ic man aghfalnaa qalb -hi can dhikr -naa wa- ittabaca hawaa -hu wa- kaana 'amr -hu furut.(an)

wa- qul al- h.aqq min rabb -kum fa- man shaa'a fa- li- yu'min wa- man shaa'a fa- li- yakfur 'in(na) -naa actadnaa li- az.- z.aalimen naar(an) ah.aat.a bi- -him suraadiq -haa wa- 'in yastaghetho yughaatho bi- maa' ka- al- muhl yashwe al- wujoh bi's ash- sharaab wa- saa'at murtafaq(an)
'inna 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat 'in(na) -naa laa nud.ec 'ajr man ah.san camal(an)

'olaa'ika la- -hum jannaat cadn tajre min tah.ti -him al- anhaar yuh.allawn fe -haa min asaawir min dhahab wa- yalbason thiyaab(an) khud.r(an) min sundus wa- istabraq muttaki'en fe -haa calaa al- 'araa'ik nicma ath- thawaab wa- h.asunat murtafaq(an)
wa- id.rib la- -hum mathal(an) rajulain jacalnaa li- 'ah.ad -himaa jannatain min acnaab wa- h.afafnaa -humaa bi- nakhl wa- jacalnaa bayna -humaa zarc(an)
kiltaa al- jannatain 'atat 'ukul -haa wa- lam taz.lim min -hu shay'(an) wa- fajjarnaa khilaala -humaa nahar(an)
wa- kaana la- -hu thamar fa- qaala li- s.aah.ib -hi wa- huwa yuh.aawir -hu 'anaa akthar min -ka maal(an) wa- acazz nafar(an)
wa- dakhala jannah -hu wa- huwa z.aalim li- nafs -hi qaala maa az.unn 'an tabed haadhihi 'abad(an)
wa- maa az.unn as- saacah qaa'imah wa- la- 'in rudidtu 'ilaa rabb -e la- ajidanna khayr(an) min -haa munqalab(an)
qaala la- -hu s.aah.ib -hu wa- huwa yuh.aawir -hu 'a- kafarta bi- 'alladhe khalaqa -ka min turaab thumma min nut.fah thumma sawwaa -ka rajul(an)
laakinna huwa 'allaah rabb -e wa- laa ushrik bi- rabb -e 'ah.ad(an)
wa- law-laa 'idh dakhalta jannah -ka qulta maa shaa'a 'allaah laa qowah 'illaa bi- 'allaah 'in tara -ni 'anaa aqall min -ka maal(an) wa- walad(an)
fa- casaa rabb -e 'an yu'tiya -ni khayr(an) min jannah -ka wa- yursil calay -haa h.usbaan(an) min as- samaa' fa- tus.bih. s.aced zalaq(an)
'aw yus.bih. maa' -haa ghawr(an) fa- lan tastat.ec la- -hu t.alab(an)
wa- uh.et. bi- thamar -hi fa- as.bah.a yuqallib kaffai -hi calaa maa anfaqa fe -haa wa- hiya khaawiyah calaa curosh -haa wa- yaqol yaa layta -ne lam ushrik bi- rabb -e 'ah.ad(an)
wa- lam takun la- -hu fi'ah yans.uron -hu min doni 'allaah wa- maa kaana muntas.ir(an)
hunaalika al- walaayah li- 'allaah al- h.aqq huwa khayr thawaab(an) wa- khayr cuqb(an)

wa- id.rib la- -hum mathal al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa ka- maa' anzalnaa -hu min as- samaa' fa- ikhtalat.a bi- -hi nabaat al- 'ard. fa- as.bah.a hashem(an) tadhro -hu ar- riyaah. wa- kaana 'allaah calaa kull shay' muqtadir(an)
al- maal wa- al- banon zenah al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- al- baaqiyaat as.- s.aalih.aat khayr cinda rabb -ka thawaab(an) wa- khayr 'amal(an)
wa- yawm nusayyir al- jibaal wa- taraa al- 'ard. baarizah wa- h.asharnaa -hum fa- lam nughaadir min -hum 'ah.ad(an)
wa- curid.o calaa rabb -ka s.aff(an) la- qad ji'tumo -naa ka-maa khalaqnaa -kum 'awwal marrah bal zacamtum 'a- lan najcal la- -kum mawcid(an)

wa- wud.ica al- kitaab fa- taraa al- mujrimen mushfiqen min maa fe -hi wa- yaqolon yaa waylah -naa maa li- haadhaa al- kitaab laa yughaadir s.agherah wa- laa kaberah 'illaa ah.s.aa -haa wa- wajado maa camilo h.aad.ir(an) wa- laa yaz.lim rabb -ka 'ah.ad(an)

wa- 'idh qulnaa li- al- malaa'ikah usjudo li- 'aadam fa- sajado 'illaa 'ibles kaana min al- jinn fa- fasaqa can 'amr rabb -hi 'a- fa- tattakhidhon -hu wa- dhurreyah -hu awliyaa' min doni -y wa- hum la- -kum cadow bi's li- az.- z.aalimen badal(an)
maa ashhadtu -hum khalq as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- laa khalq anfus -him wa- maa kuntu muttakhidh al- mud.illen cad.ud(an)
wa- yawm yaqol naado shurakaa' -e 'alladhena zacamtum fa- dacaw -hum fa- lam yastajebo la- -hum wa- jacalnaa bayna -hum mawbiq(an)
wa- ra'aa al- mujrimon an- naar fa- z.anno 'anna -hum muwaaqico -haa wa- lam yajido can -haa mus.rif(an)
wa- la- qad s.arrafnaa fe haadhaa al- qur'aan li- an- naas min kull mathal wa- kaana al- 'insaan akthar shay' jadal(an)
wa- maa manaca an- naas 'an yu'mino 'idh jaa'a -hum al- hudaa wa- yastaghfiro rabb -hum 'illaa 'an ta'tiya -him sunnah al- 'awwalen 'aw ya'tiya -hum al- cadhaab qubul(an)
wa- maa nursil al- mursalen 'illaa mubashshiren wa- mundhiren wa- yujaadil 'alladhena kafaro bi- al- baat.il li- yudh.id.o bi- -hi al- h.aqq wa- ittakhadho 'aayaat -e wa- maa undhiro huzuw(an)

wa- man az.lam min man dhukkira bi- 'aayaat rabb -hi fa- acrad.a can -haa wa- nasiya maa qaddamat yadaa -hu 'in(na) -naa jacalnaa calaa qulob -hum akinnah 'an yafqaho -hu wa- fe 'aadhaan -him waqr(an) wa- 'in tadcu -hum 'ilaa al- hudaa fa- lan yahtado 'idhan 'abad(an)
wa- rabb -ka al- ghafor dho ar- rah.mah law yu'aakhidh -hum bi- maa kasabo la- cajjala la- -hum al- cadhaab bal la- -hum mawcid lan yajido min doni -hi maw'il(an)
wa- tilka al- quraa ahlaknaa -hum lammaa z.alamo wa- jacalnaa li- mahlik -him mawcid(an)
wa- 'idh qaala mosaa li- fataa -hu laa abrah. h.attaa ablugh majmac al- bah.rain 'aw amd.e h.uqub(an)
fa- lammaa balaghaa majmac bayna -humaa nasiyaa h.ot -humaa fa- ittakhadha sabel -hu fe al- bah.r sarab(an)
fa- lammaa jaawazaa qaala li- fataa -hu 'aati -naa ghadaa' -naa la- qad laqenaa min safar -naa haadhaa nas.ab(an)
qaala 'a- ra'ayta 'idh 'awaynaa 'ilaa as.- s.akhrah fa- 'inni -y nasetu al- h.ot wa- maa ansaa -ne -hu 'illaa ash- shayt.aan 'an adhkur -hu wa- ittakhadha sabel -hi fe al- bah.r cajab(an)
qaala dhaalika maa kunnaa nabghi fa- irtaddaa calaa 'aathaar -himaa qas.as.(an)
fa- wajadaa cabd(an) min cibaad -naa 'aataynaa -hu rah.mah min cindi -naa wa- callamnaa -hu min ladun -naa cilm(an)
qaala la- -hu mosaa hal attabic -ka calaa 'an tucallim -ni min maa cullimta rushd(an)
qaala 'inna -ka lan tastat.ec maci -ya s.abr(an)
wa- kayfa tas.bir calaa maa lam tuh.it. bi- -hi khubr(an)
qaala sa- tajid -ne 'in shaa'a 'allaah s.aabir(an) wa- laa acs.e la- -ka 'amr(an)
qaala fa- 'in ittabacta -ne fa- laa tas'al -ne can shay' h.attaa uh.dith la- -ka min -hu dhikr(an)
fa- int.alaqaa h.attaa 'idhaa rakibaa fe as- safenah kharaqa -haa qaala 'a- kharaqta -haa li- tughriq 'ahl -haa la- qad ji'ta shay'(an) 'imr(an)
qaala 'a- lam aqul 'inna -ka lan tastat.ec maci -ya s.abr(an)
qaala laa tu'aakhidh -ne bi- maa nasetu wa- laa turhiq -ne min 'amr -e cusr(an)
fa- int.alaqaa h.attaa 'idhaa laqiyaa ghulaam(an) fa- qatala -hu qaala 'a- qatalta nafs(an) zakeyah bi- ghayr nafs la- qad ji'ta shay'(an) nukr(an)
qaala 'a- lam aqul la- -ka 'inna -ka lan tastat.ec maci -ya s.abr(an)
qaala 'in sa'altu -ka can shay' bacda -haa fa- laa tus.aah.ib -ne qad balaghta min ladun -ne cudhr(an)

fa- int.alaqaa h.attaa 'idhaa 'atayaa 'ahl qaryah istat.camaa 'ahl -haa fa- 'abaw 'an yud.ayyifo -humaa fa- wajadaa fe -haa jidaar(an) yured 'an yanqad.d. fa- aqaama -hu qaala law shi'ta la- ittakhadhta calay -hi 'ajr(an)
qaala haadhaa firaaq bayni -y wa- bayna -ka sa- unabbi' -ka bi- ta'wel maa lam tastat.ec calay -hi s.abr(an)
'ammaa as- safenah fa- kaanat li- masaaken yacmalon fe al- bah.r fa- aradtu 'an aceb -haa wa- kaana waraa'a -hum malik ya'khudh kull safenah ghas.b(an)
wa- 'ammaa al- ghulaam fa- kaana 'abawaa -hu mu'minain fa- khashenaa 'an yurhiq -humaa t.ughyaan(an) wa- kufr(an)
fa- aradnaa 'an yubdil -humaa rabb -humaa khayr(an) min -hu zakaah wa- aqrab ruh.m(an)

wa- 'ammaa al- jidaar fa- kaana li- ghulaamain yatemain fe al- madenah wa- kaana tah.ta -hu kanz la- -humaa wa- kaana 'abo -humaa s.aalih.(an) fa- araada rabb -ka 'an yablughaa ashudd -humaa wa- yastakhrijaa kanz -humaa rah.mah min rabb -ka wa- maa facaltu -hu can 'amr -y dhaalika ta'wel maa lam tast.ic calay -hi s.abr(an)
wa- yas'alon -ka can dhe al- qarnain qul sa- atlo calay -kum min -hu dhikr(an)
'in(na) -naa makkannaa la- -hu fe al- 'ard. wa- 'aataynaa -hu min kull shay' sabab(an)
fa- atbaca sabab(an)

h.attaa 'idhaa balagha maghrib ash- shams wajada -haa taghrub fe cayn h.ami'ah wa- wajada cinda -haa qawm(an) qulnaa yaa dhaa al- qarnain 'immaa 'an tucadhdhib wa- 'immaa 'an tattakhidh fe -him h.usn(an)
qaala 'ammaa man z.alama fa- sawfa nucadhdhib -hu thumma yuradd 'ilaa rabb -hi fa- yucadhdhib -hu cadhaab(an) nukr(an)
wa- 'ammaa man 'aamana wa- camila s.aalih.(an) fa- la- -hu jazaa' al- h.usnaa wa- sa- naqol la- -hu min 'amr -naa yusr(an)
thumma atbaca sabab(an)
h.attaa 'idhaa balagha mat.lic ash- shams wajada -haa tat.luc calaa qawm lam najcal la- -hum min doni -haa sitr(an)
ka- dhaalika wa- qad ah.at.naa bi- maa laday -hi khubr(an)
thumma atbaca sabab(an)
h.attaa 'idhaa balagha bayna as- saddain wajada min doni -himaa qawm(an) laa yakaadon yafqahon qawl(an)
qaalo yaa dhaa al- qarnain 'inna ya'joj wa- ma'joj mufsidon fe al- 'ard. fa- hal najcal la- -ka kharj(an) calaa 'an tajcal bayna -naa wa- bayna -hum sadd(an)
qaala maa makkana -ne fe -hi rabb -e khayr fa- aceno -ne bi- qowah ajcal bayna -kum wa- bayna -hum radm(an)
'aato -ne zubar al- h.aded h.attaa 'idhaa saawaa bayna as.- s.adafain qaala unfukho h.attaa 'idhaa jacala -hu naar(an) qaala 'aato -ne ufrigh calay -hi qit.r(an)
fa- maa ist.aaco 'an yaz.haro -hu wa- maa istat.aaco la- -hu naqb(an)
qaala haadhaa rah.mah min rabb -e fa- 'idhaa jaa'a wacd rabb -e jacala -hu dakkaa' wa- kaana wacd rabb -e h.aqq(an)
wa- taraknaa bacd. -hum yawma'idhin yamoj fe bacd. wa- nufikha fe as.- s.or fa- jamacnaa -hum jamc(an)
wa- carad.naa jahannam yawma'idhin li- al- kaafiren card.(an)
'alladhena kaanat acyun -hum fe ghit.aa' can dhikr -y wa- kaano laa yastat.econ samc(an)
'a- fa- h.asiba 'alladhena kafaro 'an yattakhidho cibaad -e min doni -y awliyaa' 'in(na) -naa actadnaa jahannam li- al- kaafiren nuzul(an)
qul hal nunabbi' -kum bi- al- akhsaren acmaal(an)
'alladhena d.alla sacy -hum fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- hum yah.sabon 'anna -hum yuh.sinon s.unc(an)
'olaa'ika 'alladhena kafaro bi- 'aayaat rabb -him wa- liqaa' -hi fa- h.abit.at acmaal -hum fa- laa nuqem la- -hum yawm al- qiyaamah wazn(an)
dhaalika jazaa' -hum jahannam bi- maa kafaro wa- ittakhadho 'aayaat -e wa- rusul -e huzuw(an)
'inna 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat kaanat la- -hum jannaat al- firdaws nuzul(an)
khaaliden fe -haa laa yabghon can -haa h.iwal(an)
qul law kaana al- bah.r midaad(an) li- kalimaat rabb -e la- nafida al- bah.r qabla 'an tanfad kalimaat rabb -e wa- law ji'naa bi- mithl -hi madad(an)

qul 'inna-maa 'anaa bashar mithl -kum yoh.aa 'ilay -ya 'anna maa 'ilaah -kum 'ilaah waah.id fa- man kaana yarjo liqaa' rabb -hi fa- li- yacmal camal(an) s.aalih.(an) wa- laa yushrik bi- cibaadah rabb -hi 'ah.ad(an)
kaaf-haa'-yaa'-cayn-s.aad
dhikr rah.mah rabb -ka cabd -hu zakareyaa
'idh naadaa rabb -hu nidaa' khafey(an)
qaala rabb -i 'inni -y wahana al- caz.m min -ne wa- ishtacala ar- ra's shayb(an) wa- lam akun bi- ducaa' -ka rabb -i shaqey(an)
wa- 'inni -y khiftu al- mawaale min waraa'i -y wa- kaanat imra'ah -e caaqir(an) fa- hab li- -y min ladun -ka waley(an)
yarith -ne wa- yarith min 'aal yacqob wa- ijcal -hu rabb -i rad.ey(an)
yaa zakareyaa 'in(na) -naa nubashshir -ka bi- ghulaam ism -hu yah.yaa lam najcal la- -hu min qablu samey(an)
qaala rabb -i 'annaa yakon li- -y ghulaam wa- kaanat imra'ah -e caaqir(an) wa- qad balaghtu min al- kibar citey(an)
qaala ka- dhaalika qaala rabb -ka huwa calay -ya hayyin wa- qad khalaqtu -ka min qablu wa- lam taku(n) shay'(an)
qaala rabb -i ijcal li- -y 'aayah qaala 'aayah -ka 'an laa tukallim an- naas thalaath layaal(in) sawey(an)
fa- kharaja calaa qawm -hi min al- mih.raab fa- awh.aa 'ilay -him 'an sabbih.o bukrah wa- cashey(an)
yaa yah.yaa khudh al- kitaab bi- qowah wa- 'aataynaa -hu al- h.ukm s.abey(an)
wa- h.anaan(an) min ladun -naa wa- zakaah wa- kaana taqey(an)
wa- barr(an) bi- waalidai -hi wa- lam yakun jabbaar(an) cas.ey(an)
wa- salaam calay -hi yawm wulida wa- yawm yamot wa- yawm yubcath h.ayy(an)
wa- udhkur fe al- kitaab maryam 'idh intabadhat min 'ahl -haa makaan(an) sharqey(an)
fa- ittakhadhat min doni -him h.ijaab(an) fa- arsalnaa 'ilay -haa roh. -naa fa- tamaththala la- -haa bashar(an) sawey(an)
qaalat 'inni -y acodhu bi- ar- rah.maan min -ka 'in kunta taqey(an)
qaala 'inna-maa 'anaa rasol rabb -ki li- ahab la- -ki ghulaam(an) zakey(an)
qaalat 'annaa yakon li- -y ghulaam wa- lam yamsas -ne bashar wa- lam aku(n) baghey(an)
qaala ka- dhaaliki qaala rabb -ki huwa calay -ya hayyin wa- li- najcal -hu 'aayah li- an- naas wa- rah.mah min -naa wa- kaana 'amr(an) maqd.ey(an)
fa- h.amalat -hu fa- intabadhat bi- -hi makaan(an) qas.ey(an)
fa- ajaa'a -haa al- makhaad. 'ilaa jidhc an- nakhlah qaalat yaa layta -ne mittu qabla haadhaa wa- kuntu nasy(an) mansey(an)
fa- naadaa -haa min tah.ti -haa 'an laa tah.zane qad jacala rabb -ki tah.ta -ki sarey(an)
wa- huzze 'ilay -ki bi- jidhc an- nakhlah tusaaqit. calay -ki rut.ab(an) janey(an)
fa- kule wa- ishrabe wa- qarre cayn(an) fa- 'immaa tarayinna min al- bashar 'ah.ad(an) fa- qole 'inni -y nadhartu li- ar- rah.maan s.awm(an) fa- lan ukallim al- yawm 'insey(an)
fa- 'atat bi- -hi qawm -haa tah.mil -hu qaalo yaa maryam la- qad ji'ti shay'(an) farey(an)
yaa 'ukht haaron maa kaana 'abo -ki imra' saw' wa- maa kaanat 'umm -ki baghey(an)
fa- ashaarat 'ilay -hi qaalo kayfa nukallim man kaana fe al- mahd s.abey(an)
qaala 'inni -y cabd 'allaah 'aataa -ne al- kitaab wa- jacala -ne nabey(an)
wa- jacala -ne mubaarak(an) 'ayna-maa kuntu wa- aws.aa -ne bi- as.- s.alaah wa- az- zakaah maa dumtu h.ayy(an)
wa- barr(an) bi- waalidah -e wa- lam yajcal -ne jabbaar(an) shaqey(an)
wa- as- salaam calay -ya yawm wulidtu wa- yawm amot wa- yawm ubcath h.ayy(an)
dhaalika cesaa ibn maryam qawl al- h.aqq 'alladhe fe -hi yamtaron
maa kaana li- 'allaah 'an yattakhidh min walad subh.aana -hu 'idhaa qad.aa 'amr(an) fa- 'inna-maa yaqol la- -hu kun fa- yakon
wa- 'inna 'allaah rabb -e wa- rabb -kum fa- ucbudo -hu haadhaa s.iraat. mustaqem
fa- ikhtalafa al- ah.zaab min bayni -him fa- wayl li- 'alladhena kafaro min mashhad yawm caz.em
asmic bi- -him wa- abs.ir yawm ya'ton -naa laakin az.- z.aalimon al- yawm fe d.alaal muben
wa- andhir -hum yawm al- h.asrah 'idh qud.iya al- 'amr wa- hum fe ghaflah wa- hum laa yu'minon
'in(na) -naa nah.nu narith al- 'ard. wa- man calay -haa wa- 'ilay -naa yurjacon
wa- udhkur fe al- kitaab 'ibraahem 'inna -hu kaana s.iddeq(an) nabey(an)
'idh qaala li- 'abe -hi yaa 'ab -ti li- ma(a) tacbud maa laa yasmac wa- laa yubs.ir wa- laa yughne can -ka shay'(an)
yaa 'ab -ti 'inni -y qad jaa'a -ne min al- cilm maa lam ya'ti -ka fa- ittabic -ne ahdi -ka s.iraat.(an) sawey(an)
yaa 'ab -ti laa tacbud ash- shayt.aan 'inna ash- shayt.aan kaana li- ar- rah.maan cas.ey(an)
yaa 'ab -ti 'inni -y akhaaf 'an yamass -ka cadhaab min ar- rah.maan fa- takon li- ash- shayt.aan waley(an)
qaala 'a- raaghib 'anta can 'aalihah -e yaa 'ibraahem la- 'in lam tantahi la- arjumanna -ka wa- uhjur -ne maley(an)
qaala salaam calay -ka sa- astaghfir la- -ka rabb -e 'inna -hu kaana bi- -y h.afey(an)
wa- actazil -kum wa- maa tadcon min doni 'allaah wa- adco rabb -e casaa 'an laa akon bi- ducaa' rabb -e shaqey(an)
fa- lammaa ictazala -hum wa- maa yacbudon min doni 'allaah wahabnaa la- -hu 'ish.aaq wa- yacqob wa- kull(an) jacalnaa nabey(an)
wa- wahabnaa la- -hum min rah.mah -naa wa- jacalnaa la- -hum lisaan s.idq caley(an)
wa- udhkur fe al- kitaab mosaa 'inna -hu kaana mukhlas.(an) wa- kaana rasol(an) nabey(an)
wa- naadaynaa -hu min jaanib at.- t.or al- ayman wa- qarrabnaa -hu najey(an)
wa- wahabnaa la- -hu min rah.mah -naa 'akhaa -hu haaron nabey(an)
wa- udhkur fe al- kitaab 'ismaacel 'inna -hu kaana s.aadiq al- wacd wa- kaana rasol(an) nabey(an)
wa- kaana ya'mur 'ahl -hu bi- as.- s.alaah wa- az- zakaah wa- kaana cinda rabb -hi mard.ey(an)
wa- udhkur fe al- kitaab 'idres 'inna -hu kaana s.iddeq(an) nabey(an)
wa- rafacnaa -hu makaan(an) caley(an)

'olaa'ika 'alladhena ancama 'allaah calay -him min an- nabeyen min dhurreyah 'aadam wa- min man h.amalnaa maca noh. wa- min dhurreyah 'ibraahem wa- 'israa'el wa- min man hadaynaa wa- ijtabaynaa 'idhaa tutlaa calay -him 'aayaat ar- rah.maan kharro sujjad(an) wa- bukey(an)
fa- khalafa min bacdi -him khalf ad.aaco as.- s.alaah wa- ittabaco ash- shahawaat fa- sawfa yalqawn ghayy(an)
'illaa man taaba wa- 'aamana wa- camila s.aalih.(an) fa- 'olaa'ika yadkhulon al- jannah wa- laa yuz.lamon shay'(an)
jannaat cadn 'allate wacada ar- rah.maan cibaad -hi bi- al- ghayb 'inna -hu kaana wacd -hu ma'tey(an)
laa yasmacon fe -haa laghw(an) 'illaa salaam(an) wa- la- -hum rizq -hum fe -haa bukrah wa- cashey(an)
tilka al- jannah 'allate norith min cibaad -naa man kaana taqey(an)
wa- maa natanazzal 'illaa bi- 'amr rabb -ka la- -hu maa bayna ayde -naa wa- maa khalfa -naa wa- maa bayna dhaalika wa- maa kaana rabb -ka nasey(an)
rabb as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa fa- ucbud -hu wa- is.t.abir li- cibaadah -hi hal taclam la- -hu samey(an)
wa- yaqol al- 'insaan 'a- 'idhaa maa mittu la- sawfa ukhraj h.ayy(an)
'a- wa- laa yadhkur al- 'insaan 'an(na) -naa khalaqnaa -hu min qablu wa- lam yaku(n) shay'(an)
fa- wa- rabb -ka la- nah.shuranna -hum wa- ash- shayaat.en thumma la- nuh.d.iranna -hum h.awla jahannam jithey(an)
thumma la- nanzicanna min kull shecah 'ayy -hum ashadd calaa ar- rah.maan citey(an)
thumma la- nah.nu aclam bi- 'alladhena hum awlaa bi- -haa s.iley(an)
wa- 'in min -kum 'illaa waarid -haa kaana calaa rabb -ka h.atm(an) maqd.ey(an)
thumma nunajje 'alladhena ittaqaw wa- nadhar az.- z.aalimen fe -haa jithey(an)
wa- 'idhaa tutlaa calay -him 'aayaat -naa bayyinaat qaala 'alladhena kafaro li- 'alladhena 'aamano 'ayy al- fareqain khayr maqaam(an) wa- ah.san nadey(an)
wa- kam ahlaknaa qabla -hum min qarn hum ah.san 'athaath(an) wa- ri'y(an)

qul man kaana fe ad.- d.alaalah fa- li- yamdud la- -hu ar- rah.maan madd(an) h.attaa 'idhaa ra'aw maa yocadon 'immaa al- cadhaab wa- 'immaa as- saacah fa- sa- yaclamon man huwa sharr makaan(an) wa- ad.caf jund(an)
wa- yazed 'allaah 'alladhena ihtadaw huda(n) wa- al- baaqiyaat as.- s.aalih.aat khayr cinda rabb -ka thawaab(an) wa- khayr maradd(an)
'a- fa- ra'ayta 'alladhe kafara bi- 'aayaat -naa wa- qaala la- 'otayanna maal(an) wa- walad(an)
'a- it.t.alaca al- ghayb 'am ittakhadha cinda ar- rah.maan cahd(an)
kallaa sa- naktub maa yaqol wa- namudd la- -hu min al- cadhaab madd(an)
wa- narith -hu maa yaqol wa- ya'te -naa fard(an)
wa- ittakhadho min doni 'allaah 'aalihah li- yakono la- -hum cizz(an)
kallaa sa- yakfuron bi- cibaadah -him wa- yakonon calay -him d.idd(an)
'a- lam tara 'an(na) -naa arsalnaa ash- shayaat.en calaa al- kaafiren ta'uzz -hum 'azz(an)
fa- laa tacjal calay -him 'inna-maa nacudd la- -hum cudd(an)
yawm nah.shur al- muttaqen 'ilaa ar- rah.maan wafd(an)
wa- nasoq al- mujrimen 'ilaa jahannam wird(an)
laa yamlikon ash- shafaacah 'illaa man ittakhadha cinda ar- rah.maan cahd(an)
wa- qaalo ittakhadha ar- rah.maan walad(an)
la- qad ji'tum shay'(an) 'idd(an)
takaad as- samaawaat yatafat.t.arna min -hu wa- yanshaqq al- 'ard. wa- takhirr al- jibaal hadd(an)
'an dacaw li- ar- rah.maan walad(an)
wa- maa yanbaghe li- ar- rah.maan 'an yattakhidh walad(an)
'in kull man fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. 'illaa 'aate ar- rah.maan cabd(an)
la- qad ah.s.aa -hum wa- cadda -hum cadd(an)
wa- kull -hum 'aate -hi yawm al- qiyaamah fard(an)
'inna 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat sa- yajcal la- -hum ar- rah.maan wudd(an)
fa- 'inna-maa yassarnaa -hu bi- lisaan -ka li- tubashshir bi- -hi al- muttaqen wa- tundhir bi- -hi qawm(an) ludd(an)
wa- kam ahlaknaa qabla -hum min qarn hal tuh.iss min -hum min 'ah.ad 'aw tasmac la- -hum rikz(an)
t.aa'-haa'
maa anzalnaa calay -ka al- qur'aan li- tashqaa
'illaa tadhkirah li- man yakhshaa
tanzel(an) min man khalaqa al- 'ard. wa- as- samaawaat al- culaa
ar- rah.maan calaa al- carsh istawaa
la- -hu maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa wa- maa tah.ta ath- tharaa
wa- 'in tajhar bi- al- qawl fa- 'inna -hu yaclam as- sirr wa- akhfaa
'allaah laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa la- -hu al- 'asmaa' al- h.usnaa
wa- hal 'ataa -ka h.adeth mosaa
'idh ra'aa naar(an) fa- qaala li- 'ahl -hi umkutho 'inni -y 'aanastu naar(an) lacalli -y 'aate -kum min -haa bi- qabas 'aw ajid calaa an- naar huda(n)
fa- lammaa 'ataa -haa nodiya yaa mosaa
'inni -y 'anaa rabb -ka fa- ikhlac naclai -ka 'inna -ka bi- al- waadi al- muqaddas t.uwaa
wa- 'anaa ikhtartu -ka fa- istamic li- maa yoh.aa
'inna -ne 'anaa 'allaah laa 'ilaah 'illaa 'anaa fa- ucbud -ne wa- aqim as.- s.alaah li- dhikr -e
'inna as- saacah 'aatiyah akaad ukhfe -haa li- tujzaa kull nafs bi- maa tascaa
fa- laa yas.uddanna -ka can -haa man laa yu'min bi- -haa wa- ittabaca hawaa -hu fa- tardaa
wa- maa tilka bi- yamen -ka yaa mosaa
qaala hiya cas.aa -ya atawakka' calay -haa wa- ahushsh bi- -haa calaa ghanam -e wa- li- -ya fe -haa ma'aarib 'ukhraa
qaala alqi -haa yaa mosaa
fa- alqaa -haa fa- 'idhaa hiya h.ayyah tascaa
qaala khudh -haa wa- laa takhaf sa- nuced -haa serah -haa al- 'olaa
wa- ud.mum yad -ka 'ilaa janaah. -ka takhruj bayd.aa' min ghayr so' 'aayah 'ukhraa
li- nuriya -ka min 'aayaat -naa al- kubraa
idhhab 'ilaa fircawn 'inna -hu t.aghaa
qaala rabb -i ishrah. li- -y s.adr -e
wa- yassir li- -y 'amr -e
wa- uh.lul cuqdah min lisaan -e
yafqaho qawl -e
wa- ijcal li- -y wazer(an) min 'ahl -e
haaron 'akh -e
ushdud bi- -hi 'azr -e
wa- ashrik -hu fe 'amr -e
kay nusabbih. -ka kather(an)
wa- nadhkur -ka kather(an)
'inna -ka kunta bi- -naa bas.er(an)
qaala qad 'oteta su'l -ka yaa mosaa
wa- la- qad manannaa calay -ka marrah 'ukhraa
'idh awh.aynaa 'ilaa 'umm -ka maa yoh.aa

'an iqdhife -hi fe at- taabot fa- iqdhife -hi fe al- yamm fa- li- yulqi -hi al- yamm bi- as- saah.il ya'khudh -hu cadow li- -y wa- cadow la- -hu wa- alqaytu calay -ka mah.abbah min -ne wa- li- tus.nac calaa cayn -e

'idh tamshe 'ukht -ka fa- taqol hal adull -kum calaa man yakful -hu fa- rajacnaa -ka 'ilaa 'umm -ka kay taqarr cayn -haa wa- laa tah.zan wa- qatalta nafs(an) fa- najjaynaa -ka min al- ghamm wa- fatannaa -ka futon(an) fa- labithta sinen fe 'ahl madyan thumma ji'ta calaa qadar yaa mosaa
wa- is.t.anactu -ka li- nafs -e
idhhab 'anta wa- 'akho -ka bi- 'aayaat -e wa- laa taniyaa fe dhikr -y
idhhabaa 'ilaa fircawn 'inna -hu t.aghaa
fa- qolaa la- -hu qawl(an) layyin(an) lacalla -hu yatadhakkar 'aw yakhshaa
qaalaa rabb -naa 'inna -naa nakhaaf 'an yafrut. calay -naa 'aw 'an yat.ghaa
qaala laa takhaafaa 'inna -ne maca -kumaa asmac wa- araa
fa- i'tiyaa -hu fa- qolaa 'in(na) -naa rasolaa rabb -ka fa- arsil maca -naa bane 'israa'el wa- laa tucadhdhib -hum qad ji'naa -ka bi- 'aayah min rabb -ka wa- as- salaam calaa min ittabaca al- hudaa
'in(na) -naa qad oh.iya 'ilay -naa 'anna al- cadhaab calaa man kadhdhaba wa- tawallaa
qaala fa- man rabb -kumaa yaa mosaa
qaala rabb -naa 'alladhe act.aa kull shay' khalq -hu thumma hadaa
qaala fa- maa baal al- quron al- 'olaa
qaala cilm -haa cinda rabb -e fe kitaab laa yad.ill rabb -e wa- laa yansaa
'alladhe jacala la- -kum al- 'ard. mahd(an) wa- salaka la- -kum fe -haa subul(an) wa- anzala min as- samaa' maa' fa- akhrajnaa bi- -hi azwaaj(an) min nabaat shattaa
kulo wa- ircaw ancaam -kum 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- 'ole an- nuhaa
min -haa khalaqnaa -kum wa- fe -haa nuced -kum wa- min -haa nukhrij -kum taarah 'ukhraa
wa- la- qad araynaa -hu 'aayaat -naa kull -haa fa- kadhdhaba wa- 'abaa
qaala 'a- ji'ta -naa li- tukhrij -naa min 'ard. -naa bi- sih.r -ka yaa mosaa
fa- la- na'tiyanna -ka bi- sih.r mithl -hi fa- ijcal bayna -naa wa- bayna -ka mawcid(an) laa nukhlif -hu nah.nu wa- laa 'anta makaan(an) suwa(n)
qaala mawcid -kum yawm az- zenah wa- 'an yah.shur an- naas d.uh.a(n)
fa- tawallaa fircawn fa- jamaca kayd -hu thumma 'ataa
qaala la- -hum mosaa wayl -kum laa taftaro calaa 'allaah kadhib(an) fa- yush.it -kum bi- cadhaab wa- qad khaaba man iftaraa
fa- tanaazaco 'amr -hum bayna -hum wa- asarro an- najwaa
qaalo 'inna haadhaani la- saah.iraan yuredaan 'an yukhrijaa -kum min 'ard. -kum bi- sih.r -himaa wa- yadhhabaa bi- t.areqah -kum al- muthlaa
fa- ajmico kayd -kum thumma i'to s.aff(an) wa- qad aflah.a al- yawm man istaclaa
qaalo yaa mosaa 'immaa 'an tulqiya wa- 'immaa 'an nakon 'awwal man alqaa
qaala bal alqo fa- 'idhaa h.ibaal -hum wa- cis.ey -hum yukhayyal 'ilay -hi min sih.r -him 'anna -haa tascaa
fa- awjasa fe nafs -hi khefah mosaa
qulnaa laa takhaf 'inna -ka 'anta al- aclaa
wa- alqi maa fe yamen -ka talqaf maa s.anaco 'inna-maa s.anaco kayd saah.ir wa- laa yuflih. as- saah.ir h.aythu 'ataa
fa- ulqiya as- sah.arah sujjad(an) qaalo 'aamannaa bi- rabb haaron wa- mosaa

qaala 'aamantum la- -hu qabla 'an 'aadhan la- -kum 'inna -hu la- kaber -kum 'alladhe callama -kum as- sih.r fa- la- uqat.t.icanna ayde -kum wa- arjul -kum min khilaaf wa- la- us.allibanna -kum fe judhoc an- nakhl wa- la- taclamunna 'ayy -naa ashadd cadhaab(an) wa- abqaa
qaalo lan nu'thir -ka calaa maa jaa'a -naa min al- bayyinaat wa- 'alladhe fat.ara -naa fa- iqd.i maa 'anta qaad.i(n) 'inna-maa taqd.e haadhihi al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa
'in(na) -naa 'aamannaa bi- rabb -naa li- yaghfir la- -naa khat.aayaa -naa wa- maa akrahta -naa calay -hi min as- sih.r wa- 'allaah khayr wa- abqaa
'inna -hu man ya'ti rabb -hu mujrim(an) fa- 'inna la- -hu jahannam laa yamot fe -haa wa- laa yah.yaa
wa- man ya'ti -hi mu'min(an) qad camila as.- s.aalih.aat fa- 'olaa'ika la- -hum ad- darajaat al- culaa
jannaat cadn tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa wa- dhaalika jazaa' man tazakkaa
wa- la- qad awh.aynaa 'ilaa mosaa 'an asri bi- cibaad -e fa- id.rib la- -hum t.areq(an) fe al- bah.r yabas(an) laa takhaaf darak(an) wa- laa takhshaa
fa- atbaca -hum fircawn bi- junod -hi fa- ghashiya -hum min al- yamm maa ghashiya -hum
wa- ad.alla fircawn qawm -hu wa- maa hadaa
yaa bane 'israa'el qad anjaynaa -kum min cadow -kum wa- waacadnaa -kum jaanib at.- t.or al- ayman wa- nazzalnaa calay -kum al- mann wa- as- salwaa
kulo min t.ayyibaat maa razaqnaa -kum wa- laa tat.ghaw fe -hi fa- yah.ill calay -kum ghad.ab -e wa- man yah.lil calay -hi ghad.ab -e fa- qad hawaa
wa- 'inni -y la- ghaffaar li- man taaba wa- 'aamana wa- camila s.aalih.(an) thumma ihtadaa
wa- maa acjala -ka can qawm -ka yaa mosaa
qaala hum 'olaa'i calaa 'athar -e wa- cajiltu 'ilay -ka rabb -i li- tard.aa
qaala fa- 'in(na) -naa qad fatannaa qawm -ka min bacdi -ka wa- ad.alla -hum as- saamirey

fa- rajaca mosaa 'ilaa qawm -hi ghad.baan 'asif(an) qaala yaa qawm -e 'a- lam yacid -kum rabb -kum wacd(an) h.asan(an) 'a- fa- t.aala calay -kum al- cahd 'am aradtum 'an yah.ill calay -kum ghad.ab min rabb -kum fa- akhlaftum mawcid -e
qaalo maa akhlafnaa mawcid -ka bi- malk -naa wa- laakin -naa h.ummilnaa awzaar(an) min zenah al- qawm fa- qadhafnaa -haa fa- ka- dhaalika alqaa as- saamirey
fa- akhraja la- -hum cijl(an) jasad(an) la- -hu khuwaar fa- qaalo haadhaa 'ilaah -kum wa- 'ilaah mosaa fa- nasiya
'a- fa- laa yarawn 'an laa yarjic 'ilay -him qawl(an) wa- laa yamlik la- -hum d.arr(an) wa- laa nafc(an)
wa- la- qad qaala la- -hum haaron min qablu yaa qawm -e 'inna-maa futintum bi- -hi wa- 'inna rabb -kum ar- rah.maan fa- ittabico -ne wa- at.eco 'amr -e
qaalo lan nabrah. calay -hi caakifen h.attaa yarjic 'ilay -naa mosaa
qaala yaa haaron maa manaca -ka 'idh ra'ayta -hum d.allo
'an laa tattabic -ni 'a- fa- cas.ayta 'amr -e
qaala yaa ibn 'umm laa ta'khudh bi- lih.yah -e wa- laa bi- ra's -e 'inni -y khashetu 'an taqol farraqta bayna bane 'israa'el wa- lam tarqub qawl -e
qaala fa- maa khat.b -ka yaa saamirey
qaala bas.urtu bi- maa lam yabs.uro bi- -hi fa- qabad.tu qabd.ah min 'athar ar- rasol fa- nabadhtu -haa wa- ka- dhaalika sawwalat li- -y nafs -e

qaala fa- idhhab fa- 'inna la- -ka fe al- h.ayaah 'an taqol laa misaas wa- 'inna la- -ka mawcid(an) lan tukhlaf -hu wa- unz.ur 'ilaa 'ilaah -ka 'alladhe z.alta calay -hi caakif(an) la- nuh.arriqanna -hu thumma la- nansifanna -hu fe al- yamm nasf(an)
'inna-maa 'ilaah -kum 'allaah 'alladhe laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa wasica kull shay' cilm(an)
ka- dhaalika naqus.s. calay -ka min anbaa' maa qad sabaqa wa- qad 'aataynaa -ka min ladun -naa dhikr(an)
man acrad.a can -hu fa- 'inna -hu yah.mil yawm al- qiyaamah wizr(an)
khaaliden fe -hi wa- saa'a la- -hum yawm al- qiyaamah h.iml(an)
yawm yunfakh fe as.- s.or wa- nah.shur al- mujrimen yawma'idhin zurq(an)
yatakhaafaton bayna -hum 'in labithtum 'illaa cashr(an)
nah.nu aclam bi- maa yaqolon 'idh yaqol amthal -hum t.areqah 'in labithtum 'illaa yawm(an)
wa- yas'alon -ka can al- jibaal fa- qul yansif -haa rabb -e nasf(an)
fa- yadhar -haa qaac(an) s.afs.af(an)
laa taraa fe -haa ciwaj(an) wa- laa 'amt(an)
yawma'idhin yattabicon ad- daace laa ciwaj(an) la- -hu wa- khashacat al- as.waat li- ar- rah.maan fa- laa tasmac 'illaa hams(an)
yawma'idhin laa tanfac ash- shafaacah 'illaa man 'adhina la- -hu ar- rah.maan wa- rad.iya la- -hu qawl(an)
yaclam maa bayna ayde -him wa- maa khalfa -hum wa- laa yuh.et.on bi- -hi cilm(an)
wa- canat al- wujoh li- al- h.ayy al- qayyom wa- qad khaaba man h.amala z.ulm(an)
wa- man yacmal min as.- s.aalih.aat wa- huwa mu'min fa- laa yakhaaf z.ulm(an) wa- laa had.m(an)
wa- ka- dhaalika anzalnaa -hu qur'aan(an) carabey(an) wa- s.arrafnaa fe -hi min al- waced lacalla -hum yattaqon 'aw yuh.dith la- -hum dhikr(an)
fa- tacaalaa 'allaah al- malik al- h.aqq wa- laa tacjal bi- al- qur'aan min qabli 'an yuqd.aa 'ilay -ka wah.y -hu wa- qul rabb -i zid -ne cilm(an)
wa- la- qad cahidnaa 'ilaa 'aadam min qablu fa- nasiya wa- lam najid la- -hu cazm(an)
wa- 'idh qulnaa li- al- malaa'ikah usjudo li- 'aadam fa- sajado 'illaa 'ibles 'abaa
fa- qulnaa yaa 'aadam 'inna haadhaa cadow la- -ka wa- li- zawj -ka fa- laa yukhrijanna -kumaa min al- jannah fa- tashqaa
'inna la- -ka 'an laa tajoc fe -haa wa- laa tacraa
wa- 'anna -ka laa taz.ma' fe -haa wa- laa tad.h.aa
fa- waswasa 'ilay -hi ash- shayt.aan qaala yaa 'aadam hal adull -ka calaa shajarah al- khuld wa- mulk laa yablaa
fa- 'akalaa min -haa fa- badat la- -humaa saw'aat -humaa wa- t.afiqaa yakhs.ifaan calay -himaa min waraq al- jannah wa- cas.aa 'aadam rabb -hu fa- ghawaa
thumma ijtabaa -hu rabb -hu fa- taaba calay -hi wa- hadaa
qaala ihbit.aa min -haa jamec(an) bacd. -kum li- bacd. cadow fa- 'immaa ya'tiyanna -kum min -ne huda(n) fa- man ittabaca hudaa -ya fa- laa yad.ill wa- laa yashqaa
wa- man acrad.a can dhikr -e fa- 'inna la- -hu maceshah d.ank(an) wa- nah.shur -hu yawm al- qiyaamah acmaa
qaala rabb -i li- ma(a) h.asharta -ne acmaa wa- qad kunta bas.er(an)
qaala ka- dhaalika 'atat -ka 'aayaat -naa fa- naseta -haa wa- ka- dhaalika al- yawm tunsaa
wa- ka- dhaalika najze man asrafa wa- lam yu'min bi- 'aayaat rabb -hi wa- la- cadhaab al- 'aakhirah ashadd wa- abqaa
'a- fa- lam yahdi la- -hum kam ahlaknaa qabla -hum min al- quron yamshon fe masaakin -him 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- 'ole an- nuhaa
wa- law-laa kalimah sabaqat min rabb -ka la- kaana lizaam(an) wa- 'ajal musamma(n)
fa- is.bir calaa maa yaqolon wa- sabbih. bi- h.amd rabb -ka qabla t.uloc ash- shams wa- qabla ghurob -haa wa- min 'aanaa' al- layl fa- sabbih. wa- at.raaf an- nahaar lacalla -ka tard.aa
wa- laa tamuddanna caynai -ka 'ilaa maa mattacnaa bi- -hi azwaaj(an) min -hum zahrah al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa li- naftin -hum fe -hi wa- rizq rabb -ka khayr wa- abqaa
wa- u'mur 'ahl -ka bi- as.- s.alaah wa- is.t.abir calay -haa laa nas'al -ka rizq(an) nah.nu narzuq -ka wa- al- caaqibah li- at- taqwaa
wa- qaalo law-laa ya'te -naa bi- 'aayah min rabb -hi 'a- wa- lam ta'ti -him bayyinah maa fe as.- s.uh.uf al- 'olaa
wa- law 'an(na) -naa ahlaknaa -hum bi- cadhaab min qabli -hi la- qaalo rabb -naa law-laa arsalta 'ilay -naa rasol(an) fa- nattabic 'aayaat -ka min qabli 'an nadhill wa- nakhzaa
qul kull mutarabbis. fa- tarabbas.o fa- sa- taclamon man as.h.aab as.- s.iraat. as- sawey wa- man ihtadaa
iqtaraba li- an- naas h.isaab -hum wa- hum fe ghaflah mucrid.on
maa ya'te -him min dhikr min rabb -him muh.dath 'illaa istamaco -hu wa- hum yalcabon
laahiyah qulob -hum wa- asarro an- najwaa 'alladhena z.alamo hal haadhaa 'illaa bashar mathal -kum 'a- fa- ta'ton as- sih.r wa- 'antum tubs.iron
qaala rabb -e yaclam al- qawl fe as- samaa' wa- al- 'ard. wa- huwa as- samec al- calem
bal qaalo ad.ghaath ah.laam bal iftaraa -hu bal huwa shaacir fa- li- ya'ti -naa bi- 'aayah ka-maa ursila al- 'awwalon
maa 'aamanat qabla -hum min qaryah ahlaknaa -haa 'a- fa- hum yu'minon
wa- maa arsalnaa qabla -ka 'illaa rijaal(an) noh.e 'ilay -him fa- is'alo 'ahl adh- dhikr 'in kuntum laa taclamon
wa- maa jacalnaa -hum jasad(an) laa ya'kulon at.- t.acaam wa- maa kaano khaaliden
thumma s.adaqnaa -hum al- wacd fa- anjaynaa -hum wa- man nashaa' wa- ahlaknaa al- musrifen
la- qad anzalnaa 'ilay -kum kitaab(an) fe -hi dhikr -kum 'a- fa- laa tacqilon
wa- kam qas.amnaa min qaryah kaanat z.aalimah wa- ansha'naa bacda -haa qawm(an) 'aakharen
fa- lammaa ah.asso ba's -naa 'idhaa hum min -haa yarkud.on
laa tarkud.o wa- irjico 'ilaa maa utriftum fe -hi wa- masaakin -kum lacalla -kum tus'alon
qaalo yaa wayl -naa 'in(na) -naa kunnaa z.aalimen
fa- maa zaalat tilka dacwaa -hum h.attaa jacalnaa -hum h.as.ed(an) khaamiden
wa- maa khalaqnaa as- samaa' wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa laaciben
law aradnaa 'an nattakhidh lahw(an) la- ittakhadhnaa -hu min ladun -naa 'in kunnaa faacilen
bal naqdhif bi- al- h.aqq calaa al- baat.il fa- yadmagh -hu fa- 'idhaa huwa zaahiq wa- la- -kum al- wayl min maa tas.ifon
wa- la- -hu man fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- man cinda -hu laa yastakbiron can cibaadah -hi wa- laa yastah.siron
yusabbih.on al- layl wa- an- nahaar laa yafturon
'am ittakhadho 'aalihah min al- 'ard. hum yunshiron
law kaana fe -himaa 'aalihah 'illaa 'allaah la- fasadataa fa- subh.aana 'allaah rabb al- carsh can maa yas.ifon
laa yus'al can maa yafcal wa- hum yus'alon
'am ittakhadho min doni -hi 'aalihah qul haato burhaan -kum haadhaa dhikr man maci -ya wa- dhikr man qabli -y bal akthar -hum laa yaclamon al- h.aqq fa- hum mucrid.on
wa- maa arsalnaa min qabli -ka min rasol 'illaa noh.e 'ilay -hi 'anna -hu laa 'ilaah 'illaa 'anaa fa- ucbudo -ni
wa- qaalo ittakhadha ar- rah.maan walad(an) subh.aana -hu bal cibaad mukramon
laa yasbiqon -hu bi- al- qawl wa- hum bi- 'amr -hi yacmalon
yaclam maa bayna ayde -him wa- maa khalfa -hum wa- laa yashfacon 'illaa li- man irtad.aa wa- hum min khashyah -hi mushfiqon
wa- man yaqul min -hum 'inni -y 'ilaah min doni -hi fa- dhaalika najze -hi jahannam ka- dhaalika najze az.- z.aalimen
'a- wa- lam yara 'alladhena kafaro 'anna as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. kaanataa ratq(an) fa- fataqnaa -humaa wa- jacalnaa min al- maa' kull shay' h.ayy 'a- fa- laa yu'minon
wa- jacalnaa fe al- 'ard. rawaasiya 'an tamed bi- -him wa- jacalnaa fe -haa fijaaj(an) subul(an) lacalla -hum yahtadon
wa- jacalnaa as- samaa' saqf(an) mah.foz.(an) wa- hum can 'aayaat -haa mucrid.on
wa- huwa 'alladhe khalaqa al- layl wa- an- nahaar wa- ash- shams wa- al- qamar kull fe falak yasbah.on
wa- maa jacalnaa li- bashar min qabli -ka al- khuld 'a- fa- 'in mitta fa- hum al- khaalidon
kull nafs dhaa'iqah al- mawt wa- nablo -kum bi- ash- sharr wa- al- khayr fitnah wa- 'ilay -naa turjacon
wa- 'idhaa ra'aa -ka 'alladhena kafaro 'in yattakhidhon -ka 'illaa huzuw(an) 'a- haadhaa 'alladhe yadhkur 'aalihah -kum wa- hum bi- dhikr ar- rah.maan hum kaafiron
khuliqa al- 'insaan min cajal sa- ure -kum 'aayaat -e fa- laa tastacjilon
wa- yaqolon mataa haadhaa al- wacd 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
law yaclam 'alladhena kafaro h.ena laa yakuffon can wujoh -him an- naar wa- laa can z.uhor -him wa- laa hum yuns.aron
bal ta'te -him baghtah fa- tabhat -hum fa- laa yastat.econ radd -haa wa- laa hum yunz.aron
wa- la- qad istuhzi' bi- rusul min qabli -ka fa- h.aaqa bi- 'alladhena sakhiro min -hum maa kaano bi- -hi yastahzi'on
qul man yakla' -kum bi- al- layl wa- an- nahaar min ar- rah.maan bal hum can dhikr rabb -him mucrid.on
'am la- -hum 'aalihah tamnac -hum min doni -naa laa yastat.econ nas.r anfus -him wa- laa hum min -naa yus.h.abon
bal mattacnaa haa'ulaa'i wa- 'aabaa' -hum h.attaa t.aala calay -him al- cumur 'a- fa- laa yarawn 'an(na) -naa na'te al- 'ard. nanqus. -haa min at.raaf -haa 'a- fa- hum al- ghaalibon
qul 'inna-maa undhir -kum bi- al- wah.y wa- laa yasmac as.- s.umm ad- ducaa' 'idhaa maa yundharon
wa- la- 'in massat -hum nafh.ah min cadhaab rabb -ka la- yaqolanna yaa wayl -naa 'in(na) -naa kunnaa z.aalimen
wa- nad.ac al- mawaazen al- qist. li- yawm al- qiyaamah fa- laa tuz.lam nafs shay'(an) wa- 'in kaana mithqaal h.abbah min khardal 'ataynaa bi- -haa wa- kafaa bi- -naa h.aasiben
wa- la- qad 'aataynaa mosaa wa- haaron al- furqaan wa- d.iyaa' wa- dhikr(an) li- al- muttaqen
'alladhena yakhshawn rabb -hum bi- al- ghayb wa- hum min as- saacah mushfiqon
wa- haadhaa dhikr mubaarak anzalnaa -hu 'a- fa- 'antum la- -hu munkiron
wa- la- qad 'aataynaa 'ibraahem rushd -hu min qablu wa- kunnaa bi- -hi caalimen
'idh qaala li- 'abe -hi wa- qawm -hi maa haadhihi at- tamaathel 'allate 'antum la- -haa caakifon
qaalo wajadnaa 'aabaa' -naa la- -haa caabiden
qaala la- qad kuntum 'antum wa- 'aabaa' -kum fe d.alaal muben
qaalo 'a- ji'ta -naa bi- al- h.aqq 'am 'anta min al- laaciben
qaala bal rabb -kum rabb as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. 'alladhe fat.ara -hunna wa- 'anaa calaa dhaalikum min ash- shaahiden
wa- ta- 'allaah la- akedanna as.naam -kum bacda 'an tuwallo mudbiren
fa- jacala -hum judhaadh(an) 'illaa kaber(an) la- -hum lacalla -hum 'ilay -hi yarjicon
qaalo man facala haadhaa bi- 'aalihah -naa 'inna -hu la- min az.- z.aalimen
qaalo samicnaa fata(n) yadhkur -hum yuqaal la- -hu 'ibraahem
qaalo fa- i'to bi- -hi calaa acyun an- naas lacalla -hum yashhadon
qaalo 'a- 'anta facalta haadhaa bi- 'aalihah -naa yaa 'ibraahem
qaala bal facala -hu kaber -hum haadhaa fa- is'alo -hum 'in kaano yant.iqon
fa- rajaco 'ilaa anfus -him fa- qaalo 'inna -kum 'antum az.- z.aalimon
thumma nukiso calaa ru'os -him la- qad calimta maa haa'ulaa'i yant.iqon
qaala 'a- fa- tacbudon min doni 'allaah maa laa yanfac -kum shay'(an) wa- laa yad.urr -kum
'uff la- -kum wa- li- maa tacbudon min doni 'allaah 'a- fa- laa tacqilon
qaalo h.arriqo -hu wa- uns.uro 'aalihah -kum 'in kuntum faacilen
qulnaa yaa naar kone bard(an) wa- salaam(an) calaa 'ibraahem
wa- araado bi- -hi kayd(an) fa- jacalnaa -hum al- akhsaren
wa- najjaynaa -hu wa- lot.(an) 'ilaa al- 'ard. 'allate baaraknaa fe -haa li- al- caalamen
wa- wahabnaa la- -hu 'ish.aaq wa- yacqob naafilah wa- kull(an) jacalnaa s.aalih.en
wa- jacalnaa -hum a'immah yahdon bi- 'amr -naa wa- awh.aynaa 'ilay -him ficl al- khayraat wa- iqaam as.- s.alaah wa- 'etaa' az- zakaah wa- kaano la- -naa caabiden
wa- lot.(an) 'aataynaa -hu h.ukm(an) wa- cilm(an) wa- najjaynaa -hu min al- qaryah 'allate kaanat tacmal al- khabaa'ith 'inna -hum kaano qawm saw' faasiqen
wa- adkhalnaa -hu fe rah.mah -naa 'inna -hu min as.- s.aalih.en
wa- noh.(an) 'idh naadaa min qablu fa- istajabnaa la- -hu fa- najjaynaa -hu wa- 'ahl -hu min al- karb al- caz.em
wa- nas.arnaa -hu min al- qawm 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa 'inna -hum kaano qawm saw' fa- aghraqnaa -hum ajmacen
wa- daawod wa- sulaymaan 'idh yah.kumaan fe al- h.arth 'idh nafashat fe -hi ghanam al- qawm wa- kunnaa li- h.ukm -him shaahiden
fa- fahhamnaa -haa sulaymaan wa- kull(an) 'aataynaa h.ukm(an) wa- cilm(an) wa- sakhkharnaa maca daawod al- jibaal yusabbih.na wa- at.- t.ayr wa- kunnaa faacilen
wa- callamnaa -hu s.ancah labos la- -kum li- tuh.s.in -kum min ba's -kum fa- hal 'antum shaakiron
wa- li- sulaymaan ar- reh. caas.ifah tajre bi- 'amr -hi 'ilaa al- 'ard. 'allate baaraknaa fe -haa wa- kunnaa bi- kull shay' caalimen
wa- min ash- shayaat.en man yaghos.on la- -hu wa- yacmalon camal(an) dona dhaalika wa- kunnaa la- -hum h.aafiz.en
wa- 'ayyob 'idh naadaa rabb -hu 'anni -y massa -ne ad.- d.urr wa- 'anta arh.am ar- raah.imen
fa- istajabnaa la- -hu fa- kashafnaa maa bi- -hi min d.urr wa- 'aataynaa -hu 'ahl -hu wa- mithl -hum maca -hum rah.mah min cindi -naa wa- dhikraa li- al- caabiden
wa- 'ismaacel wa- 'idres wa- dhaa al- kifl kull min as.- s.aabiren
wa- adkhalnaa -hum fe rah.mah -naa 'inna -hum min as.- s.aalih.en
wa- dhaa an- non 'idh dhahaba mughaad.ib(an) fa- z.anna 'an lan naqdir calay -hi fa- naadaa fe az.- z.ulumaat 'an laa 'ilaah 'illaa 'anta subh.aana -ka 'inni -y kuntu min az.- z.aalimen
fa- istajabnaa la- -hu wa- najjaynaa -hu min al- ghamm wa- ka- dhaalika nu(n)je al- mu'minen
wa- zakareyaa 'idh naadaa rabb -hu rabb -i laa tadhar -ne fard(an) wa- 'anta khayr al- waarithen
fa- istajabnaa la- -hu wa- wahabnaa la- -hu yah.yaa wa- as.lah.naa la- -hu zawj -hu 'inna -hum kaano yusaaricon fe al- khayraat wa- yadcon -naa raghab(an) wa- rahab(an) wa- kaano la- -naa khaashicen
wa- 'allate ah.s.anat farj -haa fa- nafakhnaa fe -haa min roh. -naa wa- jacalnaa -haa wa- ibn -haa 'aayah li- al- caalamen
'inna haadhihi 'ummah -kum 'ummah waah.idah wa- 'anaa rabb -kum fa- ucbudo -ni
wa- taqat.t.aco 'amr -hum bayna -hum kull 'ilay -naa raajicon
fa- man yacmal min as.- s.aalih.aat wa- huwa mu'min fa- laa kufraan li- sacy -hi wa- 'in(na) -naa la- -hu kaatibon
wa- h.araam calaa qaryah ahlaknaa -haa 'anna -hum laa yarjicon
h.attaa 'idhaa futih.at ya'joj wa- ma'joj wa- hum min kull h.adab yansilon
wa- iqtaraba al- wacd al- h.aqq fa- 'idhaa hiya shaakhis.ah abs.aar 'alladhena kafaro yaa wayl -naa qad kunnaa fe ghaflah min haadhaa bal kunnaa z.aalimen
'inna -kum wa- maa tacbudon min doni 'allaah h.as.ab jahannam 'antum la- -haa waaridon
law kaana haa'ulaa'i 'aalihah maa warado -haa wa- kull fe -haa khaalidon
la- -hum fe -haa zafer wa- hum fe -haa laa yasmacon
'inna 'alladhena sabaqat la- -hum min -naa al- h.usnaa 'olaa'ika can -haa mubcadon
laa yasmacon h.ases -haa wa- hum fe maa ishtahat anfus -hum khaalidon
laa yah.zun -hum al- fazac al- akbar wa- tatalaqqaa -hum al- malaa'ikah haadhaa yawm -kum 'alladhe kuntum tocadon
yawm nat.we as- samaa' ka- t.ayy as- sijill li- al- kutub ka-maa bada'naa 'awwal khalq nuced -hu wacd(an) calay -naa 'in(na) -naa kunnaa faacilen
wa- la- qad katabnaa fe az- zabor min bacdi adh- dhikr 'anna al- 'ard. yarith -haa cibaad -e as.- s.aalih.on
'inna fe haadhaa la- balaagh(an) li- qawm caabiden
wa- maa arsalnaa -ka 'illaa rah.mah li- al- caalamen
qul 'inna-maa yoh.aa 'ilay -ya 'anna-maa 'ilaah -kum 'ilaah waah.id fa- hal 'antum muslimon
fa- 'in tawallaw fa- qul 'aadhantu -kum calaa sawaa' wa- 'in adre 'a- qareb 'am baced maa tocadon
'inna -hu yaclam al- jahr min al- qawl wa- yaclam maa taktumon
wa- 'in adre lacalla -hu fitnah la- -kum wa- mataac 'ilaa h.en
qaala rabb -i uh.kum bi- al- h.aqq wa- rabb -naa ar- rah.maan al- mustacaan calaa maa tas.ifon
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas ittaqo rabb -kum 'inna zalzalah as- saacah shay' caz.em
yawm tarawn -haa tadhhal kull murd.icah can maa ard.acat wa- tad.ac kull dhaat h.aml h.aml -haa wa- taraa an- naas sukaaraa wa- maa hum bi- sukaaraa wa- laakin cadhaab 'allaah shaded
wa- min an- naas man yujaadil fe 'allaah bi- ghayr cilm wa- yattabic kull shayt.aan mared
kutiba calay -hi 'anna -hu man tawallaa -hu fa- 'anna -hu yud.ill -hu wa- yahde -hi 'ilaa cadhaab as- sacer

yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas 'in kuntum fe rayb min al- bacth fa- 'in(na) -naa khalaqnaa -kum min turaab thumma min nut.fah thumma min calaqah thumma min mud.ghah mukhallaqah wa- ghayr mukhallaqah li- nubayyin la- -kum wa- nuqirr fe al- arh.aam maa nashaa' 'ilaa 'ajal musamma(n) thumma nukhrij -kum t.ifl(an) thumma li- tablugho ashudd -kum wa- min -kum man yutawaffaa wa- min -kum man yuradd 'ilaa ardhal al- cumur li- kay laa yaclam min bacdi cilm shay'(an) wa- taraa al- 'ard. haamidah fa- 'idhaa anzalnaa calay -haa al- maa' ihtazzat wa- rabat wa- anbatat min kull zawj bahej
dhaalika bi- 'anna 'allaah huwa al- h.aqq wa- 'anna -hu yuh.ye al- mawtaa wa- 'anna -hu calaa kull shay' qader
wa- 'anna as- saacah 'aatiyah laa rayb fe -haa wa- 'anna 'allaah yabcath man fe al- qubor
wa- min an- naas man yujaadil fe 'allaah bi- ghayr cilm wa- laa huda(n) wa- laa kitaab muner
thaane cit.f -hi li- yud.ill can sabel 'allaah la- -hu fe ad- dunyaa khizy wa- nudheq -hu yawm al- qiyaamah cadhaab al- h.areq
dhaalika bi- maa qaddamat yadaa -ka wa- 'anna 'allaah laysa bi- z.allaam li- al- cabed

wa- min an- naas man yacbud 'allaah calaa h.arf fa- 'in as.aaba -hu khayr it.ma'anna bi- -hi wa- 'in as.aabat -hu fitnah inqalaba calaa wajh -hi khasira ad- dunyaa wa- al- 'aakhirah dhaalika huwa al- khusraan al- muben
yadco min doni 'allaah maa laa yad.urr -hu wa- maa laa yanfac -hu dhaalika huwa ad.- d.alaal al- baced
yadco la- man d.arr -hu aqrab min nafc -hi la- bi's al- mawlaa wa- la- bi's al- casher
'inna 'allaah yudkhil 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar 'inna 'allaah yafcal maa yured
man kaana yaz.unn 'an lan yans.ur -hu 'allaah fe ad- dunyaa wa- al- 'aakhirah fa- li- yamdud bi- sabab 'ilaa as- samaa' thumma li- yaqt.ac fa- li- yanz.ur hal yudhhibanna kayd -hu maa yaghez.
wa- ka- dhaalika anzalnaa -hu 'aayaat bayyinaat wa- 'anna 'allaah yahde man yured

'inna 'alladhena 'aamano wa- 'alladhena haado wa- as.- s.aabi'en wa- an- nas.aaraa wa- al- majos wa- 'alladhena ashrako 'inna 'allaah yafs.il bayna -hum yawm al- qiyaamah 'inna 'allaah calaa kull shay' shahed

'a- lam tara 'anna 'allaah yasjud la- -hu man fe as- samaawaat wa- man fe al- 'ard. wa- ash- shams wa- al- qamar wa- an- nujom wa- al- jibaal wa- ash- shajar wa- ad- dawaabb wa- kather min an- naas wa- kather h.aqqa calay -hi al- cadhaab wa- man yuhin 'allaah fa- maa la- -hu min mukrim 'inna 'allaah yafcal maa yashaa'
haadhaani khas.maani ikhtas.amo fe rabb -him fa- 'alladhena kafaro qut.t.icat la- -hum thiyaab min naar yus.abb min fawqi ru'os -him al- h.amem
yus.har bi- -hi maa fe but.on -him wa- al- julod
wa- la- -hum maqaamic min h.aded
kulla-maa araado 'an yakhrujo min -haa min ghamm ucedo fe -haa wa- dhoqo cadhaab al- h.areq
'inna 'allaah yudkhil 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar yuh.allawn fe -haa min asaawir min dhahab wa- lu'lu'(an) wa- libaas -hum fe -haa h.arer
wa- hudo 'ilaa at.- t.ayyib min al- qawl wa- hudo 'ilaa s.iraat. al- h.amed

'inna 'alladhena kafaro wa- yas.uddon can sabel 'allaah wa- al- masjid al- h.araam 'alladhe jacalnaa -hu li- an- naas sawaa' al- caakif fe -hi wa- al- baadi wa- man yurid fe -hi bi- ilh.aad bi- z.ulm nudhiq -hu min cadhaab 'alem
wa- 'idh bawwa'naa li- 'ibraahem makaan al- bayt 'an laa tushrik bi- -y shay'(an) wa- t.ahhir bayt -e li- at.- t.aa'ifen wa- al- qaa'imen wa- ar- rukkac as- sujod
wa- 'adhdhin fe an- naas bi- al- h.ajj ya'to -ka rijaal(an) wa- calaa kull d.aamir ya'tena min kull fajj cameq
li- yashhado manaafic la- -hum wa- yadhkuro ism 'allaah fe ayyaam maclomaat calaa maa razaqa -hum min bahemah al- ancaam fa- kulo min -haa wa- at.cimo al- baa'is al- faqer
thumma li- yaqd.o tafath -hum wa- li- yofo nudhor -hum wa- li- yat.t.awwafo bi- al- bayt al- cateq

dhaalika wa- man yucaz.z.im h.urumaat 'allaah fa- huwa khayr la- -hu cinda rabb -hi wa- uh.illat la- -kum al- ancaam 'illaa maa yutlaa calay -kum fa- ijtanibo ar- rijs min al- awthaan wa- ijtanibo qawl az- zor
h.unafaa' li- 'allaah ghayr mushriken bi- -hi wa- man yushrik bi- 'allaah fa- ka-'anna maa kharra min as- samaa' fa- takht.af -hu at.- t.ayr 'aw tahwe bi- -hi ar- reh. fe makaan sah.eq
dhaalika wa- man yucaz.z.im shacaa'ir 'allaah fa- 'inna -haa min taqwaa al- qulob
la- -kum fe -haa manaafic 'ilaa 'ajal musamma(n) thumma mah.ill -haa 'ilaa al- bayt al- cateq
wa- li- kull 'ummah jacalnaa mansak(an) li- yadhkuro ism 'allaah calaa maa razaqa -hum min bahemah al- ancaam fa- 'ilaah -kum 'ilaah waah.id fa- la- -hu aslimo wa- bashshir al- mukhbiten
'alladhena 'idhaa dhukira 'allaah wajilat qulob -hum wa- as.- s.aabiren calaa maa as.aaba -hum wa- al- muqeme as.- s.alaah wa- min maa razaqnaa -hum yunfiqon

wa- al- budn jacalnaa -haa la- -kum min shacaa'ir 'allaah la- -kum fe -haa khayr fa- udhkuro ism 'allaah calay -haa s.awaaff fa- 'idhaa wajabat junob -haa fa- kulo min -haa wa- at.cimo al- qaanic wa- al- muctarr ka- dhaalika sakhkharnaa -haa la- -kum lacalla -kum tashkuron
lan yanaal 'allaah luh.om -haa wa- laa dimaa' -haa wa- laakin yanaal -hu at- taqwaa min -kum ka- dhaalika sakhkhara -haa la- -kum li- tukabbiro 'allaah calaa maa hadaa -kum wa- bashshir al- muh.sinen
'inna 'allaah yudaafic can 'alladhena 'aamano 'inna 'allaah laa yuh.ibb kull khawwaan kafor
'udhina li- 'alladhena yuqaatalon bi- 'anna -hum z.ulimo wa- 'inna 'allaah calaa nas.r -him la- qader

'alladhena ukhrijo min diyaar -him bi- ghayr h.aqq 'illaa 'an yaqolo rabb -naa 'allaah wa- law-laa dafc 'allaah an- naas bacd. -hum bi- bacd. la- huddimat s.awaamic wa- biyac wa- s.alawaat wa- masaajid yudhkar fe -haa ism 'allaah kather(an) wa- la- yans.uranna 'allaah man yans.ur -hu 'inna 'allaah la- qawey cazez
'alladhena 'in makkannaa -hum fe al- 'ard. aqaamo as.- s.alaah wa- 'aataw az- zakaah wa- 'amaro bi- al- macrof wa- nahaw can al- munkar wa- li- 'allaah caaqibah al- 'umor
wa- 'in yukadhdhibo -ka fa- qad kadhdhabat qabla -hum qawm noh. wa- caad wa- thamod
wa- qawm 'ibraahem wa- qawm lot.
wa- as.h.aab madyan wa- kudhdhiba mosaa fa- amlaytu li- al- kaafiren thumma 'akhadhtu -hum fa- kayfa kaana naker -i
fa- ka-'ayyin min qaryah ahlaknaa -haa wa- hiya z.aalimah fa- hiya khaawiyah calaa curosh -haa wa- bi'r mucat.t.alah wa- qas.r mashed
'a- fa- lam yasero fe al- 'ard. fa- takon la- -hum qulob yacqilon bi- -haa 'aw 'aadhaan yasmacon bi- -haa fa- 'inna -haa laa tacmaa al- abs.aar wa- laakin tacmaa al- qulob 'allate fe as.- s.udor
wa- yastacjilon -ka bi- al- cadhaab wa- lan yukhlif 'allaah wacd -hu wa- 'inna yawm(an) cinda rabb -ka ka- 'alf sanah min maa tacuddon
wa- ka-'ayyin min qaryah amlaytu la- -haa wa- hiya z.aalimah thumma 'akhadhtu -haa wa- 'ilay -ya al- mas.er
qul yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas 'inna-maa 'anaa la- -kum nadher muben
fa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat la- -hum maghfirah wa- rizq karem
wa- 'alladhena sacaw fe 'aayaat -naa mucaajizen 'olaa'ika as.h.aab al- jah.em

wa- maa arsalnaa min qabli -ka min rasol wa- laa nabey 'illaa 'idhaa tamannaa alqaa ash- shayt.aan fe umniyah -hi fa- yansakh 'allaah maa yulqe ash- shayt.aan thumma yuh.kim 'allaah 'aayaat -hi wa- 'allaah calem h.akem
li- yajcal maa yulqe ash- shayt.aan fitnah li- 'alladhena fe qulob -him marad. wa- al- qaasiyah qulob -hum wa- 'inna az.- z.aalimen la- fe shiqaaq baced
wa- li- yaclam 'alladhena 'oto al- cilm 'anna -hu al- h.aqq min rabb -ka fa- yu'mino bi- -hi fa- tukhbit la- -hu qulob -hum wa- 'inna 'allaah la- haadi 'alladhena 'aamano 'ilaa s.iraat. mustaqem
wa- laa yazaal 'alladhena kafaro fe miryah min -hu h.attaa ta'tiya -hum as- saacah baghtah 'aw ya'tiya -hum cadhaab yawm caqem
al- mulk yawma'idhin li- 'allaah yah.kum bayna -hum fa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat fe jannaat an- nacem
wa- 'alladhena kafaro wa- kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa fa- 'olaa'ika la- -hum cadhaab muhen
wa- 'alladhena haajaro fe sabel 'allaah thumma qutilo 'aw maato la- yarzuqanna -hum 'allaah rizq(an) h.asan(an) wa- 'inna 'allaah la- huwa khayr ar- raaziqen
la- yudkhilanna -hum mudkhal(an) yard.awn -hu wa- 'inna 'allaah la- calem h.alem
dhaalika wa- man caaqaba bi- mithl maa coqiba bi- -hi thumma bughiya calay -hi la- yans.uranna -hu 'allaah 'inna 'allaah la- cafow ghafor
dhaalika bi- 'anna 'allaah yolij al- layl fe an- nahaar wa- yolij an- nahaar fe al- layl wa- 'anna 'allaah samec bas.er
dhaalika bi- 'anna 'allaah huwa al- h.aqq wa- 'anna maa yadcon min doni -hi huwa al- baat.il wa- 'anna 'allaah huwa al- caley al- kaber
'a- lam tara 'anna 'allaah anzala min as- samaa' maa' fa- tus.bih. al- 'ard. mukhd.arrah 'inna 'allaah lat.ef khaber
la- -hu maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- 'inna 'allaah la- huwa al- ghaney al- h.amed

'a- lam tara 'anna 'allaah sakhkhara la- -kum maa fe al- 'ard. wa- al- fulk tajre fe al- bah.r bi- 'amr -hi wa- yumsik as- samaa' 'an taqac calaa al- 'ard. 'illaa bi- 'idhn -hi 'inna 'allaah bi- an- naas la- ra'of rah.em
wa- huwa 'alladhe ah.yaa -kum thumma yumet -kum thumma yuh.ye -kum 'inna al- 'insaan la- kafor
li- kull 'ummah jacalnaa mansak(an) hum naasiko -hu fa- laa yunaazicunna -ka fe al- 'amr wa- udcu 'ilaa rabb -ka 'inna -ka la- calaa huda(n) mustaqem
wa- 'in jaadalo -ka fa- qul 'allaah aclam bi- maa tacmalon
'allaah yah.kum bayna -kum yawm al- qiyaamah fe maa kuntum fe -hi takhtalifon
'a- lam taclam 'anna 'allaah yaclam maa fe as- samaa' wa- al- 'ard. 'inna dhaalika fe kitaab 'inna dhaalika calaa 'allaah yaser
wa- yacbudon min doni 'allaah maa lam yunazzil bi- -hi sult.aan(an) wa- maa laysa la- -hum bi- -hi cilm wa- maa li- az.- z.aalimen min nas.er

wa- 'idhaa tutlaa calay -him 'aayaat -naa bayyinaat tacrif fe wujoh 'alladhena kafaro al- munkar yakaadon yast.on bi- 'alladhena yatlon calay -him 'aayaat -naa qul 'a- fa- unabbi' -kum bi- sharr min dhaalikum an- naar wacada -haa 'allaah 'alladhena kafaro wa- bi's al- mas.er

yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas d.uriba mathal fa- istamico la- -hu 'inna 'alladhena tadcon min doni 'allaah lan yakhluqo dhubaab(an) wa- law ijtamaco la- -hu wa- 'in yaslub -hum adh- dhubaab shay'(an) laa yastanqidho -hu min -hu d.acufa at.- t.aalib wa- al- mat.lob
maa qadaro 'allaah h.aqq qadr -hu 'inna 'allaah la- qawey cazez
'allaah yas.t.afe min al- malaa'ikah rusul(an) wa- min an- naas 'inna 'allaah samec bas.er
yaclam maa bayna ayde -him wa- maa khalfa -hum wa- 'ilaa 'allaah turjac al- 'umor
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano irkaco wa- usjudo wa- ucbudo rabb -kum wa- ifcalo al- khayr lacalla -kum tuflih.on

wa- jaahido fe 'allaah h.aqq jihaad -hi huwa ijtabaa -kum wa- maa jacala calay -kum fe ad- den min h.araj millah 'abe -kum 'ibraahem huwa sammaa -kum al- muslimen min qablu wa- fe haadhaa li- yakon ar- rasol shahed(an) calay -kum wa- takono shuhadaa' calaa an- naas fa- aqemo as.- s.alaah wa- 'aato az- zakaah wa- ictas.imo bi- 'allaah huwa mawlaa -kum fa- nicma al- mawlaa wa- nicma an- nas.er
qad aflah.a al- mu'minon
'alladhena hum fe s.alaah -him khaashicon
wa- 'alladhena hum can al- laghw mucrid.on
wa- 'alladhena hum li- az- zakaah faacilon
wa- 'alladhena hum li- furoj -him h.aafiz.on
'illaa calaa azwaaj -him 'aw maa malakat aymaan -hum fa- 'inna -hum ghayr malomen
fa- man ibtaghaa waraa'a dhaalika fa- 'olaa'ika hum al- caadon
wa- 'alladhena hum li- 'amaanaat -him wa- cahd -him raacon
wa- 'alladhena hum calaa s.alawaat -him yuh.aafiz.on
'olaa'ika hum al- waarithon
'alladhena yarithon al- firdaws hum fe -haa khaalidon
wa- la- qad khalaqnaa al- 'insaan min sulaalah min t.en
thumma jacalnaa -hu nut.fah fe qaraar maken

thumma khalaqnaa an- nut.fah calaqah fa- khalaqnaa al- calaqah mud.ghah fa- khalaqnaa al- mud.ghah ciz.aam(an) fa- kasawnaa al- ciz.aam lah.m(an) thumma ansha'naa -hu khalq(an) 'aakhar fa- tabaaraka 'allaah ah.san al- khaaliqen
thumma 'inna -kum bacda dhaalika la- mayyiton
thumma 'inna -kum yawm al- qiyaamah tubcathon
wa- la- qad khalaqnaa fawqa -kum sabc t.araa'iq wa- maa kunnaa can al- khalq ghaafilen
wa- anzalnaa min as- samaa' maa' bi- qadar fa- askannaa -hu fe al- 'ard. wa- 'in(na) -naa calaa dhahaab bi- -hi la- qaadiron
fa- ansha'naa la- -kum bi- -hi jannaat min nakhel wa- acnaab la- -kum fe -haa fawaakih katherah wa- min -haa ta'kulon
wa- shajarah takhruj min t.or saynaa' tanbut bi- ad- duhn wa- s.ibgh li- al- 'aakilen
wa- 'inna la- -kum fe al- ancaam la- cibrah nusqe -kum min maa fe but.on -haa wa- la- -kum fe -haa manaafic katherah wa- min -haa ta'kulon
wa- calay -haa wa- calaa al- fulk tuh.malon
wa- la- qad arsalnaa noh.(an) 'ilaa qawm -hi fa- qaala yaa qawm -e ucbudo 'allaah maa la- -kum min 'ilaah ghayr -hu 'a- fa- laa tattaqon
