fa- qaala al- mala' 'alladhena kafaro min qawm -hi maa haadhaa 'illaa bashar mithl -kum yured 'an yatafad.d.ala calay -kum wa- law shaa'a 'allaah la- anzala malaa'ikah maa samicnaa bi- haadhaa fe 'aabaa' -naa al- 'awwalen
'in huwa 'illaa rajul bi- -hi jinnah fa- tarabbas.o bi- -hi h.attaa h.en
qaala rabb -i uns.ur -ne bi- maa kadhdhabo -ni

fa- awh.aynaa 'ilay -hi 'an is.nac al- fulk bi- acyun -naa wa- wah.y -naa fa- 'idhaa jaa'a 'amr -naa wa- faara at- tannor fa- usluk fe -haa min kull zawjain ithnain wa- ahlaka 'illaa man sabaqa calay -hi al- qawl min -hum wa- laa tukhaat.ib -ne fe 'alladhena z.alamo 'inna -hum mughraqon
fa- 'idhaa istawayta 'anta wa- man maca -ka calaa al- fulk fa- qul al- h.amd li- 'allaah 'alladhe najjaa -naa min al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
wa- qul rabb -i anzil -ne munzal(an) mubaarak(an) wa- 'anta khayr al- munzilen
'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat wa- 'in kunnaa la- mubtalen
thumma ansha'naa min bacdi -him qarn(an) 'aakharen
fa- arsalnaa fe -him rasol(an) min -hum 'an ucbudo 'allaah maa la- -kum min 'ilaah ghayr -hu 'a- fa- laa tattaqon

wa- qaala al- mala' min qawm -hi 'alladhena kafaro wa- kadhdhabo bi- liqaa' al- 'aakhirah wa- atrafnaa -hum fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa maa haadhaa 'illaa bashar mithl -kum ya'kul min maa ta'kulon min -hu wa- yashrab min maa tashrabon
wa- la- 'in at.actum bashar(an) mithl -kum 'inna -kum 'idhan la- khaasiron
'a- yacid -kum 'anna -kum 'idhaa mittum wa- kuntum turaab(an) wa- ciz.aam(an) 'anna -kum mukhrajon
hayhaat hayhaat li- maa tocadon
'in hiya 'illaa h.ayaah -naa ad- dunyaa namot wa- nah.yaa wa- maa nah.nu bi- mabcothen
'in huwa 'illaa rajul iftaraa calaa 'allaah kadhib(an) wa- maa nah.nu la- -hu bi- mu'minen
qaala rabb uns.ur -ne bi- maa kadhdhabo -ni
qaala can maa qalel la- yus.bih.unna naadimen
fa- 'akhadhat -hum as.- s.ayh.ah bi- al- h.aqq fa- jacalnaa -hum ghuthaa' fa- bucd(an) li- al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
thumma ansha'naa min bacdi -him quron(an) 'aakharen
maa tasbiq min 'ummah 'ajal -haa wa- maa yasta'khiron
thumma arsalnaa rusul -naa tatraa kulla-maa jaa'a 'ummah rasol -haa kadhdhabo -hu fa- atbacnaa bacd. -hum bacd.(an) wa- jacalnaa -hum ah.aadeth fa- bucd(an) li- qawm laa yu'minon
thumma arsalnaa mosaa wa- 'akhaa -hu haaron bi- 'aayaat -naa wa- sult.aan muben
'ilaa fircawn wa- mala' -hi fa- istakbaro wa- kaano qawm(an) caalen
fa- qaalo 'a- nu'min li- basharain mithl -naa wa- qawm -humaa la- -naa caabidon
fa- kadhdhabo -humaa fa- kaano min al- muhlaken
wa- la- qad 'aataynaa mosaa al- kitaab lacalla -hum yahtadon
wa- jacalnaa ibn maryam wa- 'umm -hu 'aayah wa- 'aawaynaa -humaa 'ilaa rabwah dhaat qaraar wa- macen
yaa 'ayyuhaa ar- rusul kulo min at.- t.ayyibaat wa- icmalo s.aalih.(an) 'inni -y bi- maa tacmalon calem
wa- 'inna haadhihi 'ummah -kum 'ummah waah.idah wa- 'anaa rabb -kum fa- ittaqo -ne
fa- taqat.t.aco 'amr -hum bayna -hum zubur(an) kull h.izb bi- maa laday -him farih.on
fa- dhar -hum fe ghamrah -him h.attaa h.en
'a- yah.sabon 'anna maa numidd -hum bi- -hi min maal wa- banen
nusaaric la- -hum fe al- khayraat bal laa yashcuron
'inna 'alladhena hum min khashyah rabb -hum mushfiqon
wa- 'alladhena hum bi- 'aayaat rabb -him yu'minon
wa- 'alladhena hum bi- rabb -him laa yushrikon
wa- 'alladhena yu'ton maa 'aataw wa- qulob -hum wajilah 'anna -hum 'ilaa rabb -him raajicon
'olaa'ika yusaaricon fe al- khayraat wa- hum la- -haa saabiqon
wa- laa nukallif nafs(an) 'illaa wusc -haa wa- laday -naa kitaab yant.iq bi- al- h.aqq wa- hum laa yuz.lamon
bal qulob -hum fe ghamrah min haadhaa wa- la- -hum acmaal min doni dhaalika hum la- -haa caamilon
h.attaa 'idhaa 'akhadhnaa mutrafe -him bi- al- cadhaab 'idhaa hum yaj'aron
laa taj'aro al- yawm 'inna -kum min -naa laa tuns.aron
qad kaanat 'aayaat -e tutlaa calay -kum fa- kuntum calaa acqaab -kum tankis.on
mustakbiren bi- -hi saamir(an) tahjuron
'a- fa- lam yaddabbaro al- qawl 'am jaa'a -hum maa lam ya'ti 'aabaa' -hum al- 'awwalen
'am lam yacrifo rasol -hum fa- hum la- -hu munkiron
'am yaqolon bi- -hi jinnah bal jaa'a -hum bi- al- h.aqq wa- akthar -hum li- al- h.aqq kaarihon
wa- law ittabaca al- h.aqq ahwaa' -hum la- fasadat as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- man fe -hinna bal 'ataynaa -hum bi- dhikr -him fa- hum can dhikr -him mucrid.on
'am tas'al -hum kharj(an) fa- kharaaj rabb -ka khayr wa- huwa khayr ar- raaziqen
wa- 'inna -ka la- tadco -hum 'ilaa s.iraat. mustaqem
wa- 'inna 'alladhena laa yu'minon bi- al- 'aakhirah can as.- s.iraat. la- naakibon
wa- law rah.imnaa -hum wa- kashafnaa maa bi- -him min d.urr la- lajjo fe t.ughyaan -him yacmahon
wa- la- qad 'akhadhnaa -hum bi- al- cadhaab fa- maa istakaano li- rabb -him wa- maa yatad.arracon
h.attaa 'idhaa fatah.naa calay -him baab(an) dhaa cadhaab shaded 'idhaa hum fe -hi mublison
wa- huwa 'alladhe ansha'a la- -kum as- samc wa- al- abs.aar wa- al- af'idah qalel(an) maa tashkuron
wa- huwa 'alladhe dhara'a -kum fe al- 'ard. wa- 'ilay -hi tuh.sharon
wa- huwa 'alladhe yuh.ye wa- yumet wa- la- -hu ikhtilaaf al- layl wa- an- nahaar 'a- fa- laa tacqilon
bal qaalo mithl maa qaala al- 'awwalon
qaalo 'a- 'idhaa mitnaa wa- kunnaa turaab(an) wa- ciz.aam(an) 'a- 'in(na) -naa la- mabcothon
la- qad wucidnaa nah.nu wa- 'aabaa' -naa haadhaa min qablu 'in haadhaa 'illaa asaat.er al- 'awwalen
qul li- man al- 'ard. wa- man fe -haa 'in kuntum taclamon
sa- yaqolon li- 'allaah qul 'a- fa- laa tadhakkaron
qul man rabb as- samaawaat as- sabc wa- rabb al- carsh al- caz.em
sa- yaqolon li- 'allaah qul 'a- fa- laa tattaqon
qul man bi- yad -hi malakot kull shay' wa- huwa yujer wa- laa yujaar calay -hi 'in kuntum taclamon
sa- yaqolon li- 'allaah qul fa- 'annaa tush.aron
bal 'ataynaa -hum bi- al- h.aqq wa- 'inna -hum la- kaadhibon
maa ittakhadha 'allaah min walad wa- maa kaana maca -hu min 'ilaah 'idhan la- dhahaba kull 'ilaah bi- maa khalaqa wa- la- calaa bacd. -hum calaa bacd. subh.aana 'allaah can maa yas.ifon
caalim al- ghayb wa- ash- shahaadah fa- tacaalaa can maa yushrikon
qul rabb -i 'immaa turiyan -ne maa yocadon
rabb -i fa- laa tajcal -ne fe al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
wa- 'in(na) -naa calaa 'an nuriya -ka maa nacid -hum la- qaadiron
idfac bi- 'allate hiya ah.san as- sayyi'ah nah.nu aclam bi- maa yas.ifon
wa- qul rabb -i acodhu bi- -ka min hamazaat ash- shayaat.en
wa- acodhu bi- -ka rabb -i 'an yah.d.uron
h.attaa 'idhaa jaa'a 'ah.ad -hum al- mawt qaala rabb -i irjico -ni
lacalli -y acmal s.aalih.(an) fe maa taraktu kallaa 'inna -haa kalimah huwa qaa'il -haa wa- min waraa'i -him barzakh 'ilaa yawm yubcathon
fa- 'idhaa nufikha fe as.- s.or fa- laa ansaab bayna -hum yawma'idhin wa- laa yatasaa'alon
fa- man thaqulat mawaazen -hu fa- 'olaa'ika hum al- muflih.on
wa- man khaffat mawaazen -hu fa- 'olaa'ika 'alladhena khasiro anfus -hum fe jahannam khaalidon
talfah. wujoh -hum an- naar wa- hum fe -haa kaalih.on
'a- lam takun 'aayaat -e tutlaa calay -kum fa- kuntum bi- -haa tukadhdhibon
qaalo rabb -naa ghalabat calay -naa shiqwah -naa wa- kunnaa qawm(an) d.aallen
rabb -naa akhrij -naa min -haa fa- 'in cudnaa fa- 'in(na) -naa z.aalimon
qaala ikhsa'o fe -haa wa- laa tukallimo -ni
'inna -hu kaana fareq min cibaad -e yaqolon rabb -naa 'aamannaa fa- ighfir la- -naa wa- irh.am -naa wa- 'anta khayr ar- raah.imen
fa- ittakhadhtumo -hum sikhrey(an) h.attaa ansaw -kum dhikr -e wa- kuntum min -hum tad.h.akon
'inni -y jazaytu -hum al- yawm bi- maa s.abaro 'anna -hum hum al- faa'izon
qaala kam labithtum fe al- 'ard. cadad sinen
qaalo labithnaa yawm(an) 'aw bacd. yawm fa- is'al al- caadden
qaala 'in labithtum 'illaa qalel(an) law 'anna -kum kuntum taclamon
'a- fa- h.asibtum 'anna-maa khalaqnaa -kum cabath(an) wa- 'anna -kum 'ilay -naa laa turjacon
fa- tacaalaa 'allaah al- malik al- h.aqq laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa rabb al- carsh al- karem
wa- man yadcu maca 'allaah 'ilaah(an) 'aakhar laa burhaan la- -hu bi- -hi fa- 'inna-maa h.isaab -hu cinda rabb -hi 'inna -hu laa yuflih. al- kaafiron
wa- qul rabb -i ighfir wa- irh.am wa- 'anta khayr ar- raah.imen
sorah anzalnaa -haa wa- farad.naa -haa wa- anzalnaa fe -haa 'aayaat bayyinaat lacalla -kum tadhakkaron

az- zaaniyah wa- az- zaane fa- ijlido kull waah.id min -humaa mi'ah jaldah wa- laa ta'khudh -kum bi- -himaa ra'fah fe den 'allaah 'in kuntum tu'minon bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- li- yashhad cadhaab -humaa t.aa'ifah min al- mu'minen
al- zaane laa yankih. 'illaa zaaniyah 'aw mushrikah wa- az- zaaniyah laa yankih. -haa 'illaa zaani(n) 'aw mushrik wa- h.urrima dhaalika calaa al- mu'minen
wa- 'alladhena yarmon al- muh.s.anaat thumma lam ya'to bi- arbacah shuhadaa' fa- ijlido -hum thamaanen jaldah wa- laa taqbalo la- -hum shahaadah 'abad(an) wa- 'olaa'ika hum al- faasiqon
'illaa 'alladhena taabo min bacdi dhaalika wa- as.lah.o fa- 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em
wa- 'alladhena yarmon azwaaj -hum wa- lam yakun la- -hum shuhadaa' 'illaa anfus -hum fa- shahaadah 'ah.ad -him arbac shahaadaat bi- 'allaah 'inna -hu la- min as.- s.aadiqen
wa- al- khaamisah 'anna lacnah 'allaah calay -hi 'in kaana min al- kaadhiben
wa- yadra' can -haa al- cadhaab 'an tashhad arbac shahaadaat bi- 'allaah 'inna -hu la- min al- kaadhiben
wa- al- khaamisah 'anna ghad.ab 'allaah calay -haa 'in kaana min as.- s.aadiqen
wa- law-laa fad.l 'allaah calay -kum wa- rah.mah -hu wa- 'anna 'allaah tawwaab h.akem

'inna 'alladhena jaa'o bi- al- 'ifk cus.bah min -kum laa tah.sabo -hu sharr(an) la- -kum bal huwa khayr la- -kum li- kull imri' min -hum maa iktasaba min al- 'ithm wa- 'alladhe tawallaa kibr -hu min -hum la- -hu cadhaab caz.em
law-laa 'idh samictumo -hu z.anna al- mu'minon wa- al- mu'minaat bi- anfus -him khayr(an) wa- qaalo haadhaa 'ifk muben
law-laa jaa'o calay -hi bi- arbacah shuhadaa' fa- 'idh lam ya'to bi- ash- shuhadaa' fa- 'olaa'ika cinda 'allaah hum al- kaadhibon
wa- law-laa fad.l 'allaah calay -kum wa- rah.mah -hu fe ad- dunyaa wa- al- 'aakhirah la- massa -kum fe maa afad.tum fe -hi cadhaab caz.em
'idh talaqqawn -hu bi- alsinah -kum wa- taqolon bi- afwaah -kum maa laysa la- -kum bi- -hi cilm wa- tah.sabon -hu hayyin(an) wa- huwa cinda 'allaah caz.em
wa- law-laa 'idh samictumo -hu qultum maa yakon la- -naa 'an natakallam bi- haadhaa subh.aana -ka haadhaa buhtaan caz.em
yaciz. -kum 'allaah 'an tacodo li- mithl -hi 'abad(an) 'in kuntum mu'minen
wa- yubayyin 'allaah la- -kum al- 'aayaat wa- 'allaah calem h.akem
'inna 'alladhena yuh.ibbon 'an tashec al- faah.ishah fe 'alladhena 'aamano la- -hum cadhaab 'alem fe ad- dunyaa wa- al- 'aakhirah wa- 'allaah yaclam wa- 'antum laa taclamon
wa- law-laa fad.l 'allaah calay -kum wa- rah.mah -hu wa- 'anna 'allaah ra'of rah.em

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tattabico khut.uwaat ash- shayt.aan wa- man yattabic khut.uwaat ash- shayt.aan fa- 'inna -hu ya'mur bi- al- fah.shaa' wa- al- munkar wa- law-laa fad.l 'allaah calay -kum wa- rah.mah -hu maa zakaa min -kum min 'ah.ad 'abad(an) wa- laakin 'allaah yuzakke man yashaa' wa- 'allaah samec calem

wa- laa ya'tali 'olo al- fad.l min -kum wa- as- sacah 'an yu'to 'ole al- qurbaa wa- al- masaaken wa- al- muhaajiren fe sabel 'allaah wa- li- yacfo wa- li- yas.fah.o 'a-laa tuh.ibbon 'an yaghfir 'allaah la- -kum wa- 'allaah ghafor rah.em
'inna 'alladhena yarmon al- muh.s.anaat al- ghaafilaat al- mu'minaat lucino fe ad- dunyaa wa- al- 'aakhirah wa- la- -hum cadhaab caz.em
yawm tashhad calay -him alsinah -hum wa- ayde -hum wa- arjul -hum bi- maa kaano yacmalon
yawma'idhin yuwaffe -him 'allaah den -hum al- h.aqq wa- yaclamon 'anna 'allaah huwa al- h.aqq al- muben

al- khabethaat li- al- khabethen wa- al- khabethon li- al- khabethaat wa- at.- t.ayyibaat li- at.- t.ayyiben wa- at.- t.ayyibon li- at.- t.ayyibaat 'olaa'ika mubarra'on min maa yaqolon la- -hum maghfirah wa- rizq karem
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tadkhulo buyot(an) ghayr buyot -kum h.attaa tasta'niso wa- tusallimo calaa 'ahl -haa dhaalikum khayr la- -kum lacalla -kum tadhakkaron
fa- 'in lam tajido fe -haa 'ah.ad(an) fa- laa tadkhulo -haa h.attaa yu'dhan la- -kum wa- 'in qela la- -kum irjico fa- irjico huwa azkaa la- -kum wa- 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon calem
laysa calay -kum junaah. 'an tadkhulo buyot(an) ghayr maskonah fe -haa mataac la- -kum wa- 'allaah yaclam maa tubdon wa- maa taktumon
qul li- al- mu'minen yaghud.d.o min abs.aar -him wa- yah.faz.o furoj -hum dhaalika azkaa la- -hum 'inna 'allaah khaber bi- maa yas.nacon

wa- qul li- al- mu'minaat yaghd.ud.na min abs.aar -hinna wa- yah.faz.na furoj -hunna wa- laa yubdena zenah -hunna 'illaa maa z.ahara min -haa wa- li- yad.ribna bi- khumur -hinna calaa juyob -hinna wa- laa yubdena zenah -hunna 'illaa li- bucolah -hinna 'aw 'aabaa' -hinna 'aw 'aabaa' bucolah -hinna 'aw abnaa' -hinna 'aw abnaa' bucolah -hinna 'aw 'ikhwaan -hinna 'aw bane 'ikhwaan -hinna 'aw bane 'akhawaat -hinna 'aw nisaa' -hinna 'aw maa malakat aymaan -hunna 'aw at- taabicen ghayr 'ole al- 'irbah min ar- rijaal 'aw at.- t.ifl 'alladhena lam yaz.haro calaa cawraat an- nisaa' wa- laa yad.ribna bi- arjul -hinna li- yuclam maa yukhfena min zenah -hinna wa- tobo 'ilaa 'allaah jamec(an) 'ayyuhaa al- mu'minon lacalla -kum tuflih.on
wa- ankih.o al- 'ayaamaa min -kum wa- as.- s.aalih.en min cibaad -kum wa- 'imaa' -kum 'in yakono fuqaraa' yughni -him 'allaah min fad.l -hi wa- 'allaah waasic calem

wa- li- yastacfif 'alladhena laa yajidon nikaah.(an) h.attaa yughniya -hum 'allaah min fad.l -hi wa- 'alladhena yabtaghon al- kitaab min maa malakat aymaan -kum fa- kaatibo -hum 'in calimtum fe -him khayr(an) wa- 'aato -hum min maal 'allaah 'alladhe 'aataa -kum wa- laa tukriho fatayaat -kum calaa al- bighaa' 'in aradna tah.as.s.un(an) li- tabtagho carad. al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- man yukrih -hunna fa- 'inna 'allaah min bacdi ikraah -hinna ghafor rah.em
wa- la- qad anzalnaa 'ilay -kum 'aayaat mubayyinaat wa- mathal(an) min 'alladhena khalaw min qabli -kum wa- mawciz.ah li- al- muttaqen

'allaah nor as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. mathal nor -hi ka- mishkaah fe -haa mis.baah. al- mis.baah. fe zujaajah az- zujaajah ka-'anna -haa kawkab durrey yoqad min shajarah mubaarakah zaytonah laa sharqeyah wa- laa gharbeyah yakaad zayt -haa yud.e' wa- law lam tamsas -hu naar nor calaa nor yahde 'allaah li- nor -hi man yashaa' wa- yad.rib 'allaah al- amthaal li- an- naas wa- 'allaah bi- kull shay' calem
fe buyot 'adhina 'allaah 'an turfac wa- yudhkar fe -haa ism -hu yusabbih. la- -hu fe -haa bi- al- ghudow wa- al- 'aas.aal
rijaal laa tulhe -him tijaarah wa- laa bayc can dhikr 'allaah wa- iqaam as.- s.alaah wa- 'etaa' az- zakaah yakhaafon yawm(an) tataqallab fe -hi al- qulob wa- al- abs.aar
li- yajziya -hum 'allaah ah.san maa camilo wa- yazed -hum min fad.l -hi wa- 'allaah yarzuq man yashaa' bi- ghayr h.isaab

wa- 'alladhena kafaro acmaal -hum ka- saraab bi- qecah yah.sab -hu az.- z.am'aan maa' h.attaa 'idhaa jaa'a -hu lam yajid -hu shay'(an) wa- wajada 'allaah cinda -hu fa- waffaa -hu h.isaab -hu wa- 'allaah sarec al- h.isaab

'aw ka- z.ulumaat fe bah.r lujjey yaghshaa -hu mawj min fawqi -him mawj min fawqi -him sah.aab z.ulumaat bacd. -haa fawqa bacd. 'idhaa akhraja yad -hu lam yakad yaraa -haa wa- man lam yajcal 'allaah la- -hu nor(an) fa- maa la- -hu min nor
'a- lam tara 'anna 'allaah yusabbih. la- -hu man fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- at.- t.ayr s.aaffaat kull qad calima s.alaah -hu wa- tasbeh. -hu wa- 'allaah calem bi- maa yafcalon
wa- li- 'allaah mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- 'ilaa 'allaah al- mas.er

'a- lam tara 'anna 'allaah yuzje sah.aab(an) thumma yu'allif bayna -hu thumma yajcal -hu rukaam(an) fa- taraa al- wadq yakhruj min khilaali -hi wa- yunazzil min as- samaa' min jibaal fe -haa min barad fa- yus.eb bi- -hi man yashaa' wa- yas.rif -hu can man yashaa' yakaad sanaa barq -hi yadhhab bi- al- abs.aar
yuqallib 'allaah al- layl wa- an- nahaar 'inna fe dhaalika la- cibrah li- 'ole al- abs.aar

wa- 'allaah khalaqa kull daabbah min maa' fa- min -hum man yamshe calaa bat.n -hi wa- min -hum man yamshe calaa rijlain wa- min -hum man yamshe calaa arbac yakhluq 'allaah maa yashaa' 'inna 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader
la- qad anzalnaa 'aayaat mubayyinaat wa- 'allaah yahde man yashaa' 'ilaa s.iraat. mustaqem
wa- yaqolon 'aamannaa bi- 'allaah wa- bi- ar- rasol wa- at.acnaa thumma yatawallaa fareq min -hum min bacdi dhaalika wa- maa 'olaa'ika bi- al- mu'minen
wa- 'idhaa duco 'ilaa 'allaah wa- rasol -hi li- yah.kum bayna -hum 'idhaa fareq min -hum mucrid.on
wa- 'in yakun la- -hum al- h.aqq ya'to 'ilay -hi mudhcinen
'a- fe qulob -him marad. 'am irtaabo 'am yakhaafon 'an yah.ef 'allaah calay -him wa- rasol -hu bal 'olaa'ika hum az.- z.aalimon
'inna-maa kaana qawl al- mu'minen 'idhaa duco 'ilaa 'allaah wa- rasol -hi li- yah.kum bayna -hum 'an yaqolo samicnaa wa- at.acnaa wa- 'olaa'ika hum al- muflih.on
wa- man yut.ic 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- yakhsha 'allaah wa- yattaq -hi fa- 'olaa'ika hum al- faa'izon
wa- aqsamo bi- 'allaah jahd aymaan -hum la- 'in 'amarta -hum la- yakhrujunna qul laa tuqsimo t.aacah macrofah 'inna 'allaah khaber bi- maa tacmalon

qul at.eco 'allaah wa- at.eco ar- rasol fa- 'in tawallaw fa- 'inna-maa calay -hi maa h.ummila wa- calay -kum maa h.ummiltum wa- 'in tut.eco -hu tahtado wa- maa calaa ar- rasol 'illaa al- balaagh al- muben

wacada 'allaah 'alladhena 'aamano min -kum wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat la- yastakhlifanna -hum fe al- 'ard. ka-maa istakhlafa 'alladhena min qabli -him wa- la- yumakkinanna la- -hum den -hum 'alladhe irtad.aa la- -hum wa- la- yubaddilanna -hum min bacdi khawf -him 'amn(an) yacbudon -ne laa yushrikon bi- -y shay'(an) wa- man kafara bacda dhaalika fa- 'olaa'ika hum al- faasiqon
wa- aqemo as.- s.alaah wa- 'aato az- zakaah wa- at.eco ar- rasol lacalla -kum turh.amon
laa tah.sabanna 'alladhena kafaro mucjizen fe al- 'ard. wa- ma'waa -hum an- naar wa- la- bi's al- mas.er

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano li- yasta'dhin -kum 'alladhena malakat aymaan -kum wa- 'alladhena lam yablugho al- h.ulum min -kum thalaath marraat min qabli s.alaah al- fajr wa- h.ena tad.acon thiyaab -kum min az.- z.aherah wa- min bacdi s.alaah al- cishaa' thalaath cawraat la- -kum laysa calay -kum wa- laa calay -him junaah. bacda -hunna t.awwaafon calay -kum bacd. -kum calaa bacd. ka- dhaalika yubayyin 'allaah la- -kum al- 'aayaat wa- 'allaah calem h.akem
wa- 'idhaa balagha al- at.faal min -kum al- h.ulum fa- li- yasta'dhino ka-maa ista'dhana 'alladhena min qabli -him ka- dhaalika yubayyin 'allaah la- -kum 'aayaat -hi wa- 'allaah calem h.akem

wa- al- qawaacid min an- nisaa' 'allate laa yarjon nikaah.(an) fa- laysa calay -hinna junaah. 'an yad.acna thiyaab -hunna ghayr mutabarrijaat bi- zenah wa- 'an yastacfifna khayr la- -hunna wa- 'allaah samec calem

laysa calaa al- acmaa h.araj wa- laa calaa al- acraj h.araj wa- laa calaa al- mared. h.araj wa- laa calaa anfus -kum 'an ta'kulo min buyot -kum 'aw buyot 'aabaa' -kum 'aw buyot 'ummahaat -kum 'aw buyot 'ikhwaan -kum 'aw buyot 'akhawaat -kum 'aw buyot acmaam -kum 'aw buyot cammaat -kum 'aw buyot akhwaal -kum 'aw buyot khaalaat -kum 'aw maa malaktum mafaatih. -hu 'aw s.adeq -kum laysa calay -kum junaah. 'an ta'kulo jamec(an) 'aw ashtaat(an) fa- 'idhaa dakhaltum buyot(an) fa- sallimo calaa anfus -kum tah.eyah min cindi 'allaah mubaarakah t.ayyibah ka- dhaalika yubayyin 'allaah la- -kum al- 'aayaat lacalla -kum tacqilon

'inna-maa al- mu'minon 'alladhena 'aamano bi- 'allaah wa- rasol -hi wa- 'idhaa kaano maca -hu calaa 'amr jaamic lam yadhhabo h.attaa yasta'dhino -hu 'inna 'alladhena yasta'dhinon -ka 'olaa'ika 'alladhena yu'minon bi- 'allaah wa- rasol -hi fa- 'idhaa ista'dhano -ka li- bacd. sha'n -him fa- i'dhan li- man shi'ta min -hum wa- istaghfir la- -hum 'allaah 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em

laa tajcalo ducaa' ar- rasol bayna -kum ka- ducaa' bacd. -kum bacd.(an) qad yaclam 'allaah 'alladhena yatasallalon min -kum liwaadh(an) fa- li- yah.dhar 'alladhena yukhaalifon can 'amr -hi 'an tus.eb -hum fitnah 'aw yus.eb -hum cadhaab 'alem
'a-laa 'inna li- 'allaah maa fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. qad yaclam maa 'antum calay -hi wa- yawm yurjacon 'ilay -hi fa- yunabbi' -hum bi- maa camilo wa- 'allaah bi- kull shay' calem
tabaaraka 'alladhe nazzala al- furqaan calaa cabd -hi li- yakon li- al- caalamen nadher(an)
'alladhe la- -hu mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- lam yattakhidh walad(an) wa- lam yakun la- -hu sharek fe al- mulk wa- khalaqa kull shay' fa- qaddara -hu taqder(an)
wa- ittakhadho min doni -hi 'aalihah laa yakhluqon shay'(an) wa- hum yukhlaqon wa- laa yamlikon li- anfus -him d.arr(an) wa- laa nafc(an) wa- laa yamlikon mawt(an) wa- laa h.ayaah wa- laa nushor(an)
wa- qaala 'alladhena kafaro 'in haadhaa 'illaa 'ifk iftaraa -hu wa- acaana -hu calay -hi qawm 'aakharon fa- qad jaa'o z.ulm(an) wa- zor(an)
wa- qaalo asaat.er al- 'awwalen iktataba -haa fa- hiya tumlaa calay -hi bukrah wa- 'as.el(an)
qul anzala -hu 'alladhe yaclam as- sirr fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. 'inna -hu kaana ghafor(an) rah.em(an)
wa- qaalo maa li- haadhaa ar- rasol ya'kul at.- t.acaam wa- yamshe fe al- aswaaq law-laa unzila 'ilay -hi malak fa- yakon maca -hu nadher(an)
'aw yulqaa 'ilay -hi kanz 'aw takon la- -hu jannah ya'kul min -haa wa- qaala az.- z.aalimon 'in tattabicon 'illaa rajul(an) mash.or(an)
unz.ur kayfa d.arabo la- -ka al- amthaal fa- d.allo fa- laa yastat.econ sabel(an)
tabaaraka 'alladhe 'in shaa'a jacala la- -ka khayr(an) min dhaalika jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar wa- yajcal la- -ka qus.or(an)
bal kadhdhabo bi- as- saacah wa- actadnaa li- man kadhdhaba bi- as- saacah sacer(an)
'idhaa ra'at -hum min makaan baced samico la- -haa taghayyuz.(an) wa- zafer(an)
wa- 'idhaa ulqo min -haa makaan(an) d.ayyiq(an) muqarranen dacaw hunaalika thubor(an)
laa tadco al- yawm thubor(an) waah.id(an) wa- udco thubor(an) kather(an)
qul 'a- dhaalika khayr 'am jannah al- khuld 'allate wucida al- muttaqon kaanat la- -hum jazaa' wa- mas.er(an)
la- -hum fe -haa maa yashaa'on khaaliden kaana calaa rabb -ka wacd(an) mas'ol(an)
wa- yawm yah.shur -hum wa- maa yacbudon min doni 'allaah fa- yaqol 'a- 'antum ad.laltum cibaad -e haa'ulaa'i 'am hum d.allo as- sabel
qaalo subh.aana -ka maa kaana yanbaghe la- -naa 'an nattakhidh min doni -ka min awliyaa' wa- laakin mattacta -hum wa- 'aabaa' -hum h.attaa naso adh- dhikr wa- kaano qawm(an) bor(an)
fa- qad kadhdhabo -kum bi- maa taqolon fa- maa tastat.econ s.arf(an) wa- laa nas.r(an) wa- man yaz.lim min -kum nudhiq -hu cadhaab(an) kaber(an)
wa- maa arsalnaa qabla -ka min al- mursalen 'illaa 'inna -hum la- ya'kulon at.- t.acaam wa- yamshon fe al- aswaaq wa- jacalnaa bacd. -kum li- bacd. fitnah 'a- tas.biron wa- kaana rabb -ka bas.er(an)
wa- qaala 'alladhena laa yarjon liqaa' -naa law-laa unzila calay -naa al- malaa'ikah 'aw naraa rabb -naa la- qad istakbaro fe anfus -him wa- cataw cutow(an) kaber(an)
yawm yarawn al- malaa'ikah laa bushraa yawma'idhin li- al- mujrimen wa- yaqolon h.ijr(an) mah.jor(an)
wa- qadimnaa 'ilaa maa camilo min camal fa- jacalnaa -hu habaa' manthor(an)
as.h.aab al- jannah yawma'idhin khayr mustaqarr(an) wa- ah.san maqel(an)
wa- yawm tashaqqaq as- samaa' bi- al- ghamaam wa- nuzzila al- malaa'ikah tanzel(an)
al- mulk yawma'idhin al- h.aqq li- ar- rah.maan wa- kaana yawm(an) calaa al- kaafiren caser(an)
wa- yawm yacad.d. az.- z.aalim calaa yadai -hi yaqol yaa layta -ne ittakhadhtu maca ar- rasol sabel(an)
yaa waylah -taa layta -ne lam attakhidh fulaan(an) khalel(an)
la- qad ad.alla -ne can adh- dhikr bacda 'idh jaa'a -ne wa- kaana ash- shayt.aan li- al- 'insaan khadhol(an)
wa- qaala ar- rasol yaa rabb -i 'inna qawm -e ittakhadho haadhaa al- qur'aan mahjor(an)
wa- ka- dhaalika jacalnaa li- kull nabey cadow min al- mujrimen wa- kafaa bi- rabb -ka haadiy(an) wa- nas.er(an)
wa- qaala 'alladhena kafaro law-laa nuzzila calay -hi al- qur'aan jumlah waah.idah ka- dhaalika li- nuthabbit bi- -hi fu'aad -ka wa- rattalnaa -hu tartel(an)
wa- laa ya'ton -ka bi- mathal 'illaa ji'naa -ka bi- al- h.aqq wa- ah.san tafser(an)
'alladhena yuh.sharon calaa wujoh -him 'ilaa jahannam 'olaa'ika sharr makaan(an) wa- ad.all sabel(an)
wa- la- qad 'aataynaa mosaa al- kitaab wa- jacalnaa maca -hu 'akhaa -hu haaron wazer(an)
fa- qulnaa idhhabaa 'ilaa al- qawm 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa fa- dammarnaa -hum tadmer(an)
wa- qawm noh. lammaa kadhdhabo ar- rusul aghraqnaa -hum wa- jacalnaa -hum li- an- naas 'aayah wa- actadnaa li- az.- z.aalimen cadhaab(an) 'alem(an)
wa- caad(an) wa- thamod(an) wa- as.h.aab ar- rass wa- quron(an) bayna dhaalika kather(an)
wa- kull(an) d.arabnaa la- -hu al- amthaal wa- kull(an) tabbarnaa tatber(an)
wa- la- qad 'ataw calaa al- qaryah 'allate umt.irat mat.ar as- saw' 'a- fa- lam yakono yarawn -haa bal kaano laa yarjon nushor(an)
wa- 'idhaa ra'aw -ka 'in yattakhidhon -ka 'illaa huzuw(an) 'a- haadhaa 'alladhe bacatha 'allaah rasol(an)
'in kaada la- yud.ill -naa can 'aalihah -naa law-laa 'an s.abarnaa calay -haa wa- sawfa yaclamon h.ena yarawn al- cadhaab man ad.all sabel(an)
'a- ra'ayta man ittakhadha 'ilaah -hu hawaa -hu 'a- fa- 'anta takon calay -hi wakel(an)
'am tah.sab 'anna akthar -hum yasmacon 'aw yacqilon 'in hum 'illaa ka- al- ancaam bal hum ad.all sabel(an)
'a- lam tara 'ilaa rabb -ka kayfa madda az.- z.ill wa- law shaa'a la- jacala -hu saakin(an) thumma jacalnaa ash- shams calay -hi dalel(an)
thumma qabad.naa -hu 'ilay -naa qabd.(an) yaser(an)
wa- huwa 'alladhe jacala la- -kum al- layl libaas(an) wa- an- nawm subaat(an) wa- jacala an- nahaar nushor(an)
wa- huwa 'alladhe arsala ar- riyaah. bushr(an) bayna yadai rah.mah -hi wa- anzalnaa min as- samaa' maa' t.ahor(an)
li- nuh.yiya bi- -hi baldah mayt(an) wa- nusqiya -hu min maa khalaqnaa ancaam(an) wa- 'anaasey kather(an)
wa- la- qad s.arrafnaa -hu bayna -hum li- yadhdhakkaro fa- 'abaa akthar an- naas 'illaa kufor(an)
wa- law shi'naa la- bacathnaa fe kull qaryah nadher(an)
fa- laa tut.ic al- kaafiren wa- jaahid -hum bi- -hi jihaad(an) kaber(an)
wa- huwa 'alladhe maraja al- bah.rain haadhaa cadhb furaat wa- haadhaa milh. 'ujaaj wa- jacala bayna -humaa barzakh(an) wa- h.ijr(an) mah.jor(an)
wa- huwa 'alladhe khalaqa min al- maa' bashar(an) fa- jacala -hu nasab(an) wa- s.ihr(an) wa- kaana rabb -ka qader(an)
wa- yacbudon min doni 'allaah maa laa yanfac -hum wa- laa yad.urr -hum wa- kaana al- kaafir calaa rabb -hi z.aher(an)
wa- maa arsalnaa -ka 'illaa mubashshir(an) wa- nadher(an)
qul maa as'al -kum calay -hi min 'ajr 'illaa man shaa'a 'an yattakhidh 'ilaa rabb -hi sabel(an)
wa- tawakkal calaa al- h.ayy 'alladhe laa yamot wa- sabbih. bi- h.amd -hi wa- kafaa bi- -hi bi- dhunob cibaad -hi khaber(an)
'alladhe khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa fe sittah ayyaam thumma istawaa calaa al- carsh ar- rah.maan fa- is'al bi- -hi khaber(an)
wa- 'idhaa qela la- -hum usjudo li- ar- rah.maan qaalo wa- maa ar- rah.maan 'a- nasjud li- maa ta'mur -naa wa- zaada -hum nufor(an)
tabaaraka 'alladhe jacala fe as- samaa' buroj(an) wa- jacala fe -haa siraaj(an) wa- qamar(an) muner(an)
wa- huwa 'alladhe jacala al- layl wa- an- nahaar khilfah li- man araada 'an yadhdhakkar 'aw araada shukor(an)
wa- cibaad ar- rah.maan 'alladhena yamshon calaa al- 'ard. hawn(an) wa- 'idhaa khaat.aba -hum al- jaahilon qaalo salaam(an)
wa- 'alladhena yabeton li- rabb -him sujjad(an) wa- qiyaam(an)
wa- 'alladhena yaqolon rabb -naa is.rif can -naa cadhaab jahannam 'inna cadhaab -haa kaana gharaam(an)
'inna -haa saa'at mustaqarr(an) wa- muqaam(an)
wa- 'alladhena 'idhaa anfiqo lam yusrifo wa- lam yaqturo wa- kaana bayna dhaalika qawaam(an)
wa- 'alladhena laa yadcon maca 'allaah 'ilaah(an) 'aakhar wa- laa yaqtulon an- nafs 'allate h.arrama 'allaah 'illaa bi- al- h.aqq wa- laa yaznon wa- man yafcal dhaalika yalqa 'athaam(an)
yud.aacaf la- -hu al- cadhaab yawm al- qiyaamah wa- yakhlud fe -hi muhaan(an)
'illaa man taaba wa- 'aamana wa- camila camal(an) s.aalih.(an) fa- 'olaa'ika yubaddil 'allaah sayyi'aat -him h.asanaat wa- kaana 'allaah ghafor(an) rah.em(an)
wa- man taaba wa- camila s.aalih.(an) 'a- 'inna -hu yatob 'ilaa 'allaah mataab(an)
wa- 'alladhena laa yashhadon az- zor wa- 'idhaa marro bi- al- laghw marro kiraam(an)
wa- 'alladhena 'idhaa dhukkiro bi- 'aayaat rabb -him lam yakhirro calay -haa s.umm(an) wa- cumyaan(an)
wa- 'alladhena yaqolon rabb -naa hab la- -naa min azwaaj -naa wa- dhurreyaat -naa qurrah acyun wa- ijcal -naa li- al- muttaqen 'imaam(an)
'olaa'ika yujzawn al- ghurfah bi- maa s.abaro wa- yulaqqawn fe -haa tah.eyah wa- salaam(an)
khaaliden fe -haa h.asunat mustaqarr(an) wa- muqaam(an)

rabb -i najji -ne wa- 'ahl -e min maa yacmalon
fa- najjaynaa -hu wa- 'ahl -hu ajmacen
'illaa cajoz(an) fe al- ghaabiren
thumma dammarnaa al- 'aakharen
wa- amt.arnaa calay -him mat.ar(an) fa- saa'a mat.ar al- mundharen
'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayah wa- maa kaana akthar -hum mu'minen
wa- 'inna rabb -ka la- huwa al- cazez ar- rah.em
kadhdhaba as.h.aab al- 'aykah al- mursalen
'idh qaala la- -hum shucayb 'a-laa tattaqon
'inni -y la- -kum rasol 'amen
fa- ittaqo 'allaah wa- at.eco -ni
wa- maa as'al -kum calay -hi min 'ajr 'in 'ajr -ya 'illaa calaa rabb al- caalamen
awfo al- kayl wa- laa takono min al- mukhsiren
wa- zino bi- al- qist.aas al- mustaqem
wa- laa tabkhaso an- naas ashyaa' -hum wa- laa tacthaw fe al- 'ard. mufsiden
wa- ittaqo 'alladhe khalaqa -kum wa- al- jibillah al- 'awwalen
qaalo 'inna-maa 'anta min al- musah.h.aren
wa- maa 'anta 'illaa bashar mithl -naa wa- 'in naz.unn -ka la- min al- kaadhiben
fa- asqit. calay -naa kisaf(an) min as- samaa' 'in kunta min as.- s.aadiqen
qaala rabb -e aclam bi- maa tacmalon
fa- kadhdhabo -hu fa- 'akhadha -hum cadhaab yawm az.- z.ullah 'inna -hu kaana cadhaab yawm caz.em
'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayah wa- maa kaana akthar -hum mu'minen
wa- 'inna rabb -ka la- huwa al- cazez ar- rah.em
wa- 'inna -hu la- tanzel rabb al- caalamen
nazala bi- -hi ar- roh. al- 'amen
calaa qalb -ka li- takon min al- mundhiren
bi- lisaan carabey muben
wa- 'inna -hu la- fe zubur al- 'awwalen
'a- wa- lam yakun la- -hum 'aayah 'an yaclam -hu culamaa' bane 'israa'el
wa- law nazzalnaa -hu calaa bacd. al- acjamen
fa- qara'a -hu calay -him maa kaano bi- -hi mu'minen
ka- dhaalika salaknaa -hu fe qulob al- mujrimen
laa yu'minon bi- -hi h.attaa yaraw al- cadhaab al- 'alem
fa- ya'te -him baghtah wa- hum laa yashcuron
fa- yaqolo hal nah.nu munz.aron
'a- fa- bi- cadhaab -naa yastacjilon
'a- fa- ra'ayta 'in mattacnaa -hum sinen
thumma jaa'a -hum maa kaano yocadon
maa aghnaa can -hum maa kaano yumattacon
wa- maa ahlaknaa min qaryah 'illaa la- -haa mundhiron
dhikraa wa- maa kunnaa z.aalimen
wa- maa tanazzalat bi- -hi ash- shayaat.en
wa- maa yanbaghe la- -hum wa- maa yastat.econ
'inna -hum can as- samc la- maczolon
fa- laa tadcu maca 'allaah 'ilaah(an) 'aakhar fa- takon min al- mucadhdhaben
wa- andhir casherah -ka al- aqraben
wa- ikhfid. janaah. -ka li- man ittabaca -ka min al- mu'minen
fa- 'in cas.aw -ka fa- qul 'inni -y bare' min maa tacmalon
wa- tawakkal calaa al- cazez ar- rah.em
'alladhe yaraa -ka h.ena taqom
wa- taqallub -ka fe as- saajiden
'inna -hu huwa as- samec al- calem
hal unabbi' -kum calaa man tanazzal ash- shayaat.en
tanazzal calaa kull 'affaak 'athem
yulqon as- samc wa- akthar -hum kaadhibon
wa- ash- shucaraa' yattabic -hum al- ghaawon
'a- lam tara 'anna -hum fe kull waadi(n) yahemon
wa- 'anna -hum yaqolon maa laa yafcalon
'illaa 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat wa- dhakaro 'allaah kather(an) wa- intas.aro min bacdi maa z.alamo wa- sa- yaclam 'alladhena z.alamo 'ayy munqalab yanqalibon
t.aa'-sen tilka 'aayaat al- qur'aan wa- kitaab muben
huda(n) wa- bushraa li- al- mu'minen
'alladhena yuqemon as.- s.alaah wa- yu'ton az- zakaah wa- hum bi- al- 'aakhirah hum yoqinon
'inna 'alladhena laa yu'minon bi- al- 'aakhirah zayyannaa la- -hum acmaal -hum fa- hum yacmahon
'olaa'ika 'alladhena la- -hum so' al- cadhaab wa- hum fe al- 'aakhirah hum al- akhsaron
wa- 'inna -ka la- tulaqqaa al- qur'aan min ladun h.akem calem
'idh qaala mosaa li- 'ahl -hi 'inni -y 'aanastu naar(an) sa- 'aate -kum min -haa bi- khabar 'aw 'aate -kum bi- shihaab qabas lacalla -kum tas.t.alon
fa- lammaa jaa'a -haa nodiya 'an borika man fe an- naar wa- man h.awla -haa wa- subh.aana 'allaah rabb al- caalamen
yaa mosaa 'inna -hu 'anaa 'allaah al- cazez al- h.akem
wa- alqi cas.aa -ka fa- lammaa ra'aa -haa tahtazz ka-'anna -haa jaann wallaa mudbir(an) wa- lam yucaqqib yaa mosaa laa takhaf 'inni -y laa yakhaaf laday -ya al- mursalon
'illaa man z.alama thumma baddala h.usn(an) bacda so' fa- 'inni -y ghafor rah.em
wa- adkhil yad -ka fe jayb -ka takhruj bayd.aa' min ghayr so' fe tisc 'aayaat 'ilaa fircawn wa- qawm -hi 'inna -hum kaano qawm(an) faasiqen
fa- lammaa jaa'at -hum 'aayaat -naa mubs.irah qaalo haadhaa sih.r muben
wa- jah.ado bi- -haa wa- istayqanat -haa anfus -hum z.ulm(an) wa- culow(an) fa- unz.ur kayfa kaana caaqibah al- mufsiden
wa- la- qad 'aataynaa daawod wa- sulaymaan cilm(an) wa- qaalaa al- h.amd li- 'allaah 'alladhe fad.d.alnaa calaa kather min cibaad -hi al- mu'minen
wa- waritha sulaymaan daawod wa- qaala yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas cullimnaa mant.iq at.- t.ayr wa- 'otenaa min kull shay' 'inna haadhaa la- huwa al- fad.l al- muben
wa- h.ushira li- sulaymaan junod -hu min al- jinn wa- al- 'ins wa- at.- t.ayr fa- hum yozacon
h.attaa 'idhaa 'ataw calaa waadi an- naml qaalat namlah yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naml udkhulo masaakin -kum laa yah.it.amanna -kum sulaymaan wa- junod -hu wa- hum laa yashcuron

fa- tabassama d.aah.ik(an) min qawl -haa wa- qaala rabb -i awzic -ne 'an ashkur nicmah -ka 'allate ancamta calay -ya wa- calaa waalidai -ya wa- 'an acmal s.aalih.(an) tard.aa -hu wa- adkhil -ne bi- rah.mah -ka fe cibaad -ka as.- s.aalih.en
wa- tafaqqada at.- t.ayr fa- qaala maa li- -y laa araa al- hudhud 'am kaana min al- ghaa'iben
la- ucadhdhibanna -hu cadhaab(an) shaded(an) 'aw la- adhbah.anna -hu 'aw la- ya'tiyanni -y bi- sult.aan muben
fa- makatha ghayr baced fa- qaala ah.at.tu bi- maa lam tuh.it. bi- -hi wa- ji'tu -ka min saba' bi- naba' yaqen
'inni -y wajadtu imra'ah tamlik -hum wa- 'otiyat min kull shay' wa- la- -haa carsh caz.em
wajadtu -haa wa- qawm -haa yasjudon li- ash- shams min doni 'allaah wa- zayyana la- -hum ash- shayt.aan acmaal -hum fa- s.adda -hum can as- sabel fa- hum laa yahtadon
'an laa yasjudo li- 'allaah 'alladhe yukhrij al- khab' fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- yaclam maa tukhfon wa- maa tuclinon
'allaah laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa rabb al- carsh al- caz.em
qaala sa- nanz.ur 'a- s.adaqta 'am kunta min al- kaadhiben
idhhab bi- kitaab -e haadhaa fa- alqi -hi 'ilay -him thumma tawalla can -hum fa- unz.ur maa-dhaa yarjicon
qaalat yaa 'ayyuhaa al- mala' 'inni -y ulqiya 'ilay -ya kitaab karem
'inna -hu min sulaymaan wa- 'inna -hu bi- ism 'allaah ar- rah.maan ar- rah.em
'an laa taclo calay -ya wa- i'to -ne muslimen
qaalat yaa 'ayyuhaa al- mala' afto -ne fe 'amr -y maa kuntu qaat.icah 'amr(an) h.attaa tashhadon
qaalo nah.nu 'olo qowah wa- 'olo ba's shaded wa- al- 'amr 'ilay -ki fa- unz.ure maa-dhaa ta'murena
qaalat 'inna al- mulok 'idhaa dakhalo qaryah afsado -haa wa- jacalo acizzah 'ahl -haa adhillah wa- ka- dhaalika yafcalon
wa- 'inni -y mursilah 'ilay -him bi- hadeyah fa- naaz.irah bi- ma(a) yarjic al- mursalon
fa- lammaa jaa'a sulaymaan qaala 'a- tumiddon -ni bi- maal fa- maa 'aataa -ne 'allaah khayr min maa 'aataa -kum bal 'antum bi- hadeyah -kum tafrah.on
irjic 'ilay -him fa- la- na'tiyanna -hum bi- junod laa qibal la- -hum bi- -haa wa- la- nukhrijanna -hum min -haa adhillah wa- hum s.aaghiron
qaala yaa 'ayyuhaa al- mala' 'ayy -kum ya'te -ne bi- carsh -haa qabla 'an ya'to -ne muslimen
qaala cifret min al- jinn 'anaa 'aate -ka bi- -hi qabla 'an taqom min maqaam -ka wa- 'inni -y calay -hi la- qawey 'amen

qaala 'alladhe cinda -hu cilm min al- kitaab 'anaa 'aate -ka bi- -hi qabla 'an yartadd 'ilay -ka t.arf -ka fa- lammaa ra'aa -hu mustaqarr(an) cinda -hu qaala haadhaa min fad.l rabb -e li- yabluwa -ne 'a- ashkur 'am akfur wa- man shakara fa- 'inna-maa yashkur li- nafs -hi wa- man kafara fa- 'inna rabb -e ghaney karem
qaala nakkiro la- -haa carsh -haa nanz.ur 'a- tahtade 'am takon min 'alladhena laa yahtadon
fa- lammaa jaa'at qela 'a- haakadhaa carsh -ka qaalat ka-'anna -hu huwa wa- 'otenaa al- cilm min qabli -haa wa- kunnaa muslimen
wa- s.adda -haa maa kaanat tacbud min doni 'allaah 'inna -haa kaanat min qawm kaafiren

qela la- -haa udkhule as.- s.arh. fa- lammaa ra'at -hu h.asibat -hu lujjah wa- kashafat can saaqai -haa qaala 'inna -hu s.arh. mumarrad min qawaarer qaalat rabb -i 'inni -y z.alamtu nafs -e wa- aslamtu maca sulaymaan li- 'allaah rabb al- caalamen
wa- la- qad arsalnaa 'ilaa thamod 'akhaa -hum s.aalih.(an) 'an ucbudo 'allaah fa- 'idhaa hum fareqaan yakhtas.imon
qaala yaa qawm -i li- ma(a) tastacjilon bi- as- sayyi'ah qabla al- h.asanah law-laa tastaghfiron 'allaah lacalla -kum turh.amon
qaalo it.t.ayyarnaa bi- -ka wa- bi- man maca -ka qaala t.aa'ir -kum cinda 'allaah bal 'antum qawm tuftanon
wa- kaana fe al- madenah tiscah raht. yufsidon fe al- 'ard. wa- laa yus.lih.on
qaalo taqaasamo bi- 'allaah la- nubayyitanna -hu wa- 'ahl -hu thumma la- naqolanna li- waley -hi maa shahidnaa mahlik 'ahl -hi wa- 'in(na) -naa la- s.aadiqon
wa- makaro makr(an) wa- makarnaa makr(an) wa- hum laa yashcuron
fa- unz.ur kayfa kaana caaqibah makr -him 'an(na) -naa dammarnaa -hum wa- qawm -hum ajmacen
fa- tilka buyot -hum khaawiyah bi- maa z.alamo 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayah li- qawm yaclamon
wa- anjaynaa 'alladhena 'aamano wa- kaano yattaqon
wa- lot.(an) 'idh qaala li- qawm -hi 'a- ta'ton al- faah.ishah wa- 'antum tubs.iron
'a- 'inna -kum la- ta'ton ar- rijaal shahwah min doni an- nisaa' bal 'antum qawm tajhalon
fa- maa kaana jawaab qawm -hi 'illaa 'an qaalo akhrijo 'aal lot. min qaryah -kum 'inna -hum unaas yatat.ahharon
fa- anjaynaa -hu wa- 'ahl -hu 'illaa imra'ah -hu qaddarnaa -haa min al- ghaabiren
wa- amt.arnaa calay -him mat.ar(an) fa- saa'a mat.ar al- mundharen
qul al- h.amd li- 'allaah wa- salaam calaa cibaad -hi 'alladhena is.t.afaa 'a- 'allaah khayr 'am maa yushrikon

'am man khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- anzala la- -kum min as- samaa' maa' fa- anbatnaa bi- -hi h.adaa'iq dhaat bahjah maa kaana la- -kum 'an tunbito shajar -haa 'a- 'ilaah maca 'allaah bal hum qawm yacdilon
'am man jacala al- 'ard. qaraar(an) wa- jacala khilaala -haa anhaar(an) wa- jacala la- -haa rawaasiya wa- jacala bayna al- bah.rain h.aajiz(an) 'a- 'ilaah maca 'allaah bal akthar -hum laa yaclamon
'am man yujeb al- mud.t.arr 'idhaa dacaa -hu wa- yakshif as- so' wa- yajcal -kum khulafaa' al- 'ard. 'a- 'ilaah maca 'allaah qalel(an) maa tadhakkaron
'am man yahde -kum fe z.ulumaat al- barr wa- al- bah.r wa- man yursil ar- riyaah. bushraa bayna yadai rah.mah -hi 'a- 'ilaah maca 'allaah tacaalaa 'allaah can maa yushrikon
'am man yabda' al- khalq thumma yuced -hu wa- man yarzuq -kum min as- samaa' wa- al- 'ard. 'a- 'ilaah maca 'allaah qul haato burhaan -kum 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
qul laa yaclam man fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. al- ghayb 'illaa 'allaah wa- maa yashcuron 'ayyaana yubcathon
bal iddaaraka cilm -hum fe al- 'aakhirah bal hum fe shakk min -haa bal hum min -haa camon
wa- qaala 'alladhena kafaro 'a- 'idhaa kunnaa turaab(an) wa- 'aabaa' -naa 'a- 'in(na) -naa la- mukhrajon
la- qad wucidnaa haadhaa nah.nu wa- 'aabaa' -naa min qablu 'inna haadhaa 'illaa asaat.er al- 'awwalen
qul sero fe al- 'ard. fa- unz.uro kayfa kaana caaqibah al- mujrimen
wa- laa tah.zan calay -him wa- laa takun fe d.ayq min maa yamkuron
wa- yaqolon mataa haadhaa al- wacd 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
qul casaa 'an yakon radifa la- -kum bacd. 'alladhe tastacjilon
wa- 'inna rabb -ka la- dho fad.l calaa an- naas wa- laakin akthar -hum laa yashkuron
wa- 'inna rabb -ka li- yaclam maa tukinn s.udor -hum wa- maa yuclinon
wa- maa min ghaa'ibah fe as- samaa' wa- al- 'ard. 'illaa fe kitaab muben
'inna haadhaa al- qur'aan yaqus.s. calaa bane 'israa'el akthar 'alladhe -hum fe -hi yakhtalifon
wa- 'inna -hu la- huda(n) wa- rah.mah li- al- mu'minen
'inna rabb -ka yaqd.e bayna -hum bi- h.ukm -hi wa- huwa al- cazez al- calem
fa- tawakkal calaa 'allaah 'inna -ka calaa al- h.aqq al- muben
'inna -ka laa tusmic al- mawtaa wa- laa tusmic as.- s.umm ad- ducaa' 'idhaa wallaw mudbiren
wa- maa 'anta bi- haade al- cumyaa can d.alaalah -him 'in tusmic 'illaa man yu'min bi- 'aayaat -naa fa- hum muslimon
wa- 'idhaa waqaca al- qawl calay -him akhrajnaa la- -hum daabbah min al- 'ard. tukallim -hum 'anna an- naas kaano bi- 'aayaat -naa laa yoqinon
wa- yawm nah.shur min kull 'ummah fawj(an) min man yukadhdhib bi- 'aayaat -naa fa- hum yozacon
h.attaa 'idhaa jaa'o qaala 'a- kadhdhabtum bi- 'aayaat -e wa- lam tuh.et.o bi- -haa cilm(an) 'am maa-dhaa kuntum tacmalon
wa- waqaca al- qawl calay -him bi- maa z.alamo fa- hum laa yant.iqon
'a- lam yaraw 'an(na) -naa jacalnaa al- layl li- yaskuno fe -hi wa- an- nahaar mubs.ir(an) 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- qawm yu'minon
wa- yawm yunfakh fe as.- s.or fa- fazica man fe as- samaawaat wa- man fe al- 'ard. 'illaa man shaa'a 'allaah wa- kull 'ataw -hu daakhiren
wa- taraa al- jibaal tah.sab -haa jaamidah wa- hiya tamurr marra as- sah.aab s.unc 'allaah 'alladhe atqana kull shay' 'inna -hu khaber bi- maa tafcalon
man jaa'a bi- al- h.asanah fa- la- -hu khayr min -haa wa- hum min fazac yawma'idhin 'aaminon
wa- man jaa'a bi- as- sayyi'ah fa- kubbat wujoh -hum fe an- naar hal tujzawn 'illaa maa kuntum tacmalon
'inna-maa 'umirtu 'an acbud rabb haadhihi al- baldah 'alladhe h.arrama -haa wa- la- -hu kull shay' wa- 'umirtu 'an akon min al- muslimen
wa- 'an atluwa al- qur'aan fa- man ihtadaa fa- 'inna-maa yahtade li- nafs -hi wa- man d.alla fa- qul 'inna-maa 'anaa min al- mundhiren
wa- qul al- h.amd li- 'allaah sa- yure -kum 'aayaat -hi fa- tacrifon -haa wa- maa rabb -ka bi- ghaafil can maa tacmalon
t.aa'-sen-mem
tilka 'aayaat al- kitaab al- muben
natlo calay -ka min naba' mosaa wa- fircawn bi- al- h.aqq li- qawm yu'minon
'inna fircawn calaa fe al- 'ard. wa- jacala 'ahl -haa shiyac(an) yastad.cif t.aa'ifah min -hum yudhabbih. abnaa' -hum wa- yastah.ye nisaa' -hum 'inna -hu kaana min al- mufsiden
wa- nured 'an namunn calaa 'alladhena istud.cifo fe al- 'ard. wa- najcal -hum a'immah wa- najcal -hum al- waarithen
wa- numakkin la- -hum fe al- 'ard. wa- nure fircawn wa- haamaan wa- junod -humaa min -hum maa kaano yah.dharon

wa- awh.aynaa 'ilaa 'umm mosaa 'an ard.ice -hi fa- 'idhaa khifti calay -hi fa- alqe -hi fe al- yamm wa- laa takhaafe wa- laa tah.zane 'in(na) -naa raaddo -hu 'ilay -ki wa- jaacilo -hu min al- mursalen
fa- iltaqat.a -hu 'aal fircawn li- yakon la- -hum cadow(an) wa- h.azan(an) 'inna fircawn wa- haamaan wa- junod -humaa kaano khaat.i'en
wa- qaalat imra'ah fircawn qurrah cayn li- -y wa- la- -ka laa taqtulo -hu casaa 'an yanfac -naa 'aw nattakhidh -hu walad(an) wa- hum laa yashcuron
wa- as.bah.a fu'aad 'umm mosaa faarigh(an) 'in kaadat la- tubde bi- -hi law-laa 'an rabat.naa calaa qalb -haa li- takon min al- mu'minen
wa- qaalat li- 'ukht -hi qus.s.e -hi fa- bas.urat bi- -hi can junub wa- hum laa yashcuron
wa- h.arramnaa calay -hi al- maraad.ic min qablu fa- qaalat hal adull -kum calaa 'ahl bayt yakfulon -hu la- -kum wa- hum la- -hu naas.ih.on
fa- radadnaa -hu 'ilaa 'umm -hi kay taqarr cayn -haa wa- laa tah.zan wa- li- taclam 'anna wacd 'allaah h.aqq wa- laakin akthar -hum laa yaclamon
wa- lammaa balagha ashudd -hu wa- istawaa 'aataynaa -hu h.ukm(an) wa- cilm(an) wa- ka- dhaalika najze al- muh.sinen

wa- dakhala al- madenah calaa h.eni ghaflah min 'ahl -haa fa- wajada fe -haa rajulain yaqtatilaan haadhaa min shecah -hi wa- haadhaa min cadow -hi fa- istaghaatha -hu 'alladhe min shecah -hi calaa 'alladhe min cadow -hi fa- wakaza -hu mosaa fa- qad.aa calay -hi qaala haadhaa min camal ash- shayt.aan 'inna -hu cadow mud.ill muben
qaala rabb -i 'inni -y z.alamtu nafs -e fa- ighfir li- -y fa- ghafara la- -hu 'inna -hu huwa al- ghafor ar- rah.em
qaala rabb -i bi- maa ancamta calay -ya fa- lan akon z.aher(an) li- al- mujrimen
fa- as.bah.a fe al- madenah khaa'if(an) yataraqqab fa- 'idhaa 'alladhe istans.ara -hu bi- al- 'ams yastas.rikh -hu qaala la- -hu mosaa 'inna -ka la- ghawey muben

fa- lammaa 'an araada 'an yabt.ish bi- 'alladhe huwa cadow la- -humaa qaala yaa mosaa 'a- tured 'an taqtul -ne ka-maa qatalta nafs(an) bi- al- 'ams 'in tured 'illaa 'an takon jabbaar(an) fe al- 'ard. wa- maa tured 'an takon min al- mus.lih.en
wa- jaa'a rajul min aqs.aa al- madenah yascaa qaala yaa mosaa 'inna al- mala' ya'tamiron bi- -ka li- yaqtulo -ka fa- ukhruj 'inni -y la- -ka min an- naas.ih.en
fa- kharaja min -haa khaa'if(an) yataraqqab qaala rabb -i najji -ne min al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
wa- lammaa tawajjaha tilqaa'a madyan qaala casaa rabb -e 'an yahdiya -ne sawaa' as- sabel

wa- lammaa warada maa' madyan wajada calay -hi 'ummah min an- naas yasqon wa- wajada min doni -him imra'atain tadhodaan qaala maa khat.b -kumaa qaalataa laa nasqe h.attaa yus.dir ar- ricaa' wa- 'abo -naa shaykh kaber
fa- saqaa la- -humaa thumma tawallaa 'ilaa az.- z.ill fa- qaala rabb -i 'inni -y li- maa anzalta 'ilay -ya min khayr faqer

fa- jaa'at -hu 'ih.daa -humaa tamshe calaa istih.yaa' qaalat 'inna 'ab -e yadco -ka li- yajziya -ka 'ajr maa saqayta la- -naa fa- lammaa jaa'a -hu wa- qas.s.a calay -hi al- qas.as. qaala laa takhaf najawta min al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
qaalat 'ih.daa -humaa yaa 'ab -ti ista'jir -hu 'inna khayr man ista'jarta al- qawey al- 'amen

qaala 'inni -y ured 'an unkih. -ka 'ih.daa ibnatai -ya haatain calaa 'an ta'jur -ne thamaane h.ijaj fa- 'in atmamta cashr(an) fa- min cindi -ka wa- maa ured 'an ashuqq calay -ka sa- tajid -ne 'in shaa'a 'allaah min as.- s.aalih.en
qaala dhaalika bayni -y wa- bayna -ka 'ayya-maa al- 'ajalain qad.aytu fa- laa cudwaan calay -ya wa- 'allaah calaa maa naqol wakel

fa- lammaa qad.aa mosaa al- 'ajl wa- saara bi- 'ahl -hi 'aanasa min jaanib at.- t.or naar(an) qaala li- 'ahl -hi umkutho 'inni -y 'aanastu naar(an) lacalli -y 'aate -kum min -haa bi- khabar 'aw jadhwah min an- naar lacalla -kum tas.t.alon
fa- lammaa 'ataa -haa nodiya min shaat.i' al- waadi al- ayman fe al- buqcah al- mubaarakah min ash- shajarah 'an yaa mosaa 'inni -y 'anaa 'allaah rabb al- caalamen
wa- 'an alqi cas.aa -ka fa- lammaa ra'aa -haa tahtazz ka-'anna -haa jaann wallaa mudbir(an) wa- lam yucaqqib yaa mosaa aqbil wa- laa takhaf 'inna -ka min al- 'aaminen

usluk yad -ka fe jayb -ka takhruj bayd.aa' min ghayr so' wa- ud.mum 'ilay -ka janaah. -ka min ar- rahb fa- dhaanika burhaanaan min rabb -ka 'ilaa fircawn wa- mala' -hi 'inna -hum kaano qawm(an) faasiqen
qaala rabb -i 'inni -y qataltu min -hum nafs(an) fa- akhaaf 'an yaqtulo -ni
wa- 'akh -e haaron huwa afs.ah. min -ne lisaan(an) fa- arsil -hu maci -ya rid'(an) yus.addiq -ne 'inni -y akhaaf 'an yukadhdhibo -ni
qaala sa- nashudd cad.ud -ka bi- 'akhe -ka wa- najcal la- -kumaa sult.aan(an) fa- laa yas.ilon 'ilay -kumaa bi- 'aayaat -naa 'antumaa wa- man ittabaca -kumaa al- ghaalibon
fa- lammaa jaa'a -hum mosaa bi- 'aayaat -naa bayyinaat qaalo maa haadhaa 'illaa sih.r muftara(n) wa- maa samicnaa bi- haadhaa fe 'aabaa' -naa al- 'awwalen
wa- qaala mosaa rabb -e aclam bi- man jaa'a bi- al- hudaa min cindi -hi wa- man takon la- -hu caaqibah ad- daar 'inna -hu laa yuflih. az.- z.aalimon

wa- qaala fircawn yaa 'ayyuhaa al- mala' maa calimtu la- -kum min 'ilaah ghayr -e fa- awqid li- -y yaa haamaan calaa at.- t.en fa- ijcal li- -y s.arh.(an) lacalli -y at.t.alic 'ilaa 'ilaah mosaa wa- 'inni -y la- az.unn -hu min al- kaadhiben
wa- istakbara huwa wa- junod -hu fe al- 'ard. bi- ghayr al- h.aqq wa- z.anno 'anna -hum 'ilay -naa laa yurjacon
fa- 'akhadhnaa -hu wa- junod -hu fa- nabadhnaa -hum fe al- yamm fa- unz.ur kayfa kaana caaqibah az.- z.aalimen
wa- jacalnaa -hum a'immah yadcon 'ilaa an- naar wa- yawm al- qiyaamah laa yuns.aron
wa- atbacnaa -hum fe haadhihi ad- dunyaa lacnah wa- yawm al- qiyaamah hum min al- maqboh.en
wa- la- qad 'aataynaa mosaa al- kitaab min bacdi maa ahlaknaa al- quron al- 'olaa bas.aa'ir li- an- naas wa- huda(n) wa- rah.mah lacalla -hum yatadhakkaron
wa- maa kunta bi- jaanib al- gharbey 'idh qad.aynaa 'ilaa mosaa al- 'amr wa- maa kunta min ash- shaahiden
wa- laakin -naa ansha'naa quron(an) fa- tat.aawala calay -him al- cumur wa- maa kunta thaawiy(an) fe 'ahl madyan tatlo calay -him 'aayaat -naa wa- laakin -naa kunnaa mursilen
wa- maa kunta bi- jaanib at.- t.or 'idh naadaynaa wa- laakin rah.mah min rabb -ka li- tundhir qawm(an) maa 'ataa -hum min nadher min qabli -ka lacalla -hum yatadhakkaron
wa- law-laa 'an tus.eb -hum mus.ebah bi- maa qaddamat ayde -him fa- yaqolo rabb -naa law-laa arsalta 'ilay -naa rasol(an) fa- nattabic 'aayaat -ka wa- nakon min al- mu'minen

fa- lammaa jaa'a -hum al- h.aqq min cindi -naa qaalo law-laa 'otiya mithl maa 'otiya mosaa 'a- wa- lam yakfuro bi- maa 'otiya mosaa min qablu qaalo sih.raan taz.aaharaa wa- qaalo 'in(na) -naa bi- kull kaafiron
qul fa- i'to bi- kitaab min cindi 'allaah huwa ahdaa min -humaa attabic -hu 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
fa- 'in lam yastajebo la- -ka fa- iclam 'anna-maa yattabicon ahwaa' -hum wa- man ad.all min man ittabaca hawaa -hu bi- ghayr huda(n) min 'allaah 'inna 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
wa- la- qad was.alnaa la- -hum al- qawl lacalla -hum yatadhakkaron
'alladhena 'aataynaa -hum al- kitaab min qabli -hi hum bi- -hi yu'minon
wa- 'idhaa yutlaa calay -him qaalo 'aamannaa bi- -hi 'inna -hu al- h.aqq min rabb -naa 'in(na) -naa kunnaa min qabli -hi muslimen
'olaa'ika yu'tawn 'ajr -hum marratain bi- maa s.abaro wa- yadra'on bi- al- h.asanah as- sayyi'ah wa- min maa razaqnaa -hum yunfiqon
wa- 'idhaa samico al- laghw acrad.o can -hu wa- qaalo la- -naa acmaal -naa wa- la- -kum acmaal -kum salaam calay -kum la- nabtaghe al- jaahilen
'inna -ka laa tahde man ah.babta wa- laakin 'allaah yahde man yashaa' wa- huwa aclam bi- al- muhtaden

wa- qaalo 'in nattabic al- hudaa maca -ka natakhat.t.af min 'ard. -naa 'a- wa- lam numakkin la- -hum h.aram(an) 'aamin(an) yujbaa 'ilay -hi thamaraat kull shay' rizq(an) min ladun -naa wa- laakin akthar -hum laa yaclamon
wa- kam ahlaknaa min qaryah bat.irat maceshah -haa fa- tilka masaakin -hum lam tuskan min bacdi -him 'illaa qalel(an) wa- kunnaa nah.nu al- waarithen
wa- maa kaana rabb -ka muhlik al- quraa h.attaa yabcath fe 'umm -haa rasol(an) yatlo calay -him 'aayaat -naa wa- maa kunnaa muhlike al- quraa 'illaa wa- 'ahl -haa z.aalimon
wa- maa 'otetum min shay' fa- mataac al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- zenah -haa wa- maa cinda 'allaah khayr wa- abqaa 'a- fa- laa tacqilon
'a- fa- man wacadnaa -hu wacd(an) h.asan(an) fa- huwa laaqe -hi ka- man matacnaa -hu mataac al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa thumma huwa yawm al- qiyaamah min al- muh.d.aren
wa- yawm yunaade -him fa- yaqol 'ayna shurakaa' -e 'alladhena kuntum tazcumon
qaala 'alladhena h.aqqa calay -him al- qawl rabb -naa haa'ulaa'i 'alladhena aghwaynaa aghwaynaa -hum ka-maa ghawaynaa tabarra'naa 'ilay -ka maa kaano 'eyaa -naa yacbudon
wa- qela udco shurakaa' -kum fa- dacaw -hum fa- lam yastajebo la- -hum wa- ra'aw al- cadhaab law 'anna -hum kaano yahtadon
wa- yawm yunaade -him fa- yaqol maa-dhaa ajabtum al- mursalen
fa- camiyat calay -him al- anbaa' yawma'idhin fa- hum laa yatasaa'alon
fa- 'ammaa man taaba wa- 'aamana wa- camila s.aalih.(an) fa- casaa 'an yakon min al- muflih.en
wa- rabb -ka yakhluq maa yashaa' wa- yakhtaar maa kaana la- -hum al- khiyarah subh.aana 'allaah wa- tacaalaa can maa yushrikon
wa- rabb -ka yaclam maa tukinn s.udor -hum wa- maa yuclinon
wa- huwa 'allaah laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa la- -hu al- h.amd fe al- 'olaa wa- al- 'aakhirah wa- la- -hu al- h.ukm wa- 'ilay -hi turjacon
qul 'a- ra'aytum 'in jacala 'allaah calay -kum al- layl sarmad(an) 'ilaa yawm al- qiyaamah man 'ilaah ghayr 'allaah ya'te -kum bi- d.iyaa' 'a- fa- laa tasmacon
qul 'a- ra'aytum 'in jacala 'allaah calay -kum an- nahaar sarmad(an) 'ilaa yawm al- qiyaamah man 'ilaah ghayr 'allaah ya'te -kum bi- layl taskunon fe -hi 'a- fa- laa tubs.iron
wa- min rah.mah -hi jacala la- -kum al- layl wa- an- nahaar li- taskuno fe -hi wa- li- tabtagho min fad.l -hi wa- lacalla -kum tashkuron
wa- yawm yunaade -him fa- yaqol 'ayna shurakaa' -e 'alladhena kuntum tazcumon
wa- nazacnaa min kull 'ummah shahed(an) fa- qulnaa haato burhaan -kum fa- calimo 'anna al- h.aqq li- 'allaah wa- d.alla can -hum maa kaano yaftaron

'inna qaaron kaana min qawm mosaa fa- baghaa calay -him wa- 'aataynaa -hu min al- kunoz maa 'inna mafaatih. -hu la- tano' bi- al- cus.bah 'ole al- qowah 'idh qaala la- -hu qawm -hu laa tafrah. 'inna 'allaah laa yuh.ibb al- farih.en

wa- ibtaghi fe maa 'aataa -ka 'allaah ad- daar al- 'aakhirah wa- laa tansa nas.eb -ka min ad- dunyaa wa- ah.sin ka-maa ah.sana 'allaah 'ilay -ka wa- laa tabghi al- fasaad fe al- 'ard. 'inna 'allaah laa yuh.ibb al- mufsiden

qaala 'inna-maa 'otetu -hu calaa cilm cindi -y 'a- wa- lam yaclam 'anna 'allaah qad ahlaka min qabli -hi min al- quron man huwa ashadd min -hu qowah wa- akthar jamc(an) wa- laa yus'al can dhunob -him al- mujrimon
fa- kharaja calaa qawm -hi fe zenah -hi qaala 'alladhena yuredon al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa yaa layta la- -naa mithl maa 'otiya qaaron 'inna -hu la- dho h.az.z. caz.em
wa- qaala 'alladhena 'oto al- cilm wayl -kum thawaab 'allaah khayr li- man 'aamana wa- camila s.aalih.(an) wa- laa yulaqqaa -haa 'illaa as.- s.aabiron
fa- khasafnaa bi- -hi wa- bi- daar -hi al- 'ard. fa- maa kaana la- -hu min fi'ah yans.uron -hu min doni 'allaah wa- maa kaana min al- muntas.iren

wa- as.bah.a 'alladhena tamannaw makaan -hu bi- al- 'ams yaqolon wayka'anna 'allaah yabsut. ar- rizq li- man yashaa' min cibaad -hi wa- yaqdir law-laa 'an manna 'allaah calay -naa la- khasafa bi- -naa wayka'anna -hu laa yuflih. al- kaafiron
tilka ad- daar al- 'aakhirah najcal -haa li- 'alladhena laa yuredon culow(an) fe al- 'ard. wa- laa fasaad(an) wa- al- caaqibah li- al- muttaqen
man jaa'a bi- al- h.asanah fa- la- -hu khayr min -haa wa- man jaa'a bi- as- sayyi'ah fa- laa yujzaa 'alladhena camilo as- sayyi'aat 'illaa maa kaano yacmalon
'inna 'alladhe farad.a calay -ka al- qur'aan la- raadd -ka 'ilaa macaad qul rabb -e aclam man jaa'a bi- al- hudaa wa- man huwa fe d.alaal muben
wa- maa kunta tarjo 'an yulqaa 'ilay -ka al- kitaab 'illaa rah.mah min rabb -ka fa- laa takonanna z.aher(an) li- al- kaafiren
wa- laa yas.uddunna -ka can 'aayaat 'allaah bacda 'idh unzilat 'ilay -ka wa- udcu 'ilaa rabb -ka wa- laa takonanna min al- mushriken
wa- laa tadcu maca 'allaah 'ilaah(an) 'aakhar laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa kull shay' haalik 'illaa wajh -hu la- -hu al- h.ukm wa- 'ilay -hi turjacon
alif-laam-mem
'a- h.asiba an- naas 'an yutrako 'an yaqolo 'aamannaa wa- hum laa yuftanon
wa- la- qad fatannaa 'alladhena min qabli -him fa- la- yaclamanna 'allaah 'alladhena s.adaqo wa- la- yaclamanna al- kaadhiben
'am h.asiba 'alladhena yacmalon as- sayyi'aat 'an yasbiqo -naa saa'a maa yah.kumon
man kaana yarjo liqaa' 'allaah fa- 'inna 'ajal 'allaah la- 'aati(n) wa- huwa as- samec al- calem
wa- man jaahada fa- 'inna-maa yujaahid li- nafs -hi 'inna 'allaah la- ghaney can al- caalamen
wa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat la- nukaffiranna can -hum sayyi'aat -him wa- la- najziyanna -hum ah.san 'alladhe kaano yacmalon

wa- was.s.aynaa al- 'insaan bi- waalidai -hi h.usn(an) wa- 'in jaahadaa -ka li- tushrik bi- -y maa laysa la- -ka bi- -hi cilm fa- laa tut.ic -humaa 'ilay -ya marjic -kum fa- unabbi' -kum bi- maa kuntum tacmalon
wa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat la- nudkhilanna -hum fe as.- s.aalih.en

wa- min an- naas man yaqol 'aamannaa bi- 'allaah fa- 'idhaa 'odhiya fe 'allaah jacala fitnah an- naas ka- cadhaab 'allaah wa- la- 'in jaa'a nas.r min rabb -ka la- yaqolunna 'in(na) -naa kunnaa maca -kum 'a- wa- laysa 'allaah bi- aclam bi- maa fe s.udor al- caalamen
wa- la- yaclamanna 'allaah 'alladhena 'aamano wa- la- yaclamanna al- munaafiqen
wa- qaala 'alladhena kafaro li- 'alladhena 'aamano ittabico sabel -naa wa- li- nah.mil khat.aayaa -kum wa- maa hum bi- h.aamilen min khat.aayaa -hum min shay' 'inna -hum la- kaadhibon
wa- la- yah.milunna athqaal -hum wa- athqaal(an) maca athqaal -him wa- la- yus'alunna yawm al- qiyaamah can maa kaano yaftaron
wa- la- qad arsalnaa noh.(an) 'ilaa qawm -hi fa- labitha fe -him 'alf sinah 'illaa khamsen caamm(an) fa- 'akhadha -hum at.- t.ofaan wa- hum z.aalimon
fa- anjaynaa -hu wa- as.h.aab as- safenah wa- jacalnaa -haa 'aayah li- al- caalamen
wa- 'ibraahem 'idh qaala li- qawm -hi ucbudo 'allaah wa- ittaqo -hu dhaalikum khayr la- -kum 'in kuntum taclamon

'inna-maa tacbudon min doni 'allaah awthaan(an) wa- takhluqon 'ifk(an) 'inna 'alladhena tacbudon min doni 'allaah laa yamlikon la- -kum rizq(an) fa- ibtagho cinda 'allaah ar- rizq wa- ucbudo -hu wa- ushkuro la- -hu 'ilay -hi turjacon
wa- 'in tukadhdhibo fa- qad kadhdhaba 'umam min qabli -kum wa- maa calaa ar- rasol 'illaa al- balaagh al- muben
'a- wa- lam yaraw kayfa yubdi' 'allaah al- khalq thumma yuced -hu 'inna dhaalika calaa 'allaah yaser
qul sero fe al- 'ard. fa- unz.uro kayfa bada'a al- khalq thumma 'allaah yunshi' an- nash'ah al- 'aakhirah 'inna 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader
yucadhdhib man yashaa' wa- yarh.am man yashaa' wa- 'ilay -hi tuqlabon
wa- maa 'antum bi- mucjizen fe al- 'ard. wa- laa fe as- samaa' wa- maa la- -kum min doni 'allaah min waley wa- laa nas.er
wa- 'alladhena kafaro bi- 'aayaat 'allaah wa- liqaa' -hi 'olaa'ika ya'iso min rah.mah -e wa- 'olaa'ika la- -hum cadhaab 'alem
fa- maa kaana jawaab qawm -hu 'illaa 'an qaalo uqtulo -hu 'aw h.arriqo -hu fa- anjaa -hu 'allaah min an- naar 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- qawm yu'minon

wa- qaala 'inna-maa ittakhadhtum min doni 'allaah awthaan(an) mawaddah bayna -kum fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa thumma yawm al- qiyaamah yakfur bacd. -kum bi- bacd. wa- yalcan bacd. -kum bacd.(an) wa- ma'waa -kum an- naar wa- maa la- -kum min naas.iren
fa- 'aamana la- -hu lot. wa- qaala 'inni -y muhaajir 'ilaa rabb -e 'inna -hu huwa al- cazez al- h.akem
wa- wahabnaa la- -hu 'ish.aaq wa- yacqob wa- jacalnaa fe dhurreyah -hi an- nubowah wa- al- kitaab wa- 'aataynaa -hu 'ajr -hu fe ad- dunyaa wa- 'inna -hu fe al- 'aakhirah la- min as.- s.aalih.en
wa- lot.(an) 'idh qaala li- qawm -hi 'inna -kum la- ta'ton al- faah.ishah maa sabaqa -kum bi- -haa min 'ah.ad min al- caalamen

'a- 'inna -kum la- ta'ton ar- rijaal wa- taqt.acon as- sabel wa- ta'ton fe naade -kum al- munkar fa- maa kaana jawaab qawm -hi 'illaa 'an qaalo i'ti -naa bi- cadhaab 'allaah 'in kunta min as.- s.aadiqen
qaala rabb -i uns.ur -ne calaa al- qawm al- mufsiden
wa- lammaa jaa'at rusul -naa 'ibraahem bi- al- bushraa qaalo 'in(na) -naa muhliko 'ahl haadhihi al- qaryah 'inna 'ahl -haa kaano z.aalimen
qaala 'inna fe -haa lot.(an) qaalo nah.nu aclam bi- man fe -haa la- nunajjiyanna -hu wa- 'ahl -hu 'illaa imra'ah -hu kaanat min al- ghaabiren

wa- lammaa 'an jaa'at rusul -naa lot.(an) se'a bi- -him wa- d.aaqa bi- -him dharc(an) wa- qaalo laa takhaf wa- laa tah.zan 'in(na) -naa munajjo -ka wa- 'ahl -ka 'illaa imra'ah -ka kaanat min al- ghaabiren
'in(na) -naa munzilon calaa 'ahl haadhihi al- qaryah rijz(an) min as- samaa' bi- maa kaano yafsuqon
wa- la- qad taraknaa min -haa 'aayah bayyinah li- qawm yacqilon
wa- 'ilaa madyan 'akhaa -hum shucayb(an) fa- qaala yaa qawm -e ucbudo 'allaah wa- urjo al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- laa tacthaw fe al- 'ard. mufsiden
fa- kadhdhabo -hu fa- 'akhadhat -hum ar- rajfah fa- as.bah.o fe daar -him jaathimen
wa- caad(an) wa- thamod wa- qad tabayyana la- -kum min masaakin -him wa- zayyana la- -hum ash- shayt.aan acmaal -hum fa- s.adda -hum can as- sabel wa- kaano mustabs.iren
wa- qaaron wa- fircawn wa- haamaan wa- la- qad jaa'a -hum mosaa bi- al- bayyinaat fa- istakbaro fe al- 'ard. wa- maa kaano saabiqen

fa- kull(an) 'akhadhnaa bi- dhanb -hi fa- min -hum man arsalnaa calay -hi h.aas.ib(an) wa- min -hum man 'akhadhat -hu as.- s.ayh.ah wa- min -hum man khasafnaa bi- -hi al- 'ard. wa- min -hum man aghraqnaa wa- maa kaana 'allaah li- yaz.lim -hum wa- laakin kaano anfus -hum yaz.limon
mathal 'alladhena ittakhadho min doni 'allaah awliyaa' ka- mathal al- cankabot ittakhadhat bayt(an) wa- 'inna awhan al- buyot la- bayt al- cankabot law kaano yaclamon
'inna 'allaah yaclam maa yadcon min doni -hi min shay' wa- huwa al- cazez al- h.akem
wa- tilka al- amthaal nad.rib -haa li- an- naas wa- maa yacqil -haa 'illaa al- caalimon
khalaqa 'allaah as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. bi- al- h.aqq 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayah li- al- mu'minen
utlu maa oh.iya 'ilay -ka min al- kitaab wa- aqim as.- s.alaah 'inna as.- s.alaah tanhaa can al- fah.shaa' wa- al- munkar wa- la- dhikr 'allaah akbar wa- 'allaah yaclam maa tas.nacon

wa- laa tujaadilo 'ahl al- kitaab 'illaa bi- 'allate hiya ah.san 'illaa 'alladhena z.alamo min -hum wa- qolo 'aamannaa bi- 'alladhe unzila 'ilay -naa wa- unzila 'ilay -kum wa- 'ilaah -naa wa- 'ilaah -kum waah.id wa- nah.nu la- -hu muslimon
wa- ka- dhaalika anzalnaa 'ilay -ka al- kitaab fa- 'alladhena 'aataynaa -hum al- kitaab yu'minon bi- -hi wa- min haa'ulaa'i man yu'min bi- -hi wa- maa yajh.ad bi- 'aayaat -naa 'illaa al- kaafiron
wa- maa kunta tatlo min qabli -hi min kitaab wa- laa takhut.t. -hu bi- yamen -ka 'idhan la- artaab al- mubt.ilon
bal huwa 'aayaat bayyinaat fe s.udor 'alladhena 'oto al- cilm wa- maa yajh.ad bi- 'aayaat -naa 'illaa az.- z.aalimon
wa- qaalo law-laa unzila calay -hi 'aayaat min rabb -hi qul 'inna-maa al- 'aayaat cinda 'allaah wa- 'inna-maa 'anaa nadher muben
'a- wa- lam yakfi -him 'an(na) -naa anzalnaa calay -ka al- kitaab yutlaa calay -him 'inna fe dhaalika la- rah.mah wa- dhikraa li- qawm yu'minon
qul kafaa bi- 'allaah bayni -y wa- bayna -kum shahed(an) yaclam maa fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- 'alladhena 'aamano bi- al- baat.il wa- kafaro bi- 'allaah 'olaa'ika hum al- khaasiron
wa- yastacjilon -ka bi- al- cadhaab wa- law-laa 'ajal musamma(n) la- jaa'a -hum al- cadhaab wa- la- ya'tiyanna -hum baghtah wa- hum laa yashcuron
yastacjilon -ka bi- al- cadhaab wa- 'inna jahannam la- muh.et.ah bi- al- kaafiren
yawm yaghshaa -hum al- cadhaab min fawqi -him wa- min tah.ti arjul -hum wa- yaqol dhoqo maa kuntum tacmalon
yaa cibaad -e 'alladhena 'aamano 'inna 'ard. -e waasicah fa- 'eyaa -ya fa- ucbudo -ni
kull nafs dhaa'iqah al- mawt thumma 'ilay -naa turjacon
wa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat la- nubawwi'anna -hum min al- jannah ghuraf(an) tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa nicma 'ajr al- caamilen
'alladhena s.abaro wa- calaa rabb -him yatawakkalon
wa- ka-'ayyin min daabbah laa tah.mil rizq -haa 'allaah yarzuq -haa wa- 'eyaa -kum wa- huwa as- samec al- calem
wa- la- 'in sa'alta -hum man khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- sakhkhara ash- shams wa- al- qamar la- yaqolunna 'allaah fa- 'annaa yu'fakon
'allaah yabsut. ar- rizq li- man yashaa' min cibaad -hi wa- yaqdir la- -hu 'inna 'allaah bi- kull shay' calem
wa- la- 'in sa'alta -hum man nazzala min as- samaa' maa' fa- ah.yaa bi- -hi al- 'ard. min bacdi mawt -haa la- yaqolunna 'allaah qul al- h.amd li- 'allaah bal akthar -hum laa yacqilon
wa- maa haadhihi al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa 'illaa lahw wa- lacib wa- 'inna ad- daar al- 'aakhirah la- hiya al- h.ayawaan law kaano yaclamon
fa- 'idhaa rakibo fe al- fulk dacaw 'allaah mukhlis.en la- -hu ad- den fa- lammaa najaa -hum 'ilaa al- barr 'idhaa hum yushrikon
li- yakfuro bi- maa 'aataynaa -hum wa- li- yatamattaco fa- sawfa yaclamon
'a- wa- lam yaraw 'an(na) -naa jacalnaa h.aram(an) 'aamin(an) wa- yutakhat.t.af an- naas min h.awli -him 'a- fa- bi- al- baat.il yu'minon wa- bi- nicmah 'allaah yakfuron
wa- man az.lam min man iftaraa calaa 'allaah kadhib(an) 'aw kadhdhaba bi- al- h.aqq lammaa jaa'a -hu 'a- laysa fe jahannam mathwa(n) li- al- kaafiren
wa- 'alladhena jaahado fe -naa la- nahdiyanna -hum subul -naa wa- 'inna 'allaah la- maca al- muh.sinen
alif-laam-mem
ghulibat ar- rom
fe adnaa al- 'ard. wa- hum min bacdi ghalab -him sa- yaghlibon
fe bid.c sinen li- 'allaah al- 'amr min qablu wa- min bacdu wa- yawma'idhin yafrah. al- mu'minon
bi- nas.r 'allaah yans.ur man yashaa' wa- huwa al- cazez ar- rah.em
wacd 'allaah laa yukhlif 'allaah wacd -hu wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yaclamon
yaclamon z.aahir(an) min al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- hum can al- 'aakhirah hum ghaafilon

'a- wa- lam yatafakkaro fe anfus -him maa khalaqa 'allaah as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa 'illaa bi- al- h.aqq wa- 'ajal musamma(n) wa- 'inna kather(an) min an- naas bi- liqaa' rabb -hum la- kaafiron

'a- wa- lam yasero fe al- 'ard. fa- yanz.uro kayfa kaana caaqibah 'alladhena min qabli -him kaano ashadd min -hum qowah wa- athaaro al- 'ard. wa- camaro -haa akthar min maa camaro -haa wa- jaa'at -hum rusul -hum bi- al- bayyinaat fa- maa kaana 'allaah li- yaz.lim -hum wa- laakin kaano anfus -hum yaz.limon
thumma kaana caaqibah 'alladhena asaa'o as- so'aa 'an kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat 'allaah wa- kaano bi- -haa yastahzi'on
'allaah yabda' al- khalq thumma yuced -hu thumma 'ilay -hi turjacon
wa- yawm taqom as- saacah yublis al- mujrimon
wa- lam yakun la- -hum min shurakaa' -him shufacaa' wa- kaano bi- shurakaa' -him kaafiren
wa- yawm taqom as- saacah yawma'idhin yatafarraqon
fa- 'ammaa 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat fa- hum fe rawd.ah yuh.baron
wa- 'ammaa 'alladhena kafaro wa- kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa wa- liqaa' al- 'aakhirah fa- 'olaa'ika fe al- cadhaab muh.d.aron
fa- subh.aana 'allaah h.ena tumson wa- h.ena tus.bih.on
wa- la- -hu al- h.amd fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- cashey(an) wa- h.ena tuz.hiron
yukhrij al- h.ayy min al- mayyit wa- yukhrij al- mayyit min al- h.ayy wa- yuh.ye al- 'ard. bacda mawt -haa wa- ka- dhaalika tukhrajon
wa- min 'aayaat -hi 'an khalaqa -kum min turaab thumma 'idhaa 'antum bashar tantashiron
wa- min 'aayaat -hi 'an khalaqa la- -kum min anfus -kum azwaaj(an) li- taskuno 'ilay -haa wa- jacala bayna -kum mawaddah wa- rah.mah 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- qawm yatafakkaron
wa- min 'aayaat -hi khalq as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- ikhtilaaf alsinah -kum wa- alwaan -kum 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- al- caalamen
wa- min 'aayaat -hi manaam -kum bi- al- layl wa- an- nahaar wa- ibtighaa' -kum min fad.l -hi 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- qawm yasmacon
wa- min 'aayaat -hi yure -kum al- barq khawf(an) wa- t.amac(an) wa- yunazzil min as- samaa' maa' fa- yuh.ye bi- -hi al- 'ard. bacda mawt -haa 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- qawm yacqilon
wa- min 'aayaat -hi 'an taqom as- samaa' wa- al- 'ard. bi- 'amr -hi thumma 'idhaa dacaa -kum dacwah min al- 'ard. 'idhaa 'antum takhrujon
wa- la- -hu man fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. kull la- -hu qaaniton
wa- huwa 'alladhe yabda' al- khalq thumma yuced -hu wa- huwa ahwan calay -hi wa- la- -hu al- mathal al- aclaa fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- huwa al- cazez al- h.akem

d.araba la- -kum mathal(an) min anfus -kum hal la- -kum min maa malakat aymaan -kum min shurakaa' fe maa razaqnaa -kum fa- 'antum fe -hi sawaa' takhaafon -hum ka- khefah -kum anfus -kum ka- dhaalika nufas.s.il al- 'aayaat li- qawm yacqilon
bal ittabaca 'alladhena z.alamo ahwaa' -hum bi- ghayr cilm fa- man yahde man ad.alla 'allaah wa- maa la- -hum min naas.iren
fa- aqim wajh -ka li- ad- den h.anef(an) fit.rah 'allaah 'allate fat.ara an- naas calay -haa laa tabdel li- khalq 'allaah dhaalika ad- den al- qayyim wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yaclamon
muneben 'ilay -hi wa- ittaqo -hu wa- aqemo as.- s.alaah wa- laa takono min al- mushriken
min 'alladhena farraqo den -hum wa- kaano shiyac(an) kull h.izb bi- maa laday -him farih.on
wa- 'idhaa massa an- naas d.urr dacaw rabb -hum muneben 'ilay -hi thumma 'idhaa adhaaqa -hum min -hu rah.mah 'idhaa fareq min -hum bi- rabb -him yushrikon
li- yakfuro bi- maa 'aataynaa -hum fa- tamattaco fa- sawfa taclamon
'am anzalnaa calay -him sult.aan(an) fa- huwa yatakallam bi- maa kaano bi- -hi yushrikon
wa- 'idhaa adhaqnaa an- naas rah.mah farih.o bi- -haa wa- 'in tus.ib -hum sayyi'ah bi- maa qaddamat ayde -him 'idhaa hum yaqnat.on
'a- wa- lam yaraw 'anna 'allaah yabsut. ar- rizq li- man yashaa' wa- yaqdir 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- qawm yu'minon
fa- 'aati dhaa al- qurbaa h.aqq -hu wa- al- misken wa- ibn as- sabel dhaalika khayr li- 'alladhena yuredon wajh 'allaah wa- 'olaa'ika hum al- muflih.on
wa- maa 'aataytum min riba(n) li- yarbuwa fe amwaal an- naas fa- laa yarbo cinda 'allaah wa- maa 'aataytum min zakaah turedon wajh 'allaah fa- 'olaa'ika hum al- mud.cifon
'allaah 'alladhe khalaqa -kum thumma razaqa -kum thumma yumet -kum thumma yuh.ye -kum hal min shurakaa' -kum man yafcal min dhaalikum min shay' subh.aana -hu wa- tacaalaa can maa yushrikon
z.ahara al- fasaad fe al- barr wa- al- bah.r bi- maa kasabat ayde an- naas li- yudheq -hum bacd. 'alladhe camilo lacalla -hum yarjicon
qul sero fe al- 'ard. fa- unz.uro kayfa kaana caaqibah 'alladhena min qablu kaana akthar -hum mushriken
fa- aqim wajh -ka li- ad- den al- qayyim min qabli 'an ya'tiya yawm laa maradd la- -hu min 'allaah yawma'idhin yas.s.addacon
man kafara fa- calay -hi kufr -hu wa- man camila s.aalih.(an) fa- li- anfus -him yamhadon
li- yajziya 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat min fad.l -hi 'inna -hu laa yuh.ibb al- kaafiren
wa- min 'aayaat -hi 'an yursil ar- riyaah. mubashshiraat wa- li- yudheq -kum min rah.mah -hi wa- li- tajriya al- fulk bi- 'amr -hi wa- li- tabtagho min fad.l -hi wa- lacalla -kum tashkuron
wa- la- qad arsalnaa min qabli -ka rusul(an) 'ilaa qawm -him fa- jaa'o -hum bi- al- bayyinaat fa- intaqamnaa min 'alladhena ajramo wa- kaana h.aqq(an) calay -naa nas.r al- mu'minen

'allaah 'alladhe yursil ar- riyaah. fa- tuther sah.aab(an) fa- yabsut. -hu fe as- samaa' kayfa yashaa' wa- yajcal -hu kisaf(an) fa- taraa al- wadq yakhruj min khilaali -hi fa- 'idhaa as.aaba bi- -hi man yashaa' min cibaad -hi 'idhaa hum yastabshiron
wa- 'in kaano min qabli 'an yunazzal calay -him min qabli -hi la- mublisen
fa- unz.ur 'ilaa 'aathaar rah.mah 'allaah kayfa yuh.ye al- 'ard. bacda mawt -haa 'inna dhaalika la- muh.ye al- mawtaa wa- huwa calaa kull shay' qader
wa- la- 'in arsalnaa reh.(an) fa- ra'aw -hu mus.farr(an) la- z.allo min bacdi -hi yakfuron
fa- 'inna -ka laa tusmic al- mawtaa wa- laa tusmic as.- s.umm ad- ducaa' 'idhaa wallaw mudbiren
wa- maa 'anta bi- haadi al- cumyaa can d.alaalah -him 'in tusmic 'illaa man yu'min bi- 'aayaat -naa fa- hum muslimon
'allaah 'alladhe khalaqa -kum min d.acf thumma jacala min bacdi d.acf qowah thumma jacala min bacdi qowah d.acf(an) wa- shaybah yakhluq maa yashaa' wa- huwa al- calem al- qader
wa- yawm taqom as- saacah yuqsim al- mujrimon maa labitho ghayr saacah ka- dhaalika kaano yu'fakon
wa- qaala 'alladhena 'oto al- cilm wa- al- 'emaan la- qad labithtum fe kitaab 'allaah 'ilaa yawm al- bacth fa- haadhaa yawm al- bacth wa- laakinna -kum kuntum laa taclamon
fa- yawma'idhin laa yanfac 'alladhena z.alamo macdhirah -hum wa- laa hum yustactabon
wa- la- qad d.arabnaa li- an- naas fe haadhaa al- qur'aan min kull mathal wa- la- 'in ji'ta -hum bi- 'aayah la- yaqolanna 'alladhena kafaro 'in 'antum 'illaa mubt.ilon
ka- dhaalika yat.bac 'allaah calaa qulob 'alladhena laa yaclamon
fa- is.bir 'inna wacd 'allaah h.aqq wa- laa yastakhiffanna -ka 'alladhena laa yoqinon
alif-laam-mem
tilka 'aayaat al- kitaab al- h.akem
huda(n) wa- rah.mah li- al- muh.sinen
'alladhena yuqemon as.- s.alaah wa- yu'ton az- zakaah wa- hum bi- al- 'aakhirah hum yoqinon
'olaa'ika calaa huda(n) min rabb -him wa- 'olaa'ika hum al- muflih.on
wa- min an- naas man yashtare lahw al- h.adeth li- yud.ill can sabel 'allaah bi- ghayr cilm wa- yattakhidh -haa huzuw(an) 'olaa'ika la- -hum cadhaab muhen
wa- 'idhaa tutlaa calay -hi 'aayaat -naa wallaa mustakbir(an) ka-'an lam yasmac -haa ka-'anna fe 'udhunai -hi waqr(an) fa- bashshir -hu bi- cadhaab 'alem
'inna 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat la- -hum jannaat an- nacem
khaaliden fe -haa wacd 'allaah h.aqq(an) wa- huwa al- cazez al- h.akem

khalaqa as- samaawaat bi- ghayr camad tarawn -haa wa- alqaa fe al- 'ard. rawaasiya 'an tamed bi- -kum wa- baththa fe -haa min kull daabbah wa- anzalnaa min as- samaa' maa' fa- anbatnaa fe -haa min kull zawj karem
haadhaa khalq 'allaah fa- aro -ne maa-dhaa khalaqa 'alladhena min doni -hi bal az.- z.aalimon fe d.alaal muben
wa- la- qad 'aataynaa luqmaan al- h.ikmah 'an ushkur li- 'allaah wa- man yashkur fa- 'inna-maa yashkur li- nafs -hi wa- man kafara fa- 'inna 'allaah ghaney h.amed
wa- 'idh qaala luqmaan li- ibn -hi wa- huwa yaciz. -hu yaa bunay -ya laa tushrik bi- 'allaah 'inna ash- shirk la- z.ulm caz.em
wa- was.s.aynaa al- 'insaan bi- waalidai -hi h.amalat -hu 'umm -hu wahn(an) calaa wahn wa- fis.aal -hu fe caamain 'an ushkur li- -y wa- li- waalidai -ka 'ilay -ya al- mas.er

wa- 'in jaahadaa -ka calaa 'an tushrik bi- -y maa laysa la- -ka bi- -hi cilm fa- laa tut.ic -humaa wa- s.aah.ib -humaa fe ad- dunyaa macrof(an) wa- ittabic sabel man anaaba 'ilay -ya thumma 'ilay -ya marjic -kum fa- unabbi' -kum bi- maa kuntum tacmalon
yaa bunay -ya 'inna -haa 'in taku(n) mithqaal h.abbah min khardal fa- takun fe s.akhrah 'aw fe as- samaawaat 'aw fe al- 'ard. ya'ti bi- -haa 'allaah 'inna 'allaah lat.ef khaber
yaa bunay -ya aqim as.- s.alaah wa- u'mur bi- al- macrof wa- inha can al- munkar wa- is.bir calaa maa as.aaba -ka 'inna dhaalikum min cazm al- 'umor
wa- laa tus.accir khadd -ka li- an- naas wa- laa tamshi fe al- 'ard. marah.(an) 'inna 'allaah laa yuh.ibb kull mukhtaal fakhor
wa- iqs.id fe mashy -ka wa- ughd.ud. min s.awt -ka 'inna ankar al- as.waat la- s.awt al- h.amer

'a- lam taraw 'anna 'allaah sakhkhara la- -kum maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- asbagha calay -kum nicam -hu z.aahirah wa- baat.inah wa- min an- naas man yujaadil fe 'allaah bi- ghayr cilm wa- laa huda(n) wa- laa kitaab muner
wa- 'idhaa qela la- -hum ittabico maa anzala 'allaah qaalo bal nattabic maa wajadnaa calay -hi 'aabaa' -naa 'a- wa- law kaana ash- shayt.aan yadco -hum 'ilaa cadhaab as- sacer
wa- man yuslim wajh -hu 'ilaa 'allaah wa- huwa muh.sin fa- qad istamsaka bi- al- curwah al- wuthqaa wa- 'ilaa 'allaah caaqibah al- 'umor
wa- man kafara fa- laa yah.zun -ka kufr -hu 'ilay -naa marjic -hum fa- nunabbi' -hum bi- maa camilo 'inna 'allaah calem bi- dhaat as.- s.udor
numattic -hum qalel(an) thumma nad.t.arr -hum 'ilaa cadhaab ghalez.
wa- la- 'in sa'alta -hum man khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. la- yaqolunna 'allaah qul al- h.amd li- 'allaah bal akthar -hum laa yaclamon
li- 'allaah maa fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. 'inna 'allaah huwa al- ghaney al- h.amed
wa- law 'anna maa fe al- 'ard. min shajarah aqlaam wa- al- bah.r yamudd -hu min bacdi -hi sabcah abh.ur maa nafidat kalimaat 'allaah 'inna 'allaah cazez h.akem
maa khalq -kum wa- laa bacth -kum 'illaa ka- nafs waah.idah 'inna 'allaah samec bas.er

'a- lam tara 'anna 'allaah yolij al- layl fe an- nahaar wa- yolij an- nahaar fe al- layl wa- sakhkhara ash- shams wa- al- qamar kull yajre 'ilaa 'ajal musamma(n) wa- 'anna 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon khaber
dhaalika bi- 'anna 'allaah huwa al- h.aqq wa- 'anna maa yadcon min doni -hi al- baat.il wa- 'anna 'allaah huwa al- caley al- kaber
'a- lam tara 'anna al- fulk tajre fe al- bah.r bi- nicmah 'allaah li- yuriya -kum min 'aayaat -hi 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- kull s.abbaar shakor

wa- 'idhaa ghashiya -hum mawj ka- az.- z.ulal dacaw 'allaah mukhlis.en la- -hu ad- den fa- lammaa najjaa -hum 'ilaa al- barr fa- min -hum muqtas.id wa- maa yajh.ad bi- 'aayaat -naa 'illaa kull khattaar kafor

yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas ittaqo rabb -kum wa- ikhshaw yawm(an) laa yajze waalid can walid -hu wa- laa mawlod huwa jaazi(n) can waalid -hi shay'(an) 'inna wacd 'allaah h.aqq fa- laa taghurranna -kum al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- laa yaghurranna -kum bi- 'allaah al- gharor

'inna 'allaah cinda -hu cilm as- saacah wa- yunazzil al- ghayth wa- yaclam maa fe al- arh.aam wa- maa tadre nafs maa-dhaa taksib ghad(an) wa- maa tadre nafs bi- 'ayy 'ard. tamot 'inna 'allaah calem khaber
alif-laam-mem
tanzel al- kitaab laa rayb fe -hi min rabb al- caalamen
'am yaqolon iftaraa -hu bal huwa al- h.aqq min rabb -ka li- tundhir qawm(an) maa 'ataa -hum min nadher min qabli -ka lacalla -hum yahtadon
'allaah 'alladhe khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa fe sittah ayyaam thumma istawaa calaa al- carsh maa la- -kum min doni -hi min waley wa- laa shafec 'a- fa- laa tatadhakkaron
yudabbir al- 'amr min as- samaa' 'ilaa al- 'ard. thumma yacruj 'ilay -hi fe yawm kaana miqdaar -hu 'alf sinah min maa tacuddon
dhaalika caalim al- ghayb wa- ash- shahaadah al- cazez ar- rah.em
'alladhe ah.san kull shay' khalaqa -hu wa- bada'a khalq al- 'insaan min t.en
thumma jacala nasl -hu min sulaalah min maa' mahen
thumma sawwaa -hu wa- nafakha fe -hi min roh. -hi wa- jacala la- -kum as- samc wa- al- abs.aar wa- al- af'idah qalel(an) maa tashkuron
wa- qaalo 'a- 'idhaa d.alalnaa fe al- 'ard. 'a- 'in(na) -naa la- fe khalq jaded bal hum bi- liqaa' rabb -hum kaafiron
qul yatawaffaa -kum malak al- mawt 'alladhe wukkila bi- -kum thumma 'ilaa rabb -kum turjacon
wa- law taraa 'idh al- mujrimon naakiso ru'os -him cinda rabb -him rabb -naa abs.arnaa wa- samicnaa fa- irjic -naa nacmal s.aalih.(an) 'in(na) -naa moqinon
wa- law shi'naa la- 'ataynaa kull nafs hudaa -haa wa- laakin h.aqqa al- qawl min -ne la- amla'anna jahannam min al- jinnah wa- an- naas ajmacen
fa- dhoqo bi- maa nasetum liqaa' yawm -kum haadhaa 'in(na) -naa nasenaa -kum wa- dhoqo cadhaab al- khuld bi- maa kuntum tacmalon
'inna-maa yu'min bi- 'aayaat -naa 'alladhena 'idhaa dhukkiro bi- -haa kharro sujjad(an) wa- sabbah.o bi- h.amd rabb -him wa- hum laa yastakbiron
tatajaafaa junob -hum can al- mad.aajic yadcon rabb -hum khawf(an) wa- t.amac(an) wa- min maa razaqnaa -hum yunfiqon
fa- laa taclam nafs maa ukhfiya la- -hum min qurrah acyun jazaa' bi- maa kaano yacmalon
'a- fa- man kaana mu'min(an) ka- man kaana faasiq(an) laa yastawon
'ammaa 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat fa- la- -hum jannaat al- ma'waa nuzul(an) bi- maa kaano yacmalon
wa- 'ammaa 'alladhena fasaqo fa- ma'waa -hum an- naar kulla-maa araado 'an yakhrujo min -haa ucedo fe -haa wa- qela la- -hum dhoqo cadhaab an- naar 'alladhe kuntum bi- -hi tukadhdhibon
wa- la- nudheqanna -hum min al- cadhaab al- adnaa dona al- cadhaab al- akbar lacalla -hum yarjicon
wa- man az.lam min man dhukkira bi- 'aayaat rabb -hi thumma acrad.a can -haa 'in(na) -naa min al- mujrimen muntaqimon
wa- la- qad 'aataynaa mosaa al- kitaab fa- laa takun fe miryah min liqaa' -hi wa- jacalnaa -hu huda(n) li- bane 'israa'el
wa- jacalnaa min -hum a'immah yahdon bi- 'amr -naa lammaa s.abaro wa- kaano bi- 'aayaat -naa yoqinon
'inna rabb -ka huwa yafs.il bayna -hum yawm al- qiyaamah fe maa kaano fe -hi yakhtalifon
'a- wa- lam yahdi la- -hum kam ahlaknaa min qabli -him min al- quron yamshon fe masaakin -him 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat 'a- fa- laa yasmacon
'a- wa- lam yaraw 'an(na) -naa nasoq al- maa' 'ilaa al- 'ard. al- juruz fa- nukhrij bi- -hi zarc(an) ta'kul min -hu ancaam -hum wa- anfus -hum 'a- fa- laa yubs.iron
wa- yaqolon mataa haadhaa al- fath. 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
qul yawm al- fath. laa yanfac 'alladhena kafaro 'emaan -hum wa- laa hum yunz.aron
fa- acrid. can -hum wa- intaz.ir 'inna -hum muntaz.iron
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- nabey ittaqi 'allaah wa- laa tut.ic al- kaafiren wa- al- munaafiqen 'inna 'allaah kaana calem(an) h.akem(an)
wa- ittabic maa yoh.aa 'ilay -ka min rabb -ka 'inna 'allaah kaana bi- maa tacmalon khaber(an)
wa- tawakkal calaa 'allaah wa- kafaa bi- 'allaah wakel(an)

maa jacala 'allaah li- rajul min qalbain fe jawf -hi wa- maa jacala azwaaj -kum 'allaa'e tuz.aahiron min -hunna 'ummahaat -kum wa- maa jacala adciyaa' -kum abnaa' -kum dhaalikum qawl -kum bi- afwaah -kum wa- 'allaah yaqol al- h.aqq wa- huwa yahde as- sabel

udco -hum li- 'aabaa' -him huwa aqsat. cinda 'allaah fa- 'in lam taclamo 'aabaa' -hum fa- 'ikhwaan -kum fe ad- den wa- mawaale -kum wa- laysa calay -kum junaah. fe maa akht.a'tum bi- -hi wa- laakin maa tacammadat qulob -kum wa- kaana 'allaah ghafor(an) rah.em(an)

an- nabey awlaa bi- al- mu'minen min anfus -him wa- azwaaj -hu 'ummahaat -hum wa- 'olo al- arh.aam bacd. -hum awlaa bi- bacd. fe kitaab 'allaah min al- mu'minen wa- al- muhaajiren 'illaa 'an tafcalo 'ilaa awliyaa' -kum macrof(an) kaana dhaalika fe al- kitaab mast.or(an)
wa- 'idh 'akhadhnaa min an- nabeyen methaaq -hum wa- min -ka wa- min noh. wa- 'ibraahem wa- mosaa wa- cesaa ibn maryam wa- 'akhadhnaa min -hum methaaq(an) ghalez.(an)
li- yas'al as.- s.aadiqen can s.idq -him wa- acadda li- al- kaafiren cadhaab(an) 'alem(an)
