yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano udhkuro nicmah 'allaah calay -kum 'idh jaa'at -kum junod fa- arsalnaa calay -hi reh.(an) wa- junod(an) lam taraw -haa wa- kaana 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon bas.er(an)
'idh jaa'o -kum min fawqi -kum wa- min asfal min -kum wa- 'idh zaaghat al- abs.aar wa- balaghat al- qulob al- h.anaajir wa- taz.unnon bi- 'allaah az.- z.unon
hunaalika ubtuliya al- mu'minon wa- zulzilo zilzaal(an) shaded(an)
wa- 'idh yaqol al- munaafiqon wa- 'alladhena fe qulob -him marad. maa wacada -naa 'allaah wa- rasol -hu 'illaa ghuror(an)

wa- 'idh qaalat t.aa'ifah min -hum yaa 'ahl yathrib laa maqaam la- -kum fa- irjico wa- yasta'dhin fareq min -hum an- nabey yaqolon 'inna buyot -naa cawrah wa- maa hiya bi- cawrah 'in yuredon 'illaa firaar(an)
wa- law dukhilat calay -him min aqt.aar -haa thumma su'ilo al- fitnah la- 'ataw -haa wa- maa talabbatho bi- -haa 'illaa yaser(an)
wa- la- qad kaano caahado 'allaah min qablu laa yuwallon al- adbaar wa- kaana cahd 'allaah mas'ol(an)
qul lan yanfac -kum al- firaar 'in farartum min al- mawt 'aw al- qatl wa- 'idhan laa tumattacon 'illaa qalel(an)
qul man-dhaa 'alladhe yacs.im -kum min 'allaah 'in araada bi- -kum so' 'aw araada bi- -kum rah.mah wa- laa yajidon la- -hum min doni 'allaah waley(an) wa- laa nas.er(an)
qad yaclam 'allaah al- mucawwiqen min -kum wa- al- qaa'ilen 'ikhwaan -hum halumma 'ilay -naa wa- laa ya'ton al- ba's 'illaa qalel(an)

ashih.h.ah calay -kum fa- 'idhaa jaa'a al- khawf ra'ayta -hum yanz.uron 'ilay -ka tador acyun -hum ka- 'alladhe yughshaa calay -hi min al- mawt fa- 'idhaa dhahaba al- khawf salaqo -kum bi- alsinah h.idaad ashih.h.ah calaa al- khayr 'olaa'ika lam yu'mino fa- ah.bat.a 'allaah acmaal -hum wa- kaana dhaalika calaa 'allaah yaser(an)
yah.sabon al- ah.zaab lam yadhhabo wa- 'in ya'ti al- ah.zaab yawaddo law 'anna -hum baadon fe al- acraab yas'alon can anbaa' -kum wa- law kaano fe -kum maa qaatalo 'illaa qalel(an)
la- qad kaana la- -kum fe rasol 'allaah 'uswah h.asanah li- man kaana yarjo 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- dhakara 'allaah kather(an)
wa- lammaa ra'aa al- mu'minon al- ah.zaab qaalo haadhaa maa wacada -naa 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- s.adaqa 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- maa zaada -hum 'illaa 'emaan(an) wa- taslem(an)
min al- mu'minen rijaal s.adaqo maa caahado 'allaah calay -hi fa- min -hum man qad.aa nah.b -hu wa- min -hum man yantaz.ir wa- maa baddalo tabdel(an)
li- yajziya 'allaah as.- s.aadiqen bi- s.idq -him wa- yucadhdhib al- munaafiqen 'in shaa'a 'aw yatob calay -him 'inna 'allaah kaana ghafor(an) rah.em(an)
wa- radda 'allaah 'alladhena kafaro bi- ghayz. -him lam yanaalo khayr(an) wa- kafaa 'allaah al- mu'minen al- qitaal wa- kaana 'allaah qawey(an) cazez(an)
wa- anzala 'alladhena z.aaharo -hum min 'ahl al- kitaab min s.ayaas.e -him wa- qadhafa fe qulob -him ar- rucb fareq taqtulon wa- ta'siron fareq(an)
wa- awratha -kum 'ard. -hum wa- diyaar -hum wa- amwaal -hum wa- 'ard.(an) lam tat.a'o -haa wa- kaana 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader(an)
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- nabey qul li- azwaaj -ka 'in kuntunna turidna al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- zenah -haa fa- tacaalain umattic -kunna wa- usarrih. -kunna saraah.(an) jamel(an)
wa- 'in kuntunna turidna 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- ad- daar al- 'aakhirah fa- 'inna 'allaah acadda li- al- muh.sinaat min -kunna 'ajr(an) caz.em(an)
yaa nisaa' an- nabey man ya'ti min -kunna bi- faah.ishah mubayyinah yud.aacif la- -haa al- cadhaab d.icfain wa- kaana dhaalika calaa 'allaah yaser(an)
wa- man yaqnut min -kunna li- 'allaah wa- rasol -hi wa- tacmal s.aalih.(an) nu'ti -haa 'ajr -haa marratain wa- actadnaa la- -haa rizq(an) karem(an)
yaa nisaa' an- nabey lastunna ka- 'ah.ad min an- nisaa' 'in ittaqaytunna fa- laa takhd.acna bi- al- qawl fa- yat.mac 'alladhe fe qalb -hi marad. wa- qulna qawl(an) macrof(an)

wa- qarna fe buyot -kunna wa- laa tabarrajna tabarruj al- jaahileyah al- 'olaa wa- aqimna as.- s.alaah wa- 'aatena az- zakaah wa- at.icna 'allaah wa- rasol -hu 'inna-maa yured 'allaah li- yudhhib can -kum ar- rijs 'ahl al- bayt wa- yut.ahhir -kum tat.her(an)
wa- udhkurna maa yutlaa fe buyot -kunna min 'aayaat 'allaah wa- al- h.ikmah 'inna 'allaah kaana lat.ef(an) khaber(an)

'inna al- muslimen wa- al- muslimaat wa- al- mu'minen wa- al- mu'minaat wa- al- qaaniten wa- al- qaanitaat wa- as.- s.aadiqen wa- as.- s.aadiqaat wa- as.- s.aabiren wa- as.- s.aabiraat wa- al- khaashicen wa- al- khaashicaat wa- al- mutas.addiqen wa- al- mutas.addiqaat wa- as.- s.aa'imen wa- as.- s.aa'imaat wa- al- h.aafiz.en furoj -hum wa- al- h.aafiz.aat wa- adh- dhaakiren 'allaah kather(an) wa- adh- dhaakiraat acadda 'allaah la- -hum maghfirah wa- 'ajr(an) caz.em(an)

wa- maa kaana li- mu'min wa- laa mu'minah 'idhaa qad.aa 'allaah wa- rasol -hu 'amr(an) 'an yakon la- -hum al- khiyarah min 'amr -him wa- man yacs.i 'allaah wa- rasol -hu fa- qad d.alla d.alaal(an) muben(an)

wa- 'idh taqol li- 'alladhe ancama 'allaah calay -hi wa- ancamta calay -hi amsik calay -ka zawj -ka wa- ittaqi 'allaah wa- tukhfe fe nafs -ka maa 'allaah mubde -hi wa- takhshaa an- naas wa- 'allaah ah.aqq 'an takhshaa -hu fa- lammaa qad.aa zayd min -haa wat.ar(an) zawwajnaa -ka -haa li- kay laa yakon calaa al- mu'minen h.araj fe azwaaj adciyaa' -him 'idhaa qad.aw min -hunna wat.ar(an) wa- kaana 'amr 'allaah mafcol(an)
maa kaana calaa an- nabey min h.araj fe maa farad.a 'allaah la- -hu sunnah 'allaah fe 'alladhena khalaw min qablu wa- kaana 'amr 'allaah qadar(an) maqdor(an)
'alladhena yuballighon risaalaat 'allaah wa- yakhshawn -hu wa- laa yakhshawn 'ah.ad(an) 'illaa 'allaah wa- kafaa bi- 'allaah h.aseb(an)
maa kaana muh.ammad 'abaa 'ah.ad min rijaal -kum wa- laakin rasol 'allaah wa- khaatam an- nabeyen wa- kaana 'allaah bi- kull shay' calem(an)
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano udhkuro 'allaah dhikr(an) kather(an)
wa- sabbih.o -hu bukrah wa- 'as.el(an)
huwa 'alladhe yus.alle calay -kum wa- malaa'ikah -hu li- yukhrij -kum min az.- z.ulumaat 'illaa an- nor wa- kaana bi- al- mu'minen rah.em(an)
tah.eyah -hum yawm yalqawna -hu salaam wa- acadda la- -hum 'ajr(an) karem(an)
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- nabey 'in(na) -naa arsalnaa -ka shaahid(an) wa- mubashshir(an) wa- nadher(an)
wa- daaciy(an) 'ilaa 'allaah bi- 'idhn -hi wa- siraaj(an) muner(an)
wa- bashshir al- mu'minen bi- 'anna la- -hum min 'allaah fad.l(an) kaber(an)
wa- laa tut.ic al- kaafiren wa- al- munaafiqen wa- dac 'adhaa -hum wa- tawakkal calaa 'allaah wa- kafaa bi- 'allaah wakel(an)

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'idhaa nakah.tum al- mu'minaat thumma t.allaqtumo -hunna min qabli 'an tamasso -hunna fa- maa la- -kum calay -hinna min ciddah tactaddon -haa fa- mattico -hunna wa- sarrih.o -hunna saraah.(an) jamel(an)

yaa 'ayyuhaa an- nabey 'in(na) -naa ah.lalnaa la- -ka azwaaj -ka 'allaate 'aatayta 'ujor -hunna wa- maa malakat yamen -ka min maa afaa'a 'allaah calay -ka wa- banaat camm -ka wa- banaat cammaat -ka wa- banaat khaal -ka wa- banaat khaalaat -ka 'allate haajarna maca -ka wa- imra'ah mu'minah 'in wahabat nafs -haa li- an- nabey 'in araada an- nabey 'an yastankih. -haa khaalis.ah la- -ka min doni al- mu'minen qad calimnaa maa farad.naa calay -him fe azwaaj -him wa- maa malakat aymaan -hum li- kay laa yakon calay -ka h.araj wa- kaana 'allaah ghafor(an) rah.em(an)

turje man tashaa' min -hunna wa- tu'we 'ilay -ka man tashaa' wa- man ibtaghayta min man cazalta fa- laa junaah. calay -ka dhaalika adnaa 'an taqarr acyun -hunna wa- laa yah.zanna wa- yard.ayna bi- maa 'aatayta -hunna kull -hunna wa- 'allaah yaclam maa fe qulob -kum wa- kaana 'allaah calem(an) h.alem(an)
laa yah.ill la- -ka an- nisaa' min bacda wa- laa 'an tabaddala bi- -hinna min azwaaj wa- law acjaba -ka h.usn -hunna 'illaa maa malakat yamen -ka wa- kaana 'allaah calaa kull shay' raqeb(an)

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tadkhulo buyot an- nabey 'illaa 'an yu'dhan la- -kum 'ilaa t.acaam ghayr naaz.iren 'inaa -hu wa- laakin 'idhaa ducetum fa- udkhulo fa- 'idhaa t.acimtum fa- intashiro wa- laa musta'nisen li- h.adeth 'inna dhaalikum kaana yu'dhe an- nabey fa- yastah.ye min -kum wa- 'allaah laa yastah.ye min al- h.aqq wa- 'idhaa sa'altumo -hunna mataac(an) fa- is'alo -hunna min waraa'a h.ijaab dhaalikum at.har li- qulob -kum wa- qulob -hinna wa- maa kaana la- -kum 'an tu'dho rasol 'allaah wa- laa 'an tankih.o azwaaj -hu min bacdi -hi 'abad(an) 'inna dhaalikum kaana cinda 'allaah caz.em(an)
'in tubdo shay'(an) 'aw tukhfo -hu fa- 'inna 'allaah kaana bi- kull shay' calem(an)

laa junaah. calay -hinna fe 'aabaa' -hinna wa- laa abnaa' -hinna wa- laa 'ikhwaan -hinna wa- laa abnaa' 'ikhwaan -hinna wa- laa abnaa' 'akhawaat -hinna wa- laa nisaa' -hinna wa- laa maa malakat aymaan -hunna wa- ittaqena 'allaah 'inna 'allaah kaana calaa kull shay' shahed(an)
'inna 'allaah wa- malaa'ikah -hu yus.allon calaa an- nabey yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano s.allo calay -hi wa- sallimo taslem(an)
'inna 'alladhena yu'dhon 'allaah wa- rasol -hu lacana -hum 'allaah fe ad- dunyaa wa- al- 'aakhirah wa- acadda la- -hum cadhaab(an) muhen(an)
wa- 'alladhena yu'dhon al- mu'minen wa- al- mu'minaat bi- ghayr maa iktasabo fa- qad ih.tamalo buhtaan(an) wa- 'ithm(an) muben(an)

yaa 'ayyuhaa an- nabey qul li- azwaaj -ka wa- banaat -ka wa- nisaa' al- mu'minen yudnena calay -hinna min jalaabeb -hinna dhaalika adnaa 'an yucrafna fa- laa yu'dhayna wa- kaana 'allaah ghafor(an) rah.em(an)
la- 'in lam yantahi al- munaafiqon wa- 'alladhena fe qulob -him marad. wa- al- murjifon fe al- madenah la- nughriyanna -ka bi- -him thumma laa yujaawiron -ka fe -haa 'illaa qalel(an)
malconen 'ayna-maa thuqifo 'ukhidho wa- quttilo taqtel(an)
sunnah 'allaah fe 'alladhena khalaw min qablu wa- lan tajid li- sunnah 'allaah tabdel(an)
yas'al -ka an- naas can as- saacah qul 'inna-maa cilm -haa cinda 'allaah wa- maa yudre -ka lacalla as- saacah takon qareb(an)
'inna 'allaah lacana al- kaafiren wa- acadda la- -hum sacer(an)
khaaliden fe -haa 'abad(an) laa yajidon waley(an) wa- laa nas.er(an)
yawm tuqallab wujoh -hum fe an- naar yaqolon yaa layta -naa at.acnaa 'allaah wa- at.acnaa ar- rasol
wa- qaalo rabb -naa 'in(na) -naa at.acnaa saadah -naa wa- kubaraa' -naa fa- ad.allo -naa as- sabel
rabb -naa 'aati -him d.icfain min al- cadhaab wa- ilcan -hum lacn(an) kaber(an)
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa takono ka- 'alladhena 'aadhaw mosaa fa- barra'a -hu 'allaah min maa qaalo wa- kaana cinda 'allaah wajeh(an)
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano ittaqo 'allaah wa- qolo qawl(an) saded(an)
yus.lih. la- -kum acmaal -kum wa- yaghfir la- -kum dhunob -kum wa- man yut.ic 'allaah wa- rasol -hu fa- qad faaza fawz(an) caz.em(an)

'in(na) -naa carad.naa al- amaanah calaa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- al- jibaal fa- 'abayna 'an yah.milna -haa wa- ashfaqna min -haa wa- h.amala -haa al- 'insaan 'inna -hu kaana z.alom(an) jahol(an)
li- yucadhdhib 'allaah al- munaafiqen wa- al- munaafiqaat wa- al- mushriken wa- al- mushrikaat wa- yatob 'allaah calaa al- mu'minen wa- al- mu'minaat wa- kaana 'allaah ghafor(an) rah.em(an)
al- h.amd li- 'allaah 'alladhe la- -hu maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- la- -hu al- h.amd fe al- 'aakhirah wa- huwa al- h.akem al- khaber
yaclam maa yalij fe al- 'ard. wa- maa yakhruj min -haa wa- maa yanzil min as- samaa' wa- maa yacruj fe -haa wa- huwa ar- rah.em al- ghafor

wa- qaala 'alladhena kafaro laa ta'te -naa as- saacah qul balaa wa- rabb -e la- ta'tiyanna -kum caalim al- ghayb laa yaczub can -hu mithqaal dharrah fe as- samaawaat wa- laa fe al- 'ard. wa- laa as.ghar min dhaalika wa- laa akbar 'illaa fe kitaab muben
li- yajziya 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat 'olaa'ika la- -hum maghfirah wa- rizq karem
wa- 'alladhena sacaw fe 'aayaat -naa mucaajizen 'olaa'ika la- -hum cadhaab min rijz 'alem
wa- yaraa 'alladhena 'oto al- cilm 'alladhe unzila 'ilay -ka min rabb -ka huwa al- h.aqq wa- yahde 'ilaa s.iraat. al- cazez al- h.amed
wa- qaala 'alladhena kafaro hal nadull -kum calaa rajul yunabbi' -kum 'idhaa muzziqtum kull mumazzaq 'inna -kum la- fe khalq jaded
iftaraa calaa 'allaah kadhib(an) 'am bi- -hi jinnah bal 'alladhena laa yu'minon bi- al- 'aakhirah fe al- cadhaab wa- ad.- d.alaal al- baced

'a- fa- lam yaraw 'ilaa maa bayna ayde -him wa- maa khalfa -hum min as- samaa' wa- al- 'ard. 'in nasha' nakhsif bi- -him al- 'ard. 'aw nusqit. calay -him kisaf(an) min as- samaa' 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayah li- kull cabd muneb
wa- la- qad 'aataynaa daawod min -naa fad.l(an) yaa jibaal 'awwibe maca -hu wa- at.- t.ayr wa- alannaa la- -hu al- h.aded
'an icmal saabighaat wa- qaddir fe as- sard wa- icmalo s.aalih.(an) 'inni -y bi- maa tacmalon bas.er

wa- li- sulaymaan ar- reh. ghudow -haa shahr wa- rawaah. -haa shahr wa- asalnaa la- -hu cayn al- qit.r wa- min al- jinn man yacmal bayna yadai -hi bi- 'idhn rabb -hi wa- man yazigh min -hum can 'amr -naa nudhiq -hu min cadhaab as- sacer
yacmalon la- -hu maa yashaa' min mah.aareb wa- tamaathel wa- jifaan ka- al- jawaab wa- qudor raasiyaat icmalo 'aal daawod shukr(an) wa- qalel min cibaad -e ash- shakor

fa- lammaa qad.aynaa calay -hi al- mawt maa dalla -hum calaa mawt -hi 'illaa daabbah al- 'ard. ta'kul minsa'ah -hu fa- lammaa kharra tabayyanat al- jinn 'an law kaano yaclamon al- ghayb maa labitho fe al- cadhaab al- muhen
la- qad kaana li- saba' fe maskan -him 'aayah jannataan can yamen wa- shimaal kulo min rizq rabb -kum wa- ushkuro la- -hu baldah t.ayyibah wa- rabb ghafor
fa- acrad.o fa- arsalnaa calay -him sayl al- carim wa- baddalnaa -hum bi- jannatai -him jannatain dhawaatai 'ukul khamt. wa- 'athl wa- shay' min sidr qalel
dhaalika jazaynaa -hum bi- maa kafaro wa- hal nujaaze 'illaa al- kafor
wa- jacalnaa bayna -hum wa- bayna al- quraa 'allate baaraknaa fe -haa qura(n) z.aahirah wa- qaddarnaa fe -haa as- sayr sero fe -haa layaaliya wa- ayyaam(an) 'aaminen
fa- qaalo rabb -naa baacid bayna asfaar -naa wa- z.alamo anfus -hum fa- jacalnaa -hum ah.aadeth wa- mazzaqnaa -hum kull mumazzaq 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- kull s.abbaar shakor
wa- la- qad s.addaqa calay -him 'ibles z.anna -hu fa- ittabaco -hu 'illaa fareq(an) min al- mu'minen
wa- maa kaana la- -hu calay -him min sult.aan 'illaa li- naclam man yu'min bi- al- 'aakhirah min man huwa min -haa fe shakk wa- rabb -ka calaa kull shay' h.afez.
qul udco 'alladhena zacamtum min doni 'allaah laa yamlikon mithqaal dharrah fe as- samaawaat wa- laa fe al- 'ard. wa- maa la- -hum fe -himaa min shirk wa- maa la- -hu min -hum min z.aher
wa- laa tanfac ash- shafaacah cinda -hu 'illaa li- man 'adhina la- -hu h.attaa 'idhaa fuzzica can qulob -him qaalo maa-dhaa qaala rabb -kum qaalo al- h.aqq wa- huwa al- caley al- kaber
qul man yarzuq -kum min as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. qul 'allaah wa- 'in(na) -naa 'aw 'eyaa -kum la- calaa huda(n) 'aw fe d.alaal muben
qul laa tus'alon can maa ajramnaa wa- laa nus'al can maa tacmalon
qul yajmac bayna -naa rabb -naa thumma yaftah. bayna -naa bi- al- h.aqq wa- huwa al- fattaah. al- calem
qul aro -ne 'alladhena alh.aqtum bi- -hi shurakaa' kallaa bal huwa 'allaah al- cazez al- h.akem
wa- maa arsalnaa -ka 'illaa kaaffah li- an- naas basher(an) wa- nadher(an) wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yaclamon
wa- yaqolon mataa haadhaa al- wacd 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
qul la- -kum mecaad yawm laa tasta'khiron can -hu saacah wa- laa tastaqdimon

wa- qaala 'alladhena kafaro lan nu'min bi- haadhaa al- qur'aan wa- laa bi- 'alladhe bayna yadai -hi wa- law taraa 'idh az.- z.aalimon mawqofon cinda rabb -him yarjic bacd. -hum 'ilaa bacd. al- qawl yaqol 'alladhena istud.cifo li- 'alladhena istakbaro law-laa 'antum la- kunnaa mu'minen
qaala 'alladhena istakbaro li- 'alladhena istud.cifo 'a- nah.nu s.adadnaa -kum can al- hudaa bacda 'idh jaa'a -kum bal kuntum mujrimen

wa- qaala 'alladhena istud.cifo li- 'alladhena istakbaro bal makr al- layl wa- an- nahaar 'idh ta'muron -naa 'an nakfur bi- 'allaah wa- najcal la- -hu andaad(an) wa- asarro an- nadaamah lammaa ra'aw al- cadhaab wa- jacalnaa al- aghlaal fe acnaaq 'alladhena kafaro hal yujzawn 'illaa maa kaano yacmalon
wa- maa arsalnaa fe qaryah min nadher 'illaa qaala mutrafo -haa 'in(na) -naa bi- maa ursiltum bi- -hi kaafiron
wa- qaalo nah.nu akthar amwaal(an) wa- awlaad(an) wa- maa nah.nu bi- mucadhdhaben
qul 'inna rabb -e yabsut. ar- rizq li- man yashaa' wa- yaqdir wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yaclamon

wa- maa amwaal -kum wa- laa awlaad -kum bi- 'allate tuqarrib -kum cinda -naa zulfaa 'illaa man 'aamana wa- camila s.aalih.(an) fa- 'olaa'ika la- -hum jazaa' ad.- d.icf bi- maa camilo wa- hum fe al- ghurufaat 'aaminon
wa- 'alladhena yascawn fe 'aayaat -naa mucaajizen 'olaa'ika fe al- cadhaab muh.d.aron
qul 'inna rabb -e yabsut. ar- rizq li- man yashaa' min cibaad -hi wa- yaqdir la- -hu wa- maa anfaqtum min shay' fa- huwa yukhlif -hu wa- huwa khayr ar- raaziqen
wa- yawm yah.shur -hum jamec(an) thumma yaqol li- al- malaa'ikah 'a- haa'ulaa'i 'eyaa -kum kaano yacbudon
qaalo subh.aana -ka 'anta waley -naa min doni -him bal kaano yacbudon al- jinn akthar -hum bi- -him mu'minon
fa- al- yawm laa yamlik bacd. -kum li- bacd. nafc(an) wa- laa d.arr(an) wa- naqol li- 'alladhena z.alamo dhoqo cadhaab an- naar 'allate kuntum bi- -haa tukadhdhibon

wa- 'idhaa tutlaa calay -him 'aayaat -naa bayyinaat qaalo maa haadhaa 'illaa rajul yured 'an yas.udd -kum can maa kaana yacbud 'aabaa' -kum wa- qaalo maa haadhaa 'illaa 'ifk muftara(n) wa- qaala 'alladhena kafaro li- al- h.aqq lammaa jaa'a -hum 'inna haadhaa 'illaa sih.r muben
wa- maa 'aataynaa -hum min kutub yadruson -haa wa- maa arsalnaa 'ilay -him qabla -ka min nadher
wa- kadhdhaba 'alladhena min qabli -him wa- maa balagho micshaar maa 'aataynaa -hum fa- kadhdhabo rusul -e fa- kayfa kaana naker -i
qul 'inna-maa aciz. -kum bi- waah.idah 'an taqomo li- 'allaah mathnaa wa- furaad(an) thumma tatafakkaro maa bi- s.aah.ib -kum min jinnah 'in huwa 'illaa nadher la- -kum bayna yadai cadhaab shaded
qul maa sa'altu -kum min 'ajr fa- huwa la- -kum 'in 'ajr -y 'illaa calaa 'allaah wa- huwa calaa kull shay' shahed
qul 'inna rabb -e yaqdhif bi- al- h.aqq callaam al- ghuyob
qul jaa'a al- h.aqq wa- maa yubdi' al- baat.il wa- maa yuced
qul 'in d.alaltu fa- 'inna-maa ad.ill calaa nafs -e wa- 'in ihtadaytu fa- bi- maa yoh.e 'ilay -ya rabb -e 'inna -hu samec qareb
wa- law taraa 'idh fazico fa- laa fawt wa- 'ukhidho min makaan qareb
wa- qaalo 'aamannaa bi- -hi wa- 'annaa la- -hum at- tanaawush min makaan baced
wa- qad kafaro bi- -hi min qablu wa- yaqdhifon bi- al- ghayb min makaan baced
wa- h.ela bayna -hum wa- bayna maa yashtahon ka-maa fucila bi- ashyaac -him min qablu 'inna -hum kaano fe shakk mureb

al- h.amd li- 'allaah faat.ir as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. jaacil al- malaa'ikah rusul(an) 'ole ajnih.ah mathnaa wa- thulaath wa- rubaac yazed fe al- khalq maa yashaa' 'inna 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader
maa yaftah. 'allaah li- an- naas min rah.mah fa- laa mumsik la- -haa wa- maa yumsik fa- laa mursil la- -hu min bacdi -hi wa- huwa al- cazez al- h.akem
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas udhkuro nicmah 'allaah calay -kum hal min khaaliq ghayr 'allaah yarzuq -kum min as- samaa' wa- al- 'ard. laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa fa- 'annaa tu'fakon
wa- 'in yukadhdhibo -ka fa- qad kudhdhibat rusul min qabli -ka wa- 'ilaa 'allaah turjac al- 'umor
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas 'inna wacd 'allaah h.aqq fa- laa taghurranna -kum al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- laa yaghurranna -kum bi- 'allaah al- ghuror
'inna ash- shayt.aan la- -kum cadow fa- ittakhidho -hu cadow(an) 'inna-maa yadco h.izb -hu li- yakono min as.h.aab as- sacer
'alladhena kafaro la- -hum cadhaab shaded wa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat la- -hum maghfirah wa- 'ajr kaber

'a- fa- man zuyyina la- -hu so' camal -hi fa- ra'aa -hu h.asan(an) fa- 'inna 'allaah yud.ill man yashaa' wa- yahde man yashaa' fa- laa tadhhab nafs -ka calay -him h.asaraat 'inna 'allaah calem bi- maa yas.nacon
wa- 'allaah 'alladhe arsala ar- riyaah. fa- tuther sah.aab(an) fa- suqnaa -hu 'ilaa balad mayyit fa- ah.yaynaa bi- -hi al- 'ard. bacda mawt -haa ka- dhaalika an- nushor

man kaana yured al- cizzah fa- li- 'allaah al- cizzah jamec(an) 'ilay -hi yas.cad al- kalim at.- t.ayyib wa- al- camal as.- s.aalih. yarfac -hu wa- 'alladhena yamkuron as- sayyi'aat la- -hum cadhaab shaded wa- makr 'olaa'ika huwa yabor

wa- 'allaah khalaqa -kum min turaab thumma min nut.fah thumma jacala -kum azwaaj(an) wa- maa tah.mil min 'unthaa wa- laa tad.ac 'illaa bi- cilm -hi wa- maa yucammar min mucammar wa- laa yunqas. min cumur -hi 'illaa fe kitaab 'inna dhaalika calaa 'allaah yaser

wa- maa yastawe al- bah.raan haadhaa cadhab furaat saa'igh sharaab -hu wa- haadhaa milh. 'ujaaj wa- min kull ta'kulon lah.m(an) t.arey(an) wa- tastakhrijon h.ilyah talbason -haa wa- taraa al- fulk fe -hi mawaakhir li- tabtagho min fad.l -hi wa- lacalla -kum tashkuron

yolij al- layl fe an- nahaar wa- yolij an- nahaar fe al- layl wa- sakhkhara ash- shams wa- al- qamar kull yajre li- 'ajal musamma(n) dhaalikum 'allaah rabb -kum la- -hu al- mulk wa- 'alladhena tadcon min doni -hi maa yamlikon min qit.mer
'in tadcon -hum laa yasmaco ducaa' -kum wa- law samico maa istajaabo la- -kum wa- yawm al- qiyaamah yakfuron bi- shirk -kum wa- laa yunabbi' -ka mithl khaber
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas 'antum al- fuqaraa' 'ilaa 'allaah wa- 'allaah huwa al- ghaney al- h.amed
'in yasha' yudhhib -kum wa- ya'ti bi- khalq jaded
wa- maa dhaalika calaa 'allaah bi- cazez

wa- laa tazir waazirah wizr 'ukhraa wa- 'in tadcu muthqalah 'ilaa h.iml -haa laa yuh.mal min -hu shay' wa- law kaana dhaa qurbaa 'inna-maa tundhir 'alladhena yakhshawn rabb -hum bi- al- ghayb wa- aqaamo as.- s.alaah wa- man tazakkaa fa- 'inna-maa yatazakkaa li- nafs -hi wa- 'ilaa 'allaah al- mas.er
wa- maa yastawe al- acmaa wa- al- bas.er
wa- laa az.- z.ulumaat wa- laa an- nor
wa- laa az.- z.ill wa- laa al- h.aror
wa- maa yastawe al- ah.yaa' wa- laa al- amwaat 'inna 'allaah yusmic man yashaa' wa- maa 'anta bi- musmic man fe al- qubor
'in 'anta 'illaa nadher
'in(na) -naa arsalnaa -ka bi- al- h.aqq basher(an) wa- nadher(an) wa- 'in min 'ummah 'illaa khalaa fe -haa nadher
wa- 'in yukadhdhibo -ka fa- qad kadhdhaba 'alladhena min qabli -him jaa'at -hum rusul -hum bi- al- bayyinaat wa- bi- az- zubur wa- bi- al- kitaab al- muner
thumma 'akhadhtu 'alladhena kafaro fa- kayfa kaana naker -i
'a- lam tara 'anna 'allaah anzala min as- samaa' maa' fa- akhrajnaa bi- -hi thamaraat mukhtalif(an) alwaan -haa wa- min al- jibaal judad bed. wa- h.umr mukhtalif alwaan -haa wa- gharaabeb sod
wa- min an- naas wa- ad- dawaab wa- al- ancaam mukhtalif alwaan -hu ka- dhaalika 'inna-maa yakhshaa 'allaah min cibaad -hi al- culamaa' 'inna 'allaah cazez ghafor
'inna 'alladhena yatlon kitaab 'allaah wa- aqaamo as.- s.alaah wa- anfaqo min maa razaqnaa -hum sirr(an) wa- calaaniyah yarjon tijaarah lan tabor
li- yuwaffiya -hum 'ujor -hum wa- yazed -hum min fad.l -hi 'inna -hu ghafor shakor
wa- 'alladhe awh.aynaa 'ilay -ka min al- kitaab huwa al- h.aqq mus.addiq(an) li- maa bayna yadai -hi 'inna 'allaah bi- cibaad -hi la- khaber bas.er

thumma awrathnaa al- kitaab 'alladhena is.t.afaynaa min cibaad -naa fa- min -hum z.aalim li- nafs -hi wa- min -hum muqtas.id wa- min -hum saabiq bi- al- khayraat bi- 'idhn 'allaah dhaalika huwa al- fad.l al- kaber
jannaat cadn yadkhulon -haa yuh.allawn fe -haa min asaawir min dhahab wa- lu'lu'(an) wa- libaas -hum fe -haa h.arer
wa- qaalo al- h.amd li- 'allaah 'alladhe adhhaba can -naa al- h.azan 'inna rabb -naa la- ghafor shakor
'alladhe ah.alla -naa daar al- muqaamah min fad.l -hi laa yamass -naa fe -haa nas.ab wa- laa yamass -naa fe -haa lughob
wa- 'alladhena kafaro la- -hum naar jahannam laa yuqd.aa calay -him fa- yamoto wa- laa yukhaffaf can -hum min cadhaab -haa ka- dhaalika najze kull kafor

wa- hum yas.t.arikhon fe -haa rabb -naa akhrij -naa nacmal s.aalih.(an) ghayr 'alladhe kunnaa nacmal 'a- wa- lam nucammir -kum maa yatadhakkar fe -hi man tadhakkara wa- jaa'a -kum an- nadher fa- dhoqo fa- maa li- az.- z.aalimen min nas.er
'inna 'allaah caalim ghayb as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. 'inna -hu calem bi- dhaat as.- s.udor

huwa 'alladhe jacala -kum khalaa'if fe al- 'ard. fa- man kafara fa- calay -hi kufr -hu wa- laa yazed al- kaafiren kufr -hum cinda rabb -him 'illaa maqt(an) wa- laa yazed al- kaafiren kufr -hum 'illaa khasaar(an)

qul 'a- ra'aytum shurakaa' -kum 'alladhena tadcon min doni 'allaah aro -ne maa-dhaa khalaqo min al- 'ard. 'am la- -hum shirk fe as- samaawaat 'am 'aataynaa -hum kitaab(an) fa- hum calaa bayyinah min -hu bal 'in yacid az.- z.aalimon bacd. -hum bacd.(an) 'illaa ghuror(an)
'inna 'allaah yumsik as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. 'an tazolaa wa- la- 'in zaalataa 'in amsaka -humaa min 'ah.ad min bacdi -hi 'inna -hu kaana h.alem(an) ghafor(an)
wa- aqsamo bi- 'allaah jahd aymaan -him la- 'in jaa'a -hum nadher la- yakonunna ahdaa min 'ih.daa al- 'umam fa- lammaa jaa'a -hum nadher maa zaada -hum 'illaa nufor(an)

istikbaar(an) fe al- 'ard. wa- makr as- sayyi' wa- laa yah.eq al- makr as- sayyi' 'illaa bi- 'ahl -hi fa- hal yanz.uron 'illaa sunnah al- 'awwalen fa- lan tajid li- sunnah 'allaah tabdel(an) wa- lan tajid li- sunnah 'allaah tah.wel(an)

'a- wa- lam yasero fe al- 'ard. fa- yanz.uro kayfa kaana caaqibah 'alladhena min qabli -him wa- kaano ashadd min -hum qowah wa- maa kaana 'allaah li- yucjiz -hu min shay' fe as- samaawaat wa- laa fe al- 'ard. 'inna -hu kaana calem(an) qader(an)

wa- law yu'aakhidh 'allaah an- naas bi- maa kasabo maa taraka calaa z.ahr -haa min daabbah wa- laakin yu'akhkhir -hum 'ilaa 'ajal musamma(n) fa- 'idhaa jaa'a 'ajal -hum fa- 'inna 'allaah kaana bi- cibaad -hi bas.er(an)
yaa'-sen
wa- al- qur'aan al- h.akem
'inna -ka la- min al- mursalen
calaa s.iraat. mustaqem
tanzel al- cazez ar- rah.em
li- tundhir qawm(an) maa undhira 'aabaa' -hum fa- hum ghaafilon
la- qad h.aqqa al- qawl calaa akthar -him fa- hum laa yu'minon
'in(na) -naa jacalnaa fe acnaaq -him aghlaal(an) fa- hiya 'ilaa al- adhqaan fa- hum muqmah.on
wa- jacalnaa min bayna ayde -him sadd(an) wa- min khalfi -him sadd(an) fa- aghshaynaa -hum fa- hum laa yubs.iron
wa- sawaa' calay -him 'a- andharta -hum 'am lam tundhir -hum laa yu'minon
'inna-maa tundhir man ittabaca adh- dhikr wa- khashiya ar- rah.maan bi- al- ghayb fa- bashshir -hu bi- maghfirah wa- 'ajr karem
'in(na) -naa nah.nu nuh.ye al- mawtaa wa- naktub maa qaddamo wa- 'aathaar -hum wa- kull shay' ah.s.aynaa -hu fe 'imaam muben
wa- id.rib la- -hum mathal(an) as.h.aab al- qaryah 'idh jaa'a -haa al- mursalon
'idh arsalnaa 'ilay -him ithnain fa- kadhdhabo -humaa fa- cazzaznaa bi- thaalith fa- qaalo 'in(na) -naa 'ilay -kum mursalon
qaalo maa 'antum 'illaa bashar mithl -naa wa- maa anzala ar- rah.maan min shay' 'in 'antum 'illaa takdhibon
qaalo rabb -naa yaclam 'in(na) -naa 'ilay -kum la- mursalon
wa- maa calay -naa 'illaa al- balaagh al- muben
qaalo 'in(na) -naa tat.ayyarnaa bi- -kum la- 'in lam tantaho la- narjumanna -kum wa- la- yamassanna -kum min -naa cadhaab 'alem
qaalo t.aa'ir -kum maca -kum 'a- 'in dhukkirtum bal 'antum qawm musrifon
wa- jaa'a min aqs.aa al- madenah rajul yascaa qaala yaa qawm -e ittabico al- mursalen
ittabico man laa yas'al -kum 'ajr(an) wa- hum muhtadon
wa- maa li- -y laa acbud 'alladhe fat.ara -ne wa- 'ilay -hi turjacon
'a- attakhidh min doni -hi 'aalihah 'in yurid -ni ar- rah.maan bi- d.urr laa tughni can -ne shafaacah -hum shay'(an) wa- laa yunqidhon
'inni -y 'idhan la- fe d.alaal muben
'inni -y 'aamantu bi- rabb -kum fa- ismaco -ni
qela udkhul al- jannah qaala yaa layta qawm -e yaclamon
bi- maa ghafara li- -y rabb -e wa- jacala -ne min al- mukramen
wa- maa anzalnaa calaa qawm -hi min bacdi -hi min jund min as- samaa' wa- maa kunnaa munzilen
'in kaanat 'illaa s.ayh.ah waah.idah fa- 'idhaa hum khaamidon
yaa h.asrah calaa al- cibaad maa ya'te -him min rasol 'illaa kaano bi- -hi yastahzi'on
'a- lam yaraw -kum ahlaknaa qabla -hum min al- quron 'anna -hum 'ilay -him laa yarjicon
wa- 'in kull lammaa jamec laday -naa muh.d.aron
wa- 'aayah la- -hum al- 'ard. al- maytah ah.yaynaa -haa wa- akhrajnaa min -haa h.abb(an) fa- min -hu ya'kulon
wa- jacalnaa fe -haa jannaat min nakhel wa- acnaab wa- fajjarnaa fe -haa min al- cuyon
li- ya'kulo min thamarah wa- maa camilat -hu ayde -him 'a- fa- laa yashkuron
subh.aana 'alladhe khalaqa al- azwaaj kull -haa min maa tunbit al- 'ard. wa- min anfus -him wa- min maa laa yaclamon
wa- 'aayah la- -hum al- layl naslak -hu min -hu an- nahaar fa- 'idhaa hum muz.limon
wa- ash- shams tajre li- mustaqarr la- -haa dhaalika taqder al- cazez al- calem
wa- al- qamar qaddarnaa -hu manaazil h.attaa caada ka- al- curjon al- qadem
laa ash- shams yanbaghe la- -haa 'an tudrik al- qamar wa- laa al- layl saabiq an- nahaar wa- kull fe falak yasbah.on
wa- 'aayah la- -hum 'an(na) -naa h.amalnaa dhurreyah -hum fe al- fulk al- mashh.on
wa- khalaqnaa la- -hum min mithl -hi maa yarkabon
wa- 'in nasha' nughriq -hum fa- laa s.arekh la- -hum wa- laa hum yunqadhon
'illaa rah.mah min -naa wa- mataac(an) 'ilaa h.en
wa- 'idhaa qela la- -hum ittaqo maa bayna ayde -kum wa- maa khalfa -kum lacalla -kum turh.amon
wa- maa ta'te -him min 'aayah min 'aayaat rabb -him 'illaa kaano can -haa mucrid.en
wa- 'idhaa qela la- -hum anfiqo min maa razaqa -kum 'allaah qaala 'alladhena kafaro li- 'alladhena 'aamano 'a- nut.cim man law yashaa' 'allaah at.cama -hu 'in 'antum 'illaa fe d.alaal muben
wa- yaqolon mataa haadhaa al- wacd 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
maa yanz.uron 'illaa s.ayh.ah waah.idah ta'khudh -hum wa- hum yakhis.s.imon
fa- laa yastat.econ taws.iyah wa- laa 'ilaa 'ahl -him yarjicon
wa- nufikha fe as.- s.or fa- 'idhaa hum min al- ajdaath 'ilaa rabb -him yansilon
qaalo yaa wayl -naa man bacatha -naa min marqad -naa haadhaa maa wacada ar- rah.maan wa- s.adaqa al- mursalon
'in kaanat 'illaa s.ayh.ah waah.idah fa- 'idhaa hum jamec laday -naa muh.d.aron
fa- al- yawm laa tuz.lam nafs shay'(an) wa- laa tujzawn 'illaa maa kuntum tacmalon
'inna as.h.aab al- jannah al- yawm fe shughul faakihon
hum wa- azwaaj -hum fe z.ilaal calaa al- 'araa'ik muttaki'on
la- -hum fe -haa faakihah wa- la- -hum maa yaddacon
salaam qawl(an) min rabb rah.em
wa- imtaazo al- yawm 'ayyuhaa al- mujrimon
'a- lam achad 'ilay -kum yaa bane 'aadam 'an laa tacbudo ash- shayt.aan 'inna -hu la- -kum cadow muben
wa- 'an ucbudo -ne haadhaa s.iraat. mustaqem
wa- la- qad ad.alla min -kum jibill(an) kather(an) 'a- fa- lam takono tacqilon
haadhihi jahannam 'allate kuntum tocadon
is.law -haa al- yawm bi- maa kuntum takfuron
al- yawm nakhtim calaa afwaah -him wa- tukallim -naa ayde -him wa- tashhad arjul -hum bi- maa kaano yaksibon
wa- law nashaa' la- t.amasnaa calaa acyun -him fa- istabaqo as.- s.iraat. fa- 'annaa yubs.iron
wa- law nashaa' la- masakhnaa -hum calaa makaanah -him fa- maa istat.aaco mud.ey(an) wa- laa yarjicon
wa- man nucammir -hu nunakkis -hu fe al- khalq 'a- fa- laa yacqilon
wa- maa callamnaa -hu ash- shicr wa- maa yanbaghe la- -hu 'in huwa 'illaa dhikr wa- qur'aan muben
li- yundhir man kaana h.ayy(an) wa- yah.iqq al- qawl calaa al- kaafiren
'a- wa- lam yaraw 'an(na) -naa khalaqnaa la- -hum min maa camilat ayde -naa ancaam(an) fa- hum la- -haa maalikon
wa- dhallalnaa -haa la- -hum fa- min -haa rakob -hum wa- min -haa ya'kulon
wa- la- -hum fe -haa manaafic wa- mashaarib 'a- fa- laa yashkuron
wa- ittakhadho min doni 'allaah 'aalihah lacalla -hum yuns.aron
laa yastat.econ nas.r -hum wa- hum la- -hum jund muh.d.aron
fa- laa yah.zun -ka qawl -hum 'in(na) -naa naclam maa yusirron wa- maa yuclinon
'a- wa- lam yara al- 'insaan 'an(na) -naa khalaqnaa -hu min nut.fah fa- 'idhaa huwa khas.em muben
wa- d.araba la- -naa mathal(an) wa- nasiya khalq -hu qaala man yuh.ye al- ciz.aam wa- hiya ramem
qul yuh.ye -haa 'alladhe ansha'a -haa 'awwal marrah wa- huwa bi- kull khalq calem
'alladhe jacala la- -kum min ash- shajar al- akhd.ar naar(an) fa- 'idhaa 'antum min -hu toqidon
'a- wa- laysa 'alladhe khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. bi- qaadir calaa 'an yakhluq mithl -hum balaa wa- huwa al- khallaaq al- calem
'inna-maa 'amr -hu 'idhaa araada shay'(an) 'an yaqol la- -hu kun fa- yakon
fa- subh.aana 'alladhe bi- yad -hi malakot kull shay' wa- 'ilay -hi turjacon
wa- as.- s.aaffaat s.aff(an)
fa- az- zaajiraat zajr(an)
fa- at- taaliyaat dhikr(an)
'inna 'ilaah -kum la- waah.id
rabb as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa wa- rabb al- mashaariq
'in(na) -naa zayyannaa as- samaa' ad- dunyaa bi- zenah al- kawaakib
wa- h.ifz.(an) min kull shayt.aan maarid

fa- aghwaynaa -kum 'in(na) -naa kunnaa ghaawen
fa- 'inna -hum yawma'idhin fe al- cadhaab mushtarikon

wa- yaqolon 'a- 'in(na) -naa la- taariko 'aalihah -naa li- shaacir majnon
bal jaa'a bi- al- h.aqq wa- s.addaqa al- mursalen
'inna -kum la- dhaa'iqo al- cadhaab al- 'alem
wa- maa tujzawn 'illaa maa kuntum tacmalon

fe jannaat an- nacem

laa fe -haa ghawl wa- laa hum can -haa yunzafon
wa- cinda -hum qaas.iraat at.- t.arf cen
ka-'anna -hunna bayd. maknon
fa- aqbala bacd. -hum calaa bacd. yatasaa'alon
qaala qaa'il min -hum 'inni -y kaana li- -y qaren
yaqol 'a- 'inna -ka la- min al- mus.addiqen
'a- 'idhaa mitnaa wa- kunnaa turaab(an) wa- ciz.aam(an) 'a- 'in(na) -naa la- madenon
qaala hal 'antum mut.t.alicon
fa- it.t.alaca fa- ra'aa -hu fe sawaa' al- jah.em
qaala ta- 'allaah 'in kidta la- turde -ni
wa- law-laa nicmah rabb -e la- kuntu min al- muh.d.aren
'a- fa- maa nah.nu bi- mayyiten
'illaa mawtah -naa al- 'olaa wa- maa nah.nu bi- mucadhdhaben
'inna haadhaa la- huwa al- fawz al- caz.em
li- mithl haadhaa fa- li- yacmal al- caamilon
'a- dhaalika khayr nuzul(an) 'am shajarah az- zaqqom
'in(na) -naa jacalnaa -haa fitnah li- az.- z.aalimen
'inna -haa shajarah takhruj fe 'as.l al- jah.em
t.alc -haa ka-'anna -hu ru'os ash- shayaat.en
fa- 'inna -hum la- 'aakilon min -haa fa- maali'on min -haa al- but.on
thumma 'inna la- -hum calay -haa la- shawb(an) min h.amem
thumma 'inna marjic -hum la- 'ilaa al- jah.em
'inna -hum alfaw 'aabaa' -hum d.aallen
fa- hum calaa 'aathaar -him yuhracon
wa- la- qad d.alla qabla -hum akthar al- 'awwalen
wa- la- qad arsalnaa fe -him mundhiren
fa- unz.ur kayfa kaana caaqibah al- mundharen
'illaa cibaad 'allaah al- mukhlas.en
wa- la- qad naadaa -naa noh. fa- la- nicma al- mujebon
wa- najjaynaa -hu wa- 'ahl -hu min al- karb al- caz.em
wa- jacalnaa dhurreyah -hu hum al- baaqen
wa- taraknaa calay -hi fe al- 'aakhiren
salaam calaa noh. fe al- caalamen
'in(na) -naa ka- dhaalika najze al- muh.sinen
'inna -hu min cibaad -naa al- mu'minen
thumma aghraqnaa al- 'aakharen
wa- 'inna min shecah -hi la- 'ibraahem
'idh jaa'a rabb -hu bi- qalb salem

'a- 'ifk(an) 'aalihah dona 'allaah turedon
fa- maa z.ann -kum bi- rabb al- caalamen

fa- qaala 'inni -y saqem

fa- lammaa balagha maca -hu as- sacy qaala yaa bunay -ya 'inni -y araa fe al- manaam 'anni -y adhbah. -ka fa- unz.ur maa-dhaa taraa qaala yaa 'ab -ti ifcal maa tu'mar sa- tajid -ne 'in shaa'a 'allaah min as.- s.aabiren

'idh najjaynaa -hu wa- 'ahl -hu ajmacen

wa- 'inna -kum la- tamurron calay -him mus.bih.en

wa- 'inna yonus la- min al- mursalen
'idh 'abaqa 'ilaa al- fulk al- mashh.on
fa- saahama fa- kaana min al- mudh.ad.en

fa- law-laa 'anna -hu kaana min al- musabbih.en

fa- istafti -him 'a- li- rabb -ka al- banaat wa- la- -hum al- banon

'a-laa 'inna -hum min 'ifk -him la- yaqolon

wa- jacalo bayna -hu wa- bayna al- jinnah nasab(an) wa- la- qad calimat al- jinnah 'inna -hum la- muh.d.aron
subh.aana 'allaah can maa yas.ifon

fa- 'inna -kum wa- maa tacbudon

'inna -hum la- -hum al- mans.oron

'a- fa- bi- cadhaab -naa yastacjilon

s.aad wa- al- qur'aan dhe adh- dhikr
bal 'alladhena kafaro fe cizzah wa- shiqaaq

wa- cajibo 'an jaa'a -hum mundhir min -hum wa- qaala al- kaafiron haadhaa saah.ir kadhdhaab
'a- jacala al- 'aalihah 'ilaah(an) waah.id(an) 'inna haadhaa la- shay' cujaab
wa- int.alaqa al- mala' min -hum 'an imsho wa- is.biro calaa 'aalihah -kum 'inna haadhaa la- shay' yuraad
maa samicnaa bi- haadhaa fe al- millah al- 'aakhirah 'in haadhaa 'illaa ikhtilaaq
'a- unzila calay -hi adh- dhikr min bayna -naa bal hum fe shakk min dhikr -y bal lammaa yadhoqo cadhaab -i
'am cinda -hum khazaa'in rah.mah rabb -ka al- cazez al- wahhaab

jund maa hunaalika mahzom min al- ah.zaab
kadhdhabat qabla -hum qawm noh. wa- caad wa- fircawn dho al- awtaad

'in kull 'illaa kadhdhaba ar- rusul fa- h.aqqa ciqaab -i
wa- maa yanz.ur haa'ulaa'i 'illaa s.ayh.ah waah.idah maa la- -haa min fawaaq

is.bir calaa maa yaqolon wa- udhkur cabd -naa daawod dhaa al- aydi 'inna -hu 'awwaab
