wa- at.- t.ayr mah.shorah kull la- -hu 'awwaab
wa- shadadnaa mulk -hu wa- 'aataynaa -hu al- h.ikmah wa- fas.l al- khit.aab
wa- hal 'ataa -ka naba' al- khas.m 'idh tasawwaro al- mih.raab
'idh dakhalo calaa daawod fa- fazica min -hum qaalo laa takhaf khas.maan baghaa bacd. -naa calaa bacd. fa- uh.kum bayna -naa bi- al- h.aqq wa- laa tusht.it. wa- ihdi -naa 'ilaa sawaa' as.- s.iraat.
'inna haadhaa 'akh -e la- -hu tisc wa- tiscon nacjah wa- li- -ya nacjah waah.idah fa- qaala akfil -ne -haa wa- cazza -ne fe al- khit.aab

qaala la- qad z.alama -ka bi- su'aal nacjah -ka 'ilaa nicaaj -hi wa- 'inna kather(an) min al- khulat.aa' la- yabghe bacd. -hum calaa bacd. 'illaa 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat wa- qalel maa hum wa- z.anna daawod 'anna-maa fatannaa -hu fa- istaghfara rabb -hu wa- kharra raakic(an) wa- anaaba
fa- ghafarnaa la- -hu dhaalika wa- 'inna la- -hu cinda -naa la- zulfaa wa- h.usn ma'aab

yaa daawod 'in(na) -naa jacalnaa -ka khalefah fe al- 'ard. fa- uh.kum bayna an- naas bi- al- h.aqq wa- laa tattabic al- hawaa fa- yud.ill -ka can sabel 'allaah 'inna 'alladhena yad.illon can sabel 'allaah la- -hum cadhaab shaded bi- maa naso yawm al- h.isaab
wa- maa khalaqnaa as- samaa' wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa baat.il(an) dhaalika z.anna 'alladhena kafaro fa- wayl li- 'alladhena kafaro min an- naar
'am najcal 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat ka- al- mufsiden fe al- 'ard. 'am najcal al- muttaqen ka- al- fujjaar
kitaab anzalnaa -hu 'ilay -ka mubaarak li- yaddabbaro 'aayaat -hi wa- li- yatadhakkar 'olo al- albaab
wa- wahabnaa li- daawod sulaymaan nicma al- cabd 'inna -hu 'awwaab
'idh curid.a calay -hi bi- al- cashey as.- s.aafinaat al- jiyaad
fa- qaala 'inni -y ah.babtu h.ubb al- khayr can dhikr rabb -e h.attaa tawaarat bi- al- h.ijaab
ruddo -haa calay -ya fa- t.afiqa mash.(an) bi- as- soq wa- al- acnaaq
wa- la- qad fatannaa sulaymaan wa- alqaynaa calaa kursey -hi jasad(an) thumma anaaba
qaala rabb ighfir li- -y wa- hab li- -y mulk(an) laa yanbaghe li- 'ah.ad min bacdi -y 'inna -ka 'anta al- wahhaab
fa- sakhkharnaa la- -hu ar- reh. tajre bi- 'amr -hi rukhaa' h.aythu as.aaba
wa- ash- shayaat.en kull bannaa' wa- ghawwaas.
wa- 'aakharen muqarranen fe al- as.faad
haadhaa cat.aa' -naa fa- umnun 'aw amsik bi- ghayr h.isaab
wa- 'inna la- -hu cinda -naa la- zulfaa wa- h.usn ma'aab
wa- udhkur cabd -naa 'ayyob 'idh naadaa rabb -hu 'anni -y massa -ne ash- shayt.aan bi- nus.b wa- cadhaab
urkud. bi- rijl -ka haadhaa mughtasal baarid wa- sharaab
wa- wahabnaa la- -hu 'ahl -hu wa- mithl -hum maca -hum rah.mah min -naa wa- dhikraa li- 'ole al- albaab
wa- khudh bi- yad -ka d.ighth(an) fa- id.rib bi- -hi wa- laa tah.nath 'in(na) -naa wajadnaa -hu s.aabir(an) nicma al- cabd 'inna -hu 'awwaab
wa- udhkur cibaad -naa 'ibraahem wa- 'ish.aaq wa- yacqob 'ole al- ayde wa- al- abs.aar
'in(na) -naa akhlas.naa -hum bi- khaalis.ah dhikraa ad- daar
wa- 'inna -hum cinda -naa la- min al- mus.t.afain al- akhyaar
wa- udhkur 'ismaacel wa- al-yasac wa- dhaa al- kifl wa- kull min al- akhyaar
haadhaa dhikr wa- 'inna li- al- muttaqen la- h.usn ma'aab
jannaat cadn mufattah.ah la- -hum al- abwaab
muttaki'en fe -haa yadcon fe -haa bi- faakihah katherah wa- sharaab
wa- cinda -hum qaas.iraat at.- t.arf atraab
haadhaa maa tocadon li- yawm al- h.isaab
'inna haadhaa la- rizq -naa maa la- -hu min nafaad
haadhaa wa- 'inna li- at.- t.aaghen la- sharr ma'aab
jahannam yas.lawn -haa fa- bi's al- mihaad
haadhaa fa- li- yadhoqo -hu h.amem wa- ghassaaq
wa- 'aakhar min shakl -hi azwaaj
haadhaa fawj muqtah.im maca -kum laa marh.ab(an) bi- -him 'inna -hum s.aalo an- naar
qaalo bal 'antum laa marh.ab(an) bi- -kum 'antum qaddamtumo -hu la- -naa fa- bi's al- qaraar
qaalo rabb -naa man qaddama la- -naa haadhaa fa- zid -hu cadhaab(an) d.icf(an) fe an- naar
wa- qaalo maa la- -naa laa naraa rijaal(an) kunnaa nacud -hum min al- ashraar
'a- ittakhadhnaa -hum sikhrey(an) 'am zaaghat can -hum al- abs.aar
'inna dhaalika la- h.aqq takhaas.um 'ahl an- naar
qul 'inna-maa 'anaa mundhir wa- maa min 'ilaah 'illaa 'allaah al- waah.id al- qahhaar
rabb as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa al- cazez al- ghaffaar
qul huwa naba' caz.em
'antum can -hu mucrid.on
maa kaana li- -y min cilm bi- al- mala' al- aclaa 'idh yakhtas.imon
'in yoh.aa 'ilay -ya 'illaa 'anna-maa 'anaa nadher muben
'idh qaala rabb -ka li- al- malaa'ikah 'inni -y khaaliq bashar(an) min t.en
fa- 'idhaa sawwaytu -hu wa- nafakhtu fe -hi min roh. -e fa- qaco la- -hu saajiden
fa- sajada al- malaa'ikah kull -hum ajmacon
'illaa 'ibles istakbara wa- kaana min al- kaafiren
qaala yaa 'ibles maa manaca -ka 'an tasjud li- maa khalaqtu bi- yadai -ya 'a- istakbarta 'am kunta min al- caalen
qaala 'anaa khayr min -hu khalaqta -ne min naar wa- khalaqta -hu min t.en
qaala fa- ukhruj min -haa fa- 'inna -ka rajem
wa- 'inna calay -ka lacnah -e 'ilaa yawm ad- den
qaala rabb -i fa- anz.ir -ne 'ilaa yawm yubcathon
qaala fa- 'inna -ka min al- munz.aren
'ilaa yawm al- waqt al- maclom
qaala fa- bi- cizzah -ka la- ughwiyanna -hum ajmacen
'illaa cibaad -ka min -hum al- mukhlas.en
qaala fa- al- h.aqq wa- al- h.aqq aqol
la- amla'anna jahannam min -ka wa- min man tabica -ka min -hum ajmacen
qul maa as'al -kum calay -hi min 'ajr wa- maa 'anaa min al- mutakallifen
'in huwa 'illaa dhikr li- al- caalamen
wa- la- taclamunna naba' -hu bacda h.en
tanzel al- kitaab min 'allaah al- cazez al- h.akem
'in(na) -naa anzalnaa 'ilay -ka al- kitaab bi- al- h.aqq fa- ucbud 'allaah mukhlis.(an) la- -hu ad- den

'a-laa li- 'allaah ad- den al- khaalis. wa- 'alladhena ittakhadho min doni -hi awliyaa' maa nacbud -hum 'illaa li- yuqarribo -naa 'ilaa 'allaah zulfaa 'inna 'allaah yah.kum bayna -hum fe maa hum fe -hi yakhtalifon 'inna 'allaah laa yahde man huwa kaadhib kuffaar
law araada 'allaah 'an yattakhidh walad(an) la- is.t.afaa min maa yakhluq maa yashaa' subh.aana -hu huwa 'allaah al- waah.id al- qahhaar

khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. bi- al- h.aqq yukawwir al- layl calaa an- nahaar wa- yukawwir an- nahaar calaa al- layl wa- sakhkhara ash- shams wa- al- qamar kull yajre li- 'ajal musamma(n) 'a-laa huwa al- cazez al- ghaffaar

khalaqa -kum min nafs waah.idah thumma jacala min -haa zawj -haa wa- anzala la- -kum min al- ancaam thamaaniyah azwaaj yakhluq -kum fe but.on 'ummahaat -kum khalq(an) min bacdi khalq fe z.ulumaat thalaath dhaalikum 'allaah rabb -kum la- -hu al- mulk laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa fa- 'annaa tus.rafon

'in takfuro fa- 'inna 'allaah ghaney can -kum wa- laa yard.aa li- cibaad -hi al- kufr wa- 'in tashkuro yard.a -hu la- -kum wa- laa tazir waazirah wizr 'ukhraa thumma 'ilaa rabb -kum marjic -kum fa- yunabbi' -kum bi- maa kuntum tacmalon 'inna -hu calem bi- dhaat as.- s.udor

wa- 'idhaa massa al- 'insaan d.urr dacaa rabb -hu muneb(an) 'ilay -hi thumma 'idhaa khawwala -hu nicmah min -hu nasiya maa kaana yadco 'ilay -hi min qablu wa- jacala li- 'allaah andaad(an) li- yud.ill can sabel -hi qul tamattac bi- kufr -ka qalel(an) 'inna -ka min as.h.aab an- naar

'am man huwa qaanit 'aanaa' al- layl saajid(an) wa- qaa'im(an) yah.dhar al- 'aakhirah wa- yarjo rah.mah rabb -hi qul hal yastawe 'alladhena yaclamon wa- 'alladhena laa yaclamon 'inna-maa yatadhakkar 'olo al- albaab
qul yaa cibaad -i 'alladhena 'aamano ittaqo rabb -kum li- 'alladhena ah.sano fe haadhihi ad- dunyaa h.asanah wa- 'ard. 'allaah waasicah 'inna-maa yuwaffaa as.- s.aabiron 'ajr -hum bi- ghayr h.isaab
qul 'inni -y 'umirtu 'an acbud 'allaah mukhlis.(an) la- -hu ad- den
wa- 'umirtu li- 'in akon 'awwal al- muslimen
qul 'inni -y akhaaf 'in cas.aytu rabb -e cadhaab yawm caz.em
qul 'allaah acbud mukhlis.(an) la- -hu den -e
fa- ucbudo maa shi'tum min doni -hi qul 'inna al- khaasiren 'alladhena khasiro anfus -hum wa- 'ahle -him yawm al- qiyaamah 'a-laa dhaalika huwa al- khusraan al- muben
la- -hum min fawqi -him z.ulal min an- naar wa- min tah.ti -him z.ulal dhaalika yukhawwif 'allaah bi- -hi cibaad -hi yaa cibaad -i fa- ittaqo -ni
wa- 'alladhena ijtanabo at.- t.aaghot 'an yacbudo -haa wa- anaabo 'ilaa 'allaah la- -hum al- bushraa fa- bashshir cibaad -i
'alladhena yastamicon al- qawl fa- yattabicon ah.san -hu 'olaa'ika 'alladhena hadaa -hum 'allaah wa- 'olaa'ika hum 'olo al- albaab
'a- fa- man h.aqqa calay -hi kalimah al- cadhaab 'a- fa- 'anta tunqidh man fe an- naar
laakin 'alladhena ittaqaw rabb -him la- -hum ghuraf min fawqi -haa ghuraf mabneyah tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar wacd 'allaah laa yukhlif 'allaah al- mecaad

'a- lam tara 'anna 'allaah anzala min as- samaa' maa' fa- salaka -hu yanaabec fe al- 'ard. thumma yukhrij bi- -hi zarc(an) mukhtalif(an) alwaan -hu thumma yahej fa- taraa -hu mus.farr(an) thumma yajcal -hu h.ut.aam(an) 'inna fe dhaalika la- dhikraa li- 'ole al- albaab
'a- fa- man sharah.a 'allaah s.adr -hu li- al- islaam fa- huwa calaa nor min rabb -hi fa- wayl li- al- qaasiyah qulob -hum min dhikr 'allaah 'olaa'ika fe d.alaal muben

'allaah nazzala ah.san al- h.adeth kitaab(an) mutashaabih(an) mathaaniya taqshacirr min -hu julod 'alladhena yakhshawn rabb -hum thumma talen julod -hum wa- qulob -hum 'ilaa dhikr 'allaah dhaalika hudaa 'allaah yahde bi- -hi man yashaa' wa- man yud.lil 'allaah fa- maa la- -hu min haadi(n)
'a- fa- man yattaqe bi- wajh -hi so' al- cadhaab yawm al- qiyaamah wa- qela li- az.- z.aalimen dhoqo maa kuntum taksibon
kadhdhaba 'alladhena min qabli -him fa- 'ataa -hum al- cadhaab min h.aythu laa yashcuron
fa- adhaaqa -hum 'allaah al- khizy fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- la- cadhaab al- 'aakhirah akbar law kaano yaclamon
wa- la- qad d.arabnaa li- an- naas fe haadhaa al- qur'aan min kull mathal lacalla -hum yatadhakkaron
qur'aan(an) carabey(an) ghayr dhe ciwaj(an) lacalla -hum yattaqon
d.araba 'allaah mathal(an) rajul(an) fe -hi shurakaa' matashaakison wa- rajul(an) salam(an) li- rajul hal yastawiyaan mathal(an) al- h.amd li- 'allaah bal akthar -hum laa yaclamon
'inna -ka mayyit wa- 'inna -hum mayyiton
thumma 'inna -kum yawm al- qiyaamah cinda rabb -kum takhtas.imon
fa- man az.lam min man kadhaba calaa 'allaah wa- kadhdhaba bi- as.- s.idq 'idh jaa'a -hu 'a- laysa fe jahannam mathwa(n) li- al- kaafiren
wa- 'alladhe jaa'a bi- as.- s.idq wa- s.addaqa bi- -hi 'olaa'ika hum al- muttaqon
la- -hum maa yashaa'on cinda rabb -him dhaalika jazaa' al- muh.sinen
li- yukaffir 'allaah can -hum aswa' 'alladhe camilo wa- yajziya -hum 'ajr -hum bi- ah.san 'alladhe kaano yacmalon
'a- laysa 'allaah bi- kaafi(n) cabd -hu wa- yukhawwifon -ka bi- 'alladhena min doni -hi wa- man yud.lil 'allaah fa- maa la- -hu min haadi(n)
wa- man yahdi 'allaah fa- maa la- -hu min mud.ill 'a- laysa 'allaah bi- cazez dhe intiqaam

wa- la- 'in sa'alta -hum man khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. la- yaqolunna 'allaah qul 'a- fa- ra'aytum maa tadcon min doni 'allaah 'in araada -ne 'allaah bi- d.urr hal hunna kaashifaat d.urr -hi 'aw araada -ne bi- rah.mah hal hunna mumsikaat rah.mah -hi qul h.asb -e 'allaah calay -hi yatawakkal al- mutawakkilon
qul yaa qawm -e icmalo calaa makaanah -kum 'inni -y caamil fa- sawfa taclamon
man ya'te -hi cadhaab yukhze -hi wa- yah.ill calay -hi cadhaab muqem
'in(na) -naa anzalnaa calay -ka al- kitaab li- an- naas bi- al- h.aqq fa- man ihtadaa fa- li- nafs -hi wa- man d.alla fa- 'inna-maa yad.ill calay -haa wa- maa 'anta calay -him bi- wakel

'allaah yatawaffaa al- anfus h.ena mawt -haa wa- 'allate lam tamut fe manaam -haa fa- yumsik 'allate qad.aa calay -haa al- mawt wa- yursil al- 'ukhraa 'ilaa 'ajal musamma(n) 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- qawm yatafakkaron
'am ittakhadho min doni 'allaah shufacaa' qul 'a- wa- law kaano laa yamlikon shay'(an) wa- laa yacqilon
qul li- 'allaah ash- shafaacah jamec(an) la- -hu mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. thumma 'ilay -hi turjacon
wa- 'idhaa dhukira 'allaah wah.d -hu ishma'azzat qulob 'alladhena laa yu'minon bi- al- 'aakhirah wa- 'idhaa dhukira 'alladhena min doni -hi 'idhaa hum yastabshiron
qul 'allaahumma faat.ir as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. caalim al- ghayb wa- ash- shahaadah 'anta tah.kum bayna cibaad -ka fe maa kaano fe -hi yakhtalifon

wa- law 'anna li- 'alladhena z.alamo maa fe al- 'ard. jamec(an) wa- mithl -hu maca -hu la- iftadaw bi- -hi min so' al- cadhaab yawm al- qiyaamah wa- badaa la- -hum min 'allaah maa lam yakono yah.tasibon
wa- badaa la- -hum sayyi'aat maa kasabo wa- h.aaqa bi- -him maa kaano bi- -hi yastahzi'on
fa- 'idhaa massa al- 'insaan d.urr dacaa -naa thumma 'idhaa khawwalnaa -hu nicmah min -naa qaala 'inna-maa 'otetu -hu calaa cilm bal hiya fitnah wa- laakin akthar -hum laa yaclamon
qad qaala -haa 'alladhena min qabli -him fa- maa aghnaa can -hum maa kaano yaksibon
fa- as.aaba -hum sayyi'aat maa kasabo wa- 'alladhena z.alamo min haa'ulaa'i sa- yus.eb -hum sayyi'aat maa kasabo wa- maa hum bi- mucjizen
'a- wa- lam yaclamo 'anna 'allaah yabsut. ar- rizq li- man yashaa' wa- yaqdir 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- qawm yu'minon
qul yaa cibaad -e 'alladhena asrafo calaa anfus -him laa taqnat.o min rah.mah 'allaah 'inna 'allaah yaghfir adh- dhunob jamec(an) 'inna -hu huwa al- ghafor ar- rah.em
wa- anebo 'ilaa rabb -kum wa- aslimo la- -hu min qabli 'an ya'tiya -kum al- cadhaab thumma laa tuns.aron
wa- ittabico ah.san maa unzila 'ilay -kum min rabb -kum min qabli 'an ya'tiya -kum al- cadhaab baghtah wa- 'antum laa tashcuron
'an taqol nafs yaa h.asrah -taa calaa maa farrat.tu fe janb 'allaah wa- 'in kuntu la- min as- saakhiren
'aw taqol law 'anna 'allaah hadaa -ne la- kuntu min al- muttaqen
'aw taqol h.ena taraa al- cadhaab law 'anna li- -y karrah fa- akon min al- muh.sinen
balaa qad jaa'at -ka 'aayaat -e fa- kadhdhabta bi- -haa wa- istakbarta wa- kunta min al- kaafiren
wa- yawm al- qiyaamah taraa 'alladhena kadhabo calaa 'allaah wujoh -hum muswaddah 'a- laysa fe jahannam mathwa(n) li- al- mutakabbiren
wa- yunajje 'allaah 'alladhena ittaqaw bi- mafaazah -him laa yamass -hum as- so' wa- laa hum yah.zanon
'allaah khaaliq kull shay' wa- huwa calaa kull shay' wakel
la- -hu maqaaled as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- 'alladhena kafaro bi- 'aayaat 'allaah 'olaa'ika hum al- khaasiron
qul 'a- fa- ghayr 'allaah ta'muro -ne acbud 'ayyuhaa al- jaahilon
wa- la- qad oh.iya 'ilay -ka wa- 'ilaa 'alladhena min qabli -ka la- 'in ashrakta la- yah.bat.anna camal -ka wa- la- takonanna min al- khaasiren
bal 'allaah fa- ucbud wa- kun min ask- shaakiren
wa- maa qadaro 'allaah h.aqq qadr -hi wa- al- 'ard. jamec(an) qabd.ah -hu yawm al- qiyaamah wa- as- samaawaat mat.weyaat bi- yamen -hi subh.aana -hu wa- tacaalaa can maa yushrikon
wa- nufikha fe as.- s.or fa- s.aciqa man fe as- samaawaat wa- man fe al- 'ard. 'illaa man shaa'a 'allaah thumma nufikha fe 'ukhraa fa- 'idhaa hum qiyaam yanz.uron
wa- ashraqat al- 'ard. bi- nor rabb -haa wa- wud.ica al- kitaab wa- je'a bi- an- nabeyen wa- ash- shuhadaa' wa- qud.iya bayna -hum bi- al- h.aqq wa- hum laa yuz.lamon
wa- wuffiyat kull nafs maa camilat wa- huwa aclam bi- maa yafcalon

wa- seqa 'alladhena kafaro 'ilaa jahannam zumar(an) h.attaa 'idhaa jaa'o -haa futih.at abwaab -haa wa- qaala la- -hum khazanah -haa 'a- lam ya'ti -kum rusul min -kum yatlon calay -kum 'aayaat rabb -kum wa- yundhiron -kum liqaa' yawm -kum haadhaa qaalo balaa wa- laakin h.aqqat kalimah al- cadhaab calaa al- kaafiren
qela udkhulo abwaab jahannam khaaliden fe -haa fa- bi's mathwa(n) al- mutakabbiren

wa- seqa 'alladhena ittaqaw rabb -hum 'ilaa al- jannah zumar(an) h.attaa 'idhaa jaa'o -haa wa- futih.at abwaab -haa wa- qaala la- -hum khazanah -haa salaam calay -kum t.ibtum fa- udkhulo -haa khaaliden
wa- qaalo al- h.amd li- 'allaah 'alladhe s.adaqa -naa wacd -hu wa- awratha -naa al- 'ard. natabawwa' min al- jannah h.aythu nashaa' fa- nicma 'ajr al- caamilen
wa- taraa al- malaa'ikah h.aaffen min h.awli al- carsh yusabbih.on bi- h.amd rabb -him wa- qud.iya bayna -hum bi- al- h.aqq wa- qela al- h.amd li- 'allaah rabb al- caalamen
h.aa'-mem
tanzel al- kitaab min 'allaah al- cazez al- calem
ghaafir adh- dhanb wa- qaabil at- tawb shaded al- ciqaab dhe at.- t.awl laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa 'ilay -hi al- mas.er
maa yujaadil fe 'aayaat 'allaah 'illaa 'alladhena kafaro fa- laa yaghrur -ka taqallub -hum fe al- bilaad

kadhdhabat qabla -hum qawm noh. wa- al- ah.zaab min bacdi -him wa- hammat kull 'ummah bi- rasol -him li- ya'khudho -hu wa- jaadalo bi- al- baat.il li- yudh.id.o bi- -hi al- h.aqq fa- 'akhadhtu -hum fa- kayfa kaana ciqaab -i
wa- ka- dhaalika h.aqqat kalimah rabb -ka calaa 'alladhena kafaro 'anna -hum as.h.aab an- naar

'alladhena yah.milon al- carsh wa- man h.awla -hu yusabbih.on bi- h.amd rabb -him wa- yu'minon bi- -hi wa- yastaghfiron li- 'alladhe 'aamano rabb -naa wasicat kull shay' rah.mah wa- cilm(an) fa- ighfir li- 'alladhena taabo wa- ittabaco sabel -ka wa- qi -him cadhaab al- jah.em
rabb -naa wa- adkhil -hum jannaat cadn 'allate wacadta -hum wa- man s.alah.a min 'aabaa' -him wa- azwaaj -him wa- dhurreyaat -him 'inna -ka 'anta al- cazez al- h.akem
wa- qi -him as- sayyi'aat wa- man taqi as- sayyi'aat yawma'idhin fa- qad rah.imta -hu wa- dhaalika huwa al- fawz al- caz.em
'inna 'alladhena kafaro yunaadawn la- maqt 'allaah akbar min maqt -kum anfus -kum 'idh tudcawn 'ilaa al- 'emaan fa- takfuron
qaalo rabb -naa amatta -naa ithnatain wa- ah.yayta -naa ithnatain fa- ictarafnaa bi- dhunob -naa fa- hal 'ilaa khuroj min sabel
dhaalikum bi- 'anna -hu 'idhaa duciya 'allaah wah.d -hu kafartum wa- 'in yushrak bi- -hi tu'mino fa- al- h.ukm li- 'allaah al- caley al- kaber
huwa 'alladhe yure -kum 'aayaat -hu wa- yunazzil la- -kum min as- samaa' rizq(an) wa- maa yatadhakkar 'illaa man yuneb
fa- udco 'allaah mukhlis.en la- -hu ad- den wa- law kariha al- kaafiron
rafec ad- darajaat dho al- carsh yulqe ar- roh. min 'amr -hi calaa man yashaa' min cibaad -hi li- yundhir yawm at- talaaqi
yawm hum baarizon laa yakhfaa calaa 'allaah min -hum shay' li- man al- mulk al- yawm li- 'allaah al- waah.id al- qahhaar
al- yawm tujzaa kull nafs bi- maa kasabat laa z.ulm al- yawm 'inna 'allaah sarec al- h.isaab
wa- andhir -hum yawm al- 'aazifah 'idh al- qulob ladaa al- h.anaajir kaaz.imen maa li- az.- z.aalimen min h.amem wa- laa shafec yut.aac
yaclam khaa'inah al- acyun wa- maa tukhfe as.- s.udor
wa- 'allaah yaqd.e bi- al- h.aqq wa- 'alladhena yadcon min doni -hi laa yaqd.on bi- shay' 'inna 'allaah huwa as- samec al- baser

'a- wa- lam yasero fe al- 'ard. fa- yanz.uro kayfa kaana caaqibah 'alladhena kaano min qabli -him kaano hum ashadd min -hum qowah wa- 'aathaar(an) fe al- 'ard. fa- 'akhadha -hum 'allaah bi- dhunob -him wa- maa kaana la- -hum min 'allaah min waaqi(n)
dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum kaanat ta'te -him rusul -hum bi- al- bayyinaat fa- kafaro fa- 'akhadha -hum 'allaah 'inna -hu qawey shaded al- ciqaab
wa- la- qad arsalnaa mosaa bi- 'aayaat -naa wa- sult.aan muben
'ilaa fircawn wa- haamaan wa- qaaron fa- qaalo saah.ir kadhdhaab
fa- lammaa jaa'a -hum bi- al- h.aqq min cindi -naa qaalo uqtulo abnaa' 'alladhena 'aamano maca -hu wa- istah.yo nisaa' -hum wa- maa kayd al- kaafiren 'illaa fe d.alaal
wa- qaala fircawn dharo -ne aqtul mosaa wa- li- yadcu rabb -hu 'inni -y akhaaf 'an yubaddil den -kum 'aw 'an yuz.hir fe al- 'ard. al- fasaad
wa- qaala mosaa 'inni -y cudhtu bi- rabb -e wa- rabb -kum min kull mutakabbir laa yu'min bi- yawm al- h.isaab

wa- qaala rajul mu'min min 'aal fircawn yaktum 'emaan -hu 'a- taqtulon rajul(an) 'an yaqol rabb -e 'allaah wa- qad jaa'a -kum bi- al- bayyinaat min rabb -kum wa- 'in yaku(n) kaadhib(an) fa- calay -hi kadhib -hu wa- 'in yaku(n) s.aadiq(an) yus.ib -kum bacd. 'alladhe yacid -kum 'inna 'allaah laa yahde man huwa musrif kadhdhaab

yaa qawm -e la- -kum al- mulk al- yawm z.aahiren fe al- 'ard. fa- man yans.ur -naa min ba's 'allaah 'in jaa'a -naa qaala fircawn maa ure -kum 'illaa maa araa wa- maa ahde -kum 'illaa sabel ar- rashaad
wa- qaala 'alladhe 'aamana yaa qawm -e 'inni -y akhaaf calay -kum mithl yawm al- ah.zaab
mithl da'b qawm noh. wa- caad wa- thamod wa- 'alladhena min bacdi -him wa- maa 'allaah yured z.ulm(an) li- al- cibaad
wa- yaa qawm -e 'inni -y akhaaf calay -kum yawm at- tanaadi
yawm tuwallon mudbiren maa la- -kum min 'allaah min caas.im wa- man yud.lil 'allaah fa- maa la- -hu min haadi(n)

wa- la- qad jaa'a -kum yosuf min qablu bi- al- bayyinaat fa- maa ziltum fe shakk min maa jaa'a -kum bi- -hi h.attaa 'idhaa halaka qultum lan yabcath 'allaah min bacdi -hi rasol(an) ka- dhaalika yud.ill 'allaah man huwa musrif murtaab
'alladhena yujaadilon fe 'aayaat 'allaah bi- ghayr sult.aan 'ataa -hum kabura maqt(an) cinda 'allaah wa- cinda 'alladhena 'aamano ka- dhaalika yat.bac 'allaah calaa kull qalb mutakabbir jabbaar
wa- qaala fircawn yaa haamaan ibni li- -y s.arh.(an) lacalli -y ablugh al- asbaab

asbaab as- samaawaat fa- at.t.alic 'ilaa 'ilaah mosaa wa- 'inni -y la- az.unn -hu kaadhib(an) wa- ka- dhaalika zuyyina li- fircawn so' camal -hi wa- s.udda can as- sabel wa- maa kayd fircawn 'illaa fe tabaab
wa- qaala 'alladhe 'aamana yaa qawm -e ittabico -ni ahdi -kum sabel ar- rashaad
yaa qawm -e 'inna-maa haadhihi al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa mataac wa- 'inna al- 'aakhirah hiya daar al- qaraar
man camila sayyi'ah fa- laa yujzaa 'illaa mithl -haa wa- man camila s.aalih.(an) min dhakar 'aw 'unthaa wa- huwa mu'min fa- 'olaa'ika yadkhulon al- jannah yurzaqon fe -haa bi- ghayr h.isaab
wa- yaa qawm -e maa li- -y adco -kum 'ilaa an- najaah wa- tadcon -ne 'ilaa an- naar
tadcon -ne li- akfur bi- 'allaah wa- ushrik bi- -hi maa laysa li- -y bi- -hi cilm wa- 'anaa adco -kum 'ilaa al- cazez al- ghaffaar
laa jaram 'anna maa tadcon -ne 'ilay -hi laysa la- -hu dacwah fe ad- dunyaa wa- laa fe al- 'aakhirah wa- 'anna maradd -naa 'ilaa 'allaah wa- 'anna al- musrifen hum as.h.aab an- naar
fa- sa- tadhkuron maa aqol la- -kum wa- ufawwid. 'amr -e 'ilaa 'allaah 'inna 'allaah bas.er bi- al- cibaad
fa- waqaa -hu 'allaah sayyi'aat maa makaro wa- h.aaqa bi- 'aal fircawn so' al- cadhaab
an- naar yucrad.on calay -haa ghudow wa- cashey(an) wa- yawm taqom as- saacah adkhilo 'aal fircawn ashadd al- cadhaab
wa- 'idh yatah.aajjon fe an- naar fa- yaqol ad.- d.ucafaa' li- 'alladhena istakbaro 'in(na) -naa kunnaa la- -kum tabac(an) fa- hal 'antum mughnon can -naa nas.eb(an) min an- naar
qaala 'alladhena istakbaro 'in(na) -naa kull fe -haa 'inna 'allaah qad h.akama bayna al- cibaad
wa- qaala 'alladhena fe an- naar li- khazanah jahannam udco rabb -kum yukhaffif can -naa yawm(an) min al- cadhaab
qaalo 'a- wa- lam taku(n) ta'te -kum rusul -kum bi- al- bayyinaat qaalo balaa qaalo fa- udco wa- maa ducaa' al- kaafiren 'illaa fe d.alaal
'in(na) -naa la- nans.ur rusul -naa wa- 'alladhena 'aamano fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- yawm yaqom al- ashhaad
yawm laa yanfac az.- z.aalimen macdhirah -hum wa- la- -hum al- lacnah wa- la- -hum so' ad- daar
wa- la- qad 'aataynaa mosaa al- hudaa wa- awrathnaa bane 'israa'el al- kitaab
huda(n) wa- dhikraa li- 'ole al- albaab
fa- is.bir 'inna wacd 'allaah h.aqq wa- istaghfir li- dhanb -ka wa- sabbih. bi- h.amd rabb -ka bi- al- cashey wa- al- ibkaar
'inna 'alladhena yujaadilon fe 'aayaat 'allaah bi- ghayr sult.aan 'ataa -hum 'in fe s.udor -him 'illaa kibr maa hum bi- baalighe -hi fa- istacidh bi- 'allaah 'inna -hu huwa as- samec al- baser
la- khalq as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. akbar min khalq an- naas wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yaclamon
wa- maa yastawe al- acmaa wa- al- bas.er wa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat wa- laa al- muse' qalel(an) maa tatadhakkaron
'inna as- saacah la- 'aatiyah laa rayb fe -haa wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yu'minon
wa- qaala rabb -kum udco -ne astajib la- -kum 'inna 'alladhena yastakbiron can cibaadah -e sa- yadkhulon jahannam daakhilen
'allaah 'alladhe jacala la- -kum al- layl li- taskuno fe -hi wa- an- nahaar mubs.ir(an) 'inna 'allaah la- dho fad.l calaa an- naas wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yashkuron
dhaalikum 'allaah rabb -kum khaaliq kull shay' laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa fa- 'annaa tu'fakon
ka- dhaalika yu'fak 'alladhena kaano bi- 'aayaat 'allaah yajh.adon

'allaah 'alladhe jacala la- -kum al- 'ard. qaraar(an) wa- as- samaa' binaa' wa- s.awwara -kum fa- ah.sana s.uwar -kum wa- razaqa -kum min at.- t.ayyibaat dhaalikum 'allaah rabb -kum fa- tabaaraka 'allaah rabb al- caalamen
huwa al- h.ayy laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa fa- udco -hu mukhlis.en la- -hu ad- den al- h.amd li- 'allaah rabb al- caalamen
qul 'inni -y nuhetu 'an acbud 'alladhena tadcon min doni 'allaah lammaa jaa'a -ne al- bayyinaat min rabb -e wa- 'umirtu 'an uslim li- rabb al- caalamen

huwa 'alladhe khalaqa -kum min turaab thumma min nut.fah thumma min calaqah thumma yukhrij -kum t.ifl(an) thumma li- tablugho ashudd -kum thumma li- takono shuyokh(an) wa- min -kum man yutawaffaa min qablu wa- li- tablugho 'ajal(an) musamma(n) wa- lacalla -kum tacqilon
huwa 'alladhe yuh.ye wa- yumet fa- 'idhaa qad.aa 'amr(an) fa- 'inna-maa yaqol la- -hu kun fa- yakon
'a- lam tara 'ilaa 'alladhena yujaadilon fe 'aayaat 'allaah 'annaa yus.rafon
'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- al- kitaab wa- bi- maa arsalnaa bi- -hi rusul -naa fa- sawfa yaclamon
'idh al- aghlaal fe acnaaq -him wa- as- salaasil yush.abon
fe al- h.amem thumma fe an- naar yusjaron
thumma qela la- -hum 'ayna-maa kuntum tushrikon
min doni 'allaah qaalo d.allo can -naa bal lam nakun nadco min qablu shay'(an) ka- dhaalika yud.ill 'allaah al- kaafiren
dhaalikum bi- maa kuntum tafrah.on fe al- 'ard. bi- ghayr al- h.aqq wa- bi- maa kuntum tamrah.on
udkhulo abwaab jahannam khaaliden fe -haa fa- bi's mathwa(n) al- mutakabbiren
fa- is.bir 'inna wacd 'allaah h.aqq fa- 'immaa nuriyanna -ka bacd. 'alladhe nacid -hum 'aw natawaffayanna -ka fa- 'ilay -naa yurjacon

wa- la- qad arsalnaa rusul(an) min qabli -ka min -hum man qas.as.naa calay -ka wa- min -hum man lam naqs.us. calay -ka wa- maa kaana li- rasol 'an ya'tiya bi- 'aayah 'illaa bi- 'idhn 'allaah fa- 'idhaa jaa'a 'amr 'allaah qud.iya bi- al- h.aqq wa- khasira hunaalika al- mubt.ilon
'allaah 'alladhe jacala la- -kum al- ancaam li- tarkabo min -haa wa- min -haa ta'kulon
wa- la- -kum fe -haa manaafic wa- li- tablugho calay -haa h.aajah fe s.udor -kum wa- calay -haa wa- calaa al- fulk tuh.malon
wa- yure -kum 'aayaat -hi fa- 'ayy 'aayaat 'allaah tunkiron

'a- fa- lam yasero fe al- 'ard. fa- yanz.uro kayfa kaana caaqibah 'alladhena min qabli -him kaano akthar min -hum wa- ashadd qowah wa- 'aathaar(an) fe al- 'ard. fa- maa aghnaa can -hum maa kaano yaksibon
fa- lammaa jaa'at -hum rusul -hum bi- al- bayyinaat farih.o bi- maa cinda -hum min al- cilm wa- h.aaqa bi- -him maa kaano bi- -hi yastahzi'on
fa- lammaa ra'aw ba's -naa qaalo 'aamannaa bi- 'allaah wah.d -hu wa- kafarnaa bi- maa kunnaa bi- -hi mushriken
fa- lam yaku(n) yanfac -hum 'emaan -hum lammaa ra'aw ba's -naa sunnah 'allaah 'allate qad khalat fe cibaad -hi wa- khasira hunaalika al- kaafiron
h.aa'-mem
tanzel min ar- rah.maan ar- rah.em
kitaab fus.s.ilat 'aayaat -hu qur'aan(an) carabey(an) li- qawm yaclamon
basher(an) wa- nadher(an) fa- acrad.a akthar -hum fa- hum laa yasmacon
wa- qaalo qulob -naa fe akinnah min maa tadco -naa 'ilay -hi wa- fe 'aadhaan -naa waqr wa- min bayni -naa wa- bayni -ka h.ijaab fa- icmal 'inna -naa caamilon
qul 'inna-maa 'anaa bashar mithl -kum yoh.aa 'ilay -ya 'anna-maa 'ilaah -kum 'ilaah waah.id fa- istaqemo 'ilay -hi wa- istaghfiro -hu wa- wayl li- al- mushriken
'alladhena laa yu'ton az- zakaah wa- hum bi- al- 'aakhirah hum kaafiron
'inna 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat la- -hum 'ajr ghayr mamnon
qul 'a- 'inna -kum la- takfuron bi- 'alladhe khalaqa al- 'ard. fe yawmain wa- tajcalon la- -hu andaad(an) dhaalika rabb al- caalamen
wa- jacala fe -haa rawaasiya min fawqi -haa wa- baaraka fe -haa wa- qaddara fe -haa aqwaat -haa fe arbacah ayyaam sawaa' li- as- saa'ilen
thumma istawaa 'ilaa as- samaa' wa- hiya dukhaan fa- qaala la- -haa wa- li- al- 'ard. i'tiyaa t.awc(an) 'aw karh(an) qaalataa 'ataynaa t.aa'icen
fa- qad.aa -hunna sabc samaawaat fe yawmain wa- awh.aa fe kull samaa' 'amr -haa wa- zayyannaa as- samaa' ad- dunyaa bi- mas.aabeh. wa- h.ifz.(an) dhaalika taqder al- cazez al- calem
fa- 'in acrad.o fa- qul andhartu -kum s.aaciqah mithl s.aaciqah caadi(n) wa- thamod
'idh jaa'at -hum ar- rusul min bayni ayde -him wa- min khalfi -him 'an laa tacbudo 'illaa 'allaah qaalo law shaa'a rabb -naa la- anzala malaa'ikah fa- 'in(na) -naa bi- maa ursiltum bi- -hi kaafiron

fa- 'ammaa caadi(n) fa- istakbaro fe al- 'ard. bi- ghayr al- h.aqq wa- qaalo man ashadd min -naa qowah 'a- wa- lam yaraw 'anna 'allaah 'alladhe khalaqa -hum huwa ashadd min -hum qowah wa- kaano bi- 'aayaat -naa yajh.adon
fa- arsalnaa calay -him reh.(an) s.ars.ar(an) fe ayyaam nah.isaat li- nudheq -hum cadhaab al- khizy fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- la- cadhaab al- 'aakhirah akhzaa wa- hum laa yuns.aron
wa- 'ammaa thamod fa- hadaynaa -hum fa- istah.abbo al- camaa calaa al- hudaa fa- 'akhadhat -hum s.aaciqah al- cadhaab al- hon bi- maa kaano yaksibon
wa- najjaynaa 'alladhena 'aamano wa- kaano yattaqon
wa- yawm yuh.shar acdaa' 'allaah 'ilaa an- naar fa- hum yozacon
h.attaa 'idhaa maa jaa'o -haa shahida calay -him samc -hum wa- abs.aar -hum wa- julod -hum bi- maa kaano yacmalon
wa- qaalo li- julod -him li- ma(a) shahidtum calay -naa qaalo ant.aqa -naa 'allaah 'alladhe ant.aqa kull shay' wa- huwa khalaqa -kum 'awwal marrah wa- 'ilay -hi turjacon
wa- maa kuntum tastatiron 'an yashhad calay -kum samc -kum wa- laa abs.aar -kum wa- laa julod -kum wa- laakin z.anantum 'anna 'allaah laa yaclam kather(an) min maa tacmalon
wa- dhaalikum z.ann -kum 'alladhe z.anantum bi- rabb -kum ardaa -kum fa- as.bah.tum min al- khaasiren
fa- 'in yas.biro fa- an- naar mathwa(n) la- -hum wa- 'in yastactibo fa- maa hum min al- muctaben

wa- qayyad.naa la- -hum quranaa' fa- zayyano la- -hum maa bayna ayde -him wa- maa khalf -hum wa- h.aqqa calay -him al- qawl fe 'umam qad khalat min qabli -him min al- jinn wa- al- 'ins 'inna -hum kaano khaasiren
wa- qaala 'alladhena kafaro laa tasmaco li- haadhaa al- qur'aan wa- ilghaw fe -hi lacalla -kum taghlibon
fa- la- nudheqanna 'alladhena kafaro cadhaab(an) shaded(an) wa- la- najziyanna -hum aswa' 'alladhe kaano yacmalon
dhaalika jazaa' acdaa' 'allaah an- naar la- -hum fe -haa daar al- khuld jazaa' bi- maa kaano bi- 'aayaat -naa yajh.adon
wa- qaala 'alladhena kafaro rabb -naa ari -naa 'alladhaini ad.allaa -naa min al- jinn wa- al- 'ins najcal -humaa tah.ta aqdaam -naa li- yakonaa min al- asfalen
'inna 'alladhena qaalo rabb -naa 'allaah thumma istaqaamo tatanazzal calay -him al- malaa'ikah 'an laa takhaafo wa- laa tah.zano wa- abshiro bi- al- jannah 'allate kuntum tocadon
nah.nu awliyaa' -kum fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- fe al- 'aakhirah wa- la- -kum fe -haa maa tashtahe anfus -kum wa- la- -kum fe -haa maa taddacon
nuzul(an) min ghafor rah.em
wa- man ah.san qawl(an) min man dacaa 'ilaa 'allaah wa- camila s.aalih.(an) wa- qaala 'inni -y min al- muslimen
wa- laa tastawe al- h.asanah wa- laa as- sayyi'ah idfac bi- 'allate hiya ah.san fa- 'idhaa 'alladhe bayna -ka wa- bayna -hu cadaawah ka-'anna -hu waley h.amem
wa- maa yulaqqaa -haa 'illaa 'alladhena s.abaro wa- maa yulaqqaa -haa 'illaa dho h.az.z. caz.em
wa- 'immaa yanzaghanna -ka min ash- shayt.aan nazgh fa- istacidh bi- 'allaah 'inna -hu huwa as- samec al- calem
wa- min 'aayaat -hi al- layl wa- an- nahaar wa- ash- shams wa- al- qamar laa tasjudo li- ash- shams wa- laa li- al- qamar wa- usjudo li- 'allaah 'alladhe khalaqa -hunna 'in kuntum 'eyaa -hu tacbudon
fa- 'in istakbaro fa- 'alladhena cinda rabb -ka yusabbih.on la- -hu bi- al- layl wa- an- nahaar wa- hum laa yas'amon
wa- min 'aayaat -hi 'anna -ka taraa al- 'ard. khaashicah fa- 'idhaa anzalnaa calay -haa al- maa' ihtazzat wa- rabat 'inna 'alladhe ah.yaa -haa la- muh.ye al- mawtaa 'inna -hu calaa kull shay' qader
'inna 'alladhena yulh.idon fe 'aayaat -naa laa yakhfawn calay -naa 'a- fa- man yulqaa fe an- naar khayr 'am man ya'te 'aamin(an) yawm al- qiyaamah icmalo maa shi'tum 'inna -hu bi- maa tacmalon bas.er
'inna 'alladhena kafaro bi- adh- dhikr lammaa jaa'a -hum wa- 'inna -hu la- kitaab cazez
laa ya'te -hi al- baat.il min bayni yadai -hi wa- laa min khalf -hi tanzel min h.akem h.amed
maa yuqaal la- -ka 'illaa maa qad qela li- ar- rusul min qabli -ka 'inna rabb -ka la- dho maghfirah wa- dho ciqaab 'alem

wa- law jacalnaa -hu qur'aan(an) acjamey(an) la- qaalo law-laa fus.s.ilat 'aayaat -hu 'a- acjamey wa- carabey qul huwa li- 'alladhena 'aamano huda(n) wa- shifaa' wa- 'alladhena laa yu'minon fe 'aadhaan -him waqr wa- huwa calay -him cama(n) 'olaa'ika yunaadawn min makaan baced
wa- la- qad 'aataynaa mosaa al- kitaab fa- ikhtulifa fe -hi wa- law-laa kalimah sabaqat min rabb -ka la- qud.iya bayna -hum wa- 'inna -hum la- fe shakk min -hu mureb
man camila s.aalih.(an) fa- li- nafs -hi wa- man asaa'a fa- calay -haa wa- maa rabb -ka bi- z.allaam li- al- cabed

'ilay -hi yuradd cilm as- saacah wa- maa takhruj min thamaraat min akmaam -haa wa- maa tah.mil min 'unthaa wa- laa tad.ac 'illaa bi- cilm -hi wa- yawm yunaade -him 'ayna shurakaa' -e qaalo 'aadhannaa -ka maa min -naa min shahed
wa- d.alla can -hum maa kaano yadcon min qablu wa- z.anno maa la- -hum min mah.es.
laa yas'am al- 'insaan min ducaa' al- khayr wa- 'in massa -hu ash- sharr fa- ya'os qanot.

wa- la- 'in adhaqnaa -hu rah.mah min -naa min bacdi d.arraa' massat -hu la- yaqolanna haadhaa li- -y wa- maa az.unn as- saacah qaa'imah wa- la- 'in rujictu 'ilaa rabb -e 'inna li- -y cinda -hu al- h.usnaa fa- la- nunabbi'anna 'alladhena kafaro bi- maa camilo wa- la- nudheqanna -hum min cadhaab ghalez.
wa- 'idhaa ancamnaa calaa al- 'insaan acrad.a wa- na'aa bi- jaanib -hi wa- 'idhaa massa -hu ash- sharr fa- dho ducaa' cared.
qul 'a- ra'aytum 'in kaana min cindi 'allaah thumma kafartum bi- -hi man ad.alla min man huwa fe shiqaaq baced
sa- nure -him 'aayaat -naa fe al- 'aafaaq wa- fe anfus -him h.attaa yatabayyan la- -hum 'anna -hu al- h.aqq 'a- wa- lam yakfi bi- rabb -ka 'anna -hu calaa kull shay' shahed
'a-laa 'inna -hum fe miryah min liqaa' rabb -hum 'a-laa 'inna -hu bi- kull shay' muh.et.
h.aa'-mem
cayn-sen-qaaf
ka- dhaalika yoh.e 'ilay -ka wa- 'ilaa 'alladhena min qabli -ka 'allaah al- cazez al- h.akem
la- -hu maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- huwa al- caley al- caz.em
takaad as- samaawaat yatafat.t.arna min fawqi -hinna wa- al- malaa'ikah yusabbih.on bi- h.amd rabb -him wa- yastaghfiron li- man fe al- 'ard. 'a-laa 'inna 'allaah huwa al- ghafor ar- rah.em
wa- 'alladhena ittakhadho min doni -hi awliyaa' 'allaah h.afez. calay -him wa- maa 'anta calay -him bi- wakel
wa- ka- dhaalika awh.aynaa 'ilay -ka qur'aan(an) carabey(an) li- tundhir 'umm al- quraa wa- man h.awla -haa wa- tundhir yawm al- jamc laa rayb fe -hi fareq fe al- jannah wa- fareq fe as- sacer
wa- law shaa'a 'allaah la- jacala -hum 'ummah waah.idah wa- laakin yudkhil man yashaa' fe rah.mah -hi wa- az.- z.aalimon maa la- -hum min waley wa- laa nas.er
'am ittakhadho min doni -hi awliyaa' fa- 'allaah huwa al- waley wa- huwa yuh.ye al- mawtaa wa- huwa calaa kull shay' qader
wa- maa ikhtalaftum fe -hi min shay' fa- h.ukm -hu 'ilaa 'allaah dhaalikum 'allaah rabb -e calay -hi tawakkaltu wa- 'ilay -hi uneb
faat.ir as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. jacala la- -kum min anfus -kum azwaaj(an) wa- min al- ancaam azwaaj(an) yadhra' -kum fe -hi laysa ka- mithl -hi shay' wa- huwa as- samec al- bas.er
la- -hu maqaaled as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. yabsut. ar- rizq li- man yashaa' wa- yaqdir 'inna -hu bi- kull shay' calem

sharaca la- -kum min ad- den maa was.s.aa bi- -hi noh.(an) wa- 'alladhe awh.aynaa 'ilay -ka wa- maa was.s.aynaa bi- -hi 'ibraahem wa- mosaa wa- cesaa 'an aqemo ad- den wa- laa tatafarraqo fe -hi kabura calaa al- mushriken maa tadco -hum 'ilay -hi 'allaah yajtabe 'ilay -hi man yashaa' wa- yahde 'ilay -hi man yuneb

wa- maa tafarraqo 'illaa min bacdi maa jaa'a -hum al- cilm baghy(an) bayna -hum wa- law-laa kalimah sabaqat min rabb -ka 'ilaa 'ajal musamma(n) la- qud.iya bayna -hum wa- 'inna 'alladhena oritho al- kitaab min bacdi -him la- fe shakk min -hu mureb

fa- li- dhaalika fa- udcu wa- istaqim ka-maa 'umirta wa- laa tattabic ahwaa' -hum wa- qul 'aamantu bi- maa anzala 'allaah min kitaab wa- 'umirtu li- acdil bayna -kum 'allaah rabb -naa wa- rabb -kum la- -naa acmaal -naa wa- la- -kum acmaal -kum laa h.ujjah bayna -naa wa- bayna -kum 'allaah yajmac bayna -naa wa- 'ilay -hi al- mas.er
wa- 'alladhena yuh.aajjon fe 'allaah min bacdi maa ustujeba la- -hu h.ujjah -hum daah.id.ah cinda rabb -him wa- calay -him ghad.ab wa- la- -hum cadhaab shaded
'allaah 'alladhe anzala al- kitaab bi- al- h.aqq wa- al- mezaan wa- maa yudre -ka lacalla as- saacah qareb
yastacjil bi- -haa 'alladhena laa yu'minon bi- -haa wa- 'alladhena 'aamano mushfiqon min -haa wa- yaclamon 'anna -haa al- h.aqq 'a-laa 'inna 'alladhena yumaaron fe as- saacah la- fe d.alaal baced
'allaah lat.ef bi- cibaad -hi yarzuq man yashaa' wa- huwa al- qawey al- cazez
man kaana yured h.arth al- 'aakhirah nazid la- -hu fe h.arth -hi wa- man kaana yured h.arth ad- dunyaa nu'ti -hi min -haa wa- maa la- -hu fe al- 'aakhirah min nas.eb
'am la- -hum shurakaa' sharaco la- -hum min ad- den maa lam ya'dhan bi- -hi 'allaah wa- law-laa kalimah al- fas.l la- qud.iya bayna -hum wa- 'inna az.- z.aalimen la- -hum cadhaab 'alem

taraa az.- z.aalimen mushfiqen min maa kasabo wa- huwa waaqic bi- -him wa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat fe rawd.aat al- jannaat la- -hum maa yashaa'on cinda rabb -him dhaalika huwa al- fad.l al- kaber

dhaalika 'alladhe yubashshir 'allaah cibaad -hu 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat qul laa as'al -kum calay -hi 'ajr(an) 'illaa al- mawaddah fe al- qurbaa wa- man yaqtarif h.asanah nazid la- -hu fe -haa h.usn(an) 'inna 'allaah ghafor shakor
'am yaqolon iftaraa calaa 'allaah kadhib(an) fa- 'in yasha' 'allaah yakhtim calaa qalb -ka wa- yamh.u 'allaah al- baat.il wa- yuh.iqq al- h.aqq bi- kalimaat -hi 'inna -hu calem bi- dhaat as.- s.udor
wa- huwa 'alladhe yaqbal at- tawbah can cibaad -hi wa- yacfo can as- sayyi'aat wa- yaclam maa tafcalon
wa- yastajeb 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat wa- yazed -hum min fad.l -hi wa- al- kaafiron la- -hum cadhaab shaded
wa- law basat.a 'allaah ar- rizq li- cibaad -hi la- baghaw fe al- 'ard. wa- laakin yunazzil bi- qadar maa yashaa' 'inna -hu bi- cibaad -hi khaber bas.er
wa- huwa 'alladhe yunazzil al- ghayth min bacdi maa qanat.o wa- yanshur rah.mah -hi wa- huwa al- waley al- h.amed
wa- min 'aayaat -hi khalq as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa baththa fe -himaa min daabbah wa- huwa calaa jamc -him 'idhaa yashaa' qader
wa- maa as.aaba -kum min mus.ebah fa- bi- maa kasabat ayde -kum wa- yacfo can kather
wa- maa 'antum bi- mucjizen fe al- 'ard. wa- maa la- -kum min doni 'allaah min waley wa- laa nas.er
wa- min 'aayaat -hi al- jawaar fe al- bah.r ka- al- aclaam
'in yasha' yuskin ar- reh. fa- yaz.lalna rawaakid calaa z.ahr -hi 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- kull s.abbaar shakor
'aw yobiq -hunna bi- maa kasabo wa- yacfu can kather
wa- yaclam 'alladhena yujaadilon fe 'aayaat -naa maa la- -hum min mah.es.
fa- maa 'otetum min shay' fa- mataac al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- maa cinda 'allaah khayr wa- abqaa li- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- calaa rabb -him yatawakkalon
wa- 'alladhena yajtanibon kabaa'ir al- 'ithm wa- al- fawaah.ish wa- 'idhaa maa ghad.ibo hum yaghfiron
wa- 'alladhena istajaabo li- rabb -him wa- aqaamo as.- s.alaah wa- 'amr -hum shoraa bayna -hum wa- min maa razaqnaa -hum yunfiqon
wa- 'alladhena 'idhaa as.aaba -hum al- baghy hum yantas.iron
wa- jazaa' sayyi'ah sayyi'ah mithl -haa fa- man cafaa wa- as.lah.a fa- 'ajr -hu calaa 'allaah 'inna -hu laa yuh.ibb az.- z.aalimen
wa- la- man intas.ara bacda z.ulm -hi fa- 'olaa'ika maa calay -him min sabel
'inna-maa as- sabel calaa 'alladhena yaz.limon an- naas wa- yabghon fe al- 'ard. bi- ghayr al- h.aqq 'olaa'ika la- -hum cadhaab 'alem
wa- la- man s.abara wa- ghafara 'inna dhaalika la- min cazm al- 'umor
wa- man yud.lil 'allaah fa- maa la- -hu min waley min bacdi -hi wa- taraa az.- z.aalimen lammaa ra'aw al- cadhaab yaqolon hal 'ilaa maradd min sabel

wa- taraa -hum yucrad.on calay -haa khaashicen min adh- dhull yanz.uron min t.arf khafey wa- qaala 'alladhena 'aamano 'inna al- khaasiren 'alladhena khasiro anfus -hum wa- 'ahle -him yawm al- qiyaamah 'a-laa 'inna az.- z.aalimen fe cadhaab muqem
wa- maa kaana la- -hum min awliyaa' yans.uron -hum min doni 'allaah wa- man yud.lil 'allaah fa- maa la- -hu min sabel
istajebo li- rabb -kum min qabli 'an ya'tiya yawm laa maradd la- -hu min 'allaah maa la- -kum min malja'(an) yawma'idhin wa- maa la- -kum min naker

fa- 'in acrad.o fa- maa arsalnaa -ka calay -him h.afez.(an) 'in calay -ka 'illaa al- balaagh wa- 'in(na) -naa 'idhaa adhaqnaa al- 'insaan min -naa rah.mah farih.a bi- -haa wa- 'in tus.ib -hum sayyi'ah bi- maa qaddamat ayde -him fa- 'inna al- 'insaan kafor
li- 'allaah mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. yakhluq maa yashaa' yahab li- man yashaa' 'inaath(an) wa- yahab li- man yashaa' adh- dhukor
'aw yuzawwij -hum dhukraan(an) wa- 'inaath(an) wa- yajcal man yashaa' caqem(an) 'inna -hu calem qader
wa- maa kaana li- bashar 'an yukallim -hu 'allaah 'illaa wah.y(an) 'aw min waraa'i h.ijaab 'aw yursil rasol(an) fa- yoh.e bi- 'idhn -hi maa yashaa' 'inna -hu caley h.akem

wa- ka- dhaalika awh.aynaa 'ilay -ka roh.(an) min 'amr -naa maa kunta tadre maa al- kitaab wa- laa al- 'emaan wa- laakin jacalnaa -hu nor(an) nahde bi- -hi man nashaa' min cibaad -naa wa- 'inna -ka la- tahde 'ilaa s.iraat. mustaqem
s.iraat. 'allaah 'alladhe la- -hu maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. 'a-laa 'ilaa 'allaah tas.er al- 'umor
h.aa'-mem
wa- al- kitaab al- muben
'in(na) -naa jacalnaa -hu qur'aan(an) carabey(an) lacalla -kum tacqilon
wa- 'inna -hu fe 'umm al- kitaab laday -naa la- caley h.akem
'a- fa- nad.rib can -kum adh- dhikr s.afh.(an) 'an kuntum qawm(an) musrifen
wa- kam arsalnaa min nabey fe al- 'awwalen
wa- maa ya'te -him min nabey 'illaa kaano bi- -hi yastahzi'on
fa- ahlaknaa ashadd min -hum bat.sh(an) wa- mad.aa mathal al- 'awwalen
wa- la- 'in sa'alta -hum man khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. la- yaqolunna khalaqa -hunna al- cazez al- calem
'alladhe jacala la- -kum al- 'ard. mahd(an) wa- jacala la- -kum fe -haa subul(an) lacalla -kum tahtadon
wa- 'alladhe nazzala min as- samaa' maa' bi- qadar fa- ansharnaa bi- -hi baldah mayt(an) ka- dhaalika tukhrajon
wa- 'alladhe khalaqa al- azwaaj kull -haa wa- jacala la- -kum min al- fulk wa- al- ancaam maa tarkabon
li- tastawo calaa z.uhor -hi thumma tadhkuro nicmah rabb -kum 'idhaa istawaytum calay -hi wa- taqolo subh.aana 'alladhe sakhkhara la- -naa haadhaa wa- maa kunnaa la- -hu muqrinen
wa- 'in(na) -naa 'ilaa rabb -naa la- munqalibon
wa- jacalo la- -hu min cibaad -hi juz'(an) 'inna al- 'insaan la- kafor muben
'am ittakhadha min maa yakhluq banaat wa- as.faa -kum bi- al- banen
wa- 'idhaa bushshira 'ah.ad -hum bi- maa d.araba li- ar- rah.maan mathal(an) z.alla wajh -hu muswadd(an) wa- huwa kaz.em
'a- wa- man yunashsha' fe al- h.ilyah wa- huwa fe al- khis.aam ghayr muben
wa- jacalo al- malaa'ikah 'alladhena hum cibaad ar- rah.maan 'inaath(an) 'a- shahido khalq -hum sa- tuktab shahaadah -hum wa- yus'alon
wa- qaalo law shaa'a ar- rah.maan maa cabadnaa -hum maa la- -hum bi- dhaalika min cilm 'in hum 'illaa yakhrus.on
'am 'aataynaa -hum kitaab(an) min qabli -hi fa- hum bi- -hi mustamsikon
bal qaalo 'in(na) -naa wajadnaa 'aabaa' -naa calaa 'ummah wa- 'in(na) -naa calaa 'aathaar -him muhtadon
wa- ka- dhaalika maa arsalnaa min qabli -ka fe qaryah min nadher 'illaa qaala mutrafo -haa 'in(na) -naa wajadnaa 'aabaa' -naa calaa 'ummah wa- 'in(na) -naa calaa 'aathaar -him muqtadon
qaala 'a- wa- law ji'tu -kum bi- ahdaa min maa wajadtum calay -hi 'aabaa' -kum qaalo 'in(na) -naa bi- maa ursiltum bi- -hi kaafiron
fa- intaqamnaa min -hum fa- unz.ur kayfa kaana caaqibah al- mukadhdhiben
wa- 'idh qaala 'ibraahem li- 'abe -hi wa- qawm -hi 'inna -ne baraa' min maa tacbudon
'illaa 'alladhe fat.ara -ne fa- 'inna -hu sa- yahde -ni
wa- jacala -haa kalimah baaqiyah fe caqib -hi lacalla -hum yarjicon
bal mattactu haa'ulaa'i wa- 'aabaa' -hum h.attaa jaa'a -hum al- h.aqq wa- rasol muben
wa- lammaa jaa'a -hum al- h.aqq qaalo haadhaa sih.r wa- 'in(na) -naa bi- -hi kaafiron
wa- qaalo law-laa nuzzila haadhaa al- qur'aan calaa rajul min al- qaryatain caz.em

'a- -hum yaqsimon rah.mah rabb -ka nah.nu qasamnaa bayna -hum maceshah -hum fe al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- rafacnaa bacd. -hum fawqa bacd. darajaat li- yattakhidh bacd. -hum bacd.(an) sukhrey(an) wa- rah.mah rabb -ka khayr min maa yajmacon
wa- law-laa 'an yakon an- naas 'ummah waah.idah la- jacalnaa li- man yakfur bi- ar- rah.maan li- buyot -him suquf(an) min fid.d.ah wa- macaarij calay -haa yaz.haron
wa- li- buyot -him abwaab(an) wa- surur(an) calay -haa yattaki'on
wa- zukhruf(an) wa- 'in kull dhaalika lammaa mataac al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa wa- al- 'aakhirah cinda rabb -ka li- al- muttaqen
wa- man yacshu can dhikr ar- rah.maan nuqayyid. la- -hu shayt.aan(an) fa- huwa la- -hu qaren
wa- 'inna -hum la- yas.uddon -hum can as- sabel wa- yah.sabon 'anna -hum muhtadon
h.attaa 'idhaa jaa'a -naa qaala yaa layta bayni -y wa- bayna -ka bucd al- mashriqain fa- bi's al- qaren
wa- lan yanfac -kum al- yawm 'idh z.alamtum 'anna -kum fe al- cadhaab mushtarikon
'a- fa- 'anta tusmic as.- s.umm 'aw tahde al- cumyaa wa- man kaana fe d.alaal muben
fa- 'immaa nadhhabanna bi- -ka fa- 'in(na) -naa min -hum muntaqimon
'aw nuriyanna -ka 'alladhe wacadnaa -hum fa- 'in(na) -naa calay -him muqtadiron
fa- istamsik bi- 'alladhe oh.iya 'ilay -ka 'inna -ka calaa s.iraat. mustaqem
wa- 'inna -hu la- dhikr la- -ka wa- li- qawm -ka wa- sawfa tus'alon
wa- is'al man arsalnaa min qabli -ka min rusul -naa 'a- jacalnaa min doni ar- rah.maan 'aalihah yucbadon
wa- la- qad arsalnaa mosaa bi- 'aayaat -naa 'ilaa fircawn wa- mala' -hi fa- qaala 'inni -y rasol rabb al- caalamen
fa- lammaa jaa'a -hum bi- 'aayaat -naa 'idhaa hum min -haa yad.h.akon
wa- maa nure -him min 'aayah 'illaa hiya akbar min 'ukht -haa wa- 'akhadhnaa -hum bi- al- cadhaab lacalla -hum yarjicon
wa- qaalo yaa 'ayyuha(a) as- saah.ir udcu la- -naa rabb -ka bi- maa cahida cinda -ka 'in(na) -naa la- muhtadon
fa- lammaa kashafnaa can -hum al- cadhaab 'idhaa hum yankuthon
wa- naadaa fircawn fe qawm -hi qaala yaa qawm -e 'a- laysa li- -y mulk mis.r wa- haadhihi al- anhaar tajre min tah.ti -y 'a- fa- laa tubs.iron
'am 'anaa khayr min haadhaa 'alladhe huwa mahen wa- laa yakaad yuben
fa- law-laa ulqiya calay -hi aswirah min dhahab 'aw jaa'a maca -hu al- malaa'ikah muqtarinen
fa- istakhaffa qawm -hu fa- at.aaco -hu 'inna -hum kaano qawm(an) faasiqen
fa- lammaa 'aasafo -naa intaqamnaa min -hum fa- aghraqnaa -hum ajmacen
fa- jacalnaa -hum salaf(an) wa- mathal(an) li- al- 'aakhiren
wa- lammaa d.uriba ibn maryam mathal(an) 'idhaa qawm -ka min -hu yas.iddon
wa- qaalo 'a- 'aalihah -naa khayr 'am huwa maa d.arabo -hu la- -ka 'illaa jadal(an) bal hum qawm khas.imon
'in huwa 'illaa cabd ancamnaa calay -hi wa- jacalnaa -hu mathal(an) li- bane 'israa'el
wa- law nashaa' la- jacalnaa min -kum malaa'ikah fe al- 'ard. yakhlufon
wa- 'inna -hu la- cilm li- as- saacah fa- laa tamtarunna bi- -haa wa- ittabico -ni haadhaa s.iraat. mustaqem
wa- laa yas.uddanna -kum ash- shayt.aan 'inna -hu la- -kum cadow muben
wa- lammaa jaa'a cesaa bi- al- bayyinaat qaala qad ji'tu -kum bi- al- h.ikmah wa- li- ubayyin la- -kum bacd. 'alladhe takhtalifon fe -hi fa- ittaqo 'allaah wa- at.eco -ni
'inna 'allaah huwa rabb -e wa- rabb -kum fa- ucbudo -hu haadhaa s.iraat. mustaqem
fa- ikhtalafa al- ah.zaab min bayni -him fa- wayl li- 'alladhena z.alamo min cadhaab yawm 'alem
hal yanz.uron 'illaa as- saacah 'an ta'tiya -hum baghtah wa- hum laa yashcuron
al- akhillaa' yawma'idhin bacd. -hum li- bacd. cadow 'illaa al- muttaqen
yaa cibaad -i laa khawf calay -kum al- yawm wa- laa 'antum tah.zanon
'alladhena 'aamano bi- 'aayaat -naa wa- kaano muslimen
udkhulo al- jannah 'antum wa- azwaaj -kum tuh.baron
yut.aaf calay -him bi- s.ih.aaf min dhahab wa- akwaab wa- fe -haa maa tashtahe -hi al- anfus wa- taladhdh al- acyun wa- 'antum fe -haa khaalidon
wa- tilka al- jannah 'allate orithtumo -haa bi- maa kuntum tacmalon
la- -kum fe -haa faakihah katherah min -haa ta'kulon
'inna al- mujrimen fe cadhaab jahannam khaalidon
laa yufattar can -hum wa- hum fe -hi mublison
wa- maa z.alamnaa -hum wa- laakin kaano hum az.- z.aalimen
wa- naadaw yaa maalik li- yaqd.i calay -naa rabb -ka qaala 'inna -kum maakithon
la- qad ji'naa -kum bi- al- h.aqq wa- laakin akthar -kum li- al- h.aqq kaarihon
'am abramo 'amr(an) fa- 'in(na) -naa mubrimon
'am yah.sabon 'an(na) -naa laa nasmac sirr -hum wa- najwaa -hum balaa wa- rusul -naa laday -him yaktubon
qul 'in kaana li- ar- rah.maan walad fa- 'anaa 'awwal al- caabiden
subh.aana rabb as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. rabb al- carsh can maa yas.ifon
fa- dhar -hum yakhod.o wa- yalcabo h.attaa yulaaqo yawm -hum 'alladhe yocadon
wa- huwa 'alladhe fe as- samaa' 'ilaah wa- fe al- 'ard. 'ilaah wa- huwa al- h.akem al- calem
wa- tabaaraka 'alladhe la- -hu mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa wa- cinda -hu cilm as- saacah wa- 'ilay -hi turjacon
wa- laa yamlik 'alladhena yadcon min doni -hi ash- shafaacah 'illaa man shahida bi- al- h.aqq wa- hum yaclamon
wa- la- 'in sa'alta -hum man khalaqa -hum la- yaqolunna 'allaah fa- 'annaa yu'fakon
wa- qel -hi yaa rabb -i 'inna haa'ulaa'i qawm laa yu'minon
fa- is.fah. can -hum wa- qul salaam fa- sawfa yaclamon
h.aa'-mem
wa- al- kitaab al- muben
'in(na) -naa anzalnaa -hu fe laylah mubaarakah 'in(na) -naa kunnaa mundhiren
fe -haa yufraq kull 'amr h.akem
'amr(an) min cindi -naa 'in(na) -naa kunnaa mursilen
rah.mah min rabb -ka 'inna -hu huwa as- samec al- calem
rabb as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa 'in kuntum moqinen
laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa yuh.ye wa- yumet rabb -kum wa- rabb 'aabaa' -kum al- 'awwalen
bal hum fe shakk yalcabon
fa- irtaqib yawm ta'te as- samaa' bi- dukhaan muben
yaghshaa an- naas haadhaa cadhaab 'alem
rabb -naa ikshif can -naa al- cadhaab 'in(na) -naa mu'minon
'annaa la- -hum adh- dhikraa wa- qad jaa'a -hum rasol muben
thumma tawallaw can -hu wa- qaalo mucallam majnon
'in(na) -naa kaashifo al- cadhaab qalel(an) 'inna -kum caa'idon
yawm nabt.ish al- bat.shah al- kubraa 'in(na) -naa muntaqimon
wa- la- qad fatannaa qabla -hum qawm fircawn wa- jaa'a -hum rasol karem
'an 'addo 'ilay -ya cibaad 'allaah 'inni -y la- -kum rasol 'amen
wa- 'an laa taclo calaa 'allaah 'inni -y 'aate -kum bi- sult.aan muben
wa- 'inni -y cudhtu bi- rabb -e wa- rabb -kum 'an tarjumon
wa- 'in lam tu'mino li- -y fa- ictazilo -ni
fa- dacaa rabb -hu 'anna haa'ulaa'i qawm mujrimon
fa- asri bi- cibaad -e layl(an) 'inna -kum muttabacon
wa- utruk al- bah.r rahw(an) 'inna -hum jund mughraqon
kam tarako min jannaat wa- cuyon
wa- zuroc wa- maqaam karem
wa- nacmah kaano fe -haa faakihen
ka- dhaalika wa- awrathnaa -haa qawm(an) 'aakharen
fa- maa bakat calay -him as- samaa' wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa kaano munz.aren
wa- la- qad najjaynaa bane 'israa'el min al- cadhaab al- muhen
min fircawn 'inna -hu kaana caaliy(an) min al- musrifen
wa- la- qad ikhtarnaa -hum calaa cilm calaa al- caalamen
wa- 'aataynaa -hum min al- 'aayaat maa fe -hi balaa' muben
'inna haa'ulaa'i la- yaqolon
'in hiya 'illaa mawtah -naa al- 'olaa wa- maa nah.nu bi- munsharen
fa- i'to bi- 'aabaa' -naa 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
'a- -hum khayr 'am qawm tubbac wa- 'alladhena min qabli -him ahlaknaa -hum 'inna -hum kaano mujrimen
wa- maa khalaqnaa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa laaciben
maa khalaqnaa -humaa 'illaa bi- al- h.aqq wa- laakin akthar -hum laa yaclamon
'inna yawm al- fas.l meqaat -hum ajmacen
yawm laa yughne mawla(n) can mawla(n) shay'(an) wa- laa hum yuns.aron
'illaa man rah.ima 'allaah 'inna -hu huwa al- cazez ar- rah.em
'inna shajarah az- zaqqom
t.acaam al- 'athem
ka- al- muhl yaghle fe al- but.on
ka- ghaly al- h.amem
khudho -hu fa- ictilo -hu 'ilaa sawaa' al- jah.em
thumma s.ubbo fawqa ra's -hi min cadhaab al- h.amem
dhuq 'inna -ka 'anta al- cazez al- karem
'inna haadhaa maa kuntum bi- -hi tamtaron
'inna al- muttaqen fe maqaam 'amen
fe jannaat wa- cuyon
yalbison min sundus wa- istabraq mutaqaabilen
ka- dhaalika wa- zawwajnaa -hum bi- h.or cen
yadcon fe -haa bi- kull faakihah 'aaminen
laa yadhoqon fe -haa al- mawt 'illaa al- mawtah al- 'olaa wa- waqaa -hum cadhaab al- jah.em
fad.l(an) min rabb -ka dhaalika huwa al- fawz al- caz.em
fa- 'inna-maa yassarnaa -hu bi- lisaan -ka lacalla -hum yatadhakkaron
fa- irtaqib 'inna -hum murtaqibon
h.aa'-mem
tanzel al- kitaab min 'allaah al- cazez al- h.akem
'inna fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. la- 'aayaat li- al- mu'minen
wa- fe khalq -kum wa- maa yabuthth min daabbah 'aayaat li- qawm yoqinon
wa- ikhtilaaf al- layl wa- an- nahaar wa- maa anzala 'allaah min as- samaa' min rizq fa- ah.yaa bi- -hi al- 'ard. bacda mawt -haa wa- tas.ref ar- riyaah. 'aayaat li- qawm yacqilon
tilka 'aayaat 'allaah natlo -haa calay -ka bi- al- h.aqq fa- bi- 'ayy h.adeth bacda 'allaah wa- 'aayaat -hi yu'minon
wayl li- kull 'affaak 'athem
yasmac 'aayaat 'allaah tutlaa calay -hi thumma yus.irr mustakbir(an) ka-'an lam yasmac -haa fa- bashshir -hu bi- cadhaab 'alem
wa- 'idhaa calima min 'aayaat -naa shay'(an) ittakhadha -haa huzuw(an) 'olaa'ika la- -hum cadhaab muhen
min waraa'i -him jahannam wa- laa yughne can -hum maa kasabo shay'(an) wa- laa maa ittakhadho min doni 'allaah awliyaa' wa- la- -hum cadhaab caz.em
haadhaa huda(n) wa- 'alladhena kafaro bi- 'aayaat rabb -him la- -hum cadhaab min rijz 'alem
'allaah 'alladhe sakhkhara la- -kum al- bah.r li- tajriya al- fulk fe -hi bi- 'amr -hi wa- li- tabtagho min fad.l -hi wa- lacalla -kum tashkuron
wa- sakhkhara la- -kum maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. jamec(an) min -hu 'inna fe dhaalika la- 'aayaat li- qawm yatafakkaron
qul li- 'alladhena 'aamano yaghfiro li- 'alladhena laa yarjon ayyaam 'allaah li- yajziya qawm(an) bi- maa kaano yaksibon
man camila s.aalih.(an) fa- li- nafs -hi wa- man asaa'a fa- calay -haa thumma 'ilaa rabb -kum turjacon
wa- la- qad 'aataynaa bane 'israa'el al- kitaab wa- al- h.ukm wa- an- nubowah wa- razaqnaa -hum min at.- t.ayyibaat wa- fad.d.alnaa -hum calaa al- caalamen

wa- 'aataynaa -hum bayyinaat min al- 'amr fa- maa ikhtalafo 'illaa min bacdi maa jaa'a -hum al- cilm baghy(an) bayna -hum 'inna rabb -ka yaqd.e bayna -hum yawm al- qiyaamah fe maa kaano fe -hi yakhtalifon
thumma jacalnaa -ka calaa sharecah min al- 'amr fa- ittabic -haa wa- laa tattabic ahwaa' 'alladhena laa yaclamon
'inna -hum lan yughno can -ka min 'allaah shay'(an) wa- 'inna az.- z.aalimen bacd. -hum awliyaa' bacd. wa- 'allaah waley al- muttaqen
haadhaa bas.aa'ir li- an- naas wa- huda(n) wa- rah.mah li- qawm yoqinon
'am h.asiba 'alladhena ijtarah.o as- sayyi'aat 'an najcal -hum ka- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat sawaa' mah.yaa -hum wa- mamaat -hum saa'a maa yah.kumon
wa- khalaqa 'allaah as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. bi- al- h.aqq wa- li- tujzaa kull nafs bi- maa kasabat wa- hum laa yuz.lamon

'a- fa- ra'ayta man ittakhadha 'ilaah -hu hawaa -hu wa- ad.alla -hu 'allaah calaa cilm wa- khatama calaa samc -hi wa- qalb -hi wa- jacala calaa bas.ar -hi ghishaawah fa- man yahde -hi min bacdi 'allaah 'a- fa- laa tadhakkaron
wa- qaalo maa hiya 'illaa h.ayaah -naa ad- dunyaa namot wa- nah.yaa wa- maa yuhlik -naa 'illaa ad- dahr wa- maa la- -hum bi- dhaalika min cilm 'in hum 'illaa yaz.unnon
wa- 'idhaa tutlaa calay -him 'aayaat -naa bayyinaat maa kaana h.ujjah -hum 'illaa 'an qaalo i'to bi- 'aabaa' -naa 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
qul 'allaah yuh.ye -kum thumma yumet -kum thumma yajmac -kum 'ilaa yawm al- qiyaamah laa rayb fe -hi wa- laakin akthar an- naas laa yaclamon
wa- li- 'allaah mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- yawm taqom as- saacah yawma'idhin yakhsar al- mubt.ilon
wa- taraa kull 'ummah jaathiyah kull 'ummah tudcaa 'ilaa kitaab -haa al- yawm tujzawn maa kuntum tacmalon
haadhaa kitaab -naa yant.iq calay -kum bi- al- h.aqq 'in(na) -naa kunnaa nastansikh maa kuntum tacmalon
fa- 'ammaa 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat fa- yudkhil -hum rabb -hum fe rah.mah -hi dhaalika huwa al- fawz al- muben
wa- 'ammaa 'alladhena kafaro 'a- fa- lam takun 'aayaat -e tutlaa calay -kum fa- istakbartum wa- kuntum qawm(an) mujrimen
wa- 'idhaa qela 'inna wacd 'allaah h.aqq wa- as- saacah laa rayb fe -haa qultum maa nadre maa as- saacah 'in naz.unn 'illaa z.ann(an) wa- maa nah.nu bi- mustayqinen
wa- badaa la- -hum sayyi'aat maa camilo wa- h.aaqa bi- -him maa kaano bi- -hi yastahzi'on
wa- qela al- yawm nansaa -kum ka-maa nasetum liqaa' yawm -kum haadhaa wa- ma'waa -kum an- naar wa- maa la- -kum min naas.iren
dhaalikum bi- 'anna -kum ittakhadhtum 'aayaat 'allaah huzuw(an) wa- gharrat -kum al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa fa- al- yawm laa yukhrajon min -haa wa- laa hum yustactabon
fa- li- 'allaah al- h.amd rabb as- samaawaat wa- rabb al- 'ard. rabb al- caalamen
wa- la- -hu al- kibriyaa' fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- huwa al- cazez al- h.akem
h.aa'-mem
tanzel al- kitaab min 'allaah al- cazez al- h.akem
maa khalaqnaa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa 'illaa bi- al- h.aqq wa- 'ajal musamma(n) wa- 'alladhena kafaro can maa undhiro mucrid.on

qul 'a- ra'aytum maa tadcon min doni 'allaah aro -ne maa-dhaa khalaqo min al- 'ard. 'am la- -hum shirk fe as- samaawaat i'to -ne bi- kitaab min qabli haadhaa 'aw 'athaarah min cilm 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
wa- man ad.all min man yadco min doni 'allaah man laa yastajeb la- -hu 'illaa yawm al- qiyaamah wa- hum can ducaa' -him ghaafilon
wa- 'idhaa h.ushira an- naas kaano la- -hum acdaa' wa- kaano bi- cibaadah -him kaafiren
wa- 'idhaa tutlaa calay -him 'aayaat -naa bayyinaat qaala 'alladhena kafaro li- al- h.aqq lammaa jaa'a -hum haadhaa sih.r muben

'am yaqolon iftaraa -hu qul 'in iftaraytu -hu fa- laa tamlikon li- -y min 'allaah shay'(an) huwa aclam bi- maa tufed.on fe -hi kafaa bi- -hi shahed(an) bayni -y wa- bayna -kum wa- huwa al- ghafor ar- rah.em
qul maa kuntu bidc(an) min ar- rusul wa- maa adre maa yufcal bi- -y wa- laa bi- -kum 'in attabic 'illaa maa yoh.aa 'ilay -ya wa- maa 'anaa 'illaa nadher muben
qul 'a- ra'aytum 'in kaana min cindi 'allaah wa- kafartum bi- -hi wa- shahida shaahid min bane 'israa'el calaa mithl -hi fa- 'aamana wa- istakbartum 'inna 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
wa- qaala 'alladhena kafaro li- 'alladhena 'aamano law kaana khayr(an) maa sabaqo -naa 'ilay -hi wa- 'idh lam yahtado bi- -hi fa- sa- yaqolon haadhaa 'ifk qadem
wa- min qabli -hi kitaab mosaa 'imaam(an) wa- rah.mah wa- haadhaa kitaab mus.addiq lisaan(an) carabey(an) li- yundhir 'alladhena z.alamo wa- bushraa li- al- muh.sinen
'inna 'alladhena qaalo rabb -naa 'allaah thumma istaqaamo fa- laa khawf calay -him wa- laa hum yah.zanon
'olaa'ika as.h.aab al- jannah khaaliden fe -haa jazaa' bi- maa kaano yacmalon

wa- was.s.aynaa al- 'insaan bi- waalidai -hi ih.saan(an) h.amalat -hu 'umm -hu kurh(an) wa- wad.acat -hu kurh(an) wa- h.aml -hu wa- fis.aal -hu thalaathon shahr(an) h.attaa 'idhaa balagha ashudd -hu wa- balagha arbacen sanah qaala rabb -i awzic -ne 'an ashkur nicmah -ka 'allate ancamta calay -ya wa- calaa waalidai -ya wa- 'an acmal s.aalih(an) tard.aa -hu wa- as.lih. li- -y fe dhurreyah -e 'inni -y tubtu 'ilay -ka wa- 'inni -y min al- muslimen
'olaa'ika 'alladhena nataqabbal can -hum ah.san maa camilo wa- natajaawaz can sayyi'aat -him fe as.h.aab al- jannah wacd as.- s.idq 'alladhe kaano yocadon

wa- 'alladhe qaala li- waalidai -hi 'uff la- -kumaa 'a- tacidaan -ne 'an ukhraj wa- qad khalat al- quron min qabli -y wa- humaa yastaghethaan 'allaah wayl -ka 'aamin wacd 'allaah h.aqq fa- yaqol maa haadhaa 'illaa asaat.er al- 'awwalen
'olaa'ika 'alladhena h.aqqa calay -him al- qawl fe 'umam qad khalat min qabli -him min al- jinn wa- al- 'ins 'inna -hum kaano khaasiren
wa- li- kull darajaat min maa camilo wa- li- yuwaffiya -hum acmaal -hum wa- hum laa yuz.lamon

wa- yawm yucrad. 'alladhena kafaro calaa an- naar adhhabtum t.ayyibaat -kum fe h.ayaah -kum ad- dunyaa wa- istamtactum bi- -haa fa- al- yawm tujzawn cadhaab al- hon bi- maa kuntum tastakbiron fe al- 'ard. bi- ghayr al- h.aqq wa- bi- maa kuntum tafsuqon

wa- udhkur 'akhaa caadi(n) 'idh andhara qawm -hu bi- al- ah.qaaf wa- qad khalat an- nudhur min bayni yadai -hi wa- min khalf -hi 'an laa tacbudo 'illaa 'allaah 'inni -y akhaaf calay -kum cadhaab yawm caz.em
qaalo 'a- ji'ta -naa li- ta'fik -naa can 'aalihah -naa fa- i'ti -naa bi- maa tacid -naa 'in kunta min as.- s.aadiqen
qaala 'inna-maa al- cilm cinda 'allaah wa- uballigh -kum maa ursiltu bi- -hi wa- laakin -ne araa -kum qawm(an) tajhalon
fa- lammaa ra'aw -hu caarid.(an) mustaqbil awdiyah -him qaalo haadhaa caarid. mumt.ir -naa bal huwa maa istacjaltum bi- -hi reh. fe -haa cadhaab 'alem
tudammir kull shay' bi- 'amr rabb -haa fa- as.bah.o laa yuraa 'illaa masaakin -hum ka- dhaalika najze al- qawm al- mujrimen

wa- la- qad makkannaa -hum fe maa 'in makkannaa -kum fe -hi wa- jacalnaa la- -hum samc(an) wa- abs.aar(an) wa- af'idah fa- maa aghnaa can -hum samc -hum wa- laa abs.aar -hum wa- laa af'idah -hum min shay' 'idh kaano yajh.adon bi- 'aayaat 'allaah wa- h.aaqa bi- -him maa kaano bi- -hi yastahzi'on
wa- la- qad ahlaknaa maa h.awla -kum min al- quraa wa- s.arrafnaa al- 'aayaat lacalla -hum yarjicon
fa- law-laa nas.ara -hum 'alladhena ittakhadho min doni 'allaah qurbaan(an) 'aalihah bal d.allo can -hum wa- dhaalika 'ifk -hum wa- maa kaano yaftaron
wa- 'idh s.arafnaa 'ilay -ka nafar(an) min al- jinn yastamicon al- qur'aan fa- lammaa h.ad.aro -hu qaalo ans.ito fa- lammaa qud.iya wallaw 'ilaa qawm -him mundhiren
qaalo yaa qawm -naa 'in(na) -naa samicnaa kitaab(an) unzila min bacdi mosaa mus.addiq(an) li- maa bayna yadai -hi yahdi 'ilaa al- h.aqq wa- 'ilaa t.areq mustaqem
yaa qawm -naa ajebo daaciy 'allaah wa- 'aamino bi- -hi yaghfir la- -kum min dhunob -kum wa- yujir -kum min cadhaab 'alem
wa- man laa yujib daaciy 'allaah fa- laysa bi- mucjiz fe al- 'ard. wa- laysa la- -hu min doni -hi awliyaa' 'olaa'ika fe d.alaal muben
'a- wa- lam yaraw 'anna 'allaah 'alladhe khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- lam yacyaa bi- khalq -hinna bi- qaadir calaa 'an yuh.yiya al- mawtaa balaa 'inna -hu calaa kull shay' qader
wa- yawm yucrad. 'alladhena kafaro calaa an- naar 'a- laysa haadhaa bi- al- h.aqq qaalo balaa wa- rabb -naa qaala fa- dhoqo al- cadhaab bi- maa kuntum takfuron

fa- is.bir ka-maa s.abara 'olo al- cazm min ar- rusul wa- laa tastacjil la- -hum ka-'anna -hum yawm yarawn maa yocadon lam yalbatho 'illaa saacah min nahaar balaagh fa- hal yuhlak 'illaa al- qawm al- faasiqon
'alladhena kafaro wa- s.addo can sabel 'allaah ad.alla acmaal -hum
wa- 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat wa- 'aamano bi- maa nazzala calaa muh.ammad wa- huwa al- h.aqq min rabb -him kaffara can -hum sayyi'aat -him wa- as.lah.a baal -hum
dhaalika bi- 'anna 'alladhena kafaro ittabaco al- baat.il wa- 'anna 'alladhena 'aamano ittabaco al- h.aqq min rabb -him ka- dhaalika yad.rib 'allaah li- an- naas amthaal -hum

fa- 'idhaa laqetum 'alladhena kafaro fa- d.arb ar- riqaab h.attaa 'idhaa athkhantumo -hum fa- shuddo al- wathaaq fa- 'immaa mann(an) bacdu wa- 'immaa fidaa' h.attaa tad.ac al- h.arb awzaar -haa dhaalika wa- law yashaa' 'allaah la- intas.ara min -hum wa- laakin li- yabluwa bacd. -kum bi- bacd. wa- 'alladhena qutilo fe sabel 'allaah fa- lan yud.ill acmaal -hum
sa- yahde -him wa- yus.lih. baal -hum
wa- yudkhil -hum al- jannah carrafa -haa la- -hum
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'in tans.uro 'allaah yans.ur -kum wa- yuthabbit aqdaam -kum
wa- 'alladhena kafaro fa- tacs(an) la- -hum wa- ad.alla acmaal -hum
dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum kariho maa anzala 'allaah fa- ah.bat.a acmaal -hum
'a- fa- lam yasero fe al- 'ard. fa- yanz.uro kayfa kaana caaqibah 'alladhena min qabli -him dammara 'allaah calay -him wa- li- al- kaafiren amthaal -haa
dhaalika bi- 'anna 'allaah mawlaa 'alladhena 'aamano wa- 'anna al- kaafiren laa mawlaa la- -hum

'inna 'allaah yudkhil 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar wa- 'alladhena kafaro yatamattacon wa- ya'kulon ka-maa ta'kul al- ancaam wa- an- naar mathwa(n) la- -hum
wa- ka-'ayyin min qaryah hiya ashadd qowah min qaryah -ka 'allate akhrajat -ka ahlaknaa -hum fa- laa naas.ir la- -hum
'a- fa- man kaana calaa bayyinah min rabb -hi ka- man zuyyina la- -hu so' camal -hi wa- ittabaco ahwaa' -hum

mathal al- jannah 'allate wucida al- muttaqon fe -haa anhaar min maa' ghayr 'aasin wa- anhaar min laban lam yataghayyar t.acm -hu wa- anhaar min khamr ladhdhah li- ash- shaariben wa- anhaar min casal mus.affa(n) wa- la- -hum fe -haa min kull ath- thamaraat wa- maghfirah min rabb -him ka- man huwa khaalid fe an- naar wa- suqo maa' h.amem(an) fa- qat.t.aca amcaa' -hum

wa- min -hum man yastamic 'ilay -ka h.attaa 'idhaa kharajo min cindi -ka qaalo li- 'alladhena 'oto al- cilm maa-dhaa qaala 'aanif(an) 'olaa'ika 'alladhena t.abaca 'allaah calaa qulob -him wa- ittabaco ahwaa' -hum
wa- 'alladhena ihtadaw zaada -hum huda(n) wa- 'aataa -hum taqwaa -hum
fa- hal yanz.uron 'illaa as- saacah 'an ta'tiya -hum baghtah fa- qad jaa'a ashraat. -haa fa- 'annaa la- -hum 'idhaa jaa'at -hu dhikraa -hum
fa- iclam 'anna -hu laa 'ilaah 'illaa 'allaah wa- istaghfir li- dhanb -ka wa- li- al- mu'minen wa- al- mu'minaat wa- 'allaah yaclam mutaqallab -kum wa- mathwaa -kum

wa- yaqol 'alladhena 'aamano law-laa nuzzilat sorah fa- 'idhaa unzilat sorah muh.kamah wa- dhukira fe -haa al- qitaal ra'ayta 'alladhena fe qulob -him marad. yanz.uron 'ilay -ka naz.ar al- maghshey calay -hi min al- mawt fa- awlaa la- -hum
t.aacah wa- qawl macrof fa- 'idhaa cazama al- 'amr fa- law s.adaqo 'allaah la- kaana khayr(an) la- -hum
fa- hal casaytum 'in tawallaytum 'an tufsido fe al- 'ard. wa- tuqat.t.ico arh.aam -kum
'olaa'ika 'alladhena lacana -hum 'allaah fa- as.amma -hum wa- acmaa abs.aar -hum
'a- fa- laa yatadabbaron al- qur'aan 'am calaa qulob aqfaal -haa
'inna 'alladhena irtaddo calaa adbaar -him min bacdi maa tabayyana la- -hum al- hudaa ash- shayt.aan sawwala la- -hum wa- amlaa la- -hum
dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum qaalo li- 'alladhena kariho maa nazzala 'allaah sa- nut.ec -kum fe bacd. al- 'amr wa- 'allaah yaclam israar -hum
fa- kayfa 'idhaa tawaffat -hum al- malaa'ikah yad.ribon wujoh -hum wa- adbaar -hum
dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum ittabaco maa askhat.a 'allaah wa- kariho rid.waan -hu fa- ah.bat.a acmaal -hum
'am h.asiba 'alladhena fe qulob -him marad. 'an lan yukhrij 'allaah ad.ghaan -hum
wa- law nashaa' la- araynaa -ka -hum fa- la- carafta -hum bi- semaa -hum wa- la- tacrifanna -hum fe lah.n al- qawl wa- 'allaah yaclam acmaal -kum
wa- la- nabluwanna -kum h.attaa naclam al- mujaahiden min -kum wa- as.- s.aabiren wa- nabluwa akhbaar -kum
'inna 'alladhena kafaro wa- s.addo can sabel 'allaah wa- shaaqqo ar- rasol min bacdi maa tabayyana la- -hum al- hudaa lan yad.urr 'allaah shay'(an) wa- sa- yuh.et. acmaal -hum
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano at.eco 'allaah wa- at.eco ar- rasol wa- laa tubt.ilo acmaal -kum
'inna 'alladhena kafaro wa- s.addo can sabel 'allaah thumma maato wa- hum kuffaar fa- lan yaghfir 'allaah la- -hum
fa- laa tahino wa- tadco 'ilaa as- salm wa- 'antum al- aclawn wa- 'allaah maca -kum wa- lan yatir -kum acmaal -kum
'inna-maa al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa lacib wa- lahw wa- 'in tu'mino wa- tattaqo yu'ti -kum 'ujor -kum wa- laa yas'al -kum amwaal -kum
'in yas'al -kumo -haa fa- yuh.fi -kum tabkhalo wa- yukhrij ad.ghaan -kum

haa 'antum haa'ulaa'i tudcawn li- tunfiqo fe sabel 'allaah fa- min -kum man yabkhal wa- man yabkhal fa- 'inna-maa can nafs -hi wa- 'allaah al- ghaney wa- 'antum al- fuqaraa' wa- 'in tatawallaw yastabdil qawm(an) ghayr -kum thumma laa yakono amthaal -kum
'in(na) -naa fatah.naa la- -ka fath.(an) muben(an)
li- yaghfir la- -ka 'allaah maa taqaddama min dhanb -ka wa- maa ta'akhkhara wa- yutimm nicmah -hu calay -ka wa- yahdiya -ka s.iraat.(an) mustaqem(an)
wa- yans.ur -ka 'allaah nas.r(an) cazez(an)
huwa 'alladhe anzala as- sakenah fe qulob al- mu'minen li- yazdaado 'emaan(an) maca 'emaan -him wa- li- 'allaah junod as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- kaana 'allaah calem(an) h.akem(an)
li- yudkhil al- mu'minen wa- al- mu'minaat jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa wa- yukaffir can -hum sayyi'aat -him wa- kaana dhaalika cinda 'allaah fawz(an) caz.em(an)

wa- yucadhdhib al- munaafiqen wa- al- munaafiqaat wa- al- mushriken wa- al- mushrikaat az.- z.aannen bi- 'allaah z.ann as- saw' calay -him daa'irah as- saw' wa- ghad.iba 'allaah calay -him wa- lacana -hum wa- acadda la- -hum jahannam wa- saa'at mas.er(an)
wa- li- 'allaah junod as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- kaana 'allaah cazez(an) h.akem(an)
'in(na) -naa arsalnaa -ka shaahid(an) wa- mubashshir(an) wa- nadher(an)
li- tu'mino bi- 'allaah wa- rasol -hi wa- tucazziro -hu wa- tuwaqqiro -hu wa- tusabbih.o -hu bukrah wa- 'as.el(an)

'inna 'alladhena yubaayicon -ka 'inna-maa yubaayicon 'allaah yad 'allaah fawqa ayde -him fa- man nakatha fa- 'inna-maa yankuth calaa nafs -hi wa- man awfaa bi- maa caahada calay -hi 'allaah fa- sa- yu'te -hi 'ajr(an) caz.em(an)

sa- yaqol la- -ka al- mukhallafon min al- acraab shaghalat -naa amwaal -naa wa- 'ahlo -naa fa- istaghfir la- -naa yaqolon bi- alsinah -him maa laysa fe qulob -him qul fa- man yamlik la- -kum min 'allaah shay'(an) 'in araada bi- -kum d.arr(an) 'aw araada bi- -kum nafc(an) bal kaana 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon khaber(an)
bal z.anantum 'an lan yanqalib ar- rasol wa- al- mu'minon 'ilaa 'ahle -him 'abad(an) wa- zuyyina dhaalika fe qulob -kum wa- z.anantum z.ann as- saw' wa- kuntum qawm(an) bor(an)
wa- man lam yu'min bi- 'allaah wa- rasol -hi fa- 'in(na) -naa actadnaa li- al- kaafiren sacer(an)
wa- li- 'allaah mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. yaghfir li- man yashaa' wa- yucadhdhib man yashaa' wa- kaana 'allaah ghafor(an) rah.em(an)

sa- yaqol al- mukhallafon 'idhaa int.alaqtum 'ilaa maghaanim li- ta'khudho -haa dharo -naa nattabic -kum yuredon 'an yubaddilo kalaam 'allaah qul lan tattabico -naa ka- dhaalikum qaala 'allaah min qablu fa- sa- yaqolon bal tah.sudon -naa bal kaano laa yafqahon 'illaa qalel(an)

qul li- al- mukhallafen min al- acraab sa- tudcawn 'ilaa qawm 'ole ba's shaded tuqaatilon -hum 'aw yuslimon fa- 'in tut.eco yu'ti -kum 'allaah 'ajr(an) h.asan(an) wa- 'in tatawallaw ka-maa tawallaytum min qablu yucadhdhib -kum cadhaab(an) 'alem(an)

laysa calaa al- acmaa h.araj wa- laa calaa al- acraj h.araj wa- laa calaa al- mared. h.araj wa- man yut.ic 'allaah wa- rasol -hu yudkhil -hu jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar wa- man yatawalla yucadhdhib -hu cadhaab(an) 'alem(an)
la- qad rad.iya 'allaah can al- mu'minen 'idh yubaayicon -ka tah.ta ash- shajarah fa- calima maa fe qulob -him fa- anzala as- sakenah calay -him wa- athaaba -hum fath.(an) qareb(an)
wa- maghaanim katherah ya'khudhon -haa wa- kaana 'allaah cazez(an) h.akem(an)
wacada -kum 'allaah maghaanim katherah ta'khudhon -haa fa- cajjala la- -kum haadhihi wa- kaffa ayde an- naas can -kum wa- li- takon 'aayah li- al- mu'minen wa- yahde -kum s.iraat.(an) mustaqem(an)
wa- 'ukhraa lam taqdiro calay -haa qad ah.aat.a 'allaah bi- -haa wa- kaana 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader(an)
wa- law qaatala -kum 'alladhena kafaro la- wallaw al- adbaar thumma laa yajidon waley(an) wa- laa nas.er(an)
sunnah 'allaah 'allate qad khalat min qablu wa- lan tajid li- sunnah 'allaah tabdel(an)
wa- huwa 'alladhe kaffa ayde -him can -kum wa- ayde -kum can -hum bi- bat.n makkah min bacdi 'an az.fara -kum calay -him wa- kaana 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon bas.er(an)

hum 'alladhena kafaro wa- s.addo -kum can al- masjid al- h.araam wa- al- hady mackof(an) 'an yablugh mah.ill -hu wa- law-laa rijaal mu'minon wa- nisaa' mu'minaat lam taclamo -hum 'an tat.a'o -hum fa- tuseb -kum min -hum macarrah bi- ghayr cilm li- yudkhil 'allaah fe rah.mah -hi man yashaa' law tazayyalo la- cadhdhabnaa 'alladhena kafaro min -hum cadhaab(an) 'alem(an)

'idh jacala 'alladhena kafaro fe qulob -him al- h.ameyah h.ameyah al- jaahileyah fa- anzala 'allaah sakenah -hu calaa rasol -hi wa- calaa al- mu'minen wa- alzama -hum kalimah at- taqwaa wa- kaano ah.aqq bi- -haa wa- 'ahl -haa wa- kaana 'allaah bi- kull shay' calem(an)

la- qad s.adaqa 'allaah rasol -hu ar- ru'yaa bi- al- h.aqq la- tadkhulunna al- masjid al- h.araam 'in shaa'a 'allaah 'aaminen muh.alliqen ru'os -kum wa- muqas.s.iren laa takhaafon fa- calima maa lam taclamo fa- jacala min doni dhaalika fath.(an) qareb(an)
huwa 'alladhe arsala rasol -hu bi- al- hudaa wa- den al- h.aqq li- yuz.hir -hu calaa ad- den kull -hi wa- kafaa bi- 'allaah shahed(an)

muh.ammad rasol 'allaah wa- 'alladhena maca -hu ashiddaa' calaa al- kuffaar ruh.amaa' bayna -hum taraa -hum rukkac(an) sujjad(an) yabtaghon fad.l(an) min 'allaah wa- rid.waan(an) semaa -hum fe wujoh -him min 'athar as- sujod dhaalika mathal -hum fe at- tawraah wa- mathal -hum fe al- 'injel ka- zarc akhraja shat.' -hu fa- 'aazara -hu fa- istaghlaz.a fa- istawaa calaa soq -hi yucjib az- zurraac li- yaghez. bi- -him al- kuffaar wacada 'allaah 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat min -hum maghfirah wa- 'ajr(an) caz.em(an)
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tuqaddimo bayna yadai 'allaah wa- rasol -hi wa- ittaqo 'allaah 'inna 'allaah samec calem
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tarfaco as.waat -kum fawqa s.awt an- nabey wa- laa tajharo la- -hu bi- al- qawl ka- jahr bacd. -kum li- bacd. 'an tah.bat. acmaal -kum wa- 'antum laa tashcuron
'inna 'alladhena yaghud.d.on as.waat -hum cinda rasol 'allaah 'olaa'ika 'alladhena imtah.ana 'allaah qulob -hum li- at- taqwaa la- -hum maghfirah wa- 'ajr caz.em
'inna 'alladhena yunaadon -ka min waraa'a al- h.ujuraat akthar -hum laa yacqilon
wa- law 'anna -hum s.abaro h.attaa takhruj 'ilay -him la- kaana khayr(an) la- -hum wa- 'allaah ghafor rah.em
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'in jaa'a -kum faasiq bi- naba' fa- tabayyano 'an tus.ebo qawm(an) bi- jahaalah fa- tus.bih.o calaa maa facaltum naadimon

wa- iclamo 'anna fe -kum rasol 'allaah law yut.ec -kum fe kather min al- 'amr la- canittum wa- laakin 'allaah h.abbaba 'ilay -kum al- 'emaan wa- zayyana -hu fe qulob -kum wa- karraha 'ilay -kum al- kufr wa- al- fusoq wa- al- cis.yaan 'olaa'ika hum ar- raashidon
fad.l(an) min 'allaah wa- nicmah wa- 'allaah calem h.akem

wa- 'in t.aa'ifataan min al- mu'minen iqtatalo fa- as.lih.o bayna -humaa fa- 'in baghat 'ih.daa -humaa calaa al- 'ukhraa fa- qaatilo 'allate tabghe h.attaa tafe' 'ilaa 'amr 'allaah fa- 'in faa'at fa- as.lih.o bayna -humaa bi- al- cadl wa- aqsit.o
'inna-maa al- mu'minon 'ikhwah fa- as.lih.o bayna 'akhawai -kum wa- ittaqo 'allaah lacalla -kum turh.amon

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa yaskhar qawm min qawm casaa 'an yakono khayr(an) min -hum wa- laa nisaa' min nisaa' casaa 'an yakunna khayr(an) min -hunna wa- laa talmizo anfus -kum wa- laa tanaabazo bi- al- alqaab bi's al- ism al- fusoq bacda al- 'emaan wa- man lam yatub fa- 'olaa'ika hum az.- z.aalimon

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano ijtanibo kather(an) min az.- z.ann 'inna bacd. az.- z.ann 'ithm wa- laa tajassaso wa- laa yaghtab bacd. -kum bacd.(an) 'a- yuh.ibb 'ah.ad -kum 'an ya'kul lah.m 'akhe -hi mayt(an) fa- karihtumo -hu wa- ittaqo 'allaah 'inna 'allaah tawwaab rah.em
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- naas 'in(na) -naa khalaqnaa -kum min dhakar wa- 'unthaa wa- jacalnaa -kum shucob(an) wa- qabaa'il li- tacaarafo 'inna akram -kum cinda 'allaah atqaa -kum 'inna 'allaah calem khaber

qaalat al- acraab 'aamannaa qul lam tu'mino wa- laakin qolo aslamnaa wa- lammaa yadkhul al- 'emaan fe qulob -kum wa- 'in tut.eco 'allaah wa- rasol -hu laa yalit -kum min acmaal -kum shay'(an) 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em
'inna-maa al- mu'minon 'alladhena 'aamano bi- 'allaah wa- rasol -hi thumma lam yartaabo wa- jaahado bi- amwaal -him wa- anfus -him fe sabel 'allaah 'olaa'ika hum as.- s.aadiqon
qul 'a- tucallimon 'allaah bi- den -kum wa- 'allaah yaclam maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- 'allaah bi- kull shay' calem
yamunnon calay -ka 'an aslamo qul laa tamunno calay -ya islaam -kum bal 'allaah yamunn calay -kum 'an hadaa -kum li- al- 'emaan 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
'inna 'allaah yaclam ghayb as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- 'allaah bas.er bi- maa tacmalon
qaaf wa- al- qur'aan al- majed
bal cajibo 'an jaa'a -hum mundhir min -hum fa- qaala al- kaafiron haadhaa shay' cajeb
'a- 'idhaa mitnaa wa- kunnaa turaab(an) dhaalika rajc baced
qad calimnaa maa tanqus. al- 'ard. min -hum wa- cinda -naa kitaab h.afez.
bal kadhdhabo bi- al- h.aqq lammaa jaa'a -hum fa- hum fe 'amr marej
'a- fa- lam yanz.uro 'ilaa as- samaa' fawqa -hum kayfa banaynaa -haa wa- zayyannaa -haa wa- maa la- -haa min furoj

wa- nazzalnaa min as- samaa' maa' mubaarak(an) fa- anbatnaa bi- -hi jannaat wa- h.abb al- h.as.ed

rizq(an) li- al- cibaad wa- ah.yaynaa bi- -hi baldah mayt(an) ka- dhaalika al- khuroj
kadhdhabat qabla -hum qawm noh. wa- as.h.aab ar- rass wa- thamod
wa- caadi(n) wa- fircawn wa- 'ikhwaan lot.
wa- as.h.aab al- 'aykah wa- qawm tubbac kull kadhdhaba ar- rusul fa- h.aqqa waced
'a- fa- cayenaa bi- al- khalq al- 'awwal bal hum fe labs min khalq jaded
wa- la- qad khalaqnaa al- 'insaan wa- naclam maa tuwaswis bi- -hi nafs -hu wa- nah.nu aqrab 'ilay -hi min h.abl al- wared
'idh yatalaqqaa al- mutalaqqiyaan can al- yamen wa- can ash- shimaal qaced
maa yalfiz. min qawl 'illaa laday -hi raqeb cated
wa- jaa'at sakrah al- mawt bi- al- h.aqq dhaalika maa kunta min -hu tah.ed
wa- nufikha fe as.- s.or dhaalika yawm al- waced

la- qad kunta fe ghaflah min haadhaa fa- kashafnaa can -ka ghit.aa' -ka fa- bas.ar -ka al- yawm h.aded
wa- qaala qaren -hu haadhaa maa laday -ya cated
alqiyaa fe jahannam kull kaffaar caned

'alladhe jacala maca 'allaah 'ilaah(an) 'aakhar fa- alqiyaa -hu fe al- cadhaab ash- shaded
qaala qaren -hu rabb -naa maa at.ghaytu -hu wa- laakin kaana fe d.alaal baced
qaala laa takhtas.imo laday -ya wa- qad qaddamtu 'ilay -kum bi- al- waced
maa yubaddal al- qawl laday -ya wa- maa 'anaa bi- z.allaam li- al- cabed
yawm naqol li- jahannam hal imtala'ti wa- taqol hal min mazed
wa- uzlifat al- jannah li- al- muttaqen ghayr baced
haadhaa maa tocadon li- kull 'awwaab h.afez.
man khashiya ar- rah.maan bi- al- ghayb wa- jaa'a bi- qalb muneb
udkhulo -haa bi- salaam dhaalika yawm al- khulod
la- -hum maa yashaa'on fe -haa wa- laday -naa mazed
wa- kam ahlaknaa qabla -hum min qarn hum ashadd min -hum bat.sh(an) fa- naqqabo fe al- bilaad hal min mah.es.
'inna fe dhaalika la- dhikraa li- man kaana la- -hu qalb 'aw alqaa as- samc wa- huwa shahed
wa- la- qad khalaqnaa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- maa bayna -humaa fe sittah ayyaam wa- maa massa -naa min lughob
fa- is.bir calaa maa yaqolon wa- sabbih. bi- h.amd rabb -ka qabla t.uloc ash- shams wa- qabla al- ghurob
wa- min al- layl fa- sabbih. -hu wa- adbaar as- sujod
wa- istamic yawm yunaadi al- munaadi min makaan qareb
yawm yasmacon as.- s.ayh.ah bi- al- h.aqq dhaalika yawm al- khuroj
'in(na) -naa nah.nu nuh.ye wa- numet wa- 'ilay -naa al- mas.er
yawm tashaqqaq al- 'ard. can -hum siraac(an) dhaalika h.ashr calay -naa yaser
nah.nu aclam bi- maa yaqolon wa- maa 'anta calay -him bi- jabbaar fa- dhakkir bi- al- qur'aan man yakhaaf waced

fa- 'akhadhnaa -hu wa- junod -hi fa- nabadhnaa -hum fe al- yamm wa- huwa mulem

fa- cataw can 'amr rabb -him fa- 'akhadhat -hum as.- s.aaciqah wa- hum yanz.uron
fa- maa istat.aaco min qiyaam wa- maa kaano muntas.iren
wa- qawm noh. min qablu 'inna -hum kaano qawm(an) faasiqen
wa- as- samaa' banaynaa -haa bi- aydi(n) wa- 'in(na) -naa la- mosicon

wa- laa tajcalo maca 'allaah 'ilaah(an) 'aakhar 'in(na) -e la- -kum min -hu nadher muben
ka- dhaalika maa 'ataa 'alladhena min qabli -him min rasol 'illaa qaalo saah.ir 'aw majnon

faakihen bi- maa 'aataa -hum rabb -hum wa- waqaa -hum rabb -hum cadhaab al- jah.em

fa- manna 'allaah calay -naa wa- waqaa -naa cadhaab as- samom

fa- dhakkir fa- maa 'anta bi- nicmah rabb -ka bi- kaahin wa- laa majnon

fa- li- ya'to bi- h.adeth mithl -hi 'in kaano s.aadiqen

'in hiya 'illaa asmaa' sammaytumo -haa 'antum wa- 'aabaa' -kum maa anzala 'allaah bi- -haa min sult.aan 'in yattabicon 'illaa az.- z.ann wa- maa tahwaa al- anfus wa- la- qad jaa'a hum min rabb -him al- hudaa

fa- bi- 'ayy 'aalaa' rabb -kumaa tukadhdhibaan
fa- yawma'idhin laa yus'al can dhanb -hi 'ins wa- laa jaann

fa- bi- 'ayy 'aalaa' rabb -kumaa tukadhdhibaan
