'idhaa waqacat al- waaqicah
laysa li- waqcah -haa kaadhibah
khaafid.ah raaficah
'idhaa rujjat al- 'ard. rajj(an)
wa- bussat al- jibaal bass(an)
fa- kaanat habaa' munbathth(an)
wa- kuntum azwaaj(an) thalaathah
fa- as.h.aab al- maymanah maa as.h.aab al- maymanah
wa- as.h.aab al- mash'amah maa as.h.aab al- mash'amah
wa- as- saabiqon as- saabiqon
'olaa'ika al- muqarrabon

'inna -hum kaano qabla dhaalika mutrafen

wa- kaano yaqolon 'a- 'idhaa mitnaa wa- kunnaa turaab(an) wa- ciz.aam(an) 'a- 'in(na) -naa la- mabcothon
'a- wa- 'aabaa' -naa al- 'awwalon
qul 'inna al- 'awwalen wa- al- 'aakhiren
la- majmocon 'ilaa meqaat yawm maclom
thumma 'inna -kum 'ayyuhaa ad.- d.aallon al- mukadhdhibon
la- 'aakilon min shajar min zaqqom
fa- maali'on min -haa al- but.on

fa- shaaribon shurb al- hem
haadhaa nuzul -hum yawm ad- den
nah.nu khalaqnaa -kum fa- law-laa tus.addiqon
'a- fa- ra'aytum maa tomnon
'a- 'antum takhluqon -hu 'am nah.nu al- khaaliqon
nah.nu qaddarnaa bayna -kum al- mawt wa- maa nah.nu bi- masboqen
calaa 'an nubaddil amthaal -kum wa- nunshi' -kum fe maa laa taclamon
wa- la- qad calimtum an- nash'ah al- 'olaa fa- law-laa tadhakkaron
'a- fa- ra'aytum maa tah.ruthon
'a- 'antum tazracon -hu 'am nah.nu az- zaaricon
law nashaa' la- jacalnaa -hu h.ut.aam(an) fa- z.altum tafakkahon
'in(na) -naa la- mughramon
bal nah.nu mah.romon
'a- fa- ra'aytum al- maa' 'alladhe tashrabon
'a- 'antum anzaltumo -hu min al- muzn 'am nah.nu al- munzilon
law nashaa' jacalnaa -hu 'ujaaj(an) fa- law-laa tashkuron
'a- fa- ra'aytum an- naar 'allate toron
'a- 'antum ansha'tum shajarah -haa 'am nah.nu al- munshi'on
nah.nu jacalnaa -haa tadhkirah wa- mataac(an) li- al- muqwen
fa- sabbih. bi- ism rabb -ka al- caz.em
fa- laa uqsim bi- mawaaqic an- nujom
wa- 'inna -hu la- qasam law taclamon caz.em
'inna -hu la- qur'aan karem
fe kitaab maknon
laa yamass -hu 'illaa al- mut.ahharon
tanzel min rabb al- caalamen
'a- fa- bi- haadhaa al- h.adeth 'antum mudhinon
wa- tajcalon rizq -kum 'anna -kum tukadhdhibon
fa- law-laa 'idhaa ballaghat al- h.ulqom
wa- 'antum h.ena'idhin tanz.uron
wa- nah.nu aqrab 'ilay -hi min -kum wa- laakin laa tubs.iron
fa- law-laa 'in kuntum ghayr madenen
tarjicon -haa 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
fa- 'ammaa 'in kaana min al- muqarraben
fa- rawh. wa- rayh.aan wa- jannah nacem
wa- 'ammaa 'in kaana min as.h.aab al- yamen
fa- salaam la- -ka min as.h.aab al- yamen

fa- nuzul min h.amem
wa- tas.liyah jah.em
'inna haadhaa la- huwa h.aqq al- yaqen
fa- sabbih. bi- ism rabb -ka al- caz.em
sabbah.a li- 'allaah maa fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- huwa al- cazez al- h.akem
la- -hu mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. yuh.ye wa- yumet wa- huwa calaa kull shay' qader
huwa al- 'awwal wa- al- 'aakhir wa- az.- z.aahir wa- al- baat.in wa- huwa bi- kull shay' calem

huwa 'alladhe khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. fe sittah ayyaam thumma istawaa calaa al- carsh yaclam maa yalij fe al- 'ard. wa- maa yakhruj min -haa wa- maa yanzil min as- samaa' wa- maa yacruj fe -haa wa- huwa maca -kum 'ayna-maa kuntum wa- 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon bas.er
la- -hu mulk as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- 'ilaa 'allaah turjac al- 'umor
yolij al- layl fe an- nahaar wa- yolij an- nahaar fe al- layl wa- huwa calem bi- dhaat as.- s.udor
'aamino bi- 'allaah wa- rasol -hi wa- anfiqo min maa jacala -kum mustakhlafen fe -hi fa- 'alladhena 'aamano min -kum wa- anfaqo la- -hum 'ajr kaber
wa- maa la- -kum laa tu'minon bi- 'allaah wa- ar- rasol yadco -kum li- tu'mino bi- rabb -kum wa- qad 'akhadha methaaq -kum 'in kuntum mu'minen
huwa 'alladhe yunazzil calaa cabd -hi 'aayaat bayyinaat li- yukhrij -kum min az.- z.ulumaat 'ilaa an- nor wa- 'inna 'allaah bi- -kum la- ra'of rah.em

wa- maa la- -kum 'an laa tunfiqo fe sabel 'allaah wa- li- 'allaah meraath as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. laa yastawe min -kum man anfaqa min qabli al- fath. wa- qaatala 'olaa'ika acz.am darajah min 'alladhena anfaqo min bacdu wa- qaatalo wa- kull(an) wacada 'allaah al- h.usnaa wa- 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon khaber
man-dhaa 'alladhe yuqrid. 'allaah qard.(an) h.asan(an) fa- yud.aacif -hu la- -hu wa- la- -hu 'ajr karem

yawm taraa al- mu'minen wa- al- mu'minaat yascaa nor -hum bayna ayde -him wa- bi- aymaan -him bushraa -kum al- yawm jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa dhaalika huwa al- fawz al- caz.em

yawm yaqol al- munaafiqon wa- al- munaafiqaat li- 'alladhena 'aamano unz.uro -naa naqtabis min nor -kum qela irjico waraa'a -kum fa- iltamiso nor(an) fa- d.uriba bayna -hum bi- sor la- -hu baab baat.in -hu fe -hi ar- rah.mah wa- z.aahir -hu min qibali -hi al- cadhaab

yunaadawn -hum 'a- lam nakun maca -kum qaalo balaa wa- laakinna -kum fatantum anfus -kum wa- tarabbas.tum wa- irtabtum wa- gharrat -kum al- amaaney h.attaa jaa'a 'amr 'allaah wa- gharra -kum bi- 'allaah al- gharor
fa- al- yawm laa yu'khadh min -kum fidyah wa- laa min 'alladhena kafaro ma'waa -kum an- naar huwa mawlaa -kum wa- bi's al- mas.er

'a- lam ya'ni li- 'alladhena 'aamano 'an takhshac qulob -hum la- dhikr 'allaah wa- maa nazala min al- h.aqq wa- laa yakono ka- 'alladhena 'oto al- kitaab min qablu fa- t.aala calay -him al- 'amad fa- qasat qulob -hum wa- kather min -hum faasiqon
iclamo 'anna 'allaah yuh.ye al- 'ard. bacda mawt -haa qad bayyannaa la- -kum al- 'aayaat lacalla -kum tacqilon
'inna al- mus.s.addiqen wa- al- mus.s.addiqaat wa- aqrad.o 'allaah qard.(an) h.asan(an) yud.aacaf la- -hum wa- la- hum 'ajr karem

wa- 'alladhena 'aamano bi- 'allaah wa- rusul -hi 'olaa'ika hum as.- s.iddeqon wa- ash- shuhadaa' cinda rabb -him la- -hum 'ajr -hum wa- nor -hum wa- 'alladhena kafaro wa- kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa 'olaa'ika as.h.aab al- jah.em

iclamo 'anna-maa al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa lacib wa- lahw wa- zenah wa- tafaakhur bayna -kum wa- takaathur fe al- amwaal wa- al- awlaad ka- mathal ghayth acjaba al- kuffaar nabaat -hu thumma yahej fa- taraa -hu mus.farr(an) thumma yakon h.ut.aam(an) wa- fe al- 'aakhirah cadhaab shaded wa- maghfirah min 'allaah wa- rid.waan wa- maa al- h.ayaah ad- dunyaa 'illaa mataac al- ghuror

saabiqo 'ilaa maghfirah min rabb -kum wa- jannah card. -haa ka- card. as- samaa' wa- al- 'ard. uciddat li- 'alladhena 'aamano bi- 'allaah wa- rusul -hi dhaalika fad.l 'allaah yu'te -hi man yashaa' wa- 'allaah dho al- fad.l al- caz.em
maa as.aaba min mus.ebah fe al- 'ard. wa- laa fe anfus -kum 'illaa fe kitaab min qabli 'an nabra' -haa 'inna dhaalika calaa 'allaah yaser
li- kay laa ta'saw calaa maa faata -kum wa- laa tafrah.o bi- maa 'aataa -kum wa- 'allaah laa yuh.ibb kull mukhtaal fakhor
'alladhena yabkhalon wa- ya'muron an- naas bi- al- bukhl wa- man yatawalla fa- 'inna 'allaah huwa al- ghaney al- h.amed

la- qad arsalnaa rusul -naa bi- al- bayyinaat wa- anzalnaa maca -hum al- kitaab wa- al- mezaan li- yaqom an- naas bi- al- qist. wa- anzalnaa al- h.aded fe -hi ba's shaded wa- manaafic li- an- naas wa- li- yaclam 'allaah man yans.ur -hu wa- rusul -hu bi- al- ghayb 'inna 'allaah qawey cazez
wa- la- qad arsalnaa noh.(an) wa- 'ibraahem wa- jacalnaa fe dhurreyah -himaa an- nubowah wa- al- kitaab fa- min -hum muhtadi(n) wa- kather min -hum faasiqon

thumma qaffaynaa calaa 'aathaar -him bi- rusul -naa wa- qaffaynaa bi- cesaa ibn maryam wa- 'aataynaa -hu al- 'injel wa- jacalnaa fe qulob 'alladhena ittabaco -hu ra'fah wa- rah.mah wa- rahbaaneyah ibtadaco -haa maa katabnaa -haa calay -him 'illaa ibtighaa' rid.waan 'allaah fa- maa racaw -haa h.aqq ricaayah -haa fa- 'aataynaa 'alladhena 'aamano min -hum 'ajr -hum wa- kather min -hum faasiqon
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano ittaqo 'allaah wa- 'aamino bi- rasol -hi yu'ti -kum kiflain min rah.mah -hi wa- yajcal la- -kum nor(an) tamshon bi- -hi wa- yaghfir la- -kum wa- 'allaah ghafor rah.em
li- 'an laa yaclam 'ahl al- kitaab 'an laa yaqdiron calaa shay' min fad.l 'allaah wa- 'anna al- fad.l bi- yad 'allaah yu'te -hi man yashaa' wa- 'allaah dho al- fad.l al- caz.em
qad samica 'allaah qawl 'allate tujaadil -ka fe zawj -haa wa- tashtake 'ilaa 'allaah wa- 'allaah yasmac tah.aawur -kumaa 'inna 'allaah samec bas.er

'alladhena yuz.aahiron min -kum min nisaa' -him maa hunna 'ummahaat -hum 'in 'ummahaat -hum 'illaa 'allaa'e waladna -hum wa- 'inna -hum la- yaqolon munkar(an) min al- qawl wa- zor(an) wa- 'inna 'allaah la- cafow ghafor
wa- 'alladhena yuz.aahiron min nisaa' -him thumma yacodon li- maa qaalo fa- tah.rer raqabah min qabli 'an yatamaassaa dhaalika tocaz.on bi- -hi wa- 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon khaber

fa- man lam yajid fa- s.iyaam shahrain mutataabicain min qabli 'an yatamaassaa fa- man lam yastat.ic fa- it.caam sitten misken(an) dhaalika li- tu'mino bi- 'allaah wa- rasol -hi wa- tilka h.udod 'allaah wa- li- al- kaafiron cadhaab 'alem
'inna 'alladhena yuh.aaddon 'allaah wa- rasol -hu kubito ka-maa kubita 'alladhena min qabli -him wa- qad anzalnaa 'aayaat bayyinaat wa- li- al- kaafiren cadhaab muhen
yawm yabcath -hum 'allaah jamec(an) fa- yunabbi' -hum bi- maa camilo ah.s.aa -hu 'allaah wa- naso -hu wa- 'allaah calaa kull shay' shahed

'a- lam tara 'anna 'allaah yaclam maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. maa yakon min najwaa thalaathah 'illaa huwa raabic -hum wa- laa khamsah 'illaa huwa saadis -hum wa- laa adnaa min dhaalika wa- laa akthar 'illaa huwa maca -hum 'ayna-maa kaano thumma yunabbi' -hum bi- maa camilo yawm al- qiyaamah 'inna 'allaah bi- kull shay' calem

'a- lam tara 'ilaa 'alladhena nuho can an- najwaa thumma yacodon li- maa nuho can -hu wa- yatanaajawn bi- al- 'ithm wa- al- cudwaan wa- macs.iyah ar- rasol wa- 'idhaa jaa'o -ka h.ayyaw -ka bi- maa lam yuh.ayyi -ka bi- -hi 'allaah wa- yaqolon fe anfus -him law-laa yucadhdhib -naa 'allaah bi- maa naqol h.asb -hum jahannam yas.lawn -haa fa- bi's al- mas.er

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'idhaa tanaajaytum fa- laa tatanaajaw bi- al- 'ithm wa- al- cudwaan wa- macs.iyah ar- rasol wa- tanaajaw bi- al- birr wa- at- taqwaa wa- ittaqo 'allaah 'alladhe 'ilay -hi tuh.sharon
'inna-maa an- najwaa min ash- shayt.aan li- yah.zun 'alladhena 'aamano wa- laysa bi- d.aarr -him shay'(an) 'illaa bi- 'idhn 'allaah wa- calaa 'allaah fa- li- yatawakkal al- mu'minon

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'idhaa qela la- -kum tafassah.o fe al- majaalis fa- ifsah.o yafsah. 'allaah la- -kum wa- 'idhaa qela unshuzo fa- unshuzo yarfac 'allaah 'alladhena 'aamano min -kum wa- 'alladhena 'oto al- cilm darajaat wa- 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon khaber
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'idhaa naajaytum ar- rasol fa- qaddimo bayna yadai najwaa -kum s.adaqah dhaalika khayr la- -kum wa- at.har fa- 'in lam tajido fa- 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em

'a- ashfaqtum 'an tuqaddimo bayna yadai najwaa -kum s.adaqaat fa- 'idh lam tafcalo wa- taaba 'allaah calay -kum fa- aqemo as.- s.alaah wa- 'aato az- zakaah wa- at.eco 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- 'allaah khaber bi- maa tacmalon
'a- lam tara 'ilaa 'alladhena tawallaw qawm(an) ghad.iba 'allaah calay -him maa hum min -kum wa- laa min -hum wa- yah.lifon calaa al- kadhib wa- hum yaclamon
acadda 'allaah la- -hum cadhaab(an) shaded(an) 'inna -hum saa'a maa kaano yacmalon
ittakhadho aymaan -hum junnah fa- s.addo can sabel 'allaah fa- la- -hum cadhaab muhen
lan tughniya can -hum amwaal -hum wa- laa awlaad -hum min 'allaah shay'(an) 'olaa'ika as.h.aab an- naar hum fe -haa khaalidon
yawm yabcath -hum 'allaah jamec(an) fa- yah.lifon la- -hu ka-maa yah.lifon la- -kum wa- yah.sabon 'anna -hum calaa shay' 'a-laa 'inna -hum hum al- kaafiron
istah.wadha calay -him ash- shayt.aan fa- ansaa -hum dhikr 'allaah 'olaa'ika h.izb ash- shayt.aan 'a-laa 'inna h.izb ash- shayt.aan hum al- khaasiron
'inna 'alladhena yuh.aaddon 'allaah wa- rasol -hu 'olaa'ika fe al- adhallen
kataba 'allaah la- aghlibanna 'anaa wa- rusul -e 'inna 'allaah qawey cazez

laa tajid qawm(an) yu'minon bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir yuwaaddon man h.aadda 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- law kaano 'aabaa' -hum 'aw abnaa' -hum 'aw 'ikhwaan -hum 'aw casherah -hum 'olaa'ika kataba fe qulob -him al- 'emaan wa- 'ayyada -hum bi- roh. min -hu wa- yudkhil -hum jannaat tajre min tah.ta -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa rad.iya 'allaah can -hum wa- rad.o can -hu 'olaa'ika h.izb 'allaah 'a-laa 'inna h.izb 'allaah hum al- muflih.on
sabbah.a li- 'allaah maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- huwa al- cazez al- h.akem

huwa 'alladhe akhraja 'alladhena kafaro min 'ahl al- kitaab min diyaar -him li- 'awwal al- h.ashr maa z.anantum 'an yakhrujo wa- z.anno 'anna -hum maanicah -hum h.us.on -hum min 'allaah fa- 'ataa -hum 'allaah min h.aythu lam tah.tasibo wa- qadhafa fe qulob -him ar- rucb yukhribon buyot -hum bi- ayde -him wa- ayde al- mu'minen fa- ictabiro yaa 'ole al- abs.aar
wa- law-laa 'an kataba 'allaah calay -him al- jalaa' la- cadhdhaba -hum fe ad- dunyaa wa- la- -hum fe al- 'aakhirah cadhaab an- naar
dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum shaaqqo 'allaah wa- rasol -hu wa- man yushaaqq 'allaah fa- 'inna 'allaah shaded al- ciqaab
maa qat.actum min lenah 'aw taraktumo -haa qaa'imah calaa 'us.ol -haa fa- bi- 'idhn 'allaah wa- li- yukhziya al- faasiqen
wa- maa afaa'a 'allaah calaa rasol -hi min -hum fa- maa awjaftum calay -hi min khayl wa- laa rikaab wa- laakin 'allaah yusallit. rusul -hu calaa man yashaa' wa- 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader

maa afaa'a 'allaah calaa rasol -hi min 'ahl al- quraa fa- li- 'allaah wa- li- ar- rasol wa- li- dhe al- qurbaa wa- al- yataamaa wa- al- masaaken wa- ibn as- sabel kay laa yakon dolah bayna al- aghniyaa' min -hum wa- maa 'ataa -kum ar- rasol fa- khudho -hu wa- maa nahaa -kum can -hu fa- intaho wa- ittaqo 'allaah 'inna 'allaah shaded al- ciqaab
li- al- fuqaraa' al- muhaajiren 'alladhena ukhrijo min diyaar -him wa- amwaal -hi yabtaghon fad.l(an) min 'allaah wa- rid.waan(an) wa- yans.uron 'allaah wa- rasol -hu 'olaa'ika hum as.- s.aadiqon

wa- 'alladhena tabawwa'o ad- daar wa- al- 'emaan min qabli -him yuh.ibbon man haajara 'ilay -him wa- laa yajidon fe s.udor -him h.aajah min maa 'oto wa- yu'thiron calaa anfus -him wa- law kaana bi- -him khas.aas.ah wa- man yoqa shuh.h. nafs -hi fa- 'olaa'ika hum al- muflih.on

wa- 'alladhena jaa'o min bacdi -him yaqolon rabb -naa ighfir la- -naa wa- li- 'ikhwaan -naa 'alladhena sabaqo -naa bi- al- 'emaan wa- laa tajcal fe qulob -naa ghill(an) li- 'alladhena 'aamano rabb -naa 'inna -ka ra'of rah.em

'a- lam tara 'ilaa 'alladhena naafaqo yaqolon li- 'ikhwaan -him 'alladhena kafaro min 'ahl al- kitaab la- 'in ukhrijtum la- nakhrujanna maca -kum wa- laa nut.ec fe -kum 'ah.ad(an) 'abad(an) wa- 'in qotiltum la- nans.uranna -kum wa- 'allaah yashhad 'inna -hum la- kaadhibon
la- 'in ukhrijo laa yakhrujon maca -hum wa- la- 'in qotilo laa yans.uron -hum wa- la- 'in nas.aro -hum la- yuwallunna al- adbaar thumma laa yuns.aron
la- 'antum ashadd rahbah fe s.udor -him min 'allaah dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum qawm laa yafqahon
laa yuqaatilon -kum jamec(an) 'illaa fe qura(n) muh.as.s.anah 'aw min waraa'i judur ba's -hum bayna -hum shaded tah.sab -hum jamec(an) wa- qulob -hum shattaa dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum qawm laa yacqilon
ka- mathal 'alladhena min qabli -him qareb(an) dhaaqo wabaal 'amr -him wa- la- -hum cadhaab 'alem
ka- mathal ash- shayt.aan 'idh qaala li- al- 'insaan ukfur fa- lammaa kafara qaala 'inni -y bare' min -ka 'inni -y akhaaf 'allaah rabb al- caalamen
fa- kaana caaqibah -humaa 'anna -humaa fe an- naar khaalidain fe -haa wa- dhaalika jazaa' az.- z.aalimen
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano ittaqo 'allaah wa- li- tanz.ur nafs maa qaddamat li- ghad wa- ittaqo 'allaah 'inna 'allaah khaber bi- maa tacmalon
wa- laa takono ka- 'alladhena naso 'allaah fa- ansaa -hum anfus -hum 'olaa'ika hum al- faasiqon
laa yastawe as.h.aab an- naar wa- as.h.aab al- jannah as.h.aab al- jannah hum al- faa'izon
law anzalnaa haadhaa al- qur'aan calaa jabal la- ra'ayta -hu khaashic(an) mutas.addic(an) min khashyah 'allaah wa- tilka al- amthaal nad.rib -haa li- an- naas lacalla -hum yatafakkaron
huwa 'allaah 'alladhe laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa caalim al- ghayb wa- ash- shahaadah huwa ar- rah.maan ar- rah.em
huwa 'allaah 'alladhe laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa al- malik al- quddos as- salaam al- mu'min al- muhaymin al- cazez al- jabbaar al- mutakabbir subh.aana 'allaah can maa yushrikon
huwa 'allaah al- khaaliq al- baari' al- mus.awwir la- -hu al- asmaa' al- h.usnaa yusabbih. la- -hu maa fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- huwa al- cazez al- h.akem

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tattakhidho cadow -e wa- cadow -kum awliyaa' tulqon 'ilay -him bi- al- mawaddah wa- qad kafaro bi- maa jaa'a -kum min al- h.aqq yukhrijon ar- rasol wa- 'eyaa -kum 'an tu'mino bi- 'allaah rabb -kum 'in kuntum kharajtum jihaad(an) fe sabel -e wa- ibtighaa' mard.aat -e tusirron 'ilay -him bi- al- mawaddah wa- 'anaa aclam bi- maa akhfaytum wa- maa aclantum wa- man yafcal -hu min -kum fa- qad d.alla sawaa' as- sabel
'in yathqafo -kum yakono la- -kum acdaa' wa- yabsut.o 'ilay -kum ayde -him wa- alsinah -him bi- as- so' wa- waddo law takfuron
lan tanfac -kum arh.aam -kum wa- laa awlaad -kum yawm al- qiyaamah yafs.il bayna -kum wa- 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon bas.er

qad kaanat la- -kum 'uswah h.asanah fe 'ibraahem wa- 'alladhena maca -hu 'idh qaalo li- qawm -him 'in(na) -naa bura'aa' min -kum wa- min maa tacbudon min doni 'allaah kafarnaa bi- -kum wa- badaa bayna -naa wa- bayna -kum al- cadaawah wa- al- baghd.aa' 'abad(an) h.attaa tu'mino bi- 'allaah wah.d -hu 'illaa qawl 'ibraahem li- 'abe -hi la- astaghfiranna la- -ka wa- maa amlik la- -ka min 'allaah min shay' rabb -naa calay -ka tawakkalnaa wa- 'ilay -ka anabnaa wa- 'ilay -ka al- mas.er
rabb -naa laa tajcal -naa fitnah li- 'alladhena kafaro wa- ighfir la- -naa rabb -naa 'inna -ka 'anta al- cazez al- h.akem
la- qad kaana la- -kum fe -him 'uswah h.asanah li- man kaana yarjo 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- man yatawalla fa- 'inna 'allaah huwa al- ghaney al- h.amed
casaa 'allaah 'an yajcal bayna -kum wa- bayna 'alladhena caadaytum min -hum mawaddah wa- 'allaah qader wa- 'allaah ghafor rah.em
laa yanhaa -kum 'allaah can 'alladhena lam yuqaatilo -kum fe ad- den wa- lam yukhrijo -kum min diyaar -kum 'an tabarro -hum wa- tuqsit.o 'ilay -him 'inna 'allaah yuh.ibb al- muqsit.en

'inna-maa yanhaa -kum 'allaah can 'alladhena qaatalo -kum fe ad- den wa- akhrajo -kum min diyaar -kum wa- z.aaharo calaa ikhraaj -kum 'an tawallaw -hum wa- man yatawalla -hum fa- 'olaa'ika hum az.- z.aalimon

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'idhaa jaa'a -kum al- mu'minaat muhaajiraat fa- imtah.ino -hunna 'allaah aclam bi- 'emaan -hinna fa- 'in calimtumo -hunna mu'minaat fa- laa tarjico -hunna 'ilaa al- kuffaar laa hunna h.ill la- -hum wa- laa hum yah.illon la- -hunna wa- 'aato -hum maa anfaqo wa- laa junaah. calay -kum 'an tankih.o -hunna 'idhaa 'aataytumo -hunna 'ujor -hunna wa- laa tumsiko bi- cis.am al- kawaafir wa- is'alo maa anfaqtum wa- li- yas'alo maa anfaqo dhaalika h.ukm 'allaah yah.kum bayna -kum wa- 'allaah calem h.akem
wa- 'in faata -kum shay' min azwaaj -kum 'ilaa al- kuffaar fa- caaqabtum fa- 'aato 'alladhena dhahabat azwaaj -hum mithl maa anfaqo wa- ittaqo 'allaah 'alladhe 'antum bi- -hi mu'minon

yaa 'ayyuhaa an- nabey 'idhaa jaa'a -ka al- mu'minaat yubaayicna -ka calaa 'an laa yushrikna bi- 'allaah shay'(an) wa- laa yasriqna wa- laa yazneena wa- laa yaqtulna awlaad -hunna wa- laa ya'tena bi- buhtaan yaftarena -hu bayna ayde -hinna wa- arjul -hinna wa- laa yacs.ena -ka fe macrof fa- baayic -hunna wa- istaghfir la- -hunna 'allaah 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tatawallaw qawm(an) ghad.iba 'allaah calay -him qad ya'iso min al- 'aakhirah ka-maa ya'isa al- kuffaar min as.h.aab al- qubor
sabbah.a li- 'allaah maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. wa- huwa al- cazez al- h.akem
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano li- ma(a) taqolon maa laa tafcalon
kabura maqt(an) cinda 'allaah 'an taqolo maa laa tafcalon
'inna 'allaah yuh.ibb 'alladhena yuqaatilon fe sabel -hi s.aff(an) ka-'anna -hum bunyaan mars.os.

wa- 'idh qaala mosaa li- qawm -hi yaa qawm -e li- ma(a) tu'dhon -ne wa- qad taclamon 'anni -y rasol 'allaah 'ilay -kum fa- lammaa zaagho azaagha 'allaah qulob -hum wa- 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm al- faasiqen

wa- 'idh qaala cesaa ibn maryam yaa bane 'israa'el 'inni -y rasol 'allaah 'ilay -kum mus.addiq(an) li- maa bayna yadai -ya min at- tawraah wa- mubashshir(an) bi- rasol ya'te min bacdi -e ism -hu ah.mad fa- lammaa jaa'a -hum bi- al- bayyinaat qaalo haadhaa sih.r muben
wa- man az.lam min man iftaraa calaa 'allaah al- kadhib wa- huwa yudcaa 'ilaa al- islaam wa- 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm al- z.aalimen
yuredon li- yut.fi'o nor 'allaah bi- afwaah -him wa- 'allaah mutimm nor -hi wa- law kariha al- kaafiron
huwa 'alladhe arsala rasol -hi bi- al- hudaa wa- den al- h.aqq li- yuz.hir -hu calaa ad- den kull -hi wa- law kariha al- mushrikon
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano hal adull -kum calaa tijaarah tunje -kum min cadhaab 'alem
tu'minon bi- 'allaah wa- rasol -hi wa- tujaahidon fe sabel 'allaah bi- amwaal -kum wa- anfus -kum dhaalikum khayr la- -kum 'in kuntum taclamon
yaghfir la- -kum dhunob -kum wa- yudkhil -kum jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar wa- masaakin t.ayyibah fe jannaat cadn dhaalika al- fawz al- caz.em
wa- 'ukhraa tuh.ibbon -haa nas.r min 'allaah wa- fath. qareb wa- bashshir al- mu'minen

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano kono ans.aar 'allaah ka-maa qaala cesaa ibn maryam li- al- h.awaareyen man ans.aar -e 'ilaa 'allaah qaala al- h.awaareyon nah.nu ans.aar 'allaah fa- 'aamanat t.aa'ifah min bane 'israa'el wa- kafarat t.aa'ifah fa- 'ayyadnaa 'alladhena 'aamano calaa cadow -him fa- as.bah.o z.aahiren
yusabbih. li- 'allaah maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. al- malik al- quddos al- cazez al- h.akem
huwa 'alladhe bacatha fe al- 'ummeyen rasol(an) min -hum yatlo calay -him 'aayaat -hi wa- yuzakke -him wa- yucallim -hum al- kitaab wa- al- h.ikmah wa- 'in kaano min qablu la- fe d.alaal muben
wa- 'aakharen min -hum lammaa yalh.aqo bi- -him wa- huwa al- cazez al- h.akem
dhaalika fad.l 'allaah yu'te -hi man yashaa' wa- 'allaah dho al- fad.l al- caz.em

mathal 'alladhena h.ummilo at- tawraah thumma lam yah.milo -haa ka- mathal al- h.imaar yah.mil asfaar(an) bi's mathal al- qawm 'alladhena kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat 'allaah wa- 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
qul yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena haado 'in zacamtum 'anna -kum awliyaa' li- 'allaah min doni an- naas fa- tamannawu al- mawt 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
wa- laa yatamannawn -hu 'abad(an) bi- maa qaddamat ayde -him wa- 'allaah calem bi- az.- z.aalimen
qul 'inna al- mawt 'alladhe tafirron min -hu fa- 'inna -hu mulaaqe -kum thumma turaddon 'ilaa caalim al- ghayb wa- ash- shahaadah fa- yunabbi' -kum bi- maa kuntum tacmalon
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'idhaa nodiya li- as.- s.alaah min yawm al- jumucah fa- iscaw 'ilaa dhikr 'allaah wa- dharo al- bayc dhaalikum khayr la- -kum 'in kuntum taclamon
fa- 'idhaa qud.iyat as.- s.alaah fa- intashiro fe al- 'ard. wa- ibtagho min fad.l 'allaah wa- udhkuro 'allaah kather(an) lacalla -kum tuflih.on
wa- 'idhaa ra'aw tijaarah 'aw lahw(an) infad.d.o 'ilay -haa wa- tarako -ka qaa'im(an) qul maa cinda 'allaah khayr min al- lahw wa- min at- tijaarah wa- 'allaah khayr ar- raaziqen
'idhaa jaa'a -ka al- munaafiqon qaalo nashhad 'inna -ka li- rasol 'allaah wa- 'allaah yaclam 'inna -ka la- rasol -hu wa- 'allaah yashhad 'inna al- munaafiqen la- kaadhibon
ittakhadho aymaan -hum junnah fa- s.addo can sabel 'allaah 'inna -hum saa'a maa kaano yacmalon
dhaalika bi- 'anna -hum 'aamano thumma kafaro fa- t.ubica calaa qulob -him fa- hum laa yafqahon

wa- 'idhaa ra'ayta -hum tucjib -ka ajsaam -hum wa- 'in yaqolo tasmac li- qawl -him ka-'anna -hum khushub musannadah yah.sabon kull s.ayh.ah calay -him hum al- cadow fa- ih.dhar -hum qaatala -hum 'allaah 'annaa yu'fakon
wa- 'idhaa qela la- -hum tacaalaw yastaghfir la- -kum rasol 'allaah lawwaw ru'os -hum wa- ra'ayta -hum yas.uddon wa- hum mustakbiron
sawaa' calay -him 'a- istaghfarta la- -hum 'am lam tastaghfir la- -hum lan yaghfir 'allaah la- -hum 'inna 'allaah laa yahde al- qawm al- faasiqen
hum 'alladhena yaqolon laa tunfiqo calaa man cinda rasol 'allaah h.attaa yanfad.d.o wa- li- 'allaah khazaa'in as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- laakin al- munaafiqen laa yafqahon
yaqolon la- 'in rajacnaa 'ilaa al- madenah la- yukhrijanna al- acazz min -haa al- adhall wa- li- 'allaah al- cizzah wa- li- rasol -hi wa- li- al- mu'minen wa- laakin al- munaafiqen laa yaclamon
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano laa tulhi -kum amwaal -kum wa- laa awlaad -kum can dhikr 'allaah wa- man yafcal dhaalika fa- 'olaa'ika hum al- khaasiron
wa- anfiqo min maa razaqnaa -kum min qabli 'an ya'tiya 'ah.ad -kum al- mawt fa- yaqol rabb -i law-laa 'akhkharta -ne 'ilaa 'ajal qareb fa- as.s.addaq wa- akun min as.- s.aalih.en
wa- lan yu'akhkhir 'allaah nafs(an) 'idhaa jaa'a 'ajal -haa wa- 'allaah khaber bi- maa tacmalon
yusabbih. li- 'allaah maa fe as- samaawaat wa- maa fe al- 'ard. la- -hu al- mulk wa- la- -hu al- h.amd wa- huwa calaa kull shay' qader
huwa 'alladhe khalaqa -kum fa- min -kum kaafir wa- min -kum mu'min wa- 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon bas.er
khalaqa as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. bi- al- h.aqq wa- s.awwara -kum fa- ah.sana s.uwar -kum wa- 'ilay -hi al- mas.er
yaclam maa fe as- samaawaat wa- al- 'ard. wa- yaclam maa tusirron wa- maa tuclinon wa- 'allaah calem bi- dhaat as.- s.udor
'a- lam ya'ti -kum naba' 'alladhena kafaro min qablu fa- dhaaqo wabaal 'amr -him wa- la- -hum cadhaab 'alem
dhaalika bi- 'anna -hu kaanat ta'te -him rusul -hum bi- al- bayyinaat fa- qaalo 'a- bashar yahdon -naa fa- kafaro wa- tawallaw wa- istaghnaa 'allaah wa- 'allaah ghaney h.amed
zacama 'alladhena kafaro 'an lan yubcatho qul balaa wa- rabb -e la- tubcathunna thumma la- tunabba'unna bi- maa camiltum wa- dhaalika calaa 'allaah yaser
fa- 'aamino bi- 'allaah wa- rasol -hi wa- an- nor 'alladhe anzalnaa wa- 'allaah bi- maa tacmalon khaber

yawm yajmac -kum li- yawm al- jamc dhaalika yawm at- taghaabun wa- man yu'min bi- 'allaah wa- yacmal s.aalih.(an) yukaffir can -hu sayyi'aat -hi wa- yudkhil -hu jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa 'abad(an) dhaalika al- fawz al- caz.em
wa- 'alladhena kafaro wa- kadhdhabo bi- 'aayaat -naa 'olaa'ika as.h.aab an- naar khaaliden fe -haa wa- bi's al- mas.er
maa as.aaba min mus.ebah 'illaa bi- 'idhn 'allaah wa- man yu'min bi- 'allaah yahdi qalb -hu wa- 'allaah bi- kull shay' calem
wa- at.eco 'allaah wa- at.eco ar- rasol fa- 'in tawallaytum fa- 'inna-maa calaa rasol -naa al- balaagh al- muben
'allaah laa 'ilaah 'illaa huwa wa- calaa 'allaah fa- li- yatawakkal al- mu'minon
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano 'inna min azwaaj -kum wa- awlaad -kum cadow la- -kum fa- ih.dharo -hum wa- 'in tacfo wa- tas.fah.o wa- taghfiro fa- 'inna 'allaah ghafor rah.em
'inna-maa amwaal -kum wa- awlaad -kum fitnah wa- 'allaah cinda -hu 'ajr caz.em
fa- ittaqo 'allaah maa istat.actum wa- ismaco wa- at.eco wa- anfiqo khayr(an) li- anfus -kum wa- man yoqa shuh.h. nafs -hi fa- 'olaa'ika hum al- muflih.on
'in tuqrid.o 'allaah qard.(an) h.asan(an) yud.aacif -hu la- -kum wa- yaghfir la- -kum wa- 'allaah shakor h.alem
caalim al- ghayb wa- ash- shahaadah al- cazez al- h.akem

yaa 'ayyuhaa an- nabey 'idhaa t.allaqtum an- nisaa' fa- t.alliqo -hunna li- ciddah -hinna wa- ah.s.o al- ciddah wa- ittaqo 'allaah rabb -kum laa tukhrijo -hunna min buyot -hinna wa- laa yakhrujna 'illaa 'an ya'tena bi- faah.ishah mubayyinah wa- tilka h.udod 'allaah wa- man yatacadd h.udod 'allaah fa- qad z.alama nafs -hu laa tadre lacalla 'allaah yuh.dith bacda dhaalika 'amr(an)

fa- 'idhaa balaghnaa 'ajal -hunna fa- amsiko -hunna bi- macrof 'aw faariqo -hunna bi- macrof wa- ashhido dhawe cadl min -kum wa- aqemo ash- shahaadah li- 'allaah dhaalikum yocaz. bi- -hi man kaana yu'min bi- 'allaah wa- al- yawm al- 'aakhir wa- man yattaqi 'allaah yajcal la- -hu makhraj(an)
wa- yarzuq -hu min h.aythu laa yah.tasib wa- man yatawakkal calaa 'allaah fa- huwa h.asb -hu 'inna 'allaah baaligh 'amr -hi qad jacala 'allaah li- kull shay' qadr(an)

wa- 'allaa'e ya'isna min al- mah.ed. min nisaa' -kum 'in irtabtum fa- ciddah -hunna thalaathah ashhur wa- 'allaa'e lam yah.id.na wa- 'olaat al- ah.maal 'ajal -hunna 'an yad.acna h.aml -hunna wa- man yattaqi 'allaah yajcal la- -hu min 'amr -hi yusr(an)
dhaalika 'amr 'allaah anzala -hu 'ilay -kum wa- man yattaqi 'allaah yukaffir can -hu sayyi'aat -hi wa- yucz.im la- -hu 'ajr(an)

askino -hunna min h.aythu sakantum min wujd -kum wa- laa tud.aarro -hunna li- tud.ayyiqo calay -hinna wa- 'in kunna 'olaat h.aml fa- anfiqo calay -hinna h.attaa yad.acna h.aml -hunna fa- 'in ard.acna la- -kum fa- 'aato -hunna 'ujor -hunna wa- i'tamiro bayna -kum bi- macrof wa- 'in tacaasartum fa- sa- turd.ic la- -hu 'ukhraa

li- yunfiq dho sacah min sacah -hi wa- man qudira calay -hi rizq -hu fa- li- yunfiq min maa 'aataa -hu 'allaah laa yukallif 'allaah nafs(an) 'illaa maa 'ataa -haa sa- yajcal 'allaah bacda cusr yusr(an)
wa- ka-'ayyin min qaryah catat can 'amr rabb -haa wa- rusul -hi fa- h.aasabnaa -haa h.isaab(an) shaded(an) wa- cadhdhabnaa -haa cadhaab nukr(an)
fa- dhaaqat wabaal 'amr -haa wa- kaana caaqibah 'amr -haa khusr(an)
acadda 'allaah la- -hum cadhaab(an) shaded(an) fa- ittaqo 'allaah yaa 'ole al- albaab 'alladhena 'aamano qad anzala 'allaah 'ilay -kum dhikr(an)

rasol(an) yatlo calay -kum 'aayaat 'allaah mubayyinaat li- yukhrij 'alladhena 'aamano wa- camilo as.- s.aalih.aat min az.- z.ulumaat 'ilaa an- nor wa- man yu'min bi- 'allaah wa- yacmal s.aalih.(an) yudkhil -hu jannaat tajre min tah.ti -haa al- anhaar khaaliden fe -haa 'abad(an) qad ah.sana 'allaah la- -hu rizq(an)

'allaah 'alladhe khalaqa sabc samaawaat wa- min al- 'ard. mithl -hunna yatanazzal al- 'amr bayna -hunna li- taclamo 'anna 'allaah calaa kull shay' qader wa- 'anna 'allaah qad ah.aat.a bi- kull shay' cilm(an)
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- nabey li- ma(a) tuh.arrim maa ah.alla 'allaah la- -ka tabtaghe mard.aat azwaaj -ka wa- 'allaah ghafor rah.em
qad farad.a 'allaah la- -kum tah.illah aymaan -kum wa- 'allaah mawlaa -kum wa- huwa al- calem al- h.akem

wa- 'idh asarra an- nabey 'ilaa bacd. azwaaj -hu h.adeth(an) fa- lammaa nabba'at bi- -hi wa- az.hara -hu 'allaah calay -hi carrafa bacd. -hu wa- acrad.a can bacd. fa- lammaa nabba'a -haa bi- -hi qaalat man anba'a haadhaa qaala nabba'a -ne al- calem al- khaber
'in tatobaa 'ilaa 'allaah fa- qad s.aghat qulob -kumaa wa- 'in taz.aaharaa calay -hi fa- 'inna 'allaah huwa mawlaa -hu wa- jibrel wa- s.aalih. al- mu'minen wa- al- malaa'ikah bacda dhaalika z.aher
casaa rabb -hu 'in t.allaqa -kunna 'an yubdil -hu azwaaj(an) khayr(an) min -kunna muslimaat mu'minaat qaanitaat taa'ibaat caabidaat saa'ih.aat thayyibaat wa- abkaar(an)

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano qo anfus -kum wa- 'ahle -kum naar(an) waqod -haa an- naas wa- al- h.ijaarah calay -haa malaa'ikah ghilaaz. shidaad laa yacs.on 'allaah maa 'amara -hum wa- yafcalon maa yu'maron
yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena kafaro laa tactadhiro al- yawm 'inna-maa tujzawn maa kuntum tacmalon

yaa 'ayyuhaa 'alladhena 'aamano tobo 'ilaa 'allaah tawbah nas.oh.(an) casaa rabb -kum 'an yukaffir can -kum sayyi'aat -kum wa- yudkhil -kum jannaat tajre min tah.ta -haa al- anhaar yawm laa yukhze 'allaah an- nabey wa- 'alladhena 'aamano maca -hu nor -hum yascaa bayna ayde -him wa- bi- aymaan -him yaqolon rabb -naa atmim la- -naa nor -naa wa- ighfir la- -naa 'inna -ka calaa kull shay' qader
yaa 'ayyuhaa an- nabey jaahid al- kuffaar wa- al- munaafiqen wa- ughluz. calay -him wa- ma'waa -hum jahannam wa- bi's al- mas.er

d.araba 'allaah mathal(an) li- 'alladhena kafaro imra'ah noh. wa- imra'ah lot. kaanataa tah.ta cabdain min cibaad -naa s.aalih.ain fa- khaanataa -humaa fa- lam yughniyaa can -humaa min 'allaah shay'(an) wa- qela udkhulaa an- naar maca ad- daakhilen

wa- d.araba 'allaah mathal(an) li- 'alladhena 'aamano imra'ah fircawn 'idh qaalat rabb -i ibni li- -y cinda -ka bayt(an) fe al- jannah wa- najji -ne min fircawn wa- camal -hi wa- najji -ne min al- qawm az.- z.aalimen
wa- maryam ibnat cimraan 'allate ah.s.anat farj -haa fa- nafakhnaa fe -hi min roh. -naa wa- s.addaqat bi- kalimaat rabb -haa wa- kutub -hi wa- kaanat min al- qaaniten
tabaaraka 'alladhe bi- yad -hi al- mulk wa- huwa calaa kull shay' qader
'alladhe khalaqa al- mawt wa- al- h.ayaah li- yabluwa -kum 'ayy -kum ah.san camal(an) wa- huwa al- cazez al- ghafor
'alladhe khalaqa sabc samaawaat t.ibaaq(an) maa taraa fe khalq ar- rah.maan min tafaawut fa- irjic al- bas.ar hal taraa min fut.or
thumma irjic al- bas.ar karratain yanqalib 'ilay -ka al- bas.ar khaasi'(an) wa- huwa h.aser
wa- la- qad zayyannaa as- samaa' ad- dunyaa bi- mas.aabeh. wa- jacalnaa -haa rujom(an) li- ash- shayaat.en wa- actadnaa la- -hum cadhaab as- sacer
wa- li- 'alladhena kafaro bi- rabb -him cadhaab jahannam wa- bi's al- mas.er
'idhaa ulqo fe -haa samico la- -haa shaheq(an) wa- hiya tafor
takaad tamayyaz min al- ghayz. kulla-maa ulqiya fe -haa fawj sa'ala -hum khazanah -haa 'a- lam ya'ti -kum nadher
qaalo balaa qad jaa'a -naa nadher fa- kadhdhabnaa wa- qulnaa maa nazzala 'allaah min shay' 'in 'antum 'illaa fe d.alaal kaber
wa- qaalo law kunnaa nasmac 'aw nacqil maa kunnaa fe as.h.aab as- sacer
fa- ictarafo bi- dhanb -him fa- suh.q(an) li- as.h.aab as- sacer
'inna 'alladhena yakhshawn rabb -hum bi- al- ghayb la- -hum maghfirah wa- 'ajr kaber
wa- asirro qawl -kum 'aw ajharo bi- -hi 'inna -hu calem bi- dhaat as.- s.udor
'a- laa yaclam man khalaqa wa- huwa al- lat.ef al- khaber
huwa 'alladhe jacala la- -kum al- 'ard. dhalol(an) fa- imsho fe manaakib -haa wa- kulo min rizq -hi wa- 'ilay -hi an- nushor
'a- 'amintum man fe as- samaa' 'an yakhsif bi- -kum al- 'ard. fa- 'idhaa hiya tamor
'am 'amintum man fe as- samaa' 'an yursil calay -kum h.aas.ib(an) fa- sa- taclamon kayfa nadher
wa- la- qad kadhdhaba 'alladhena min qabli -him fa- kayfa kaana naker
'a- wa- lam yaraw 'ilaa at.- t.ayr fawqa -hum s.aaffaat wa- yaqbid.na maa yumsik -hunna 'illaa ar- rah.maan 'inna -hu bi- kull shayy bas.er
'am man haadhaa 'alladhe huwa jund la- -kum yans.ur -kum min doni ar- rah.maan 'in al- kaafiron 'illaa fe ghuror
'am man haadhaa 'alladhe yarzuq -kum 'in amsaka rizq -hu bal lajjo fe cutow wa- nufor
'a- fa- man yamshe mukibb(an) calaa wajh -hi ahdaa 'am man yamshe sawey(an) calaa s.iraat. mustaqem
qul huwa 'alladhe ansha'a -kum wa- jacala la- -kum as- samc wa- al- abs.aar wa- al- af'idah qalel(an) maa tashkuron
qul huwa 'alladhe dhara'a -kum fe al- 'ard. wa- 'ilay -hi tuh.sharon
wa- yaqolon mataa haadhaa al- wacd 'in kuntum s.aadiqen
qul 'inna-maa al- cilm cinda 'allaah wa- 'inna-maa 'anaa nadher muben
fa- lammaa ra'aw -hu zulfah se'at wujoh 'alladhena kafaro wa- qela haadhaa 'alladhe kuntum bi- -hi taddacon
qul 'a- ra'aytum 'in ahlaka -ne 'allaah wa- man maci -ya 'aw rah.ima -naa fa- man yujer al- kaafiren min cadhaab 'alem
qul huwa ar- rah.maan 'aamannaa bi- -hi wa- calay -hi tawakkalnaa fa- sa- taclamon man huwa fe d.alaal muben
qul 'a- ra'aytum 'in as.bah.a maa' -kum ghawr(an) fa- man ya'te -kum bi- maa' macen
non wa- al- qalam wa- maa yast.uron
maa 'anta bi- nicmah rabb -ka bi- majnon
wa- 'inna la- -ka la- 'ajr(an) ghayr mamnon
wa- 'inna -ka la- calaa khuluq caz.em
fa- sa- tubs.ir wa- yubs.iron
bi- 'ayy -kum al- mafton
'inna rabb -ka huwa aclam bi- man d.alla can sabel -hi wa- huwa aclam bi- al- muhtaden
fa- laa tut.ic al- mukadhdhiben
waddo law tudhin fa- yudhinon
wa- laa tut.ic kull h.allaaf muhen
hammaaz mashshaa' bi- namem
mannaac li- al- khayr muctadi(n) 'athem
cutull bacda dhaalika zanem
'an kaana dhaa maal wa- banen
'idhaa tutlaa calay -hi 'aayaat -naa qaala asaat.er al- 'awwalen
sa- nasim -hu calaa al- khurt.om
'in(na) -naa balawnaa -hum ka-maa balawnaa as.h.aab al- jannah 'idh aqsamo la- yas.rimunna -haa mus.bih.en
wa- laa yastathnon
fa- t.aafa calay -haa t.aa'if min rabb -ka wa- hum naa'imon
fa- as.bah.at ka- as.- s.arem
fa- tanaadaw mus.bih.en
'an ughdo calaa h.arth -kum 'in kuntum s.aarimen
fa- int.alaqo wa- hum yatakhaafaton
'an laa yadkhulanna -haa al- yawm calay -kum misken
wa- ghadaw calaa h.ard qaadiren
fa- lammaa ra'aw -haa qaalo 'in(na) -naa la- d.aallon
bal nah.nu mah.romon
qaala awsat. -hum 'a- lam 'a- qul la- -kum law-laa tusabbih.on
qaalo subh.aana rabb -naa 'in(na) -naa kunnaa z.aalimen
fa- aqbala bacd. -hum calaa bacd. yatalaawamon
qaalo yaa wayl -naa 'in(na) -naa kunnaa t.aaghen
casaa rabb -naa 'an yubdil -naa khayr(an) min -haa 'in(na) -naa 'ilaa rabb -naa raaghibon
ka- dhaalika al- cadhaab wa- la- cadhaab al- 'aakhirah akbar law kaano yaclamon
'inna li- al- muttaqen cinda rabb -him jannaat an- nacem
'a- fa- najcal al- muslimen ka- al- mujrimen
maa la- -kum kayfa tah.kumon
'am la- -kum kitaab fe -hi tadruson
'inna la- -kum fe -hi la- maa takhayyaron
'am la- -kum aymaan calay -naa baalighah 'ilaa yawm al- qiyaamah 'inna la- -kum la- maa tah.kumon
sal -hum 'ayy -hum bi- dhaalika zacem
'am la- -hum shurakaa' fa- li- ya'to bi- shurakaa' -him 'in kaano s.aadiqen
yawm yukshaf can saaqi(n) wa- yudcawn 'ilaa as- sujod fa- laa yastat.econ
khaashicah abs.aar -hum tarhaq -hum dhillah wa- qad kaano yudcawn 'ilaa as- sujod wa- hum saalimon
fa- dhar -ne wa- man yukadhdhib bi- haadhaa al- h.adeth sa- nastadrij -hum min h.aythu laa yaclamon
wa- umle la- -hum 'inna kayd -e maten
'am tas'al -hum 'ajr(an) fa- hum min maghram muthqalon
'am cinda -hum al- ghayb fa- hum yaktubon
fa- is.bir li- h.ukm rabb -ka wa- laa takun ka- s.aah.ib al- h.ot 'idh naadaa wa- huwa makz.om
law-laa 'an tadaaraka -hu nicmah min rabb -hi la- nubidha bi- al- caraa' wa- huwa madhmom
fa- ijtabaa -hu rabb -hu fa- jacala -hu min as.- s.aalih.en
wa- 'in yakaad 'alladhena kafaro la- yuzliqon -ka bi- abs.aar -him lammaa samico adh- dhikr wa- yaqolon 'inna -hu la- majnon
wa- maa huwa 'illaa dhikr li- al- caalamen
al- h.aaqqah
maa al- h.aaqqah
wa- maa adraa -ka maa al- h.aaqqah
kadhdhabat thamod wa- caad bi- al- qaaricah
fa- 'ammaa thamod fa- uhliko bi- at.- t.aaghiyah
wa- 'ammaa caad fa- uhliko bi- reh. s.ars.ar caatiyah
sakhkhara -haa calay -him sabc layaal(in) wa- thamaaniyah ayyaam h.usom(an) fa- taraa al- qawm fe -haa s.arc(an) ka-'anna -hum acjaaz nakhl khaawiyah
fa- hal taraa la- -hum min baaqiyah
wa- jaa'a fircawn wa- man qabla -hu wa- al- mu'tafikaat bi- al- khaat.i'ah
fa- cas.aw rasol rabb -him fa- 'akhadha -hum 'akhdhah raabiyah
'in(na) -naa lammaa t.aghaa al- maa' h.amalnaa -kum fe al- jaariyah
li- najcal -haa la- -kum tadhkirah wa- taciya -haa 'udhun waaciyah
fa- 'idhaa nufikha fe as.- s.or nafkhah waah.idah
wa- h.umilat al- 'ard. wa- al- jibaal fa- dukkataa dakkah waah.idah
fa- yawma'idhin waqacat al- waaqicah
wa- inshaqqat as- samaa' fa- hiya yawma'idhin waahiyah
wa- al- malak calaa arjaa' -haa wa- yah.mil carsh rabb -ka fawqa -hum yawma'idhin thamaaniyah
yawma'idhin tucrad.on laa takhfaa min -kum khaafiyah
fa- 'ammaa man 'otiya kitaab -hu bi- yamen -hi fa- yaqol haa'um iqra'o kitaab -iyah
'inni -y z.anantu 'anni -y mulaaqi(n) h.isaab -iyah
fa- huwa fe ceshah raad.iyah
fe jannah caaliyah
qut.of -haa daaniyah
kulo wa- ishrabo hane'(an) bi- maa aslaftum fe al- ayyaam al- khaaliyah
wa- 'ammaa man 'otiya kitaab -hu bi- shimaal -hi fa- yaqol yaa layta -ne lam 'ota kitaab -iyah
wa- lam adri maa h.isaab -iyah
yaa layta -haa kaanat al- qaad.iyah
maa aghnaa can -ne maal -iyah
halaka can -ne sult.aan -iyah
khudho -hu fa- ghullo -hu
thumma al- jah.em s.allo -hu
thumma fe silsilah dharc -haa sabcon dhiraac(an) fa- usluko -hu
'inna -hu kaana laa yu'min bi- 'allaah al- caz.em
wa- laa yah.ud.d. calaa t.acaam al- misken
fa- laysa la- -hu al- yawm haahunaa h.amem
wa- laa t.acaam 'illaa min ghislen
laa ya'kul -hu 'illaa al- khaat.i'on
fa- laa uqsim bi- maa tubs.iron
wa- maa laa tubs.iron
'inna -hu la- qawl rasol karem
wa- maa huwa bi- qawl shaacir qalel(an) maa tu'minon
wa- laa bi- qawl kaahin qalel(an) maa tadhakkaron
tanzel min rabb al- caalamen
wa- law taqawwala calay -naa bacd. al- aqaawel
la- 'akhadhnaa min -hu bi- al- yamen
thumma la- qat.acnaa min -hu al- waten
fa- maa min -kum min 'ah.ad can -hu h.aajizen
wa- 'inna -hu la- tadhkirah li- al- muttaqen
wa- 'in(na) -naa la- naclam 'anna min -kum mukadhdhiben
wa- 'inna -hu la- h.asrah calaa al- kaafiren
wa- 'inna -hu la- h.aqq al- yaqen
fa- sabbih. bi- ism rabb -ka al- caz.em
sa'ala saa'il bi- cadhaab waaqic
li- al- kaafiren laysa la- -hu daafic
min 'allaah dhe al- macaarij
tacruj al- malaa'ikah wa- ar- roh. 'ilay -hi fe yawm kaana miqdaar -hu khamsen 'alf sanah
fa- is.bir s.abr(an) jamel(an)
'inna -hum yarawn -hu baced(an)
wa- naraa -hu qareb(an)
yawm takon as- samaa' ka- al- muhl
wa- takon al- jibaal ka- al- cihn
wa- laa yas'al h.amem h.amem(an)
yubas.s.aron -hum yawadd al- mujrim law yaftade min cadhaab yawmi'idhin bi- bane -hi
wa- s.aah.ibah -hi wa- 'akhe -hi

kallaa 'inna -haa laz.aa

'idhaa massa -hu ash- sharr jazoc(an)
wa- 'idhaa massa -hu al- khayr manoc(an)

'a- yat.mac kull imri' min -hum 'an yudkhal jannah nacem

fa- dhar -hum yakhod.o wa- yalcabo h.attaa yulaaqo yawm -hum 'alladhe yocadon

'in(na) -naa arsalnaa noh.(an) 'ilaa qawm -hi 'an andhir qawm -ka min qabli 'an ya'tiya -hum cadhaab 'alem
qaala yaa qawm -e 'inni -y la- -kum nadher muben
'an ucbudo 'allaah wa- ittaqo -hu wa- at.eco -ni

qaala rabb -i 'inni -y dacawtu qawm -e layl(an) wa- nahaar(an)
fa- lam yazid -hum ducaa' -e 'illaa firaar(an)
wa- 'inni -y kulla-maa dacawtu -hum li- taghfir la- -hum jacalo as.aabic -hum fe 'aadhaan -him wa- istaghshaw thiyaab -hum wa- as.arra wa- istakbaro istikbaar(an)
thumma 'inni -y dacawtu -hum jihaar(an)
thumma 'inni -y aclantu la- -hum wa- asrartu la- -hum israar(an)
fa- qultu istaghfiro rabb -kum 'inna -hu kaana ghaffaar(an)

qul oh.iya 'ilay -ya 'anna -hu istamaca nafar min al- jinn fa- qaalo 'in(na) -naa samicnaa qur'aan(an) cajab(an)

wa- 'an(na) -naa z.anannaa 'an lan taqol al- 'ins wa- al- jinn calaa 'allaah kadhib(an)
wa- 'anna -hu kaana rijaal min al- 'ins yacodhon bi- rijaal min al- jinn fa- zaado -hum rahaq(an)
wa- 'anna -hum z.anno ka-maa z.anantum 'an lan yabcath 'allaah 'ah.ad(an)
wa- 'an(na) -naa lamasnaa as- samaa' fa- wajadnaa -haa muli'at h.aras(an) shaded(an) wa- shuhub(an)
wa- 'an(na) -naa kunnaa naqcud min -haa maqaacid li- as- samc fa- man yastamic al-'aan yajid la- -hu shihaab(an) ras.ad(an)
wa- 'an(na) -naa laa nadre 'a- sharr ureda bi- man fe al- 'ard. 'am araada bi- -him rabb -hum rashad(an)
wa- 'an(na) -naa min -naa as.- s.aalih.on wa- min -naa dona dhaalika kunnaa t.araa'iq qidad(an)
wa- 'an(na) -naa z.anannaa 'an lan nucjiz 'allaah fe al- 'ard. wa- lan nucjiz -hu harab(an)
wa- 'an(na) -naa lammaa samicnaa al- hudaa 'aamannaa bi- -hi fa- man yu'min bi- rabb -hi fa- laa yakhaaf bakhs(an) wa- laa rahaq(an)
wa- 'an(na) -naa min -naa al- muslimon wa- min -naa al- qaasit.on fa- man aslama fa- 'olaa'ika tah.arraw rashad(an)
